Netflix & Chill'd
author: Bambooninja
title: Wonderful peanut butter flavor
text;;;: I bought this to complement some chocolate cake. The peanut butter flavor is fabulous. The salt from the pretzel enhances the flavor. I'm on the fence about the brownie because I found it a bit gooey. Brownies are a good idea but maybe make them smaller and more chewy.;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd,SweetNSalty,2020-09-01,5,Great Taste!,0,0,"I've seen a few people complain about the saltiness. Pretzels are salty and it might not be the flavor for you. However, to those of us who love pretzels, peanut butter, and brownies: This is a GREAT flavor for those of us who like the sweet and salty mix of flavors!";;;

Netflix & Chill'd,22snew,2020-02-29,5,Netflix n chilled,0,0,"THIS IS THE BEST FLAVOR EVER!!!! this flavor has been available for less than a week and my roommates and I have already bought 5 (yes you heard that right, 5!) pints!! The perfect blend of flavors. I hope this is a flavor for as long as I live! By far the best!";;;

Netflix & Chill'd,Thebandits,2020-05-19,5,Gave my husband a sweet tooth.,0,0,"Delicious sweet-salty flavour is our household favourite. My husband doesn’t usually eat dessert and the first tub we bought, I had a single, humble scoop, only to find out the next evening that he had finished the pot. I wish I had a bigger freezer.";;;

Netflix & Chill'd,,2020-08-31,4,I've Bought it Three Times,0,0,"Peanut butter and then the juxtaposition of the salt in the pretzels. So...read the review title and that's pretty much all. I watch movies with it, usually documentaries, dark comedies, or something uber tacky and sentimental like ""Dumb and Dumber.""";;;

Netflix & Chill'd,Debra8308,2020-08-10,5,Simply amazzzin,0,0,"This ice cream is the perfect balance of different flavors all in one! I just can not get enough. Just when I think I have had enough I gotta keep going back to get more of that flavor explosion! Great job, please please don’t ever stop making it!!";;;

text;;;: If they get rid of this flavor I’ll literally sob! It’s the best one they’ve ever made! I’m not an ice cream person but bought one out of sheer curiosity and I can’t stop. It’s perfectly salty and sweet! Hands down the best ice cream I’ve ever had!;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd,givemethecream007,2020-05-07,4,Golden ratio ice cream,0,0,"The peanut butter ice cream is deliciously rich and creamy. The brownie swirls are gooey and proportional with every bite, which pairs so well with the ice cream. The pretzels add an awesome touch to a balanced sweetness, salty and not too crunchy.";;;

Netflix & Chill'd,IceCreamLovinBaddie94,2020-07-03,5,So creamy and great flavours!,0,0,"Absolutely love it, the peanut butter ice cream is amazing- such great flavour and texture and the rich brownie just cuts through the thick peanut butter taste SO WELL. Netflix & Chill'd
author: TommyG
title: Interesting blend of flavors
text;;;: The Peanut Butter flavor is very good although the fudge seems out of place and rubbery. The salted pretzel is a nice compliment to the PB but the overall blend of flavors reminds me of a PB&J sandwich. OK but not amazing.;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd
author: sarah123
title: MY MOST FAVORITE ICE CREAM IN THE WORLD
text;;;: I love this ice cream and the pretzel swirl is my favorite thing. I've been waiting for B&Js to come back with this flavor. I like how salty it is. I've bought many to make sure I am stocked up. Please keep this flavor!;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd,BreG,2020-08-07,2,Where’s the Brownie?!?!,0,0,"Love the peanut butter flavour and the sweet and salty preztel swirls. Great for peanut butter lovers! However, I was disappointed that my pint did not have a single brownie bit, as mentioned in the description.";;;

author: Goon Squad

name: Netflix & Chill'd,kw81,2020-04-02,5,Great for PB lovers,0,0,"I got a pint a few weeks ago and was blown away. For the first time, I found an ice cream with a decent peanut butter flavor. The salty pretzel swirl adds a nice little flavor boost. I need more!";;;

Netflix & Chill'd,rstap,2020-08-23,5,This stuff is bomb!,0,0,"I didn’t think I would even like peanut butter ice cream and now this is one of my all time favorites!! I love the bit of saltiness and the brownie chunks are so soft. Oh man, it’s so dang gooooood.";;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd
author: Val22
title: My new favorite flavor
text;;;: I looked EVERYWHERE for this and it was totally worth it!! So so so good. Keep your eyes peeling in the freezer sections and don’t miss out!!;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd
author: RachelSuzanne
title: Great new flavor!
text;;;: I love it. Please keep it around! I've tried both the vegan variety and the regular. Both delicious. That salty pretzel swirl. Wow. I also love the peanut butter base.;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd
author: Jmoo
title: My Favorite... made me an ice cream person
text;;;: I’m not one to choose ice cream over other sweets but this has changed that. By far the best flavor. I’ve bought a pint every week for the last 4 weeks. Delicious!;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd
author: Talll
title: It’s my new favourite flavour.
text;;;: I absolutely love the taste the combination between sweet and salty is perfect it’s sooooo good I literally finished the whole ice cream by myself in one day;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd
author: Ellie2647
title: Baddiebx
text;;;: My girl on TikTok names baddiebx recommended this flavour to me and my friends so we all brought it and it’s amazing I’m so greatful she told me about it;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd
author: KWeez
title: What Dreams Are Made Of
text;;;: My husband picked this up for me to make up for eating all of the Glampfire Trail Mix. And I'm so glad he did! Favorite flavor to date! Thank you! :);;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd,cg27,2020-08-01,5,DELICIOUS!,0,0,"Delicious combination peanut butter, gooey brownie, and salty pretzel. Love the texture and balance of flavors, please make this a permanent flavor!";;;
Netflix & Chill'd
author: eeeeeejay
title: Please never stop making this flavor!
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream. We've been buying this regularly. The mix of salty and sweet is perfect. Please always make this flavor!;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd,Jd24,2020-08-02,5,New favorite!,0,0,"I'm in loooove, the peanut butter ice cream isn't too sweet like many others are, and the salty pretzel swirl is *chef's kiss* perfect.";;;
Netflix & Chill'd
author: IceCreamGuy23
title: OH YEAH!
text;;;: Bought this because I'm trying to try all the Ben and Jerry's flavors and was really happy with how great it is! Would buy again!;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd
author: Lauren B
title: So much salt
text;;;: Some bites are magical and some are HORRIBLE. I ended up tossing this day 2 because it was way too salty. Super disappointed.;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd
author: Baroness
title: Best ice cream ever
text;;;: Not usually an ice cream person but this flavour is absolutely amazing and I can’t get enough of it!Very bad for my diet!;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd,lizagna,2020-06-06,5,MY NEW FAVORITE,0,0,"I was skeptical at first but this is my new favorite ice cream! Found it in Durham, NC - haven't yet found it home in AL.";;;
Netflix & Chill'd
author: Smully
title: Favorite!
text;;;: I think this is my favorite! My bus and and I hide them in the freezer from each other because we don’t want to share.;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd,Rachael86,2020-06-02,5,Amazing!,0,0,"This Ice Cream is the best! It is salty, it is sweet! The taste is heavenly please do not stop making this flavour!";;;
Netflix & Chill'd
author: AllisoninSF
title: My favorite flavor
text;;;: The salty pretzel swirl sets this flavor apart. It's dangerous for me to keep this in my house--I just can't stop.;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd,CarlySyz,2020-06-10,5,PB ice cream- what could be wrong?,0,0,"If you love peanut butter, you’ll love this. There is more fudge than pretzel- or at least there was in mine.";;;
Netflix & Chill'd,jaymz21,2020-08-03,5,the BEST,0,0,"Absolutely perfect combination!!! Creamy, peanut buttery, and slightly salty from the pretzels. Perfection";;;
Netflix & Chill'd
author: Melyy28
title: Great Flavors except the brownie
text;;;: I like the peanut butter ice cream and the salty pretzel (my wife didn’t) but I’m not a fan of the brownie;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd,JennEd,2020-09-02,5,Fantastic!,0,0,"My favorite Ben & Jerry’s flavor and one of my favorite ice creams ever. Salty pretzels, chewy brownies.";;;
Netflix & Chill'd
author: dorie
title: Amazing
text;;;: This is by far my favorite! I keep my freezer stocked when I can find them!! This flavor is a keeper!;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd,Teach,2020-08-05,5,Best DoorDash purchase!,0,0,"Soooo delicious! Spoonfuls of happy in this paininthebackside pandemic! Well done, Ben & Jerry's!";;;
Netflix & Chill'd
author: joklein
title: Best ice cream ever
text;;;: This ice cream is literally my favorite thing in the whole world. It's perfect in every way;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd
author: Samir07
title: Best Ice Cream Ever
text;;;: I LOVE this flavor. I bought one pint and have since bought 25 pints in (2 or 3 months).;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd
author: angiemarie12345
title: Amazing taste!!!
text;;;: Bought this yesterday and ate it outside on the porch. Best ice cream i’ve had in a while!;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd,Smjones816,2020-08-24,3,More fudge brownie,0,0,"I bought this a few weeks ago, it needs more fudge brownie. Will go back to phish food.";;;
Netflix & Chill'd,Melanie122,2020-08-08,5,Best ice cream flavor I’ve ever had,0,0,"I eat ice cream nightly, this one beats every other flavor. Please never stop making it";;;
Netflix & Chill'd
author: Nikayla
title: Please keep this forever. I love it
text;;;: Oh my lord. Best I’ve cream I have ever had!!! I go out of my way to find this.;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd,casey0525,2020-05-19,5,MORE THAN LOVED,0,0,"this is by far my favorite flavor, i'm going tomorrow to get about 4 more lol";;;
Netflix & Chill'd
author: Gazz
title: Nirvana
text;;;: This is the best ice cream I've ever had. Please never stop production.;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd
author: QuitaB
title: And the Nominee for best ice cream flavor!
text;;;: I am a Ben &Jerry's fanatic. Netflix and Chilled is soooooo bomb.;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd
author: The Rockin Fig
title: Two Big Thumbs Up!
text;;;: This flavor better not go away. I mean like EVER!!! So tasty!;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd
author: Emmaaaaaaaaa
title: Dreamy
text;;;: Bought this ice cream three times now and I’m obsessed. 10/10;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd
author: Babyruth
title: Great flavor
text;;;: The brownie pieces are awful but everything else is great;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd
author: kjkj
title: The Best Flavor
text;;;: This is by far the best B&J flavor ever. I devoured it.;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd
author: PireLuvsIceCream
title: Its a nice flavour but..
text;;;: I didnt saw any pieces of pretzel when i was eating It.;;;

name: Netflix & Chill'd
author: macalao
title: Couldn't be more delicious!
text;;;: Wait... Maybe with some white chocolate pieces????;;;

name: Chip Happens,chelsealovesicecream,2020-05-13,5,BEST flavor EVER,22,8,"During quarantine I was living off of Half Baked...but when I went to the store all that was left was Chip Happens. Having been heartbroken by another brand's ""Milkshake and Fries"" I reluctantly bought Chip Happens. I am happy to report Ben & Jerry's NAILED this flavor. The lighter chocolate, chocolate chunks and the perfectly CRUNCHY salty potato chip swirl is EXACTLY what every sweet/salty craving is made of. I put on my quarantine mask and went back to the store and bought the 4 pints left. I need another freezer to stock this flavor. Hope it remains a regular flavor because it says ""limited botched edition"". Break quarantine and RUN to get Chip Happens!";;;

Chip Happens,horix,2020-07-12,5,"Please, never get rid of this potato chip flavor!",10,6,My favorite flavor used to be Late Night Snack because of the amazing innovation of the salty potato chip balls they used in combination with the sweet ice cream. The combo is heavenly. I've been waiting for years for Ben and Jerry's to bring back the potato chip ingredient and lo and behold yesterday at the store I found this flavor. It's even better than I remember late night snack being; the potato chip swirl provides a perfect salty and sweet combo in almost every bite. Please make this a permanent flavor; or at least release something else that uses this potato chip ingredient because I'll be SO sad if I have to wait years for it to appear again.;

Chip Happens,,2020-07-26,4,Love this flavor combo!,5,0,"I tried this for the first time a few days ago and the pint is already gone. This is a perfect flavor for someone that likes the sweet and salty combo (e.g. chocolate covered pretzels). The chip pieces add a nice twist to the chocolate, and the texture/consistency is not weird. There are some bites that I feel the chip chunks are a little too big,but overall it is great!";;;

Chip Happens,chipalwayshappens,2020-07-21,5,Best B&J's flavor!,4,1,"I am a lover of all things sweet and salty, so when I saw this in my grocery freezer I just knew I had to try it. Ben & Jerry's did NOT disappoint with this flavor! I've searched for and bought this flavor countless times since I first found it a few months back, and I enjoy it a little more each time. The sweet & salty balance in this one is perfect. The only downside I can say is that the consistency of the potato chips are often in botches and not evenly distributed throughout, but that's nothing some scoop controlling can't fix. Please keep this one permanently!";;;

Chip Happens,Sierrastdenis,2020-07-19,5,Amazing!,5,5,"I was so excited when I saw this flavor! I am usually picky with different ice cream flavors. Ben and Jerry’s used to have a flavor that was called The Kitchen Sink...I believe, which was vanilla ice cream with chunks of potato chips mixed in! It was my absolute favorite! I was so upset when it was discontinued! When I found this ice cream I was SO EXCITED! I’m hoping this will become a permanent flavor!";;;

Chip Happens,Sydsscoops,2020-07-19,5,Should be a permanent flavor,31,7,"This achieved what Late Night Snack could not--it is a FANTASTIC flavor. The chip swirls have the perfect salt content and potato taste. They stay crispy, which is a great complement to the thin crunch of the chocolate chips and that smooth, almost milk chocolate ice cream. THIS SHOULD BE A PERMANENT FLAVOR. IT'S SO GOOD.";;;

Chip Happens,MJamz,2020-05-01,4,Chip Chip Hooray!,5,7,"Fresh off the taste test, I'd say this was a great addition to the flavor line-up! It's simple but different enough from the usual B&J's components (although those are great too!). I appreciate that the base is a bit of a lighter, milkier chocolate-- more like in Chocolate Shake It than Fudge Brownie. The potato chip swirl is fantastically crunchy and salty. I'd love a real mish-mosh with a split between chocolate and vanilla (or peanut butter), and BOTH the chip and pretzel swirl (like in Glampfire Trail Mix)... what botch heaven that would be.";;;

Chip Happens,JLI7,2020-07-30,5,Blissful Contrast,2,0,"I am not usually the type that likes a lot of mix-in’s in my ice cream, in fact, it would be accurate to call me a plain Jane. However, I just recently happened to go on to your website and saw that this was a new flavor so after a trip to the grocery store......my palette my most pleased. It was such a wonderful combination both with the velvety chocolate ice cream and then the salty crunch of the potato chips!! Well done———-you most definitely nailed it!!!!!";;;

Chip Happens,JayIceCream,2020-05-13,3,Bring back Late Night Snack!,5,3,"Can I express how excited I was to see this on the shelves? I was beyond excited since I was a HUGE fan of Late Night Snack. Upon opening the lid, I noticed chocolate ice cream with giant chunks of chocolate chips and potato chips.On my first bite, I tasted molasses and then bits of chocolates and potato chips. I wasn't a fan of the strong taste of molasses.. Perhaps I was expecting something similar to the discontinued Late Night Snack. Chips Happen wasn't bad but it wasn't great.";;;

Chip Happens,LAloveschips,2020-08-08,5,Please keep this as a permanent flavor!!,0,0,"Simple and delicious flavors with great texture! The potato chip stays crispy, and it works great with the size of the chocolate chips. If I were to change anything, I’d add some more potato chip swirls. Maybe even keep the potato chip swirls but then include chocolate covered potato chips instead of the chocolate chips? I really hope this isn’t a fleeting “limited botch”";;;
Chip Happens,Rayah,2020-04-19,5,For all the people who dip their fries in a frosty,17,7,"Absolutely delicious. Sweet, salty, creamy and crunchy. This is a pint of oxymorons and I love it.";;;
Chip Happens
author: Skarlet
title: PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE KEEP THIS FLAVOR!!!!!!
text;;;: I’m obsessed with this flavor since I tried it. I can not believe how amazing it is. And the potato chips have the perfect crisp (don’t understand how) but it’s delicious. Please please please keep this flavor :(;;;

name: Chip Happens
author: lina uwu
title: This is literally perfect.
text;;;: When i saw this i thought it would be gross because chips and ice cream seems just gross together but when my sister convinced me to try it i felt fireworks. the chips are perfectly salty and the chocolate isn't to chocolaty! Its perfect for people who eat dip their french fries in chocolate ice cream and its a fun and unique flavor to try out! would highly recommend!! :D;;;

name: Chip Happens,cmitch927,2020-07-23,5,Make Chip Happens Permanent!,1,0,"When I first came upon this early June I tried the pint and within 5 minutes it was gone. The rich, velvety milk chocolate ice cream blends well with the contrasting textures of chocolate chunks and salty potato chips. I find a reason to drive 10 minutes 3 times a week just to stock up on this flavor exclusively. I am willing to lead the charge to make this flavor permanent. It's genius! I was disappointed that imy local store had sold out. I hope you consider this as a Fan Favorite!";;;

Chip Happens,DelightandTuchus,2020-07-06,5,My New Number 1,1,5,"In the beginning my favorite was Coffee Toffee Bar crunch. Rich coffee, with satisfyingly semi-salted toffee. Salty-sweet taste combo stage-one unlocked.";;;

Chip Happens,Deanof316,2020-05-03,5,Love the chips!,6,6,"Whilst I still hold a candle for 'Chubby Hubby' and my all-time fave here in Australia...'Clusterfluff' (was soooo good!), I must say that Ben & Jrry's nailed it (!) for sure with this new netflix inspired flavour. Far superior to their earlier 'Netflix and Chilled' option I certainly hope this 'limited botch' ice-cream becomesa mainstay as it is delicious and perhaps the best ice-cream that B&J has in Australia atm!";;;

Chip Happens,HBunny,2020-05-07,2,Had such potential,6,3,"I was so excited to find this special pint - unfortunately, mine barely had the potato chip swirl I was looking forward to! Ben and Jerry’s are known for their ample mix ins, and this didn’t make the cut. Really bummed!";;;
Chip Happens
author: Pnw2015
title: Amazing sweet and salty
text;;;: I’m a sucker for chocolate covered potato chips. This ice cream is my major weakness. The chocolate ice cream is the best (and I don’t care for chocolate ice cream). I hope this flavor stays.;;;

name: Chip Happens,Kate925,2020-07-31,5,Should be a permanent flavor!,2,0,"You guys nailed this one! It is perfection, the sweetness of the ice cream with a hint of saltiness of chips. I’d buy it every time I went shopping if it was a permanent flavor!";;;
Chip Happens
author: Buffalobabe
title: Don’t want to ever eat this again
text;;;: I’ve had ice cream with chips before and enjoyed it so was excited for this one. But this flavor is truly terrible. My boyfriend and i each ate a scoop & decided to throw the rest away - a choice we’ve never made before.;;;

name: Chip Happens,Jules0408,2020-06-06,5,Very Good!,9,6,"I bought this in substitute of Americone Dream and I have got to say, I love this ice cream!! It tastes so good!";;;

Chip Happens,victorialee,2020-06-06,5,Wonderful creation that makes the day better!,1,6,"I didn't buy it when I first saw this flavor at the store because potato chips aren't the usual ingredient in ice cream. But then I was convinced by my sister to try it, whether I like it or not, at least I will actually know how I feel. And oh boy, was I delighted!!! It's truly beautiful creation..!!! It tasted like eating potato chips and drinking chocolate shake at the same time (it doesn't sound weird anymore.) The potato chip swirls are, in fact, CRUNCHY, and salty! So yummy! I am happy that I decided to give this flavor a chance.";;;

Chip Happens,Snorkie,2020-09-23,1,Good idea bad in reality,0,0,"Potato chips are dark tasting, like the crunchy burnt ends in kettle chips. First time I’ve gotten a flavor that I just couldn’t finish.";;;

Chip Happens,Sebs2020,2020-06-11,2,"Too Strange, Two Stars",5,3,"Regular flavor made worse with potato chips. The combination of potato chips with chocolate ice cream is too strange for me. If you can't tell, I don't dip my fries in my milkshakes.";;;

Chip Happens,Ilikeicecream1002134,2020-07-21,5,Make it permanent please!!!!,2,1,"Perfect chocolate ice cream! I love the lighter, less intense chocolate ice cream that’s similar to one of my other faves (chocolate milk and cookies). It really tastes more like chocolate milk. The potato chip swirls are a perfect salty complement to the mild sweet. Im a huge fan of chocolate covered chips so this is right up my wheel house. PLEASE make this a permanent flavor!!!";;;
Chip Happens
author: Nicki19
title: Best ice cream!
text;;;: After Trader Joe’s discontinued their chocolate covered potato’s chips I’ve been in search for something close. This nailed the same flavor and was so much better. Great mix of sweet and salty. It’s like in n out fries dipped in their chocolate milkshake. Turned my whole family onto this flavor and we bought out the two stores that carried it. Please Please continue the flavor!;;;

name: Chip Happens,MamaCat,2020-06-12,1,A grainy aweful mess,8,8,"Ew, not good at all. The chip swirl is like chewing sand and it disrupts the rest of ice cream. This was not pleasant. Icky stuff. Wish I’d never tried it.";;;

Chip Happens,knscott,2020-07-18,5,Please make this permanent!,1,2,"I’ve never felt moved to write an ice cream review before - a friend recommended this flavor, which has been hard to find so when I came across a pint buried in the freezer at a store I don’t usually go to, I was excited to try it. Honestly this is one of the best combos I’ve ever had and I’m not usually a big fan of chocolate ice cream. The potato chips are insanely good and the mix is perfect for salty/sweet lovers like me. PLEASE consider expanding this beyond a “limited botch”!";;;

Chip Happens,Ashp,2020-09-06,5,Make it a KEEPER!!!,0,0,"I remember when A flavor called “Late Night Snack” was released a few years back and it was the first and only ice cream I’d ever tried with potato chips in it. I was put off by the idea of someone ruining ice cream with such an absurd idea but trust me people, potato chips and ice cream belong together!!!! I was bummed when Late Night Snack never appeared again but was ecstatic when this flavor released!!! Please don’t get rid of this flavor!!! My local store cannot keep it stocked because it is THAT good!!!!";;;
Chip Happens
author: Roomba
title: Nope
text;;;: I love Ben&Jerry's but this flavor was a disaster. The chocolate doesn't mix with the saltiness of the chips and it just tastes so wrong.;;;

name: Chip Happens
author: jon1
title: Please make permanent!
text;;;: this is my new favorite flavor. this chocolate base is better than any of their others and this potato chip swirl is incredible. i don't buy ben and jerry's that often because of the price point but i would for this pint! this is an incredible sweet and salty blend and i can't get enugh!;;;

name: Chip Happens
author: JustDesserts
title: My absolute favorite: please keep permanently!
text;;;: Oh my goodness—this combination of salty and sweet is everything I need in life. I could never have another flavor of ice cream in my life and be just fine.;;;

name: Chip Happens,Miranclan,2020-06-27,5,Please make it permanent!!!,1,5,"I do not write reviews very often at all, but I really wish this was a permanent flavor and I am hoping if they get enough great reviews it will be. I was skeptical of course that it would just be soggy chips in a pile of icecream, but it is in fact crisp af. It is a must try flavor I wish I could find anywhere, but unfortunately I have to drive to one specific Target to get my hands on it. Thanks to Ben and Jerry's for all of their hands on support in the community.";;;

Chip Happens,macintosh1597,2020-05-23,5,LITERALLY THE BEST FLAVOR EVER,1,6,"My roommate brought this glorious flavor home for our late night binge and my life will never be the same. I have a huge sweet tooth so I have a lot of experience when it comes to ice cream. This flavor is the perfect mixture of sweet and chocolaty with a sprinkle of salty. It honestly reminds me of dipping a french fry in my Wendy's frosty, dare I say it. I am seriously in love, I can't find it in my local store anymore so really hoping it becomes a permanent flavor.";;;
Chip Happens
author: Kate001
title: Delicious!
text;;;: I got this a number of days ago and it’s absolutely delicious. The chip swirl makes sure you get it throughout the ice cream. I really hope this stays in the collection!!;;;

name: Chip Happens,Castaway,2020-07-23,5,Favorite of all time,1,0,"Half Baked has been my favorite ice cream, but this beat it. I wish the whole potato chip, sweet salty thing was more popular because this is amazing.";;;
Chip Happens
author: BigTom97
title: My all time time favorite
text;;;: This ice cream is my newest addiction. I have been buying as much as I Can before it’s gone. I’m begging for this to become a permanent flavor.;;;

name: Chip Happens
author: Chipper345
title: Please make it permanent!!
text;;;: Chip happens is my absolute new favorite ice cream! The chocolate and salty mix BEAUTIFULLY! Please keep it around!!;;;

name: Chip Happens
author: Zoe2000
title: Too Salty
text;;;: Wayyyy to salty I couldn’t even finish it. but I did enjoy the chocolate.;;;

name: Chip Happens,Bearsie,2020-06-07,3,"Delicious Chocolate, Iffy Chips",0,0,"Love trying new Ben and Jerry’s flavors, so I immediately grabs this when I saw it on the shelf. Overall it takes like dipping fries into a Wendy’s Frosty. The chocolate flavor is AMAZING! However, I wasn’t a big fan of the chip “swirls”. It’s soft and doughy, but salty like a chip. The texture threw me off, and reminded me of salt dough. I wasn’t able to enjoy it. If they made just the chocolate flavor separately I would definitely buy it! Tastes just like a frosty.";;;
Chip Happens,wdb1974,2020-07-22,5,One of the few good things to happen in 2020,2,1,"What a great combination of flavors, I truly hope this will be around for awhile.";;;

Chip Happens,rexicon,2020-07-02,5,if you ever dipped your french fries in a frosty..,1,5,"i’m always a fan of the sweet and salty combination, especially chocolate and salt. i also love chocolate covered potato chips, AND i’m a fan of the show so this was a no brainer. it’s rich, the flavors work really well together and it’s equitably distributed throughout. i can’t express how much i love this flavor, how many pints my partner and i go through, and how much i hope it stays in permanent rotation. NAILED IT!";;;
Chip Happens
author: Faye
title: Make this flavor permanent!!!!!
text;;;: Cherry Garcia used to be my favorite. I cannot get enough of Chip Happens. Please make this flavor a regular and not a limited addition. It will bring happiness across the world.;;;

name: Chip Happens,Sheri,2020-06-29,5,Perfect Combo of Sweet & Savory!,3,6,"Best new Ben & Jerry’s flavor since Tonight Dough! I almost ate an entire pint in one sitting, it was so good. It has all my favorite things in one ice cream! I certainly hope that you keep this flavor around, it’s too good to be a limited batch only.";;;

Chip Happens,marvelouscara,2020-07-06,5,Amazing chocolate CHIPs!,1,5,"I have always been a huge fan of chocolate covered potato chips, so when I saw Ben and Jerry’s had come out with a flavor including both of these flavors, I had to try it. I do not know how they did it, but getting the chips into the ice cream without the chips becoming soggy is a dream come true, and absolute magic as far as I’m concerned. I have found my favorite ever ice cream. Thank you!";;;

Chip Happens,BP13,2020-08-20,5,Perfect Mix of Sweet and Salty,0,0,"This flavor is freaking amazing! After falling in love with another limited batch flavor, I told myself I wouldn't try any others in case they disappear forever. Well when I saw Chip Happens at the grocery store I couldn't resist... and have bought a dozen pints since! The chocolate flavor is rich but somehow still light, the chocolate chunks add to the sweetness perfectly, and the chip crumbles are heavenly. 5 stars.";;;

Chip Happens,Mallory,2020-07-11,5,"I came here to write a review, didnt I?",1,5,"This ice cream is my favorite. It’s salty and sweet at the perfect combination of happiness on a spoon. I want to stockpile it because I can’t imagine a world where I can’t grab this guilty please out of the fridge. It’s getting me through social distancing and COVID19 and the woes of the world. I beseech you, please make this a permanent addition. I’m begging. I’m pleading.";;;
Chip Happens
author: rzaun99
title: Nailed my all time favorite snack!!!
text;;;: i love love love this flavor!!!! i was so upset when you got rid of the “late night snack” flavor a few years ago but this one is perfect!! please make it forever and ever ❤️;;;

name: Chip Happens,JBinMidTN,2020-07-06,5,Please make this a permanent flavor!,2,5,"Real truth, I’ve never been a huge fan of Ben & Jerry’s. Most flavors sound amazing but they end up being a let down. This is an exception. The chocolate base is just right and the potato chip ribbons contrast the sweet with just enough salty. It’s perfection.";;;
Chip Happens,19mk,2020-05-27,5,Unreal,3,6,"My girlfriend was moved to tears of joy after her first bite, it’s that good. How on earth are the chips still crunchy? Amazing";;;

Chip Happens,Zaqj,2020-09-22,5,Perfecto!,0,0,"Honestly it's my favorite ice cream of all time and I'm super stressed that I can't find it anywhere. I guess on the bright side, my wife and I are no longer fighting over who gets to eat it and our marriage counseling bills have lessened.";;;
Chip Happens
author: Kanye south
title: Bad flavuot
text;;;: Taste dreadful. I don't know whos idea it was to make this flavour but they are;;;

name: Chip Happens,panditachung,2020-07-13,5,FAVE FLAVOR EVER!! PLEASE DO NOT DISCONTINUE!,1,6,"Please make this a permanent flavor. This is hands down my favorite flavor I have ever tried....I absolutely love it. The salty crispy potatoe chips...my gosh!! I love having this as a treat daily. Keeps me sane during shelter in place. Also, B&J is a kickass company that stands for social and racial justice. Love their ice cream and their values.";;;
Chip Happens
author: Dmarie513
title: In love
text;;;: Wow. This flavor is the best thing I’ve ever had! Absolutely amazing!!! Please keep it forever :);;;

name: Chip Happens
author: jamesy
title: Kinda average
text;;;: So I literally just bought it and was excited but I dunno it’s kinda mediocre. Obviously B&J makes fantastic ice cream this one just ain’t doin it for me. The potato chips are chewy not crunchy and they taste kinda fake I found myself eating around the potato bits.;;;

name: Chip Happens,RumorHasItGodIsATexan,2020-07-05,5,Should be a permanent flavor,1,5,"I was hesitant to try this, but it was on sale so I figured I’d got it a shot. Omg. I’m not usually a big sweet and salty person because I think it can make the sweet taste too sweet, but this ice cream balanced the flavors perfectly. Also the chips are somehow perfectly crisp and crunchy. Please make this a forever flavor!!";;;
Chip Happens
author: Zigfree
title: Awesome
text;;;: Best ice every. Must keep making this ice cream!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!;;;

name: Chip Happens,,2020-06-07,5,Amazing blend,3,6,"Amazing blend of smooth, then crunch, salty, and then sweet!!";;;

Chip Happens,Lauren123,2020-06-11,5,PLEASE KEEP THIS FOREVER,2,6,"I love it so much! The potato chip swirl is really good, idk who B&Js does it but it literally tastes like regular chips. Chip Happens,bnimmo,2020-07-11,5,Potato Chip Swirl!!,1,5,"I had no idea potato chip swirl is what was missing from my life. I have told everyone I know about this flavor. Chip Happens,Traveltone1,2020-05-14,5,A Game Changer,0,5,"I am a 63-year-old mom, I have been eating Ben & Jerry’s for years. title: This is the best

name: Chip Happens,vjbjoe99,2020-06-07,5,Potato chips are AMAZING!!!,1,5,"Thank you so much for this flavor! I truly hope that it stays on the market. Ever since Late Night Snack got discontinued I've been hoping that you would introduce a new mix that included potato chips. It may sound like a strange ingredient to some, yet the salty sweet combo can't be beat! LOVE THIS FLAVOR!!!";;;

Chip Happens,Annie J,2020-05-14,5,This chip is good!!!,1,5,"If you're a sweet and salty fanatic like me, get this.. It's amazing!! I've been spreading the word about how amazing this flavor is. If you're wondering if the chips are soggy.. They are NOT!! Idk how they managed to keep them so crispy, but they are, and it's so amazingly tasty. Sad it's a limited batch!";;;

Chip Happens,dalis139,2020-06-06,5,Perfect sweet and salty combo,1,5,"Love Ben & Jerry's in general and this flavor did not disappoint. Hope this becomes a permanent flavor!";;;
Chip Happens
author: NINmuffin

name: Chip Happens,c0l0n,2020-08-24,5,"BEST, MOST UNIQUE ICE CREAM EVAAAAHHHHHHHHH!!!!!!!",0,0,"When my friend told me she'd found an amazing ice cream with POTATO CHIPS in it, I was like, ""Ewwww. Thank you Ben & Jerry's!!! <3 Colin";;;
Chip Happens
author: Sean The Irishman
title: The best ice cream flavor

name: Chip Happens,Leah420,2020-06-19,5,PLEASE KEEP THIS PERMANENTLY!,1,5,"This is the best ice cream I have ever had. It is the perfect combination of salty and sweet. Chip Happens
author: SummerAnn1
title: Scrumptious.
text;;;: I decided to go out on a limb and try this one day. I saw Ben & Jerry’s social platform and absolutely wanted to give this company my support. I was not disappointed. This ice cream is absolutely BOMB and Im so sad because it’s been sold out at my local grocery stores for a while. Please keep this flavor!!;;;

name: Chip Happens,elizabethhopee,2020-07-07,5,A Snackers DREAM,1,5,"This is exactly what I want in a snack, sweet and salty. There’s the perfect amount of potato chips and chocolate chunks you can get some in every bite. It was absolutely delicious and I wish this would stay a permanent flavor!";;;

Chip Happens,Tarheelswin,2020-08-05,5,So yummy! The perfect sweet and salty treat!,0,0,"I love everything about this! It’s even better than Late Night Snack (but where is that one? Bring it back, too?). We need more sweet and salty flavors, and this one had plenty of the chip swirl, as well as the sweet chocolate ice cream. Love love love this. Please add it permanently!";;;
Chip Happens
author: Berry

text;;;: I will be sad when I can't find this flavor anymore. It was my new favorite -- the chip swirl is delicious and the chocolate tastes almost malted. It's so good.;;;

name: Chip Happens,Bernie90,2020-06-22,5,Salty sweet goodness!,0,5,"I just bought this flavor today and I can tell you if you are a salty and sweet fan like myself you will love this ice cream. Chip Happens,LivS,2020-07-06,5,AMAZING TASTE,1,5,"I cannot say enough about these incredible flavors, the saltiness of the chips are unbeatable. I would buy 1 million of these if I had space in my freezer.";;;

Chip Happens,Liam,2020-08-09,5,"Best Flavor, Hands Down",0,0,"This is the best Ben & Jerry’s flavor I’ve ever had, no cap. I made my boyfriend drive me to five different grocery stores until we found some & I (no joke) bought five pints. I DIE by Chip Happens. I would kill a man for this ice cream flavor.";;;

name: Cannoli
author: Doglover88888888
title: OMG!!!!!! SOOOOOOO DELICIOUS!!!!!
text;;;: Am trying this flavor for the first time right now. Took my first bite and fell in love IMMEDIATELY!! May just be my new favorite flavor!! Have tried a different brand of mascarpone ice cream before and it basically just tasted like vanilla. This is the complete opposite!! Definitely not just plain old boring vanilla!! Can NOT believe how amazingly delicious this is!! Everyone needs to try this now!! Would probably drive 10 hours to get this if i had to like omg it's just that good!!!!!!!!!! Please ben and jerry's-I'm literally begging you to keep this flavor FOREVER!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!;;;

name: Cannoli,Plumber,2020-08-18,5,LOVE THE SWIRL,1,1,"I love this flavor. It’s light but packs a POWERFUL flavor punch. And the swirl is kind of hidden by its color but man if you find a big pocket of it and try and isolate it, it’s the BEST. The chocolate covered pastry things have Always been crunchy in my 20+ pints to date. The flavor is just so boom in your face. The texture of the Mars alone swirl is insane. This is my 2nd favorite flavor behind Gimme Smore. So help me god if you guys discontinue this flavor or gimme smore, I will come down on you with the wrath of a thousand lightning bolts. Haha. Plz make a cake batter with chocolate chocolate chip swirl and a brownie batter something";;;

Cannoli,Arubaman68,2020-03-29,5,My Prayers Have Been Answered!!,4,1,"I was devastated when the “Holly Cannoli” flavor was discontinued years ago. Every time I passed the ice cream aisle in my supermarket, I’d search for the Cannoli flavor, hoping to see it again. Just when I was about to give up, THERE IT WAS!!!!! I scooped up every pint I could get my hands on. This flavor is the best!! The sweet marscapone cream and chocolatey shell pieces make for a sweet celebration for the tastebuds. Thank you so much for bringing this awesome flavor back! Please don’t ever discontinue it again. You’ve struck gold with this flavor — it is truly is a treat!";;;

Cannoli,antaresoceana,2020-06-14,5,I think this is my new 2nd favourite ice cream,6,1,"Oh man. Where to begin. Two bites and I knew. The marscapone ice cream? Dude. The cannoli shells? DUDE. They're so crispy it's almost like magic how crispy they stay. And coated in chocolate nonetheless! The marscapone swirl is something you almost forget about too but like not even in a bad way because you end up stumbling upon it without expecting to do so and it HITS YOU IN THE FACE WITH DECADENT FLAOUR. Also the chocolate chips are the mini's, the cute ones. Perfectly sized!! B & J knocked it out of the park with this one. A+++";;;
Cannoli
author: Christine94
title: SO HAPPY IT IS BACK
text;;;: Please keep this around forever! For over 7 years I have hoped that this day would come where my favorite dessert ever would return! Such a delicious ice cream!;;;

name: Cannoli,Kalidoscope,2020-04-06,4,Not half bad,1,0,"The icecream itself is luxuriously fatty, so it does take some time to eat this as compared to opposing flavors. The mascarpone swirls is what I'd say takes the cake for me, though be aware that not all the chocolate-covered cannoli pieces will be as crisp as you'd expect them to be.";;;
Cannoli,CraigShew,2020-02-17,5,I eat one a day,9,1,"This is so good, i have been eating one a day, please keep this around so i can keep eating it";;;
Cannoli
author: jndnaps
title: Absolutely Terrible!
text;;;: I love cannoli's and couldn't wait to try this. Finally found it and was so excited. But it was a total let down. This taste nothing like any cannoli I ever had. Absolutely terrible.;;;

name: Cannoli,Soni,2020-02-10,5,Thank you for making my dreams come true!,5,1,"I have been craving, whining about, and reminiscing about this flavor for YEARS.";;;

Cannoli,Scabicky,2020-09-23,1,Cannoli? I don’t think so,0,0,"Not only does this ice cream do nothing to remind you of a cannoli it does not taste good at all. The container says A fan favorite.Overly sweet with an unpleasant aftertaste. Took two bites and tossed the rest. A total misfire. Clearly those fans have never tasted a real cannoli or one of B&J’s better flavors,";;;

Cannoli,Fallerina,2020-04-30,2,Where’s the shell pieces?!,1,0,"The flavor is great, but there were almost no pieces of the cannoli shell in the pint. My husband and I both thought it was strange, and maybe a bad batch because you can always count on the pints to be pretty full of all the good stuff listed in the description. But not this time. And I see from another review that maybe this isn’t a fluke after all. The cannoli shell is the best part of the dessert, so it shouldn’t be skimped.";;;

Cannoli,ChrisColby,2020-02-26,5,Hopefully never discontinued again!,3,2,"A delicious take on the classic Italian dessert, B&J's Cannoli is a winner. The base is described as a marscapone flavor. Now marscapone isn't typically used for Cannolis but instead ricotta. Marscapone is a cream cheese used for cakes and other desserts. While not quite fitting the theme of a Cannoli in that regard, B&J made the right choice for the sake of flavor. The base is absolutely like a heightened cheesecake. Almost as if their regular cheesecake flavor was mixed with the equally delicious buttery brown sugar one. It's fantastic. The swirl is the same flavor, so they blend together seamlessly for a full on sweet cream cheese taste. And the pastry pieces are the perfect contrast to the base. Crunchy and covered in chocolate, they remind me of the similar chocolate dipped waffle cone pieces from Americone Dream, and there are plenty in each pint. Whether it fits the theme or not, Cannoli is a great flavor that I hope stays as a mainline one for a long time.";;;

Cannoli,RealIceCreamLover,2020-05-07,2,Doesn't taste like a cannoli.,1,0,"First of all traditional cannoli are made with ricotta, not mascarpone. This tastes more like tiramisu without the coffee. It's missing the liquor flavor of a cannoli and was too cheesy. It would be better if it had chocolate shavings, but the base is wrong. I ate it, but I would not it buy again.";;;
Cannoli
author: Bionicbello
title: Makes my Italian knees shake with pleasure!
text;;;: I happened to find this flavor when I went shopping today at Albertsons and I love all kinds of Italian cuisine. Cannolis are one of my favorite desserts. The flavor of this ice cream was delicious and tasted exactly like a cannoli! Perfect flavor!!;;;

name: Cannoli,Jpan99,2020-05-07,1,Not at all like a Cannoli,1,0,"I was so excited to try this because I love a good cannoli. The taste was just wrong. I really didn't like anything about this flavor. The ice cream itself was marscapone which isn't what's in a cannoli. This was just a fail, cannot recommend.";;;

Cannoli,givemethecream007,2020-05-05,3,"Good, not impressed",1,0,"The ice cream is light and fluffy, just as expected from Ben & Jerry’s, but I think the mascarpone ice cream is just a variant of vanilla ice cream. The crunch from the chocolate shells is rad and the mascarpone swirls are delicious.";;;
Cannoli
author: Meli24
title: Could’ve been perfect!
text;;;: Bought this a few days ago after searching for a while. So looking forward to it. I loved the flavors BUT it should have had way more cannoli shell pieces. There were barely any at all.;;;

name: Cannoli
author: gillian_belle
title: DELICIOUS
text;;;: Chunks were found throughout and I really enjoyed ice cream so reminiscent of my fave dessert.;;;

name: Cannoli,LeLe33176,2020-02-17,5,My favorite dessert as an ice cream!,2,1,"I absolutely love this flavor, and I'm glad it's back to stay and not a 'Limited Batch'";;;

author: tati
title: PLEASE KEEP!!!!!!!
text;;;: Please keep the Cannoli ice cream!!!!! It is the best EVER!!!!!;;;

name: Cannoli,MichaelaLM,2020-05-24,5,My FAVORITE is back!!!,0,0,"Ben and Jerry’s limited batch Cannoli ice cream single handedly got me through law school!!! I have literally written the website 100s of times begging them to bring it back!! For years I have regaled my now fiancé with tales of the elusive, delicious limited batch Cannoli ice cream. Well fast forward about a decade and in walks my fiancé carrying not 1, not 2, but 3 pints of the permanent Cannoli pint. It’s just as delicious as I remember.";;;

Cannoli,Giavana 12,2020-05-26,1,Horrible,1,2,"I usually love Ben & Jerry but this ice cream was horrible. It tastes nothing like a cannoli. I was so excited to eat this, and looked everywhere for it, and it's a total let down. The ""cannoli shells"" taste like waffle cones, and the mascarpone tastes horrible. This has a after taste and honestly just a total let down.";;;

Cannoli,Doreen,2020-06-13,2,Not as good as the prior Holy Cannoli,0,0,"Holy Cannoli was my second favorite Ben & Jerry's of all time. When I heard it was coming back as Cannoli, I couldn't wait to find it locally. Unfortunately, I was disappointed as it had changed from ""Creamy Ricotta and Pistachio Ice Cream with Chocolate Covered Cannolis and Roasted Pistachios"" and didn't taste as good. Bring back the old Holy Cannoli!";;;
Cannoli
author: GoBlue99
title: Nothing like a real cannoli.
text;;;: Chocolate chip cannoli is one of my favorite desserts. I grew up in Boston and know great cannoli. So I was very excited to try this flavor.;;;

name: Cannoli
author: NillaRilla
title: Meh
text;;;: Not my favorite.....Tastes nothing like a Cannoli.;;;

name: Cannoli,Christi102,2020-03-01,3,Needs more bits!,1,2,"This ice cream is very good, however I think that it would benefit from having more cannoli bits in it. If it’s called cannoli it should have more cannoli in it.";;;

Cannoli,Ikay,2020-08-03,5,My favorite,0,0,"I love cannolis and I love this ice cream but I wouldn't say they taste the same. This is really rich. On my first bite I thought it was a bit too strong, but it really grew on me. Love hitting those mascarpone swirls, and the pastry shell pieces are nice and crunchy. Happy it's permanent to the line.";;;
Cannoli
author: billthecat
title: Would have preferred Holy Cannoli
text;;;: I was so excited to see this. I was a little concerned when I saw that it was made with mascarpone ... which has no place in a true Sicilian cannoli. I should have known ... this is only what a grocery store cannoli would possibly taste like. Bring back the REAL cannoli ice cream: Holy Cannoli.;;;

name: Cannoli,catcrazy73,2020-05-02,4,Good stuff!,0,0,"Found Cannoli in my store recently and decided to give it a try, as I'm from a predominantly Italian area and a fan of the real pastry. Tasty ice cream, super creamy and fun. Could use a bit more of the cannoli bits, though, which was the only reason it didn't get 5 stars. Still a top 5!";;;

Cannoli,Jbi22,2020-04-13,2,Underwhelming,0,0,"Not sure how this is a “fan favorite”... the ice cream base is this weird artificial vanilla, the mascarpone swirl is this gritty, undercooked batter and the fudge cone flakes literally feel and taste like cardboard. I WOULDNT recommend this flavor unless you enjoying wasting your money";;;

Cannoli,Norrrrm,2020-07-03,1,First Ben & Jerry's Flavor I did not like,0,0,"I'm a big Cannoli fan. The filling is so important but so his the shell. This just didn't taste like cannoli to me at all. I'm a native New Yorker and perhaps the filling and shells here are not typical of the rest of the country, but both sure are gold standard in my book";;;
Cannoli
author: JLE90
title: Love it
text;;;: Fantastic. Saw this in the store while working out of town in Jacksonville. Let’s just say the Publix gets bought out every-time I go. Since I can’t find Cinnabon anywhere this one is my new go to. Netflix and chilled is tasty as well classic favorites in one for that one;;;

name: Cannoli,HaddieMae11,2020-05-05,5,NEW FAVORITE,0,0,"Wow. This ice cream is soooo good! So good I had to write this review lol. I think it could use a bit more cannoli pieces but regardless it's an awesome ice cream. Do yourself a favor and try it, it's for sure a new favorite of mine and I hope it sticks around forever";;;
Cannoli
author: TheMayorReview
title: Terrible!
text;;;: I was so excited to find ice cream that allegedly tasted like cannolis. It tasted like utter disappointment! It tasted absolutely nothing like cannolis! This mediocre monstrosity was literally just butterscotch with bits of chocolate covered waffle cones.;;;

name: Cannoli,AnchorPointDeb,2020-05-11,5,"Tried it, loved it!",0,0,"Not finding Chunky Monkey, I took home Cannoli and am so glad I did! I ate the whole pint in one sitting... good lord! I loved the still crispy bits hidden inside that lusciousness... yum! Hope this one makes it into the big league as a regular flavor.";;;
Cannoli
author: Liz1
title: AMAZING
text;;;: This ice cream is by far the best ice cream I've ever had from Ben and Jerry's. Big fan of cannolis and they could not have done a better job. The mascarpone swirls are to die for and I am proud to call this my happiness in a spoon!;;;

name: Cannoli
author: Rozalynne
title: Did you have anyone who has eaten a cannoli taste
text;;;: I bought this tonight and it is straight up vanilla ice cream with chocolate chips. Did there taste testers actually ever have a cannoli? This had no resemblance to the taste of a cannoli. So upset this was a flavor failure;;;

name: Cannoli
author: Paigem212
title: New Favorite
text;;;: I was really skeptical of the flavor because I’ve never had a cannoli before but I decided to try it because the americone was out at my grocery store and WOW! Genuinely this is my new favorite flavor *chef’s kiss*;;;

name: Cannoli
author: CannoliFanGrl
title: Best. Ice cream. Ever.
text;;;: I've waited YEARS for this flavor to return.... Nothing compares. Thank you for bringing it back! Please don't ever take it away again.... I don't want to live in a world that doesn't include cannoli ice cream!;;;

name: Cannoli,Karen13,2020-06-17,1,Holy cannoli this was awful,0,0,"I love cannolis. This was no cannoli. Weird tasting ice cream. Hardly any mix ins, which was probably good because they just tasted like cardboard covered on chocolate. Don't waste your money or calories.";;;
Cannoli
author: Mimi30
title: So happy it's back
text;;;: Deliciously Different. The marscapone swirl is the best;;;

name: Cannoli
author: Morgan546
title: Perfect sweetness
text;;;: I bought this at the food store yesterday eager to try it. I honestly didn’t expect it to be nearly as good as it was! It’s just so sweet and creamy and the chocolate pieces add the perfect crunch.;;;

name: Cannoli
author: mama
title: goood
text;;;: people always complain that things never taste like the thing theyre supposed to but is that a reason to hate it? its good i dont care if it tastes like candy corn just a little its still nice;;;

name: Cannoli,Caviggs,2020-05-11,5,One of my all-time faves,0,0,"I shed a tear in the grocery store when I saw that they brought this flavor back. It's the perfect balance of sweet and creamy with delicious chocolate, pastry shell crunchies. YUM!";;;
Cannoli
author: Bluemeaney
title: TAKE THE CANNOLI!
text;;;: Literally the most scrumptious B&J’s flavor I have ever had. I ate the whole pint *accidentally* in 6 minutes. I have built a shrine to its perfection in my fridge. FREAKING YUMMY!;;;

name: Cannoli
author: Lacapaneus
title: Thank you for bringing this back!
text;;;: This redux is better than the original cannoli flavor that I tried. The mascarpone made it softer than many other flavors and it wasn’t overly sweet like some flavors.;;;

name: Cannoli
author: Idontusuallydothis
title: Best flavor I've had
text;;;: I have a sweet tooth but Ice Cream is usually lower on my list of must have treats. This ice cream changed that for me. Love it. Happy it is back for good!!;;;

name: Cannoli
author: Des02
title: Absolutely decadent!!
text;;;: I am an absolute cannoli fanatic and to see that there is a cannoli flavored ice cream just blew my mind! I had to try it! Absolutely delicious and decadent;;;

name: Cannoli
author: Mimi11
title: Best ice cream ever!
text;;;: The perfect combo of crunch from the chocolate covered cannoli cookie and swirls of mascarpone I really hope this isn’t one of those ones that’s temporary!;;;

name: Cannoli,Kayykaayy,2020-06-30,5,So delicious,0,0,"I got to try this flavor just the other day, and I am sure glad I did. This ice cream is one of the beat ben and Jerry's flavors I've had";;;
Cannoli,acferg,2020-06-15,2,Weirdly Artificial Tasting,0,0,"Tastes nothing like a cannoli. Overly sweet, cloying ice cream with a strong artificial flavor and aftertaste. Would not buy again";;;
Cannoli,Embe,2020-09-09,2,Swirl texture is a little off,0,1,"The flavor was okay, the chocolate covered pieces were a bit chewy. The swirl going through it had a bit of a grainy texture";;;
Cannoli
author: Brianna98
title: Disappointing
text;;;: I LOVE cannolis but this flavor missed the mark! It could have been amazing but it was so boring and not creamy.;;;

name: Cannoli,Alexatar15,2020-09-04,5,Great Taste and Texture!,0,0,"The store I went to didn’t have the B and Js flavor I wanted, I am so glad I grabbed cannoli instead!";;;
Cannoli
author: TonyP6
title: My New Favorite!!
text;;;: This is my new favorite ice cream - hands down!! Absolutely love the all the flavors and textures!!;;;

name: Cannoli
author: Delizioso
title: Sicilian treat by the ice cream king
text;;;: Well done as always. If this ever goes away please bring it back as a seasonal holiday item;;;

name: Cannoli,Tracy0712,2020-07-16,5,MY NEW FAVORITE,0,0,"I’ve never been disappointed with a Ben and Jerry’s flavor, but Cannoli is my favorite!!!";;;
Cannoli,,2020-08-31,3,"Good, But I Forgot it was in the Fridge",0,1,Decent and really sweet. But I forgot I had it. So...not so much like the real thing.;;;
Cannoli
author: Cathy61
title: Too sweet
text;;;: This is the first Ban and Jerry’s flavor I’m not crazy about. Wanted to like it more.;;;

name: Cannoli
author: Emilou
title: Can i suggest a rename?
text;;;: Awesome! I would have named it holy cannoli! Thank you for thinking of this one.!;;;

name: Cannoli
author: LolaD471
title: Delicious
text;;;: I love cannolis and this is one of my new favorites!;;;

name: Cannoli
author: Alee
title: Excellent!
text;;;: Great flavor. It is so rich and delicious I love it!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
title: best flavor hands down
text;;;: This is my favorite flavor in the entire world please make it a permanent flavor!! I made all my friends go out and try it and we're all addicted. I have three pints a week. I wish I was joking. We single handedly bought all of the Gimme S'more stock in our grocery store. The day this flavor is retired is the day my happiness dies. :);;;

name: Gimme S'more!,Chicksluvrock,2018-09-06,5,Smart way to make a Smore's flavor,20,0,"I have several favorite B&J's flavors, but I decided to go outside of my usual and get this flavor. With the first bite you can definitely taste a hint of marshmallow-y flavor in the base ice cream. It's different than just plain vanilla. I think they did a great job capturing that flavor. The chocolate cookie swirl and graham swirl is smart and I think it's a unique way to add the classic flavor of a smore. And of course, you can't go wrong with fudge flakes! I am a total mix-in and swirl junkie, the more the better, and Ben & Jerry's never disappoints with that! Great job on this flavor! Overall a unique take on a novel summer treat!";;;

Gimme S'more!,KGibby,2019-08-21,5,Way better than the OG S'mores!,42,6,"I've had many pints of the Gimme S'more while it's been out and tonight I accidentally grabbed the original S'mores, with the chocolate ice cream. It was the most disappointing moment when I opened the pint to find chocolate ice cream instead of the typical golden ice cream I was used to with the Gimme S'more. Gimme S'more is the perfect representation of what a S'more is: mostly composed of perfectly toasted marshmallows, hint of chocolate, and a great trail of graham crackers. I will be so sad when this pint leaves the shelves. And I will never make the mistake of buying the OG S'mores pint again. Too much chocolate to represent a S'more.";;;

Gimme S'more!,HarleyQuinn,2018-04-25,5,My New Favorite,17,3,"I recently had the pleasure of taking a tour of Ben & Jerry's in VT and this was the flavor sample of the day. Instantly, I was hooked. I've been buying some from my local CT grocery store since. There was a sale one night and the store was out. I sat on the floor and cried. While the ice cream base may not taste exactly like marshmallows, is delicious. Everything about this flavor is amazing!";;;

Gimme S'more!,laurenlaughs24,2019-02-14,5,BEST FLAVOR EVER!!!,2,0,"I am so sad that this is a limited batch. Gimme S'more is my all time favorite flavor and I've tried almost all the Ben & Jerry's flavors. It is like heaven in your mouth. The graham cracker swirl and chocolate cookie swirl are my two favorite things about this ice cream. Since the flavor is slowly leaving, my friends and I have gone to multiple stores to stock up on what is left. As you can tell we LOVE Gimme S'more and if you're a s'mores lover like me then it's worth the try!";;;

Gimme S'more!,Phish Food Fan,2018-10-30,5,"Breathe, it’s gonna be ok.",13,1,"This is such a great new pint! I stocked up and my freezer is loaded with them. The ice cream, the swirls and chunks are so so yummy! If I could eat it every night, I would. This is a LIMITED BATCH! It did not replace S’mores. It’s still available in stores and online. Gimme S’more has come and will go again and regular S’mores will remain. The very first S’mores was retired but the one we’ve been enjoying for quite a while now is still there. So enjoy this for what it is and have your regular S’mores too.";;;

Gimme S'more!,VJ101,2018-04-03,5,New Favorite Flavor,21,5,"This is so delicious! It tastes like an amped up cookies and cream but with a graham cracker taste. A S'more is like a cookie so I'm not complaining. I also like it better than the Original. This is my new favorite flavor! I don't think the base tastes like regular vanilla at all. It may not be marshmallow-y, but it's definitely a ""warm, dark"" and border-lining a faint molasses flavor versus a sweet, strong vanilla if that makes sense. This is my new addiction. I think newbie Ben and Jerry's consumers will take a liking to this one.";;;

Gimme S'more!,tyler321321321,2020-06-09,1,A worse version of the old one,27,56,"I was having trouble finding my favorite flavor of B&J at the store, when I came accross this one that seemed to be an overhauled version of it. I bought it and took it home only to discover that it tastes nothing like smores. The chocolate cookies are good but have a really out of place flavor. They definitely should have had a soft fudge swirl or something instead. The graham crackers are the best part, but there just weren't enough. And the ice cream which says its ""toasted marshmallow"" flavor just tastes like vanilla. Overall very disappointing not just as a replacement for the old smores but for ben and jerry's in general. I really did not like this one.";;;

Gimme S'more!,ChrisColby,2018-04-28,4,"Not quite S'mores, but tasty nonetheless.",4,5,"The new S'mores flavor is much better than the standard flavor from the company. Ben and Jerry's wisely made the decision to use a marshmallow base instead of chocolate, so it doesn't overpower the other components. The base tastes more like sweet cream than marshmallow but when combined with the fudge flakes and graham cracker, the result tastes very close to the real deal. My only complaints are that the chocolate cookie crumbs overpower what little graham cracker there is, losing the theme a little. And the fudge flakes are strangely limited. Still, the components all come together to provide a tasty flavor, and I hope this limited edition lasts as long as possible.";;;

Gimme S'more!,Gimmemoresmore,2018-06-25,5,Best EVER,11,3,"Honestly, I don't love ice cream. It's my least favorite dessert. But, about once a year I get a craving. I saw the Gimme S'more ice cream in the store and love s'mores so thought I'd give it a shot. Total game changer. This is the best ice cream I've ever had and I've ended up buying it like 7 times. I'm so sad it's limited edition and hope it becomes permanent. It's perfectly simple and complex-I wouldn't change a thing. I'm reviewing in hopes marketing people see its ratings and decide to keep it!!";;;

Gimme S'more!,sweatk,2019-04-11,5,Bring it back!!!,1,0,"I first tasted this heavenly creation on Dec 24th... And boy what a Christmas Miracle it was. The target I visited was out of my previous favorite Milk and Cookies, and I want in the mood for the ""chocolatey-ness"" of my other favorite the Tonight Dough.";;;

Gimme S'more!,Bip407,2018-08-21,2,Prefer original S’mores flavor,3,4,"I feel like this is a just a sweet vanilla ice cream with a cookie swirl, like cookies and cream. There was no noticeable marshmallow flavor, and occasionally I could taste the graham cracker. I much prefer the chocolate based s’mores flavor which was rich chocolate, and a creamy marshmallow, with the perfect amount of crumbly graham cracker. Really, what do you remember about s’mores over the campfire? The melted Hershey chocolate and the gooey toasted marshmallow, followed by the crumbly graham cracker. This new flavor really doesn’t have any of that except the memory of the gritty graham cracker, which was really only there to hold onto the chocolate and marshmallow.";;;

Gimme S'more!,nflamari9488,2018-03-29,5,"All I kept thinking was ""oh man, oh man!""",14,4,"I literally just bought this 20 minutes ago, put a little bit in a bowl, and decided I had to write the review. I agree with one reviewer where they said the marshmallow ice-cream doesn't really taste like marshmallow. However, I feel like that's a really difficult flavor to capture and the overall execution was very good. I totally tasted the graham cracker pieces and I LOVE the chocolate cookies BJ puts in their ice-cream. If I had to make a critique or suggestion, I would say maybe have more graham cracker swirls and/or flavor the ice-cream graham cracker and have marshmallow swirls with the cookie and graham crackers? I don't know though because I'm pretty overkill with my ice-cream. If it doesn't sound like I'm going to die it wouldn't be my first choice. All in all, I am so happy, I'm struggling to not get more, and I would be very sad if this never came back.";;;

Gimme S'more!,Drewbee,2019-06-25,5,Gimme S'moreeee,0,0,"Please bring this flavor back. I noticed one love came back again this year so ive been waiting to see this one too especially since I can't imagine a single person who tried this didn't love it. I saw one person in their review said they ate 3 pints a week. I ate a whole pint every single day the whole time it was available. Bought my grocery store out every time they restocked. I still have 3 or 4 a week but no other flavor compares to this one, not even my old favorite. This ice cream ruins all other ice creams.";;;

Gimme S'more!,Jenn01234,2020-02-26,1,I have never been let down more,3,0,"The original s'mores ice cream was a dream come true, it was by far my favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor and I even drove to Vermont to tour the facility and get a cone there. When I tried this replacement I had hope to be wowed but was left feeling nothing but disappointment. S'mores do not have cookies in them so I am not sure where that idea came from, and normally I would like cookies in my ice cream but if I am looking for the flavor profile of a s'more this ice cream just doesn't deliver.";;;

Gimme S'more!,Bkeller08,2018-04-15,1,Why change a good thing?,10,9,"My favorite flavor of Ben and Jerry’s is S’mores, which I have been a fan of since it was called Marsha Marsha Marshmallow but it is the HARDEST flavor to find! I saw Gimme S’more in my grocery and got so excited! But when I got home, I was disappointed. I thought my favorite part of S’mores was the graham cracker swirls which are also in this flavor, but it turns out, the Chocolate ice cream was more vital to the awesomeness of the flavor than I thought. The “toasted marshmallow” Ice cream just tastes like vanilla. While the add-ins are good, the ice cream part of this pint leaves something to be desired. I guess I’ll forever be on the hunt for my fave flavor “S’mores” because you can’t beat it! They shouldn’t have changed a good thing!";;;

Gimme S'more!,Savv,2019-07-24,5,PLEASE BRING IT BACK,0,0,"I need this flavor to return. This was my favorite flavor of ice cream ever and I would buy multiple pints of it out of fear that I would go to the store one day and the “limited batch” ice cream would be gone. My heart broke as I checked the Ben and Jerry’s section of the freezer and saw that there was no more and it wasn’t coming back. PLEASE bring this back even for just a month so I can buy every stores stock. I’m serious, every time I eat ice cream now I just feel like it isn’t the same as gimme s’mores. I still check the ice cream section at every store I go to and I will continue to do so till it comes back :(";;;

Gimme S'more!,Cait5,2018-11-11,2,"Ok, but NOWHERE near as good as the original.",1,5,"Don't get me wrong, it isn't bad. It's fine. But I'm docking it one star because it comes nowhere close to the original S'mores flavor--this strikes me as a disappointing remix. The ice cream itself tastes closer to sweet cream than toasted marshmallow, and it lacks enough chocolate to actually compare it to a s'more--chocolate is supposed to be a constant component of the dessert! While I prefer the original's chocolate base regardless;" if this flavor had more chocolate chunks and a toasted marshmallow swirl like the original
author: it might be a lot better. But as it stands
date: OG S'mores is still my favorite ice cream flavor ever and this simply doesn't come anywhere close to it.""";;

name: Gimme S'more!,Sarahjo723,2020-07-14,4,So glad they went back to the original recipe,0,0,"I loved the 2014 version of Gimie S‘ more. I was so disappointment when the ice cream flavor was changed to chocolate. That being said, once they brought back the toasted marshmallow flavored ice cream, I was thrilled. I liked the chocolate cookies, but the ice cream felt more like cookies and cream than s’mores, so I just added my own crushed graham crackers. EVEN MORE RECENTLY I noticed they changed the recipe, again. This time it was perfected!! I no longer have to add my own graham crackers.";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: Lare Bear
title: A solid pint. Great use of flavor choice.
text;;;: I bought this flavor last week while making a trip to my local scoop shop. Let me just start out by saying that smores is a hard flavor to really nail flavor wise. I really enjoyed the marshmallow ice cream. Alot of companies usually go with chocolate as a base for Smores and I think that its usually overwhelming and distracting from the marshmallow. So the star of the flavor show was definitely on point. The grahms are great and are a great topping used in alot of flavors lately. Unfortunately tgis pint suffers from the same thing most smores flavored things do and it was ultimately too sweet in my opinion. I enjoyed this pint but theres too many more to try to stop here!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,Cassidy,2018-04-13,1,Definitely missed the mark,12,7,"S’mores is my favorite flavor EVER. So when I saw Gimme S’mores in my local grocery store I almost fell over I was so excited! However the excitement was short-lived because this is not s’mores. Not even the slightest bit. If I were blindfolded and tried this, I would never guess that it is s’mores flavor. The “marshmallow” ice cream is vanilla and there is no hint of graham cracker. The most overpowering part is the chocolate cookie swirl...which is not s’mores. Don’t get me wrong, the ice cream is good! If I were rating based on taste it would get 5 Stars. But I’m rating it based on how closely it captures the s’mores flavor. If I could give it a 0 I would because this is basically The Tonight Dough without the cookie dough and chocolate ice cream. So do yourself a favor and just get that because at least you have cookie dough.";;;

Gimme S'more!,Ateag,2019-04-09,5,The Best and Most Missed,1,0,"This was the best s'more flavored edible substance I have ever consumed. Every time I saw ""Limited Batch"" on the label, I dreaded the day that would be my last time seeing it on the shelves. Mercy shone upon me each time, though, as upon return to my home, all the dread melted away as I rejoiced and beheld Heaven's essence grace my mouth with the textured, creamy delight of Gimme S'more. Alas, the day finally encroached upon my innocent self that I would see in its stead, ""One Love"". I've since settled for Milk&Cookies which I know can never fill the void once occupied by the dessert of unmatched divinity. I dream that one day I'll once again taste the treasure graciously gifted to this unworthy world by the great Ben and Jerry.";;;

Gimme S'more!,Andy0418,2018-06-04,5,Best s’mores ice cream I’ve had!,18,6,"Way better than the previous s’mores recipe. Fantastic! I sat down with the pint and before I knew it, it was gone. Oops!";;;

Gimme S'more!,Disappointed625,2018-06-22,2,Flavor regrets,3,2,"As a long time fan of Ben & Jerry's, I have favorite flavors I always want. Being summer and seeing the store did not have any of my favorites, I thought I would try this ""new"" flavor. I have to say, it is not at all what I was hoping for. I am a marshmallow junkie and was hoping for toasted marshmallow flavor;" instead
author: I felt like I was eating vanilla chocolate chip with some of those cake crunchies that you find in ice cream cakes. I will go back to my regular flavors or skip buying if Gimme S'more is my only other option.""";;

name: Gimme S'more!,ash84,2018-10-07,5,The real deal!,1,0,"I have been a hard-core regular cookie dough ice cream only fan for YEARS, but this flavor caught my eye at the beginning of summer and I haven't been able to buy any other ice cream since! It's the amazing cookie swirl that almost convinced me that I could love the Tonight Dough flavor, despite my hatred for the nasty peanut butter dough. And the ever so creamy toasted marshmellow ice cream was a pleasant surprise! Even the graham cracker swirl blends in perfectly so you don't feel like you have random dry crumbs messing up the texture! It's the perfect combination that at times tastes like what an Oreo ice cream should taste like! I haven't had my go-to cookie dough ice cream in over 4 months and will be incredibly sad when this masterpiece goes away!";;;

Gimme S'more!,moorejennie78,2018-07-15,1,The original S'mores is better,8,3,"This flavor does not remind me of S'mores at all. Why cookies? The chocolate flakes are more like big pieces... too big for this. I couldn't even finish the container. It wasn't worth it. first time I've done that with Ben & Jerry's. Hopefully you'll never quit making the original S'mores, even if they are only in the shops.";;;
Gimme S'more!
title: Best ice cream I’ve ever had in my life
text;;;: I had an ad pop up on my Instagram timeline for this ice cream and I went and found it at my local H-E-B. The next day I went back and they were out. I went to 4 Walmart’s and 3 more H-E-B’s with no luck until I finally found it at target. I have now bought all the pints from my local target. Please send more every where in San Antonio. I need it to live at this point LOL;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,Natf,2018-03-28,3,Not what I was expecting.,5,1,"I love s’mores, and don’t get me wrong this flavor is great, but not what I wanted. I was expecting more of a s’mores flavor, and I would explain this ice cream as more of a “marshmallow cookie crunch.” It’s still good! Just not s’mores. It would be better with gooey marshmallows :)";;;

Gimme S'more!,OTstudent90,2018-04-09,1,A miss unfortunately,7,4,"I just bought this as well as my staple, cookie dough. Cookie dough was as usual amazing but this one was just a miss for me. It reminded me of the pint slices, not nearly enough toppings or pieces. It was mostly vanilla ice cream with some cookie pieces in it. Definitely not enough marshmallows to make it feel like a s'mores ice cream. Anyway, I love most of B&Js flavors but this one wasn't for me";;;

Gimme S'more!,Frog,2018-05-31,5,Breaks my Heart this is Only Limited Batch,3,1,"I like ice cream and I eat a fair amount of it but never have I had an ice cream that haunts my dreams like this one. This ice cream might actually be perfect. The toasted marshmallow base is excellent and not too sweet and the flakes of chocolate add the perfect crunch to the blend. I'm not a big chocolate ice cream fan and I think that making the base marshmallow allows all of the flavors to be appreciated as one instead of being overpowered by chocolate. However, by far my favorite part of this ice cream is the graham cracker fudge swirl. Holy moley! It has a fantastic texture and the taste leads me on a whirlwind adventure. I don't know what I have to do to make this more than just a limited batch but I will do it. Every time I go to the grocery store I hold my breath that it will still be there waiting for me, cool and delicious.";;;

Gimme S'more!,Givemesmoreforever,2018-04-24,5,Tastes so good it should be illegal,4,3,"This is my new favorite ice cream. While I agree that the base ice cream is not an exact replica of marshmallows, it does not taste like plain vanilla... more like the melted gooey inside of a marshmallow that’s not actually warm or gooey. The add ins are perfection to me between the swirls graham and chocolate cookie I’m in ice cream heaven. I have to carefully calculate my purchases so this is the only cheat on my diet each week! I hope it goes from “limited batch” to “here to stay”!";;;

Gimme S'more!,sarac99,2018-04-30,5,beyond expectation,5,2,"I love a good vanilla based ice cream flavor, and this did not disappoint. I was skeptical to try to the flavor because of the reviews that were already posted but it was amazing. I loved the graham cracker bits. people complain it's not like the regular smores flavor, uh hello duh the smores flavor already exists and is still in stores. This a tasty spin-off and does not disappoint";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: Westanhalsey
title: Favorite Flavor!
text;;;: I have been buying this consistently for about 5 weeks almost like twice a week because I cannot get enough of this flavor. It’s honestly unhealthy for me at this point and for my bank account because I barely bought ice cream before taking a chance on this one. Delicious! The cookies and graham crackers are amazing in it. I literally went through the process of giving my info just so I could write this review in hopes that the flavor is continued and more people improve upon their lives by buying this flavor.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,Taylorch4,2018-04-02,2,Glorified cookies n cream,5,1,"Hmm tasty but not s’mores. Just tasted like cookies n cream with some extra chocolate chunks. No graham cracker flavor. Wish the base actually tasted like toasted marshmallow, but unfortunately the flavor isn’t coming through. Oh well!!";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: Angie Mottk
title: Please rename this to Cookies and Creme
text;;;: I love Ben and Jerry’s but they missed the mark on this one. This is nothing even faintly reminiscent of S’mores ice cream. Now this one replaced the original S’mores and I can’t find it. Very disappointed.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Tamami
title: I need this to be a permanent addition!
text;;;: I love this flavor. Forget s'mores because that one is just old news. I bought and stocked up my freezer but now I am eating the one last pint... Please bring it back soon;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,DaveSaysGimmeSMore,2019-03-22,5,My greatest Ice-Cream Memory,0,0,"I first tried this flavor with my best friend and became hooked the moment those flavors hit my palate. I’ve gone through 6 pints within a week (multiple times), trying to savor the limited batch that was created (also in hopes of raising the number of pints sold, encouraging your company to keep them on the grocery shelves). There was never a time I’d leave the grocery without one of these pints. Until, my local grocery store finally ran out.";;;

Gimme S'more!,RS30,2018-05-20,1,The old S'mores was so much better!!!,5,4,"The previous S'mores was so much better. The chocolate ice cream tasted much better than the marshmallow one. When I went to the store and didn't see the other one anymore (which btw was my favorite flavor ever!) and saw this one I decided to give it a try, but overall I was very disappointed. The ice cream itself is not good and the chocolate cookies do not taste like s'mores to me. Please bring the old one back!!!";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: KerryB88
title: Overall NOT S'mores!
text;;;: It's vanilla ice cream not toasted marshmallow. That alone was extremely disappointing. A little graham cracker swirl was ok. Just didn't go with the ice cream. I did like the chocolate cookie swirl. It basically was a cookies and cream ice cream taste. Only a little bit of fudge flakes but that's fine with me. Extremely disappointed. I love marshmallow.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Patty
title: Delicious
text;;;: Gimme Smores is the best ever. My whole family loves it. Please make it a forever flavor. We can't get enough.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,emilyab,2018-03-26,3,No s'mores taste,5,2,"It's ice cream, of course it still tastes good... but sadly this tasted nothing like s'mores. Marshmallow ice cream taste nothing like marshmallow, and the chocolate cookie took over the graham cracker flavor.";;;

Gimme S'more!,whistle_pig,2018-04-08,2,In no way is this like a s'more.,6,3,"The ice cream base is suppose to be a toasted marshmallow flavor but to me it is just vanilla ice cream. This ice cream to me tastes like cookies and cream to be honest, save your money and just make a s'more.";;;

Gimme S'more!,Wilhelm,2019-02-26,5,Best Ben and Jerry's Ice Cream,1,0,"Few Ice Creams in life have a perfect blend of flavor, texture, and eatability (which I know is not a word, but I have made it up for this review!). You can eat Gimme S'more! for breakfast, lunch, and dinner, and still be able to find a way to have more more bite as dessert. You can eat this straight, or as a dope milkshake. I really hope this flavor sticks and goes into permanent rotation. Good job Ben and Jerry - keep up the great work!";;;

Gimme S'more!,GimmeSmorePlease,2019-07-15,5,Please Bring this Back,0,0,"This ice cream deserves more than 5 stars. It is by far the best flavor of Ben and Jerry's I've ever had and every time I go to the grocery store I still check to see if MAYBE it will be back. My boyfriend and I were both obsessed with it and had all of our friends and family try it. This deserves to be so much more than just a limited edition flavor. The whole world needs to try it. I agree with the below reviewer that said when this flavor is off the shelf, their happiness died. There is a hole in my heart than can only be filled with this flavor.";;;
