Gimme S'more!,timoteo,2018-09-10,5,Best new flavor in years,3,1,"Ben and Jerry’s, PLEASE keep this one around. I loved the old S’mores too but this one is so much better. I know most flavors end up in the graveyard but if this one ends up in the graveyard it will be a tradgedy on par with human trafficking.";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: SpecialSauceRemix
title: Best tasting s'mores ice cream I've ever had
text;;;: My girlfriend bought one for us to try. Went back and bought each our own.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,VanessaB99,2019-02-02,2,Still needs improvement,1,0,"I like this version better than the original, however it still doesn't taste like s'mores. There needs to be a smoky element, whether that be smoked salt or bits of charred marshmallow. Also there needs to be a LOT more graham. I couldn't taste it at all. This ice cream has the potential to be amazing & legendary. It's tough to re-create the taste of a real s'more though. Hope you keep trying.";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: FuzzyGut
title: So glad I had it while it’s still available
text;;;: Delicious! Great ice cream and the swirls are perfect! I eat my Ben and Jerry’s with one of my son’s toddler spoons to help make the pint last longer (as I always eat the whole thing) but this one I couldn’t help but take huge bites anyway. I really like this flavor! I could have maybe gone for a little marshmallow swirl in addition just for a texture contrast but that’s not a big deal.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,Savanna27,2019-05-26,5,"BEST ICE CREAM EVER,",1,0,"I have been FEENING for this ice cream. It is hands down the best ice cream I’ve had in my entire life. Do you know how tormenting it is, to find your favorite ice cream then it goes out of stock? Then you try a million different flavors and none of them do what the Gimme s’mores does. ITS THE BEST. PLEASE. I beg you. Bring this back as a permanent flavor. The people need it.";;;

Gimme S'more!,mags345,2018-05-29,5,best s'more flavored thing besides actual s'mores,1,2,"I am not a fan of s'mores flavored items. I like real s'mores. but this ice cream is exquisite. the graham and chocolate cookie swirl are stars of the show and on a backdrop of marshmallow ice cream, not a sharp sweet but a mellow and deep savoriness...its delicious. I had never tried the original ""S'mores"" flavor, but tried it after loving ""Gimme S'more"".. Gimme S'more is hands down the reigning champ, i feel the other s'mores tastes mostly like a rich chocolate, nowhere near as complex in flavor";;;

Gimme S'more!,Kyle86,2018-04-15,4,Definitely better than the old S'more flavor but..,3,2,"It's pretty much another cookie bit flavor similar to ""The Tonight Dough"" and ""Milk and Cookies."" It's pretty tasty though. So.... if you're expecting an authentic s'more flavor, you'll be disappointed. But if you like cookies-n-cream types compared to the two popular flavors I compared it with, you'll enjoy it.";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: tharrfuldodgr
title: Sequels are never as good.
text;;;: I'm so sad they've discontinued the previous s'mores recipe for this.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,,2018-06-13,2,definitely not a s'more,2,1,"So, it's not like this ice cream is bad, but the name and description are very misleading. I would call it more of a cookies and cream because there is no marshmallows. And it's not a very good cookies and cream. Definitely one of my least favorite flavors:(";;;

Gimme S'more!,tiana12332132,2018-07-20,5,Better than the original,2,1,"Probably my favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor. The marshmallow ice cream is super tasty, I love the chocolate cookies. The original s'mores flavor is too chocolate-y for me, so I much prefer this one. My only complaint: I wish there were more graham crackers.";;;

Gimme S'more!,Jerbear,2018-10-17,5,THE BEST,0,0,"I just bought this a few weeks ago and I wanted to try a different flavor and I was compelled to buy this one because of the description. I was very curious about this flavor but afraid it could be too sweet. After my purchase, I finished the whole pint in one sitting because the flavor is delicious! I can't get enough of this flavor. I was looking to buy a second in the grocery stores but I couldn't find any! It's apparently not sold everywhere but when you get the chance to see this flavor, do it!";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: kjm1
title: Ugh!
text;;;: I may have gotten a bad one but there were no swirls of anything. Just specs of stuff. Plus it was very hard.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,MontyJoe414,2019-01-28,5,Loooooovvvvvve it!!!,0,0,"From the first time I laid eyes on this cream, I couldn't go back to any regular flavor lol. Seriously, this flavor is soooo much better than the other over-powered chocolate based Smores that you all have. It's texture and flavor is impeccably balanced to resemble an actual Smores. Don't judge me, but it has even come down to me buying atleast 3 pints every other week just to keep my fridge stocked for the future lol. Just please take it off of the ""Limited Batch"" list. Pleeease!!";;;

Gimme S'more!,ritaaint62,2018-10-21,5,Gimme S'more Forever!,0,0,"I work at walmart. Over the summer I took to sampling a large number of different ice-cream pints, but once I discovered ""gimme s'more!"" the sampling stopped and I have settled into my favorite ice-cream. While I refuse to share my pint, I would encourage others to get their own. With this flavor, there are no regrets.";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: SenseiEvan
title: This should be chocolate.
text;;;: I can’t find regular S’mores anywhere anymore. This is a sad excuse for a replacement if that’s what’s happening. It’s your best flavor.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Szigler
title: Not smores
text;;;: There are no graham crackers or marshmallow swirls. Doesn't even taste like smores. Chocolate chunks are the best part.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Escole3
title: Cookie swirls are AMAZING
text;;;: The chocolate cookie swirls in this blew my mind. Combined with the graham cracker and marshmallow WOW so good.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,JustBeingHonest,2018-08-25,1,The Greatest Disappointment of 2018,1,2,"I brought this flavor from my local grocery store yesterday because I've been asking for S'more ice cream with toasted marshmallows forever;" the wait was finally over or so I thought. Unfortunately
author: this is NOT S'more flavored ice cream this is however cookies in cream. The """"toasted marshmallows"""" taste exactly like the cream filling in Oreos and the double chocolate cookies like the Oreo cookie – Infinite sadness.""";;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Linds1571
title: Amazzzinggg!!!
text;;;: Chocolate Fudge Brownie used to be my fave until I tried this. I’m SO glad I did. This stuff is heavenly!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,Streeturchin,2018-08-07,5,I think cleaned put my local stores,1,0,"My daughter and I loved this, i hope it returns as i think weve gotten the last ones at our local grocer";;;

Gimme S'more!,woodhouse,2018-10-15,5,PLEASE MAKE THIS FLAVOR PERMANENT,0,0,"LOOK. I am a busy person. We all are. And part of what makes being a busy person so bearable is ice cream. Especially Ben and Jerry's ice cream. ESPECIALLY THIS FLAVOR. When I tell you that this is like a sweet and creamy version of every campfire memory of your youth, I mean it. It is every good part about every good flavor that makes S'mores a gosh-darn ethereal pleasure right here on earth. So get in your car, walk to your subway station, or hail the nearest rideshare or omnibus and GET SOME OF THIS BEFORE THEY TAKE IT AWAY.";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: Mm56789
title: THE ABSOLUTE BEST!!!
text;;;: Literally the best ice cream ever made. My new favorite. PLEASE make this a permanent flavor!!!!!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Joy96
title: Best flavor ever
text;;;: Currently stuffing myself with heaven and I gotta say this is the best flavor I’ve ever had;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Heather810
title: My favorite!
text;;;: This one is 10 times better than the other s'more one! Please keep making this one!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Ewillard
title: Best S'mores Ice Cream!
text;;;: This ice cream is so good and I really wish Ben & Jerry's would make it year round!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Briguy425
title: I don't even like marshmallows
text;;;: I have been on a journey to find the best Ben and Jerry's ice cream. This may be it;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: addylovatic
title: awesome flavor
text;;;: So good- I’ve bought it several times. The cookie crumble is the best part.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Dani1234
title: AMAZING
text;;;: My new favorite ice cream! So much better than the original s’mores flavor!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,Amercole,2018-09-19,5,The BEST,0,0,"I’m going to be super disappointed when this flavor is gone. I love that there is ZERO chocolate ice cream, but instead wonderful graham crackers and chocolate pieces. The toasted marshmallow ice cream is perfect. This is literally the first time in 30 years I’ve been willing to spend money on Ben and Jerry’s (I don’t exactly see eye to eye with some of their views on certain policies and laws), but as long as they keep selling this, I will keep spending my money!";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: DBR96
title: BEST FLAVOR
text;;;: Wish it wasn't a limited batch...I could eat this all year long!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: mama
title: YES
text;;;: this is so good please keep this flavor forever ohhh yeahhh;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Melmel
title: Yes please!
text;;;: I love the new Gimme S’more! It is my favorite flavor❤️❤️❤️;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Icecreamfan
title: Great
text;;;: Awesome flavor could be my favorite the texture is awesome;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Shan68
title: Love it!
text;;;: One of my newest favorite flavors❤️ I hope it returns.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Alwaysgimmesmore
title: Don’t get rid of it
text;;;: It’s the best! Whyyy does it have to be limited? WHY;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Mugsy
title: MARSHMALLOW
text;;;: THE MARSHMALLOW ICE CREAM IS AMAZING please restock;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,upset,2018-06-21,1,Not feeling' it,2,2,"It didn't really taste like anything, just tasted like vanilla ice cream with specks of cookie and chocolate. And when I say specks, I truly mean specks. Trace evidence of flavor. Not a fan at all, tasted nothing like S'mores.";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: Clhatbix
title: Not very S'mores like
text;;;: It's a good flavor...... but doesn't remind me of s'mores at all. It's more like cookies and cream with graham crackers. It should have the same marshmallow creme that Fish Food has and way more chocolate chunks.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,mchardy,2018-04-29,4,Give it a good ol' try,1,2,"Upon first spoon, I was overwhelmed with the disappointment of too much chocolate. I assumed that it was just another foolhardy excuse of a s'mores flavored food that would be overpowered with chocolate. However, I persevered and did not give up. As I continued on in my journey, I was greatly impressed. The marshmallow portions in the ice cream were great. was it as up to par as my usual go to staple of the Tonight Dough? No, But it was good enough to wear I would purchase again if I needed something different in my life. It does get better. Do not give up on this flavor, you really just gotta commit. Not a total fail of the s'mores flavor, which tends to be a difficult one to portray, however not a total success. It is good, though maybe not a typical s'mores. I do not think it completely captures the essence of s'mores, however I think that it is decadent and delicious enough for me to purchase again.";;;

Gimme S'more!,sweetmel,2018-10-08,1,Not the best,2,2,"Please do not replace the previous s'mores flavor with this one. It hardly has any s'mores flavor at all. All I taste is marshmellow, where's the graham crackers? Nope, I do not want s'more of this one!";;;

Gimme S'more!,Lewsfancy,2018-05-27,1,What a let down!,2,3,"Ok, ok granted I love the original S’mores. I’m just tired of having to drive 37 miles (yes 37!) to get it. This flavor hurt my soul. The base didn’t have any flavor but sweet, the chocolate cookies part was ok. That honestly all the flavors I found. I’ll keep driving the 37 miles.";;;

Gimme S'more!,ilovesmores,2018-04-25,5,I need S’more,0,3,"Perfect name, because I can’t stop eating this and I need some more! Oh my gosh, this ice cream is SO good! It’s my favorite ice cream that I’ve bought in a grocery store, and my favorite Ben & Jerry’s flavor since Fossil Fuel. I’m a lover of all things smores, and this is the best smores flavored ice cream I’ve had. I’m going to cry when it’s not in stores anymore. PLEASE make this a permanent flavor, it is too good to just be limited batch!!!";;;

Gimme S'more!,givejackiesmore,2020-06-07,5,New favorite flavor!,0,0,"I was very disappointed when I saw my boyfriend decided to buy this flavor instead of Milk & Cookies... to the point where I ate all the ice cream in my freezer before even thinking about opening this new pint. And boy oh boy was I so wrong - the combinations of flavors in this pint exceeded all expectations and Gimme S'more has now risen the ranks to my new favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor. Don't get me wrong, I will eat ANY flavor, but now when I go to stores, I specifically search for this one! The only thing that makes me sad is that most places don't carry this flavor as it must not be as popular, but when it's available, it's embarrassing how excited I get. Don't sleep on this flavor like I did... I've never written a review for any product I've ever bought in my 27 years of life, and am happy that this is my first. I'd give it 10 stars if I could!";;;

Gimme S'more!,AmyDee,2018-05-31,5,Please keep this flavor!!,1,2,"I tried this for the first time about 3 weeks ago, and have bought an embarrassingly excessive amount since. It is so good. I love how the chocolate isn’t large chunks, and swirls with the graham cracker perfectly. Too often I find a flavor I like only to have it discontinued. Please don’t do that with Gimme S'more!! Keep it!! I promise I’ll keep eating it!!!";;;

Gimme S'more!,becca13,2018-06-14,5,Best Flavor By Far!,0,0,"I grabbed this flavor along with a few others when I was bringing a bunch of ice cream for a get together at my brother's home. I picked it for dessert and it was the most amazing thing I have ever eaten! When I was going home for the night, I made sure to take this pint with me!";;;

Gimme S'more!,SmoreLove,2019-02-06,2,I will eat it because it is ice cream,0,0,"I will eat it because it is ice cream, and B&J makes great ice cream, but I am very disappointed in the S'more flavor. I was searching for my long lost, always hard to find, favorite flavor that I recall having a chocolate base with graham cracker and marshmallow swirls. What happened to that glorious ice cream?! I was ready to love this new version but it wasn't meant to be. If you try again, Ben & Jerry, I will too.";;;
Gimme S'more!,PandaCVP,2020-07-16,5,Best S'mores Ice Cream Hands Down,0,0,"This flavor is everything a s'mores should be, and I sincerely hope it becomes a permanent pint in the lineup.";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: J_1880
title: Less than 5 stars is a joke.
text;;;: Anyone who votes less than 5 stars tried the wrong ice cream.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,Mfennec,2018-11-15,5,Perfect,0,0,"I bought this last week on a whim and was blown away completely. I went on a quest for it today. No one had it, so I decided to try the original S’mores. You guys. This flavor is so much better than the original. The lighter base really helps the contrast of the flavors, and it’s honestly amazing. Completely worth the calories where the original isn’t. I hope I can find it again before it gets discontinued.";;;

Gimme S'more!,mfro,2018-08-15,5,Best Flavor Combination Since Half-Baked!,0,0,"I had the pleasure of trying this flavor at the end of the tour, and it's the most excited I'd been about an ice cream flavor in fifteen years. The ice cream itself is phenomenal, as are the chocolate chips, but the FUDGE FLAKES are the winner in my book. Purchased two pints from my local supermarket (four states away) and it's just as delicious. Please, please, please, please, please keep this flavor!!";;;

Gimme S'more!,Smoreslvr,2018-04-03,4,Great flavor but S’mores it is not,0,1,"I was so excited to see this new flavor as I love all things s’mores. I agree with previous reviewers that it reminds me of cookies and cream. A very rich, cookies and cream. What it needs more of is graham and marshmallow, less of the cookie swirl. Having said that, I wouldn’t not buy it if I were in the mood for a little ice cream. Thanks B&J for introducing this new flavor. I hope you keep it around.";;;

Gimme S'more!,,2020-05-20,5,BEST EVER,0,0,"I was in Denver, Colorado at a scoop shop and saw the flavor ""Gimme Smore"" I read the description and it sounded good. My friends and family loved it too, and as soon as we got back home we checked if our local grocery store had it and they did! We honestly probably bought 10 of them. Once it left the stores we were devastated and emailed to make sure it would come back and happily it did!!";;;

Gimme S'more!,B28078,2020-05-16,3,Meh,1,1,"Honestly very underwhelming. Maybe if there were more swirls of cookie and graham cracker, or adding marshmallow swirls would help. But I definitely won’t be buying again.";;;

Gimme S'more!,Smoreslover5467,2018-07-29,5,Get rid of the other s'mores and keep this one!,1,1,"Finally a good rendition of s'mores! So smooth, love the chocolate cookie pieces! Wish it had marshmallows in it like phish food, but oh well. Don't get rid of it please!";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: Talentchic
title: Love it beyond
text;;;: This is my new favorite flavor. Tonight dough is a very close second. Hope this becomes more than a limited edition. Would be a staple in our freezer;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Cab44
title: So Good!
text;;;: I ended up trying this flavor because they were out of my favorite. It was so much better than I expected it to be! It might be my new favorite.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Kjbedell
title: So good! My new favorite ice cream
text;;;: This is by FAR my new favorite flavor! The crunch from the cookies and graham cracker really makes it! I hope they decide to keep it around;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Jaaay7282
title: Disappointed
text;;;: It’s currently 1 am and I’m eating my ice cream that I have been looking forward too all day. It’s basically vanilla ice cream with cookies & grahm crackers. The ice cream does not taste like marshmallows & that’s so disappointing.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,Monday16,2019-04-28,5,Great While it Lasted,0,0,"This was our favorite B&J’s flavor ever. It really tasted just like you were eating a S’mores from a campfire. It was a limited batch and it must be over because it is no longer available where we live. We tried the other B&J’s S’mores Ice Cream, while it is a good chocolate ice cream, it does not really taste like S’mores. Very disappointed it is gone.";;;

Gimme S'more!,Laura24,2018-06-02,5,"Not S’mores, But Still Delicious",0,1,"This has all the elements of a s’more, but I don’t get that full s’more flavor when I eat it (I think because the marshmallow flavor isn’t very strong). That being said, it’s absolutely delicious. I love the different textures of the chocolate and graham cracker, and I had to stop myself from going back for more. I will definitely be buying this again!";;;

Gimme S'more!,Max18,2020-06-11,1,Very Disappointing!!,0,0,"I bought this for the 1st time when I couldn't find my favorite ""S'mores"" at the store. Very disappointing!! Tastes nothing like a s'more. It reminded me of a cookies and cream type flavor but not even as good! Please bring back the ""S'mores"" flavor! With it's toasted marshmallow, graham crackers and dark chocolate ice cream, it was delicious!!!";;;
Gimme S'more!,Threeb73,2018-04-24,5,Yummy,1,1,"I shared this with my five-year-old great nephew, and he said it was the best ice cream he's ever had.";;;

Gimme S'more!,Lemondrop312,2018-04-30,5,Please make this a permanent flavor!,1,2,"I absolutely LOVE this flavor! If I’m being honest, I don’t think it has an overwhelming ”s’mores” flavor, but I love it anyhow. The cookies have a great flavor, and the texture of the graham crackers is wonderful!";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: Jacksmom
title: I’ll eat s’more of this
text;;;: Great flavor. The texture of the cookie is spot on. I’ll be disappointed to see this one go.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: kimmybuz
title: Please Keep This Flavor!
text;;;: DELICIOUS! This ice cream has great texture and tastes amazing. I can't wait to get more.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: JH0912
title: New Favorite Flavor
text;;;: This is my new favorite flavor! I hope they decide to make this a permanent addition!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,GimmeSmoreNOW,2018-04-25,5,New family favorite!,1,2,"My whole family loves this ice cream! We tried this flavor during the factory tour in VT. When we got home, we bought the last 3 at our local market. Please make this a permanent favor! PLEEEEEEEASE!";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: Tonyp
title: Make this a permanent flavor please
text;;;: Magnificent.. best flavor out of all B&J I’ve tried. Keep it a permanent flavor!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,Smoseph,2018-06-08,5,Favorito,1,1,"Fave B&J ever! This should be a forever flavor, not limited batch! Puh-lease!";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: GMfT
title: Two words: Ah Mazing
text;;;: Why is this only a 4/5? People seriously...this is an epic epicurean delight;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: fat person
title: Favorite new flavor
text;;;: Wish it wasn't a limited batch. My doctor is glad it is though. LOL;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: JanelSample
title: My favorite!
text;;;: I am obsessed with this flavor. Wishing it wasn’t a limited batch!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,Ashley618smw,2018-05-17,5,Best s’mores ice cream,1,1,"Stocked my freezer with it, really wish it wasn’t limited batch";;;
Gimme S'more!,Lacie P,2018-06-20,5,The best yet,1,1,"Hands down fravorite flavor yet, and I’ve had a lot of them";;;
Gimme S'more!,Smores,2019-01-13,5,When I need a pick-me-up...,0,0,"I have never been so passionate about an ice-cream flavor than I am with Ben & Jerry's ""Gimme S'mores!""";;;

Gimme S'more!,Kaylazies,2018-07-12,5,Best Flavor on EARTH,0,0,"Literally my new absolute FAVORITE icecream ever. It’s PERFECT. It’s all my favorite flavors together all in one and that chocolate cookie swirl is to die for and omg that graham cracker is just heaven, not too chocolately and that marshmallow icecream just ties it aallllll together. Amazing. Exquisite. Must have with every meal.";;;
Gimme S'more!,Cooley,2018-05-24,5,Better than the actual s’mores flavor,1,1,"Sooooo good, my new favorite flavor of Ben and jerrys!!!";;;

Gimme S'more!,Chaos,2018-07-31,5,Best flavor EVER!!!!!,0,0,"After my first pint I never looked back. Iv eaten more of this ice cream in the past few months then Iv eaten any ice cream in my entire life lol. If you like smores (or ice cream) then you need to try this. The only bad part is that it says limited batch . ""I hope they do us all a flavor, keep this one around for us to savor "".";;;

Gimme S'more!,Lolo17,2018-03-24,4,"Great ice cream, but really S’more",0,2,"The overall ice cream was really delicious, but it didn’t really taste like a s’more. The actual ice cream did not taste enough like marshmallow, would have loved to have actual marshmallow swirl in it like some of the other B&J flavors. Tastes more like cookies and cream with some extr little extra chocolate chocolate pieces.";;;

Gimme S'more!,kris403,2018-04-27,5,Great taste!,1,2,"For days, I have been stocking up on this flavor. The graham cracker and cookie swirls are the pints' best features!! I would love to see this become a permanent flavor!";;;

Gimme S'more!,Cheatingonmydiet,2020-05-11,5,Favorite flavor!!!,0,0,"Oh my gosh I’m so happy they brought this flavor back! I was obsessed with it during the summer and I was so sad it went away, but I just saw it at my grocery store and just about freaked out. The texture from the marshmallow is so nice and the flavors are just perfect. My favorite Ben & Jerry’s flavor, hands down.";;;

Gimme S'more!,PintKiller1,2018-04-26,5,Amazing taste!,1,2,"This is now my favorite Ben and Jerry’s I’ve cream! I love the toasted marshmallow taste, and the fudge ripple and graham cracker swirl are to die for!";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: Stillannoyed
title: Not buying it.
text;;;: This is a horrible job of fixing something that wasn’t broken. Where is my S’mores!?!? I can only find this gross imposter where it used to be.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: helen74
title: NEW FAVORITE FLAVOR
text;;;: I’ve been buying this flavor left and right ever since I first tried it — it is my new favorite and I just can’t seem to get enough!!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Kamm
title: Best ice cream ever!
text;;;: This is my most favorite ice cream ever! I don't normally right reviews on anything but I want Ben&jerry to make this all the time!!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Sugar addict
title: Best flavor all time
text;;;: I have been searching for this flavor for weeks after finding one perfect pint of it. This is what cookies&cream would taste like in an ideal world. Sweet marshmallow ice cream base with a textured Graham cracker swirl is everything a s'mores ice cream should be. I desperately want to find this again!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,Sarabeth,2018-05-01,5,Best Flavor Yet!,0,2,"I cannot say enough about this delicious treat! The sugary graham cracker bits and chocolate cookie pieces...incredible!!!!! If I wasn't already married, this ice cream would for definitely ensure the fact that I would be single forever, which, for this ice cream, would be totally worth it!!!!!!";;;

Gimme S'more!,Chelsi,2018-09-12,5,The best!!!,0,0,"This is my favorite ice cream. I’ve always been a lover of Half Baked and never ventured out of my comfort zone, but now I’ll never go back. I seriously want to buy pints of this and keep it in my freezer for the 2 years that it is apparently good for. PLEASE make this a permanent flavor!!!";;;

Gimme S'more!,Grxciebella,2018-04-22,5,MY FAVORITE,0,1,"I really just wanted to break from my usual and when I saw this and it wasn't a chocolate based ice cream, I just had to get it. The last time I went to buy a pint, it was out but today when I went there were some, so just to be on the safe side, I bought two because I love it so much!!";;;

Gimme S'more!,Brooklyn99,2018-10-18,5,Delicious!!!,0,0,"This is by far my new favorite ice cream from Ben and Jerry's! It says ""limited batch"" on the container, but I hope this becomes a permanent flavor! I will eat this year round. The marshmallow ice cream is amazing and paired with the chocolate cookie pieces and graham crackers, to die!";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: ddub14
title: Top 3 Ben and Jerry Ice creams
text;;;: I bought this because it was limited addition thinking it would be mediocre. But it was amazing.5/5;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Emstay
title: New favorite!!
text;;;: Literally my new favorite flavor. Possibly the best one yet. I hope they make it a forever flavor!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Calvin B
title: Wow.
text;;;: Just when I thought Oat of this Swirrled was the best thing EVER. You guys made this flavor.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: nugget
title: BETTER THAN THE SMORES FLAVOR
text;;;: I crave that cookie taste all of the time. Please make this permanent! I accidentally got the smores flavor thinking it was the same and boy was I wrong. The smores one is just plain chocolate whereas this one tastes like a delicious smore. This is my favorite flavor of all time!!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,idealistterrene,2018-09-10,5,I hate that this is limited,0,0,"My Husband and I enjoy Ben & Jerrys ice cream a few times a week. We have our ""usual"" flavors;" Cherry Garcia and Pistachio. We tried this a couple weeks ago and we LOVED it - the marshmellowy icecream and the crunchy bits plus chocolate pcs perfectly delicious. Now we need MORE""";;
Gimme S'more!
author: Niftynoodle
title: I can’t stop buying this.
text;;;: I never had a favorite flavor of ice cream... until now. I’m terrified of the fact that it is Limited Batch. I keep buying a couple of pints when I’m at the grocery store. They go quickly at my house. And so far they are still in stock... but I’m afraid! Don’t take it away!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: lulu27
title: BEST FLAVOR EVER
text;;;: Honestly I don't know how this flavor only has four stars because it is legitimately one of the best (if not the best) Ben and Jerry's flavors of all time. SOOOO good.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: BlackThoughtz
title: Great Flavor
text;;;: Wonderful remic to the prior version. I really love the chocolate cookie swirl in this. I really wish there was a pronounced graham cracker in here. Maybe replacing the dark chocolate chip with a cluster of graham cracker instead would probably make this a better flavor IMO;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: TiNiLo
title: So Good
text;;;: I picked this up yesterday and I wasn't sure that I would like it because I tend to be pretty simple in my ice cream tastes. I am so excited that I did because this is delicious! My favorite part is the combination of the ice cream flavor and the graham cracker swirls.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: batchase3
title: Best flavor yet!
text;;;: Best flavor yet! Cant seem to find more in the same stores lately!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Erinlm
title: Gimme smores
text;;;: The old version is much better this one is not very good at all.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: KB157
title: Best flavor ever
text;;;: This is the best Ben and Jerry’s I’ve ever tried. It’s amazing!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Careabearasara
title: All gone!
text;;;: Finished a pint in one sitting it's just sooooo good!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Brian309
title: Great smores flavor
text;;;: Bought one of each of the new flavors and this was the first i tried. Its great taste like smores and id buy again. However BRING BACK VANILLA HEATH BAR CRUNCH PLEASE!!!! Obviously i dont eat this for breakfast lunch or dinner either thats a stupid question;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Mkayyy
title: All time favorite icecream
text;;;: I have an obsession. I live around the Algonac mi area. And I guarantee your sells for the gimme s’mores are up thanks to I. I can’t help but eat it on the daily. Absolute best icecream I’ve ever had. I hope it becomes permanent. I’ll be sad to see it go.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,BenJerrysLover,2019-01-29,5,LOVE IT!!!,0,0,"I love Ben & Jerry's and I have tried many different flavors. However, this one is definitely my favorite! I've lost count of how many pints I have bought so far. I hope you guys decide to keep this flavor, I was disappointed that it said ""Limited Batch"".";;;

Gimme S'more!,Zack,2018-10-09,5,Best flavor ever!,0,0,"Please keep this flavor forever, this might be my new all time favorite. Perfect for s'mores lovers, blows the other s'mores flavor out of the water. Love the graham cracker/cookie trails and the toasted marshmallow flavor. It's simply the perfect pint.";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: DanyT
title: The most delicious flavor ever probably
text;;;: Do yourself a favor and try it! Its delicious. The roasted marshmallow ice cream with graham cracker swirls is just a great mix with the chocolate cookie. I made the mistake of confusing is Gimme S'more! for S'more and while it's good it's not as good.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Vballmom
title: BEST ICE CREAM EVER!!
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream by far from anything in store or even fresh from our local ice cream shops! I can’t live without it! I even like it better than the regular s’mores flavor by Ben and Jerry’s. Please please make this a permanent flavor!!!!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,jdublovesicecream,2019-01-28,5,Absolute Favorite!,0,0,"This is hands-down the best flavor Ben and Jerry’s has ever made! I love all ice cream but this was so delicious. Tons of graham cracker, chocolate chunks, and chocolate swirl throughout. I wish this was made all year long! I highly recommend this.";;;

Gimme S'more!,Devo,2018-09-19,5,Best Ben and Jerry’s flavor,0,0,"My husband and I have purchased this flavor multiple times this summer. By far, one of the best flavors and would love it if it became a permanent option. The combination of ingredients is phenomenal, you won’t regret choosing this flavored pint.";;;

Gimme S'more!,Anonymous12,2018-12-10,5,This is my favorite flavor,0,1,"Please add this add as permanent flavor!!! Tried this on a whim and its taken over as the only flavor I have in my freezer. I usually have great self control and eat only a little at time, but with this flavor I can't help but eat the whole pint.";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: Holli123
title: BEST FLAVOR EVER
text;;;: Bought this a month ago & went back for it & have not been able to find it since & am DEVASTATED! It is the BEST icecream I've EVER had & I am pretty picky...like about everything. It has a well balanced flavor that tastes LITERALLY like smores;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Amanda M
title: PLEASE MAKE PERMANENT!!!!!
text;;;: This is literally THE best ice cream I have EVER tasted. I would love nothing more than for it to be permanent. I have bought every single pint at the three grocery stores in my town! I could not have asked for a more perfect flavor combo.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,Evhybrid,2018-08-07,5,Surprising combo,0,0,"The Gram cracker and chocolate cookie swirls go amazing with the toasted marshmallow ice cream. The fudge flakes add a nice crunch to the texture. Amazing combo of light and rich flavors, def my new favorite. A bit hard to find in stores.";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: Tb12014
title: Best of the best!
text;;;: This is easily the best flavor Ben and Jerry’s has ever released. I firmly believe it should replace the original s’mores because gimme s’mores blows it out of the water. It seems like it’s gone but I’m always on the hunt for it nonetheless;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: StormyDawn
title: One of the best!
text;;;: I bought this one after the store was out of my usual and I give it 10 stars it was perfect! I usual have to pick a flavor that doesn’t have too much hard crunch because of sensitive teeth and this hit the nail on the head! Will buy again!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,Ali_500,2019-05-20,5,BEST FLAVOR EVER!!,0,0,"This flavor should become a permanent flavor. Way better then the OG S'mores. I was so sad when my grocery store ran out of this Gimme S'more. Please mamke more of this delicious flavor and make it a permanent one, available all the time!!";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: sydthereader
title: Almost perfect!
text;;;: i tried it today and it was SO good!! the only thing that would make it better is if the ice cream itself had more of a toasted marshmallow taste. i think right now it just tastes like vanilla (maybe just a tiny bit sweeter tho).;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,Saralaw,2018-11-14,5,My absolute favorite flavor!!,0,0,"This is the best flavor, I’m obsessed with it. I have to have at least two pints in my freezer at all times! I know it’s limited edition, but PLEASE keep it!! It’s even topping half baked and mint chocolate cookie as my favorite!";;;

Gimme S'more!,Vinlands Wolf,2018-10-04,4,"Great taste, but not a staple favorite",0,0,"I absolutely love this flavor, all of the flavors stand out on their own but blend well together. I definitely would grab this on occasion when available. But due to lack of availability it just hasn't become a staple favorite.";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: abbey30
title: New Favorite Flavor!!!
text;;;: This is by far the best Smore's flavored ice cream. Do yourself a favor and try this out because you will NOT be disappointed!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Nicole145
title: Waiting for the return
text;;;: This is a limited edition batch - but it shouldn't be. It's been months since I last found this in stores and I'm waiting for it's return. PLEASE MAKE THIS A PERMANENT FLAVOR. This is some much better than the OG Smore flavor.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: BigSmileBear
title: The BEST!
text;;;: The best Ben & Jerry's flavor yet. AWESOME! Hope this one becomes a regular flavor. I ended up buying the four pints that my local grocery store had left and placed in my deep freeze. So much better than the S'more flavor.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Chris B
title: My new favorite!
text;;;: Tried this when it first came out and I was hooked. It has become my new favorite and I like it a lot better than the original S’mores. Hopefully they make this a regular flavor as I’m sad it’s becoming harder to find.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: iheartgimmesmores
title: AMAZING FLAVOR
text;;;: This is probably the best Ben & Jerry's ice cream I've ever had. My boyfriend and I are obsessed with it. We want it to be a permanent flavor not just limited batch!!! It it so so yummy- please keep it forever B&J!!!!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Natty825
title: Best flavor yet
text;;;: S'mores is one of my favorite flavors ever and B&J's absolutely killed it. You taste the cookies more than anything but once you get to the marshmallow and graham cracker tastes it is amazing. Would highly recommend.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: ShennaPunk
title: This sold me on Marshmallow
text;;;: I have never been a fan of marshmallow anything. The exception...Smores over the campfire. This ice cream flavor has me hooked. The marshmallow is subtle but pairs well with the graham cracker and chunky fudgy bits.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: sunKerst
title: Almost Perfect!
text;;;: I LOVE S'more flavored things and all existing ice creams on the market do not have a good take on it. Ben and Jerry's S'more ice cream is so addicting! Add a bit more graham cracker and perfection will be reached!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,Clark,2018-08-08,5,Soooo good,0,0,"Every part of this flavor is amazing. The toasted marshmallow ice cream would be good enough on its own, but throw in the graham cracker swirls and chocolate and it's one of the best desserts you can buy frozen";;;

Gimme S'more!,Lasquiz,2020-05-29,5,Suprise!,0,5,"This flavor was surprisingly DELICIOUS!!!! I was hesitant that the marshmallow would be too sweet but it was such a nice flavor, actually more like a cheesecake taste. Definitely will be getting this again!";;;

Gimme S'more!,KassieHaHa,2018-05-21,5,So unique!,0,1,"The marshmallow flavor was very unique! For a s’mores ice cream, I was surprised but happily! I’m usually a chocolate therapy girl, but this may be a new fave! There were plenty of toppings in every bite!";;;

Gimme S'more!,Gimmesmores18,2018-12-08,5,100% New Favorite Flavor - PLEASE KEEP IT!,0,0,"Its like comfort in a pint. Always been a hug fan of Phish Food, but this one is nostalgic and DELICIOUS. I know it’s a limted batch, but I would LOVE to see this on the permanent Ben & Jerry’s lineup!";;;

Gimme S'more!,AliMo,2018-09-30,5,ARE U KIDDING ME,0,0,"Guys, I have eaten a ton of Ben and Jerry in my lifetime but THIS is the best I have ever had. Let’s stop the games and make it a permanent flavor. Once this limited batch is done, I’ll be heartbroken.";;;

Gimme S'more!,lmccran,2019-01-13,5,Favorite Ice Cream Ever!,0,0,"This is my favorite flavor of Ben & Jerry’s, & my favorite ice cream flavor I’ve tried. I like anything inspired by s’mores, and this ice cream did not dissapoint. I hope they keep this flavor around!";;;

Gimme S'more!,gotgotgone,2020-06-23,3,Smores Flavor is better,0,0,"I was not a fan of the toasted marshmallow Ice Cream. the chocolate cookie swirls, graham cracker swirls and fudge flakes are all wonderful fill ins. I wish they used a different tasting marshmallow";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: Julia711
title: BY FAR BEST BEN & JERRYS FLAVOR
text;;;: This is by far the best Ben & Jerry's flavor ever. Finally a s'mores flavor that realizes chocolate is not the star in a s'mores its the GRAHAM CRACKERS. PLEASE make this a permanent flavor!!!!!!!!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,lj3809,2018-06-27,5,PLEASE DON'T LESS THIS BE LIMITED,0,1,"This may be my new favorite flavor!! I seriously hope they keep this on forever as a flavor since it said limited batch. I didn't think I could like one more than Half Baked, but this may beat it";;;

Gimme S'more!,foodie29,2018-12-13,1,Very disappointing.,0,1,"I couldn't find the traditional ""S'mores"" flavor at the grocery store so, as a smores fan, I bought this one instead. What a disappointment! I literally took one bite and made a face because I did not like the flavor. I dug around for a minute looking for a marshmallow swirl.... nope, it's not there. Just small bits of chocolate cookie. What? How is this a smores ice cream? The base ice cream tastes nothing like marshmallow and certainly doesn't have the wonderful marshmallow texture the old ice cream had. Couldn't find anything resembling graham cracker here either, unlike the old one. This is just.... cookies and cream. And a pretty dull cookies and cream at that. This is not only nothing like smores, it is a dull ice cream.";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: Redskull
title: Amazing
text;;;: I originally bought a pint of this flavor two weeks ago. We finished the first pint so fast that now we buy two every time we stock up on ice cream. I can’t wait to get s’more of this flavor.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Cshh
title: Best Icecream I've Ever Tasted
text;;;: I'm so excited to see they're bringing this flavor back. It's been gone for about two years and I thought I'd never get my ice cream back. Thank you Ben and Jerry's for answering my prayers.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Hannah92
title: Amazing Ice Cream
text;;;: I love anything marshmallow and this ice cream hits the spot! I was so excited to try this and I'm so happy I did! Going to be stocking up since it's a limited edition flavor! Amazing!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Slm66
title: My new favorite
text;;;: I love this new flavor. I hope it sticks around. I love s'mores flavored things. This just adds to the list of delicious s'mores like treats. Perfect blend of flavors. I love it!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,Pepman,2020-03-28,5,One of the best flavors,0,0,"I have not tried all Ben and Jerry flavors, but have tried enough to rate this as one of the best. The hint of toasted marshmallow with chocolate and graham cracker are spot on.";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: Notnowmaddie
title: Holy s’mores!!
text;;;: I’ve never made a review for any ice cream but this one deserves it!! Never been so disappointed about something being limited edition. This is my ultimate favorite ice cream.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,Amandak727651,2018-07-13,5,The chocolate cookie swirl... Oh my!!,0,0,"By far my favorite B&J yet. The ingredients yall use is what makes the difference. That was the only one left at our Target so I hope that get more. I’m in LOVE! -Oxford, AL.";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: Maggie101
title: Amazing taste!!
text;;;: Every time I go to a food store I always get gimmie smore!It has a amazing taste!!If you like chocolate chunks and graham crackers and marshmallows the your in for a treat!!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,Middlear,2018-11-17,5,My new favorite flavor,0,0,"Excellent balance of chocolate to graham cracker. Could use more of a toasty note on the marshmallow, but favorite new flavor along with with the oat of this swirled flavor.";;;

Gimme S'more!,oh_paulie,2020-08-18,1,They forgot the s'more!,0,1,"Terrible. s'mores are graham crackers, marshallow, chocolate. Gimme S'more has ZERO graham cracker taste. It's essentially just another vanilla ice cream with chocolate.";;;

Gimme S'more!,Laurenisawesome,2018-07-10,5,Life changing,0,0,"This might be my new favorite. The taste and texture are amazing. The crunch of the graham cracker, chocolate swirls. I told my sister I would share, but there was no way.";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: yummy yummy
title: YUM
text;;;: This flavor is so amazing. i’m a huge s’mores person and i couldn’t believe how amazing this was. B&J is my go to ice cream and i’ve offically found my go to flavor. YUM!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Zachp
title: So glad it’s back!!
text;;;: This ice cream is so delicious when my wife found out it was back for good she was smiled bigger than on our wedding day. Such an improvement from the old s’mores flavor!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: ICConnoissuer
title: Good but flavor not as advertised.
text;;;: I was so excited to try this but the toasted marshmallow ice cream does not taste anything like marshmallows or any kind of toasted flavor. It’s more like regular cream.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,Mason,2018-08-01,5,So Good!,0,0,"This was so good! I'm not a fan of the chocolate based s'mores and really enjoyed the sweet cream base here. I do wish they had more graham cracker swirls, though.";;;

Gimme S'more!,Phoenix,2018-08-14,5,Love it but..,0,0,"Everytime I find a flavor I love either they discontinue it or it becomes hard to find in my area...this is my new favorite flavor, please don't make me regret it!!";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: Bcslacker
title: New favorite flavor!
text;;;: Just found this. Tried it and it's my favorite flavor. I bought all of them at my local store. I love how much graham crackers crumbs are in it. Soooooo delicious!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: AKayeJ
title: New favorite flavor!!!
text;;;: This is the best flavor ice cream I have ever had. I will be heartbroken when I can no longer find it on the shelves. Please bring the flavor back next summer!!!!!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Ccokeefe
title: Delicious!
text;;;: I am going to be heartbroken when I don't see this is the stores anymore. I am obsessed. I always buy this when at the grocery store...and usually more than one.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,Pauly,2018-06-21,5,Needs one thing,0,1,"If we can buy Americone Dream with Stephen Colbert, and The Tonight Dough with Jimmy Fallon, I feel like we should definitely have Busta Rhymes on Gimme S’more!";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: icecreamlover082018
title: Good but no marshmallow flavor
text;;;: This was good ice cream but I didn't get the smores flavor. I wasn't getting any marshmallow. If it was stronger it would be perfect. But it was good to eat!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: ebrodie
title: Oh my delicious
text;;;: Hands down the best ice cream I’ll ever have. I stock up all summer just to make sure I’ll have enough to get me through all other seasons... it’s THAT good.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Itsme123
title: Best ice cream ever!
text;;;: I don’t ever write reviews but this is the best ice cream I have ever eaten. I really hope this becomes a standard year round flavor I could eat it everyday.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,alflynn,2018-09-13,5,Gimme S'more Permanently!,0,0,"The cookie and graham cracker swirls are my favorite part and this is my favorite flavor by far! It's not too sickly sweet, but satisfied your sweet tooth!";;;

Gimme S'more!,AJ105,2018-05-20,4,I’ll take S’more,0,1,"I really like this flavor, the combination works really well. I dont think it tastes as close to a s’more as the original flavor, but still a solid pint.";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: Girlmom
title: I’m in love
text;;;: I really enjoy my ice cream so when I saw this flavor I had to try it! Needless to say it’s my go to now! Please consider keeping this flavor permanently!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: EmmaRS
title: Love This Flavor
text;;;: The marshmallow ice cream blends perfectly with the graham crackers and fudge swirls. A perfect amount of everything a a very great and spot on base!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,Rsantoya,2019-02-24,5,My favorite!,0,0,"I tried this flavor not too long ago expanding from my usual half baked, this has now moved into spot #1. Please please make this a full time flavor!";;;

Gimme S'more!,IamTam247,2019-02-05,5,Daggone Right! Gimme S'more....,0,0,"#THIS by far is my FAVE-O-RIT B&Js flavor.... I thought Urban Bourban was hitting on something, but #THIS.... Gimme S'more for sure! mmmmmmmmmmmmm";;;
Gimme S'more!,megs88,2019-06-17,5,Yes!,0,0,"Marshmallow ice cream is a refreshing twist on the usual chocolate ice cream base. This is a new favorite, and I always grab a pint when I see one!";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: Nic145
title: The best flavor
text;;;: I pray this becomes a permanent flavor.. When I tell you I searched EVERYWHERE for this when it was a limited edition flavor... PLEASE BRING IT BACK;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Cait67
title: On Point
text;;;: It's a tie with Americone dream for my favorite. The chocolate cookies are a good alternative for chocolate chunks and make it a little lighter.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,GimmeMoreSmores,2019-07-24,5,Please bring it back,0,0,"Please bring it back, best flavor you guys have made, been to Vermont multiple times, and go to the local store regularly. Please bring it back.";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: SpacePeanut
title: More like Gimme Something else
text;;;: I thought I was grabbing a personal favorite. The s’mores ice cream and ended up with this disappointment. I’ll pay more attention next time.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Maddy
title: Best Flavor I have ever had!
text;;;: I tried this on our tour of the plant in vermont and now that its out I have been getting it as much as possible before It goes away forever.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,anicolosi80,2019-03-13,5,Make this a regular!,0,0,"My favorite flavor ever. Please remove this from the "" limited batch"" category and make it a regular item please. It's so difficult to get!";;;

Gimme S'more!,Iscreamyouscream,2018-07-23,5,Holy amazing!,0,0,"We bought this flavor once and now cannot stop buying it. We officially have “a problem”, haha. The marshmallow ice cream is incredible!";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: em1998
title: wish it wasn't limited!
text;;;: Excellent flavor. Tastes like a french vanilla based ice cream but even better with all the mix ins. I want this to be a regular flavor!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!,José108,2018-09-09,5,Please keep this all year-round,0,0,"This was the best S'mores ice cream I have ever had. It saddens me to see it as a ""limited batch"" flavor as if it will be gone one day.";;;
Gimme S'more!
author: kslrsa
title: Best flavor out there! Please don't discontinue
text;;;: I was heartbroken when B&Js discontinued Imagine Whirled Peace - this is the best thing that has come out since then. Please keep it!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Lennrw24
title: Best Ice Cream Ever
text;;;: This flavor is the best Ben and Jerry have ever come out with. It is a perfect combination of flavors! I hope they keep it around!;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Nichilaswbarker
title: Great taste
text;;;: I buy/bought this very frequently. Few times a week. So much better than the original. Needs to be available all the time.;;;

name: Gimme S'more!
author: Alid94

name: Peanut Butter Half Baked,ChrisColby,2020-02-26,5,Peanut Butter makes everything better,10,1,"A flavor I'm glad to see back after liking it before it was discontinued, PB Half Baked is even better than I remembered. There's not much to say if youve already had the standard half baked. It works very similarly except that the vanilla portion of the flavor is now replaced with peanut butter ice cream, and the chocolate chip cookie dough is instead peanut butter cookie dough. For such slight changes though, they do make a big difference. One thing I disliked in the original half baked was how weak the vanilla base was and how it was completely dominated by the chocolate. That's not the case here as the peanut butter taste to the ice cream is strong enough to balance out the chocolate, giving the classic combination we know and love. The balance is also matched perfectly with the mix ins. There are HUGE brownie squares in this flavor, tasting great as always, and combined with the numerous peanut butter cookie dough pieces, you're getting the chocolate/peanut butter taste in every bite. If you're a fan of that flavor combination, you can't go wrong with Peanut Butter Half Baked.";;;
Peanut Butter Half Baked
author: Nicoledobermanmom
title: Best flavor EVER
text;;;: Normally the tonight dough is my go to. I have been waiting for this flavor to get to my area and went it finally did I made sure run right to the store. I was in LOVE after the first bite . This is by far the best peanut butter ice cream flavor ever made. I beg and plead for this flavor to never go away because I am forever hooked. Thank you thank you thank you for my new favorite ever. This is a MUST TRY because you won’t look back;;;

name: Peanut Butter Half Baked,lbrennan203,2020-07-03,5,Omg so delish!,1,0,"I bought this at a Ben & Jerry’s store a couple days ago in Sandbridge, VA and it was oh so good! I am a sucker for anything chocolate and peanut butter and this did not disappoint. My son took one lick and was jealous he did not pick it so we went back again last night and bought some for him! I love the peanut butter ice cream and fudge brownie and didn’t realize the cookie dough is peanut butter too, yum! Now that I am home from vacation I just need to find it near where I live!";;;
Peanut Butter Half Baked
author: BodybyBenandJerry
title: THANK YOU!!!!!!
text;;;: First of all I would like to say THANK YOU to whoever decided to put peanut butter in half baked! Half Baked is my favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor but I'm not a huge fan of vanilla ice cream... I just think the Peanut Butter ice cream really pairs well with the rest of the components in this mix. Dare I say... I might like this BETTER than the original Half Baked? It's too soon to tell. I love you Ben & Jerry!;;;

name: Peanut Butter Half Baked,A__A,2020-06-03,5,Many problems fixed!,2,0,"The ice cream has chunky brownie, amazing cookie dough... Just amazing stuff!";;;

Peanut Butter Half Baked,HBunny,2020-04-22,5,Quarantine Dream,1,0,"It’s everything you could wish for that would make being stuck at home seem a real treat. Chunks abound! The peanut butter and chocolate combination is hearty, decadent and worth it!";;;

The ice cream is loaded with stuff: cookie dough and brownies and on the side I like to add in some chopped nuts. LOVE LOVE LOVE.";;;

Peanut Butter Half Baked,TypeNone,2020-06-12,4,"Love the PB, just needs a little more",0,0,"Bought this past week, was expecting a lot more PB, was very similar to the regular Half Baked. Still Very Good!";;;

name: Berry Sweet Mascarpone,JennyWoof,2020-04-24,5,Berry good!,19,1,"All time favorite flavor! The berry flavored swirls of ice cream are perfectly delicately, but distinctly, flavored. The natural pastel purple that comes from the blackberries is definitely an adorable plus! The mascarpone ice cream swirls have that heavenly cheesecake-y taste, which combines with the soft crumbly shortbread to create a tiramisu-esque experience... but instead of the rich notes coming from cinnamon it comes from the crunchy fudge-covered almonds. May I suggest renaming this flavor to ""Chuck Berry Mascarpone"" after Chuck Berry: one of the pioneers of rock'n'roll.";;;

Berry Sweet Mascarpone,Lexi143,2020-07-30,5,Seriously The Best Ice Cream Ever,3,0,"This is without a doubt the best ice cream I have ever tried from Ben and Jerry's, and probably from anywhere at all! There is a B&J's scoop shop down the street from my apartment, one a couple miles away, and countless grocery stores in between. However, I constantly find myself driving out of the way to go to the only store in the area that I know stocks this flavor regularly. It is the perfect combination of flavors, and I have a really hard time keeping myself from going through the whole pint in one quick sitting. I will be absolutely devastated when this exclusive flavor is no longer available. Please keep it as a regular!!";;;

Berry Sweet Mascarpone,Tr6nce,2020-05-21,5,Excellent,7,0,"A lot of recent flavors from Ben and Jerry's have left me disappointed but I saw this at Whole Foods and had to give it a go, because I'm like a Ben and Jerry's expert at this point. I thought it was going to be gross but I was pleasantly surprised by how all the flavors complimented each other. I left a few other people in the house have a small spoonful and they liked it as well. And to the person who said Strawberry Cheesecake is gone, you are wrong. That flavor is everywhere and never going away. Perhaps your store just stopped carrying it. It would be nice if they brought back the Blueberry Cheesecake flavor that was an exclusive at Walmart years ago. Anyway, Blackberry ice cream gets thumbs up from me!";;;
Berry Sweet Mascarpone
author: JEM2021
title: Love this!
text;;;: This is my new favorite ice cream!!! It is absolutely delicious! I saw this at my local Whole Foods and decided to give it a try since I was craving ice cream with berries and I was so pleased when I got home and tried it. This flavor has just the right amount of sweetness and the flavor combo is to die for. The chocolate covered almonds and cookie bits not only add to the flavors but provide a great texture. I usually don't write reviews but this is so good and I'm afraid it will only be a limited time product. I hope they keep this one. I'll buy it forever. Recommending to all my family and friends.;;;

name: Berry Sweet Mascarpone,Dianamo in Dallas,2020-05-20,5,Sooooo good!,5,0,"I’m not even a big ice cream fan, but this is life changing!";;;

Berry Sweet Mascarpone,jaiye,2020-07-08,5,my absolute favorite now!,2,0,"first of all--the pieces of cookie throughout the ice cream are EVERYTHING! I love the balance of flavors. It's so good. I'm actively searching for it which is the primary reason I ended up on this website, but figured I'd add a review and give it 5 stars to keep it on shelves.";;;

Berry Sweet Mascarpone,Anand,2020-07-26,5,My new favorite flavor!,2,0,"This is a great balance of flavors -- each one compliments the other and none of them are too over powering. Creamy, sweet, and a little fruity. I especially like that's it not jam packed with fixings and you get to taste the actual ice cream.";;;
Berry Sweet Mascarpone

text;;;: Great flavor combination. I wanted to try it because it was a new flavor and ended up loving it! Definitely in my top 5. My only criticism is that is it difficult to obtain.;;;

name: Berry Sweet Mascarpone,Cezanne,2020-09-23,5,Swept off my feet,0,0,"When I bought this flavor, I was hesitant to switch things up from my trusty flavor, The Tonight Dough. At night, I got peckish and searched the fridge until I remembered about this new flavor. I was in bed when I had my first bite, my only main regret.";;;

Chocolate Peanut Butter Split,jobird,2020-06-03,5,Best Flavor Combo!,6,0,"I'm so glad this flavor exists, it's my new favorite! Chocolate, PB, and banana is such a good combo, I order smoothies and milkshakes in that combo too.";;;

Chocolate Peanut Butter Split,Flavor fiend,2020-08-01,5,Best ever!,0,0,"This is the best flavor Ben and Jerry’s has done!;;;
Banana and chocolate ice cream with mini peanut butter cups. Please please keep this as a permanent flavor. I buy multiple containers whenever I can find it!!";;;
Justice ReMix'd
author: Puppylove
title: Best Flavor! Please Add Permanently!’
text;;;: I have been hooked on half baked for years now but this flavor changed everything! There’s just so much depth of flavor. I thought the spicy brownie would be too much but it’s very mild. I’d still prefer normal brownie but not by much. I love that the cinnamon ice cream and chocolate ice cream are two different ice creams swirled together. At first glance I thought it was going to be just chocolate ice cream with cinnamon flavor but I was wrong. Every bite is a unique balance of flavor that sends my tastebuds to heaven. I just wish it wasn’t a limited batch. I can’t go back to just half baked after this.;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd,VanessaB99,2019-09-23,5,Keep this flavor! PLEASE!!!,28,0,"I bought this flavor today. Upon trying it, I immediately wanted to go back to the store & buy every pint that they had. SOOO GOOOD!!! Please keep this as a permanent flavor, instead of a limited batch. This is one of the best flavors you've designed in a long time (except for the sour sorbet this summer).";;;

Justice ReMix'd,dennis333,2019-10-03,5,Please keep forever,18,2,"Oh man. I don't even seek out ice cream that often, but this flavor caught my eye and now I am an absolute fiend for it. I'm getting emotional thinking about this ice cream. I tell everyone I know to please try this ice cream. I sent out text messages to my family telling them to go buy this ice cream. I have never tasted anything like it in my life! Please keep it forever! I'm obsessed! (And of course I am also happy to hear about the nonprofit partnership.)";;;

Justice ReMix'd,AmandaO,2019-09-16,5,Tastes like Abuelita hot chocolate!,27,1,"This is delicious. I didn't know what to expect when I read the description of the flavor, but OMG it's so good. It takes like the Abuelita brand hot chocolate with a little hint of spice from the brownies. I love it!";;;
Justice ReMix'd
author: Kimpossible52891
title: Best one so far!
text;;;: I was a little nervous about the spicy brownies but oh my gosh! I love this flavor!! Please be a regular flavor not a limited batch!!! It’s so good!!!;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd,Jackson,2019-10-01,5,Possibly your greatest flavor ever.,17,1,"This hit every sweet spot for me. I'm serious. Absolutley loved this flavor, and I'm actually a little sad I tried it, because if it's a limited edition flavor that means it'll go away and never return. This needs a spot in the regular rotation. Don't make me go back to the store and hoard all of them.";;;

Justice ReMix'd,CinnamonLover,2020-02-02,5,Best Ice Cream so far!,3,0,"I love cinnamon more than any other flavour in general (in cakes, bubble gum, tequilla, porridge ... - you see, ice cream is certainly no exception), so i was really excited to try the ben & jerry's cinnamon bun, when I saw that flavour for the first time some years ago. Unfortunately, when it comes to ice cream, I strongly prefer chocolate over vanilla or caramel as a base, so I the cinnamon bun flavour didn't blow my mind completelly. Just 1 hour ago I saw THIS new flavour at a gas station and coudn't resist. It's even better than I expected, because the spiciness harmonize so well with the cinnamon & chocolate (that I always love). So I highly recommend this ice cream flavour to anyone, who really loves cinnamon in general and chocolate ice cream.";;;

Justice ReMix'd,SciFiLover,2019-11-25,5,The spicy fudge MWAH!,2,0,"The Ben & Jerry's line of ice cream is some of the best I have ever tasted. When I spied this, the newest in the freezer at my local grocery I was intrigued. So I ponied up my cash and brought it home. As usual, I popped the top and took a taste. OMG! I was floored. This has to be added to the line-up as a permanent option.It is everything I did not expect it to be. The flavors burst in your mouth! The combination of cinnamon and chocolate, although seemingly odd, are perfect together. And the ""topping on the cake"" is the spicy fudge brownie. Love this new flavor.";;;

Justice ReMix'd,tiffery,2019-12-11,5,I Need This Forever,4,0,"I can't stop buying this flavor. The balance of cinnamon ice cream, chocolate ice cream, tiny chunks of cinnamon bun dough, and bits of spicy brownie?! OH MY GOD. It's perfect. I saw a picture of this flavor online and then noticed it in my local grocery store, so I bought it. That was a month ago and now I can't stop. Please please please, Mr. Ben and Mr. Jerry I am begging you from my soul to keep this in the permanent rotation. JUSTICE TASTES DELICIOUS.";;;
Justice ReMix'd
author: James S
title: amazing flavor! even more amazing cause
text;;;: So glad to see B&J step it up on the activism front as well as on the taste buds front! This is a delicious ice cream;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd,Simsima,2019-11-19,5,Went back and bought every last pint,4,0,"This flavor combination is out of this world with perfect balance of flavors, textures and ... that cinnamon spice is everything. i wanted to try this initially because I support the cause and I was curious about how the flavor combo would be - and now I’m here begging you to add this to the regular rotation of flavors even though I never write reviews. I just went and bought out my local stores stock. Please add this to the regular line up!";;;

Justice ReMix'd,Jcforever3,2020-01-22,4,Pretty good flavor! Worth trying.,2,0,"I saw this in the store and had to buy it as soon as I saw the words ""spicy brownie."" They weren't lying, the brownies have a really interesting kick! I can understand why it was too strong for some, but for me it made up for the lack of cinnamon promised in the ice cream and cinnamon bun dough (which basically was like their cookie dough in texture minus the chips). This is a flavor for people who like the classics but are bold enough to try out some more exotic ones. Overall, one of the most intriguing flavors I've had from Ben and Jerry's.";;;

Justice ReMix'd,ForTheLoveOfReMixd,2020-01-27,5,If This is Discontinued....,4,0,"I'm not sure I will ever love again! This is a fantasticly unusual combination that just hits every mark for me. I can usually ration out my pints over a couple weeks, but this flavor only lasts me two sittings! Anytime you need a break from the sugary cinnamon, the deep rich chocolate is there to smooth things over with a little spice and vice versa. I would definitely become a regular fanatic if this became a daily flavor (r.i.p. my diet)";;;

Justice ReMix'd,Adam,2020-01-31,5,I LOVE this flavor,3,0,"It's so good! The cinnamon seems to pervade the entire pint and the spicy brownie bits are so tasty and interesting! I don't think that Ben and Jerry's has another flavor with a spicy element and I don't think that they need another one if they were to just keep this one around, which is exactly what they should do! I am gonna be so sad when they take this one away. I get that its kind of a weird flavor but it seems like the people who like it, REALLY love it.";;;

Justice ReMix'd,damien702,2019-10-20,5,Best new flavor yet,5,0,"This flavor is exactly what I didn’t know I needed, the cinnamon ice cream and hint of heat from the brownies really make it something special. I hope Justice ReMix’d becomes a regular flavor, it’s one of the best in the Ben and Jerry’s lineup and I’d be so sad to see it go.";;;

Justice ReMix'd,jaxyfrou,2019-11-07,5,Love love love this flavor,6,0,"Someone brought this in at work and I immediately fell in love with it. It has chocolate, chunky dough, and cinnamon!! So Good!";;;

Justice ReMix'd,Ellie,2019-10-08,5,LOVE,5,0,"This flavor combined my two favorite desserts - chocolate and cinnamon rolls. To me, it tastes like the Mexican hot chocolate, Abuelita - which I LOVE! I didn’t read that the brownies were spicy, so I was confused at first, but it was a great addition!";;;
Justice ReMix'd,Kayleen18,2019-10-27,5,PLEASE KEEP THIS FLAVOR!,6,0,"I’m an ultimate half baked person, and this is amazing and just what I wanted. Please keep it is so good!!!";;;
Justice ReMix'd
author: falon
title: Wonderful Combo!
text;;;: Whoever expresses this as a disappointment is wild. All these flavors paired wonderfully and the spice to the brownie is like a cinnamon spice and so delightful. I'll be sad once this is gone! Love it!!;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd
author: RTK18
title: Please Keep Making this Flavor
text;;;: This is my favorite flavor ever. Its the only flavor I buy now when I get ice cream and I always buy 3 or 4 pints of it at a time out of fear it won't be there when I go to the store next. I love the cinnamon and spicy brownie combination. There isn't a substitute to this and I will actually cry when its no longer available.;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd,Emdog,2019-10-30,5,PLEASE KEEP THIS FLAVOR FOREVER,4,0,"I am in love with this ice cream as of many others I know, I always seem to become OBSESSED with a product when it is a “Limited edition” item. For the first time ever I am actually contacting a company in hopes to continue my obsession with this fantastic ice cream. PLEASE keep this flavor available!! :)";;;

Justice ReMix'd,HBunny,2019-10-23,5,Chunk-a-licious!,5,0,"This is how every flavor pint should be! Gorgeous chunks evenly distributed throughout, creamy, chocolatey with a cinnamon zing. Phenomenal.";;;
Justice ReMix'd
author: dysgwraig
title: PLEASE Make this a Regular Flavor!!
text;;;: This is actually some of the best ice cream I have Ever had. All the spicy elements blend perfectly with the chocolate to create something I can only describe as the apotheosis of Mexican hot chocolate. Please don't take this deliciousness away from me!!! Make this a regular flavor!;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd,Candace,2019-11-05,5,Yum.,5,0,"Bought this yesterday at my local supermarket and ate half the pint already. Love it, love it, love it.";;;

text;;;: LOVE LOVE LOVE! Please keep this flavor definitely one of my favorites I can’t get enough of it!!!!!;;;

author: Bgirl52
title: Omg! Keep!
text;;;: I love the cinnamon bun and can't find it saw this and tried it! Best flavor ever! Please please please.keep!;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd
title: Spicy love!!!
text;;;: Loved the cinnabon pieces and the spicy brownie pieces!;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd
author: runlolarun
title: Hands down best flavor
text;;;: ...and you will not change my mind. Its cruel and unusual that this is a limited edition batch.;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd,Franfran,2020-01-18,5,Great combination of flavors!,2,0,"This is the kind of pint that I could eat in one sitting, but have to hold back to save more for the next day. The combination of flavors are exquisite in my opinion!! Nothing to complain about for me. If you’re scared of the spicy chocolate, know it is not very spicy and quite delicious. THIS ICE CREAM NEEDS TO BE PERMANENT because I’ve realized I can’t live without it now. Please consider keeping it!!!!";;;

Justice ReMix'd,calikdub,2019-11-23,5,Incredible Combination!,3,0,"I was skeptical initially on the spicy fudge brownies, but holy Hannah! It’s 1000% amazing! It is darn near impossible to stop at one serving. I hope this stays around for a while, or I’ll have to get another freezer to stock up!";;;
Justice ReMix'd
author: eggcorn
title: crying
text;;;: I'd never had a favorite ice cream flavor before I tried Justice ReMix'd and now I've gone through five pints and counting and I would sacrifice my firstborn to keep it in the roster forever;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd,AmyT,2020-05-29,5,Perfection!,1,1,"This flavor is complete perfection! It’s the perfect balance of chocolate and cinnamon. I love the spicy brownie (not too spicy) and the cinnamon roll. I just keep buying multiple pints every time I go to a grocery store because this flavor is almost singlehandedly getting me through the stress of working during the pandemic. As an added bonus to the delicious flavor, the nonprofit connection is for criminal justice reform - ice cream doesn’t get any better than this! I hope you add it as a permanent flavor!";;;
Justice ReMix'd
author: Victoriarla
title: One of my favorites!
text;;;: At first I didn't feel the spice from the brownie but when it's eaten alone its definitely there. This flavor is sooo good. I wish it would be a permanent flavor.;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd
author: Sm56
title: Love this one
text;;;: I was really excited to try this one when I heard about it I love the spicy sweet aspect and really wish they would make this one of the regular flavors;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd
author: Dooodlebops
title: Spicy brownies I love
text;;;: The ice creams are blah but the spiced up brownies saved the pint...until I ate it. All.;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd,Barbara,2020-02-17,5,Happy Surprise,2,1,"My curiousity stopped on the label at 'gobs of cinnamon bun dough', so I didn't even notice the ""spicy fudge brownie"" part. Turned out I don't actually like the little cinnamon dough buttons (easy to spit out), but the spicy brownies really made this worth the purchase. I hope they revisit it again, Loving the cinnamon/spicy chocolate combo.";;;
Justice ReMix'd
title: Too spiced
text;;;: The icecream itself and the cinnamon buns were good but the brownie was too strongly spiced.;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd,Icecreamman1,2020-02-29,5,The Most Interesting Flavor,2,1,"I haven't found a new ice cream flavor like this in awhile. I would love to have it permanently, because it is my fave flavor currently! Very odd, but satisfying. The spiciness of the brownies works perfect with the sweetness of the mix of the cinnammon bun dough and ice cream. I'd love to see more creativity like this in my ice cream!";;;
Justice ReMix'd
author: hslagle
title: The best ice cream ever. Make it permanent!!
text;;;: Ever since this ice cream has come out I always have a pint of it in the fridge. Seriously right now I have 3. Not only is this my favorite ice cream of all time but it also supports a great cause so maybe we can be lucky enough to keep this pint because as long as you guys make it I will keep buying it.;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd,antaresoceana,2020-03-26,2,Just didn't do it for me but I really wish it did,1,1,"I was more disappointed in myself than I was in this ice cream. I really wish I liked it. I really do. All the mix-ins were right up my alley. I don't know where my taste buds took a wrong turn. I had visions of a cinnamon roll with spicy hot chocolate to wash it down, but instead it was like a roller derby of playfully competitive flavours fighting each other to win. In turn, they ended up too black and blue to discern who was who. :'(";;;
Justice ReMix'd
author: Jessban507
title: This ice cream cured my depression
text;;;: NEEDS TO BE A PERMANENT FLAVOR! I can’t believe there’s a flavor that combines my favorites— cinnamon bun with Half Baked. Every bite was so interesting and delightful. A whole pint goes down eeeeasy. I hope I can find this again. DEFINITELY a new favorite.;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd
author: RiccoColdBrew
title: Addicted To CinnaBuns & Chocolate Ice Cream
text;;;: Was first time trying and I'm addicted the spicy fudge brownies paired with the sweet chocolate ice cream and cinnamon bun dough is to die for thanks @Ben&Jerry's for the best I've cream always - Ricco;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd,Veggiesaurus,2020-04-29,1,"Yuck, spicy brownies!",3,10,"The flavors did not go well together AT ALL. It sounded interesting so I decided to give it a try. I like spicy food but the spicy brownie mixed with the strong cinnamon flavor was vile. If I had very much of it, I Would be nauseous . The second I bit in to the brownie, I thought “this is disgusting “. Absolutely the worst Ben & Jerry’s flavor I have tried and the worst flavor of ANY ice cream I’ve ever tried.GROSS.";;;

Justice ReMix'd,CharChar,2020-02-13,5,My favorite flavor yet!,1,0,"Oh my gosh, I loooooooove the mixture of chocolate and spicy brownies! It reminds of Mexican hot cocoa. I vote to keep this flavor forever!";;;
Justice ReMix'd,Liza,2020-06-23,5,Please keep!,1,0,"Please make this a permanent flavor. It’s one of the most unique, delicious flavors you’ve ever produced.";;;
Justice ReMix'd,Katienesbitt85,2020-01-25,5,It’s soooo good!,1,0,"If you like Mexican hot chocolate, you’ll like this! It’s delicious!";;;
Justice ReMix'd
author: SetterMom
title: Not Working
text;;;: The cinnamon spice is way too aggressive - tastes more like strong gingerbread - and the flavor doesn’t pair well with the chocolate at all.;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd
author: Jesika Tracy
title: PLEASE KEEP THIS FOREVER
text;;;: New favorite ice cream. Ate all of it in one night. Heck yeah;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd
author: willowmiri
title: !! My favorite !!
text;;;: This is the combination of all of my favorite things and I'm so happy. It is so delicious and I hope Ben and Jerry's never stops making it. I'd always wondered about the lack of Ben and Jerry's cinnamon ice cream because it's my absolute favorite -- and Justice Remix'd knocked it out of the park. Everything is so cinnamony and chocolately. I love the chunks. SO GOOD.;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd,HHarper148,2020-07-18,5,This flavor does ice cream JUSTICE!,0,0,"I bought this a week ago because it sounded delicious. After finishing the first one a couple days ago I just had to get another. I had to go to two stores to get one and learned it's a limited batch. I LOVE cinnamon ice cream, mix that with cinnamon bun dough and spicy brownies and it is heaven on earth. PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE add this to your line of regularly available flavors. I would hate to lose it as quickly as I discovered it.";;;
Justice ReMix'd
author: mchrisman01
title: Parts of it are good.
text;;;: The cinnamon ice cream and chocolate ice cream are great. And the cinnamon bun dough is out of this world!! But the spicy brownie in it overpowers everything. I end up picking it out of the ice cream. Honestly either the brownie needs to be taken out all together or the brownie needs to be a plain brownie instead of a spicy one. There is also so much brownie in it so it could also stand to be toned down in that regard as well;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd,IceCreamMan99,2020-06-15,1,Why????,0,0,"I got this flavor by accident. Had done curbside pickup at the grocery, but instead of Phish Food, I received this. It sat in the freezer for about a week and decided to try it. I honestly feel like my taste buds were being punished, as if i lost a bet and was forced to eat this. If fear factor created an ice cream flavor, this would be it. None of the flavors work together. The cinnamon is too strong. Would be better if it tasted more like a cinnamon roll than the cinnamon challenge from a few years back. The spicy brownie makes no sense. The flavor is so off putting, i wanted to gag. They could have easily used some sort of Mexican hot chocolate flavor and it would have been so much better. I really have no words except this is one of the most vile and disgusting flavors I have ever eaten. Save your money and make a donation to your favorite social justice charity.";;;

Justice ReMix'd,lilsnackfiend,2020-06-06,5,Singing to the Tune of Justice,0,0,"Not only does this ice cream flavor support a I cause important to me, but it's an amazing texture and flavor combo. That spicy ribbon of fudgy brownie?! Those cinnamon roll chunks?! My tongue is dancing to this beat. How does this not have an average of 5 stars already? It's the remix I needed. Play it again! Make it a permanent member on the Ben & Jerry's Flavor Playlist.";;;
Justice ReMix'd
author: Giggle box
title: Omg heaven
text;;;: I wish this flavor was around year round I never knew I needed this in my life until I unlowingky took a bite into the most heavenly thing I’ve ever eaten. I LOVE IT;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd
author: Jennjennjenny
title: You had me at cinnamon
text;;;: Went looking for Justice Remix'd ice cream because of a facebook post that led me to Ben & Jerry's civic and social commitment. The Ice cream happens to contain a cinnamon and brownie deliciousness that I love and is hard to find together. A true surprise and delight. Thank you so much and if the blueberry one comes about I know I'll like that one too.;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd,DocGfin,2020-06-26,5,A great message on a great icecream.,0,0,"So many ice creams these days are one trick ponies: sweet on sweet on sweet. A well balanced dessert needs multiple notes. This delivers. Warm cinnamon, spicy brownies, bitter chocolate and of course smooth sweet Ben and Jerry's icecream.";;;
Justice ReMix'd
author: EnglishLitDoc
title: Too sweet
text;;;: Sugary and not great. This is probably my least favorite flavor I have ever had of Ben and Jerry's.;;;
