name: Justice ReMix'd
author: Rika
title: Really wanted to like it...
text;;;: I wanted to like this flavor so badly but I just didn’t. The spicy brownie ruined it for me. I ended up digging out the brownie and just eating the rest.;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd,,2020-08-29,3,I Can't Remember This,0,0,"I know I bought this, but I can't remember it. So that means that A. it's not horrible and B. it's not outstanding. Kind of like a blind date who is certain to end up with someone decent and you wish him the best, but he's not for you. I'd probably buy it again just to make sure I wasn't intoxicated the first time and that's why I forgot.";;;
Justice ReMix'd
author: Steevn
title: God awful
text;;;: Just bought this and took three bites and I couldn’t swallow any more this is the most disgusting ice cream I’ve ever had I don’t know how it made it to the shelves;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd
author: lulu7777
title: Justice Remix
text;;;: I love Ben & Jerry's however this one is not for me..Dissapointed.;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd,lemmingade,2020-01-03,1,"Good cause, bad f!avor!",3,13,Super icky. I've never thrown away an almost full pint of Ben &Jerry's before The cinnamon flavor was too strong and the spicy brownies absolutely unpleasant.;;;
Justice ReMix'd,MAGAzine lover,2020-06-17,1,Grooosssss,3,11,"Don't waste your time. Much like protests, the whole thing is ruined by disgusting spicy chocolate!";;;

Justice ReMix'd,Nettieb,2020-01-16,5,My new favorite,0,0,"I love this flavor so much that it is now my official go to! The surprising bite of spicy brownie is so delicious! I was hesitant to try it because I can't do too spicy anymore, but this has just a small amount of spice which oddly balances with the sweet! I hope this becomes a part of the permanent collection!";;;

Justice ReMix'd,Moni,2020-06-29,5,Not a chocolate fan,0,0,"I’m not a chocolate fan at all, but I love cinnamon so I decided to give this flavor a try and im glad I did!! The chocolate wasn’t overwhelming and the cinnamon mellowed it out. I loved the chunks of spicy fudge and cinnamon bun dough. This was super creative and perfectly executed";;;

Justice ReMix'd,Ashley0908,2020-07-07,5,Incredible mission,0,0,"Thank you for using your platform for good. Ice cream flavours are incredible with real ice cream! It amazes me how socially responsible this company is. I 100% recommend this brand to everyone I know any chance I get. Incredible flavours, incredible missions, worth the price! ";;;

Justice ReMix'd,Volvomom,2020-04-03,5,"Amazing, unique taste!",0,0,"I'll admit - the colorful packaging and good cause drew me in. Who knew that the cinnamon that lingers would be the thing that keeps me walking back to the fridge each night around 9:30pm? I'm not an ice cream addict, but this flavor is more like a gourmet treat. Indulge!";;;
Justice ReMix'd
author: Danny311
title: Horrible.
text;;;: Probably the worst ice cream that has ever been created. Absolutely disgusting;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd
author: Acedar608
title: So Uniquely Yummy
text;;;: I love Ben and Jerry's because their ice cream is delicious and because they support good causes. This flavor looked interesting and I like knowing that a portion of the money I spent might help make a difference. I ended up eating the whole pint in one sitting;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd,Briguy,2020-05-19,5,Good stuff.,0,0,"If you don't like the flavor profile, chances are you won't like this pint of ice cream. However, if it sounds good to you like it does to me, pretty sure you'll enjoy this ice cream. My only complaint is I wish it had more of the spicy fudge brownie pieces";;;
Justice ReMix'd
author: Shayshay06
title: Ehhhhh
text;;;: I was so excited to try this but it was absolutely terrible. It made my stomach hurt and I literally was nauseous.;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd,BL_on_the_DL,2020-02-08,5,THE. BEST. FLAVOR. EVER.,0,0,"I have never written a review here before, but I thought this necessary to see if you could make it permanent. It is so so so good. The spicy chocolate and everything is amazing. I went back and bought our grocer out. Please make it permanent. :)";;;
Justice ReMix'd
author: Lisalue49
title: Yummy cinnamon!
text;;;: What a change of pace! Not a huge fan of chocolate but the cinnamon gives it a good balance. What's B&J without something gooey? Oh yes! Gooey gobs of cinnamon bun dough and brownies! Even the brownies are magical! The taste bursts on my tongue!;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd,Ggmg,2020-04-01,1,Awful,1,4,"The flavor combination is disgusting, obviously no real thought went into this ice cream and I doubt anyone taste tested it.";;;
Justice ReMix'd
author: maiab
title: Not what I expected but really good!
text;;;: I didn’t really know what to expect with this flavor and it was different but still super good. It is pretty powerful on the cinnamon and with the spicy brownies but everything complemented super well together. Would probably buy again.;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd,mx7mbb,2020-07-24,5,make it PERMANENT!!,0,0,"I found this at the grocery store once and I fell in love with it. Unfortunately, I haven't been able to find it anywhere after that. I really want this flavor of Justice will become a permanent flavor!!!!!!!! PLEASE!!!!!!!";;;
Justice ReMix'd
author: Rmorflin
title: Great flavor experience
text;;;: I absolutely loved the cinnamon and chocolate flavor combination. It's very unique flavor in the best way possible. It's easily one of my new favorites. The spice in the fudge brownies is perfect to fight against the sweet.;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd
author: Jojo123
title: Tastes like dirt
text;;;: Horrible flavor. Get rid of it. One of your worst ever.;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd,Susanna,2020-06-03,5,Addicting and amazing!,0,0,"I impulse bought the last pint of this my Kroger had, and I swear to you it’s the best ice cream I’ve ever had! The spicy brownies were absolute perfection! The only problem? I’m craving more and can’t find it anywhere!";;;
Justice ReMix'd
author: Dave Matthews
title: Not good! Bring back One Sweet Whirled.
text;;;: Why not bring back some of the good flavors from the graveyard instead of garbage like this?;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd,Flutterfre,2020-03-12,5,OMG! My new favorite!!!,0,0,"Seriously, please keep this flavor on the shelves and available forever! I love cinnamon buns and brownies. But the spicy brownies were new to me--and now they're an absolute favorite! Can't get enough.";;;

Justice ReMix'd,ZOmbie17,2020-05-15,5,Amazing Taste!,0,0,"Bought this just to try it after reading the label, I was intrigued by the spicy brownie aspect (I LOVE Mexican brownies). Ate it right out of the pint, and was SO GOOD!!!!!! definitely a new favorite!";;;

Justice ReMix'd,iLoVeLiCoRiCe,2020-05-29,5,A favorite for cinnamon lovers!!,0,0,"This is wonderful! Definitely different than your “traditional” flavors, but I seek this one out! I wish it was easier to find!! You have to LOVE cinnamon though— some strong flavors here!";;;

Justice ReMix'd,Casey E,2020-02-11,5,Please make this permanent!,0,0,"This ice cream is amazing, the flavors go together so well and remind me of Mexican style hot chocolate with a lovely spicy kick! Please add this to your permanent roster of flavors!!!";;;

Justice ReMix'd,,2020-04-15,5,Great Ice Cream - Great Cause,0,0,"This flavor absolutely rules and I hope it never goes away. I love that Ben & Jerry's takes social justice seriously as a company, and I love the work they've done with Senator Sanders.";;;
Justice ReMix'd
author: Blacklivesmattter
title: Ben and Jerry for president
text;;;: AMAZING FLAVOUR! Ben and Jerry are so awesome that I don’t mind paying more for this ice cream because they pay their employees very well. Great guys. Gen Z loves and approves!!;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd,ohz2,2020-03-12,5,One of the best ice creams I’ve ever had,0,0,"I’ve eaten way too many kinds of ice cream, and this is easily one of the most amazing and creative kinds that I have ever had. Any time I see it in a store I have to buy it.";;;

Justice ReMix'd,JenniT,2020-04-17,5,My Favorite Flavor,0,0,"I almost didn't buy this, but my daughter convinced me to try it. It's amazing! I love that it has just a bit of brownie spiciness with the sweetness of the ice cream.";;;

Justice ReMix'd,Icecream6032753,2020-06-08,5,New favorite!,0,0,"All of the flavors pair very well with each other, the brownies add just a touch of spiciness that is complimented by the chocolate. This is going to be my new go to!";;;
Justice ReMix'd
author: Casiecase
title: The best flavor
text;;;: This is seriously such a good flavor. The brownie in it has enough cinnamon to give it a kick but isn’t overbearing and the little cinnamon bun bits are phenomenal.;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd
author: Mareday
title: Spicy Mexican hot chocolate and Cinnabon
text;;;: Anyone who rates this below a 4/5 is foolish! This tastes like heaven !! Spicy brownie batter with cinnamon ice cream and Cinnabon pieces. I hope this stays forever;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd
author: BJ2019
title: Thumbs down
text;;;: Hi I just kept feeling like they are reaching for flavors on this one. Bring back dastardly mash and New York super chunk;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd
author: Agcrook
title: My favorite flavor!!
text;;;: I absolutely LOVE this flavor. It's sweet with just a touch of spice with my favorite flavors. PLEASE make this a permanent flavor!!;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd,grayskies23,2020-03-17,5,Please make this a regular flavor!,0,0,"OMG it's so good, spicy brownie, it's like you have been listening to my inner ice cream dream thoughts! Thank You : )";;;
Justice ReMix'd
author: carolll
title: its good but not the best
text;;;: i bought this awhile ago and it's good. i really realized that I was white when I though the cinnamon was spicy lol;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd
author: Uncannyen
title: I'm obsessed
text;;;: I love this! It's my favorite ice cream since Late Night Snack. I wish it would become a permanent flavor.;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd
author: Meesh
title: LOVE IT!!!
text;;;: So good!!!! Please keep this one as a regular! It's the closest thing I can find to Mexican Chocolate.;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd
author: ice cream girl
title: yum!
text;;;: the best ice cream flavor out there! the spice is phenomenal and it NEEDS to be a regular flavor;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd
author: Horchatadelight
title: Cinnamon and chocolate
text;;;: Are a combination meant for holy matrimony. This flavor needs to be made a permanent option.;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd
author: Lillyllill
title: Yummmmmm
text;;;: Please keep this flavor it’s my favorite the cinnamon and chocolate are a perfect combo;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd
author: ilamae
title: PLEASE KEEP IT FOREVER
text;;;: I love this flavor so much this is my favorite pls dont ever get rid of it im begging;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd
author: ldmfarmer
title: Love the name!
text;;;: This is by far my favorite flavor of all time with Cinnamon Bun. Please keep it!!!;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd
author: Gotta love it
title: Love the flavor
text;;;: Absolutely love this ice cream!!!! I’ve never been disappointed when trying flavors;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd
author: Suzanne Kelsey
title: Not for everyone but I like it
text;;;: Not for everyone but I like it. Lots of cinnamon flavor and a nice hit of chili;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd
author: DouglasElliott
title: Zing!
text;;;: This is an amazing combination of flavors. Please make it a regular!;;;

name: Justice ReMix'd,Sweetsunshine,2020-03-19,5,Wish it were here to stay,0,0,"They’ve done it again! Few things I crave, now this is on the list";;;
Justice ReMix'd
author: Shonken
title: Best new flavor!
text;;;: Love this flavor so much! Dethroned several of my favorites!;;;

name: Boots on the Moooo,Lizzie22,2020-06-16,5,Please make boots on moon a regular flavor!,20,0,"I love this flavor, and am already sad that it is a limited item. Yummy chocolate ice cream with crispy toffee & fudge cows and sugar cookie core. It's all amazing, and a terrific combination! Please please please, how do we make it a regular flavor?";;;
Boots on the Moooo
author: Laluna
title: Worthy of being a regular flavor!
text;;;: Bought this the other day and omg I am in love! This needs to be available always please don’t take it away it’s too good to not be around for long!!! The sugar cookie core is to die for!!;;;

name: Boots on the Moooo,gotgotgone,2020-06-23,5,New Favorite,8,0,"This is my favorite Netflix B&J flavor and I will be purchasing again. I was worried this would be too sweet but has the perfect balance of chocolate, toffee, fudge, and sugar cookie core. The sugar cookie core is not overbearing like some other core flavors. I also love the that the texture is both smooth and crunchy. I hope this become permanent";;;

Boots on the Moooo,Amanda530,2020-08-23,1,Good idea but weird,0,9,"I was excited to try this new flavor last week. What's not to love about fudge cows, toffee, and sugar cookie. Unfortunately for me it was a major flop. The ice cream and fudge cows were enjoyable. The toffee clusters were a weird texture experience, unfortunately. I was expecting something more along the lines of the toffee in Everything But The.... which I really enjoy. The real disappointment, and reason I'm actually taking the time to review ice cream, was the sugar cookie dough core. For me, it just tasted of wet sugar. Grainy, too soft, no flavor. Ben and Jerry's has set high expectations for their products, but sadly this one didn't deliver for me.";;;
Boots on the Moooo
author: Bjaxx1992
title: BEST ICE CREAM EVER.
text;;;: The combination of flavors in this ice cream is OUT OF THIS WORLD! I was lucky enough to find one pint and have been searching for more. I really hope this becomes a regular flavor because I’m obsessed. I’ve been checking all the stores nearby and everywhere is sold out. Please please please keep this one around!;;;

name: Boots on the Moooo
author: shanti123
title: Out of This World!
text;;;: The combination of flavors makes an incredible medley for your taste buds! It was exciting to try a new flavor. The sugar cookie dough is absolutely heavenly. You have to try this new flavor combination!;;;

name: Boots on the Moooo,IceDream,2020-06-22,5,Boots on the Mooo'n is out of this world!,5,0,"Hole-y Cow!!! (Hole-y as in holes. You know, because craters...? Oh well.) Couldn't wait for Boots to show up in stores, so when it did, I pounced. I would be over the moon if this was made a regular flavor. For heaven's sake, do it! This is one of the best B&J flavors I've ever had. Been eating B&J for decades.";;;
Boots on the Moooo
author: InvestinBlackCommunities
title: Best Chocolate Ice Cream in the Solar System!
text;;;: I tried this last week for the first time on a whim (because there was no other B&J's left at the grocery store). I was nervous because myself and my partner are not usually chocolate ice cream lovers but this one has changed our minds!! The cookie core and other bits balance out the chocolate ice cream PERFECTLY. I've been trying to track it down again since but it seems people have caught on to it and it's been sold out. You have to try it!;;;

name: Boots on the Moooo,ivamarie,2020-07-09,5,We love it!!!,5,0,"My son and I can’t stop talking about how good this flavor is, and how we would sign a petition to get it made a permanent Ben and Jerry’s variety! Please continue to make it...the combination of fudge and sugar cookies and toffee! oMG!";;;

Boots on the Moooo,Sam loves ice cream,2020-07-07,5,Even better than the show!!,5,0,"After searching all the stores in my area, I was finally able to get my hands on what I now believe to be my new favorite. Please don't let this be a limited batch! It's too good to disappear!!!!";;;

Boots on the Moooo,Missymcicecream,2020-08-11,5,Most amazing flavor I’ve ever witnessed,3,0,"I bought this flavor a week ago, hearing about it from the office ladies podcast. It sounded good and I love supporting them and also Space Force, so I had to buy it. I am not kidding when I say this is literally the best flavor I’ve ever had. And it’s not even close to my old favorite go-to of cookie dough and cookies and cream, so that says ALOT. This needs to be a permanent flavor. 500 stars.";;;
Boots on the Moooo
author: TheAlphaGreenBean
title: Holy Moly!
text;;;: I got a serious case of the munchies and this was the best icecream a person could ask for...A ice cream for the Gods! and them mini chocolate cows got me feeling like a archaeologist digging thru looking for there goodness. Hats off!!;;;

name: Boots on the Moooo
title: Out of this World!!
text;;;: Move over Phish Food and Cherry Garcia and Coffee Coffee Buzz Buzz and Americone Dream- all legit faves of mine! And make room New York Super Fudge Chunk because there is a new Wowzer in space!! PLEASE make this one stay in orbit!!!;;;

name: Boots on the Moooo
author: Zany67
title: Keep Forever!
text;;;: Searched high and low for this flavor. Finally found it and bought 6 pints! Everyone in our family (5 of us) is obsessed with it. Hands down a winner! Especially love the toffee clusters in this ice cream!;;;

name: Boots on the Moooo,staciajan,2020-07-12,5,"Literally, out of this world!",3,0,"The toffee bits sold me on this initially, but every part of this flavor was a delicious surprise! Everything from the milk chocolate ice cream to the cookie core... so good!!";;;

Boots on the Moooo,ChellaQ,2020-08-03,5,Please make this a permanent flavor!,3,0,"This is my new favorite icecream. I really hope you guys keep it on forever. Usually it takes me months to finish a pint (I know, it's weird) but this one I finished in a day.";;;
Boots on the Moooo
author: Ccort
title: Please please please make this a regular flavor
text;;;: I never write reviews for anything. This is the best ice cream I HAVE EVER EATEN! Please please please make this regular.;;;

name: Boots on the Moooo,Brittany01,2020-09-23,5,Freaking delicious,0,0,"I bought this today and holy camoly it is so good. The sugar cookie dough is to die for. Can you all please make this regular. Please. It is a perfect balance of sweet and the toffee adds some saltiness, and the sugar cookie dough just finishes it off.";;;
Boots on the Moooo,TommyG,2020-07-14,5,Nothing but fun for the mouth,2,0,"The milk chocolate flavor is excellent, and there are tons of things to keep your mouth entertained. Awesome!";;;
Boots on the Moooo
author: cara19
title: my dream pint
text;;;: I love the special cows! and literally everything else about this pint. it’s so good in every way;;;

name: Boots on the Moooo,steph95688,2020-07-21,5,YAAAAAAAAS,1,0,"I'm sitting on the couch devouring this entire pint. Make this flavor permanent, i need it in my life. Love chocolate based ice creams with crunchy additions like almonds, chocolate, toffee, etc. Most are ruined with marshmallow so this was an exciting flavor to find! My other fave is New York Super Fudge Chunk. We need more chocolate flavors like these!";;;

Boots on the Moooo,Erlybird,2020-08-28,5,"Make it Regular, PLEASE!",1,0,"I went to five stores in my area looking for ""Boots on the Moon"". I love all things MOON, and I thought I would like it, and I was wrong - I LOVE it! I had some for breakfast today...and dinner tonight. I am glad I live alone, so I don't have to share it! Am I addicted to it? Will an intervention be called for? Tune in, and make it regular!!!!";;;

Boots on the Moooo,rachel23,2020-09-20,5,AMAZING,1,0,"My usual pint, Milk and Cookies has taken a back seat. The sugar cookie core + the toffee is a combination to DIE FOR. Plus, we all know the delight that is B&J chocolate ice cream.";;;

Boots on the Moooo,ray18,2020-08-02,5,Amazing!,1,0,"One of my new favorite flavors, I’m so sad that it’s not a regular flavor. The sugar cookie core is my favorite part, and the toffee clusters add a great sweet crunch. Would definitely keep purchasing this if they made it a regular flavor.";;;
Boots on the Moooo
author: Molekayhee
title: Best. Flavor. Ever.
text;;;: Seriously...never get rid of this...even if the show doesn't continue on (which it should)...never ever ever get rid of this amazing flavor combination.;;;

name: Boots on the Moooo,Ice Cream Manwich,2020-09-18,5,SWEET BABY JESUS please keep this flavor around!,0,0,"I seem to have discovered this flavor just as it was going out of stock. Got one for me and one for my wife, and we both thought it was fan-freaking-tastic. It even has a hint of malt flavor, whether unintentional or due to a confluence of other ingredients. I'd have trouble choosing between this and Phish Food, and that's saying something! I'd be even more stoked if you could make a froyo version, 'cuz the reduced calories and saturated fat would let me eat it more often!";;;
Boots on the Moooo
author: ChocolateIcecreamLover
title: Favorite EVER!
text;;;: This is seriously my fave!!! Please make it permanent!!!;;;

name: Boots on the Moooo
author: Yellow
title: I need this
text;;;: My new favorite flavor from you please make more!!!!!;;;

name: Boots on the Moooo,Ks 8,2020-09-16,5,Would give 10 stars if i could.,0,0,"Okay I’m not joking when I say I love and hate this flavor at the same time. I pe this flavor because it is BY FAR the best tasting Ben and Jerry’s flavor ever made, no competition... and i amd a huge Ben and Jerry’s fan. The reason I hate it is because this flavor has caused me to gain like 30 lbs at this point because I cannot stop eating it. It does not get old. Ever. The crunchy sweetness of the toffee is spot on amd just pairs PERFECTLY with the sugar cookie core and the milk chocolate ice cream. Oh yeah, MILK CHOCOLATE. The milk chocolate is so good. I have eaten probably like 50 of these at this point and everytime the core is big and i never get a bad core. Every pint i have gotten has been just as good ig not better than the last. Please Ben amd Jerry’s. If you are reading this. DO NOT MAKE THIS A LIMITED TIME FLAVOR.";;;

Boots on the Moooo,doubledipped89,2020-09-01,5,YES,0,0,"This new flavor is so good! I love it, it's like a fun twist on some well loved Phish Food flavors. The little chocolate cows are such a cute touch. I hope that this becomes a regular flavor, as it is now my favorite chocolate ice cream based B&J pint. My fav of all time will always be Salted Caramel Core, but this is a close second. Definitely for caramel and toffee fans, I even loved the sugar cookie core.";;;

Boots on the Moooo,MizoMetar,2020-09-15,5,Shockingly Good,0,0,"I am not the biggest ice cream fan but I do like a good dessert, but this was everything I could have wanted from a dessert, creamy chocolate, a nice crunch of cookies and toffee, a smooth flavor that wants me going back for more. If your a fan of texture and something out of the ordinary give this a try, I know I did and I cannot wait to get more.";;;
Boots on the Moooo
author: Charles V
title: Until this becomes a regular flavor...stockpile.
text;;;: When I first discovered this I was on the East Coast. Found it in a tiny gas station. After one scoop I immediately made plans to go back and buy the place out. Bought the remaining three pints the next day. We only had a week left on our trip but I had no issues finishing all 4 pints.;;;

name: Boots on the Moooo
author: Peach
title: Chip Happens
text;;;: Just tried chip happens..yummy! Don't know how you managed the chips in it but love the salty/sweet combo. Reminds me of b-day's as a child;;;

name: Boots on the Moooo
author: MegA
title: My ABSOLUTE FAVORITE!!
text;;;: I love this flavor SO MUCH! It's such a bummer when the limited time flavors are the best flavors. I still think about the 2016 Empower-mint. Please keep this one going. And maybe bring back the Empower-mint?;;;

name: Boots on the Moooo,TommyAZ,2020-06-07,1,Almonds? Why?!,9,86,"This could’ve been fantastic, but you went and ruined it with Almonds, one of the most common food allergies!!";;;
Boots on the Moooo
author: Allie223
title: Yummmmyy!!!
text;;;: My daughter (19) and I think this is one of the best flavors. Can't stop wanting in our freezer. Please make it a regular.;;;

name: Boots on the Moooo
author: Morgan K
title: Best Ice Cream Ever
text;;;: Absolute favorite flavor! All the flavors compliment each other perfectly and make a final product that is absolutely to die for! Please please please make it a regular flavor!;;;

name: Boots on the Moooo,Brittney,2020-09-13,2,Not as Great as the Others.,0,0,"Tastes kind-of bland. The sugar cookie core doesn’t really taste like much, especially when combined with the chocolate ice cream. Favorite part was the toffee pieces.";;;
Boots on the Moooo
author: Pwalsh35
title: Delicious
text;;;: Sugar cookie dough core make that into a flavor only;;;

name: Americone Dream,Coleman,2018-05-13,5,Perfect harmony,12,2,"I loved this ice cream so much I typed in Ben and Jerry's Americone Dream is amazing into Google. I wanted to add a review since there was only one so far... To my surprise the cone was still crispy and the amount of fudge covering the cone was not overwhelming whatsoever. But the caramel swirl is fantastic quality, bringing back memories of the first time I had caramel with a side of Apple. I chose this because I was looking for a non traditional flavor but not too rich, now don't get me wrong, eating half a pint is definitely a hefty load on the gut but it doesn't feel too busy and you still get to enjoy the ice cream.";;;
Americone Dream
author: sgai
title: Current fav BJ flavor
text;;;: I've gone back to this flavor after favoring The Tonight Dough and the Caramel Core ones. I forgot what I was missing. I bought 2 the last time they were BOGO at Publix and go 2 more before the sale ended. I love caramel(I hate fudge) and the crispy chocolate covered waffle cones are tasty. Also I don't see many other options with waffle cone pieces. There have also been a lot of waffle cone in the pints.;;;

name: Americone Dream,LeeLee,2017-09-30,5,Delicious,10,0,"Tastes good, satisfies my sweet tooth, and definitely represents the Americone Dream!!!! Also, you don't have to feel guilty about eating a pint because you're eating ice cream for charity (it's like a tax deduction.... calories get deducted if they're for charity)!!!!";;;
Americone Dream,Dejota,2018-09-08,5,Awesome,10,0,"I typically try every new flavor that comes out when I see them. When they have no new flavors to try, my default is American dream. I love it!";;;

Americone Dream,Americone Dream Lover,2017-04-27,5,The best ice cream ever,15,3,"I eat a pint when I am sad, I eat a pint when I am happy, I eat a pint when I want to be happy... I keep eating this ice cream... SOOOOOOO GOOOOOOOOOD. This ice cream is truly dreamy";;;
Americone Dream
author: Muney1169
title: O M Geeeee!
text;;;: Fell in love at the first taste and haven't looked back. No other ice cream can compare. June 19 was the first I saw and heard of the slices and now I won't sit and eat the entire pint. Thanks guys!;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: Maggie1198
title: Americone Slice
text;;;: I chose this flavor for the caramel swirl as much as the fudge covered cone pieces...sadly it contained neither;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: francescaf17
text;;;: This is my fave ben and Jerrys flavor. I had it back when I met jerry at a speaking engagement. The little waffle cone pieces are perfect and the ice cream flavor is great. I have and will buy again!;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: stephaniek104
text;;;: My favorite ice cream! Taste just like a drum stick!! Has the perfect amount of flavor [product:ben-&-jerrys-americone-dream-ice-cream];;;

name: Americone Dream
author: Browine
title: Delicious
text;;;: Very good ice cream u guys have. Americone Dream is me nd my wife's favorite flavor. I it new varieties coming out anytime soon?;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: FuzzyGut
title: Such a great flavor!
text;;;: This one is pretty perfect in my opinion. All the elements work well together and the chocolate covered cone pieces were nice n’ crunchy!;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: beckyh5052
text;;;: They have much better flavors. It’s not bad but I do not like that the waffle cone pieces get soggy;;;

name: Americone Dream,Melissa8271975,2019-01-08,5,My life now has purpose!!,1,0,"I just want to say that now that I have found Ben & Jerry's Americone Dream ice cream, my life now has purpose!! That purpose is to get up everyday, eat Americone Dream ice cream until it's gone, drive to the store, buy some more, and repeat. This ice cream is EVERYTHING!!!!!! Please never stop making it!!!!";;;
Americone Dream
author: Flavor Reviewer
title: Great Flavor
text;;;: Excellent! This flavor has all sorts of things in it!;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: kaylar97c1
text;;;: Guilty pleasure! I think everyone can agree Ben & Jerry's is delicious no matter what kind you get. I really like the Americone Dream. I'm a huge fan of waffle cones so add that into the ice cream and I'm sold. I usually get the small pints with my boyfriend and we'll finish that in one sitting! It's so bad but so good :P;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: Skinny Pretzel
title: :o Conerrrrr
text;;;: Such good ice cream. Like too good. I cannot physically stop myself from consuming this ice cream. The flavors and textures blend so well together and I am overwhelmed with the need to keep eating it. I am considering seeking professional help. Keep doing what you're doing. All the stars *************;;;

name: Americone Dream,dakotaw3,2020-07-07,5,,0,0,"My favorite ice cream! Its so delicious, especially the caramel swirl! Also Ben & Jerrys high key supports the #BLM movement. So we STAN Ben & Jerrys in this household. 10/10 recommend to anyone and everyone in literally the entire world. Go get you some Ben & Jerrys. Like. Right now.";;;

Americone Dream,Gabby,2017-11-04,4,Really good ice cream,1,0,"The vanilla ice cream is so good! Almost as good as my Grandma used to make! I am a caramel lover and could use a little more in this but it was yummy, and of course everyone loves the cone!";;;
Americone Dream
author: SayWhat
title: Ingredients in every bite!
text;;;: OMG.....amazing! First time trying this flavor and it did not disappoint! I love that the ingredients were in every bite. #happycustomer;;;

name: Americone Dream,Di7769,2017-09-29,5,Never Knew Something Could Be So Good!!,1,0,"I finally weaned myself off of the Strawberry Shortcake and then came Americone. Oooh Americone, I love you so!";;;
Americone Dream,kails924,2018-11-11,5,,0,0,"All of the best flavor combinations in one place! Sweet, salty, crunchy, creamy, chocolatey, waffly goodness!";;;
Americone Dream
author: Angie23
title: Yummy!!!! Perfect combo. Lots of caramel!!!
text;;;: Satisfies all sorts of cravings. Crunchier and creamy. Love it while I watch the Steven Colbert show!!!;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: Brittany012
title: Best flavor ever!
text;;;: Literally my favorite flavor. The waffle cone prices and magical.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: Amber88
title: The Best!!
text;;;: So perfect!!!!!! The caramel swirl is amazing!!!!!;;;

name: Americone Dream,MedicChick,2019-11-03,5,The Triple Threat!,0,0,"Beauty, brains, and brawn. Chocolate, caramel, cone. There are no wrong answers here. I'd say it tastes like heaven but something about it is just so sinful. Nothing should be this good and still be legal. Oh but it is. It so is. Haven't tried it? WRONG. You haven't just ""not tried it"", you haven't even started living. It is life giving. Fix it. Go forth. Brave the great wide world in search of the truth of the universe. (Hint: it's Americone Dream).";;;

Americone Dream,Elyse,2018-07-07,5,Out of This World!,0,0,"This is one of the most delicious flavors of ice cream I’ve ever eaten. It’s sweet, crunchy, wonderfully gooey, with pieces of waffle cone, fudge, and caramel goodness. To make it even better, the proceeds go The Stephen Colbert’s AmeriCone Dream Fund, which feeds hungry children, provides them with medication, and also provides services to veterans. For what more could you ask? You’ll love it and feel good about helping those in need.";;;

Americone Dream,ashleyv150,2020-07-26,4,,0,0,"A good flavor! It's pretty simple- vanilla with caramel and fudge-covered waffle cone pieces- but sometimes that's all you need! I've definitely purchased this flavor more than once. The only slight flaw- and this wasn't an issue the last time I purchased it so maybe it got a bit better- was that the waffle cone pieces could be a bit too big sometimes. I'd still highly recommend it, though!";;;

Americone Dream,,2020-07-28,4,,0,0,"This Ben & Jerry's was good, but not my favorite of their line. Idk if it's the label or the actual ice cream. I think it needs someone else on the label who doesn't hate our current president. I'm a repeat consumer, but I won't buy again because of that. I love America regardless of who our president is, but overall the flavor is actually great like all ben & Jerry's";;;

Americone Dream,Rudy,2018-01-21,3,Needs different texture caramel,0,0,"The vanilla icecream part is amazing!!! The chocolate covered cone pieces and yummy, but the texture of the caramel is bad, i love caramel swirls in icecream but this light almost slime textured caramel really bothered me, i tried to.mix it in more or somethinh but it was like biting into a cold slime ball i couldn't eat it. But the rest of the icecream was great";;;
Americone Dream
author: makeupsbymarie
text;;;: I’ve always loved Ben & Jerry’s. I really like this flavor. It’s really sweet and all of these flavors together are amazingly good. The only bad thing about this flavor is that the ice cream cone chunks are soggy. Either than that it’s super good and I recommend! It’s an ice cream that you can get an upset tummy over because it’s not too much chocolate!;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: michellehb6a4
text;;;: This one is my husbands favorite. I prefer Phish Food or Half Baked. I'm so addicted that sometimes I will eat a whole pint in one setting. It's a little costly but sometimes you can find it on sale. I live this and nbn if you like ice cream then you would enjoy this. Check out Phish food andHalf Baked. Half baked has brownie in it...omg;;;

name: Americone Dream,ash57,2020-03-23,5,Sooo good! Love the Caramel!,0,0,"My husband bought me this and it was sooo good I had to look it up to show my sister to convince her to get this flavor... and see if everyone agreed with me!! It made my night. I am usually not a huge fan of ice creams, I am pretty plain and like basic flavors like coffee, vanilla, and strawberry but man was this ice cream good!!";;;
Americone Dream
author: lalalamb
text;;;: This is my favorite Ben & Jerry flavor! It's the perfect amount of sweet for my sugar cravings. I like the waffle cone bits which give it a crunch and some texture. I give it 4 stars instead of 5 because some batches tend to have soft pieces of waffle cone. The waffle cones are not consistently crunchy with every pint i buy.;;;

name: Americone Dream,kristins8f59,2019-03-02,5,,0,0,"This is my favorite ice cream ever. I cant say this enough. They currently dont have it at the Walmart near me so I have to get it whenever Im at food lion. Its so worth it though. I think my favorite part is the waffle cone pieces. My only complaint is that there isnt enough caramel, but thats just because I love caramel.";;;
Americone Dream
author: sighrijaa
text;;;: The best combination of things. I like vanilla based things more than chocolate ice cream based things and so I stay away from a lot of Ben and Jerrys flavors because most are the latter. This is great for a vanilla lover. With pieces of fudge and caramel (waffle cone pieces). The gooey-ness is real and drool worthy. YUM.;;;

name: Americone Dream,mandy22q,2020-07-24,5,,0,0,"Great brand, amazing quality and this flavor is just perfect The crunchy waffle cones with caramel and the vanilla is just the right blend however I add chocolate syrup in with mine to give it more of a chocolate flavor I'm not big on the vanilla ice cream but with chocolate syrup mix in it's perfect summer time treat";;;

Americone Dream,Cbugkrunks33,2019-03-01,5,Definitely an ice cream dream!!,0,0,"This is one of my all time favorite flavors!! The ingredients go together so well!! The waffle cone pieces are very easy to chew, I get a rush of gooey goodness when it's mixed with the caramel swirl, and I get the ultimate satisfaction in enjoying a very tasty ice cream pint!! Please don't ever discontinue this flavor!";;;
Americone Dream
title: AMAZINGGG
text;;;: I'm lactose intolerant so I tend to stay away from ice cream but every now and then I give in . This by far has the be the best ice cream that I have ever had and it's also my first and only time trying Ben & Jerry's . Haven decided when I think that I'm going to try a new flavor yet because so far this is the one .;;;

name: Americone Dream,sydpr,2019-02-06,5,,0,0,"Ben & Jerrys will always be my favorite ice cream from the store! These pints are packed with flavor - mainly because while developing the product Ben, who suffered from a disease that left him unable to smell, couldnt taste the flavor of the ice cream! So, they just kept adding flavor! Which turned out GREAT for us.";;;
Americone Dream
author: ichbineinmaron
text;;;: I love this brand of ice cream. I have no complaints with any flavors from this company. Growing up we lived near a Ben & Jerry's and that was our treat. I love this particular flavor because of the different bits added to it. In short I don't have the time to write all the reasons I love this brand or this flavor.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: ashiahw
text;;;: very good ice cream flavor from the bunch in my opinion. i think the cream flavor is great and i love the chocolate covered cone pieces that is all over the cup. the price is good and you can find this at your local Walmart or Target for about $4 i like to have it with me on a spa night while i'm watching movies.;;;

name: Americone Dream,Jackie54,2018-02-04,5,On my top 5 list,0,0,"I love the smoothness of the ice cream, the crunch of the cone and the yummy caramel swirl. Thank you for creating this flavor.";;;

Americone Dream,kailingc,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"I normally only get Cherry Garcia from Ben & Jerrys, but I just tried this flavor out for the first time ever. This has all of my favorite things in it - chocolate, fudge, caramel and waffle cone bits! The waffle cone bits are my favorite little add on. They add a nice crunch to the ice cream. Highly recommend!";;;
Americone Dream
author: jordan_large
text;;;: One of my favorite ice cream flavors. I love Stephen Colbert and its so cool that they collaborated with him on this! The flavors together are so delicious- Im not even a caramel fan but the overall flavor is just too good. And the chocolate covered waffle pieces are so unique to this ice cream and so tasty.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: Jake3469
title: Not the best
text;;;: I love Ben and jerry’s Ice cream but this flavor is just not it... It’s so boring tasting compared to most of the other choices they have;;;

name: Americone Dream,girlwithnoclue,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"Ben & Jerry are my two favorite men because not only are they SMASHING the patriarchy, but theyve been killing the ice cream game for years. Americone dream is the perfect balance between the sweet cream I cream and the salty waffle cone pieces. Its not too indulgent and is always stocked in my fridge!";;;

Americone Dream,mizbohemia,2020-01-26,5,,0,0,"I LOVE Stephen Colbert and I LOVE Americone dream! I am a total vanilla girl through and through and tell me that my vainlla has toffee, almonst, caramel and wafers? HEAVEN!!! This ice cream was made for ME but, since I love Stephen Colbert SO much I let Ben & Jerry name this one after him. Mwahahaha!";;;
Americone Dream
author: Jennibobunni
title: Soulfullness
text;;;: My favorite ice cream in this world! For a long time I've tried to find my favorite ice cream. My brother likes buying random ice creams and he ended up having this one night. I fell in LOVE! I feel this ice cream on a spiritual level! It defineitly fits who I am as a person! Crunchy and sweet! ; );;

name: Americone Dream
author: juded1
text;;;: im not the biggest fan of ice cream but THIIIIS is so good. I cant get over how amazing this is if im going to a drug store for snacks I always grab this. If you havent tried it please give it a try you wont regret it!! (plus this is an amazing company to support so please spend the extra money!);;;

name: Americone Dream,,2020-08-29,3,Three Times This Has Been Offered to Me,0,0,"My husband has bought this for me three times and I've eaten it all three times. I was ""squinty"" two of those times so on those occasions, I was super thankful for it and likely licked the bowl. That said, I am not reviewing this also squinty and eating Cheetos that I also think are super awesome.";;;

Americone Dream,stacis8,2020-07-23,5,,0,0,"If I had to pick a favorite ice cream I think it would be this one. Yeah it would definitely be this one. Its just the best ice cream I dont know what else to say it has everything you could want it has chocolate covered waffle cone pieces, it has caramel, and it literally is the Americone dream.";;;
Americone Dream
author: fgr615
text;;;: I am not a big ice cream person at all but we picked this flavor up so I gave it a try since it has been so hot out. It. Is. DELICIOUS. I now have a scoop every night - the caramel swirls and chunks of cone in the vanilla ice cream are insane. You can tell they are used high quality ingredients.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: influensterbrit
text;;;: I cannot tell you how much I love this ice cream! It is a flavor I always buy when buying ice cream. I cannot express how delicious this is and I think you should go out and buy a pint right now. Trust me. I love ice cream. I am super satisfied with my choice to eat this for dessert for years.;;;

name: Americone Dream,eliz13413,2019-09-29,3,Just not for me,0,0,"I know a lot of people really love this one, but I'm not feeling it. The caramel swirl is delicious, but the cone pieces are soggy/chewy, and to me, they should be crunchy, like in a Drumstick treat. I think I'll be passing on this one in the future and trying the Karamel Sutra Core instead.";;;
Americone Dream
author: ysnovic
text;;;: This ice cream is one of my favorites right now!! The pieces of chocolate covered cones are so good. Also I love the caramel swirl throughout this ice cream. It's a little on the sweeter side but so creamy and delicious. I can't wait to get more of this. I just wish it was a little cheaper.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: msaxd
text;;;: This ice cream is one of my favorites right now!! The pieces of chocolate covered cones are so good. Also I love the caramel swirl throughout this ice cream. It's a little on the sweeter side but so creamy and delicious. I can't wait to get more of this. I just wish it was a little cheaper.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: andaddiesaid
text;;;: This is my second favorite flavor of Ben & Jerrys. I love it so much and hope they never retire the flavor. Delicious sugar cone bits are the perfect crunch in the creamy ice cream. I only put a few sprinkles on top of this and it is the perfect dessert! Hard to not eat the whole pint...;;;

name: Americone Dream,,2020-07-29,2,,0,0,"This has to be my least favorite Ben & Jerrys flavor. Usually they knock it out of the park, but this one disappointed me. Its strangely...bland. The cone pieces seemed stale and cardboard-y, and the rest of the flavor didnt make up for the lack, unfortunately. I wont be buying it again.";;;

Americone Dream,taylfeather,2020-04-16,5,,0,0,"When I want ice cream, this one is my GO TO. I love everything about it. Although the Tonight Dough is a close second, I prefer the Americone Dream. Its easy to find and the pint size is perfect for one serving for me! Nothing hits the spot when I am having a craving like this variety.";;;
Americone Dream
author: julien1
text;;;: This flavor is delicious!! I absolutely love the little pieces of waffle cone in there. I enjoy ben&jerrys the most out of all the other ice creams because its creamier than others.;;;

name: Americone Dream,christinab47,2020-07-23,5,,0,0,"This is my all-time favorite, vanilla with pockets of fudge and caramel, it is pricey but goes on bogo often where I shop. The tubs are small but that's a good thing otherwise brainfreeze and sweats or pj's (unless you have elastic waist pants) would be the norm. Perfect with Netfix.";;;
Americone Dream
author: rondab4
text;;;: This icecream is so good. I like the chocolate covered waffle cone pieces and the swirls of caramel yummy . Its the perfect combination. Sometimes I eat the whole pint . Its thats good. Plus Ben & Jerry's is woke so im happy to support them. I will definitely continue to repurchase;;;

name: Americone Dream,crissya7149,2020-07-24,5,,0,0,"My favorite ice cream! Taste just like a drum stick!! Has the perfect amount of flavor! Vanilla, milk chocolate and little bits of cone, just the perfect combination. I try not to go down the freezer section of the grocery store because I know I'm going to get a couple pints! Yum!!";;;
Americone Dream
author: kitkat326
text;;;: Ben & Jerrys is a staple in the ice cream industry and i enjoy it. Its not my go to because it can be too rich a lot of times but this particular combination of flavors is classic and delicious. If i only had Ben & Jerrys to choose from this would be it! Gotta love the classics!;;;

name: Americone Dream,George,2017-08-07,5,My favorite,0,0,"I am a long time lover of Americone Dream, delicious caramel and waffle cone flavors. I was surprised with my latest purchase to find cookies and cream ice cream instead of vanilla in the carton, in the end a not unwelcome addition. Perhaps brings into question quality control.";;;

Americone Dream,amydj79,2020-07-29,5,,0,0,"I love Ben and Jerrys as a company because of their social justice and community based causes. Americone Dream is one of my favorite flavors. Its the perfect mix of fudge, caramel and waffle cone pieces. Its rich and creamy. Beware, once you get started, its hard to put down!";;;
Americone Dream
author: Lauracantu88
title: Simple Perfection
text;;;: Since I was 13 I have never strayed from my two favs Phish Food and Chocolate brownie ... I saw waffle cone pieces and was sold. Americone dream is a great combination of flavors. The waffle pieces are still crisp and fresh. I ONLY wish it was loaded with more waffle pieces.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: gretakate21
text;;;: Ben & Jerrys is a family favorite because my dad has a dairy allergy. I love when stores have dairy free options because our family is able to enjoy a fun dessert where everyone is happy. Best creamy and fun ice cream flavors! [product:ben-&-jerrys-americone-dream-ice-cream];;;

name: Americone Dream
author: jeanl6
text;;;: My husband and I are addicted to the Ben and Jerry's ice creams! They are just the perfect amount of creamy. The chocolate is tasty and decadent. This flavor is perfect with the waffle cone pieces. I would highly recommend to others to try this flavor. You can not go wrong!;;;

name: Americone Dream,evelyncc086,2020-07-24,5,,0,0,"This is by far my favorite ice cream from Ben & Jerrys. The vanilla ice cream is always a winner, then the fudge covered waffle cones add texture and little bursts of surprises in your mouth. The caramel swirl adds that smooth buttery flavor without it being overwhelming.";;;
Americone Dream
author: milear
text;;;: Once this came out it quickly became my fave Ben and Jerry's flavor. Its has all of my favorite things in it. Its delicious the cone is crunchy not soggy and tge chocolate hits the spot. Perfect on a cold summer day. The price is average but can often be found on sale.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: alishac66e7
text;;;: [product:ben-&-jerrys-americone-dream-ice-cream] I love ice cream and I love Ben and Jerrys Icecream ! Out of all their flavors I love Americone! A nutty buddy basically mixed with the classic vanilla ice cream! This is a most have! You have to try this ice cream!;;;

name: Americone Dream,,2020-06-11,5,,0,0,"My go-to Ben and Jerrys! They have the best ice cream, and they always pack it full of amazing ingredients! They are all good, but this one is definitely my favorite. You cant go wrong with fridge covered waffle cone pieces with Carmel drizzle. Seriously the best!";;;

Americone Dream,mairennm,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"THIS IS MY FAVORITE ICE CREAM OF ALL TIME! Ben and Jerry's went crazy this falvor, and I love it. The mix of caramel, waffle cone, and vanilla is superb, and if you do anything next to the grocery store, you have to pick this up. I swear it will change your life.";;;

Americone Dream,measterbrook,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"This is one of my most favorite flavors when it comes to ice cream! I love that he has pieces of cone broken up in it! How creative is that!? This is the most bought ice cream flavor for me, but this is mostly because its only a few servings! Thats okay though!";;;

Americone Dream,15hurdoli,2019-11-05,5,,0,0,"There will never be a bad time for ice cream. I LOVE Ben & Jerrys. Not only does the company actually stand for some pretty great things, theyre flavors are unbeatable!! Americone Dream is my favorite with crunchy little waffle cone pieces, chocolate, caramel!!";;;

Americone Dream,,2020-04-08,4,,0,0,"This is so so good, but it's also so so expensive. The containers are so small that you split this between 2 people and you are done in one sitting. I do really love the different flavors swirling together in this one but I save Ben and Jerry's for emergencies.";;;
Americone Dream
author: sirodlovesyou
text;;;: This brand is for certain my favorite brand. It is consistently good. This flavor is the best. Someone put me on it when I was in college and ever since I have been hooked. I also love how it is widely available. The names are pretty unique and I love that too.;;;

name: Americone Dream,Rebel of Mars 81,2019-07-17,4,"Delicious, but too much caramel sauce.",0,1,"I love this flavor, however, the ones I have purchased in the last year had far too much caramel. It is not just swirls, but globs, which makes it all too sweet. The rest of the ice cream, especially the chocolate cover cone pieces, is great and well balanced.";;;
Americone Dream
author: logan1310
text;;;: Ice cream is one of my favorite desserts and Ben and Jerry’s never lets me down. I’m not much of a vanilla person so all the bits and pieces and drizzles throughout the ice cream is great. It tastes delicious and there’s enough that it lasts me a few days too!;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: kabrion
title: Love
text;;;: We call this our honeymoon ice cream because it was what was being sampled during the factory tour we went on on our honeymoon. I’ve purchased a pint a month since then. The chocolate cone pieces seemed so weird at first but the flavors blend so perfectly.;;;

name: Americone Dream,stevenckopp,2018-10-24,5,,0,0,"Listen, my apartment is a Ben & Jerry's apartment. If I'm going for ice cream, my first grab is always B&J. Americone Dream, Chubby Hubby, Tonight Dough, Half-Baked. The list goes on. There's usually a pint in my freezer. What's not to love about it?";;;
Americone Dream
author: Christin
title: FAVORITE ICE CREAM
text;;;: By far the best ice cream I have ever eaten! I have quite a sweet tooth so trust me when I say that this stuff is good! The caramel is in every bite of vanilla ice cream. The chocolate waffle cone is light and delightful! Please never discontinue this!!;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: angelloveinc25
text;;;: I love this icecream it's the best. It's very delicious and you won't be disappointed at all with the flavor. This delicious icecream are the best compared to any others. I'm a repeat consumer. I love it. I would definitely recommend this to everybody.;;;

name: Americone Dream,gianam3,2020-07-24,5,,0,0,"My favorite Ben & Jerrys flavor! It has everything - cone, caramel, cookie dough. So good. Same price tag as all Ben & Jerrys but delicious enough to splurge. Also, as a person with a nut allergy there is no warning or may contain, which is relieving!";;;

Americone Dream,Quaniapintluva,2019-06-23,1,Bummer,1,14,"I thought it was jimmy Fallon on the pint wanting to get the tonight dough. I was so upset when I got home. So I attempted to enjoy it. It’s not tasty at all. It’s salty, and crunchy & not what I want my ice cream to be.";;;

Americone Dream,ChilliedLaura,2017-06-23,5,Americone Suprise,0,0,"My wife brought me this one home to my disappointment as it really did not appeal to me. I thought it would not have any strong flavor, but I am glad I was wrong! Great mix-ins through out, a nice caramel taste and chewy bits of cone. Would buy again!";;;
Americone Dream
author: junel645d
text;;;: I really enjoy Ben & Jerry's Ice Cream varieties but do not often purchase them because of the high price tag. One of my favorites from Ben & Jerry's is Stephen Colbert's Americone Dream. I love the crunchy wafflecone bits mixed with all the goodness.;;;

name: Americone Dream,jennab10,2018-12-02,5,,0,0,"THE BEST ICE CREAM OUT THERE!!!! I love the chocolate covered wafers that give it an extra crunch and they go so well with the Carmel drizzle and vanilla ice cream. I buy this over and over again every time I have an ice cream craving, 10/10 recommend";;;

Americone Dream,sarabearycanny,2020-07-24,5,,0,0,"Favorite Ben and Jerry's flavor of all time. I love the crunchy cone pieces, the super sweet caramel, and the luscious ice cream. This flavor never lasts in my freezer a pint is basically a single serving. I highly recommend everyone try this flavor.";;;
Americone Dream
author: heatherv9478
text;;;: I really enjoyed this ice cream. The ice cream itself was super smooth and didn't do that weird thing where it gets crystally when you put it back in the freezer. Plus it satisfied my craving for something crunchy thanks to the ice cream cone pieces!;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: karishma__x3
text;;;: This is my favorite icecream and icecream brand ever. I love how they dont just sell chocolate or vanilla but these creative ones instead. The only thing i wish they did was sell bigger sizes. Its expensive for how small it is but totally worth it.;;;

name: Americone Dream,chanellej,2020-07-30,3,,0,0,"I really wanted to love this ice cream. Maybe its the hype? But I kind of had higher expectations. It was good, dont get me wrong!! I liked the sweet and the crunch and the chocolate... but Idk. Wouldnt call it my favorite of all time or anything.";;;

Americone Dream,Fat Matt,2019-01-07,3,Excellent mix of flavors,0,0,"Yes, 3 stars. I would have gave it 4 or 5 stars, but tonight dough raised the bar to high. After trying the amazing mix of flavors in tonight dough, no other flavor will be able to match the quality or complexity that I know expect from ice cream.";;;
Americone Dream
author: ericamata2010
text;;;: B and j always wins in my book. Nothing is better than blue Bell but this always takes the cake. I love this brand so much and their ice cream is loaded! Better than any alternatives out there. Nothing taste like b&j. Super satisfied with this!!;;;

name: Americone Dream,snh_18,2020-04-02,5,,0,0,"Okay, i usually do not like vanilla or caramel, but this ice cream laughs at me. The waffle cone bits are worth it all. If thats all you get it for, its worth it. They are chocolatey, crunchy and the ice cream just goes so perfectly with it.";;;
Americone Dream
author: jordankierstynmarie
text;;;: This flavors has become one my of new favorite as my flavor of choice seems to ALWAYS be sold out. Its got a great mix of flavors that come together for a delicious taste. I generally only buy when the product is on sale as it is expensive.;;;

name: Americone Dream,noflexzone11,2020-06-19,5,,0,0,"I love this ice cream!! I prefer vanilla-based ice cream over chocolate, and this is my favorite B&J ice cream flavor. With waffle cone pieces and a chocolate swirl, this sweet treat is a rewarding dessert that will tickle your tastebuds.";;;
Americone Dream
author: leslieeovoxo
text;;;: Ben and Jerrys is your best friend when you are just chilling watching Netflix and eating ice cream after your boyfriend had just broke up with you it is such a comfort food we love ice cream and Ben & Jerry’s is so amazing very satisfied;;;

name: Americone Dream,themayaabdulr,2020-07-29,5,,0,0,"I really enjoyed this flavor of ice cream. I really really love the pieces of waffle cone inside of the ice cream, it adds a very nice crunch. I really enjoyed the combination of the flavors together it isnt too overwhelming and is great.";;;

Americone Dream,nieceeg,2020-07-30,5,,0,0,"One of my favorite flavors by Ben & Jerrys! I loveeee the chocolate waffle cone!! Im drooling thinking about it. Im pregnant and Im surprised I havent gotten a pint yet! Definitely going to after being reminded! Its so good, trust me!";;;

Americone Dream,danzrlove,2020-07-30,5,,0,0,"This is one of my favorite flavors, I dont get it often. Partially because I cant find it and also because I dont tolerate dairy well. It is pricey as its Ben& Jerry but its also has all of the yummy flavors I remember from childhood!";;;
Americone Dream
author: britanayyx3
text;;;: Ben and Jerrys is the best ice cream! The Americone dream flavor is one of my favs because it has everything you could ever want in an ice cream right there in the pint. Its not too overbearing it has just enough of everything in it;;;

name: Americone Dream,reganc10,2020-05-07,5,,0,0,"By far my favorite ice cream by Ben & Jerry's!! This is such a great, never done before flavor that is provides that classic taste of a chocolate dipped cone. If you're debating which flavor to buy, you can't go wrong with this one.";;;

Americone Dream,tabithamari,2020-07-27,5,,0,0,"I very rarely Eat ice cream because Im lactose intolerant. But every now and then I crave it. I tried this once on a whim, and fell in love. I havent been able to find it recently which is a bummer. I also love how they support BLM.";;;

Americone Dream,kaitiekreviews,2020-07-24,5,,0,0,"My very favorite ice cream flavor! It is incredible including caramel ribbons, chunks of sugar cone, chocolate chips all mixed into vanilla. I only wish that it was slightly more affordable. I would eat it way more often if it was!";;;
Americone Dream
author: tiffanyr5e7a
text;;;: I love this Icecream! I love the fact that they have actual pieces of cone in the Icecream. I think its a little on the expensive side. I only buy that brand when they are on sale. Thats really the only negative thing I had to say.;;;

name: Americone Dream,kirstens22,2020-07-25,3,,0,0,"I was not a fan of this particular flavor they have. The waffle cone pieces were stale, and it wasnt that great of a flavor. I didnt even finish my pint. I love a lot of other flavors they have, but this one I would not buy again.";;;

Americone Dream,yaymejess,2020-07-30,5,,0,0,"This has to be my favorite flavor! Ive probably have brought more than 10 pints. This is the best ice cream created. It has vanilla, caramel, and waffle cone. Its just amazing! Please do yourself a favor and run to the store now!";;;

Americone Dream,maryanastasia6,2020-07-18,5,,0,0,"I love this flavor, the bits of cone add the perfect texture and the overall combo of flavors is great. I appreciate the support the company gives too, so it makes the ice cream all the sweeter. Plus Stephen Colbert is hilarious.";;;
Americone Dream
text;;;: This is one of my favorite flavors! It's vanilla ice cream with waffle cone pieces and fudge. It's very delicious! If you have not tried Ben & Jerry's then I highly recommend you do so. One of the best ice cream brands out there!;;;

name: Americone Dream,kierstenp7be0,2018-07-04,5,,0,0,"When I’m feeling ice cream, I splurge on Ben and Jerry’s! It’s really rich and creamy and has great flavor! Lots of sugar tho so be careful and don’t eat it all the time. This flavor is definitely my favorite, you should try it!";;;
Americone Dream
author: shangreen
text;;;: Im a person who likes a lot of goodies in their ice cream. This flavor was a little bland for my personal taste and didnt seem to have as many fix-ins as other varieties do. It was an ok option but I would not purchase again.;;;

name: Americone Dream,mikaelaa1,2020-07-31,5,,0,0,"My favorite ice cream of all time. This is the perfect combination of ice cream, swirls and chunks. But dont bother with the [product:ben-&-jerrys-americone-dream-pint-slices-ice-cream-9-ct] they are extremely disappointing.";;;
Americone Dream
author: baileekno
text;;;: I love me some Americone Dream. The perfect treat at the end of the day. The crunchy waffle cone pieces inside are my favorite because they add a nice crunch to go along with the creamy ice cream and delicious caramel swirl!;;;

name: Americone Dream
text;;;: I like the flavor and all the different kind of ice cream that Ben and Jerry’s have! The price is a little high but I would pay for it for having a good ice cream. I would buy it again and I recommend it to my friends always;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: Raven
title: PERFECTION
text;;;: Literally the best ice cream ever. All the best ingredients. In my fantasy world half the Carmel would be replaced with pretzels but it’s perfect as is too. My stores don’t gave it enough but that’s ok. It’s a scarce luxury;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: jill239
text;;;: Best of is in this concoction of yummy! This is my go to and not only because I love Stephen Colbert but part of the proceeds go to charity. The mix of the cone in the ice cream with the chocolate just all around perfect;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: megk9
text;;;: THIS IS MY FAVORITE FLAVOR OF ICE CREAM! It is not over pricy and is usually at all the stores that sell Ben and Jerrys. Though by the time I get to grab it there is usually only one or two left so it is clearly a winner!;;;

name: Americone Dream,kristas99a5,2020-07-27,5,,0,0,"Literally my most favorite ice cream ever! It definitely is a splurge treat, but worth every calorie! The crunchy cones covered in chocolate is what my dreams are made of! Will buy this ice cream for the rest of my life!";;;

Americone Dream,effiea3,2020-02-17,5,,0,0,"Crunchy, . Creamy, . Sweet, . Salty, . This is my perfect ice cream flavor. It has everything youll want. The chocolatey waffle cone pieces add the perfect crunch and the caramel swirl adds the perfect salty sweetness!";;;

Americone Dream,shreebee1029,2020-07-27,5,,0,0,"I like the Americone cream flavor a lot because it has really delicious cone pieces in the ice cream. I also like that Ben and Jerrys takes the time to collaborate with people to create custom flavors, its a cute idea!";;;

Americone Dream,jessicaa265f,2018-08-03,5,,0,0,"Americone Dream is one of my favorite flavors from the Ben & Jerry’s store. I love that they sell it in pint sizes now! Although it can be a little more expensive than other ice creams, I think it’s worth the splurge.";;;

Americone Dream,larissat9,2020-07-28,5,,0,0,"Ben and Jerrys its my number one brand of ice cream! But AMERICONE DREAM ITS THE BEEEEEESSSSSTTT without any doubts! My goodness, its the best, I just cant stop thinking about it haha. Everyone should try this flavor";;;

Americone Dream,jkingrey1447,2020-06-20,5,,0,0,"This is my absolute favorite pint of ice cream out there. Its a bit pricey, about $4.00 where I am, I love the waffle cone pieces dipped in chocolate in here! Delicious, makes me want a Ben and Jerrys store close by!";;;

Americone Dream,mileysmommy,2019-04-05,5,,0,0,"These little tubs of ice cream are perfect. I love hot great all the ingredients taste and how soft and smooth the ice cream is. I wish they sold this in a bigger size but other than that, this ice cream is amazing";;;

Americone Dream,cynthiam,2020-03-16,5,,0,0,"I honestly love this and use it everyday! Highly recommend this to anyone and everyone me or female. I use it practically every single day. I love this brand too, I would choose this over any other brand as well.";;;

Americone Dream,xtoxicbeautyx,2019-11-06,5,,0,0,"This is amazing. I love it. I can not say enough great things about this product. It is definitely worth the money. If you have the chance to experience this product, be sure you do so because you wont regret it.";;;

Americone Dream,TimmyA,2017-10-17,5,Soooo Good!!!!!,0,0,"Craving some Ben and Jerry's I made a stop to pick up a pint looking for something chocolatey. Saw this flavor and thought I'd give it a shot, and DANG!!!! was it good! Love the fudge covered waffle cone pieces.";;;
Americone Dream
author: jbond33
text;;;: The combo of the smooth caramel swirls and the bits of waffle cone makes this flavor one of the best. Little pricey but definitely worth the buy. You will not be disappointed in the deliciousness of this flavor;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: zreviews
text;;;: This was the first flavor of Ben & Jerrys ice cream I ever tried. Ive always heard great things about their ice cream so I decided to give it a try. I absolutely loved it! Can be found at most grocery stores.;;;

name: Americone Dream,kellies9ed4,2020-07-12,5,,0,0,"I tend to like a little crunch in my ice cream. This is great because it isnt overwhelming, but gives some caramel, and the crunch of waffle cone pieces. Its like ice cream in a cone without all of the hassle.";;;

Americone Dream,Desireeluvsicecream,2019-10-04,5,Best flavor ever,0,0,"I’ve bought this every chance I’ve had and it never disappoints. The perfect combination of caramel, crunch and vanilla is amazing. Thank you for creating this wonderful ice cream it has made my life complete";;;

Americone Dream,baileyt8,2019-04-03,5,,0,0,"I think this is my favorite flavor of Ben and Jerrys. I love the bit of crunch from the cone, and the fact that it is not too chocolatey. Its always delicious and never a disappointing flavor! Will buy again.";;;
Americone Dream
author: chuliosis
text;;;: One of my favorite Ben and Jerrys flavor! Not too sweet and the waffle pieces in there add a nice texture to the ice cream. Some ice creams have too much caramel or not enough but this is very well balanced!;;;

name: Americone Dream,maurasap,2018-10-03,5,,0,0,"Ben & Jerry’s has great flavors. I especially like this one because you don’t need to scoop it onto a cone, there are bits of cone in it already!! A bit expensive, but I get it on sale at CVS or Stop & Shop.";;;
Americone Dream
author: lauramgw
text;;;: This is my favorite. The only thing that makes it better is when I add my own slices of banana to it (I really like banana and icecream); but it's fantastic the way it is. My FAVORITE Ben and Jerry's flavor.;;

name: Americone Dream
author: austin2005999
text;;;: This is just a great product I really recommend it to all of y’all out there. Because it has a good bang for its buck and it also works very very well! It rlly works with anything. This is my great review.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: nicolep1122
text;;;: This is hands down my favorite flavor of ice cream. I love the chocolate dipped cone pieces and the smooth texture of the ice cream itself. Its just absolutely delicious and I would definitely recommend it.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: mellyzero
text;;;: My absolute favorite ice cream of all time. I love the cone pieces in this ice cream as they maintain texture without being too hard resulting in a great mouth feel. I will be sad if this ever gets retired.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: amyb274
text;;;: Whats not to love? B & J have the best flavor combinations and the chunks of goodness are always generous sized. I have not met a flavor I did not enjoy. I am definitely a repeat customer. Highly recommend.;;;

name: Americone Dream,jlaw_beauty,2020-07-29,5,,0,0,"Probably one of the best ice cream flavored Ive ever had. Plus it has Steven Colbert on it which is a nice touch the flavor is immaculate, nothing Id ever change. Sometimes pricey but absolutely worth it!";;;

Americone Dream,s_y_d_n_e_e_,2019-04-05,5,,0,0,"Ben & Jerrys is so good and super creamy. The balance of caramel and the fudge pieces in this flavor are so perfect. Ben & Jerrys is a little on the pricey side, but never enough to keep me from buying it.";;;
Americone Dream
author: paolav1
text;;;: This ice cream is to die for. It is simply delicious my whole family is addicted to this Ben & Jerrys ice cream it has the perfect amount of chocolate and the perfect amount of sweetness I am recommending;;;

name: Americone Dream,leanneh1010,2020-04-11,5,,0,0,"Who am I kidding, I like pretty much every flavor of B&J ice cream! Not only do they make a great product, theyre a good company- and I like to support the good ones! Look out for Bogo sales and stock up.";;;
Americone Dream
author: ashlynmedia
text;;;: This has been a favorite of mine for quite sometime. Such a brilliant combination. I love a cone in my ice cream so this is a dream. Ben & Jerrys is more than some brands but worth it! I highly recommend.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: alexaw4176
text;;;: The only ice cream I every get when Im craving some. It is sweet but its not overpowering like some other flavors and there arent a horrific amount of fillings. 11/10 ice cream with 20/10 political humor;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: ciararose
text;;;: Love the cone pieces in this ice cream and the flavor is really good I find myself eating the whole carton which is dangerous but Ben and Jerry’s is always amazing and never a let down love this so much;;;

name: Americone Dream,dekos1mm,2020-07-31,4,,0,0,"A tasty treat! Not my favorite ice cream but a decent one to try. Plus Colbert! And chocolate! Best eaten straight out of the container with a spoon. Grab a pint, grab a best friend, and grab 2 spoons.";;;

Americone Dream,tmarque7,2020-07-26,4,,0,0,"So delicious I absolutely love this flavor of Ben & Jerrys Americone dream ice cream. The only improvement this product needs to put it in a larger container, And make it a little bit more affordable";;;
Americone Dream
author: samanthakd8a6
text;;;: I love this product. Its the perfect combo of ingredients. The product is a bit pricey for the size you get but its definitely worth it. My boyfriend got me addicted to this. Id keep buying it again.;;;

name: Americone Dream,Carless,2019-04-03,5,In LOVE!!!,0,0,"I love this flavor! As an ice cream enthusiast, yes I named myself that, I would eat mostly any flavor, but when it comes to splurging for the very best, I scourage the shelves for Americone Dream!!";;;
Americone Dream
author: madisonc119
text;;;: I love Ben and Jerrys so much! This is a great flavor. I love the chocolate covered waffle cones. It adds a really nice crunch and texture thats different from any other flavor or brand Ive tried.;;;

name: Americone Dream,laurent3d6e,2020-07-31,5,,0,0,"If you are a fan of ice cream in a waffle cone, you will love this. The chocolate covered waffle cone pieces are SO good. This ice cream is Pricier than some other brands but i would recommend it!";;;
Americone Dream
author: heatheri474d
text;;;: My favorite flavor of Ben & Jerrys. It has everything in it that I love. It has waffle pieces and caramel and fudge. I love the taste of theyre ice cream. Its a product I love to treat myself to.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: mindysf183
text;;;: Love Ben & Jerrys! The only downfall is the price. It’s pretty expensive for the little amount you get. The ice cream is really good tho! I definitely splurge every now and then on the good stuff!;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: aeioyou
title: Just Right!
text;;;: I am someone who does not care for desserts which are too chocolatey rich. Americone Dream is a perfect flavor balance for me. Sweet vanilla and caramel with just enough chocolate crunchy cone.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: asianzing95
text;;;: A great find. If you love caramel and chocolate I HIGHLY recommend this flavor. You can't go wrong. It is sweet and crunchy and just everything great about ice cream. I always buy Ben and jerrys;;;

name: Americone Dream,valm30,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"My husband loves this flavor. Its my second favorite after phish food. So yummy. Vanilla ice cream is so classic. Mix it with caramel, fudge, and waffle cone piece and you are almost in heaven!";;;
Americone Dream
author: tonim530
text;;;: I have been a Been & Jerry fan for years. I even have their ice cream recipe book. The caramel is so buttery and delicious. The bits of chocolate covered waffle cone are the perfect addition!;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: akayyyy__
text;;;: This flavor gets the job done if youre wanting an ice cream cone without having to eat an actual ice cream cone. It is just a little too sweet for my liking (similar to how sugar free tastes).;;;

name: Americone Dream,sharmila,2020-01-12,5,,0,0,"This is my favorite flavor from Ben and Jerry! It taste amazing and definitely worth it. However because of the brand, a small pint is about $5 which is a bit expensive for such a small size.";;;
Americone Dream
author: courtneyrf356
text;;;: Vanilla ice cream. Chocolate covered waffle cone pieces. Caramel. Perfect ice cream for people that don't like super sweet foods and they put a decent amount of pieces and caramel into them!;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: noturbttrcup
text;;;: Rich and creamy! Quality ingredients! Affordable and the perfect size for a few snacks during the week. All the little additions to this ice cream are delicious! I love Ben and Jerrys!;;;

name: Americone Dream,rochellem1,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"This is definitely not a ""healthy"" treat, but it is worth every calorie when I've had a bad day and need a pick-me-up. If you get a chance to try this flavor, go for it. Treat yourself!!";;;
Americone Dream
author: brandyd23
text;;;: Delicious!! Sweet vanilla ice cream with chocolate covered waffle cone bits?? Whats not to love. It was super tasty and is a great flavor for people who do not prefer chocolate ice creams;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: robinf15
text;;;: The only way you can go wrong with BJs is if youre lactose intolerant- Other than that your stuff is the best so delicious so many wonderful ingredients put inside these packages of yummy;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: ltuinen
text;;;: One of my favorite Ben & Jerry's flavors. I love ice cream with lots of texture and the crunchy bits in this are so delicious and add a lot of variety to it. Definitely buying this again.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: kimma527
text;;;: This is my favorite flavor of Ben & Jerry's. It doesn't hurt that I also enjoy Steven's shows. I buy it at the store when it goes on sale usually. I love the waffle cone pieces the best!;;;

name: Americone Dream,,2020-07-30,5,,0,0,"One of my favorite ice creams. The flavor combos sound weird, but it all works together. The saltiness from the caramel works with the crunchiness of the waffle cone bits. Delicious!";;;

Americone Dream,oneday,2020-07-26,3,,0,0,"This was a festive surprise flavor choice. The ice cream tastes good, its sweet and the cone is soft rather than crunchy but tasty if youre stuck at home craving a tasty, sweet cone!";;;
Americone Dream
author: colet1
text;;;: Ben and Jerrys are definitely one of the top ice cream makers out there. Nothing like going to the frozen isle in the grocery store and grabbing a pint of Ben and Jerrys. Delicious.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: theresaebc99
text;;;: I love the waffle cone pieces in it and the ice cream is creamy. The flavor of this is yummy with everything it has in it. This is my go to for when I want good ice cream at home.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: emilyt57
text;;;: I like this ice cream! Im just not much of a vanilla person. The mix ins are tasty though. Not sure if I would buy again but if its in front of me Id definitely eat it all haha;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: emilyce40e
text;;;: I love Americone Dream! It's perfect because I love icecream cones but who likes to buy cones?? And on a hot day you can put have a sweet cone and it wont drip on your hands.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: glitterfaecat
text;;;: I found this ice cream at Walmart during the Summer of 2019. Its got the perfect blend of crunch from the cone pieces and the ice cream tastes so good. One of my favorites.;;;

name: Americone Dream,roslynb,2019-12-09,5,,0,0,"My favorite flavor! Lots of goodies in it: waffle cone pieces, nuts, caramel, chocolate syrup... so good! Truly a dream! Give me a spoon and a good movie and Im in heaven!";;;
Americone Dream
author: mallorys1
text;;;: All time FAVORITE ben and jerry’s flavor! I pick it almost every time I have ben and jerry’s because you just can’t go wrong. The pieces of waffle cone totally make it.;;;

name: Americone Dream,,2020-02-06,5,,0,0,"Americone Dream is my guilty pleasure! It has caramel and ice cream cone pieces, so delicious. Plus, Stephen Colbert is hilarious and I really enjoy watching his shows.";;;
Americone Dream
author: KellyCrayon
title: My Favorite!
text;;;: My absolute favorite of all of Ben and Jerry's flavors. When the Colbert Report ended I was really upset bevause I thought they would end up getting rid of the flavor.;;;

name: Americone Dream,cassandrak4,2019-06-23,5,,0,0,"I love this flavor!! It hits ask the right points...except, of course, if you want anything other than high calorie!! It's just what you get for something like this.";;;
Americone Dream
author: jerry
title: Not very good
text;;;: This ice cream does not taste good. My son tasted it and he had to spit it out.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: gloriajenette
text;;;: Possibly my favorite Ben and Jerrys flavor next to the Ron Burgundy Scotch Scout Scotch. I love the bites of waffle cone mixed in that gives it a wee bit of texture.;;;

name: Americone Dream,Garlick,2018-10-29,5,The sweat crunchy gooey addiction,0,0,"This is my goto flavor. For a reward. For antidepressant. For anti-road rage. For ""shucks that didn't work"". For ""ok where did i park the car, dag nabit i took uber""";;;
Americone Dream
author: samb_23
text;;;: ben and jerrys is my FAVORITE ice cream brand! they have the best flavors and so many to choose from! the ice cream is a bit expensive but totally worth the price!;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: maddik
text;;;: I really like this flavor. All of the fun of a cone without a cone? I can buy one pint and enjoy a Drunstick without having to actually buy a box of 6 drumsticks.;;;

name: Americone Dream,mollyp4,2019-05-01,5,,0,0,"probably my favorite ben & jerrys flavor, it has a variety of toppings in it and i like that. i wish it came in smaller servings, kind of like how hagen dazs has.";;;

Americone Dream,donnas81,2020-06-29,5,,0,0,"I dont remember much about this ice cream other than I loved it, then couldnt find it, then was told by my doctor to watch my carbs. Sad time for me all around.";;;
Americone Dream
text;;;: Hands down my favorite ice cream flavor. Vanilla ice cream with fudge covered waffle cone pieces and Carmel. How can you say no to this flavor? Creamy and yummy;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: bayareajessa
text;;;: Something about the combination of the caramel and the pieces of ice cream cone makes the perfect combo! The ice cream bar variety of this is fantastic as well.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: ryanh12d3
text;;;: The crunchy pieces of cone in this flavor are so good! They really add to the flavor and I wasnt expecting it. Tastes just like an ice cream cone with caramel.;;;
