name: Americone Dream,emmypigs,2020-04-17,5,,0,0,"I love this flavor- and Im not even an ice cream cone person! In this context, it just works. Vanilla ice cream with fudge, caramel, and ice cream cone chunks";;;

Americone Dream,carleyjosouza,2020-04-03,5,,0,0,"This is my absolute favorite flavor of Ben & Jerrys! The chocolate waffle cone pieces, caramel and ice cream are just so perfect together. Highly recommend!";;;
Americone Dream
author: jayrock0816
text;;;: My absolute favorite ben and Jerry's ice cream ever!! It tastes so good and I LOVE that it has crunchy pieces of waffle cone in it!! The texture is amazing.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: cammyh1
text;;;: This is one of the best ice creams I eat. In between on price affordable and pricey! No improvement! Maybe make tubs of them. Doesnt compare to any others!!;;;

name: Americone Dream,angeleyez314,2020-07-25,3,,0,0,"It's ok, I've had better but overall I'd try it again just to make sure I have the same opinion of it. I like the combination of ingredients that are in it";;;

Americone Dream,kaylab259,2020-07-29,4,,0,0,"Great ice cream, nice base good add ins would be improved by more waffle cones and caramel swirl. Personally dont love plain vanilla so add ins are a must!";;;
Americone Dream
author: adugee15
text;;;: This tastes amazing! The flavor is on point my main love for B&J is the range of flavors and the ice cream is loaded with different toppings which I love.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: kelseyb73
text;;;: Husbands favorite. Tastes good. Not too sweet and doesnt get old fast. Only buy in special occasions though bc its so expensive I cannot otherwise justify;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: nic91x2
text;;;: Yall are sleeping on this flavor if you havent tried it yet. Vanilla ice cream with fudge covered waffle cone pieces and a caramel swirl. Thank me later.;;;

name: Americone Dream,alwaysyoungxoxo,2020-07-26,4,,0,0,"Love Ben & Jerry ice cream, & I love in Vermont so its cheap out this way! Also you can tour where they make the ice cream & it smell so good in there!!!";;;
Americone Dream
author: harlequinnkitty
text;;;: This is my current favorite. It hits all the points I want in an ice cream. The waffle cone is the best part. I will always grab this is it's available.;;;

name: Americone Dream,Bambi91,2019-01-24,5,Best Ice Cream in the WORLD!,0,0,"If you have never eaten this ice cream and you love toppings - you are missing out. It is the perfect blend of ice cream, chocolate crunch and caramel.";;;
Americone Dream
author: megansage23
text;;;: My all time favorite flavor from Ben and Jerrys. The waffle cone was always my favorite part so its nice to have this to take home and eat when I want!;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: lizzg6a5e
text;;;: The best tasting ice cream!!! Love some Ben and Jerrys!!! Definitely not for someone who is counting cals or sugars. Great deal when b1g1 at Publix!;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: alexisf55
text;;;: Love this newer flavor! The waffle cone pieces make the perfect crunch. Had this while at the factory in Vermont and has been my new favorite flavor.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: katiem25
text;;;: One of my favorite ice cream flavors of all time! It’s a great one to pick up at 7-11 for a treat and is the perfect amount of chocolatey and sweet.;;;

name: Americone Dream,maeisham,2019-10-22,5,,0,0,"This is my FAVORITE ice cream ever. I can literally eat this EVERYDAY. It delicious, I found out about it on YouTube and been eating it ever since.";;;
Americone Dream
author: alexandriakells
text;;;: This is my FAVORITE ice cream. I love the cone pieces throughout because it adds some extra texture (plus the cone is the best part in my opinion)!;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: starkid_paige
text;;;: Great flavors and texture. I love the mix of crunchy cone pieces in the ice cream as well. Plus you can get it in the handheld bar options as well!;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: una_dolcevita
text;;;: Ben and Jerry's has the best pint ice cream hands down. I absolutely love this flavor when I want some crunch to go with my sweet this is a go to.;;;

name: Americone Dream,megang96b8,2020-07-22,4,,0,0,"Americone Dream has all the best stuff: caramel swirl and chocolate covered waffle cone. This is my go to ice cream flavor, I get it all the time!";;;
Americone Dream,krystakaay13,2020-07-28,5,,0,0,"My Favorite flavor, the most mix ins of any brand and the best quality ice cream. A litttle pricey but well worth the price for this deliciousness";;;
Americone Dream
author: maddiehc201
text;;;: Is definitely a really good concoction of things in this ice cream so youre in for a surprise with basically every bite! I definitely recommend it;;;

name: Americone Dream
text;;;: This favor is sooooo delicious! You can only find this flavor at certain grocery store and even the actual Ben and Jerry store. Highly recommend!;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: jaylynnp1
text;;;: My Absolutly favorite pricey expensive treat but very worth it. My favorite is half baked and its like heaven in my mouth and it personal serving;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: es_mayo91
text;;;: Oh my God its the best I know a lot of calories just dont read the label its my favorite I live to feel the pieces of cones on the the ice cream;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: Jjmcphe
title: Practically perfect in every way
text;;;: This ice cream flavor is perfectly delicious without being too sweet or going overboard. Please don’t ever mess with this level of perfection!!;;;

name: Americone Dream,sarahccc53,2019-12-26,5,,0,0,"Aside from loving this pun, the ice cream is awesome. I love the mix of creamy and crunchy bits. The bits of waffle cone are my favorite part";;;
Americone Dream
author: md_410
text;;;: This is the flavor I reach for EVERY single time I want Ben & Jerrys. My friend introduced me to it and I havent picked a different flavor yet.;;;

name: Americone Dream
text;;;: Americone Dream is hands down my favorite Ben and Jerrys flavor. My only complaint would be that it is sometimes difficult to find in my area.;;;

name: Americone Dream,justinc18,2020-06-17,5,,0,0,"From vanilla ice cream to chocolate covered chocolate waffle cones, this ice cream is a home run. Its a balance of sweet, savory and crunchy!";;;

Americone Dream,Lori H,2019-08-24,5,WOW is this delicious!,0,0,"I love Colbert, and the ""Americone Dream"" flavor bearing his photo is outstanding! Just the right about of sweet with a little bit of crunch.";;;
Americone Dream
author: bethlovesfreestuff
text;;;: This is so good. My favorite. Its the vanilla fudge ripple with small bits of waffle cone mixed in. Nothing like Netflix and Ben and Jerrys.;;;

name: Americone Dream,londonfp0429,2020-02-28,5,,0,0,"I really really love this flavor. Its delicious and the chocolately pieces of cone in there is just perfect, adds some crunch and I love it.";;;

Americone Dream,Xsar27,2019-02-24,5,My one of my favorites!,0,0,"Wow Ben and Jerry got this one on point! The perfect amount of carmel, and crispy sugar cone dipped in fudge! This one is hard to put down!";;;
Americone Dream
author: superpremium
title: Great
text;;;: Not every ice cream needs a lot going on. This is the perfect example. Lots of delicious caramel swirl and waffle cone pieces are awesome.;;;

name: Americone Dream,amys289,2020-07-28,5,,0,0,"Who doesn't want waffle cone in their ice cream? Tastes just like the waffle cone filled with ice cream, only WITHOUT the mess! Win! Win!";;;
Americone Dream
author: amoreno___
text;;;: I love Ben and Jerrys ice cream so much and this is definitely my number one go to flavor. It is the perfect mix of crunch and sweetness.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: beckier3
text;;;: This flavor is my go to!! Its so good and makes you just wanna keep eating! Ben&Jerrys is a little pricey but the flavor makes up for it!;;;

name: Americone Dream,glamchik99,2018-07-06,4,,0,0,"I love Been & Jerry's ice cream. This flavor is good, but it does not compare to the Kaberry Kaboom ice cream that had pop rocks in it.";;;
Americone Dream
author: emilymaxinemontville
text;;;: This ice cream is one of my favorite Ben and Jerry flavors! So crunchy with the cone pieces and so yummy! Great if you love ice cream!;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: courtneysf1ff
text;;;: I love these! There is so much personality and depth in the flavoring! I really enjoy eating these and I always feel satisfied after!;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: kelsey_cureton
text;;;: Im not a big ice cream person but when Im craving some I always choose this flavor! Its so good and the pieces of cone are soooo good;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: angelinaf1
text;;;: This is one of my go to choices for Ben and Jerrys. I love the chocolate dipped cone chunks. I wish I had a pint right now honestly.;;;

name: Americone Dream
text;;;: This is my favorite flavor of Ben and Jerrys ice cream. Everything inside blends so well together and makes such a delicious flavor!;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: maestroa
text;;;: I love using this product! It taste really well and it is very affordable! I have purchased this and used it with my whole family !;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: cosmichildatx
text;;;: Life this is life lol creamy and paked with flavors and textures. No matter what you enjoy there is a flavor mix for you. So yummy.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: gingerbreadhau5
text;;;: This was way better than I thought it would taste. It was kinda expensive but I would definitely buy it again 10/10 hella recommend;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: baileykc021
text;;;: This is my boyfriend and I's favorite Ben and Jerrys to grab. The combination isnt too over powering and its perfect for cravings.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: rburnet28
text;;;: I love Ben and Jerry's! It's a great brand and I love their mission. Their ice cream flavor names are great and enjoyable to have.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: apoorvag
text;;;: Its my all the time favorite Ben and Jerrys flavor. It has the perfect balance of flavor and hits the spot when you need ice cream;;;

name: Americone Dream,Lorccan,2020-06-30,5,Delicious!,0,0,"I love the combination of flavors - enough chocolate to satisfy a craving, but lighter and more interesting than plain chocolate.";;;
Americone Dream,kailaecdb2,2019-02-05,5,,0,0,"If my husband and I want a snack on cheat day, this is our at home go to! Its simple yet amazing, and its hard to stop eating it!";;;
Americone Dream
author: amirachenelle
text;;;: Yummy yummy yummy. Ben & Jerrys is my favorite ice cream of all time. Tastes great and is filled with so much chunks of goodness.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: amandalb4ef
text;;;: This ice cream is my second favorite Ben & Jerrys flavor at first I didnt want to like this but it ended up being a great choice.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: ru11
text;;;: Ben & Jerrys Americone Cream ice cream is amazing its a vanilla base ice cream with a bit of chocolate covered waffle cone in it;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: laurenp41
text;;;: all ben and jerry's flavors are great but this is one of my favorites. I usually splurge on it when it is on sale at the store.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: alyssak7e17
text;;;: This is a pretty good flavor. I like the Carmel and pieces of waffle cone. Maybe chunks of brownies or something would be good.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: aubreesfbd4
text;;;: This is definitely one of my favorite flavors of Ben & Jerry's ice cream. I've had it several times now & I love it every time.;;;

name: Americone Dream,elisabethnff0d,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"My absolute flavor with the yummy cone and caramel ! Its not super sweet and over powering , its so good to satisfy any craving";;;
Americone Dream
author: dorothyf98f0
text;;;: This is my second favorite Ben and Jerry’s flavor! I love the waffle cone pieces inside. The mixture of flavors is just amazing;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: lorim63
text;;;: Flavorful explosion in your mouth. I really love it. It is delicious and I would recommend this to people who love ice cream.;;;

name: Americone Dream,alyssar147,2020-07-23,4,,0,0,"this ice cream is so good but so bad for you, i wish they made lower calorie ben and jerrys! i guess halo top will have to do!";;;
Americone Dream
author: leena2
text;;;: this one is so rich and delicious! definitely my go to! its a bit sweet so its one of the ice creams i would definitely ration;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: thamara79db
text;;;: Yum! What ice cream isn't good from their brand? They taste delicious! Perfect size! The name is nice. Always a nice treat.;;;

name: Americone Dream,Jillybeany1982,2017-08-02,5,Beyond Delicious!,0,1,"This is my favorite flavor! I can't stop eating once I start, which is bad for my waistline but great for my tastebuds. Yum!";;;
Americone Dream,katelyns5821,2020-04-25,5,,0,0,"i swear this is the best ice cream i ever had. its soo good it has caramel, waffle cone pieces that are covered in chocolate";;;
Americone Dream
author: dannac1
text;;;: Not as good as Haagen Dazs caramel cone. There isnt too much flavor and its mostly just vanilla ice cream with some chunks.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: hema711
text;;;: My favorite flavor of Ben & Jerrys. It has the perfect amount of everything. So hard to not finish the pint in one sitting.;;;

name: Americone Dream,peria1,2020-07-26,3,,0,0,"The flavor is honestly just eh for me, but the fact that they come in individual serving size cups is super helpful & wise.";;;
Americone Dream,hollyrossip,2019-11-06,5,,0,0,"Ben and Jerrys has the best ice cream and flavors , the texture is amazing and the prove is affordable gives a good amount.";;;
Americone Dream
author: myriamdd3b3
text;;;: I didn’t expect this to be so good. The flavour and the price for it is worth the try because I know I’m buying this again;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: dahlsky
text;;;: My favorite Ben & Jerrys flavor! I love the combination of caramel and chocolate. I can eat the whole pint in one sitting.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: brookewallace52
text;;;: delicious!!! creamy and easy to scoop! always have some in my freezer!! also great with the hard shell chocolate topping!;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: DrewBear
title: Outstanding

name: Americone Dream
author: martinatina1993
text;;;: I loved ben and jerry soooo much! I am now keto so I cant have it but it is one of the best brands of icecream out there!;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: nadinedc5ff
text;;;: AmeriCone Dream is LIFE! I LOVE when I find this on sale. Gift to a friend who loves I've cream and has never tried it;;;

name: Americone Dream
text;;;: this is my favorite ice cream of all time. everything about it is so amazing. the chocolate cones in it make it so good;;;

name: Americone Dream,fabiolaraquel,2020-07-28,3,,0,0,"I bought this flavor a day that Chunky Monkey was sold out. Although Americone Dream was not bad, it isnt my favorite.";;;
Americone Dream,stephi661,2019-05-03,5,,0,0,"My favorite flavor, it has waffle cones in it so it gives a little crunch to it. The best mixture of all my favorites.";;;
Americone Dream
author: Alexandra

text;;;: Every time I go to a scoop shop or the Vermont factory I get myself a big helping of Americone Dream. IT IS THE BEST.;;;

name: Americone Dream

text;;;: I love the mix of bits of sugar cones in the ice cream. Its a good balance of having both ice cream and cone in a cup;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: diningcondanielle

name: Americone Dream
author: alanal12ea
text;;;: My choice of ice cream! I love all of the different that are mixed in and the stripes of caramel make it even better!;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: taral38

name: Americone Dream
author: uhlecksis
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream. I stumbled across it one day with a friend and rarely get a different B and J flavor;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: peeps98

name: Americone Dream
author: itsdee
text;;;: Ben and Jerrys always has the most unique flavors and names for their ice cream. I recommend this slices as well.;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: stephanief94c0
text;;;: Americone Dream is God's gift to man. It is by far my favorite flavor even though sometimes it is hard to choose.;;;

name: Americone Dream

text;;;: This product is great for snacking. It is very delicious and it is my favourite.I would definitely buy this again;;;

name: Americone Dream

name: Americone Dream

name: Americone Dream
author: sydneyi1

name: Americone Dream

name: Americone Dream

text;;;: There just great and every knows it!! You can never go wrong to testing your self to a pint of Ben and Jerry’s;;;

name: Americone Dream
author: elb17b
text;;;: Americone Dream is such an amazing flavor - one of my absolute faves from B&J. Have bought this so many times;;;

name: Americone Dream,hannahdfa3f,2019-02-04,4,,0,0,"Could eat this all day long, my favorite part was the waffle cone pieces, it was the perfect afternoon snack.";;;

author: katya15
text;;;: I love this company and their ice cream. Always down to support Ben and Jerrys and eat some delish ice cream!;;;

name: Americone Dream

name: Americone Dream

name: Americone Dream

name: Americone Dream

name: Americone Dream

name: Americone Dream
author: micifu7
text;;;: This ice cream is my favorite ever. I love it!! It is my dessert after Dinner. It makes me crazy seriously;;;

name: Americone Dream,Drew C,2018-09-09,4,Quite Good!,0,0,"A unique and well-balanced combination of flavors. Quite good, really! I am pleased that I gave it a shot.";;;
Americone Dream
author: chelseae3
text;;;: Oh my gosh. Best ice cream out there the little chunks of cone really make this ice cream worth the money;;;

name: Americone Dream

name: Americone Dream
author: ashleymc213

name: Americone Dream

name: Americone Dream
author: bby_gails
text;;;: My favorite ice cream ever! Has a lot of stuffs in it and i miss eating it alot. Too sweet but worth it;;;

name: Americone Dream

title: BEST FLAVOR!!:)
text;;;: I love finding this in the freezer just sitting there waiting for me to eat it. I RECOMMEND IT TO YOU!!;;;

name: Americone Dream

name: Americone Dream

name: Americone Dream
author: miaberg13

name: Americone Dream

name: Americone Dream

name: Americone Dream

name: Americone Dream

name: Bourbon Pecan Pie
author: Cduck
title: Tastes just like pecan pie!
text;;;: My husband and I loved this ice cream! The subtle bourbon flavor with the pecan chunks was superb!;;;

name: Bourbon Pecan Pie,bearwithme,2017-07-14,5,Love this!,7,0,"This flavor is amazing! I've only found one store in my area that sells it and I stock up. I've never been a huge pecan ice cream fan before, but I really can't get enough of this one.";;;
Bourbon Pecan Pie
author: Twilli31
title: Best of both worlds!
text;;;: Being from southwest Louisiana we love our pecan pie and ice cream. This ice cream has all the flavor of the south. Always heartbreaking when the store is out of their limited stock of it. Please ship it to my house all year long lol;;;

name: Bourbon Pecan Pie,busymom,2017-05-22,5,So tasty,8,2,"I love this ice cream! The first bite always tastes sweet with a hit of bourbon, then add in the nuts, and the short bread, and you have delicious complexity, with a nice crunch.";;;

Bourbon Pecan Pie,b j,2018-11-04,5,My favorite!,2,0,"I love love love this ice cream! It's got a great balance of flavors and textures, and the hints of bourbon are just right. I would eat this all day, every day, if I could get away with it.";;;
Bourbon Pecan Pie
author: Storm
title: Southern Style Ice Cream
text;;;: Bourbon Pecan Pie Ice Cream can't get enough. The bourbon makes the ice cream.;;;

name: Bourbon Pecan Pie
author: KimBeth
title: Yee Haw!
text;;;: Excellent ice cream! Whiskey can sometimes overpower all the ingredients--this ice cream has a great balance of flavor and the whiskey is not to overpowering. Here is the problem--I bought this ice cream in an outlet store in California so I fear that Bourbon Pecan Pie will be in the Ben & Jerry flavor grave yard soon. It was a great flavor while it lasted though.;;;

name: Bourbon Pecan Pie
author: Love
title: Disappointing bourbon pecan pie ice cream
text;;;: I absolutely HATE this ice cream I thought they brought bake SOUTHERN PECAN PIE!!!! That's why I bought this bourbon mess it's not even close to being as good as the southern pecan pie ice cream I'm from Dallas Tx I know pecan pie when I taste it this ice cream didn't do it for me I will be returning it way too much Carmel in the ice cream it's self I've had better Ben and jerrys ice cream;;;

name: Bourbon Pecan Pie,CP93,2020-03-01,5,One of my top two favorites,0,0,"This is one of my top two favorite flavors from B&J, and the other is long gone (the late, lamented Wavy Gravy).";;;
Brewed to Matter
author: JBlack16
title: Very Impressed
text;;;: I love Brewed to Matter! So thing about the coffee ice cream mixed with brownie batter and chocolate chunks does it for me. Although I am worried with it being a exclusive flavor it may be discontinued. Please keep this in the Ben and Jerry’s line up!;;;

name: Brewed to Matter,VanessaB99,2020-03-24,2,Unbalanced and disappointing,0,3,"I can see that the inspiration for this flavor came from a fancy coffee drink like a frozen mocha or Frappuccino. However the balance of flavors & textures is off for my taste. There's not enough coffee flavor. The coffee flavor would be improved by using the cold brew method instead of coffee extract. The extract brings an unpleasant aftertaste. The chocolate chunks are too big and dominating. There's not enough brownie swirl and it's not as prominent of ""brownie"" flavor or texture as in other pints. While this flavor idea is good, I think the execution definitely needs to be adjusted. I still love Ben & Jerry's! I'm just not a fan of this pint.";;;
Brewed to Matter,Alex,2017-04-20,5,The perfect flavor,13,0,"Okay Ben and Jerry's, you can stop making new flavors. This one is perfect.";;;
Brewed to Matter
author: iamright
title: Perfect
text;;;: My girlfriend isn't a fan of this and I think that she is so wrong in every regard that I am writing this review just out of spite and also because this is the perfect ice cream and deserves all of the stars.;;;

name: Brewed to Matter,anon,2017-10-30,5,Best flavor on the planet,5,0,"This is by far my favorite flavor, of all time. A decade ago, brownie batter was a flavor that was available as pints and I would get that and eat around the fudge brownie chunks because it was worth it. But this flavor is everything. Please never stop making this flavor! It is the end all be all of flavors. Thank you so much for making this ice cream!!";;;

Brewed to Matter,Lexi,2017-08-31,5,Amazing,3,0,"I bought this flavor one time at Target because it was the closest one to a java chip flavor, and it changed my life. It was so good. I searched up and down for it though and couldn't find it for a few months in any other store, and since then had moved. I just found it tonight in another target location and jumped for joy in the store. My favorite ice cream flavor by far! Wish it came in a bigger size...";;;

Brewed to Matter,BeachChick017,2018-04-12,5,My All Time Favorite,2,0,"I absolutely love this flavor. It is beyond perfect and no other flavor can even begin to compare! Unfortunately, it is an exclusive flavor only sold at Target. I’ll buy 2 or 3 when I find them in stock. I will go out of my way to go to target specifically for this flavor and 4 out of 5 times, they are out of the flavor. And the stock guy told me that there isn’t any on order and none coming with the next delivery. Can anybody please help!";;;
Brewed to Matter
author: Jjphoenix21
title: Have never love Ice cream so much
text;;;: I absolutely love this flavor! I have never loved a flavor as much as brewed to matter. My son loves it as well. As someone mentioned before I can only purchase at 1 store and I ask at all the other stores that are closer to order it. I never have seen it at those stores. But we absolutely LOVE THIS ONE!!!!!;;;

name: Brewed to Matter,antaresoceana,2020-03-26,5,So Have a Pint of Ice Cream and Catch Your Breath,0,0,"I should heed my own advice because this flavour truly took my breath away. Coffee ice cream is my all-time, hands-down favourite type of ice cream that is reliably available. Coffee ice cream with chocolate syrup to be specific. So this pint? It does it all for me man. It does all of the heavy lifting, it unscrews the jar lids that are on too tight, and it even pumps my gas for me when it's raining out. I didn't even need to think about exerting an iota of effort to get the flavour profile of this pint exactly where I wanted it. Didn't even need to turn location services on. A++";;;

Brewed to Matter,FuzzyGut,2018-10-02,4,Yum,1,0,"Nothing wrong here! Yummy coffee ice cream base and a great tasting fudge swirl. The chocolate chunks are a good addition. Not my favorite flavor (I mean, how many favorites can someone have?) but definitely yummy and satisfying if you’re craving coffee and fudge flavors!";;;
Brewed to Matter
author: Tubs123
title: Reminds me of mocha
text;;;: I really liked this coffee flavor! I have tried a few of the other coffee flavors and this one is probably my favorite! There was plenty of brownie swirl and fudge chunks that paired really well with the coffee ice cream! I would definitely try this flavor again!;;;

name: Brewed to Matter
author: j_judd29
title: Best flavor of all Time
text;;;: I love coffee ice cream and I usually by a store brand one called java chunk that is similar but once I tried brewed to matter I'll never go back. I love everything about it and I hope it never goes away please tell me this is going to stick around!!!!!;;;

name: Brewed to Matter
author: Arpanda88
title: My new favorite!
text;;;: So my favorite ice cream flavor has always been coffee. But my favorite Ben and Jerry’s flavor has always been chocolate fudge brownie. This ice cream brings favorites together! Please make this a permanent fixture in the Ben and Jerry’s line up!;;;

name: Brewed to Matter
author: Birdmann
title: Draws us to Target
text;;;: A wonderful coffee and chocolate ice cream with a nice mix of flavors and textures. We shop at Target sometimes just because that's the only place we can get it. Our favorite B&J flavor since Toffee Heath Bar Crunch went away.;;;

name: Brewed to Matter
author: TexasMom
title: The most perfect ice cream.
text;;;: I make up reasons to go to Target to get this ice cream. It is simply perfect. I keep thinking it will get old and I will switch to my other favs. But I just.... never.... do.;;;

name: Brewed to Matter
author: Dianamal
title: AMAZINGGGG!
text;;;: A coffee and chocolate lovers dream in ice cream form. Coffee flavor infuses your mouth as decadent chocolate chunks deliver a dessert worthy of all your money! Love it!;;;

name: Brewed to Matter,tin420,2019-02-06,5,the indisputable CHAMP,0,0,"let me start by saying that i've literally never written an internet review in my life, but this stuff is so good that here i am, pleading ben & jerry's to never discontinue this flavor... i've been loyal to b&j's for many years but never have i been so loyal to a single pint before. this incredible combo of coffee and brownie batter plagiarized straight from my DANG DREAMS. honestly i should take y'all to court for stealing my heart. brewed to matter 4evr.";;;
Brewed to Matter
author: Sam222
title: Easily in my top 3 favorites
text;;;: This flavor is my go to at my local Target. Recently the past 3 times I bought this flavor there is very little brownie batter and an abundance of fudge chucks. Which is disappointing because the brownie batter is the best part!;;;

name: Brewed to Matter,Phish Food Fan,2019-02-07,5,Coffee? Fudge Yes!,0,0,"This is just a really great flavor! Ben and Jerry’s does the best coffee ice cream base flavors of brand available and this is no exception. The fudge flakes taste great and give a textural contrast to the smooth, creamy ice cream. The brownie-fudge is, of course, delicious and completes a perfect pint. If you like coffee and fudge then take a trip over to Target and grab a pint or 4.";;;

Brewed to Matter,Laurennicole328,2018-12-14,5,Literally my new favorite!,0,0,"Just found this in my local target, and while I already had 3 other pints in my freezer of other flavors at home, I needed to try this one because it has everything I love in it. Needless to say, it did not disappoint and I can't wait to make another trip to target to get more of this delicious flavor.";;;

Brewed to Matter,drake,2019-06-14,5,One of my favorite flavors!,0,0,"I tried this for the first time last night, and I was pleasantly surprised! The coffee taste and the fudge chunks were especially nice and delicious. I would say that this pint is one of my favorite flavors now! Also, sponsor me pls";;;
Brewed to Matter
author: LeelooDallas22
title: OMCoffee!!!!
text;;;: Yesss!!! Finally a coffee ice cream with delicious mixins!!! I'm giving it 5 stars bc its the best flavor you've got even though it would be better with cookie dough instead of brownie batter!!;;;

name: Brewed to Matter
author: Rachrach
title: best ice cream ever!
text;;;: I love love love this new flavor! The coffee is perfect and the brownie batter swirl and fudge chunks really take it up to the next level! I really hope this exclusive flavor is staying!;;;

name: Brewed to Matter,MamaD,2018-05-30,5,Good Stuff,0,0,"I think this flavor, which was my all time favorite about 25 years ago, use to be Cappacino Commotion. But I'm not certain. But I do know for sure that this stuff is good!";;;
Brewed to Matter
author: Lucy123
title: Best ice cream ever
text;;;: This is now my favorite ice cream to buy a the grocery! The only thing that would make this better would be chocolate sandwhich cookie crumbles :);;;

name: Brewed to Matter
author: Courtney
title: Yum!
text;;;: Reminds me of the old Vermonty Python flavor sold years ago. Perfect combination of flavors. Definitely a keeper!;;;

name: Brewed to Matter
author: Taylor
title: FANTASTIC!
text;;;: My favorite flavor ever! I tell all my friends & family to try it. I've even eaten it for breakfast.;;;

name: Brewed to Matter
author: Coffeewoman
title: Love Coffee
text;;;: Perfect balance of coffee and chocolate swirl <3 . Please donot discontinue !;;;

name: Brewed to Matter
author: Rerecass
title: AMAZING
text;;;: Search no more for thE. Best. Ice. Cream. EVER.;;;

name: Brewed to Matter
author: Lolly
title: Coffee Ice cream lover
text;;;: Best coffee flavor from Ben & Jerry. Wish they make more coffee flavors;;;

name: Brewed to Matter,Nini1991,2018-05-28,4,Yummy,0,1,"Very tasty! Add some chopped almonds, and we'd have perfection!";;;
Brewed to Matter
author: Abbylindbloom
title: Love
text;;;: this flavor tops all other ben and jerry flavors no doubt;;;

name: Brewed to Matter,Icecreamfan4life,2018-06-26,3,Le Sigh...,0,1,"Welp, I finally broke down and bought this flavor that I've often seen mentioned on the site(wasn't quite in my usual buying locales til recently). And figured since a friend of mine told me how awesome she found this flavor or I think another coffee flavor by B&J's to be really great. I figured I would give it a whirl and try it as a ""breakfasty"" sort of option for a change. I mean it has coffee in it right? Figured it would perk me up a bit more before work. Add in the chocolate and sugar in general, I figured I would be good to go. But unfortunately I was wrong. The coffee flavor wasn't quite as strong(save for on 2/3's of the top of the pint, to the point of me not being able to tell if the fudge pieces were plain fudge flavor or expresso flavored), even appreciated the thinner fudge pieces. But hardly got any of the brownie swirl flavor until I was a 1/4 of the way done with the pint. Not to mention, after consuming a good half of the pint before work, I would have thought I'd have some get up and go(which I tend to get in general off of coffee flavored ice creams). But I had a good 10 to 15 min bit of pep before I crashed and wanted to nap so hard even before I left the house. So in other words, me thinks this flavor is going to be a no can do for me in the future. And would recommend it to folks that like coffee flavored ice creams you can eat at night and still get a good night's rest afterward.";;;

Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,Bridgespo99997,2019-02-02,2,Could be amazing.,8,0,"The cheese cake ice creams could be amazing, but for some reason the one thing wrong with the ice cream is the cheesecake balls. The balls taste very chemical and just not right. Overall I scooped around them. While the carmel flavor really lacked in this ice cream, and the chocolate cookie swirl was very little and almost nonexistent. I am very disappointed with how all of the cheesecake truffles have turned out. Overall, the truffles ruin the ice cream and need to be reformulated. While I am disappointed that this ice cream lacked swirl and Carmel. What could be amazing, was ruined by lack of and truffles.";;;

Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,Tr6nce,2020-05-29,2,Flavor's okay but..,4,0,"The flavors work for the most part. Ben & Jerry's ice creams with the graham cracker swirl are my personal favorites but this one left much to be desired. My main problem are the truffles, in this flavor in particular. The truffles seem to be frozen until you bite into them and then it's soft. I can't really enjoy the truffles if I'm too worried about the cold shock to my gums from parts of the ice cream being unexpectedly frozen in random places. I'm used to thinks like strawberries in the cheesecake to be frozen, but then something like the truffles that should be soft like the cookie dough is frozen, I can't really enjoy it.";;;

Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,kuroyuuki,2018-06-11,3,Like everything but the cheesecake truffles,11,1,"First of all, let me just say that I love this truffle craze that has been going on and made a point to try every option. For this flavor, I love mostly everything about this: the ice cream, the swirls, the exterior of the truffles. However, I do not like the cheesecake interior of the truffles. The cheesecake flavoring is already there through the ice cream, but the cheesecake part of the truffles does not retain the coldness of the ice cream and doesn't fit. I think a chocolate interior would have probably worked better. Would not buy again unless I felt the desire to eat everything but the truffle.";;;

Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,MJamz,2020-04-17,4,Redemption!,1,0,"I feel like this remake of the old cheesecake truffle flavor totally snuck in under the radar--and a shame, because it's such an upgrade! Where the truffles were the downfall of the old version (no offense, Ben & Jerry), the new cheesecake pieces are exactly what I look for in a cheesecake ice cream mix-in. They're not liquidy and greasy like the truffles, but actually have a fluffy chew to them, and they taste great! A couple pieces even had a toasty crust on them. On the downside, the cookie crumble swirls were really thin, but I *almost* didn't even mind, because I came for the cheesecake on this one, and I got it!";;;

Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,TheFeistyTeddyBear,2019-07-03,1,Definitely misses the mark.,4,6,"I bought this tonight for my mom and I. I couldn’t eat it. It’s some of the worst flavored ice cream I have had. The cookie crumbs do taste like cooking crumbs, gritty and all. The caramel flavor is very light barely there. The cheesecake truffle pieces are terrible. I love cheesecake, I bake wonderful cheesecakes, I hate the no bake style of cheesecake but these truffles are worse than that. They taste like someone took ice milk and mixed a dash a cream cheese in it. I was sorely disappointed. My mom did not enjoy it either. I have not idea what I am going to do with the stuff now but I’m certainly not going to eat it.";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: PepC
title: This ice cream is everything
text;;;: Wow this ice cream is so delicious .. I will definitely be buying more;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,kdawg,2018-07-03,5,Carmel Chocolate Cheesecake,10,1,"First time trying it yesterday.. a little embarrassed to admit i""m definitely going to buy another as soon as I'm out of work today! So much flavor but not too sweet, the truffles covered in gram crackers have to be my favorite part";;;

Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,FuzzyGut,2019-07-03,2,Boring,10,4,"See, here is my issue: if I’m going to spend 1200 calories in one sitting on ice cream (and we all eat the whole pint) after working hard to burn enough calories to eat it, I want to melt at the first bite and feel the euphoria with every spoonful, and SO many Ben and Jerry’s flavors do that for me. But when a flavor is just ok, there is no way I’m going to eat it. There was nothing wrong really, with this flavor but I found the ice cream grainy and the flavor boring, and the truffles just didn’t do it for me. I LOVE Ben and Jerry’s, the pints are my favorite ways to spend my calories but I can’t justify eating a boring one. My wife liked it well enough but she wasn’t wowed either. I remember my first bites of Phish Food, Half Baked, one sweet world and so many others that just made me melt into a pool of euphoric joy and that’s what I need from my pints.";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Ice cream man
title: Amazing!
text;;;: Soooooo good! Cookie bits are good! Cheesecake bites are good!;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Melissa98
title: BEST FLAVOR
text;;;: This is the best flavor ben and Jerrys has ever come out with.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,ChrisColby,2018-04-14,4,The best of the truffle lineup.,3,0,"Fantastic flavor. The caramel addition to the cheesecake base makes it stand out far more than B&J's other cheesecake flavors. That flavor is made even stronger by the cheesecake truffles. The graham cracker and cookie crumbs complement each other perfectly, and the overall flavor is accurate to the real thing. Thank goodness the best cheesecake flavor is not a limited batch.";;;

Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,Kalidoscope,2019-06-09,5,Like nothing you've ever tasted,0,0,"I don't know HOW anybody could hate on this icecream, it's the best thing that's ever happened! The cheesecake bits are creamy that literally melt in your mouth, the icecream is like no basic flavor that you've ever had, and the cookie bits pull it all together to ensure you never get a boring bite! My absolute FAVORITE flavor, never change Ben & Jerry's";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Olesik
title: My new favorite!
text;;;: I have been buying this one every single time I get Ben and Jerrys. I have probably bought it a good 20 times. The first time i don't think I liked it because it had a weird flavor but it really grew on me. I don't think it taste like caramel or cheesecake at all I really don't know what it taste like exactly but I love the cookie swirl and those balls I love them theu don't taste like cheesecake either and can't even describe what they do taste like it's like they made a really weird but awesome flavor but put it in the wrong container. Love it though I hope they don't discontinue.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,icecreamislife15,2018-08-09,3,Review Echo - Loved all but the CheeseCake Truffel,2,0,"I am going to completely echo the review of kuroyuuki below. This ice-cream is lovely, the cookie crumbles are nice and sweet, the caramel is perfectly subtle. The Cheese Cake Truffles, however, are almost sour in contrast. Unlike most ice cream ""goodies"" that I dig for (i.e. cookie dough chunks, brownie bits), I find myself trying to spoon around the cheese cake.";;;

Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,Rosey,2018-09-10,2,Cheesecake truffles taste...tastless?,2,0,"I purchased this ice cream hoping to find a replacement for Cheesecake Brownie since Ben and Jerry's is discontinuing that flavor. I am famous for finishing their pints in one sitting (I know, I am grossly unhealthy). Anyhow, I got through half the pint and had to throw the rest away. Very disappointing.";;;

Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,Sali,2018-05-09,5,Amazing Ben and Jerry never fails me,2,0,"This is an ice cream I have been waiting to have I always felt I had to choose between strawberry cheesecake, American dream and cookie core, but now I have this! Rich flavor and extremely generous with cheesecake and cookie ratio. It is so smooth! This will forever be my go to ice cream and flavor";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: CatB
title: Disappointing
text;;;: The cheesecake bits tasted weird? Almost tasteless. The other truffle flavor is much better. I ended up throwing the rest of this pint away because I didn’t wanna waste the calories on it.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,kail,2018-06-25,3,Overall good taste,1,0,"I recently bought this flavor and was most looking forward to the graham cracker/cheesecake truffle. However, I was highly disappointed with the flavor of the truffle. The ice cream itself tastes a lot like cheesecake, but the pieces themselves do not. I’ve had the strawberry cheesecake flavor before, and those cheesecake pieces, from what I remember, tastes how I feel these pieces should as well. Not sure if I would rebuy, but I’m glad I at least tried it.";;;

Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,Ash5647,2019-08-27,2,Bad tasting cheesecake truffles,2,0,"The cheesecake truffles have a horrible taste, they almost taste like plastic. I had to eat around them! Ben & Jerry’s what happened to your awful tasting cheesecake truffles, everything else was delicious!";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: VIBookworm
title: Did not meet expectations
text;;;: The flavor made this a must try for me. I was sorely disappointed. The cookie swirls were the only thing I could taste. The truffles had no flavor and the caramel cheesecake flavor was barely noticeable.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,onders,2018-06-14,5,a perfect iced cream flavor for any human,3,1,"scientists have tried for thousands of years to create the best flavor of ice cream. now, with Ben & Jerry's Caramel Chocolate Truffles ice cream, those scientists can sleep easy. ben or jerry should delete any review that isnt 5/5 stars or higher.";;;

Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,ScarletC,2018-06-14,1,A spoonful of disappointment,2,6,"I bought this flavor like 30 minutes ago because ya girl is hungry asf and had just cried for 2 hours. I love the Salty Caramel Core to death but sadly, Publix was out. But a sad attempt to substitute my caramel craving, I bought this piece of garbage. This doesn’t even taste like caramel, cheesecake, or chocolate. It is a hot mess of a flavor and I could do without. I truly expected more and I am still craving caramel, sad to say that every spoonful brought me closer to tears from disappointment.";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: isabel
title: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake Truffles
text;;;: This ice cream is the best thing I’ve ever spent my money on. It is perfect in every way and each component works beautifully together. I know for a fact I will never find another ice cream better than this one. I buy a pint at least once a month(I would buy more often if the calories weren’t so high)! I often eat the whole thing at once because it’s so good. I also have a tree-nut allergy which makes it extremely difficult if not impossible to find fun ice cream flavors I can eat and this one is safe! It’s definitely a must try!!;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Raebirds
title: Poor execution
text;;;: This sounds more delicious than it actually is. The cheesecake bites don’t taste anything like cheesecake. I wish I could have my money back.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,Youdontneedtoknow,2018-04-08,3,Eh it’s okay,2,1,"I had to try this because I love cheesecake ice cream! The flavor of the icecream itself with the cookies is amazing! But honestly, the cheesecake bites ruined it for me. They just taste like balls of butter. They are not good at all. If those were changed this would probably be my favorite. Think about it Ben & Jerrys.";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: prefrosh
title: Ewwww
text;;;: My absolute favorite flavor is the strawberry cheesecake so I was so excited to try the chocolate cheesecake. I was so very disappointed to find that it was really just cookies n cream ice cream with little chunks of lard covered in graham dust.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,hsa13,2018-03-06,4,Excellent flavor,1,0,"The ice cream flavor and cookie swirl is phenomenal, but the cheesecake truffles in my pint had no flavor, which was disappointing. There weren’t very many truffles in the pint, however, so I couldn’t even complain much about them.";;;

Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,MzLissa,2020-03-17,1,Used to be amazing!,1,0,"This flavor WAS the most amazing thing I'd ever put in my mouth. BUT they changed the cheesecake bits and now its just not good anymore. It makes me so sad, I had FINALLY found my emotional crutch! Now, I have nothing again :(";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: UncleP
title: Bomb except..
text;;;: This ice cream is delicious but the truffles are gross kinda...they’re very cheesy and sour in an odd way. make them less cheesy or something and add way more chocolate cookie and this ice cream will be perfect;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,imjulz,2020-09-16,5,This is the first new flavor I have really liked!,0,0,"I thought this ice cream was delicious. I do see how some people wouldn't like the cheesecake bites because they are tart compared to the ice cream. The base tastes more like a rich vanilla than caramel but I found it to be very tasty. If B&J changes the cheesecake bites they will have more satisfied consumers. I'll just keep buying it until they discontinue it. With the exception of Americone Dream, Peanut Butter Cup, and Cherry Garcia every time I love a flavor they discontinue it.";;;

Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,Mandysaur,2020-01-29,5,My favorite flavor EVER!,1,0,"I ALWAYS keep this stocked in my freezer! Please don't ever discontinue it!! Has all of my favorite things all in one ice cream- cheesecake, caramel & chocolate cookie. SO delicious!!";;;

Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,Nazmia,2020-06-11,1,The flavor isn’t the same!,0,0,"I used to be obsessed with this flavor! I used to buy it 3-4 times a week! Then the stores stopped carrying it for a while and now I recently noticed target has it in stock but the cheesecake pieces are no longer covered in graham cracker and the the flavor just isnt the same. This was the only flavor ice cream I would buy, and it was totally worth every calorie. Unless they change it back to their old version, I unfortunately won’t be buying it. PLEASEEEEEEE MAKE IT THE WAY IT WAS!!";;;

Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,P0iS0n_1vY,2018-09-15,5,Nirvana,0,0,"No matter what the day, you will always find Ben & Jerry's pints in my freezer. I am always up for trying the new flavors and was excited to see this one at our grocery store. I mean caramel, chocolate, and cheesecake truffles...Come On! How can you not give the nod to this one? It has become one of my favorite flavors and obviously that of others as well since the quantities are always the most limited in the freezer case. Keep up the great work with the crazy good flavors!";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Naz815
title: The only ice cream I will ever eat!!!
text;;;: I have tried so many different brands and flavors of ice cream and I can honestly say This is hands down the best ice cream I have ever had in my life! The flavors are so perfect in every way and compliment eachother so well! I dont understand why Walmart & target near me stopped carrying it! I have been craving it so bad and refuse to eat anything else. I really liked cinnamon buns before trying this flavor and they dont sell that anymore either!! PLEASE BRING IT BACK!!!;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Driptodebroy
title: Surprisingly good
text;;;: I was a bit concerned there would be to much going on but honestly really solid. The cheesecake bites are very nice;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,Lyssi,2018-05-30,4,Flavor is good!,1,0,"The flavor and texture of the ice cream itself, but the cheesecake pieces are too hard and not up to par.";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Nmuir
title: BEST ICE CREAM EVER!
text;;;: I ate some of this 2 days ago OMG one of the best ice cream flavors I’ve ever had- IN MY LIFE.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: JADD
title: Truffle no
text;;;: No crazy about cheese cake bites and the rest ok prefer other flavors;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,Cat6,2020-01-07,5,The BEST,0,0,"After One Love stopped restocking, I didn’t think it was possible I would find another flavor to top it. But then I tried this. It is the absolute BEST flavor. Everything in it mixes perfectly together, and the cheesecake bites are melt in your mouth amazing. The only complaint I have is it’s been so hard to find anywhere near me. I’ve traveled to outside towns looking for this flavor with no luck. Please restock this is southwest Missouri!!!";;;

Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,There4IM,2019-05-09,2,"Disappointed in ""cheesecake""",0,0,"I'm just now dipping into Ben and Jerry's to find a favorite flavor. Based on the package description, I should have loved this. The caramel ice cream was a bit bland and could have been vanilla. The chocolate swirl was nice, and I would have enjoyed even more graham cracker. The ""cheesecake"" truffles were a real problem for me, tasting mostly of coconut oil. I'm going to continue my sampling, but the cheesecake flavors are out.";;;

Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,Olivia Valeria,2018-06-24,5,I skip all meals for this!,1,1,"Oh my goodness, I'm so hooked on this flavor that I'd rather eat this than dinner. I'm almost glad it goes so fast at the stores near me so I don't eat it so often... The cheesecake truffles in this are delicious and the caramel is not overwhelming, it's subtle but just the perfect combination!";;;

Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,Autumnlv82,2019-10-19,5,Best flavor ever,0,0,"This is the best icecream flavor I've ever had hands down! My husband has bought me atleast 10 pints because I've never had a icecream I love more and now I cant find it anywhere in my town. Makes me so sad. I'm craving it and I need it back in my life. Best flavor ever Ben & Jerry's, please never take this one away & please make it more available. Gilmer Texas to be exact. This is a winner";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Sam0505
title: My least favorite flavor I have tried
text;;;: The name sounded like something I would love. There was nothing chocolatey or caramelish about it. The cheesecake bites tasted like rotten milk. Not sweet at all. I definitely do not recommend this flavor.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Limesti
title: The best flavor ever!!!
text;;;: So I eat a couple pints of Ben and Jerry’s per night usually and I have to say that this is probably my favorite flavor! It’s soooo cheesecakey and amazing. Please make this flavor forever :-);;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Lizy1917
title: Best Ice Cream Ever
text;;;: I've eaten a lot of ice cream in my time and I've never had a favorite until now. This is the best ice cream i have ever had. The cheesecake bites are actually big sized piece and there aren't too many to over power the ratio. The three flavor just mix so perfectly together. I say if you like cheesecake and caramel you better go try this delicious flavor. BEST ICE CREAM EVER!;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,Stuart,2019-07-27,2,That's NOT Cheesecake!,0,0,"On the bright side, the ice cream was great. I would try other flavors with the same base.";;;

Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,superpremium,2018-05-06,4,Good!,0,0,"Enjoyed this flavor. Caramel cheesecake ice cream is smooth, extremely tasty, and both flavors are prominent. The cookie swirls are just as awesome as they are in tonight dough. The truffles were good and the cheesecake flavor was good, but the truffles did not add or take away anything. I didn't deem them necessary in this particular pint, but it is still a great flavor.";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Mandy27
title: Super good! Buying again!
text;;;: I just got this ice cream yesterday and it’s already gone! I really enjoyed the overall flavors. Very creamy and not over powering. It didn’t give me any gas problems(lactose intolerant). The only downer about the ice cream was the little white balls of cheesecake( wish it was a little sweet) but overall super good ice cream. I think it’ll be one of my favorites!;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Coyoterose
title: Cheesecake bits taste funny
text;;;: Wish I could say I liked this but the cheesecake bits had such an off flavor did not taste like cheesecake at all. Disappointed.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,DNA46n2,2018-12-03,4,Excellent not too sweet balance!,0,0,"Hubs brought this home when Americone Dream was out. I was skeptical because I don't love things super sweet. This was PERFECT! Varied textures (although it lacks a CRUNCH but thats ok) with lightly changing flavors. Not over powering sweet, I enjoyed the cheesecake pieces and like others could use a touch more of the graham but I will no doubt get again.";;;

Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,ClaudyMiami,2019-01-28,5,Best icream flavor to date!,0,0,"I accidentally bought this at my local cvs one night and saw it was new, so said “I love cheesecake, why not?” WOW Saddened to not find it in the store again but never in my life have I seached online to see where I can find an icecream flavor (lol) and this has inspired me to do just that! Another level delicious, hope this stays around!";;;

Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,Flavour connoisseur,2020-08-16,4,Good in theory,0,0,"The cookie swirl and ice cream base is delicious, the cheesecake, like everyone else has said, is not. Frozen cheesecake barely has any flavour and let’s be honest, cheesecake isn’t that good to begin with. If the cheesecake was replaced with cookie dough and a salted caramel swirl was added this would be the best ice cream... like ever.";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: NewFavNewFlav
title: Omgsh! Instantly became a favorite
text;;;: Purchased this flavor on a whim last night. Decided to taste it today & just like that I am a fan & will absolutely repurchase! I would like a little more cheesecake bites in the mix (because I enjoyed it so much) but I love the unique combination & how the flavors complement each other nonetheless. This one is definitely a keeper!;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,Lili,2018-06-19,5,Yes. Yes. Yes.,0,0,"This new flavor is amazing. I don't buy ice cream from the grocery store often. My all time favorite has been the turtle sundae from a local place or two, and not much can top it. Occasionally I buy a B&J pint and have found a few I really like, like salted caramel core. This new flavor has possibly risen to the top of the list.";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: tankdayglo
title: Coconut oil overpowers
text;;;: The overwhelming coconut oil flavor in the cheesecake truffles made this flavor unpleasant overall. I enjoyed the cookie swirl but the fake caramel cheesecake flavor of the base ice cream was also not great. If it had been a more simple base flavor & no coconut oil in the truffles this could have been a solid flavor.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Cleo
title: So GOOD!
text;;;: I was recommended this ice cream by a friend a few weeks ago and have been obsessed with it! I'm not at all ashamed to admit I have eaten at least 4 or 5 pints since then and its my new favorite flavor. The ice cream is light and sweet and the cookie swirl adds a nice crunch. Would definitely recommend!;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Justice2087
title: Needs more truffles!!!
text;;;: I bought one a month ago for the second time and it was cheesecake chocolate swirl after truffle after truffle greatness. Sadly I bought some recently and could hardly find any on the ones I bought but I could deny the cheesecake flavor you guys excel at. Love it!!!;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Shaila13
title: Delicious
text;;;: I buy this icecream every saturday as my cheat treat i don’t crave nothing else but this icecream and its just the perfect combination of cheesecake and icecream. I try to buy other flavors they are delicious but this one is hard not to buy and enjoy.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
title: I'm Eating it Now
text;;;: I'm eating it now and I haven't stopped. I do think it could taste more authentically like cheesecake AND also caramel...oh wait...I just bit into a cheesecake bite and now I do think it tastes pretty much just like cheesecake...cool...cool...;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Sk8djday
title: Best ice cream ever
text;;;: Bought this 3 times now. I love the chunkiness. There subtle salty almost sour of the cheesecake. And the chewiness of the larger chunky pieces. For a non peanut butter fan it is one of the only non chocolate based ice creams I like.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,Brea,2020-07-03,5,My favorite flavor!,0,0,"Not sure why this flavor doesn’t have better reviews. I love everything about it. The icecream, the cheesecake pieces, the chocolate cookie swirls... amazing! I will continue to buy it for sure. An overall great icecream in my opinion.";;;

Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,SugarFiend,2020-06-27,5,"Oh man, those cheesecake chunks are real!",0,0,Fat cheesecake chunks that haven’t disintegrated into the tasty caramel cheesecake ice cream. Great distribution of cookie crumbs. Went straight to the top of my favorite flavors. I eat it straight from the pint and don’t share!;;;

Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,Dash,2019-11-12,4,I will buy again,0,2,"Hello, this Ice cream was delicious to me and my boyfriend. However, I barely had any cheesecake pieces and the caramel was SUPER light. The formula should be revamped to include more cheesecake and caramel. Still good Though.";;;

Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,MagkMary,2020-04-12,4,Not the same,0,0,"I was reading the reviews on this, and most of them are for the Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake *Truffle* flavor. This is not the same flavor. It isn't bad, but it isn't as good as it's predecessor. =( I am bummed out.";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Rylariaizmik
title: What happened?
text;;;: This used to be my Friday night guilty pleasure when it was truffles and now I feel like I've wasted $4. Why was this changed? The cheesecake pieces are too big and the flavor is different. I won't be buying it again.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Cazz
title: Favorite flavor ever
text;;;: This is my absolute favorite flavor of any brand ice cream. My #1. BUT my local Walmart hasn’t had it the last few shopping trips which is really disappointing. I hope you never stop making this. My world would end.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Shaddaymelo
title: Love the cheesecake pieces
text;;;: I tried to only eat a little bit and couldn’t help myself. The cheesecake pieces are so delicious with the chocolate and caramel flavor. I love that they are not stingy with the cheesecake pieces. Absolute perfection.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,RebaBeeba,2020-08-18,5,Delicious!,0,0,"Stopped at the store looking for the cookies and cream cheesecake core, which the store did not have so I decided to give this one a whirl. So glad I did, it was AMAZING! The cookie swirl really drives this one home!";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Julien
title: Jam packed so good
text;;;: Anyone who reported 3 stars or less is seriously deranged. This flavor is so jam packed full of flavor. You have to read the description several times tonappreciate how much goodness is in this. 5 stars easily;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,Nursikins,2019-10-08,3,Just enh,0,0,"I was so excited to try this flavor, but sadly it falls short of what I hoped I would find. The cookie swirl is tasty, but the cheesecake truffles are weird globs. I don't really get any graham cracker crust";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Mel27
title: Almost
text;;;: Loved the caramel flavor and the cookie swirl. Wish there was more cookie in it. Agree with other reviewers the chunks of cheesecake are not so good. If I take out the cheesecake chunks...so delicious.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,TinaBeana,2018-09-09,5,Love it!,0,0,"One of the best flavors-the cheesecake is chewy, but melts into your mouth-the graham cracker is delicious-and caramel, well....caramel is delicious no matter what. This entire combination is a winner.";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Jazmo
title: Unbelievably addicting.
text;;;: I hope they NEVER stop making this. This is all of my favorite flavors in one. Its not too sweet or too rich. I'm able to eat the whole thing and not blink an eye. I have 2 in my freezer hidden away.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: RottenHead
title: This is a Kiss From God
text;;;: The ice cream is so good it's ridiculous and the cookie swirl makes me emotional. The cheesecake truffles are not as good as the cheesecake in the 'Core' pint. This is a must try for all humans!;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: cj1100
title: Delicious!!
text;;;: Love this flavor. The cheesecake bits are less creamy than expected but they are frozen so it makes sense. I love the caramel ice cream and wish there was more of the chocolate cookie!!! So good!;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,Rochelless88,2019-11-21,5,Love love love it,0,0,"I love this new combo, I just discovered it a few days ago, and today I went back to buy another when I thought, how would this taste if instead of the cheesecake pieces it was a cheesecake core.";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Tubs
title: My new favorite!
text;;;: Tried this new flavor and I love it! The cheesecake flavor of the ice cream base is delicious and is so creamy! The cookie swirl adds a nice crunchy texture while the truffles are nice and soft!;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Ange18
title: The worst flavor
text;;;: I love cheesecake and carmel so I thought I’d love this pint of Ben and Jerry’s! The truffles were so terrible I had to throw them out. This flavor needs a lot of work. I wouldn’t buy it again.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,Jen674677,2018-04-30,5,absolutely rich and comforting,0,0,"I was skeptical about this and I am very picky about my cheesecake. This was sooo addicting and I could eat it without feeling heavy after. Definitely my new favorite, sorry ""Tonight Dough""!";;;

Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,,2018-05-11,3,It won't let me put the title I want -,0,1,"Yeah, I'm sure it's 3 stars i.e and only 1 other person selected 3 stars, so: 2. Maybe a step high in sodium or sugar. Also seems the things of just 4g protein get to us but thank you";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: R and M
title: So VERY disappointing
text;;;: Doesn't taste like caramel or cheesecake or truffles. Big globs of greasy yukky stuff. They've run out of good ideas. Gonna throw this out and stick with the old favorites.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,Anniebananie,2019-02-07,5,yummy yummy,0,0,"this is now my favorite flavor!! so many layers of flavor and I love all the chunks of truffle covered cheesecake, bits of chocolate and the graham cracker crust yum yum";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: DannieQ
title: Good ice cream!!
text;;;: Just tried this ice cream!! The flavors are very good!! The only reason I didn’t give more stars is because I feel like the cheesecake pieces could have more flavor :(;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: CJames
title: The best flavor yet
text;;;: I brought this flavor yesterday and I’m going get another one day. I love that it doesn’t have the chocolate flakes in it. Everything is amazing about this one.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Ashmar
title: Disappointed
text;;;: Cheesecake truffles had no flavor. The ice cream itself tasted kind of sugar free/low fat. I love caramel and i love cheesecake but this ice cream was not good.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Joss88
title: New favorite
text;;;: This is the best! It has the perfect amount of cheesecake pieces and not an overwhelming amount of chocolate. My boyfriend and I finished it in a night!! Lol;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Grreneyedlady
title: So sad that I did not know this flavor exsisted!
text;;;: I am so happy that I have finally found this flavor! This is wonderful. I can not believe anyone gave this one star. Crunchy and chocolatey and cheesy too.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,superagonist,2019-09-03,5,the most perfect ice cream ever,0,0,"Hands down, best there ever will be! I shudder thinking about a time when this may no longer be made....please dont make that nightmare a reality";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: smiley
title: Tasted weird
text;;;: I usually love the cheesecake ice creams but the cheesecakes chunks has a weird taste. I ended up throwing this one away after a few bites.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Crystal
title: Excellent
text;;;: Just bought this the other day and no complaints what so ever. Lots of flavor and soooo many cheesecake truffles in mine. Love love love.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,Delicious IceCream Wishes,2018-07-31,5,Absolutely amazing!,0,0,"I have been raving about this flavor to anyone that listens. My go-to favorite strawberry cheesecake, but this is a new favorite! Love!";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Dev G
title: Didn't just meet expectations. It exceeded them!
text;;;: This flavor was perfect and probably my new favorite flavor of any ice cream. It's a smooth taste combining all the flavors together.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,Lee25,2018-08-15,5,AMAZING,0,0,"You have to try, the best ice cream I have had in awhile. I think everything about this combo works. I will be buying again.";;;

Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,PhoenixRises,2019-09-03,5,It makes the top 10 list!,0,0,"This one is not in my top 5, but it's definitely in my top 10. I love the cookies and I love the cheesecake! It's a keeper!";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Chasetity
title: The Best Flavor
text;;;: Please Please don't ever get rid of this Flavor it's absolutely amazing. I won't say how many points I have eaten;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,kait,2018-07-18,5,Love the flavors combined!,0,0,"This is by far my new favorite and I didn’t even know it’s been out for a while now, but I’m so glad I found it!";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Wendy5x
title: Great flavors
text;;;: I love this ice cream but for last 6 months can't find it in stores near me. Why is this not available anymore;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Moe j
title: Best combination
text;;;: This ice cream is really good! All the textures fit really well and I love the cheesecake bites in there.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,HNC123,2019-04-25,5,Exceeded My Expectations!!!!,0,0,"I purchased a pint last night, and it was one of the best flavor combinations I’ve experienced in years!";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: CC91
title: My new favorite ice cream!
text;;;: I bought this recently when the store ran out of Half Baked and it is my new favorite!!;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,NikkiLynn,2020-02-13,5,My Favorite Flavor,0,0,"I haven't really found a flavor that I would not eat, but this one is truly addicting.";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,Lynnsmth,2018-09-03,5,All time favorite,0,0,"This is my new favorite, it’s a perfect balance and the cheesecake pieces are YUM!";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Tessa
title: New Favorite
text;;;: This is my favorite Ben and Jerry's flavor. Ever. And I love the cheesecake bites.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Haileyf32
title: So Good!
text;;;: This is one of the best Ben & Jerry’s iced creams! I hope they keep it for awhile!;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Rehab Radio
title: YUUUUUUMMMMMMMM
text;;;: NEED MORE IN STOCK. CANT FIND THIS AT WALMART IN WATERVILLE MAINE HALF THE TIME.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: amag33
title: AMAZING
text;;;: I bought this over the weekend. It is now my new favorite flavor. So delicious!;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: SpoonIn
title: Love it
text;;;: the chocolate cookie swirls play so wonderfully off of this flavor. I love it!;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,GAPat,2019-07-22,5,A winner!,0,0,"Great flavor combination! Very complimentary with no overpowering ""core"".";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Allison
title: My favorite!!!
text;;;: You hit a homerun with this one! I hope this one stands the test of time!;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Buckwheat
title: The best
text;;;: Definitely my favorite out of all the flavors. Ben & jerrys is the best.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Leelove
title: Delicious
text;;;: This is the best of the best! I am addicted. I can't live without it.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: ella
title: YUMMMMM!!!
text;;;: Absolutely yum! Please keep making this heavenly delightful flavor!!!;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: MeghanCC123
title: Deeeeeeeelicious!
text;;;: So delicious! My new favorite. It is the perfect marriage of flavors.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Ben and Jerry Fan
title: New Flavor Alert
text;;;: Definitely my new favorite Ice cream. Please keep this flavor around!;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Rosa
title: My favorite
text;;;: Soooooo good! And not overly chocolatey like alot of ben and jerrys.;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: nicolettezephyr
title: My New Favorite!
text;;;: This flavor is the best thing ever!! Please never stop selling it!!;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Anthony
title: Super awesome ice cream
text;;;: I got this like 3x a week love this ice cream thanks ben&Jerry's;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: MightyMommaBeae
title: Cheesecake Lovers Beware
text;;;: Hands down... best flavor ever!!! Will purchase again and again!;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Mo777
title: Amazing
text;;;: Love it the cheese cake is yummy and love the chocolate swirls;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake,heybiga,2018-03-16,5,amazing flavor!,0,0,"love all the chunks and pieces, would definitely buy again :)";;;
Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Kits
title: Best Flavor Ever!
text;;;: They really hit the nail on the head with this one! So good!;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
title: We have a Winner!
text;;;: Great tasting cheesecake with a hint of chocolate & Carmel!;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Symone21
title: Actually amazing
text;;;: Has the perfect amount of everything! I love love love!;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Tina42
title: Simply the best
text;;;: My new favorite of all time. The truffles are amazing!;;;

name: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake
author: Keven
title: Best Cheesecake flavor by a mile
text;;;: If this flavor didnt exist I would quit ice cream!;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: Debn
title: No cherries
text;;;: My husband brought a pint for me last week. I always loved the cherries. At least as st 6 were in a pint. THIS PINT HAD ONLY 2. Very disappionted.;;;

name: Cherry Garcia,BJLUVER,2018-10-29,5,THE BEST ICE CREAM FLAVOR OF. ALL. TIME.,51,4,"Wow. Just wow. I mean there's nothing better than this flavor. No topping it. Cherry ice cream combined with cherries and chunks of chocolate? Come on. This is the best flavor of all time. I'm not saying there aren't other delicious flavors that fill me with intense, creamy, passionate emotion, but cherry garcia is home. Cherry garcia is the dog that you cuddle up with on the couch after a long day of dragging your feet through the world. Cherry garcia is the mother that rubs your sweet lil head after the local school bully called your shoes ""dorky."" Cherry garcia is life. Such a wonderful flavor. I'm a life-long fan and I will pass this flavor on to my kids, my kids' kids, and their kids' kids. I love it.";;;

Cherry Garcia,Mari724,2020-04-15,1,Very Disappointed!!!!!,1,8,"We bought 2 pints of Cherry Garcia yesterday at our local Frys Store in San Tan Valley, AZ. This has been my favorite flavor for more than 23 years. Unfortunately my husband and I are very disappointed. This ice cream does not taste like anything at all. The first thing we noticed was that it had no color at all, it was like eating plain cream. The only taste was the occasional piece of chocolate and a piece of cherry. I only had a quarter of the pint, the rest will go in the garbage. So Sad.";;;

Cherry Garcia,Tiffany,2017-10-29,5,"Try it, you’ll like it!",13,0,"I’ve held off on this flavor for years. It seemed simple and less than exciting. Ben and Jerry’s is my secret soul food, so when I do it, I pick overtly decadent and rich like Phish Food. I got stuck with this when the hubby picked for me and he loves “cherry” anything. So, needless to say, I was so not happy inside to see Cherry Garcia. I even left it in time out in the freezer a whole day! I pulled it out the next day, fully expecting disappointment. Took a bite or two, and couldn’t stop! This is now my favorite ice cream of all time!! There’s a special sweet balance between the chunks of frozen cherries and giant chunks of frozen chocolate all generously dispersed in mellow vanilla. Every single bite was heaven! But don’t tell my husband! Gotta keep him on his toes!";;;

Cherry Garcia,Brooks,2017-10-03,5,This is the best thing that could possibly exist.,9,0,"This product is amazing, it is the greatest ice cream flavor to touch my tongue. Anyone that thinks otherwise is wrong. Cherry Garcia is the epitome of ice cream, and that is a fact.";;;

Cherry Garcia,sarah88,2017-12-10,5,The Best Ice Cream!,5,0,"Two years ago, this was the first Ben and Jerry's ice cream I ever had. Since then I have tried many different flavors, but this one is still my favorite by far. I get a pint of Cherry Garcia at least once a week!";;;

Cherry Garcia,FuzzyGut,2020-01-29,5,I love this one!,3,0,"This was the first Ben and Jerry flavor I had outside a scoop shop, in a pint at home. It’s got great cherry flavor in the ice cream itself and the cherry chunks themselves are great tasting and very plentiful. The fudge seals the deal and makes this a regular in my freezer!";;;

Cherry Garcia,Chewbacca,2018-05-13,5,"Just one teeny, tiny complaint...",3,1,"I've eaten this flavor for a decade or more. It's definitely my go to, but, if I could change anything about it I would change ratio of cherries to chocolate in favor of cherries by at least 8:1. If not more. Honestly I'd say leave the chocolate out period but I know there'd be war. I just can't get enough of the cherries. And sometimes I get a pint that's almost all fudge chips & no cherries. Frustrating. But it's still the best current flavor.";;;
Cherry Garcia,Katita94,2018-05-03,5,What about THAT cherries!,2,0,"First, I'm not the greater fan of cherries, and I'm really bought this pint only for trying something new.";;;
Cherry Garcia
author: NixinsNation
title: Only cherries with this garcia
text;;;: I’m so bummed. I love Ben and Jerry’s but this pint of Cherry Garcia- is all cherry. I literally scooped the whole pint into a bowl to make sure. I only had 1 small chocolate slice. Not happy;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: zoey
title: i guess i’m the only one who doesn’t like this.
text;;;: maybe i had a bad batch. but the “cherry ice cream” had no cherry flavor at all. it tasted like pure milk with just chunks of cherry throughout. and then bits of fudge flakes. they just tasted like pieces off a dark chocolate bar. i guess this flavor is just not for me;;;

name: Cherry Garcia,Forget It,2017-07-08,1,Disappointing,3,11,"Since the takeover of B&J, it has become increasingly difficult to find my favorite Cherry Garcia. So, very happy to find two 500ml containers at Sobeys. $5.49 each. I have opened and eaten the entire first container. NO CHERRY - NONE - NOT A SINGLE BIT OF CHERRY! And it ""ain't"" pink ice cream any more - whitish/yellowish bland tasting stuff. Why would you want to screw up the best ice cream ever?? I hope you made a good profit on these two containers because I will not be buying any in the future! SAD!";;;

Cherry Garcia,Vero123,2020-04-06,5,My favorite ice cream,1,0,"IBe tried multiple flavors of Ben n jerry ice cream but nothing compares to this flavor. It’s so perfect with the right ratio of the creamy vanilla ice cream, chunks of dark chocolate (which I know might make u standoffish but trust me it goes amazing together) and the amazing juicy cherries. Every time I go to my local store I grab a pint because it’s just so delicious you always need to have it near by!";;;

Cherry Garcia,chev,2018-07-06,5,,0,0,"It's not difficult to see why Ben & Jerry's has used this flavor in so many different products, because it is a good, safe flavor and for that reason, it gets a BUY IT rating. If you want a comforting ice cream treat and don't want to have your brain confused by having flavors coming at you from every different direction, this is a great choice for you and you will not regret it.";;;
Cherry Garcia
author: skaizgay
text;;;: Such an amazing ice cream unlike any other. The cherries in this are surprisingly fresh. I'm not usually a fan of ice cream with fruit because the fruit is usually very soft and mushy but the cherries in this are firm and fresh. The ice cream itself is very creamy and the chocolate is the perfect amount of cocoa without being too dark.;;;

name: Cherry Garcia,stephaniewindermere,2019-01-03,4,,0,0,"I really like this ice cream, but I prefer the Cherry Garcia formula in the frozen yogurt option. The frozen yogurt is not on Influenster, so I couldn’t review it. This ice cream is very creamy and rich. The cherries are flavourful and juicy. This flavour of ice cream is so unique. I highly recommend this flavour and brand.";;;

Cherry Garcia,cb777,2018-09-13,4,One Of Our All Time Favorites!,1,0,"We have been purchasing Ben &Jerry's Ice Cream for decades. Have tried many varieties, and have a few we buy regularly, but Cherry Garcia is my husband and son's all time favorite!! We purchase an average of one per week of this flavor. Over the years it's always been pretty consistant in taste and formulation, however the last few pints we purchased had much less chocolate chunks. One pint seemed to have a few chunks only on the bottom of the pint. My husband said ""WHERE ARE THE CHOCOLATE CHUNKS'??"" Happened to the chocolate""??? We think it must have been a fluke in manufactuing and we caught a bad batch as we purchased both pints in the same store. We had this problem with the lack of chocolate chunks in their Cherry Garcia slices, but untll now, never the pints. In ""fairness"" I am giving this product a high rating because this issue with the lack of chocolate chunks has only been with the last 2 pints we purchased, and overall it's a good product...";;;
Cherry Garcia
author: mrsbelleduarte
text;;;: SO I love the Dead and I'm from the bay area & I have so many fond memories on Haight stopping at B & J's for ice cream.
