I usually get one scoop of CG and one scoop of Phish Food and it really feeds my body and soul. I never am without a lil personal pint of CG in my house. Its the best ice cream in the world :);;;

name: Cherry Garcia,elizabethf2,2018-06-06,4,,0,0,"These days, I can’t snuggle up on the couch with a container of Ben and Jerry’s and eat as much as I want- but I can have a scoop every once in a while, so I do - and Cherry Garcia is my guilty pleasure ice cream of choice. Just don’t let it thaw too much before re freezing, or it gets all crystallized.";;;

Cherry Garcia,msugirl1901c,2019-03-08,5,,0,0,"This is one of my favorite flavors of Ben & Jerrys ice cream! The cherry ice cream doesnt taste too artificial and is delicious, I only wish they sold this in a half gallon versus just a pint! I will buy this over and over again without a doubt!";;;

Cherry Garcia,annie45,2017-07-04,4,Love it but I vote for vanilla ice cream.,3,3,"As a kid, my two favorite hand-dipped ice creams were cherry vanilla and chocolate chunk. Imagine my delight when you brought out Cherry Garcia and with a great name. But then...the cherry flavored ice cream. Still good, still recommend, not as great. Please...bring back the vanilla!";;;

Cherry Garcia,DC24,2018-09-04,2,Not For Me,1,0,"Too much of a maraschino cherry flavor for my taste. I would prefer more of a fresh cherry taste. That being said, I can see how others would like it assuming an appreciation for maraschino cherries.";;;

Cherry Garcia,Jim S,2017-06-04,5,Change back to vanilla ice cream in Cherry Garcia,3,3,"I prefer the vanilla because of the texture. The cherry ice cream is a little ""gummier"". The new Chocolate Cherry Garcia is interesting but the chocolate tends to cover up a lot of the cherry flavor. It's all still better than anything else around!";;;

Cherry Garcia,Brandii76,2019-05-21,2,Sadly disappointed..,6,8,"I bought this last week from Publix because I normally love this ice cream. For some reason though, it was very gritty and didn't taste anywhere near as good as normal... :(";;;

Cherry Garcia,amandamxc,2020-03-19,5,BRUH,1,0,"TO DIE FOR oh my god I love this ice cream I buy it for my boyfriend all the time and i’m how he found it and also my best friend , I introduced it to her too I love this ice cream :^";;;

Cherry Garcia,Mr D,2017-09-10,5,Best flavor around.,1,0,"Always on my shopping list. Favorite flavor of any brand. large cherries and big chunks of chocolate always make me smile. perfect after breakfast, lunch or dinner snack.";;;

Cherry Garcia,Curlyfry,2020-02-23,5,My go to,1,0,"My all time favorite, I love the chocolate chunks with the cherry! It’s too hard for me to try new flavors because my eyes always go back to this flavor!!";;;
Cherry Garcia,jhpellesco,2020-03-19,4,Amazing!,1,0,"I first tried this not very long ago (almost a week ago), and I was very pleased. Love the singing cow on the pint :).";;;
Cherry Garcia
author: islandfatale
text;;;: Cherry garcia is my absolute favorite ben and jerry's flavor. The chunks of chocolate and cherry.... mmm so delicious.;;;

name: Cherry Garcia,Lndsyrh2,2018-03-23,2,What happened to the fudge swirls!!!??,1,5,"This used to be my all time favorite ice, like out of this world incredible. However, I distinctly remember it used to have BIG FUDGE SWIRLS and not lame chocolate flakes. I raved about this ice cream to all my friends only to be soooo dissappointed to find they changed the recipe to flakes! My friends were not impressed to say the least even though the flavor is the same it was such a downer!! Bring back the THICK FUDGE SWIRLS !!!!!!!!!’";;;
Cherry Garcia
author: 802GirlLivinInThe603
title: Childhood Favorite
text;;;: I cannot get enough of Cherry Garcia. Been my go-to since I was a kid.;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: chicken
title: best if you add banana with it
text;;;: it is so good and you should buy it because it tastes so good;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
title: My Fave
text;;;: Cherry Garcia is my go to when I'm feeling down and out.;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: AnyaLeeBlues13
title: C.G. since I can remember!
text;;;: Long before I discovered the GD I was eating CG! <3;;;

name: Cherry Garcia,Nanny,2019-02-05,3,Confused,0,1,"Ordinarily, I would give Cherry Garcia 5+ stars. However, on two occasions (10+ years ago in San Francisco and today in Lewes, DE), the beautiful dark burgundy bing cherries were replaced with supersweet, bright red maraschino cherries that I usually only tolerate as singles atop my sundae whipped cream. What's going on?? I realize the ingredients label just lists “cherries,” but I'm hoping these two occasions were anomalies.";;;

Cherry Garcia,Beca,2017-07-26,5,The best cherry ice cream,1,1,"I decided to try the ice cream because I love anything cherry flavored and it surprised me, it's nothing like the other ones I've tried. Everybody should have this ice cream, it's fenomenal";;;
Cherry Garcia
author: malloriet5ea2
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream of all time. There’s nothing else like it! I love the little cherry pieces with vanilla ice cream and chocolate bars. It’s a treat on any day for me. And I wouldn’t pick any other kind over cherry Garcia. If you haven’t tried it yet you absolutely have to!;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: Katelyn Walters
title: I’ll never stop eating this
text;;;: My husband and I were in bed and all of a sudden a craving for my favorite Ben and Jerry’s. He took me to our local Walmart and bought me a pint of it. On the way home I had him go through McDonald’s to get a spoon so I could eat my ice cream on the way home because I couldn’t wait!!!;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: Saddest customer
title: Why the Change?!?!
text;;;: What was once my favorite ice cream no longer holds that place in my heart. I loved the freshness and contrast of the vanilla ice cream with the big chunks of cherries. And the chocolate used to be real chocolate with that lovely chocolate snap. Now it’s fudge and cloying. No snap.;;;

name: Cherry Garcia,Acer1974,2019-02-09,5,Delicious!!,0,0,"My first two containers were gritty and the second one was crystalized, but would become creamy as the crystals melted. I loved both of them...lol, but I can't wait to get my hands on a creamy batch that hasn't melted and refrozen. I can just imagine how good that one's gonna be!!";;;

Cherry Garcia,dedevol,2018-06-05,5,,0,0,"Oh Lord, this ice cream is the best! It is quite the indulgence due to the high fat content and I try to purchase the lower fat version, if available. This flavor is a bit difficult to find in my area but it is delicious and does have a high price point. Definitely recommend.";;;

Cherry Garcia,ice22,2018-08-29,5,LOVE AT FIRST BITE,0,0,"I buy this ice cream pint every time i go to walmart! Its so good, especially because of the size of the chocolate flakes and cherries. I swear, every bite you take has either a cherry or chocolate piece. Not too sweet or too sweet but perfect and I don't even like cherries.";;;
Cherry Garcia
author: Mistified
title: NOT worthy!
text;;;: This is a dang good ice cream!;;;

name: Cherry Garcia,melissam3dfb,2019-01-03,5,,0,0,"This flavor should not work but it does. I’d seen people rave about Cherry Garcia but, as someone who does not like artificial cherry anything, I was super uninterested... but it’s so good! The cherries are delicious and the chocolate balances it out so nicely.";;;

Cherry Garcia,Lori H,2019-08-24,5,The GOAT of ice cream flavors!,0,0,"It's probably been 20 years since I first had Cherry Garcia, and I swear nothing has ever been more delicious. Now, I certainly LIKE other flavors but this one is by far the best. Not overwhelmingly sweet, just enough crunch and the cherry pieces are amazing.";;;
Cherry Garcia
author: julian2
text;;;: One word YUM. This ice cream has real chunks of cherry in it. The mix of chocolate and cherry is phenomenal. I find this ice cream to be delicious. It was the first Ben & Jerry's I ever tried. It's expensive but it's so worth the price! Get a spoon and try!!;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: sophiaasmakeup
text;;;: MY FAVORITE ICECREAM OMG I wish I had some right now! There's sooooooo many cherries in this ice cream not like other icecream that doesn't give you any cherries just chocolate I hate that lol. This is my favorite icecream forever and always it's the best;;;

name: Cherry Garcia,shellyw1,2018-11-08,5,,0,0,"Ben and Jerry's produce quality ice cream and this is a favorite flavor of mine. I've always liked chocolate covered cherries and this is a frozen version! B&J's ice cream is more expensive than other brands, so I tend to purchase it when it is on sale.";;;
Cherry Garcia
author: icecream3
title: YUMMY!
text;;;: this is my absolute favorite flavor! im not much of a chocolate person so im always very happy when we have a pint of this. although i mus say lately i havent been getting as many cherries as i would like. but i still love the flavor and keep it up!;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: anasonthego
text;;;: This is THE ice cream for when you have a fight with your best friend or boyfriend. Delicious and totally worth the calories. It's banana with chocolate and it tastes like heaven. This ice cream along with a feel good 90's movie is the bomb dot com.;;;

name: Cherry Garcia,feliciawed6c,2018-12-04,5,,0,0,"I was so not excited when my husband picked out this ice cream flavor for me. I mean cherry ice cream? How can that be good? Well, it is! It's one of my favorites. The cherry is so soft and subtle and balances so nicely with the chocolate. Amazing.";;;
Cherry Garcia
author: dorothyf98f0
text;;;: This is my guilty pleasure. I could eat this ice cream all day. I love the flavor of the cherry with the chocolate. I get it out of the freezer and let it sit for 5-10 minutes then eat it because it softens so perfectly it just melts in your mouth.;;;

name: Cherry Garcia,GregsKitchen,2018-01-30,5,Best tasting ice cream in the entire world,0,0,"If you don't like Cherry Garcia ice cream, then you'll never be happy with any other ice cream. I've tried hundreds of flavors (including all Ben & Jerry's) and dozens of brands, nothing comes close. I can't help having a serving every day.";;;

Cherry Garcia,robing24ed,2018-07-02,5,,0,0,"This is a Ben and Jerry’s classic flavor and it is so tasty! The ice cream is smooth, creamy and sweet and there are huge chunks of real cherry. There are big chunks of dark chocolate that is a perfect finishing touch. This is a yummy treat.";;;

Cherry Garcia,Baye,2019-06-11,3,Did the recipe change?,0,0,"My son, who has some allergies to raw cherries and apples, could always eat this ice cream. For some reason his recent purchase set off his allergies a good bit. The ice cream is great if you don't have allergies, but take care if you do.";;;

Cherry Garcia,smalltownbelle,2018-12-05,5,,0,0,"Cherry Garcia is one of my absolute favorite flavors. Like, top 5 flavors of all time. The cherry ice cream with the addition of natural cherry halves is so refreshing and the chocolate chunks are a welcome addition to the flavor profile.";;;
Cherry Garcia
author: joelyd17
text;;;: This is the only flavor I’ve tried from Ben and Jerry’s and I love it. It has a great flavor! I love the cherry and chocolate flakes in it! I get it at Walmart for a reasonable price. My favorite flavor of ice cream. 10/10 recommend.;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: Obsessed with ice cream
title: Best Ever!
text;;;: I’m an ice cream fanatic! Obsessed completely. I ate my way through gelato shops in Italy and still Cherry Garcia is my favorite flavor. The unique cherry ice cream is creamy and paired well with chunks of chocolate and cherries.;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: namastejesslynn
text;;;: Cherry Garcia is one of the best ice creams I have ever had. I live the Ben and Jerrys brand and wish tat my local store had more flavors to try. We used to have a local ice cream parlor and when it closed I was sad to see it go.;;;

name: Cherry Garcia,Karlene,2019-06-25,1,Cherry Garcia bars has no cherries,0,0,"I purchased a box of nine bars at BJ’s of the Cherry Garcia and only 3 bars had chocolate chips, cherries, and cherry ice cream. The other 6 bars contained only chocolate chips and vanilla ice cream. I don’t know what happened.";;;
Cherry Garcia
author: desiraev568a
text;;;: One of my all time favorite ice creams. Has such a nice flavor and it seems like you get a little of everything with every bite. I just wish this ice cream came in bigger containers because these small ones don't last long;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: shelbyg2189
text;;;: Cherries are my favourite fruit and so I've tried a lot of cherry ice creams. A lot of them fall flat. But the flavour of this combined with the consistency and size of fruit chunks is very well put together. I love this;;;

name: Cherry Garcia,Plainjane,2020-05-11,1,Cherry Garcia,0,2,"What happen to this Ice Cream. Within the last few months this product has deteriorated few Cherry’s , little chocolate, is just plain ice cream . If I wanted plain Jane ice cream I can find that anywhere. Disappointed";;;

Cherry Garcia,Heartofgold,2018-11-03,4,Almost perfect,0,0,"The fruit and chocolate combination is what makes this flavor a winner. The chocolate chunks are very large, and I would rather have a chocolate chip versus a chunk. More cherry, less chocolate chunk would be perfect.";;;
Cherry Garcia
author: wishmaster_2013
text;;;: My favorite ice cream is chocolate chip and cherry and this combines the two perfectly! I would eat these every day if I could without any consequences haha. I would recommend not only this flavor but this whole brand;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: Aurora
title: almond flavor Cherry Garcia
text;;;: i bought this not realizing it was made with Almond milk. i will never buy this again.;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: robin 777
title: Cocoa processed with Alkali
text;;;: This is not a healthy Cocoa. Please remove the processing of cocoa from your ice creams. Just use cocoa.;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: jacqueliner2294
text;;;: As a kid I wasn't a fan of Cherry Garcia. But now as an adult-ish it's one of the best has complex flavored in the base and the cherries are always really good. I think Ben and Jerry's is pretty affordable.;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: icelav
text;;;: Omg this is the only brand of ice cream I buy! The cherries are cut in half and taste so good ! And I love that the chocolate chunks are big . Literally every spoonful has a piece of cherry or chocolate;;;

name: Cherry Garcia,esmeralda8426,2018-08-01,5,,0,0,"I love Ben & Jerry's, they are so creative with their flavors they cone up with and I've never had one i didn't like. I also love everything this company stands for, they are good people.";;;
Cherry Garcia
author: sierralc502
text;;;: This is my go to flavor for Ben and Jerry’s. It’s so tasty and creamy and I just love it! It’s such a good combo with the pieces of cherry and chocolate and I overall enjoy this flavor!;;;

name: Cherry Garcia,haninbe049,2019-03-05,5,,0,0,"When I am craving ice cream, I literally always go for Ben and Jerrys either the cherry garcia or strawberry cheesecake. I like how creamy they are and less sugary than other brands.";;;
Cherry Garcia
author: brittanyl6efd
text;;;: BEST flavor of all time. Just the right balance between the cherry taste and the chocolate taste. Even my friends that don't like the taste of cherry's really enjoy this ice cream;;;

name: Cherry Garcia,AlondraH711,2019-06-22,5,ultimate fav,0,0,"literally eaten sooo many of these. it brings me back so many memories with my friends, eating cherry garcia and watching movies. always recommend it. I hope it stays forever.";;;

Cherry Garcia,Chadwick,2019-08-24,1,I strongly dislike the cherries,0,0,"I don't know what kind of cherries these are, but I could not eat them. I love sour cherries, but these were terrible. I ate the ice cream, but I did not eat the cherries.";;;

Cherry Garcia,Benny1010,2019-07-14,5,Smooth,0,0,"I was raised on bluebell, and when I tell you I gave it up so quick when I tasted this ice cream. It’s creamy, and the over all quality of the ingredients are far superior!";;;

Cherry Garcia,Bbwww53,2018-09-02,5,Love since day 1,0,0,"This is mine and my moms favorite flavor, in fact she almost named me after it, thanks to my gma I am NOT named after ice cream no matter how delicious it may be";;;
Cherry Garcia
text;;;: This is so bomb. So chocolatey and cherry at the same time. Very creamy and high quality. Go to but very sweet and High calorie. It’s a rare but delicious treat;;;

name: Cherry Garcia,creativelymad,2018-08-03,5,,0,0,"What is life without Cherry Garcia? For a long time, I knew this life, but once I had it, that life was a long distant memory. I wish to never see it again.";;;
Cherry Garcia
author: massielbellorini
text;;;: Well I don’t really like cherries but I decided to take this one home a try it... and wowww amazing I love Ben a Jerry’s ice creams and this one is a YES;;;

name: Cherry Garcia,brigitteb5815,2019-01-06,5,,0,0,"Even the Ben & Jerry’s can be a little expensive, it will always be worth the price because it’s always delicious and they use great ingredients inside.";;;
Cherry Garcia
author: nourt2
text;;;: I love Ben&Jerry’s but I didn’t like this flavor it’s just too sweet. They had a cotton candy flavor I loved but they discontinued it I’m disappointed.;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: nancyg4a1a
text;;;: I love Ben & Jerry's. I love that they use new fresh ingredients and the fact that there really isn't that artificial flavor taste in the ice cream;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: Israa
title: Disappointed
text;;;: I love this flavour so much but I bought one last week from adonis griffintown and I was very disappointed that it only had one cherry in it!!;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: rheannam1
text;;;: This is my all time favorite Ben and Jerry’s ice cream! The Cherries and the chocolate chunks are so delicious it’s well worth the money!;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: ourfirstrodeo
text;;;: Good balance of fruity and chocolatey flavors. Im always a big fam of ben and jerrys but the Cherry Garcia is especially good. So chunky!;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: Kimber lee
title: Best ice cream ever
text;;;: By this flavor all the time. For about 3 months this is all I ate with added merichino cherries and it's juice I lost 35lb no kidding.;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: Ytseg
title: First time experience
text;;;: First time experience With this flavor and the pint slice presentation. Both the flavor and the pint slice get a thumbs up from me.;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: Laurel
title: Cherri garcia
text;;;: I normally like chocolate and vanilla but the cherry garcia is excellent. Love it with all the cherries and chocolate. Very good.;;;

name: Cherry Garcia,nesse,2018-12-02,5,,0,0,"I'd you dont like Cherry Garcia, something is wrong with you. I love it. My favorite. Amazing taste. I've been eati.g it for years";;;
Cherry Garcia,tqlsgq,2018-11-09,5,,0,0,"My go to ice cream whenever I need a pick me up. This stuff is just so yummy, you can never go wrong with chocolate and cherries.";;;
Cherry Garcia,radzach97,2018-07-10,5,A Classic,0,0,"This is such a delicious and classic flavor, if I cant decide which one I want this along with the cookie dough one is my go to.";;;
Cherry Garcia
author: brookep696
text;;;: My very favorite ice cream. I think Ben and Jerrys is always worth the price to me. The dark chocolate and cherries are perfect;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: candicelb53f
text;;;: Super yummy one of my most favorite ice creams ever.. If you like chocolates and cherries this is an ice cream you will love;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: bethanyk2c01
text;;;: I don’t normally like cherry-flavored ice cream but this is an exception. The chocolate chunks in it are also really good!;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: ginat53df
text;;;: Love b n j. Always crave during pregnancy. Lol. The cherries n little chocolate chips are evenly distributed and delicious;;;

name: Cherry Garcia

Cherry Garcia,johnnabright62,2018-08-25,1,,0,0,"I am a been & Jerry's brand,Cherry Garcia is my favorite ice cream I buy this all the time it's the only flavor I buy .";;;
Cherry Garcia
text;;;: So good rich and creamy. Worth the price. Love all the flavors so far. Lots of chunks of goodness inside each jar.;;;

name: Cherry Garcia,melissaa3289,2018-09-11,5,,0,0,"This icecream is classic cherry and vanilla with chocolate pieces in it, its classic but extremely good and creamy";;;
Cherry Garcia,ryanrk,2019-03-08,5,,0,0,"I never even considered trying cherry ice cream before this flavor came into my life, and now Ill never turn back.";;;

text;;;: This was a flavor that I went to if I really wanted a sweet but not to sweet cherry ice cream any time of the day.;;;

author: julisap
text;;;: I love this ice cream & I definitely recommend the only thing is that some may find the price to be a little high;;;

text;;;: I love cherries but not usually in ice cream. This is amazing and I was so surprised to love it as much as I do!;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
title: Yum!
text;;;: I only like chocolate everything but I decided to take a chance and buy cherry ice cream and it was a delicious!;;;

name: Cherry Garcia,Haftaski,2017-11-05,5,Yum yum,0,0,"Great flavor and texture. Lots of chunks of chocolate and cherries to pick out, save in the lid, and eat last!";;;

name: Cherry Garcia,member2096f,2019-01-03,5,,0,0,"A childhood favorite, it never lets me down and it has the perfect blend of cherries and chocolate";;;

author: BrianC
title: Nothing Comes Close!
text;;;: I don’t know how Cherry Garcia isn’t 5 Stars? It is literally unmatched in the ice cream world...;;;

title: Lovin it
text;;;: I absolutely love this flavor .It always perks my mood up. Please start making bigger sizes of it;;;

name: Cherry Garcia,Barry Rum,2018-09-01,5,The sweet and simple perfection!,0,0,"Always loved this,as a child we had cherry vanilla with Hershey syrup, now it’s all in one place!";;;
Cherry Garcia,rosemarycc8d2,2018-10-11,5,,0,0,"Oh my God, what can I say except that I love love love Ben & Jerry’s. This flavor is everything..";;;
Cherry Garcia,claudia_de,2018-08-23,5,A pint of heaven,0,0,"First time I got a B&J ice cream and I think I'm in love, creamy and perfectly balanced flavors.";;;
Cherry Garcia
author: brookeb18
text;;;: Still one of the best flavors around. Ben & Jerrys is always top quality and great ingredients.;;;

title: Simple and amazing
text;;;: It has such a rich flavor without being packed with 9 other toppings. So subtle and delicious;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: huntress1971
text;;;: Love cherries and chocolate. An absolutely delicious flavor. You can’t go wrong with this one;;;

name: Cherry Garcia,Lise,2017-06-10,5,Love me some Cherry Garcia,0,0,"This has always been my favorite Ben & Jerry ice cream! I love the flavor, so delicious!";;;
Cherry Garcia,Cherry Garciaholic,2018-06-04,5,A pint-a-day habbit,0,0,"I've never been addicted to anything else. If my Freezer gets down to 2 pints, I panic.";;;
Cherry Garcia,sheilaa_sm,2019-02-02,5,,0,0,"Best ice cream for PMS or bad days!! Its delicious, the chocolate taste make it greater.";;;
Cherry Garcia,arielasr,2019-03-05,5,,0,0,"Cherry Garcia is the creamiest, fruitiest flavor of all the Ben and Jerrys ice creams.";;;
Cherry Garcia
author: brookiesaur
text;;;: This is always my God go to flavor to where it’s not too chocolatey but not too fruity;;;

name: Cherry Garcia,Cass15,2019-12-18,5,The best flavor,0,0,"I love them all, but Cherry Garcia is consistently my favorite. Hands down the best.";;;
Cherry Garcia
author: Marenghi
title: One of the best
text;;;: Everything about it is delicious and my favorite part is the abundant cherry pieces.;;;

name: Cherry Garcia,Chris113,2019-03-02,5,best icecream of my life,0,0,"I realy adiccted to cherry garcia, unfortunally I can not buy it in Germany :-(";;;
Cherry Garcia,sam2001,2019-04-06,1,Oh Man ?!?!?,0,0,"I bought cherry Garcia today, and it was freezer burnt. Totally disappointed!";;;

text;;;: This is my favorite - always a treat! Go to when I want to treat myself;;;

name: Cherry Garcia,step1getexcited,2017-06-17,5,I found Jesus in this ice cream,0,0,"If you love fruit in your ice cream, you've found the right ice cream.";;;
Cherry Garcia,IceCreamGuy23,2020-06-23,5,A TRUE CLASSIC,0,0,"Title says it all, it's a classic, an essential Ben and Jerry's flavor";;;

text;;;: I got this for my birthday but I've had it many time so good;;;

name: Cherry Garcia

title: Terrible new ingredients
text;;;: I used to love Cherry Garcia but now its disgusting.;;;

name: Cherry Garcia
author: alessio
title: good
text;;;: i bought this a day a ago and i'm so happy i did...;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: Haven
title: Thank you Ben & Jerry's
text;;;: I was having a really horrible day. Had received some depressing news about a medical procedure I had to have. In a fit of anger and depression I bought this as a comfort food since my usual choices of Karamel Sutra and Urban Bourbon weren't available. And wow. It seriously was so good that it took the edge off the anger and actually made me forget about my stupid health insurance issues for a good 45 minutes. It made those happy brain chemicals kick into gear better than sitting in a room full of puppies. Thank you for making an otherwise crummy day just a little bit better <3;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,IceCreamMonster,2019-02-19,5,For the true coffee lovers,34,5,"Ben and Jerry, “Chillin the roast Truffles,” THATS WHAT IM TALKING ABOUT! You have been able to make a coffee flavor icecream with actual coffee flavor, and the coffee liqour truffles? are you kidding me?! Deliscious. This flavor ice cream has just bumped into my #2 containered ice cream and i don’t make these decisions lightly. Well done ben and jerry, well done. its not just about the stuff you put in the icecream, the base flavor makes it, and you hit it out of the park with chillin the roast.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,nickdemon1,2020-07-14,5,FANTASTIC AUTHENTIC COFFEE FLAVOR,9,0,"I recently bought this a week ago and have already bought 3. I was most surprised at the authenticity of the coffee flavor. The smooth and [satisfyingly] rich chocolate swirls were a perfect combination when mixed with the ice cream. The chocolate covered truffles were just an added bonus to the already delicious product. My 22 y/o girlfriend who does not enjoy drinking coffee itself ""too much"", also loves this ice cream flavor. 1000/10 (not a typo) would recommend to any coffee lover and non-coffee lover alike.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Bennjerryfanforlofe,2019-09-28,1,The truffles are horrid in this flavor,16,5,"I was super excited to try this new flavor, I've been a big Ben & Jerry's fan for over 25 years. The cold brew coffee ice cream is actually quite tasty and the chocolate fudge swirl is fantastic. But the truffles are absolutely horrific and I'm picking them out as I eat through my pint. They taste like this very bad chemically bourbon flavored ball of nastiness. I don't even know how to describe it they certainly don't have any coffee flavor to them at all it really does taste like a fake chemically flavored alcohol additive. Disappointed and a complete waste of money.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Lmcg91,2018-07-31,5,BEST COFFEE ICE CREAM EVER!,8,1,"I almost did not buy this flavor in my weekly shopping selection because it had “coffee” in the flavor. Don’t get me wrong, I LOVE coffee. But all the “coffee” flavor ice creams I’ve ever had are an injustice to coffee. They’re not well balanced in the flavor, it’s all the same across the brands. BUT THEN I tried this ice cream with coffee flavor and the liquor, coffee etc, whatever all is in this makes it absolutely delicious. My store is out of it - I’ve checked 3 stores! I hope it’s not gone forever!!! LOVE THIS FLAVOR!";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Tubs123,2018-05-28,3,"Was good, but not great",18,10,"There were things I liked and some I didn't. Firstly, I really did enjoy the cold brew coffee ice cream. It wasn't very sweet and was strong of coffee flavor, which I liked. If you're a fan of sugary coffee, this probably won't be for you. The fudge swirls tasted good as well, but there wasn't enough in my opinion.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,NaeWavyGravy,2020-02-12,2,Not Impressed,4,9,"This had the usual new label on it so of course I needed to buy it. I opened and tasted it and well it has very nice flavors, however the flavors are rather lingering. I am also one that enjoys ""stuff"" in the ice cream and this was rather lacking. The swirl was ok, rather thick and sticky also has that liquor flavoring however the wafers were lacking and rather thin for the thickness of the swirl. The ice cream is Ben and Jerry's it's always good, however this flavor wasn't to my liking the flavor had kin of a grit to it. Other than that it was ice cream and I do love Ice cream!! I'd suggest a friend try it to compare it to my views...other than that not so much!";;;

Chillin' the Roast,robinf,2018-06-12,2,"Had high hopes, did not deliver",5,19,"When my two favorite flavors, Oat of this Swirled and One Sweet World, sadly disappeared from my store, I turned to this flavor. I like Coffee Coffee, Buzz, Buzz, Buzz, but I wanted to try something new from the truffles line. Despite opening this up to a giant air bubble (picture attached), I hoped for a successful flavor. I'm not sure if I can email customer service about this air bubble as I had recently already found one- which would make it look sketchy if I emailed. However, I was very disappointed. The cold brew ice cream is bitter and has a weird aftertaste, and the truffles had a somewhat chalky texture. I would not recommend this flavor, but if you are against wasting ice cream and do not want to throw it out, try eating it with some sort of chocolate or chocolate based ice cream.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Anonymous too,2018-08-26,1,No thank you,12,18,"I hoped this would be a replacement for my former favorite, the original coffee heath bar. NOPE! The ice cream flavor is horrible. Advertised as cold brewed. Tastes more like a pot of Dunkin that has sat on the burner all day. The rum is unpleasant and I can't even describe the ""truffles"". I probably would have been more satisfied with something generic and unoriginal. If you insist on trying to be trendy and adding booze to your ice cream, why not start with something safe and unimaginative like an Irish coffee with a local whiskey and maybe a caramel swirl.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,,2018-04-20,1,"Sorry Guys, but it is awful.",27,55,"I was very excited to see new flavors yesterday while I strolled down my favorite aisle at the supermarket. Besides my usual go to's, I grabbed a pint of ""Chillin' the Roast.""";;;

Chillin' the Roast,typical tor,2018-06-23,1,My disappointment is immeasurable/my day is ruined,12,15,"I was craving Ben and Jerry's tonight so made the journey to my closest convenience store to grab a pint. I usually opt for the trusty Tonight Dough, but was delighted to see some new flavors. This one in particular, ""Chillin' the Roast Truffles,"" immediately grabbed my attention. I'm a coffee lover/addict, and I do enjoy a good chocolate truffle. I figured this flavor would be right up my alley. BUT... I was wrong. The coffee ice cream is actually pretty good. But the truffles taste AWFUL. Instead of ""chocolate liqueur,"" the truffles taste like balls filled with a butterscotch that has been soaked in Kahlua for too long (and not in a good way). I love alcohol but these truffles are DISGUSTING. My disappointment is immeasurable and my day is ruined.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Ashley7868,2018-10-21,1,Duuuuude. Never been so disappointed,3,7,"Ugh, my heart hurts to even write this but this is by far the worst ice cream I’ve ever had from you guys!!! The fact that I can’t get my $5 makes it worse. I’ve tried a plethora of others flavors and was never disappointed but this is so.darn.disgusting. Take it back Benny, take it back";;;

Chillin' the Roast,mchardy,2018-04-29,2,"I expected at least an 8, I got a 4 at best",2,2,"I really love coffee, particularly cold brew. When I saw this product, I ventured away from my typical ice cream choice of Tonight Dough, and I was downright ecstatic to try it out. Did I think that it would measure up to Tonight Dough or S'more? No. But, I did expect more than what I got. It just did not live up to the quality one would expect from a Ben and Jerry's ice cream. I would not recommend. It tastes like a weird type of coffee ice cream. The truffles are too sweet, and the 'fudge' ribbons in the product do not taste like fudge to me. They are very rich. I am sure some people might enjoy it, I however was disappointed. I came in expecting at least an 8, and left with half a pint of ice cream and a strong 4.";;;
Chillin' the Roast
author: Bjsup3531
title: Not bad but not great
text;;;: The ice cream itself is really good. Strongest coffee tasting ice cream I've had from Ben and jerry's. The truffle part is disgusting though and there isn't much of a fudge swirl. What I mean by much is nun at all basically.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,Brothernatureman,2020-06-05,5,That good good,0,1,"This is my favorite ice cream. When 711 carried it by my house I was livin’ on easy street but now I live in an ocean of chaos. There seems to be little to no hope in finding it again. But I will carry on. I will not cease to search out the good good. That’s actually why I’m on this site. I couldn’t believe it has a 3 star rating. My mama always said if you don’t have anything nice to say don’t say anything at all. It’s delicious. Strong robust flavour. Creamy good goodness and all the little tasties that they add to the mix, ya dig? Try it for yourself and let’s keep this one on the shelves.";;;
Chillin' the Roast,S3procto,2018-04-02,5,Delicious,4,0,"Absolutely delicious l, intense coffee flavor with a nice undertone of the liquor.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Mekagyrl,2018-06-27,2,It made my mouth sad,1,1,"I bought this ice cream flavor, because I am a coffee flavor addict. I mean I even eat chocolate covered expresso beans. My favorite Coffee, Coffee, Buzz, Buzz, Buzz flavor has apparently been discontinued in my neck of the woods. The only place I can actually find it is at the little Ben & Jerry's stand in our local mall. The flavor of the ice cream itself is great. I even enjoyed the swirls of fudge. The coffee liqueur was disgusting. It tarnished the whole pint of ice cream for me. I was strong and bitter, just not a pleasant taste. I tried to eat around it, but I ended up throwing the container out. Back to purchasing hand packed pints of my favorite from the local mall. Hopefully they will never stop ordering it.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Anonymoose,2019-03-31,1,Overall disappointed,1,1,"I have 2 go to flavors when picking B&J, but craved coffee ice cream and decided to branch out. The cold brew sounded amazing, the cookie crumble is my favorite part about The Tonight Dough, and the liquor truffle sounded great considering the complemented flavors. The cold brew ice cream was left a little lacking in my opinion but was edible. The fudge and cookie crumble was really good, but I could not get over the truffle itself. It tasted too strong and overpowered everything else, which I wouldn’t mind, if it had tasted good. It was too strong, and too fake of a liquor taste. I love you B&J, your Tonight Dough and Phish Food are amazing, but the truffle just didn’t cut it for me, and the ice cream itself was lacking.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,FuzzyGut,2018-07-05,3,Not bad...,2,0,"Not bad, but the other Ben and Jerry’s coffee flavors are better, in my opinion. The ice cream was very good but the truffles were too strong for my taste, and a little strange. The chocolate swirl was also a little too intense. You can definitely taste that it’s cold brew as opposed to regular coffee and it’s impressive that B&J was able to capture that difference. No amateur ice cream makers, this group.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,SRDine,2018-03-19,1,It is not good,5,5,"I love Ben & Jerry's. I especially love the mocha and coffee flavored ice creams, so I was very excited to try Chillin' the Roast. I am sorry to report it is by far the worst B&J flavor that I've ever tried. The cold brew flavored ice cream was fine, it was not offensive and with the right add-ins it could have been a decent flavor. However, the truffles were terrible;" they tasted sour and occasionally a little like blue cheese. I'm sad this was so bad
author: I wanted to love it.""";;

name: Chillin' the Roast,Chigirl312,2018-07-29,5,My new favorite!,1,0,"I had two or 3 pints of this before not being able to find it. It’s my new favorite after Coffee Heath Bar changed its ingredients and was no longer irresistible. The coffee flavor is a little different, not as sweet — and the truffles, true to their name, have a liquer flavor. Wonderful combination if you love coffee! I guess on one hand, I’m relieved not to be eating it regularly since losing weight has been easier, but I miss finding it on my grocery trips...please restock!!";;;

Chillin' the Roast,CW784,2018-07-01,4,For espresso lovers,1,0,"I actually really loved the coffee flavor of this ice cream. My usual favorite is Coffee Coffee Buzz Buzz Buzz, but I can only ever find that in scoop shops (which I rarely patronize). The Chillin' the Roast Truffles was available at my grocery store so I pounced. It has a taste that people who enjoy dark roast coffee, plain cold brew, black coffee, or deep espressos will enjoy in my opinion. A lot of coffee ice creams just have a very mild coffee flavor you can barely detect beneath the plain sugar and cream flavor. This was true coffee and tasted excellent.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,XxRavenxX,2019-11-23,2,A better name would be chillin the tastebuds,0,0,"Got a small pint of this from a friend who thought I'd enjoy it due to me bei g both an avid lover of chocolate & an avid lover of coffee. I was super stoked to crack it open tonight and dive into the creamy dream the description promised, only to be disappointed. The ice cream was grainy, the fudge was entirely overpowered by bitter cold brew, & the truffles tasted of nothing but bitter coconut--I had to stop eating and double check the flavour listing to be sure I hadn't made a mistake. This blend missed the mark, but at least there's rum in it? Hopefully b&j Wil try again at a coffee & chocolate combo, & hopefully it will be better than this.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Jarronimo,2018-04-03,5,Very Impressive,4,1,"I bought it last night at Target, and I really enjoyed it! It's so yummy! the truffles were delicious & coffee liqueur really hit me, eating it slowly is the best definitely will be returning to get more";;;

Chillin' the Roast,kishijoten,2018-09-20,5,Wow. Just...wow.,2,0,"Bold coffee flavor (more espresso bean than cold brew, I think, but I like it.) Thick fudgey truffles with a lovely top-shelf bourbon flavor. Oh my oh my. This is one delightful ice cream. Not for those who do not like whisky or strong coffee, but perfect for those who do.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,TinaBeana,2018-09-09,5,Delicious,1,0,"I love this flavor. I am actually currently going back and forth between the caramel chocolate cheesecake truffle, and this one. If you LOVE Coffee, you'll love this. When you hit one of the truffles, it is like an explosion of delicious coffee liqueur on your tongue-and you get a little crunch from the cookie crumble, which all fits perfectly together. It is perfect for curling up and watching the latest episode of your favorite show, or even movie night.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Gumbyz,2018-03-07,3,Almost Perfect,2,2,"I'm a huge fan of coffee ice cream, and I've tried many different brands of coffee ice cream. When I picked up Chillin the Roast yesterday, I was amazed at first with the mocha taste. Then out of nowhere I get a huge coffee bean and it was so bitter and strong. It unbalances and overpowers The chocolate and the ice cream itself. It was really good, probably top 3 in my coffee ice cream suggestions. However I found myself avoiding the coffee bits after cringing while getting past the bitterness.";;;
Chillin' the Roast
author: Garol
title: Love love love
text;;;: Wish all stores that carry Ben & Jerry's have this flavor. I stopped going to my go-to grocery store just because they don't carry this flavor. This might be my favorite Ben & Jerry's ice cream. I like how it it not too sweet.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: tagirl
title: Weird Truffles
text;;;: Just a misfire. The candy pieces are terrible tasting. Did not enjoy. Your boozy flavors tend to be bad.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,Mattis,2018-04-29,3,Trouble with the Truffles,4,2,"I love the coffee ice cream but would like more chocolate swirl and no truffles at all. The truffles taste horrible. i can’t even describe what they taste like because I have never tasted anything like them. Rework it minus the truffles and I’m in but until then, it’s a no for me.";;;
Chillin' the Roast
author: sashakey
title: The flavor is to die for. Coffee lovers dream.
text;;;: Decadent flavors not only with the coffee but the liqueur taste. Definetly and adults sweet paradise. Once you’ve had it nothing will be the same. A+++;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: ItsMe
title: Not my favorite
text;;;: I was so excited when I got the e-mail about this - went to a scoop shop immediately to pick up hoping it would bring me back to my beloved Dublin Mudslide.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,kyleebug,2018-05-18,2,Terrible Truffles,0,2,"I love coffee with a passion! I also enjoy B&J’s ice cream from time to time. I was very excited after reading the title of this container, “Chillin’ the Roast Truffles”. Description is cold brew coffee, which I adore. I was very disappointed to find out the truffles in this container tastes like straight up coffee brandy liquor. I hate the truffles and for the first time in my life left this ice cream sitting in my freezer for a week, then ended up throwing it away. The ice cream itself was great!! It’s a no from me for the truffles.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Smoky,2018-07-01,3,"Ice cream flavor is great, truffles not so much",0,1,"I love coffee and coffee ice cream, so I was really excited to try this and had high hopes. I was disappointed, sadly.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,lalalacroi,2018-04-25,2,"Great Ice Cream, Terrible Truffles",1,1,"The cold brew ice cream was great-really strong coffee flavor. The fudge swirls are also great and balance out the acidity of the coffee flavor, but the truffles are absolutely disgusting. I'd give it a higher rating, but there were so many truffles it was hard to get a bite without them. There's also not enough fudge swirls. If this didn't have the truffles it would be one of my favorite flavors.";;;
Chillin' the Roast
author: sarahfoun
title: Surprisingly terrible
text;;;: Wow this was surprisingly terrible. Only are a few bites and didn't even want to eat anymore. Can't imagine how anyone would like this.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,amom,2018-05-05,1,A HUGE Disappointment,0,2,"I love your coffee/chocolate combinations (Coffee Coffee Buzz Buzz is my favorite), but this one was nasty. I came to your website and the reviews for the first time ever (and I've been eating Ben and Jerry's forever), just to see if maybe I missed a hazelnut ingredient coating the truffles (I hate hazelnut). Or something that didn't belong. The coffee ice cream was awesome, until (I guess) I bit into a truffle. Ugh. I actually just tossed $5 of ice cream into the trash.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,PWRW,2019-06-07,1,"Grainy, bland ice cream base",0,0,"The ice cream base was grainy, as if product had melted and been refrozen. It didn't taste like coffee. It tasted like grainy ice milk with a mild and bland flavor. I couldn't comment on the truffles, as other reviewers have, because the sandy texture of the base - neither creamy nor tasty -was so disappointing I put it back in my freezer after three bites. I am hoping my local grocer will offer a refund. This pint was a terrible disappointment!";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Icecreamaddict,2018-04-20,1,Disappointed,2,3,"I was so hoping to find a new favorite coffee ice cream, but the texture was a bit more grainy than usual, and I was shocked by the truffles... wow they were so strong! They tasted like an unnatural chemical. I had my husband try it and he had to spit it out. So sad! We love B&J’s!";;;

Chillin' the Roast,hoochiebird,2018-05-25,5,Best Coffee Ice Cream EVER!,1,1,"I love coffee and was very excited to see this new flavor at the grocery store. I couldn't wait to get home and try it and to say the least I was not disappointed. Hands down the best coffee ice cream I have ever tried. I have already retuned to get more. Love it, love it, love it. Well done Ben & Jerry's!!";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Sam12,2019-12-13,2,"I'll finish the pint, but probably won't buy again",0,0,"Since I had just finished a pint of ""Coffee, Coffee, Buzz Buzz Buzz"" I figured I would try this one. They are incredibly different in every way, from color to taste to ingredients, so I wouldn't compare the two. I would like the ice cream on its own, the cold brew ice cream would be good with chocolate chips as a iced-mocha flavor concept. But with these truffles, listed as ""chocolate-cookie covered liqueur truffles"", the chocolate (which tastes just like chocolate, not sure where the cookie is), does not stay attached to the truffle inside. The liqueur truffle itself is the consistency of cookie butter, I was expecting the something harder. They definitely give a bit of a kick, which may not be what you are into. I plan on finishing the pint, but I think I have to be in the mood for it and it won't be the first thing in the fridge that I reach for.";;;
Chillin' the Roast,J101019,2019-03-05,1,Dont buy,2,2,"I bought this because they were out of buzz,buzz,buzz. I didn't know there was a way to mess up coffee icecream but this is it.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Lana17,2018-12-27,5,My new favorite!,0,0,"I loved everything about this flavor and I think it may have replaced Cherry Garcia as my new favorite. I like the heavy coffee flavoring of the ice cream — it’s a bolder coffee flavor than previous Ben & Jerry’s offerings. It’s sweet without being too sweet, which gives the gooey chocolate swirl ample room to shine AND some added sweetness from the gloriously boozy truffles. I’m gonna need to get another pint of this soon!";;;

Chillin' the Roast,MissyMiss,2018-04-26,2,Missed the mark,1,1,"The ice cream itself and chocolate swirl are great, but the truffles... ooh boy. This is the first BJ review I have ever given, and I actually came to the website to see if I had gotten a bad batch, or if everyone else had the same reaction to this flavor. Bitter and sour taste.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Smedley,2018-03-24,1,So disappointing!,1,1,"I always look forward to new flavors so I had to try this one. I have to say that this is the worst flavor I have ever tried! Weak coffee flavor, no sign of a chocolate swirl and the truffles were inedible. This is the first pint of Ben and Jerry’s that I could not finish.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Fishngal,2018-03-27,5,Best appreciated by TRUE coffee addicts,1,1,"I thought this flavor was AMAZING. Though I’m not a huge coffee liquer fan, you get exactly what they advertise. I thought the truffles complimented the overall flavor, which is definitely overwhelmingly deliciously rich strong coffee. Love it, new favorite for sure.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,cgm13,2018-12-31,1,Textures and Tastes Way Off,0,0,"I normally love Ben and Jerry's, and coffee is my weakness... this though. Just a miss. I didn't care for the taste or the texture of the truffles-- very weird. I agree around them for a whole, but ultimately threw away more of the pint than its ever have imagined. The swirls were alright, but the gritty texture of the coffee grounds in the ice cream was way too much for me. Sorry, guys. This was not a winner.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Heyhanhey,2018-06-09,2,"Actual ice cream, delicious. Truffles are a fail.",0,0,"I was torn between the two new truffle flavors, and decided to go with this one. The cold brew coffee ice cream is a LITTLE grainy but not like others I’ve had. The texture of the truffles was nice, but the flavor was a total turn off. I ended up eating around them until they were too hard to avoid. Then I threw the rest away. Granted, I’m not a booze person, but the truffle flavor was truly acrid. Too bad!";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Ntim,2018-04-23,1,The only flavor I can’t eat,1,2,"I love Ben & Jerry’s and I love coffee, but the coffee liquor “truffles” are strong and nasty. And it tastes like crushed coffee beans throughout the ice cream and not in a good way. Hardly any chocolate (at least not in the pint I purchased). I never say this, (but this is an exception), this flavor is a flop.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Reannanqueen,2020-08-24,3,Not a great combo,0,0,"I bought this simply because the flavor I REALLY wanted wasn't on the shelf and I figured ""why not?"" The description on front sounded great but I was slightly disappointed to find light colored ice cream when I took off the lid (I don't care for vanilla) but one bite in, I was a fan. The cold-brew coffee flavor is powerful and is even better than the flavor of ice cream in Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz! And the fudge swirls match that flavor perfectly. But what I found did not fit well were the truffles. They added a bitter taste and I found they did not mesh well with the other flavors. I figured I could just eat around them or scoop them out. Sadly, the shells are to fragile and broke when I tried this. After 15 mins of trying to avoid their bitterness, I ended up throwing the pint away. I was able to enjoy about a quarter of the ice cream and fudge. Awesome effort but needs adjustment (imo.)";;;

Chillin' the Roast,scoops,2018-03-26,3,"Best B&J's Coffee Base, But Not a Fan of Truffles",1,2,"Cold brew base is more of an espresso type, studded with flecks of coffee. This is the best coffee base I've ever tasted by B&J. Then, you get a bite of truffle. The coffee liqueur filling is overpowering;" you should really
author: really like coffee liqueur to enjoy these. For me

name: Chillin' the Roast,Hans,2019-05-26,5,A special occasion flavor for adults,0,0,"This is for adults. This is delicious. This may be my favorite flavor in decades, but it is a flavor to be savored and even thought about. It's very complex, and you should enjoy it at various temperatures to get all the coffee flavors. The texture is relatively simple, and the chocolate around the truffles could be slightly darker and nicer, but bravo to whoever put this recipe together.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Riso,2019-05-02,1,Threw It In The Garbage,0,0,"This flavor is so bad that Chillin' the Roast is the first pint of Ben & Jerry's that I ever threw in the garbage. It has a very odd, un-ice-cream like texture and weird flavors. It's kind of foamy and the flavors are so strange that I can't even describe them. I looked at the ingredients and it's full of gums, carrageenan, canola and soybean oils and 'natural flavors'. Mystery solved.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,kingkyle,2018-07-28,1,Not for me. Probably not you either.,0,0,"I actually accidentally grabbed a pint of this, I was want the Chocolate Cheesecake Truffle. I got messed up by the both being truffle ice cream! However I was already home when I realized it. The taste of this ice cream is horrible. It's souer and the coffee over powers everything else. I only ate a few spoons and I was done. Probably the worst ice cream I've ever tasted.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Zennie,2018-03-08,2,"Weak coffee flavor, invisible fudge swirl",0,0,"Picked up this, because I love really good coffee ice cream, and a pint of Phish Food. Good thing I had the Phish Food, because this has weak, milky coffee ice cream, had no visible fudge swirls, and the coffee liqueur truffles tasted more like butterscotch. You guys need to tase some of your premium ice cream competitors coffee ice cream, or call this one ""Cafe au Lait"".";;;
Chillin' the Roast
author: Loraine
title: Unfortunate Flavor
text;;;: I love cold brew coffee and I love coffee ice creams. The truffles were a huge let down and didn't really taste much like coffee and had a weird alcohol liqeur thing going on. Also there was a air pocket in the bottom of my pint so I was missing about a quarter of product. I wish my local stores carried the other coffee flavors because this one did not meet the mark.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: Amy2700
title: Not What I Expected
text;;;: Not good. The coffee liquor truffles taste weird and the overall flavor doesn’t mesh with all the flavors. Very disappointed and I love all B&J flavors.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: Danicecreamman
title: I love Ben and Jerry's EXCEPT THIS FLACOR
text;;;: This is one of the only flavors i've thrown into the trash. Don't waste your time. Eat any other wonder flavor they have... just not this mess.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: Jvc23
title: Coffee ice cream done right just for grown ups
text;;;: It isn’t amazing if you really like something complex and sweet and you are a fan of coffee you will love it. I see negative reviews but they were looking for something more standard they have their expectations for coffee flavored Ice cream. This is my favorite commercial ICe cream. It isn’t overly sweet and it has coffee and alcohol and chocolate it’s perfect!;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,MitchV,2018-07-01,5,Fantastic - best new flavor in *years*,0,0,"This is a wonderful alternative to flavors often geared towards an overly sweet American pallet. The texture, taste and flavor combinations are incredible. This is the first Ben & Jerry's review I've ever left, and this is the flavor that compelled me to do so!";;;
Chillin' the Roast
author: SexyAngel
title: Big let down
text;;;: the icecream and fudge swirls taste amazing but the truffles are so revolting i litterally almost through up i would rather you guys bring back coffee coffee buzz buzz then continue this flavor as the biggest part of the icecream is the worst part... if you want to fix it get rid of the coffee liquer truffles and rreplace it with something expresso;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,Mel92issa,2020-03-26,1,Horrible,0,0,"I picked this up at the grocery store the other day. I had never seen it before and the description sounded amazing. The cold brew ice cream itself is amazing, but those liquor truffles are terrible. They have this over powering salty, alcohol caramel taste to them. I tried to eat around them but I eventually just threw it away. So disappointed!";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Squisheyraerey,2018-10-28,2,Super unexpected,0,0,"I saw this ice cream and though it both looked and sounded amazing. Although the ice cream itself is yummy coffee deliciousness, those cookie-covered chocolate chunks are god awful. Or at least just not for me. The coffee flavor is very overwhelming and not at all what i expected. I tried suffering through but i couldn't. I'm disappointed lol";;;
Chillin' the Roast
author: Ice cream man
title: Not bad
text;;;: The coffee ice cream is ok! But the coffee liqueur bites are kinda butterscotch heavy!;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,Roxielpn,2018-05-12,1,Disappointed,0,0,"I was so excited to see a coffee flavor, as it is one of my favorites. When I opened the carton, a wonderful coffee scent was released. Then the taste test. The ice cream and the fudge were fine, but the “truffles” were gross. I can’t describe the flavor, but it was very unpleasant. I doubt I’ll eat any more then the small sample I had.";;;
Chillin' the Roast
author: Whyyyyyy
title: New Favorite Flavor!
text;;;: I've always loved coffee ice cream and liqueur chocolates so for me this flavor was a huge hit. I first got it a few months back then had trouble finding it in stock again until now and was totally stoked to buy it again. Apparently it's a love it or hate it flavor so I would say try it for yourself. Don't let the haters change you B&J;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,toaster389,2018-06-13,5,Coffee Ice Cream Like I've Never Had It Before,0,0,"This is an outstanding flavor that really re-imagines what can be done with coffee ice cream. I've had 3 pints already and I've only known about this flavor for a week! Some people have said the truffles taste weird, but I think they add a very unique flavor and this flavor should be kept as-is. I know I'll be buying it!";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Runnermom,2018-05-20,5,Coffee and crunchies=Bliss,0,0,"I picked this up this morning at the grocery. It's gone. One sitting. I'm not a super-sweet eater, but I broke the rules for this. Coffee flavor, then the liqueur taste...plus some crunchy yumminess to chew on. I am tempted to run to the store and buy the rest to deep freeze for when they take it out of circulation.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,gingerbread92,2019-02-13,1,Awful alcohol taste,0,0,"I bought this because I love coffee and chocolate, but the truffles made me gag! The truffles made the ice cream INEDIBLE. I did not know there was alcohol in this flavor and wish it would have been more obviously stated on the package as I do not drink. This has seriously broken my trust with Ben & Jerry's.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Lovelylashaee,2018-05-01,4,Pretty good,0,0,"I loved the cold brew ice cream and the chocolate cookie crust, however the coffee liqueur truffle inside the cookie crust was super sweet and I could only handle about 2 chunks. After a while I just scooped those chunks of the truffle itself out of its crust and set them aside and tasted much better.";;;
Chillin' the Roast
author: eli22
title: Tastes fuzzy
text;;;: I usually love any Ben & Jerry's but unfortunately this is a big miss - I don't know any better way to describe it than to say it tastes kind of fuzzy. I'd rather have coffee flavored ice cream than the cold brew grounds even if the flavor is stronger. And the truffles are as bad as people say. Yikes.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: Kaitlin
title: A+++
text;;;: Normally I can only eat a tiny amount of Ben and Jerry’s. I almost devoured this pint in one sitting. The malt flavor reminds me of the tiny malt cups with the wooden spoon that I would get from the ice cream man as a kid. Absolutely in love with this flavor. And mash mellow in there too!;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: NuMystic
title: Finally the return of a REAL coffee flavor to B&J!
text;;;: Not since Aztec Harvest coffee has there been an ice cream flavor that has a good STRONG coffee flavor. Thank you B&J for finally fulfilling this much needed gap in the ice cream world! Only thing I'd love even more is a smooth mix-in free Espresso ice cream and I can die a happy man. :);;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: CarG
title: Swing and a miss
text;;;: For me this flavor was a miss. The ice cream was gritty and the truffles tasted a little too boozy. I think the flavor combo could work with some adjustments but I won't be trying this one again. I'm still a Ben & Jerry's fan and will not hold one disappointing flavor against them.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,Dani16,2018-07-16,5,Definitely for true coffee lovers!,0,1,"I personally loved this new flavor. The coffee flavor is pretty strong and so are the coffee liquor truffles. I would definitely buy this ice cream flavor again. But if you’re not into that strong coffee flavor, I wouldn’t go for this one. Otherwise, definitely try it out! :)";;;
Chillin' the Roast
author: Shell
title: Disappointing
text;;;: Generally speaking I have loved trying new flavors but this one just didn't live up to my expectations. It had an odd aftertaste and the texture just wasn't appealing. Hoping the kids are less picky and will consume the rest of the pint otherwise it is getting tossed.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,Madferitme,2018-07-27,1,Alcohol and ice cream don’t mix,0,0,"I bought this last night, seeing truffles in the title I was excited to try it. The part that I missed was the liqueur in it. Talk about gross... that may be the only time I’ve ever said that about a Ben and Jerry’s flavor... as I sit here in my Ben and Jerry’s shirt.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,KelliMarie,2018-04-11,3,"Love the Ice Cream, Hate the Truffles",0,0,"I am a BIG coffee toffee bar crunch girl, and I haven’t been able to find it in my new city so I got this when I saw it. The ice cream is pretty good (4/5) but everytime I eat a truffle I feel like I’m taking a shot- they’re SO STRONG. I would prefer a normal truffle.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Randy662,2019-03-12,5,I fell in love with Ben and Jerry's again,0,0,"Because of this flavor, well, the title says it all. It is my new favorite and I buy multiple containers in the store whenever i see it, especially when I'm not even intending on buying ice cream that day. No stores near me sell it and I wish more stores carried it.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,ICLover,2019-10-01,1,"Very fake flavor in truffles, almost threw it away",0,0,"I bought this at my local grocery, and typically love coffee flavored treats from Ben & Jerrys, but the truffle bombs in this were just not good, the flavoring was overly artificial and almost antiseptic. Would have been better with a caramel swirl and no truffles!";;;
Chillin' the Roast
author: KEicecream
title: So Yummy!
text;;;: This tastes like a frappuccino! It is bold in its flavor.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: Gamndalf the white
title: Perfectly balanced
text;;;: Really good. If you love coffee you will love this flavor. Every element of this flavor went together perfectly. the fudge swirls help balance the strong truffles. the base icecream is the winner in this pint though! best coffee flavor by far from Ben and Jerrys.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: ash613
title: Excellent!
text;;;: I love this flavor! It has a nice strong coffee flavor. The truffles go really well with the cold brew ice cream and the chocolate swirl adds the perfect amount of sweetness. I also love that it has little specs of coffee grounds ❤️ Perfect for any coffee lover!;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,Kthree,2018-03-26,5,My new favorite,0,0,"My husband bought a pint of this and, on a whim because I don’t eat much ice cream, I tried a bit.";;;
Chillin' the Roast
author: Jeepin Jesse
title: A replacement for the Coffee Heath bar switcharoo
text;;;: Good coffee flavor and the little bites have a liquor flavor thats not overpowering. This is a good replacement for the ruined Coffee Heath bar after they removed the heath bar and substituted with some non goo garbage. Great job folks;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: kibbyposh
title: overall I really like it
text;;;: My favorite part is the coffee ice cream. Just the right amount of bitter to compensate for the sweetness of the chocolate swirls. My only issue is the flavor of the truffles. Its too much. Too bitter. It doesn't work well with the rest of the flavors.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,ttarrant4,2018-10-22,5,My new favorite,0,0,"I’m not even a particularly big coffee fan, but this flavor is AWESOME. I hope it sticks around. It’s easily in my top 3 all time favorites, and I think it would be a smart move to keep it given the ever-rising popularity of cold brew coffee.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Sam10,2019-02-18,1,Sadly disappointed,0,0,"I decided to try a new flavor because the idea sounded good, but it did not meet expectations of Ben & Jerry’s! The actual coffee flavored ice cream is good, but the truffles taste gross. Was this even taste tested before distribution??";;;

Chillin' the Roast,JavaJunkieJen,2019-03-04,5,Great authentic coffee flavor,0,0,"This is by far my favorite! I love the delicious, true coffee flavor and the truffles are to die for. As a bona fide coffee junkie, I heartily recommend this ice cream! Now if only I could get it in a larger quantity than a pint...";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Mammakarma,2019-04-28,5,Chillin' In All The Right Ways!,0,0,"This is my new favorite. I was a huge White Russian fan and this is now my Treat Night go to. The coffee flavor is smooth and mellow, a slight bit of liquor and the textures of dark chocolate, this all dances on the tongue. I smile!";;;

Chillin' the Roast,bjlover,2018-07-04,5,Bold & Creamy with Delicate Truffles,0,0,"Delish! Bold coffee flavor balanced with creamy texture and melt in your mouth truffles, love it! I'm in Starbucks country where us Seattleites like our coffee treats strong so this hits the spot. Pleeeease make a non-dairy version";;;
Chillin' the Roast
author: Lizpaddle
title: Coffee and crispy chocolate YUM
text;;;: We just found the Chillin the Roast Truffles this week. The coffee flavor is rich and creamy. The chocolate cookie-covered coffee liqueur truffles are flavor packed and delicious. And swirls of fudge all through. We love it!;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: Coffee1stNameIceCream2nd
title: Good Idea...but execution not so much
text;;;: I wanted to like this so much. If you only had the ice cream and more fudge swirl I think this would be better. Thise coffee liqueur cookie truffles ruined the ice cream. And the fudge swirl was almost non-existent in my pint.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,Cece123,2018-12-13,2,Interesting...,0,1,"The ice cream itself was okay for coffee lovers. The truffles were really yucky though, and I like coffee liqueur. Something just didn't taste right. And then the fudge swirls weren't good either! I could only have a few bites";;;
Chillin' the Roast
author: Chery
title: Mouth watering truffles
text;;;: Excited to find this new coffee flavor. Each bite was better than the last. The truffles were an extra bonus of thick chocolate and a creamy center. So delicious I will be requesting it to be stocked in my home town market.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: Ducky
title: So bad
text;;;: Picjed this up when store didnt have brewed to matter. Super disapointed. Coffee flavor was okay. The rum and truffles was horrible. Rum was overpowering and super gross I had to toss this. Bring backmdublin mudslide.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: chris617
title: Incredible
text;;;: I don’t understand all the negative reviews regarding the truffles tasting alcoholic. It says on the label that it contains liqueur! And boy does it deliver! I mean who could say no to caffeine and alcohol in an ice cream?;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: Chai
title: I'm in love
text;;;: As someone who drinks alot of coffee this is amazing. it's sweet enough to counter balance the cold brew but the flavors still taste the coffee. The cookie bite help make it the go to I'm having a bad day.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: JJCA
title: Don’t waste your time
text;;;: The coffee ice cream in this flavor is so so but the truffles have a distinctly awful flavor. I ended up trying to pick around them and then just throwing it out. Definitely would never buy this again;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,Bedie,2018-05-18,1,Not good,0,0,"This is just not good. For the first time ever, I ate a few bites and threw the rest away. The coffee ice cream itself is ok, but not with the combination of other flavors in there. I'm disappointed.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Bobcrl76,2019-01-24,5,Delicious!,0,0,"You guys still havent brought back Dublin Mudslide but this is an awfully steong competitor! I’m just having some trouble getting my hands on a second pint here in Brooklyn, NY. Happy scooping!";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Coffee Fan,2018-06-25,5,Best coffee flavor ever,0,0,"Ive been eating coffee icecream for almost 40 years. When I was little you could only find it in New England. This is by far my favorite coffee icecream, they nailed it. Hope it sticks around.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,AdopElliwasuas,2018-04-13,5,"I've never had a favorite ice cream, until now!",0,0,"From the first bite of Chillin' the Roast Truffles, my World was changed. 36 years and I've never come close to having a favorite Ice Cream. Bravo, Ben & Jerry, this flavour is a triumph!";;;
Chillin' the Roast
author: Nicole23
title: Horrible
text;;;: I normally love your ice cream but this was a huge disappointment. Super bitter tasting and the feeling of coffee grounds with every bite. The flavor of the truffles were extremely strong.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,lemmingade,2020-01-03,5,So Good!,0,0,"I am so sad that this is clearanced aty local grocery storeI find it really delicious, with a strong coffee liqueur flavor that is not overshadowed by the sweet richness of the chocoate.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,SaraJoe9682,2018-12-22,5,Best ice cream ever,0,0,"This nice cream is my ultimate favorite. Its absolutely amazing. The cold brew ice cream hits the spot every time, and biting into a coffee liquor truffle is just divine. I am addicted.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Ahall427,2019-01-23,1,I had to throw it out,0,0,"I had to throw it out, Which is very sad because I love Ben & Jerry’s and this is the first flavor that I just could not stomach. The coffee Lacore is just too much it’s offputting";;;

Chillin' the Roast,Gramma,2018-05-22,5,Coffee lover!!!!,0,1,"Love this stuff! After a competitor stopped making my favorite ice cream, I found this and I'm so glad I did! It's now my favorite ice cream. Don't ever stop making this...YUM!!!!";;;

Chillin' the Roast,shadyladybug,2018-05-02,1,Tossed it in the trash!,0,0,"My husband is an ice cream lover, he will eat almost any flavor, even if he isn't crazy about it. He tossed this in the trash because it's just that awful! I hated it too.";;;
Chillin' the Roast
author: Nicolle
title: Best Flavor
text;;;: Next to the sadly retired Wavy Gravy ( I am still sad) Chillin the Roast may be my favorite! I am frustrated however because I am finding it difficult to locate in stores.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: Catef
title: so good
text;;;: this is the first coffee ice cream i've had that astes like actual coffee was so excited when i saw it and definitely lived up to my expectations!!! my new favorite!!!;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: allybeezer
title: My favorite flavor of ice cream EVER
text;;;: I always need some in the freezer! I’m sad that none of my grocery stores sell it anymore though. I can’t find it anywhere. :’( Still the ice cream love of my life!;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,LittleAngel,2018-09-14,5,The ONLY coffee ice cream I truly enjoy,0,0,"I love coffee but everytime I tried coffee flavored ice cream, I've always been disappointed. Until NOW! Thank you Ben and Jerry's for this awesome new flavor!!";;;
Chillin' the Roast
author: ACRV
title: FOR COFFEE LOVERS ONLY
text;;;: i cant find this flavor anywhere!! i think its because not many people like it but i love it! its for true coffee lovers only! PLEASE PUT IT BACK IN STORES!!!!;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: Soundchicmic
title: Truffletastic!
text;;;: This has quickly taken over as my favorite B&J ice cream flavor! I freakin love it! The only thing that could make it better is more truffles! Omg SO GOOD!;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: CoffeeLover123456789
title: Amazon flavor
text;;;: Great coffee flavor that is complimented by the coffee liqueur truffles. Has that beautiful chocolate flavor but the coffee is not overpowered by sweetness;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,KrisR,2019-08-04,1,deeply disappointed,0,0,"It kind of tastes like Baileys, but gross. I’ve never been disappointed by Ben or Jerry until tonight. Still love them, but my heart and stomach hurt.";;;

Chillin' the Roast,deez,2018-06-23,4,it's alright.,0,0,"The coffee bits are so concentrated, it tastes like alcohol. But if you add chocolate syrup, it balances it out enough for me to where I can enjoy it.";;;
Chillin' the Roast
author: Motleyangel
title: Great coffee flavor but too much liquor flavor
text;;;: Love the coffee ice cream but the truffle chunks taste like straight up alcohol.... it put a damper on what could’ve been an amazing ice cream.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: Purpleflyy
title: My favorite!
text;;;: I bought this many times and it is one of my favorite flavors they have come out with. I have been so disappointed I cant find it any more!;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,Megleg,2019-11-25,2,"Ice cream yes, truffles no",0,1,I have never met a B&J flavor I didn’t like. Until now. The truffles ruined it for me - a nasty burst of bitter. So disappointed. :(;;;
Chillin' the Roast
author: AJ105
title: Not as good as other coffee flavors
text;;;: Coffee base tastes kind of watered down. Truffles are overpowering and not very tasty in comparison. First pint I failed to finish.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,Mjp9898,2018-03-20,3,It's likeable,0,1,"I love the cold brew ice cream because I love coffee grinds. But I did not care for the truffles, they are extremely overpowering.";;;
Chillin' the Roast
author: Steph78
title: Coffee with chocolate truffle goodness!
text;;;: I tried this on a whim and I’m so glad that I did. It’s delicious! Sweet cookie truffles in coffee ice cream. Absolutely divine!;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,Akatc,2018-03-06,5,So yummy!,0,1,"The ratio of truffle to ice cream is perfect. I love the spin on the coffee ice cream flavor, i hope this one is here to stay!!!";;;
Chillin' the Roast
author: ChrissyMarie
title: Coffee Lovers Unite!
text;;;: Whoever thinks this flavor is gross is CRAZY! Guess you have to be a true coffee lover to appreciate how DELICIOUS this is!!;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,Hayhay20,2018-05-17,5,BEST ONE YET,0,0,"Perfect mix of all my favorite things! I’m a huge fan of coffee icecream but also chocolate, and this is the perfect combo.";;;
Chillin' the Roast
author: 5hay
title: Coffee Lover
text;;;: I have purchased this flavor twice. Its hard to find but GR8 to eat. I totally loved it! It for the true coffee lovers....;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,MarkChana,2018-10-02,1,Way too bitter,0,0,"I like coffee flavored products, but this was way too bitter for my liking. Also not a fan of the whole Truffle gimmick.";;;
Chillin' the Roast,Marissa16,2018-06-09,5,Yummy!!,0,0,"I just bought this today. I love it! Coffee is one of my favorite flavors of ice cream, this did not disappoint!!";;;
Chillin' the Roast
author: Tashabeee
title: Great coffee flavor but...
text;;;: The coffee flavor is amazing but the truffle had a to strong of after taste. The fudge was spot on as well.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: kp84
title: heavenly
text;;;: A coffee party in your mouth! I just saw these were clearanced at Walmart. I HOPE they're not going away;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: chuchuvu
title: Great Flavor
text;;;: Taste absolutely amazing. I absolutely love the coffee truffle pits in my ice along with amazing flavor.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,Dpecunia,2018-09-07,5,Yummy liquer flavor! Very intense coffee taste!,0,0,"Bought this to try something new! Wasn’t expecting much from the coffee, Exceeded my expectations!";;;
Chillin' the Roast,mip123,2018-06-21,5,Much better than the 3.2 score it's getting 062118,0,0,"Had this yesterday, thoroughly impressed. Much more then other flavors getting much higher scores.";;;
Chillin' the Roast
author: ice cream know it all
title: Way off the mark.
text;;;: The truffles were soggy & disgusting and did not compliment the already off flavored ice cream.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: Johnny5
title: Ice Cream for Adults
text;;;: Great complex flavor combination that just works. I really hope this one sticks around.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,Rainy,2020-07-24,5,great taste！,0,0,"This my favorite ice cream. However, I could not find it this year. Is it discontinued?";;;

title: Great Flavor
text;;;: It's the best Ben and Jerry ice cream hands down. However it's really hard to find :(;;;

author: ndsisve1976
title: Very Dissatisfied
text;;;: Ice cream was bland and the liqueur truffles were disgusting. Had to pick them out!;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: ChrisInMaine
title: Delicious
text;;;: All the things I want in ice cream. If I can’t have Festivus anymore I’ll take this.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: Stickman
title: Love it
text;;;: Love Chillin the Roast Truffles . Also love coffee toffee crunch and phish food;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,lexi235,2018-04-02,1,Just Plain Weird,0,1,"The texture is odd, really grainy. The truffle flavour is strong but unpleasant.";;;
Chillin' the Roast
author: icecreamkween
title: BRING THIS BACK
text;;;: This is one my favorites from the truffle series! Target refuses to carry it!;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: ShelB
title: Great Job!
text;;;: A superb blend of flavors and textures! I thoroughly enjoyed this ice cream!;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: TheRooster57
title: Whoa!!
text;;;: This is the most amazing ice cream I’ve ever enjoyed!! A true masterpiece!!;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: MJ5829
title: Had high hopes
text;;;: Disappointed. To sum up the flavor in one word ... Ashtray.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,rennberry,2018-04-11,2,"Good ice cream, bad truffles.",0,0,"The ice cream was really tasty, but the truffles ruin it.";;;
Chillin' the Roast,Maary,2018-06-08,5,This is awesome!!!!!!,0,0,"It’s everything I want in an ice cream , it’s so good!!";;;
Chillin' the Roast,Big Ebe,2018-06-08,5,My life is complete!,0,0,"Truffles bring big, deep flavor. Hits all flavor notes.";;;
