author: StephaniePeters
title: So good
text;;;: New favorite flavor. Would recommend to coffee lovers.;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast,Hurkle,2018-08-29,5,Fantastic flavors!,0,0,"Saw it at the store, got it, and going back for more.";;;
Chillin' the Roast,Syd527,2018-05-07,3,Disappointed,0,0,"Not my favorite, the coffee flavor was kind of strong";;;
Chillin' the Roast
author: Linda
title: Delicious!!!
text;;;: This flavor was simply delicious is all I can say!!!;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: Itsmejjtothep
title: Fav Ice Cream Of All-Times!!!!!
text;;;: I Simply Love It Please Keep Forever And Ever!!!!!!!;;;

name: Chillin' the Roast
author: ed75369
title: Terrible
text;;;: Threw it away without finishing it. Honestly awful;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,Justamom,2018-05-08,2,Hey Ben and Jerry where is my cookie dough?,5,1,"Always have loved your chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream, my husband knows this and came home with some. Well it takes very little to excite me these days but after a day of errands, housework, homework, dinner then getting son to bed all I kept thinking of, was that small tub of heaven in my freezer. So finally I put on some Guilty pleasure reality television snugged into my couch with my favorite blanket and my favorite ice cream only to notice that after a couple spoonfuls......NO COOKIE DOUGH! This can’t be correct NOOOOOOOOO!! First I was really doubting I was smarter than a fifth grader and now NO COOKIE DOUGH! Not the ending I needed to this day!";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: Paul
title: Expensive vanilla ice cream - Where's the dough?
text;;;: Mine does not look like the example photo... there was barely any cookie dough! I basically just paid over £4 for a tub of vanilla ice cream. Very disappointing.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,Jason,2018-04-06,5,Favorite Since Childhood,14,2,"Ben & Jerry's Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough ice cream has been a favorite of mine since I was a kid. I always appreciated the rich vanilla ice cream and chunks of flavorful cookie dough (the dough isn't dry and flavorless like some other cookie dough ice creams). Sometimes you don't want a busy ice cream with too many extras and this is perfect. I usually go into it with the goal of only eating half the container, but always end up finishing it in one sitting. Classic, reliable, and delicious.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,Royalblue1990s,2019-07-19,3,Whered the chocolate chip chunks go!?,1,0,"Ive eatten this ice cream before, considering its the only non dairy i enjoy. I have gotten this as my favorite one out of the flavors so many times and never have i had this happen. Its good till november 13 2020. Todays date is july 2019. As you can see in the photo below....its just vanilla with cookie dough bites in it....WHY!? Im not that upset it still tastes good. I just hope it was processed right and not a recall of some sort and still put out on shelves.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,akg1,2017-10-14,1,Only 1 small dime sized piece of cookie dough,9,1,"I NEVER review anything, especially not food. But I live in Canada where this ice cream can run up to $10!! Wayyyyy more than other brands but you hope to get what you pay for. There was one small piece of cookie dough on the top, zero other pieces in the entire tub. The texture was weird and icy. I've had the same kind before and it was way better. With a brand this $$$ a consumer expects consistency. I will be switching to another brand from here on out.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,disappointed,2017-07-03,1,Disappointed...,9,0,"I just opened a pint of this last week and was disappointed in the quality of the cookie dough. Unlike a lot of the other reviewers, mine had enough of the cookie dough, but the dough tasted old and was too hard. I tried leaving it to sit out for a while to see if it had just needed to thaw a bit, but that did not do the trick.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,Sophiedxo,2017-08-28,1,So disappointed,3,0,"Ben and jerrys cookie dough has always been my favourite Ice cream, hate to admit but I can eat up to 3 tubs a week = £15 a week! My last 3 tubs have been disgusting, with an icy texture and the dough bits crumbly and biscuit like as opposed to the usual doughy texture. Will not be buying again as 3 times for this to happen is more than enough. I have the full 3 tubs in the freezer as they were completely inedible, ready to take back to the retailer to complain tomorrow but I'm guessing they are going to take it up with you guys.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,Jacqui,2018-11-10,1,Disappointing! Where is the Cookie Dough?!,11,4,"After trying B&Js for the first time (Half Baked which was absolutely DELICIOUS), I became a recent fan and had to come back and try their Cookie Dough flavour. Well, what a complete waste of money! I am well aware that B&J has always been more expensive than other ice cream brands (especially living in Australia) but have always been happy to pay more for a premium product. Little did I know, I would open my tub to discover next to no cookie dough in the whole thing! What's the point of having a couple of teeny millimeter specks? Why pay more for this product when you can get perfectly fine vanilla ice cream from a competitor at a lower cost?! My last experience with Half Baked was amazing but now I'm personally unsure whether I will repurchase a B&J product again as I don't want to repeat this experience of buyers remorse and utter disappointment.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,Kathryn6268,2017-06-09,1,Normally great but...,4,0,"I love Ben and Jerry's chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream. It helps me relax after a rough day. But, the most recent pint I bought the cookie dough was hard and brittle and dry? I don't know how to describe it but it was weird and not the norm. Even the ice cream itself had a chalkiness to it. So disappointing since it's a splurge to purchase Ben and Jerry's as a grad student on a budget.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,FuzzyGut,2018-06-21,5,Love the dough,4,0,"I love Ben & Jerry’s Cookie Dough. I just crushed yet another pint of it and yet again, I loved every spoonful of it! The ice cream is rich and delicious and the dough globs are ridiculous! So good that I eat it with a toddler spoon so I take smaller bites. My goal one day is to combine a pint of this with a pint of chocolate fudge brownie for a double half baked!!";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,sadandhungrypanda,2018-09-23,2,Cookie dough wasn't dough-y,3,0,"I rarely indulge in Ben & Jerry's, but when I do, I go for the Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough. Unfortunately, my most recent experience was less than satisfying. The pieces of dough felt like they were missing a few ingredients. Instead of having that really amazing soft, chewy, dough texture... they tasted like dough powder. It was dry and bland. Did the formula change or are you guys still having issues with manufacturing?";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,xel785,2017-10-25,5,Don't believe the bad reviews like I did!!!,4,1,"Not sure what the bad reviewers are on, but give me two please! This stuff is the real deal. I've literally tried all the other brands of Choc Cookie Dough and in the trash they went. I buy maybe 3 of these a week at least. Too hard to walk past. B and J is all that and more. Love you guys and your product! ps. there's always plenty of cookie dough, must be a factory issue. I've always had it packed full of dough and it's been a long time..";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,NoDoughForMe,2017-05-27,2,"Where's the ""GLOBS""",4,2,"I usually love Ben and Jerry's and buy it for a special treat. Today I bought the Cholcoate Chip Cookie Dough and was sooooo looking forward to the promised ""Globs"" of cookie dough. Sad to say in the whole pint (yes, I planned on eating all of it) there were only 7 smallish balls of cookie dough... overall, the taste of the ice cream is great however, the experience became a game of hunt and peck rather than the enjoyment I was looking for. Next time I'll opt for Brownie Batter Core, lol.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,Clark,2019-01-15,5,Underrated,2,0,"Maybe it's not the most exciting flavor, but the contrast of the plain (but very good) vanilla ice cream and the ambrosia-like cookie dough chunks makes this flavor one of the most enjoyable to eat. You just have to beat the temptation to dig out every bite of cookie dough before you eat the rest of the ice cream! I've tried many kinds of cookie dough ice cream and this has by far the best cookie dough (and ice cream for that matter) of all of them.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,dandydaniella,2020-05-28,4,,0,0,"Super big chunks of cookie dough, tons of chocolate chips, creamy ice cream and always filled to the BRIM! I did run into a huge air pocket on the side so I didnt get ALL of the container filled, but my body is probably thankful for that. The lid can sometimes be hard to put back on. But other than those functional pieces, the flavor is amazing and this is always a solid GO-TO always!";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: CookieDoughLover
title: Buy it only if you are up for a cookie dough hunt
text;;;: I have purchased the Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough multiple times so don't even try to tell me it's due to a particular ''manufacturing problem''. There is barely any cookie dough in the 500 mL pint. It is a total waste of my money.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,valerieced7e,2020-07-25,4,,0,0,"Id give this flavor 3.5 stars if I could. Ben & Jerrys is usually awesome for me, a 4/5 stars typically (and Im a very tough ice cream critic) but this one just wasnt one of their better flavors. Now, this may be my fault because it is a rather stereotypical simple flavor, and I usually only get it at ice cream shops because their cookie dough and ice cream just taste better for some reason. So Im comparing this to my top favorite fresh cookie dough ice cream at ice cream shops, and to ben & Jerrys other more exciting flavors. If youre struggling to choose which brand of cookie dough ice cream you want at the store, just for the ben & Jerrys, its for sure one of the best brands for that flavor.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,smiley girl,2017-07-06,1,So disappointing!,3,0,"I was so disappointed by the chocolate chip cookie dough. There was hardly any cookie dough, the texture was gross and the ice cream was solid as a rock which made it very difficult to scoop and eat. I won't be buying that again, especially at that price!";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,junglekock,2020-09-04,1,Really yummy but lacking cookie dough,0,0,"I really enjoy this flavour of B&J but lately it's definitely been lacking cookie dough. I am essentially paying for expensive vanilla ice cream;" had anyone been searching for B&J's plain vanilla ice cream but had no luck
author: they could just pick up a pint of B&J's cookie dough and get exactly what they wanted. As a student I'm struggling to justify continuing to purchase this ice cream regularly as it's inconsistent with the distribution of cookie dough. I hope to receive some form of compensation and I hope to see Ben and Jerry take more action in bettering and improving this product.""";;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,Nearae,2020-03-24,5,My Obsession,0,0,"Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough is my most favorite one of all. It has the perfect balance of vanilla ice cream,chocolate chip pieces,and chunks of choc chip cookie dough. I personally eat a pint a night, and I wouldn't know how to act if I didn't have any. It is definitely my new,but not so new,OBSESSION!";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: celiagsexy
text;;;: I love this ice cream it is so delicious and wants to just melt her mouth this ice cream is not too expensive its really good you should get my ice cream over at Walmart I have not at Sams Club they have good deals in it especially in my shrooms are you guys going to go check it out;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: ILUVBENANDJERRY
title: I promise you..you'll love it dough XDXD
text;;;: Best ice cream like seriouslyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: Anonymous1212
title: Awful dough!!
text;;;: The chocolate chip cookie dough was so hard and chalky! It wasn’t soft or fresh?? Not sure if this was a manufacture or transit problem. Extremely disappointed this was my first experience because my friends have always recommended this flavor to me;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,caypeezy,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"My alllll time favorite flavor! It is a perfect blend on chocolate chip, cookie dough and ice cream! This product is affordable but a liiiiitle on the high side when in comes to calories ESPECIALLY if you eat the whole pint like i do";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,dwme2017,2017-06-30,5,Possibly better than the real thing,4,1,"Ben and Jerry's never disappoints. I have had the chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream in both NYC and Burlington, Vermont, and both were nothing short of amazing. Maybe I was lucky, but the cookie dough portions were generous and the vanilla ice cream added some nice contrast. :)";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,Jess88,2019-07-22,2,Bland,0,0,"This was the most expensive Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough ice cream I've purchased, but also the least flavorful. Mostly just the ice cream- very few cookie dough bites or chocolate chunks. Left me disappointed.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,Bridgespo99997,2017-11-05,4,Could be improved.,2,0,"The cookie dough chunks in this, are very rare, or actually really inconsistent. I wish there were more chunks of cookie dough. Overall, this is by far the best tasting cookie dough ice cream. The cookie dough is good, it's just that sometimes I have 10 cookie dough chunks and once I've had 2 pieces. I just wish there were more globs.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,Shane B,2017-12-28,3,Expected Better,2,0,"The vanilla ice cream is rich, creamy and has a strong vanilla the taste. I cant complain about the quantity of cookie dough because half the container was cookie dough. Unfortunately, the cookie dough was dry, crumbly and crunchy. I expected the cookie dough to be chewy and fresh, maybe I just got a bad batch.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,taylam2,2020-05-10,4,,0,0,"I love the cookie dough! It tastes so good. This is probably one of my least favorite Ben and Jerrys flavors though, as I find the icecream to be pretty bland.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,tshr,2019-08-06,1,Dough was to dry and didnt taste as usual,0,0,"Today we bought a new Ben&Jerrys Cookie dough ice cream and we've been total dissapointed. The dough was dry, too hard and didnt taste as usual.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,atik,2017-11-16,3,Nothing Memorable,2,1,"Ben and Jerry's made this flavor first, so they're well known for it. It's a not horrible flavor, it's kind of just there. My biggest complaint with this is that there isn't enough cookie dough, and I don't think it's because of some mistake in the manufacturing process. It kind of tastes like vanilla ice cream with the occasional chunk of dough. You could seriously improve this flavor if you increased the amount of cookie dough you put into these pints.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: Ruthie
title: Delicious Vanilla Ice cream But not enough cookie
text;;;: Good vanilla ice cream but not enough cookie dough;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,SayWhat,2017-11-08,1,Where's the dough???,3,1,"This purchase left me very disappointed. It was as if I purchase a pint of vanilla ice cream. I didn't come across any cookie dough until after I was halfway through the container. At this point, I didn't eat any more ice cream but wasted the rest of the ice cream searching for the cookie dough. I doubt I will make this purchase again.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,louise,2017-07-14,1,where's the gobs?!,3,1,"I like many others who wrote reviews am very upset about the lack of cookie dough in this cookie dough ice cream. My pint of ice cream had 4 pieces of cookie dough max. I expected better from Ben and Jerry's. I could have paid less for a different brand and got way more. But I thought they were the best-of the best, I was wrong.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,shorty,2017-07-15,2,Allergen not listed.,2,2,"I was super excited to try Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough since it has always been my favorite. I thought Ben and Jerry's would have been excellent but I was wrong. Unfortunately, all I could taste was coconut. I looked on the ingredient list and it states coconut oil is in the product but didn't list it as an allergen on the label. I am allergic to all coconut (yes even the oil) and tree nuts and was extremely disappointed as I had to throw the rest away. No more Ben and Jerry's for me.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,WantMoreDough,2017-06-07,3,Needs more dough,1,2,"It seems like the biggest complaint for this product is too little dough, which I agree with (no, it's not a manufacturing issue, in my case). But I also think that is the issue with ALL cookie dough ice cream. Just look up ""what ice cream has the most cookie dough"" and while you'll find that Ben and Jerry's does, but it still might not be enough. Clearly there is a consumer demand for a truly loaded cookie dough ice cream. I hope Ben and Jerry's will indulge us. Unfortunately, this product isn't it.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
title: WHERE IS THE COOKIE DOUGH
text;;;: I juat bought one of these for the first time..I took the first bite and no cookie dough..took another bite and then another still no cookie dough. So I turned it around and took a bite from the other side still nothing. there was not one price of cookie dough in the whole thing so I paid for Something I did not get and I'm very upset about it I have are Ben and jerseys my whole life and have never been disapointed until now;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,qubie,2018-12-19,1,Would be excellent if there was cookie dough,1,0,"The first time I bought a pint of this I was over the moon with the ratio to cookie dough to ice cream to Chico chips, but as I kept purchasing I noticed there was less and less cookie dough/chocolate chips and more ice cream. This is disappointing and it’s kind of a waste of money to buy 6 dollar ice cream when you aren’t getting what you’re buying.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: Brit
title: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Is BAE
text;;;: Can we start by saying that Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough is bae?!? I started purchasing this flavor over a year ago & I’ve been addicted every since! The ONE thing I would change is having more cookie dough in each pint. I often feel like I have to buy more before finishing fully because I run out of cookie dough lol! I did try the Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core & plan to leave my honest opinion under its own picture!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: Bravo7
title: The Best
text;;;: The Classic Ben and Jerry's. This is the best of all flavors and shall forever be.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: bennyc
title: Amazing
text;;;: Everyone knows Ben & Jerry's is the best. Let's get real here.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: destinykeene33
text;;;: If you havent tried Ben & Jerrys I honestly dont know what youre doing I live in Vermont and that was where Ben and Jerrys was invented and honestly I think theyre awesome because of the variety they give you and all the different kinds they have their ice cream cones taste amazing in their ice cream even though there are funky flavors they all suck each other very well and then come up with the best names for them you cant go wrong with any of their flavors[product:ben-&-jerrys-chocolate-chip-cookie-dough-ice-cream];;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: sarahc354
text;;;: This ice cream is also really good! The only issue I have is that there is so much variance in the amount of cookie dough bites that sometimes there are not enough and others there are WAY too many to be a nice balance. The cookie dough pieces and vanilla ice cream are a classic pair and this ice cream is very good!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,Marquel,2017-10-17,5,"Awesome, safe for pregnancy?",2,1,"I loooove this, flavor I buy it all the time. I recently found out a friend of mine is pregnant and she stopped eating it. I’m just curious if the eggs in the dough are raw? Or is it safe for pregnant women to eat? If so I could let her know and she can eat as much as her heart desires. Thanks!";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,Jen622,2018-01-19,2,Very disappointed,2,0,"I’ve been buying Ben and Jerry ice cream off and on for years. I’m referring to the last year I have been purchasing your cookie dough ice cream. Although it never contained the amount of cookie dough consumers were led to believe it did in the advertised pictures or descriptions it still contained more and better tasting cookie dough than other brands I have tried. I was pleased a lot times in the beginning, but I still would have liked to see more cookie dough. Also with most of the cookie dough being toward the top and very little or almost none further down was another disappointing factor. I also find consistency to be all over the place.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,redbnice,2020-07-26,4,,0,0,"I really love how Ben and Jerry's always have these crazy new flavors, but this one is my all-time favorite. While the ice cream is all sweet, I like the perfect balance of salt in the cookie dough to even out the taste. Even though the price of the pint is not always right, it was good for at least three servings because I tend to only eat two scoops at a time. If you are planning for a big party, this might not be enough for obvious reasons. However, for a kick on an occasional sweet tooth, it is perfect!";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,radzach97,2018-07-10,5,Life Changing,1,0,"Cookie dough is my all time favorite flavor no matter what brand, so I have to thank yall for inventing this. That being said, this is hands down the BEST out of them all! Nothing comes close to this, you can tell the cookie dough could make actual cookies.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,carolinesbfc9,2018-07-03,5,,0,0,"I don’t always go for ice cream, but when I do this is my favourite. I actually just made a cake for my son with this. Oreo cookie base, Ben and Jerry’s cookies and creak ice cream and drizzle chocolate sauce and let it set in the freezer. Amazing";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: Jake
title: this is my favorite flavor
text;;;: i love that flavor! I am 10 years old i just got done eating some chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream 15 minutes ago. I visited the factory in Vermont in August. The chocolate chip cookie dough i had 15 minutes ago was from Ben and Jerrys;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: jordanw_497
text;;;: Since I was little Ben & Jerry’s cookie dough ice cream has been one of my favorites. It is a little more expensive than some other brands but the flavor is worth it. I will buy more and definitely recommend trying it.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: kaylar7
text;;;: I could eat this for breakfast lunch and dinner haha I absolutely love this ice cream. It’s the best hands down. It’s a little pricey but you get what you pay for. This is an all time fav at girls night for sure.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,linda001,2018-10-29,5,Mine always has dough,1,0,"Not sure what luck everyone else is having but mine always has plenty of dough. It's really good dough! And the icecream doesn't taste plain, it's very vanilla flavored, almost like a vanilla bean icecream.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: angelicabadbd
text;;;: I love this ice cream. Especially since Blue Bell has its issue with the recalls in the past. Every since I’ve been eating this brand and I just say I’m not disappointed at all. Overall I’m satisfied with!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: miasd75b
text;;;: Omg my favourite ice cream! Everything about this ice cream is amazing! Ice cream is my fave and I’m very picky but this is delicious. The only thing I would say is that my local supermarkets sell for £5!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: alishasec3f
text;;;: Does it really get any better than ben and Jerry's ice cream? I mean c'mon?! Always a staple for our family on movie night. So many different flavors to choose from so everyone gets their own.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,megan0,2017-09-24,1,"All Vanilla, Nothing Else",2,1,"So sad that I decided to break my no ice cream streak with this particular flavor. There was barely any cookie dough, and even less chocolate chips. Waste of the $8 a pint costs in NYC.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,Rem127,2017-08-06,1,It was ok vanilla ice cream,2,1,"Got a pint for cheat day, and there was not a single cookie dough pellet in the entire pint. It was plain vanilla ice cream with about 15 chocolate chips in the whole thing.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: babee143
text;;;: Cookie dough really taste like cookie dough. It’s really hard to find an ice cream that has that real dough taste. You also get dough or chocolate chips in every bite.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: mxriamk
text;;;: An absolute favourite ! Plus I love the half baked flavour. The mix of flavours this brand offers differentiates itself from other brands and is totally worth it!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,alyssa_cave,2018-08-02,5,,0,0,"Nice big chunks of cookie dough, great vanilla ice cream. I mean can you really go wrong with Ben and Jerry's?";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: sheenawfac1
text;;;: Dangerous to have in my house I’ll eat it all. It is the only comfort food that my life needs. Get you some;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: Katie
title: No dough!
text;;;: Not a single piece of cookie dough! Very frustrating! Especially at the price of Ben & Jerry's!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,bekzbekz,2018-11-09,5,,0,0,"Guilty pleasure! Perfect for the sweet tooth, lots of cookie dough pieces and chocolate chips.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,NightElf321,2017-09-06,1,Didn't like it,1,0,"Tasted like Just really sugary Vanilla Ice Cream, I couldn't taste the cookie dough gobs.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,Cassandra D,2020-04-28,1,Inconsistent flavor,0,0,"Decided to indulge in a Ben & Jerry’s cookie dough pint and it was a disappointing splurge! This is the second time now having this experience. The ice cream was very chalky and had a weird after taste. Maybe an inconsistent batch? No cookie dough chunks a few chocolate bits, was very dry and brittle. The base vanilla ice cream had a chalky taste to it and as you tried to scoop it out of the pint was flaky. No ice crystals but left a powdery film on your palate.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,Jnewton79,2017-04-26,1,No Cookie Dough,2,2,"They tasted ok I guess, but there wasn't one piece of cookie dough in the entire box I bought;" that's the reason for my review. Quality was fine but without cookie dough they aren't what I bought.""";;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: sdtatis
text;;;: I'm really not a sweets fan and by association an 8ce cream fan but who doesn't love Ben & Jerry's Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Ice Cream? It's just good! Smooth and creamy with bite sized chunks of the raw cookie dough that you all know we grew up stealing and eating if our moms were baking cookies. Mine didn't but I learned how to as a kid so that's what I did. As a whole it's a great brand with unique flavors. Something for everyone.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,Ccp3,2018-05-04,1,Disappointed..........,1,1,"Like many of the other reviewers, I can't find much cookie dough. I usually spend the extra cash for Ben and Jerry's, but I am so disappointed in this flavor. I guess I will go back to buying a gallon of another brand for the same price. I had such high hopes when I bought this.....";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,influenster_kaitlyn,2020-07-27,4,,0,0,"This was delicious. They have enough chunks of cookie dough so that there was at least one little cookie dough bite in each spoon full. Theres also a great balance of the cookie dough, chocolate chips, and ice cream so that youre able to actually taste all the ingredients. Only downfall for me is the taste of the ice cream base, it is kind of bland and think it could have more of a vanilla or cookie dough flavor.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: michaelah33
text;;;: For starters this is my go to chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream brand because I feel as if they put the most cookie dough bites in their ice cream. I know they tend to be on the pricier side but I dont mind paying a little more considering the companies values. I encourage anyone to look into Ben & Jerrys and learn more about how they are passing it forward to their employees and the world.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,RavenY,2017-05-28,1,Let down !!!,1,1,"Ive recently became a fan of the half baked ice cream , that it made me wana try just a cookie dough flavor. I bought one and there were very little cookie dough globs . Barely enough yo satisfy my sweet tooth.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,,2020-07-24,5,,0,0,"Super big chunks of cookie dough, tons of chocolate chips, creamy ice cream and always filled to the BRIM! I did run into a huge air pocket on the side so I didnt get ALL of the container filled, but my body is probably thankful for that. The lid can sometimes be hard to put back on. But other than those functional pieces, the flavor is amazing and this is always a solid GO-TO always!";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,leahinphx,2020-06-14,5,,0,0,"It's a classic for a reason-- it's just so delicious. I think this is the first chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream I ever tried, and, while I've tried many kinds since then, Ben and Jerry's cookie dough remains my favorite. The vanilla ice cream is creamy and delicious and not overly sweet. The cookie dough tastes just like homemade cookie dough. Together, it's just perfection.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,thy_golden_child,2020-06-24,5,,0,0,"I love the fact Ben & Jerry isnt afraid to use their brand & platform to speak out on social issues harming our society! I also enjoy this flavor, I wish they werent stingy on the cookie dough though. The ice cream is a tad expensive too. But, this os the only brand I buy when I get Ice cream. Please sponsors me, Ben & Jerry, I eat this too much to not become apart of the team.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: shannonce981
text;;;: I love Ben and Jerrys and I love their message and brand so I never mind spending money on this ice cream! This is a great quality ice cream made by a company thats big in keeping it simple and natural with ingredients and a this is a classic flavor so you cant go wrong. The cookie dough to ice cream ratio is spot on so I definitely recommend this to my fellow ice cream lovers .;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,carog2,2019-08-06,4,,0,0,"I was a bit disappointed with the amount of chocolate chip cookie dough pieces. This didn't really have many pieces of cookie dough it was like 70% vanilla icecream & 30% cookie dough, therefore I would improve this product by adding more chocolate chip cookie dough. However, the taste of the vanilla icecream had a hint of cookie dough which is unlike any other brand I've had.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,shebs13,2020-06-30,4,,0,0,"My kids love this. There is something about the cookie dough. I took away a star, because despite the ingredients being good my kids -teens- tend to break out a bit afterwards. This happens with Talenti too. If you ever see Dolceza ice cream at Whole Foods buy it! Especially the marscapone and raspberry or roasted strawberry. Ive literally eAten a pint in one sitting.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,rigaj,2019-12-18,5,,0,0,"Perfect for any day. Sad day and you just want to cry? Ben & Jerry's is here. Fun day out in the sun and now you want to cool down? Ben & Jerry's is here. Sleepover with your friends? Well, Ben & Jerry's is here. The ice cream is worth all the hype it receives as it doesn't disappoint. It comes in various flavours and it's definitely a highlight to anybody's day.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: turnerm110
text;;;: This will always be my favorite Ben and Jerry's ice cream but I do love that they have so many different ice creams that you can try in pint size containers without having to commit to half gallons or larger incase you don't like the ice cream. I also like that it is local to me and the next state over has Ben and Jerry Ice Cream shops besides their factory.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: Momof21816
title: Horrrrible
text;;;: I'm 30 weeks pregnant and I was craving cookie dough and this is what I got and there was seriously 5 bites of cookie dough.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,alexisw46,2020-06-24,5,,0,0,"This is my favorite flavor of ice cream, and Ben and Jerrys is my favorite brand of ice cream. The boxes are great, and the ice cream parlors they have are amazing as well. Definitely recommend this, Ben and Jerrys is an awesome brand, theyre on the pricier side only because they pay their employees well. Overall an awesome company with awesome flavors.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,jsheu,2020-08-01,4,,0,0,"Ben & Jerrys is a great ice cream brand, but I personally dont like having a rich ice cream that also has a ton of mix-ins. Also, the majority of their ice cream features chocolate in some form, which is not something I enjoy in an ice cream (I know, not a popular opinion). I love cookie dough ice cream though, and Ben & Jerrys does a good job with it.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,stefanieamb,2020-06-22,5,,0,0,"The best take on an absolute classic. I would consume my bodyweight in almost anything from Ben & Jerrys. However, their chocolate chip cookie dough is on comparable from anything. It is my favorite I always find good pricing information especially at local grocery stores, or I can find a coupon online. Highly recommend Ben & Jerrys ice cream";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,manderzz,2020-07-31,5,,0,0,"When I was pregnant all I craved was sweets. I had my husband go out and buy me this specific flavor of Ben and Jerrys at all hours of the night to fix my babys and I craving lol. Its just so good. The big chunks of cookie dough with the smooth, creamy ice cream. You cant go wrong. I might have to go buy myself some tonight! Lol.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,rebeccac5359,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"Ben and Jerrys Ice cream is definitely one of my top 3 favorite ice cream brands. They have an amazing variety of flavors, is locally made and never disappoints. This is one of my all time favorite flavors. I have loved since been a little kid riding home from beach and stopping to grab Ben and Jerrys on the way home! Must try!!";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,s_y_d_n_e_e_,2019-04-03,5,,0,0,"This flavor of Ben & Jerrys is really, really good! It balances perfectly between the ice cream, chocolate chips, and cookie dough. The cookie dough is soft and is perfect with the creamy ice cream. Its a little pricey, but all Ben & Jerrys is. Its never too much to keep me from buying it though! Definitely one of my favorites!";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: Cbugkrunks33
title: Sadly disappointed...
text;;;: My hubby night this for me as a treat this week. I love this flavor but was very disappointed in the pint I tasted. The cookie dough was there but no chocolate chips. The vanilla ice cream tasted chalky and the committee dough was chewy and grainy. Can someone fix these batches? I love Ben & Jerry's so this was a shock to me;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: sashao
text;;;: Omg this brand of coodkie dough ice cream is one of my favorites! A good amount of cookie dough chunks and just melts in your mouth. I dont get it too often because it is on the pricer side but when i treat myself this is the one i choose! I definitely recommend it! You cam usually find it at most big chain grocery stores.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,kristinh358,2020-07-25,4,,0,0,"While most B&J flavors are absolutely five star-worthy, chocolate chip cookie dough is probably my least fave of theirs. The cookie dough pieces are plentiful but are a smidgen dryer and chewier than the cookie dough in some other brands. The ice cream itself is DELISH, but I would choose other B&J flavors over this one.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: yasmine96
title: THE BEST.
text;;;: I just want to start by saying. To the reviews who said “nOt EnOuGh cOoKiE dOuGh” that was NOT the case for me. Hey maybe I got lucky lol. Because my pint came with MORE than enough cookie dough in it! Literally huge clumps of it in EVERY scoop! This ice cream is delicious!! Definitely craving it as I type this review :);;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: gladism2
text;;;: One of my favorite kinds of ice cream is cookie dough. I love the Ben & Jerrys ice cream more Because it has a different taste than other brands. This one I feel like it is more creamier and delicious. Also Ben & Jerrys is known to have so many crazy and yummy flavors. Definitely recommend if you havent tried This brand.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,jenniferj1d4a,2020-07-28,5,,0,0,"Of all the cookie dough ice creams, Ben & Jerrys is my absolute favorite. The ice cream is really good and it has nice big pieces of cookie dough. I have tried other brands and it has had basically just chocolate chips and called it cookie dough. I love Ben & Jerrys, I would recommend any flavor but this one is the best.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,elanar,2019-11-03,5,,0,0,"It's hard to pick a single favorite Ben & Jerry's ice cream, but if I had to this would be it. Ben & Jerry's Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Ice Cream to me the quintessential ice cream. It is what put this brand on the map, and as far as I'm concerned no other brand has done cookie dough ice cream as well as they have.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
text;;;: You cant go wrong with Ben & Jerry's. I love this icecream because they are never skimpy on the mixture of icecream to add ins. You always get some in every bite. The price is a little steep for the amount of icecream compared to other brands but considering its more of an ice cream shop quality the price is fair.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: jazmines16
text;;;: Ben and Jerrys ice cream chocolate chip cookie dough is very good. Along with all of the Ben and Jerrys Ive creams being so creamy and flavorful. The combination of cookie dough and chocolate chips is perfect! Also the chocolate chips in the ice cream arent hard which is just delightful because it melts in your mouth;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: hangingoutwithlori
text;;;: I am not a chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream lover and this is no exception. Too sickly sweet for me. However the base ice cream is good. My children (now grown) love B&J chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream so its a winner just for that alone.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,Polly,2020-05-27,1,No cookie dough,0,0,"My favourite ice-cream is the choc chip and cookie dough. I have just sat down ,looking forward to it...while watching a movie. Only to be totally disappointed to find no cookie dough and only a few choc chips. For an ice-cream that costs more than the average price to enjoy. I have to say what a waste of my money.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,,2020-02-06,4,,0,0,"This was my first introduction to Ben and Jerry's back when I was in college and it remains a favorite of mine today. In fact I had a scoop last night after dinner. There is just something about Ben and Jerry's that is superior in taste, mouth feel and whole experience that will have me always coming back for more.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: elizabethk9677
text;;;: This ice cream is a premium brand which makes it a little more expensive than my usual brand. The Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough is one of my favourites! It has a lot of cookie dough and chocolate chips in it. If youd like to indulge in a high quality ice cream that comes in many flavours I would recommend this one.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,corriesbeautyspot,2020-07-31,5,,0,0,"Probably my favorite cookie dough ice creams Ive tried! I dont get this flavor often anymore but when I do I feel like you cant beat Ben & Jerrys flavor and their quality! Some cookie dough ice creams the cookie dough has a gummy, flavorless texture, but this one tastes amazing and has the perfect chewy texture.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,mkatlhen,2019-01-05,5,,0,0,"I swear, this is HEAVEN. Ben & Jerry’s are my favorite and I have a thing for cookies dough ice cream. I just can’t explain. I always get this, it’s the type of ice cream that won’t get you sick of it just “because it’s too sweet” it’s not that pure sugar ice cream, it’s actually soft and very tasty. I love it.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: karbuckle0
text;;;: Dang this stuff is SO expensive for a little tiny pint of ice cream that goes so quickly... But there is NOTHING like it! Other brands don't compare and cookie dough is just one of my favorites. All of the flavors are so good! The limited time Bob Marley one with banana ice cream was the definition of KILLER!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,ashleyq13,2020-07-17,5,,0,0,"There ice cream is so bomb I definitely recommend. I get it all the time its a perfect snack, no matter the weather even if its raining! They also support BLM which makes me love the ice cream even more! I definitely recommend its affordable! [product:ben-&-jerrys-ice-cream-chocolate-chip-cookie-dough-16oz]";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,jenpb581,2018-10-03,4,,0,0,"Cookie dough ice cream is my favorite type. Ben and Jerry’s is delicious, with nice chunks of cookie dough. However, I do wish there were more of those delicious chunks in each pint, as you end up eating a fair amount of vanilla ice cream with chocolate chunks (which is still delicious, don’t get me wrong).";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,kimj60,2020-07-29,4,,0,0,"I like Ben & Jerrys ice cream in general, its usually my go to indulgent ice cream, and I especially love the chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream. It can be a bit pricey for the size of the tub, but you dont really need a bigger tub if youre going to eat it all at once. I would definitely recommend.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: adventureswithgail
text;;;: I love chocolate chip cookie dough and ice cream so this combo is the best of both worlds. Ben and Jerry's makes the best ice cream around and their flavor range is out of this world! Super affordable and the flavor can't be beat! Only 4 stars cause I wish it came in a bigger size! Highly recommend!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,rosan10,2020-06-19,5,,0,0,"Perfect ice cream flavor for a romantic movie, breakup, time of the month etc... Ive ALWAYS loved Ben and Jerrys like even before I was born. Thats right my mom ate Ben and Jerrys Ice cream like it was her business the entire pregnancy then I came out and started to eat all the ice cream with her";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: laurag122
text;;;: This is one of my favorite cookie dough ice creams on the market. I love the 16oz size because if youre splurging you eat the whole thing. If youre being mindful of portion sizes its easy to scoop 1/4 or 1/2 so you dont overdo it. The dough is a good soft quality while the ice cream is so yummy.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,juliab161,2020-06-25,5,,0,0,"My favorite I used to tell my boyfriend that the only way he could come over was if he brought this ice cream, my best friends were at my house watching a movie and he was like I dont have it I was like okay then go back home but I opened the door and had four different ones just for all of us";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"My favorite flavor from this brand! Although I do love my cookies n cream, Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough adds that perfect crunch into the ice cream but still very smooth and savory. This is the perfect ice cream for the cookie dough lovers out there because of the chunks of cookie dough added!";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,mottagiu,2020-06-17,5,,0,0,"I had the Chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream from ben and jerrys yesterday. Im normally not a fan of this flavor since the ice cream normally tastes too much like vanilla, but a friend told me to try this one and i absolutely loved it!! The cookie dough has a great texture and seems fresh.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,mearsy,2020-07-07,5,,0,0,"My favorite at home ice cream. The chunks of cookie dough are giant and the chocolate chips are big and crunchy. Paired with the creamy ice cream base, it all comes together perfectly. After learning more of the Ben and Jerrys company morals, I was even more glad to have a pint in my freezer!";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: sonache232
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream brand of all time. They have a big variety of flavors so everyone can find something that they like. Even though it is kind of on the pricier side I definitely think its worth it because they use the money they have to donate to different charities/organizations.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,susanhayleyfox,2020-07-28,5,,0,0,"I love classic flavors like cookie dough and Ben & Jerrys version is one of the best! Their packages ice cream tastes the same as what they serve in the store, so you know youre getting a high-quality product. Compared to others, this product has the perfect amount of cookie dough mixed it!";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: meetig94
text;;;: Who doesnt love cookie dough?! [product:ben-&-jerrys-chocolate-chip-cookie-dough-ice-cream] is PACKED with globe of cookie dough. Its thick and cream texture makes a little go a long way. Perfect for your sweet cravings legit anytime of the day. My absolute favourite. #icecream #cookiedough;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: theonly_ali
text;;;: I love this ice cream and always feel like I get extra cookie dough. Unlike other brands there is way more than the usual 5 chunks of dough that you have to dig for. I also will always gladly give this company my money based off their views and donations to causes that are dear to my heart.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: leimatronic
text;;;: I love this icecream. It's got such a smooth taste and the cookie dough bits are delicious. It's a bit pricey but not bad of you can get them on sale. I'd love if they'd put them in a bigger tub like most icecream but it's still a good icecream. Definitely satisfied with the taste overall.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,rachell31,2020-07-23,5,,0,0,"I absolutely love this ice cream. But I also love what this company stands for moral and values wise so its double appealing to me. This flavor of ice cream is delicious, rich and filling! It is very much a selfish pleasure of mine and I truly cant think of an ice cream that I enjoy more.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,natashak,2020-06-03,3,,0,0,"This ice cream is pretty good. However there is never actually enough cookie dough, it is mostly just vanilla ice cream. So many of the other flavors are really packed with goodies so I don't understand why this doesn't have more cookie dough bits. Make the dough smaller and include more.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,beckyyyyp,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"This is my favorite ice cream! It really is the best chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream I have tried and it's also dangerous because I can sit down and eat the full box!!!! haha This ice cream is a bit more expensive than others, but I find that Ben & Jerry's really does taste better!";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,memoulds,2020-05-07,4,,0,0,"My husband got me this after we got home from having the baby, because you're not supposed to eat raw cookie dough while pregnant, (or really anytime, but it's delicious!). This ice cream is super yummy and has generous chunks of cookie dough in it. I just wish B&J was more affordable.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: BBIC68
title: Best Cookie Dough EVER
text;;;: Hands down best Cookie dough ice cream around. Only negative is at times they don't have much cookie dough but I find that very spotty. Still the best ever!! This flavor was the only reason why I started eating Ben and Jerry's ... Now I even eat others but this is still my favorite;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,vajoyce,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"I love anything Ben & Jerrys, but Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough is one of my favorites. However, theres not a lot of cookie dough chunks in the pints. Its okay for me because I love plain vanilla ice cream. So I get some plain vanilla ice cream and also some with chunks of cookie dough!";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: hamburglar2
text;;;: Yum. My favorite ice cream ever. I wish I didnt like it! Thank goodness this flavor is popular so it seems to always be out of stock otherwise it would be more tempting to buy lol. It is by far the best though even if it is a little expensive it is a nice treat every once in a while.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,Em Ward,2017-09-10,5,My favorite flavor!,0,1,"...I also love Half Baked, but this one will always been my classic, hometown flavor. One of the only brands that gets the cookie dough chewy instead of flaky. I would definitely not complain if they added more cookie dough... but until then, this one remains a favorite at our house.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,CookieDoughLover13,2018-08-02,1,Where's the dough?,0,2,"The last two times I've had Ben & Jerry's, I tried the chocolate chip cookie dough. The first pint had so little cookie dough in it, that I assumed there was a manufacturing defect. The second pint proved to be just as disappointing. You may as well just get plain vanilla ice cream.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: kpounds
text;;;: This is easily my favorite ice cream ever. I can most definitely eat a Ben and Jerry's pint in one sitting. It's the perfect amount of sweet and creamy and is the perfect treat for any occasion. It's pricey so I usually only get it once and a while but definitely love this product.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: memberf0fa3
text;;;: Ive never had such a good chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream. I have love all of the Ben & Jerrys flavors Ive had so far but I never thought I would like cookie dough. But they proved me wrong. It had a perfect amount of cookie dough and tasted AMAZING. I 100% recommended this;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: angelac154
text;;;: I absolutely love Ben & Jerry's ice cream I have a hard time stopping when I'm eating it. I've been eating Ben & Jerry's for years. This is me only brand of chocolate chip cookie dough that has a good flavor that I have found. I buy this as well as a few other flavors regularly.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,oakleykennedy,2019-01-28,3,Usually incredible,0,0,"It's usually so so great and I bought a pint the other day and have just opened it to eat it and the cookie dough is all dry and crumbly i literally had to spit it out it was so bad, am dissappointed because its quite expensive and I only buy it once in a blue moon as a treat";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: alil02ec
text;;;: Its good I just wish it had bigger chunks of cookie dough. Plus it would be sooo much better if we could buy any flavor by the gallon so there werent as many visits to the grocery store to buy more ice cream!!! [product:ben-&-jerrys-ice-cream-chocolate-chip-cookie-dough-16oz];;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,makeupbymeiv,2020-04-25,5,,0,0,"This is my FAVORITE ice cream flavor. I've tried other brands but ben and jerry's does it best! There are some brands that have super hard cookie dough pieces, but the ones in this brand are so soft and chewy! It goes super well with the chocolate chips and vanilla ice cream";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: ashleyr8b6e
text;;;: I absolutely love this ice cream! It tastes amazing! Its hard to keep it in my house because my children and I love it so much so I have to buy 2 at a time and hide one! I hide it right under the frozen vegetables and they never know! Lol I definitely recommend trying this!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,natalien4,2020-05-05,5,,0,0,"Ben & Jerry's is a brand that you can NEVER go wrong with to satisfy your ice cream needs. I love Ben & Jerry's, especially any Cookie Dough flavored ice creams. This brand has never failed to make me happy, and invite me to new flavor combinations I couldn't even think of!";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,gwynedolynp,2019-02-04,5,,0,0,"Many people do not know this but I live for cookie dough ice cream! Its my favorite flavor! I love Ben & Jerrys because it gives me all of cookie dough pieces it can fit in the cup, lol. Super delicious and I always grab this in the store whenever Im in the ice cream mood!";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: dakotaw3
text;;;: I love me a good cookie dough ice cream! Its so delicious! Also Ben & Jerrys high key supports the #BLM movement. So we STAN Ben & Jerrys in this household. 10/10 recommend to anyone and everyone in literally the entire world. Go get you some Ben & Jerrys. Like. Right now.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,pandabehr_est,2020-06-23,5,,0,0,"One of my favorite cookie dough ice creams! While I dont purchase Ben & Jerrys often, when I do this is typically my go to flavor. You get a good amount of cookie dough especially compared to some other companies that make cookie dough. Plus the flavors all mesh together!";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,fernief,2018-12-05,5,,0,0,"The chocolate chip cookie dough is amazing, Ben & jerry's has come a long way in making a premium product and the cost sometimes may be high but the quality is great so paying more for the brand is so worth it! I will buy it again and keep trying all of the crazy flavors";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: andreaviolin
text;;;: My favorite flavor. I like that you actually get cookie dough bits in this. The chocolate chip mixed in with the vanilla ice cream really helps balance out the sweetness of the cookie dough. This is my favorite and I love this flavor of ice cream. I keep re-purchasing it;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: marine_a
text;;;: This is one of my top favorite ice cream brand. I love the different flavors they have and I cant choose a favorite one because I love all of the flavors. For me its not overly sweet. And doesn't leave any weird after taste in my mouth. I would definatley 100% recommend.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,stilla,2020-05-05,5,,0,0,"A classic for all to love. It may be a little more fattening than other flavors but that means you can split up how you eat it a savor the deliciousness of this amazing treat. Highly recommend it to cookie lovers, cookie dough lovers, people with a sweet tooth and more!";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: ecjo13
text;;;: This is my favorite brand to buy cookie dough from. The ice cream itself is so creamy and delicious. The cookie dough pieces are so good! And they give you a good amount of them in the ice cream. It is a little expensive but you get what you pay for and this is quality;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: lexeeb1
text;;;: Always will be in love with cookie dough ice cream and I don’t know if it’s just me or not but some cookie dough or chocolate chips taste differently in other ice cream brands. Ben & Jerry’s definitely doesn’t disappoint when it comes to their ice cream. I’m obsessed!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: ajroxurvanitym
text;;;: I'm a huge fan of chocolate chip cookie dough. Oddly enough out of the three I've tried I really only like this one from ben and Jerry's. I have to eat it over time though because it's so sweet. I like how it still tastes like cookie dough though and not just chunks.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: missymissjamie
text;;;: Best Ice Cream ! The vanilla taste so rich and creamy! I buy about 3 pints every single week because it's so good ! I would add more cookie dough to the ice cream it def taste better than any other brand it taste more natural ! I would buy this product all the time !;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
text;;;: Ben and Jerry's has to be the best ice cream that there is on the market. The different types of ice cream they come up with is pure genius. It is so hard to pick on flavor to be your favorite. They come in perfect little containers so they make a great little snack.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,allyhawk13,2020-07-26,4,,0,0,"I love cookie dough, so I loved [product:ben-&-jerrys-ice-cream-chocolate-chip-cookie-dough-16oz]. Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,carolmpileggi,2020-07-30,5,,0,0,"My absolute favorite! Loooove the big chunks of dough all throughout the ice cream. I can eat the whole pint in one sitting if Im not paying attention... if I have to find a fault is the size, I would like more variation as for a bigger family you will need multiple";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,brittanys36e9,2020-07-28,5,,0,0,"The cookie dough in this is absolutely amazing. I usually buy cookie dough ice cream mostly for the cookie dough and unfortunately usually find that there is hardly and cookie dough, but there is so much cookie dough in this particular brand! Its definitely my go to";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,kristinka_v_s,2019-03-03,5,,0,0,"Simply delicious! Not too much chocolate, not too much vanilla, amazing balance of traditional Ben&Jerry's ice cream with cookie dough! A bit too sweet but at the same time the ice cream can never have too much sugar. I always have a tub of this flavor iny freezer.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,angiel68,2020-06-26,4,,0,0,"This was delicious. They have chunks of cookie dough so thats theres at least one little cookie dough bite in each spoon full. Theres also a great balance of the cookie dough, chocolate chips, and ice cream so that youre able to actually taste all the ingredients.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,makaylab19,2020-06-11,5,,0,0,"Ben & Jerry's Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough ice cream has been a favorite of mine since I can remember. I always appreciate the rich vanilla ice cream and chunks of cookie dough. I always end up finishing it in one sitting. Classic, reliable, and delicious!!!!!!!!!!";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: dannab14
text;;;: I love this ice. I think You will love this too if you love to eat cookie dough when your not supposed to. This ice cream has an amazing taste that almost taste like the really thing but in ice cream form. I really recommend this ice cream that has a lovely taste.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: katpereira21
text;;;: Honestly Ive made it pretty clear that anything with some kind of dough in it is absolutely amaaaazing! Ive just come to associate Ben and Jerrys with it by now. Its there known good. Their identity which is why I like this ice cream in addition to all the others.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: alic40
text;;;: I only ever get cookie dough ice cream from Ben and Jerrys! They actually came to my college this past spring semester and were handing out free ice cream and thankfully I had the last scoop of cookie dough because it has so much cookie dough in it and I love it!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: taliao5
text;;;: I love this ice cream because it has the perfect amount of all the components of this as it is on the package theres not just more cookie dough or less cookie dough and not always vanilla ice cream as a perfect amount of chocolate chip cookie dough and ice cream.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: allysonp8
text;;;: Everyone loves a good basic cookie dough ice cream and this one is definitely a great one. My only complaint is that it can be really solid and you have to let it defrost a lot before you can really get into it. Its not the creamiest but it still tastes amazing!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,tallyv,2020-01-06,5,,0,0,"I LOVE ben and Jerrys ice cream! Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,kenzieebritt,2020-07-24,5,,0,0,"I am a big fan of anything cookie dough, and this is easily my FAVORITE cookie dough ice cream! Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,arelyp16,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"DELICIOUS, creamy, sweet and the best part is that it has chunks of cookie dough in it, great product and at a very good and fair price, great for sharing. Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: zhya
text;;;: Yum!! Really liked this flavor because cookie dough in ice cream is just great. Polished it off in 3 sittings while watching some netflix and I definitely want to repurchase this. Definitely recommend getting some if you're into chocolate and/or cookie dough.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: QTgurl224
title: SOFTY
text;;;: Well there’s not many chunks so I️ just sat there and kept digging around for chunks. There was none to be found): ugh also the ones I️ did were very soft. Like I️ want alittle crunch or something but I️t was as if they were soggy !! Great flavor I love I️t.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,myal1,2019-12-08,5,,0,0,"I love chocolate chip cookie dough and Ben and Jerrys does it best with theirs. Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: taylorc16
text;;;: This so so good for movie nights. I bought one for me and one for my boyfriend for an outdoor movie night. It was delicious. Obviously dont leave this out in the heat for an extended period of time. But this whole brand is fantastic they support BLM Movement;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: christiannar2
text;;;: Ben & jerry's always makes the most addicting ice cream. I am always willing to pay the high price cause I know i'll never be disappointing. Chocolate chip cookie dough is a dream come true. Huge chunks in ever bite makes any cookie lover's dream come true.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,kathyt40,2020-07-23,5,,0,0,"This is, hands down, my absolute favorite ice cream I have ever tried!!! Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: tzintlya
text;;;: This was super good. They are really good for a picnic or hot day. I love the portion and it helps me to eat an entire gallon of ice cream. I love the pieces of cookie dough. I have bought this many times. I would buy this again. I recommend this to anyone.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,memberabfe7,2020-06-03,5,,0,0,"This is the only ice cream brand i enjoy. Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,abi_auck,2020-05-13,5,,0,0,"This is it, folks. I have tried every other cookie dough ice cream and all fall short of Ben and Jerrys. Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: ryann4

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: katelynb73f7
text;;;: I am a huge sucker for ben and Jerrys chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream. It is so smooth and not super milky. A small pint last me a for a few days. Since is sweet i can only have a small amount at a time. It is a bit on the pricey side but so worth it;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,diaundradabney,2020-07-31,4,,0,0,"I love cookie dough lol.. I know ally of people can say this. Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,taym10,2020-05-10,5,,0,0,"SO GOOD! Rich, decadent and creamy! Great flavors, not over the top sweet and those chunks of cookie dough are beyond mouth watering! Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: nicolen99
text;;;: I love this when I dont want a lot of ice cream I can usually eat this in two days but it gives me just the right amount. I love getting this when I want some but dont wanna buy a whole tub. Its expensive for such a small container but definitely worth it;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: kikim18
text;;;: Ice cream holds a special place in my heart. Not many deserts can hit the spot like ice cream. All the flavors. This flavor is a favorite. Little sweet little salty. Just right and yes it is affordable. I always buy when im craving and it just hits right.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,jordoncoxx,2020-03-14,3,,0,0,"While Ben and Jerry's serves the best ice cream on Earth, their cookie dough would have one thinking otherwise. Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: member05c731
text;;;: Ben & Jerrys chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream is the first chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream I ever had and it is hands-down the best chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream available. I also love that it is made in a neighboring state of Vermont.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,yaymejess,2020-07-28,5,,0,0,"The perfect size! You can find this ice cream at most grocery stores, and it definitely hits the spot. Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: yanibellp
text;;;: I love cookie dough ice cream and this Ben and Jerrys chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream is perfect for when you want a sweet treat. The cookie dough chunks in this are soft and perfectly combined with the ice cream creaminess. Definitely a favorite!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: jkranjac
text;;;: This is my go to brand and flavor. Ben & Jerrys has such high quality products and a large variety to choose from as well. I love the huge chocolate chip cookie dough bites in each pint. Real cookie dough bites and with a rich creamy vanilla ice cream.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,everythingbeauty786,2020-06-03,5,,0,0,"This is the best brand of ice cream!! I'm like a little kid at the grocery store when I see Ben and Jerry's! Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,emmakate_02,2020-05-08,5,,0,0,"This is one of the best ice creams to exist in this entire world, and to be honest, universe! Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,kellyc169,2020-07-24,4,,0,0,"Love the Ben and Jerry's Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Ice Cream. Sometimes we add a little milk to make a milkshake out of it. Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: itssydni
text;;;: My go too ice cream. I love it so much that my boyfriend will randomly just buy it and put it in the freezer for me to surprise me. Im actually eating it as I write this review! I like to spice it up sometimes by adding caramel and rainbow sprinkles.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
text;;;: BEST ICE CREAM EVER!!!!! It has the perfect amount of cookie dough and the vanilla ice cream is to die for. The pint is the perfect amount. It lasts me from three to seven days. This ice cream is more pricey than others but it is definitely worth it.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: rs426
text;;;: This is one of my all time favorite ice creams. The base is a creamy vanilla flavor but with a toffee flavor like a real chocolate chip cookie. The chunks of cookie dough are substantial and abundant which I love. This is best cookie dough ice cream.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: emilyoc7fc
text;;;: Ben & Jerry;s chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream is delicious. I don't normally purchase this flavor because my favorite flavor of this brand is Phish Food. The company has strong morals and I feel comfortable buying from them. Worth the calories!;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: msaxd
text;;;: This is currently my favorite chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream! It's delicious and fresh. The distribution of cookie dough to ice cream is perfect! It's pricey so I only buy when it's on sale but it is my favorite! I can't wait to repurchase it!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: kalynnm
text;;;: Now who doesnt like cookie dough. I love it. I could eat it all the time if I could. Its my always go to ice cream that from this brand. I hope that never change this but could they add more cookie dough in it just for me please. Im just kidding lol;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: kats6
text;;;: Delicious ice cream! Really creamy and soft compared to other ice cream brands. It is affordable and comes in many flavors. I am a repeat consumer and I always get Ben and Jerrys. I 100% recommend this ice cream brand to others who havent tried it.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,alisab0acd,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"By far the best cookie dough ice cream out there, I tried this when it came out and have been hooked ever since. Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough

text;;;: if i could rate this 10/5 stars i would because its so delicious that its disappointing when youre done w/ it! ben and jerrys is just a staple its better than roundys or blue bunny. its not too pricey and its worth it in my eyes. i would recommend;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,msnyder2,2020-07-23,5,,0,0,"I love Ben and Jerrys. They have creative flavors with quality ingredients, and you can tell when you taste it. Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,sakinab2,2020-05-05,5,,0,0,"One of the classics is a good chocolate chip cookie dough flavored ice cream. text;;;: When you say ice cream I think Ben and Jerry's! Specifically cookie dough...who doesn't love cookie dough ice cream. Ben and Jerry's is delicious. I grew up with a pint always in the fridge and us New Englanders love to eat ice cream year round!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough

text;;;: You literally go wrong with Ben & Jerrys. I mean its delicious! Of course I only purchase the flavors I like. This is a classic cookie flavor though and the cream melts so deliciously as you get to munch on the cookie dough. Now I want ice cream;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: afa1
text;;;: A classic! Can't go wrong with this flavor. Lots of cookie dough in there -- good ratio of dough to vanilla! I've had this maybe 2-3 times. Wouldn't always purchase this because it is really really sweet but as a once-in-a-while-buy I'd get it.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: ayaank
text;;;: It's great. It's also vegan if you are dairy free. I am personally not a vegan but I still think it's their best flavor. It's also cheaper than some of the other flavor. I love eating this with cookies. Absolutely delicious. I highly recommend.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: isobeldm

author: soniar49

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,ncwarren80w,2020-07-24,4,,0,0,"Love Ben and Jerrys! name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,justicem8,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"No matter what flavor I choose Ive never gone wrong with Ben and Jerrys. Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,jaeb8,2020-07-23,4,,0,0,"Such a great ice cream flavor that adds to your day. It is delicious. I do wish there wasnt as many chocolate chip cookie dough pieces within the ice cream but when there arent any other flavors that interest me, I definitely go for this one.";;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,clarisseashley,2020-07-30,5,,0,0,"One of my go-tos when Im in the mood for ice cream. Not too sweet, and it has a good amount of cookie dough bits and chocolate. Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,taylorjobeauty,2019-12-04,5,,0,0,"My favorite ice cream EVER!! This is the most tasty chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream on the market. name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,courtneyfaith___,2020-07-23,5,,0,0,"Not only does B&J make incredible tasting products, but they also take a very vocal stance on social issues and use their influence to do good in the world. Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,curlytiff,2020-07-28,5,,0,0,"as a lover of chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream, i can confidently say that ben & jerrys did something right! the cookie dough is the perfect balance of salty and sweet goodness and the chocolate chips add a balance! you wont regret it.";;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,alyssac174,2020-07-25,4,,0,0,"I love this ice cream, but it is pretty sweet because of all the cookie dough! Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,knoue,2020-07-23,5,,0,0,"This is honestly one of my most favorite ice creams! The cookie dough actually tastes real instead of having that weird aftertaste. I love this, and have actually recommended it to people. Overall my satisfaction is at a high percentage!";;;

author: brandiejoann
text;;;: An absolute classic that will make your tummy and your tastebuds ecstatic! I have purchased this several times and its always a classic option. Ben and Jerrys is always a quality product that you can count on you cant go wrong with them!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: timetogloww
text;;;: Hands down one of my favourite makers of chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream out there! The perfect ratio of ice cream to toppings! So delicious Im definitely a fan for life! Highly recommend to anyone wanting a satisfying cold treat!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,lipkit99,2018-06-03,5,,0,0,"You can’t really go wrong with chocolate chip cookie dough or Ben & Jerrys. So the Ben & Jerry's® Ice Cream Cookie Dough is an obvious go to when I’m;;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,coralv,2020-05-04,3,,0,0,"Ben & Jerrys is a great brand for ice cream but this one just doesnt make the deal for me. I think its a little plain to my taste, if your looking for ice cream with cookie dough Id rather try the Milk & Cookies one, you wont regret it!";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,jamestheiv,2020-07-22,5,,0,0,"I mean. Its amazing, it might be packed full of calories but its worth it. I never regret it afterwords, well maybe a little. But almost every one of their flavors is incredible. Give them a shot and you will have found your new brand.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: nickilynn765950db

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,denizzza,2020-05-02,4,,0,0,"Pretty good, tastes like ice cream from the ice cream store. Delicious. Very expensive for the size though. Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,hallierb,2020-07-21,2,,0,0,"I tried this, and just decided Id rather eat normal ice cream. If you cant have dairy, this really isnt that bad! It lacks that familiar creamy consistency that dairy ice cream has so I suggest letting it melt a little bit when eating!";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,carlab18,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"Chocolate and cookie dough together in an ice cream, its a delicious combo , I'd recommend it to anyone who loves chocolate and cookie dough, its great just the way it is, it don't need any improvement, I would buy it again and again!";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
text;;;: Im obsessed with chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream and this is by far the best Ive had. This is a little pricey for the amount you get but they more than make up for it with the flavor and quality of the product that youre getting!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
text;;;: I love this ice cream and it def. is a favorite I. My household. We buy this frequently the only thing I think I would improve is the size of the pacakaging I wish it was bigger ! But overall satisfied with the quality of this product;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: camc1
text;;;: So amazing! Ben and Jerry’s is the only kind of ice cream I buy and I purchase it every single time I go grocery shopping! I can’t get enough. I love the cookie dough flavor! There’s lots of cookie dough and the chunks are really big!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: vandorsten
text;;;: Since I was in college (15 years ago!) this has always been an indulgant treat. I dont buy it all the time because it is pricey for the amount you get. But it always has an amazing flavor and is rich & smooth like ice cream should be.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: guettav
text;;;: Love the natural sweetness in my mouth. This flavor comes with such a variety and different blends of taste. Sometimes its sweet then its salty. I highly recommend if you are looking for that specific taste for you next tasty craving.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,avad12,2020-06-14,5,,0,0,"I am such a sucker for Ben and Jerrys Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Ice Cream. Yes, it can be a little pricey but it is worth it. The cookie dough is chewy with that satisfying sugary grit. You could never go wrong with this ice cream.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: alisay2
text;;;: i try not to do dairy but when i do i definitely get b&j. i love chocolate chip cookie dough even if im risking salmonella from the cookie dough. all of ben and jerrys ice cream is good. it has the perfect amount of creamy and punch.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: ericaf50

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: sandrar127
text;;;: Sooooo good I crave this all the time and its so much better than all the cheap brands its so creamy and theres also little mini ones and theyre so cute its for like one serving just in case ur scared of eating more than one serving;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,laurag31,2020-07-30,4,,0,0,"Great vanilla flavor. Nice rich ice cream, and the cookie dough pieces are plentiful and just the right size. I could eat a whole pint of this in one sitting. You really cant go wrong with Ben and Jerrys. They understand ice cream.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,lorim63,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"Gahhh! By far one of my favorite Ben and Jerrys ice creams. There is ample amount of dough which is something other ice creams tend to lack. But also, not too much to be overwhelming. I love this one and would buy it over and over.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,keke1920,2020-07-10,5,,0,0,"I mean, what can I say?? The Ben and Jerry products have always been on point. I've been a customer for years and will continue to purchase. I wouldn't change anything with this product. Compare to many, this is worth every penny.";;;

author: katerinas74e6

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: ah240
text;;;: Who doesnt love Ben and Jerrys ! Honestly they have everything I would want. This is one of my favorites yes I would buy it again. I would like to not have to wait so long to open the tub hahaha. I just want to eat the ice cream !;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,aelac,2020-07-29,5,,0,0,"I love this so much! Its so so Delicious! I cant get enough of it, I would definitely recommend if you want some delicious meal ice cream, melted in your mouth wonderland! Definitely a favorite, I cant tell you how much I love it!";;;
