text;;;: I feel like Ben & Jerrys packs the most add ins/ toppings per container. No matter what flavor you choose you will receive a whole bunch of chunks of delicious. If Im having an ice cream craving I know this brand will be amazing!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: absinthewithadya
text;;;: I think the ratio of ice cream to cookie dough is the most perfect in Ben and Jerrys. I would highly recommend this product especially with the lower cost point! It is the same quality as in store which is a huge reason to buy it;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,mariaz15,2020-06-22,3,,0,0,"I love Ben & Jerry's don't get me wrong any pint that I can get, I snag. Except this one it never has enough chocolate chip cookie dough pieces in it and the ice cream is just Bland without it. This one will stay on the shelves";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,ninal39,2020-06-23,5,,0,0,"The BEST chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream EVER! Other ice creams can't match the taste of Ben and Jerry's cookie dough. I don't know what they put in them, but I'd eat a whole pint of nothing but that right now if I could.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,nikaa4,2020-07-27,5,,0,0,"The taste of Ben & Jerry's is probably the best you can get when it comes to cookie dough ice cream. The mix between chocolate chips, cookie dough, and ice cream is very good and makes sure theres enough of each in every scoop.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
text;;;: I love Ben and Jerrys ice cream! Its really the only I eat! Chocolate chip cookie dough and chocolate fudge brownie are my favorites. They really hit the spot when you want something sweet! Everyone should try their ice cream!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: kseniyak1
text;;;: I havent tried yet but from what I see its a good brand of ice cream and I see people that say its too pricey but its so expensive because the workers that work for this brand actually are the ones that have no home after jail;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,eddyk,2020-07-23,5,,0,0,"At the beginning this flavor sounds weird for me but my kid was very excited to tries it, and he wasn't wrong, he enjoyed this flavor like he uses to do when something is delicious for him, with a face of ""I am in the heaven """;;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: steffanis2
text;;;: Who doesnt love cookie dough ice cream. This might be my go to on a hot summer day when I need something sweet. I would give it a 10/10 for sure. I love that this is sold in almost every store so I can get it when ever I want;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: stoneyr
text;;;: Cookie dough has been my favorite ice cream since I was a kid! Ben & Jerrys by far the best ice cream! Loaded with cookie dough!! Very affordable price! Very delicious! Im 28 now and still eating cookie dough ice cream lol :);;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: mariamf11
text;;;: This product is great we should give a try and find new ways or you can say explore new ways I really dont want to stick on routine way so I try new things always try it and find for yourself too yes i recommend it its yummy;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: melisaj4
text;;;: Love it love it love it love it love it love it love it. No repeat consumer and couldnt be happier with your products. Needs more chunks in all of them. Its so much better than anything else would choose over and over again.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: haileec9
text;;;: I absolutely loved Ben & Jerrys Ice Cream Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough. I have bought it multiple times and I will keep buying it when ever I have the extra cash. While it may be a bit more expensive its completely worth it.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,miacolleeng,2020-07-29,5,,0,0,"I love cookie dough anything! Even though Im not a huge fan of the cherry or vanilla flavor but the cookie dough is delish!!! I like the small 16 oz I get from 7/11 for movie nights! Also, the deals buy 2 get the 3rd free:)";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: hattie_killeen99
text;;;: This dairy free ice cream wasnt bad but it definitely is not in my top five dairy free ice creams. It tastes a lot like greek yogurt and the cookie dough bites taste a little bit off. I most likely would not recommend this.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,lizzym15,2020-07-05,5,,0,0,"To me, its all about the toppings not the ice cream. You can put cookie dough on just about any flavor and I will eat it for the cookie dough. However this ice cream is so tasty either way but I love the cookie dough touch!";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,person,2018-02-12,4,it has a nice balance,0,0,"This is a go-to, comforting ice cream to me. Yes the price is a bit high but after comparing it to other cookie dough ice creams, ive found the balance of chocolate chips, cookie dough and ice cream is perfect for my taste.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: diamonds1
text;;;: Probably one of my top flavors. My daughters will try to take it if they see me with it. But I always share and they love this kind of brand. Our favorite and I love their deals that they have at Walgreens with this brand.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: jaimehbeth
text;;;: When I crave ice cream this is my favorite. No other cookie dough ice cream brand can compare to this classic. The cookie dough bites are so good! I can finish an entire pint in one sitting if I dont force myself to stop!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: Lyss
title: Huge Globs of dough! So yummy!
text;;;: The vanilla base is absolutely wonderful and I love that there are bits of chocolate thrown in as well. I couldn't believe how much cookie dough was in this ice cream! Definitely glad I splurged and got myself this brand!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,jocelynt13,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"i will definitely have this again! the ice cream was perfectly creamy and had just the right balance of toppings and ice cream. it was a little pricey and i couldnt find a bigger size, but it was totally worth the money!";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,gaballday,2020-07-13,5,,0,0,"This is my favorite ice cream brand! I am allergic to milk, but I love cookie dough ice cream. I recently discovered this product and Im very happy that I dont have to compromise my health or my favorite dessert anymore.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: davida17
text;;;: My favorite ice cream on the market! Very flavorful and I love the cookie dough and texture of the ice cream overall! Definitely a fun late night sugar craving. I would highly recommend buying this and I would buy again!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: mtursk
text;;;: Ben and Jerrys is one of my favourites ! There is a lot of cookie dough and chocolate all throughout. It can be a little more pricy than other ones but you can usually find a 2 for $10 deal at shoppers. Super delicious !;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: kira_in_hawaii
text;;;: This product has a huge taste of delicious chocolate chip cookie dough flavor that just makes u want even more of the ice cream. My kids love chocolate so this is the most ideal flavor and ice cream brand we have tried.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: mamanicole215
text;;;: I would get this every summer! It was always fresh and tasted great! My sisters also enjoyed it as well. We would totally recommend this ice cream! Compared to others it was better quality. We were completely satisfied.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,elenid,2018-12-05,5,,0,0,"I love ice cream, but I love Ben and Jerry’s ice cream especially because it has that rich cookie dough taste and it’s full of texture and it’s just my favorite flavor of ice cream from this brand! I love it! Must have!";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: xzarial
text;;;: I think this product was good overall it is a very affordable price and perfect for sharing although they could lower the price a bit and this flavor is not my favorite but still pretty good I would definitely recommend;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,lesliec86,2020-07-27,5,,0,0,"You can never go wrong with a Ben & Jerrys ice crea! It is more on the expensive side, bit definitely worth treating yourself! This flavor its amazing, especially if you love cookie dough it has all the right amounts!";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,uhohloreo,2020-07-03,5,,0,0,"I love Ben & Jerrys because it truly is the best ice cream, even though its so expensive. They also personally took part in the current BLM human rights movement, so they are obviously the top tier brand of ice cream.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,nicoleb313,2020-07-28,5,,0,0,"I love cookie dough ice cream, and this brand is one of my favorites because it has such a large amount of cookie dough chunks! I also like how thick it is. It has such a full flavor which makes it one of my favorites.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: noracat99
text;;;: Okay... let me just start with my favorite ice cream brand is ben & jerrys so I might be a little biased BUT I love this flavor!! It satisfies my sweet tooth so well! The price is also great and doesnt break the bank!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,natalielovesskincare,2020-06-20,5,,0,0,"These are so delicious and such a classic, except for the thousands of calories that are in 1 pint. If you dont care about the calories and you just want a full sand then this is a great option and it taste delicious.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,justinc18,2020-06-17,4,,0,0,"Putting cookie dough and ice cream together is almost a perfect match, but can sometimes be heavy when eating it. Cookie dough is delicious and amazing following that original blend of vanilla ice cream is impeccable.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,brooke5,2020-05-08,4,,0,0,"Ben and Jerrys is just a classic go to comfort food. Whether youre sad or celebrating, this is the perfect product for any moment! there are so many flavors but personally i love cookie dough! I recommend every tries!";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: ULTIMATEC
title: COOKIE DOUGH
text;;;: I have always been a fan of cookie dough. I could always use more in the pint but then again I should just eat cookie dough. I was happy and had plenty of dough in my pints over the years. Usually average of 5-7 gobs;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: crimsonm
text;;;: If you love eating cookie dough ice cream then this one will definitely be a favorite. Has a good amount of cookie dough pieces. Unlike other brands where the ratio will be a bit off. I always recommend this flavor.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: nicholeb33
text;;;: Ok this is one of my favs. My only complaints are that the container is tiny for the price. It should be more like $1.99 but its $5.99 for just a small amount. Thats the only disappointing thing about this ice cream.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,onlywayisforward,2020-01-03,5,,0,0,"Any ice cream I can eat anytime, anywhere! It is so enriching & flavorful, I live eating it especially when Im binge watching, Im a repeated customer and cookie dough is my favorite favorite ice cream I love love it!";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: lexi_rodz24
text;;;: this is the best flavor of Ben & Jerrys ice cream. theres plenty of cookie dough pockets and youre definitely getting what you paid for.The ice cream is very good quality and creamy and I can finish a pint by myself.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: jessshanee
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream ever! It is the best the cookie dough with the chocolate chips are simply amazing an enjoyable! One of the best ice creams I have ever had hands down! I would recommend this to everyone!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: monika1990
text;;;: This is hands-down my favorite ice cream flavor. I would definitely recommend this product. It has a good ice cream to chocolate chip cookie to ratio. I have purchased this product many times and I will buy it again.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: oliviad89
text;;;: My absolute favorite ice cream! This is such a great treat and so creamy. I love the additional chunks of chocolate chip cookie dough. This is my brothers favorite dessert. I also really enjoy this ice cream as well!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,mykaela_alvey,2020-07-28,5,,0,0,"Honestly, the best! In my opinion Ben and Jerrys has the best tasting cookie dough! Theres nothing I dislike about this ice cream. You will absolutely not be disappointed. Its my top choice whenever I buy ice cream.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: No chocolate chips
title: No chocolate chips
text;;;: Every time I buy this ice cream I seem to forget that there are never any chocolate chips in the cookie dough. And every time I’m disappointed. Hopefully I’ll remember next time I get a craving and go somewhere else;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,,2020-07-19,5,,0,0,"My favorite go-to to indulge my dairy fix. Ben and Jerrys is quality ice cream, and chocolate chip cookie dough should be a staple in your freezer. I try not to eat it all in one sitting, but the temptation is real.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: asian_bbby
text;;;: Ben and Jerrys is one of the best ice cream brands ever to me. it tastes the best of cookie dough ice cream that ive ever had. so delicious theres no way you could be disappointed. buy every single time i run out !!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: Ajw1
title: Chalky texture
text;;;: I had a craving for icecream so I went to the store and got this hoping it would satisfy the craving. It didn't. The texture is weird. It's not smooth like every other b&j's icecream. The flavor also sort of lacks.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: xsimply_sydx
text;;;: The original cookie dough ice cream! Ben and jerrys actually invented cookie dough ice cream! This is the BEST cookie dough ice cream@in the market and I will pay the premium price over and over because its so good;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: leah l
title: Barely any cookie dough if not none :(
text;;;: Ben and Jerry’s is my favorite but whenever I have the cookie dough ice cream there is very little if any actual cookie dough in it! so it would be awesome if you guys put more in or made a new one with extra dough;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,clairekcf4c,2018-10-05,5,,0,0,"The best store brand ice cream out there. The vanilla is better than all other ice creams I’ve tasted, and the cookie dough does not make me sick like some do. I have bought this over and over and will continue to.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
text;;;: I really like this ice cream but it seems a little bit too sweet for my taste. The chocolate seems slightly sharper than a milk chocolate but not as much as a dark chocolate. The cookie dough is soooo good though !;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: daniellec192
text;;;: Thus is a great sweet hard ice cream. Its single serve style cup allows you to grip for yourself satisfaction. Normally I eat halfway down and put in the freezer for consumption on another day I crave cookie dough.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,jadar18,2020-05-07,5,,0,0,"Anyone you ask who knows me will tell you about how much I love ice cream- and especially this one! I am obsessed with this flavor of ice cream,and I cannot stop eating it! I would definitely recommend this flavor!";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: autumnrose16
text;;;: Delicious ice cream and lots of flavors too! Always nice and creamy. Tons of interesting flavors; not just the simple chocolate and vanilla. This is my favorite brand of ice cream as well I would highly recommend.;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: randi10
text;;;: Delicious as it is fattening but so worth it. The vanilla and the cookie dough bites are out of this world! Wish there were more pieces of cookie dough but I might be obsessed. You cant go wrong with Ben & Jerrys!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,chanteli1,2020-07-30,4,,0,0,"Chocked full of cookie dough and that makes this a real winner. To me, it is a bit pricey. But, if I have a splurge or a craving then I will spend the money. It is great out of the carton or from the store fronts.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: katd1
text;;;: Ben and Jerrys never disappoints me at all. It tastes better than any off brand ice cream that tries to look like Ben and Jerrys. This ice cream has the bests flavors but it is very expensive. I would recommend.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,imlaurax,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"To die for!! One of my favorite ice cream brands. I love the cookie dough. They are expensive though so I dont purchase often. Even on sale, they are pretty price but Ben and Jerrys has amazing quality ice cream.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: yoyoc75ca
text;;;: Just ordered a Ben & Jerrys ice cream cake in this flavor for my husbands birthday! Im not a cookie dough person but still enjoyed it a lot! My husband LOVED it! I think it would even taste better with hot fudge!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: jordyng8171
text;;;: THE BEST! Anything Ben & Jerry does is amazing!! Its a bit pricey but worth it. I dont think there is much they could even do to improve this product because its to die for! Everyone needs this in their freezer!!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: elizabeths849a
text;;;: My favorite ice creal of all time! I dont know what they put in ben and jerrys ice cream that they are so addicting ! The other one that i also like is vanilla and that is also my favorite! I would but it again !;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,Alexis,2018-01-24,3,Was looking forward to cookie dough icecream...,0,1,"Unfortunately, I ended up with pint of vanilla icecream. There were only about 3 globs of cookie dough in the whole thing (which were delish when I did get to eat them). Wish there were more, very disappointed..";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: hibs
text;;;: I love cookie dough therefore the ice cream hating part of me just disappears. But I do have to appreciate the ratio of ice cream to cookie dough in these cartons because they have SO MUCH COOKIE DOUGH I love it;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,taylorrenae92,2020-06-24,4,,0,0,"A classic! I have to be in the mood for it, its not an ice cream I want all of the time. I enjoy it, but there is something about it that is just maybe a little off. Im not sure what it is, its not bad just ehh.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,amandah342,2020-06-16,5,,0,0,"Chocolate chip cookie dough is my favorite ice cream, and Ben and Jerry's does not disappoint. The cookie chunks are big enough to stand out, but not so big they become overwhelming. Really great overall flavor.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: asb322
text;;;: I love Ben and Jerrys ice cream! Theres always so many flavors to choose from! It is perfect for summer days and whatever flavor you choose I bet it will taste delicious! I would definitely recommend to others!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,parisiaz,2020-07-28,4,,0,0,"This is pretty good. But honestly Im not that big of a fan of cookie dough ice cream so this was just ehh for me. I wouldnt buy it again but if I was offered it at a party or something, I wouldnt turn it down.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: kylal1
text;;;: This is my all time favourite ice cream since I was a kid! Ben and Jerrys makes the best! The cookie dough chunks are big enough for you to taste them each bite! The price is reasonable for the quality you get;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: alexisf0642
text;;;: You cant go wrong with a good Ben & Jerrys ice cream. There are so many flavors to choose from and theyre all amazingly tasty! They come in various sizes and each tub of ice cream is affordable. Im satisfied.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,racing_my_shadow,2019-10-22,3,,0,0,"Something about cookie dough and ice cream. It is on the pricey side if you dont but it on sale, but hey when you want ben and Jerrys you go get it! I would definitely recommend if you havent tried it, do it";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: lorikovachuphold
text;;;: Ben and Jerry I think is the creamiest ice cream of all ice cream I love the cookie dough my husband will get up late at night just to have a bowl of ice cream and me I find myself eating it in theAfter noon;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,lovelycarolinaa_xo,2020-07-11,5,,0,0,"loving this chocolate chip cookie dough its really good with a good size amount of the dough, i had got a different brand but not ben & jerry does it, i also got the birthday flavor which im excited to try!";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: hayleyp6f89
text;;;: Lots of cookie dough pieces which is the most important to me! I love all Ben & Jerrys ice cream and its usually my go to when grocery shopping and we want to grab ice cream! Their cookie dough is top notch.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,linneai,2020-06-24,5,,0,0,"I love Ben & Jerrys, and this ice cream has been one of my favorite for years! Because of how unhealthy it would be to eat every day and how pricy that would be, I treat this as a me-night type of ice cream.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,spaigeotis,2020-05-08,4,,0,0,"Ben & Jerrys is my favorite brand to buy chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream from, I think the vanilla is delish and creamy however I do think there could be more cookie dough, the equal ratio is lacking!";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: sarahh420
text;;;: B&J is so full of chunks and I love it. Their cookie dough has lots of chocolate which is perfect for those who are chocolate lovers. This is such a go to ice cream for me. I highly recommend trying it out.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,jessicag15fc,2020-07-30,5,,0,0,"another good brand, can easily be found at many grocery stores and there are so many flavors to choose from. They range from mini personal cups to regular sized buckets of ice cream. Would totally recommend";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,rubs84,2020-06-08,5,,0,0,"I love this Ice cream, I like to feel the chocolate. The price is good for the quality. I bougth the last year but I want to buy again this year. Like a dessert is perfect or with brownies. I recommend you!";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: breannas39
text;;;: I really like this flavor. The cookie dough is chewy in a good way. It brings a little bit of saltiness to all of the sweet components. Ive had this flavor a few times and its definitely a top five for me!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,kaelinw1,2020-07-23,5,,0,0,"I love Ben and Jerrys ice cream, it is so creamy and delicious. I think is is up there with Graeters ice cream because they have so many flavors. It is delicious. I was overall satisfied with this product.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
text;;;: This is my all time favourite ice cream. If I had to choose one flavour of ice cream to eat for the rest of my life it would probably be this. The chunks of cookie dough in the ice cream is the best part.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: Rsties
title: I live cookie dough but...
text;;;: I've been buying this flavor for years now. I went to my local store to buy one today and my pint size seriously only had two pieces of cookie dough :/. Big disappointment! Guess I grabbed the wrong pint.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
text;;;: This ice cream gives you that raw cookie dough taste surrounded by swirls of chocolate fudge and ice cream. The creaminess is this product is to die for! I would recommend this to any cookie loving feen!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,ticketsforfive,2020-07-28,5,,0,0,"Classic cookie dough. Cant go wrong, super yummy and the perfect Ben and Jerrys size for splitting while having a Netflix marathon! The ice cream is delish and theres a good amount of cookie dough pieces";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,kaceya,2019-12-05,5,,0,0,"Ben and Jerrys is delicious. Where blue bell is a classic, Ben and Jerrys isnt afraid to really mix in bold ingredients and new flavors. Love having this in my freezer for days that I need a sweet treat.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: serenax2
text;;;: I love this brand and all their unique and amazing flavors. I cant help but buy a few when I go to the supermarket because of how fast I finish one pint. And this is affordable so I would recommend 10/10;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: emilyannperry14
text;;;: Ben and Jerrys chocolate chip cookie dough is such a classic. There are an abundance of chocolate chips and cookie dough pieces all throughout the ice cream so you know youre getting your moneys worth.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,,2020-07-16,5,,0,0,"This is so good especially with this season!!! Much needed dessert for summer!!!! You can eat this all for yourself but if you cant, you would love to share this to your friends!!!!!! So much lovee!!!!";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,memberf2692,2020-07-28,5,,0,0,"My all time favorite flavor of ice cream is chocolate chip cookie dough, but the Ben and Jerrys flavor is just so sweet and the cookie dough part is so soft and just the right amount for the container!";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: sundas
text;;;: One of my favorites! I always buy this flavor whenever I find it in the ice cream section. Cookie dough has been a fav since I was young so this always brings back the joyful memories when I was a kid!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: thebrighterside926
text;;;: The little bites of cookie dough taste like homemade cookie dough. There are plenty in the ice cream. The ice cream is creamy and has great flavor. The cookie dough compliments the ice cream perfectly.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,muppethans,2020-07-29,4,,0,0,"Love this flavor since Im a huge cookie dough ice cream person. Only thing I dont like is there isnt enough cookie dough pieces, but then again I would just eat a whole pint of cookie dough if I could.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,kennadyy,2020-06-05,5,,0,0,"THIS! This is the best icecream out there whether your eating it in the pint or your actually at ben and jerrys, its like a cookie in icecream form and is absolutely amazing! Highly recommend for you!";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,smashattackk,2019-12-05,5,,0,0,"I love this ice cream! Its so delicious and although the price isnt ideal, its so worth the money. The flavor, the packaging, everything about this ice cream I love. I always recommend this to others!";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,faithda5b8,2020-07-23,4,,0,0,"This ice cream is so good! The cookie pieces are the perfect size, and mixed with the ice cream it creates a wonderful treat for all those cookie dough lovers out there! I would definitely recommend!";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: jenniferc29
text;;;: The best chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream out there!!! Huge chunks of the cookie dough in this small tub... and a lot of cookie dough in this tub! Simply perfect if you love to eat cookie dough!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: bellas72
text;;;: LOVE THIS!!!!! soooo good if you love cookie dough this ice cream is filled with cookie dough chunks I recommend to anyone who likes cookie dough its affordable doesnt melt quick and overall yummy !;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: arielc
text;;;: I am a big lover of chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream. I have been buying Ben & Jerrys for a very long time and I simply love the little cookie dough balls in the ice cream. It has great flavor.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,nicurn17,2020-06-21,4,,0,0,"The pint size is so convenient, but dangerous. Its not hard to finish a pint;" the problem is the huge amount of calories. Im a sucker for cookie dough but they have a huge variety of fun flavors.""";;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: heatherbeeeee
text;;;: Man cookie dough anything is good. Period. But Ben & Jerrys chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream is AMAZING!! The ice cream tastes so good and the cookie dough is nice and doughy and yummy! Mmmmm.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,michellel285,2020-07-24,5,,0,0,"Who doesn't love creamy, sweet ice cream with little chunks of tasty cookie dough? Ben & Jerry's never leaves you disappointed or looking for those bits of cookie dough. One of my go-to flavors.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: expensiveicecream
title: No dough
text;;;: I bought this tonight for my birthday ice cream. Happy birthday single me. THERE WAS NOT A SINGLE PIECE OF COOKIE DOUGH OR A CHOCOLATE CHIP. just vanilla ice cream. really??? you guys... come on.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: hihanserd
text;;;: literal heaven. and the flavor half baked is the goat. i usually eat their diary free ice cream and its soooooo delicious. still creamy and flavorful. the best thing about it i dont feel bloated!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: harryd3
text;;;: Who doesnt love chocolate chip cookie dough? In my opinion its one of Ben and Jerrys better flavors. Good amount of chocolate chip cookie dough scattered throughout. It is one of my go to flavors;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,kaia2424,2020-05-05,4,,0,0,"I love any Ben & Jerry's ice cream. I just hate how much they cost for such a little carton. Do not get me wrong, the ice cream is very creamy and the taste is awesome, it is just too expensive.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: nickelb
text;;;: My all-time favorite Ben & Jerrys ice cream flavor. This flavor has consistently been in my freezer for most of my adult life. I wish I could eat half a pint every day & have my pants still fit.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,laurelanne,2020-07-23,5,,0,0,"Good, tiny lil bits of cookie dough throughout with yummy lil chocolate chips. I would improve by making chunks of cookie dough bigger and incorporate it into the ice cream more, will buy again.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,lalasabyx3,2020-06-22,5,,0,0,"Ben and Jerrys ice cream are really good. It bring a lot of cookie dough, and the ice cream is creamy. They are expensive but they are always doing a lot of good, do research and youll see why.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,brittanysterling83,2019-12-03,5,,0,0,"Just beautiful ice cream. Delivered today, frozen solid, consumed today. We found the product very flavorable, quality unmatched. Brought back the old days when ice cream was really ice cream.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,emmaro1397,2019-05-02,5,,0,0,"I adore Ben and Jerrys, and anything cookie dough related. Its always a let down when there is not much cookie dough in the ice cream, but that is certainly not the case with this ice cream!";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,shaybe40c,2020-07-24,4,,0,0,"The perfect size for one person. It is enough to finish before it gets freezer burn. Just the right balance of dough, chips and ice cream. It can be pricey so I stock up whenever its on sale";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,nervousnoel,2020-07-23,5,,0,0,"I absolutely love Ben & Jerrys ice cream, especially chocolate chip cookie dough. This container is the perfect size, and is on the affordable side. I highly recommend trying this ice cream.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,ssss,2019-06-07,5,just perfect,0,0,"My favorite kind of ice cream is cookie dough, and this is one of my favorite brands of cookie dough ice cream. The globs are perfect texture, and the chocolate-vanilla balance is on point.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: cocolokooo
text;;;: Ben & Jerrys is one of my first choice when it comes to super market icecream. Its so good and tasty . It actually taste like real cookie dough . I really like this brand overall satisfied.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,lindsaya38b3,2020-07-29,2,,0,0,"It was too sweet for my liking. I do realize it is a sugary treat, but compared to other ice creams, I just didnt love this one. More for the novelty of different flavors than actual taste.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: daniisfc4e
text;;;: My favorite! I like the way the cookie dough pieces melt with the iceream and leave the chocolate chips behind to chew. Best combination on an ice cream but Been & Jerrys have perfected it.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: whitfr0st
title: I can't find my icecream!!
text;;;: Eating my favourite Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough flavour right now and I have eaten lots of dough!! Not sure others about others saying not enough dough... I'm having not enough ice cream!!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
text;;;: This ice cream is super creamy and smooth. It's very sweet and is sooo good you might finish the pint in a week! I love this cookie dough it's like the perfect amount of sweetness and salt;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: mbunnell25
text;;;: I have tried every brand of chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream and Ben&Jerrys is by far the best of all of them! It may be a little more expensive than the rest of them but SO worth it!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: laurap69
text;;;: A basic but classic example of the cookie dough icecream. Its always more expensive than other options in the case. The cookie dough quality is typically better but not but a huge amount.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: mo2019
text;;;: Easily one of my favorite ice creams. I can honestly say I always have a pint in my freezer. The vanilla based is so creamy and the ratio of ice cream to cookie dough chunks - perfection.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: summaahhtime
text;;;: Ben & Jerrys is one of those brands you know you want to buy from not only because the quality is great but you know its a good company that cares. Will definitely buy from over and over!;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,ashlynmedia,2020-07-14,5,,0,0,"Whats more classic than cookie dough ice cream? I love cookie dough and ice cream so of course this is a perfect combination. Its rich, creamy and always a safe choice when having guests.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: autumncsusa
text;;;: Definitely one of my favorite ice creams! Ive gotten this countless of times but the only down side is the price compared to other brands that have larger sizes. Takes super good though.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: sharonr10
text;;;: Its a little pricey for what you get but I think its the beat cookie dough ice cream. It has a good amount of cookie dough. I would say you get a piece in almost every bite. Very creamy.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: brooken30
text;;;: This product is so good. It is worth the price and I purchase it often. I highly recommend if this is something you enjoy as well. I don't feel like this product needs any improvements.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,stephaniec1,2020-07-29,5,,0,0,"Best cookie dough ice cream. Honestly Ive tried a lot of brands. And if youre lucky enough to live close to one of their ice cream shops, its even better in person!! Highly recommended!";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,kenyaf2,2019-12-13,5,,0,0,"My favorite ice cream, I love the variety of flavors the company offers, but the biscuit and cream is my favorite, I love the little pot option too, comes the portion of the size I need";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,notyourbai,2020-05-04,5,,0,0,"I love ice cream. Especially when there is just enough in a jar for one person to enjoy. I buy these when Im having my time of the month and it can last me three days, the hardest ones";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,michellee87,2019-10-22,4,,0,0,"This ice cream is amazing! One of my favorite brands of icecream. It melts so nice and is super creamy! I can eat a whole container alone, but being the nice mommy I am I always share!";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,scarletb9,2020-04-02,5,,0,0,"This ice cream is so delicious and an easy late night snack, u can buy it at almost any gas station which my friends and I LOVED on our hot summers night drives. Definitely recommend!";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,jenniferl359,2020-07-27,4,,0,0,"This ice cream was great! Huge chunks of cookie dough and the ice cream was pretty soft, I do think the price is very high for the small pint we get but I would definitely buy again.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,kashc,2020-05-06,5,,0,0,"The best flavor of ice cream to ever exist!!!!!!! I love it, its a bit expensive for only a pint but worth i t. The cookie dough pieces are evenly inside the ice cream and not small.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: murphyt1

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: isiav

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,Ashtonzj,2017-11-14,5,Love it,0,1,"I’m addicted to this ! It’s the best chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream I’ve ever had . Sometimes I hardly get any of the dough, but it’s still good and I’ll continue to buy it.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,jackien33,2020-07-23,4,,0,0,"Soooo much cookie dough and chocolate chips. Ben and Jerrys is not stingy , there is cookie dough in every bite . I didnt give it 5 stars just because its expensive for ice cream .";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: lismariea

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,courtneyw117,2020-06-20,5,,0,0,"The cookie dough is very good tasting, I buy this everytime i want ice cream! Everything about this ice cream is amazing. It is affordable but i think they should lower the price.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: christineh1

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: lizzieg15

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: donnaf32
text;;;: I love Ben & Jerrys. Chocolate chip cookies is the bomb [product:ben-&-jerrys-chocolate-chip-cookie-dough-vanilla-non-dairy-frozen-dessert]s. I little pricey but worth the money.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: shortnsweetz

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,torih38,2020-07-25,4,,0,0,"I like this ice cream, but it tends to get so hard even a metal spoon can barely get anything out. Which is a problem I have never had to deal with, when it comes to the brands.";;;

author: maditheamazing

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,,2019-04-03,5,,0,0,"Ive eaten whole tubs of this at a time, its that good. It used to be a friday night tradition with my boyfriend to whip one of these out and watch movies. Best ice cream brand.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: joceling95

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,madisync,2020-07-23,5,,0,0,"There is really a Ben & Jerrys flavor out there for everyone. My favorite is the chocolate chip cookie dough of course, but go to the grocery store and find yo flavor today!";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,brianab30,2020-01-05,5,,0,0,"Cookie dough ice cream is a favorite in my house, and my personal favorite brand is Ben and Jerrys. The pints are a bit pricey but they are so good with quality ingredients.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
text;;;: Ben & Jerry's is such a sweet yummy ice cream. It can be more expensive than a lot of other ice creams especially for the small containers they come in. But they're so good.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,hilrozen,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"dont even get me started cookie dough is my favorite so this review is already biased, cookie dough anything Id eat, actually scratch that super raw raw dough i could never.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: habi

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,zukhrufnaz,2020-07-29,5,,0,0,"This is one of my favorite icecream i always have it in my freezer lol and the prove isnt bad honest, i did recommend it to my friends and family. One of the best ice cream";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: aleksandrajan

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,vb89,2020-07-12,5,,0,0,"My favorite flavor! I love the chunks of cookie dough in the ice cream, its a nice surprise how big they are. Its creamy and tastes fresh with out being too rich in taste!";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: destinyslifex

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,tommoerman1,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"super chunky and killer with plenty of wokeness and baby crying to go along with the amazing flavor, the price is just right and i always love a buy one get 4 free deal!";;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,kassidiel,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"I love, love ice cream I could seriously survive off of icecream. But Ben and Jerrys is one of my absolute favorites. I dont think I have tried one that I havent loved!";;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,micheller128,2020-01-05,5,,0,0,"Great flavor & its loaded with lots of cookie dough pieces. Its a bit pricy compared to the price of quarts in other brands,but definitely better flavor & ingredients";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,riquel_angela,2020-07-25,4,,0,0,"If your Favorite Ice Cream Flavor is Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough, then this Brand is a good Choice to try. This is my go to if I don't see the Milk & Cookies Flavor.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough
author: samrad

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,thaish1,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"I love the taste of this ice cream, it is definitely my favorite! I guess it is a little bit expensive for an ice cream, but it tastes so good that worth the price!";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,jessicacc0b6,2019-12-04,4,,0,0,"This was not too bad. It had a good level of dairy in the ice cream. Each tub is quite small, but it had enough cookie dough. A little too sweet overall though.";;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,hauptem,2020-07-24,5,,0,0,"I thought that the Chocolate Chip Cookie dough was just the right texture, creaminess and flavor. The tub had the right amount of chocolate chips. Truly delicious!";;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,cammiegraceweaver,2018-07-03,4,,0,0,"It’s expensive, but it’s so worth paying the price!! This ice cream is really good!! I don’t keep it on the freezer, but I will splurge every now and then on it!";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,lesliea28,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"Ben & Jerry's Ice Cream Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough is so rich and creamy it melts in your mouth. If you must indulge, this Ice Cream is like being on a Cloud.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,danielles213,2020-07-30,3,,0,0,"Lots of big chunks of chocolate and cookie dough! If you like a lot of chocolate, this is for you! I prefer the smaller chips and larger chunks of cookie dough.";;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,jenniferi21,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"I love Ben & Jerrys, their ice cream is so smooth & creamy. I love their flavors & its a super plus that support BLM so I will always support Ben & Jerrys.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough,alijac904,2020-07-28,5,,0,0,"The one. The only. The original thats never been recreated. This is the best and although other cookie dough ice creams are good, none beats Ben and Jerrys.";;;
