name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Please fix your brownies,2018-05-15,1,Crumbly brownies three times!,23,10,"He past three times I have bought the chocolate fudge brownie flavor the brownies have been hard and crumbly. The soft chewy brownies and the best part and three times now I have been let down. Each purchase was made several months apart, hoping the quality control issue was fixed. Nope. They were purchased and Walmart twice and Walgreens the most recent time. This was my absolute favorite ice cream flavor, but I think I’m done wasting $5 on being disappointed each time. Ben and Jerry’s, please figure this out. I saw that you commented that this happens when the ice cream melts and refreezes. You really need to contact your vendors and get this worked out.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,EBGC03,2018-09-19,5,Simply the best,11,0,"I’m dealing with an ice cream addiction right now, I’m eating a pint of chocolate fudge brownie everyday, I know it’s crazy and expensive but it’s the only coping skill that works for me right now, I just love love this ice cream.";;;
Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: andiinnashville
title: Same issue with the crumbly brownie
text;;;: This is our favorite flavor and the last 3 cartons we’ve purchased have had the same issue of the brownie being crumbly and gritty. We love this flavor so we’re hoping this can get resolved soon! here’s a photo of what we’re seeing in these last 3 cartons.;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Djmomjeans,2019-04-26,1,I miss the old brownies.,54,16,"Chocolate fudge brownie is my absolute favorite! A few months ago a bought a pint and there was only one giant hunk of hard crumbly brownie in the center, I couldn't even eat it. I was disappointed but thought it was a freak thing. Since then I have tried it again from different stores, and different flavors i.e. Half baked and the chocolate fudge brownie pint slices. Again the brownies have been crumbly and chalky. And there weren't many brownie pieces in the them or any fudge swirls. I hope they change the brownies back to the way they were so I can enjoy my favorite treat again!";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,,2020-06-16,1,Only thing I wanted after having my baby,17,4,"So disappointed! I struggled with gestational diabetes and was unable to indulge in sweet treats for my whole pregnancy. When I gave birth to our sweet baby boy, I was allowed to have my Ben & Jerry's again. The store was out of half baked so my husband brought me fudge brownie. Couldn't even get through a proper bite because the brownies were just a crumbly/icy mess and the ice cream was sticky and solidified. I thought it had expired but it's good until Sept 2018! I was so upset. I'm afraid to have him go buy more pints if this is the result. I keep hearing about their new flavors but I waited 9 months for a regular pint and it was thrown in the trash-my husband couldn't even stomach it and he eats everything.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Miss Pettinato 55,2017-08-07,5,Chocolate fudge brownie,15,5,"This ice cream is the best chocolate ice cream in the world, now I am a chocolate lover and I also love ice cream i love trying new flavors and also new restaurants. Ever since I have tryed Ben and Jerrys ice cream I never thought i would find another ice cream that would beat it, and you know what I have not found a better one... and I probably never will. I am only 25 but I have traveled ALOT. I lived in Amsterdam for 3 years and I have tasted and tryed many different chocolate ice creams all arownd Europe and nothing even comes close. I am now back in the US and I still have yet to find a better ice cream. ❤️❤️❤️ If your in a chocolatly mood and need a fix Ben and Jerrys is the ice cream for you!!!";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,FuzzyGut,2019-04-26,5,One of my favorites!,11,0,"The brownies! My god the brownies are so GOOD! I’m sorry some don’t enjoy them but I just ate my second pint of this flavor and it’s become a favorite. The ice cream is rich and delicious of course, but the brownies are ridiculously good! Just the right flavor and chewiness. I could eat this for days on end. Please keep this one alive!";;;
Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Phish Food Fan
title: How I love thee!
text;;;: I love the brownies in this ice cream. I’m fact I love them so much that I bought a batch from the company Ben and Jerry’s uses! I eat this flavor more often than I should admit and I LOVE it. Chewy yummy brownies in delicious chocolate ice cream! Can’t lose. I’m sorry so many of you don’t like these new brownies but that just leaves more for me!;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Goldriley,2017-11-08,3,Brownie woes,7,0,"This flavor used to be a favorite of mine, but the last few times I have purchased this flavor over the past few months, no matter what store, the ice cream itself has been great...but the brownie chunks were dry and crumbly! I had purchased Half Baked as well, and the brownie chunks were AMAZING!! I hope something can be figured out so it can be a return to being in my good graces again!!";;;
Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Chrissy
title: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
text;;;: Im huge fan of Ben & Jerry's and normally Im a Phish food gal! Decided to try this Flavour as had 7 year old nephew staying and Brownies are his favourite desert also any excuse to indulge in a major choc feast! but was SO disappointed in this ice-cream ! was clumpy and brownies where so hard and dry?!!! Shame a let from all the other flavours ..boohoo.;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,PatTuz,2020-04-14,1,What's happened?,1,0,"Every so often I'd buy a pint of ""CFB"" as my kids' and I refer it, and the brownies would be hard, crumbly, and tasteless....a real disappointment. I just attributed it to ""a batch that melted on the way to the supermarket"" or something. However, now, when we really need it, I bought 5 pints, and all are hard, tasteless and crumbly. I can't believe that I have to say ""bye-bye""to B&J's CFB.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Mari,2020-05-09,1,Very Sad,1,0,"Ever since I was young, this has always been my favorite ice cream. I've always bought this ice cream and ate it as a comfort food. However, recently i've found that I can't enjoy this ice cream like I used to, because of the disgusting little chunks of hardness in the brownie bits. There's nothing more insulting than biting into a ""great baked good"" and instead having your teeth grit because of the inability to chew the extremely hard pieces in the brownie. I thought maybe it was a one time thing, so I bought another container. The second container had the exact same issue. This is truly a major let down, because this is the only store bought ice cream I've ever liked I hope they can fix this issue soon.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Disappointed625,2019-03-13,1,Disappointing,3,2,"I have had this flavor from time to time pretty much since it was first made available, so I am familiar with the level of quality it can have. In fact, take a look at your pic compared to mine--totally different experiences as your pic represents what I am accustomed to enjoying and mine is a poor copycat version with crumbly bits of what appear to be and taste like inadequately mixed brownie pieces. Honestly, the ice cream would have been better without the add-ins. After reading other customers' experiences, I think I am going to write this one off my favorites list.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Melanie,2019-08-26,1,I noticed you must read and fix issues????????,1,0,"My girlfriend and I got some of this ice cream all because it’s her favorite. She dug into it to find dry, gross brownies. We were like what? Went and bought another thinking the first must have frozen wrong or something. She dug into it and it as well was the same way. I love Ben and Jerry’s ice cream. I will go out of my way to get some. But now I’m rethinking this. The reviews go on and on for several years worth. If you don’t fix a problem that’s been on going, how am I sure the rest of your ice cream isn’t going to have problems like this. Sorry but I just can’t chance it.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Rosex,2019-06-25,1,Fix your brownies!!,1,0,"This has always been one of my favorite Ben & Jerry's flavors. However the last two times I have bought it, the brownies have been crumbly and not fudgey?? Not sure what happened to the batter but the brownies are flaky and hard chunks. Very disappointed!";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,becca,2018-05-15,1,Was my favorite until.....,8,4,"Had a huge craving for Ben & Jerry's Chocolate Fudge Brownie Ice Cream. I have been eating Ben & Jerry's for quite some time now. Today I purchased it and must have bought a bad batch. The ""fudge brownie"" pieces were dry, crumbly, and tan in color-not like usual! It didn't taste like the normal batch either- I was so sad because after 2 bites I just couldn't handle it anymore. I just bought it today and it wasn't even close to the Expiration date either. Disappointed :(";;;
Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Tally
title: Disappointed
text;;;: The chocolate ice cream itself is very good but the last couple pints I've bought all had hard brownie bites. They're so dry they crack as soon as you bite into them.;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Scook,2017-08-24,1,Disappointed,3,1,"Since I was a child Chocolate Fudge Brownie was my all time favorite ice cream until one day I bought it and the brownies were hard, crumbly, gross...I hoped it was a fluke yet every single time I buy it it's still disgusting. I stopped getting it for a while and switched to Half baked....the brownies were hard AGAIN even in that. Now I've been forced to buy other brands but none can even compare to what once was the best ice cream known to man. Sadly not anymore.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Sara,2018-03-05,1,Awful brownies!!,1,0,"I was hoping this was a fluke thing but reading the other reviews it seems not. I’ve purchased 3 pints in the last six months or so and they were absolutely delicious! Soft chewy brownie pieces and wonderful ice cream. However this time the brownies are awful. They are rock hard rectangular chunks I can barely scoop out and when eating them they are just dry, hard, and crumbly. Not worth the $5!!!! I probably won’t try again as this seems to be an ongoing issue for other customers as well. It was my favourite ice cream:(";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,TayTayE,2017-08-18,2,Really disappointed :(,3,1,"I bought a pint of this ice cream from my local drug store and I just have to say how utterly dissatisfied I am on the quality of the ice cream I have been eating this brownie flavor for the past 4 years with no problem and I have always been a loyal customer of Ben & Jerry's so I'm sad to say that for the first time I am very unsatisfied hopefully you'll be able to make it up. And to pin point the problem area, the brownies were burnt and dry.";;;
Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Freddiegee
title: What used to be
text;;;: I have been buying this for a long time but it's not the same anymore. you guys have the best chocolate ice cream but the brownies have totally declined lately. I know you can blame retailers but that doesn't cut it anymore. it's not their fault. Take the heat yourselves and do something about it.;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,mpc2000,2017-06-13,1,What happened to this ice cream?,4,3,"We bought 2 pints last night, chocolate fudge brownie and coffee toffee crunch. We haven't had any Ben and Jerry's in a few years. Chocolate fudge brownie used to be my absolute favorite. We each tried one bite and all hated it. The brownies were hard and the ice cream tasted really weird. The coffee toffee crunch wasn't much better. I guess they changed the ingredients. Doesn't taste like a premium ice cream. It's not even as good as a cheap ice cream! Definitely won't buy again!";;;
Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Michael G
title: So disapointed
text;;;: This used to be heaven in a cup. Now the squishy delicious brownie has been reduced to some indescribable light colured crunchy substance that neither looks og tastes like brownie. Surpriced to see the same issue in year old reviews.;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Melba,2017-12-14,3,Totally Torn!!,3,2,"This has been my favorite flavor since it came out. However I’ve recently switched to different flavors because the consistency is very bad regarding the brownie chunks. I understand the issue regarding handling but if you cannot control the quality of your product through your vendors, well that’s concernjng for your product. I look forward to the company regulating handling so I can come back to my beloved flavor. Meanwhile, your other flavors are definitely keeping me busy!!";;;
Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Marissak
title: So disappointed
text;;;: I haven't had any of these ice creams in about 8 or 9 months and to celebrate my nephews birthday I took him to get one since I don't get to see him besides every couple months. Well when we got home for his party he took a bite and immediately spit it out. So i tried it and noticed it just didn't taste the same and the brownies were either overcooked just not made correctly. It's such a shame because this was my favorite brand but I can't afford the price for it just to be thrown in the trash :(;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Kris0909,2017-10-11,2,Yuck,4,1,"This ice cream used to be my absolute favorite!!! Now every time I have gotten some the brownies are hard and crumbly. I've even tried different stores, different states and now we are stationed in Germany and we still get the hard crumb brownie :( I miss the yummy fudge brownie";;;
Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Shalom
title: VERY AVERAGE....
text;;;: Certainly not worth $8! never again.................;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,alex1989,2017-09-28,3,Normally I love this ice cream!,3,1,"I buy this ice cream a lot. I notice that half the time it's perfect, lots of big chunks of brownie. The other half, it's hardly any brownie, or it's a whitish color in the brownie and it's crunchy (not how it normally is, which is soft) or the brownie is mushy. So, it's a basically a 50/50 shot of getting my money's worth. I love this ice cream but I'm starting to wonder why this happens?";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Kandi,2019-11-24,2,Ugh,0,0,"I bought one 2 weeks ago and it was amazing! I bought one today and it is disappointing. The brownies are hard and dry. I couldn't even eat them, so I ate the chocolate icecream.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,sunny23,2017-10-06,1,Brownie tasted hard,4,1,"I bought this recently and it used to my favorite. I got it all the time but the last two pints I bought the brownies tasted overcooked. I don't know how they let that slip through quality control. Come on Ben n Jerrys, you guys can do better.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,caitlinlarkin,2017-07-14,1,"Used to be the best, not so much anymore",3,1,"This used to be one of my favorite B&J's flavor (right up there with Peanut Butter Cup and Half Baked), but the last two pints I've bought have had super dry, over-cooked brownies. So disappointing when you are expecting delicious, chewy, fudgy brownie chunks. Upon reading other reviews, it seems like this is a common issue, so I don't think I'll be purchasing this flavor again.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,LBeckett,2019-05-02,3,Hard brownies,0,0,"Normally love this flavour, but opened this carton and all the brownies are hard and crumbly. Very disappointed and makes the ice cream not enjoyable";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,PhoenixRises,2019-09-03,5,Old Faithful,0,0,"This is a classic favorite! I would buy this ice cream a couple times a week from the convenience store on campus during my college days at George Mason. Whether I was stressed out or just in the mood for something delicious I would turn to old faithful. I stopped eating this flavor for awhile when all the new flavors came in, but no too long ago by husband bought me this by mistake instead of the brownie core (another fav), and I forgot how amazing this ice cream was. I started getting this again. I love brownies, and they're not stingy with the brownie bite size and that's much appreciate. This ice cream was the reason why I fell in love with B&J in the first place, so it will always have a special place in my heart.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Jank,2017-10-14,1,Hard and crumbly fudge,4,1,"The last 3 jugs of chocolate fudge brownie have been very dissapointing. The texture of the brownie havent been fudgy, but very hard and crumbly... The brownie isent even brown, its more a light brown colour ..";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,lily14,2017-08-31,2,Strange,3,1,"This ice cream is usually very good and chocolatey, complete with soft, scrumptious brownies. However, my last purchase of this specific flavor was very disappointing. The brownie bites were hard, grainy, and inedible. The pint has been sitting in the freezer for months, something that is unprecedented in my house Ben and Jerry's lovers.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Lgalla25,2017-09-13,2,Poor quality recently,3,1,"This is my absolute favourite ice cream and hadn't had it for around 6 months - unfortunately the 2 tubs I have bought recently have had light coloured, chalky/crumbly dried out brownie in them - very disappointed :-( the chocolate ice cream tastes ok, just the quality of the brownies seems to have deteriorated.";;;
Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Camcam
title: What's happened to the quality control on this fla
text;;;: I love this flavor when the brownie are fudge bu over the last several years about 50% of the time I get the graining yucky stuff that I think is supposed to be the brownies. Please fix the problem.;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: beach patty
title: Not what it use to be!
text;;;: The only ice cream I've eaten for years is the Chocolate Fudge Brownie. Was always my absolute favorite but lately the brownies are light colored and crunchy and so disgusting that I have thrown most of the last few containers out. Have you changed something? I noticed you said that it could be from improper handling and refreezing. If that was the case I think the ice cream would have ice crystals in it. For the price of over $5 I will have to reconsider brands of ice cream. I don't mind paying the price but lately it's just not worth it. I'm sooo sad.;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Madday,2017-08-24,4,Amazing chocolate!,1,3,"I LOVE!!! This ice cream. It took my husband a few yrs to even convince me to try it. Result..... pure weekly addiction. However- the last few pints we have purchased (one for him one for me) have had SUPER dried out,almost cracker like, brownie chuncks. Not at all the ice cream I've come to love and crave. Don't know if maybe a bad batch, quality control, or recipes??? Anyway, hoping the good ole amazing-ness will return. I would still tell my friends this is amazing Icecream with a proviso that it's been not stellar lately.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Lejla,2017-07-16,1,Not like it used to be...,1,0,"I used to get this flavor ALL the time. I loved it. It satisfied all my chocolate cravings.... buuuut... I haven't gotten it in a while. Until yesterday. It tasted fine until I got to the brownie part. It felt like it was dried out, hard, and even had a crunch to it. I love the Milk & Cookies flavor (so I guess I'll stick to that), but unfortunately I won't be buying this flavor again.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Jackiefromcalifornia,2019-08-24,3,The queen of Ben & Jerry’s ice cream,0,0,"Good lord, I use to LOVE This ice cream. I would pay $8.99 at gas stations if I craved it and I was away from home. It was always worth the extra money even when it came to the minis. I don’t know what’s happening with the company though, the ice cream is becoming a hit or miss. Sometimes my brownies are so soft and delicious and other times they are dry and hard to chew. It’s terrible. Just last week they were doing buy 5 and get them for $3.99 each, so best believed I bought ten because what a steal.or so I thought..... Well turns out that was a mistake because I have opened three containers and they are extremely dry and hard. Hope they see all these reviews and improve its quality. because girlfriend over here wants to love the ice cream again!";;;
Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Kvb1982
title: Hard brownie
text;;;: I bought this and was really excited to try it but when I did the brownies were a weird light brown color and hard. The brownies crumbled into what looked like dirt.;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,DC24,2018-09-04,5,A Go-To Chocolate Ice Cream!,1,0,"I don't normally go for rich chocolate flavors, but this is one of my favorites when I do. It has a wonderfully rich, creamy, cake-like texture. Perfect smoothness and a delightful chocolaty brownie flavor set this ice cream apart from most chocolate ice cream. If you have a hankering for simple pure chocolate fudge brownie goodness, then this flavor is for you!";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Joseph1813,2017-07-01,1,Very Disappointing...,2,1,"Bought this flavor twice in the last 2 days... Yesterday the ice cream was fantastic ate the entire pint me and my wife. But tonight we had our second pint.. The ice cream had lots of crystals all over it, the brownies were crusty it was so bad i checked the expiration date thinking it was expired. Not very happy considering this is a $5 pint of ice cream...";;;
Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: MM33
title: Extremely disappointing
text;;;: I loved this ice cream flavor ever since middle school! Now the last time I've bought it the brownie is crusty and nasty ! It not only is disappointing after I sit down after a extremely long day go enjoy a sweet treat that use to be very delicious- and now it's just chocolate with chunks of dry crusty brownie bites !! Waste of money;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Cree,2019-03-14,1,"Good ice cream, nasty brownies",1,0,"I'm in shock. Ben and Jerry's has let me down for the second time. They used to have such delicious ice cream! The ice cream itself was good, but the brownie chunks were terrible! They tasted more like a ball of slightly cocoa mostly flour. Even the cheapest ice creams get the brownie chunks to taste like... brownies. Epic fail.";;;
Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Love Brownies
title: Please Bring Back Better Brownies!
text;;;: I have been a fan of this flavor & eating 1 pt a week for last 3 yrs. The last 4 months I have been buying from Neighborhood Walmart in St Matthews Ky & Kroger nearby & unfortunately this ice cream..my escape has not been as good :(;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Mike
title: Crusty brownies!
text;;;: I have stood by this flavor for so long thinking I just had bad luck but the past few times its been the same! Freezer burn chalky crusty brownies and an all around bad flavor. I can see I'm not alone. I've tried multiple stores and it seems like there is no bias for quality! To bad it really is the best flavor in my opinion;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: porter6547
title: Not the same
text;;;: I always get this ice cream flavor. It is my favorite. I bought it three times within the last month and each time it contiued to disappoint me. The brownies were hard and scarce and the ice cream tasted weird and of chemical odor. So disappointed because it is my favorite flavor and I was a dedicated buyer. :((((((((((((((;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: James193850790
title: Brownies are gummy!
text;;;: Used to be my favorite before they released the brownie batter ice cream (RIP).. now the brownies are so gummy that they are unedible! I literally eat the ice cream and spit out the brownies they are so bad :( I wish they would release the brownie batter ice cream again as that was a much better ice cream overall.;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Gtrman84,2019-07-21,2,What happened?,1,0,"Ben and Jerry's chocolate fudge brownie ice cream was once one of my favorite things. A treat that was worth looking forward to. The brownies used to be delicious, now they are dried crumbles of tan funk. I don't buy that the poor state of said brownies is due to a freeze thaw cycle. What happened? Really??";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Sarah0192837,2020-05-07,1,Disappointing and inedible :(,0,0,"I just bought a pint of this because I was desperately craving ice cream and it was disgusting. This used to be my favorite flavor, and I'd buy it all the time last summer, but the brownies this time were all white and crumbly and the whole experience was so gross that it was completely inedible. I wanted this ice cream so badly and it was such a let down. And now I see that this is a common problem and has been for years. Not buying again;" it's not worth spending $4 a pint for this kind of risk. Buyer beware.""";;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Karitx,2019-03-14,1,Brownies might as well be rocks,2,1,"This used to be the best flavor they had - moist and chewy brownies. For the last 10 years, they've sucked. Every so often, you'll get a decent pint, but mostly they are inedible. I've contacted B&J a few times and they never sent what they promised, I've stopped buying this completely.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Priya R,2017-06-21,1,"Ugh! Hard, inedible brownies",2,1,"This used to be my favorite ice cream, bar none. But every other pint I buy now has the same problem - the brownies are hard, chalky and just BAD. They used to be consistently soft and delicious...think I'll have to stop buying this altogether, though it breaks my heart.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,EmmaN,2017-09-18,1,Almost no brownies and they are hard :(,2,1,"Used to love this flavour and I bought a couple pints the other day, there were almost no brownie bits in either of them and the ones that were there were hard and crusty :( if the recipe changed for any reason, please bring back the old one. I love my Ben and Jerry's!";;;
Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Kbuggs
title: Taking care of customers
text;;;: My fiance and I are very big fans of Ben & Jerry's especially this flavor. It's something we get to share together at night when we're alone. A week ago we had an issue with his ice cream and we hate to complain but it was an issue that really freaks out my fiance. Today we received a refund and 5 free coupons for whatever we wanted. This was a shock to him and I but was very much appreciated. It nice to see how much you care about your customers. We both thank you very much and will always be a fan!! :);;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,briski,2019-02-06,5,Still can't find a better chocolate brownie flavor,1,0,"I compare all my chocolate ice cream and brownie ice cream experiences off this flavor. I have tried and failed multiple times to find a comparable one that comes close to achieving this greatness, only to come short every time. It is my all time favorite ice cream!";;;
Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Lucy1991
title: Not sure anymore!
text;;;: This is my go to flavor when I get Ben and Jerry's! Normally it's very delicious and the brownies are soft! The brownies in this pint were almost white and I was cautious as to if I should eat them! I'm disappointed it wasn't like it normally is!;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Jillvh16,2018-04-21,5,Holy Fudge!,1,0,"I've been in love with Ben & Jerry's ice cream since I was 3. I'm 16 and I've tried just about every flavor. My top 3 favorites have got to be Chocolate Fudge Brownie, Half baked, and Phish Food. I will always love this ice cream!";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Yuki,2017-06-21,1,Not the same,2,1,"I have bought this flavor three times in the last two months and the first pint was great, really creamy and the brownies were soft. The last two the brownies were hard and crusty :( Super disappointing.";;;
Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Cbugkrunks33
title: A solid classic
text;;;: I love chocolate ice cream and I love brownies! Putting the two of them into an ice cream flavor together was a genius idea! It's a classic flavor to me and never disappoints! Thank you B & J!!!!;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Chris,2017-05-08,1,"Brownie bits had white, crumbly, dried parts.",1,0,"The ice cream itself was good, but most of the brownie bits had white crumbly bits and it got worse the further I went into the pint. Possibly partially unmixed ingredients?";;;
Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Grantb22
title: Dry chalk brownie ice cream
text;;;: Went down to my local store and grabbed a pint always love the chest gooey brownies but they were crumbly dust disappointed because it's usually so good;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Cmfoster1
title: Best Chocolate Ice Cream Ever!!!
text;;;: This Ice Cream is amazing!!! Love the big chunks of Brownie!!! Im a Mint Chocolate Chip nut...Put a scoop of this with Mint Ice Cream and OMG...Heaven!!!;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Zoe37
title: Brownies hard and gross!
text;;;: Really don’t understand why the brownies in the last few pints I’ve bought become so hard and gross?!?! It’s unfortunate and now I’ve lost $$$ :(;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: maal
title: Where are the old brownies
text;;;: I just had it for the first time in a while and the other reviews are correct. The brownies are terrible. The old recipe was much better!;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Jagger,2017-08-21,2,Getting worse,1,0,"I've always loved chocolate fudge brownie, but now the brownies are rock hard and crumble. No longer have the soft chewy texture.";;;
Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Dababywolf
title: LIKE AN ANGEL IS KISSING YOU
text;;;: This is hands down the best ice cream on the PLANET! I could eat this flavor all day every day. 10/10 great job B&J’s!;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,ella,2018-07-17,5,Rich chocolate taste!,1,0,"I love, love, love this flavored & textured ice cream! Please keep producing it! Soooo yummy!!!";;;
Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Rick,2017-10-01,1,Chocolate fudge brownie,2,1,"Not a good ice cream, would not buy again . Stick with vanilla or cherry garcia";;;
Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Ronin
title: That Rich Chocolate Flavor
text;;;: When I want a really deep chocolate flavor this is it.;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,SadAnnie,2020-06-06,1,What happened to the brownies?,0,0,"I remember 10 years ago this ice cream was my absolute favourite because of the amazing chewy gooey pieces of brownie goodness inside. I've just had a pot and disappointed to find that there are no discernible brownie pieces. Then it dawned on me that I hadn't actually had any brownies in my brownie ice cream for a while. So irritated by this, that I browsed the Web for similar complaints. It seems as though I'm not the only one, and I won't be buying again!";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,BJLUVER,2017-06-15,4,A nice change of pace,0,3,"When I'm feeling frisky I'll switch up to this flavor. You have to be in brownie mood;" this flavor is extremely rich. If you're looking to power through a pint
author: this one might hurt
date: but it is delicious. The consistency of the brownies is very very good. I would say B&J does the best job of figuring out how to keep their brownies gooey and soft in the freezer. If you want a brownie ice cream
stars: this is the best one. Not my #1 flavor
title: but it is up there.""";;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Ricky6732,2017-04-11,5,Incredible,0,1,"Never did in my wildest imaginations would I have been able to imagine a B&J flavor that would match, if not top, Peanut Butter Cup. The place I usually purchase buy my pints was out of PBC so I decided to give this flavor a try. The flavor of milk chocolate ice cream alongside fudge brownies, tasting as if they had been made that same week, was quite satisfying. It's as if you are enjoying brownies with a cup of milk, brilliant. Thanks!";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,WickedAnnabella,2020-08-17,1,"Should be discontinued--dry, crusty, gross",0,0,"I loved this flavor when it was new, but stopped buying it when I was getting pints with crumbly/dry/crusty ""brownie"" bits. Every now and then I decide to give it another try, and I'm always disappointed. I can't remember the last time I bought a pint of this that wasn't dried out and gross. Now sure if it's a storage issue or an ingredient issue, but it's a real problem and a waste of money. They should have stopped selling it years ago.";;;
Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: paintingthesun
title: YUMMMMMY!
text;;;: I was craving a treat tonight and this ice cream (it doesn't really do it justice to call it just ice cream - it's more than that) was on sale at Metro. So glad I picked some up! The chocolate is a nice deep chocolate flavour and there are so many brownie pieces in it that are chewy and delicious! I thought I was going to eat the entire thing in one sitting but it's so satisfying it's going to last me a few down and out nights.;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: nina90
title: used to be great...
text;;;: The weather recently had been very warm into the mid 90s. I decided to treat myself and picked out this flavor. I had great memories of this flavor but this was just a horrid experience. This ice cream batch was crusty and very hard. I just threw away the rest because I was so upset.;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Matthew B,2018-12-26,2,Bad couple of batches?,0,0,"Every week I treat myself to a pint of this ice cream, however, the three times I've purchased this flavor, the brownies look white/greyish, powdery, and crumble the second you scoop them. In addition, the ice cream doesn't seem as creamy anymore, but it may have been because of the brownies... I sure hope this isn't the quality I can expect from Ben and Jerry's going forward. It's the only ice cream worth consuming.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Lane,2018-03-02,2,"Unappetizing, gummy brownies",0,0,"The chocolate ice cream itself is some of the best I have ever had, but the brownie was hard to find and even harder to eat. I had no idea what to expect. My spoon slid through the brownie instantly, but when I tried a mouthful, it was like half-baked batter gum! I kept chewing and chewing the same bit of brownie. Finally, I lost my appetite and put the pint back in the freezer. I won't be trying this flavor again.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,KimmyB,2017-07-27,5,The Ultimate take on this classic combo,0,1,"I've tried many different takes on the chocolate and brownies combo, and none have held a candle to Ben & Jerry's. The ice cream itself tastes deeply of a good quality chocolate -- not too sweet, just right. The brownies are rich and chewy, the perfect texture to contrast the creamy ice chocolate ice cream base. Ben & Jerry's Chocolate Fudge Brownie is my very favorite ice cream, bar none.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,TheLadyofHouseBrownie,2020-04-08,5,I Pledge My Loyalty to Thee Choco Fudge Brownie,0,0,"I would literally pay taxes to fund this flavor. Forget the Targaryens, I would bend the knee to Chocolate Fudge Brownie. This ice cream has been my go-to for the past decade and will continue to be my go-to until my last breath. I know no ice cream flavor but the Ben & Jerry's ice cream whose name is Chocolate Fudge Brownie. It'll be my ice cream from this day, until the end of my days.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Lilshywolfswag,2020-05-16,5,Amazing chocolate with brownie pieces,0,0,"This ice cream is amazing & i enjoy the little brownie pieces. I've ate 2 pints so far in the past couple weeks (& now have 7 more fudge brownie & 2 brownie batter core i ordered from the gift shop). Both fudge brownie pints I've had so far were delicious. & most ice cream has tasted weird to me lately, with 2 places including Ben & Jerrys being the exception that actually tastes good.";;;
Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: foodlover
title: It is bad.
text;;;: I saw the ratings for this before so I thought I'd give it a try. I don't know if its the brownie but its a light crumbly hard texture in the ice cream. It honestly makes the ice cream nasty to eat.;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: skye
title: Literally my only source of happiness
text;;;: This is my go to flavour for any ice cream and it is straight up the greatest thing to ever happen to me;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,BringBackFudgyBrownies,2020-01-05,1,Used to be amazing,0,0,"This has to be my favorite ice cream flavor BUT, it is a 1 in 5 chance that you get a good pint. Lately every pint that I get have dry crumbly brownies like it's just frozen brownie powder. I have wasted so much money buying this flavor in hopes of getting a good batch. The last 4 pints I bought from the store were all bad and I had to throw all of them away.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Vesna,2018-08-23,5,Best chocolate ice cream ever,0,0,"On a whim I tried this, altho I am not into ice creams that have anything but chocolate swirl or chips in it. I loved this, I have purchased a couple times and each time the brownie pieces were soft and chewy. But I would buy it just for the deep, rich chocolate ice cream, so good! And no nuts in it, thank you--I am not a big fan of nuts in my ice cream";;;
Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Ashmar
title: So good!
text;;;: BOGO this week at the grocery store and haven't had this flavor in forever and decided to pick it up this week and it's just SO AMAZING. The brownie pieces are huge and fudgy and the quality of the chocolate ice cream is just beyond the best. Planning on going back by the store to buy two more for the sale before it endsz;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,AJourneyThroughIceCream,2020-07-12,5,Amazing flavor,0,0,"Got this flavor a few days ago to start my journey of trying all flavors, and I am glad to say I wasn’t disappointed. Even though the grocery store I got it from gave it freezer burn I couldn’t have asked for a better pint of ice cream. Strongly recommended if you are in the feels and need a pick-me up.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,LBGA,2017-10-06,5,Personal Favorite,0,3,"I crave chocolate fudge brownie all the time. I'm not big on sweets and consitantly eat very healthy, but I have to have a couple bites every day of my Chocolate Fudge Brownie. It's the perfect balance of sweet chocolate with a touch of saltiness and smooth texture from the brownie. Yummy in every way!";;;
Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: PrinzessJasmine
title: Wisdom Teeth
text;;;: I just got my wisdom teeth removed and I had my mom pick up some ice cream. I was initially nervous about the brownie getting stuck in my teeth but I found that they dissolve between the roof of my mouth and my tounge. Nice rich flavor and texture. Helped soothe my sore throat after the surgery;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Ashleys
title: Another brownie problem
text;;;: This has been my favorite flavor since forever and now the brownies are all dry and crumbly. There aren’t many in my pint yet though with this consistency I don’t want them. The chocolate ice cream is really good but not this brownie mess. What happened!? I miss the gooey fudgy pieces!;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Nessyrae23
title: Finally a chocolate ice cream for chocolate lovers
text;;;: I love chocolate and I love ice cream but that doesn't mean I like chocolate ice cream. Who else hates when you open up a carton of chocolate ice cream and it's light tan and you know the flavor will be as weak as the color and you know before you take your first bite you'll be disappointed? I kind of gave up on ice cream for a long time because of that. It wasn't until I got a job at a Ben and jerrys scoop shop and saw how dark their chocolate fudge brownie ice cream is that I decided to try it. At that point I wasn't much of an ice cream eater and if wasn't called triple dark chocolate fudge I didn't want to try it and be disappointed. When I took my first bite I was really blown away by how rich and deep the flavor was. This is the way chocolate ice cream should be. It should be indulgent and intoxicating and not for the faint hearted. Then you add in the super moist and delicious brownies and it just doesn't get any better than that. Now I can't eat a lot of this. One scoop is enough bc it is so indulgent. I have to be in the mood for it. This is my go to when I've had a bad day and I need comfort. Since I tried this I have become a loyal Ben and jerrys customer. The scoop shop closed a while back which is sad because it was a cool place. But bottom line is Ben and jerrys are the only brand that makes real chocolate ice cream the way it should be made;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Steph
title: Tried and true
text;;;: This has been my favorite flavor since childhood. It's true that you need to be careful to get a pint at a more reputable place because if the freezer situation is iffy then hard brownies you will get. But usually it's extra decadent with chewy brownie bits in almost every bite.;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Rebel of Mars 81,2019-07-16,5,Intense Chocolate!,0,0,"If you love semi-sweet and/or dark chocolate, you will love this ice cream. Only true chocolate lovers will be able to eat more than a couple spoonfuls. The brownie bits are rather large, they should be half to a quarter their current size, but they're really yummy and chewy.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,,2020-08-29,5,"This is My Favorite. Judge Me, I'm Boring.",0,0,"I wish the look, name, and flavor were more interesting, but cuss, it's good, and I love it more than others. I said it. There. Keep judging me. It's chocolate, it's brownie. It's Jennifer Anistin compared to Angelina Jolie but I love it and you shouldn't judge my love.";;;
Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: MH27
title: Best brownie ice cream
text;;;: Love this ice cream the brownies are so soft and delicious;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,David M,2018-01-25,3,Dry crumbly brownies... so sad :(,0,0,"Usually we love this — it’s actually our favorite ice cream of all time! But recently we’ve got some very bad batches with dried out, crusted brownies. instead of being rich and chewy, it just tastes old and freezer brunt. It’s real sad because we usually love it.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Ari1,2020-03-07,1,Nasty!!!,0,0,"Tastes like I am eating a cold, raw ball of chocolate Cake Flour Dough with glass of chocolate milk with a bitter aftertaste wasted my money no brownie chunks, creaminess, or richness just a cold mess. Need to definitely fix the recipe ASAP. UGH";;;
Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: hailley564
title: Dry brownies
text;;;: I usually buy half baked because the brownies are really good so I decided to go straight for the source. Unfortunately the fudge brownie flavor has brownie chunks that are dry making it more of a chocolate flavor than a fudge brownie flavor.;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,heatherrrrrrr,2019-04-03,2,bad brownies,0,0,"this has been my favourite flavour for a while but the recent pint I bought was different. The brownies that used to be soft are rock hard and unpleasant to chew, and don't taste good. Very disappointing, won't be buying more for a while.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,eatass445,2019-10-01,5,Greatest of all time,0,0,"This is the greatest ice cream of all time. I eat it every week. I don't even care if my arteries get clogged up. I am willing to die for this ice cream. Buy it and eat it, it will change your life. If i could give 1000 stars I would.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,LikeemFudgelike,2020-02-05,1,Crumbly Brownies,0,0,"Three pints in last 6 months had crumbly brownies instead of the decadent fudge brownie I have come to love. Sent email to B&Js to let them know. Looking at other reviews, this seems like an ongoing issue. I await a response.";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,leahzc07,2018-09-28,5,Best flavor of any ice cream ever!,0,0,"I have never had a chocolate ice cream so rich and delicious, and the brownie chunks are the perfect texture. It's not too sweet with a hint of salt that just makes the perfect combination. This would be my last meal on Earth.";;;

title: Keep getting rotten brownies

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Peterha,2020-08-24,5,OG CFB,0,0,"Chocolate fudge brownie is super legit. Actually, all the true original flavors are delicious. There is stuff in here called a classic flavor that certainly is post sale to Unilever, therefore definitely not classic.";;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Mariocheese42,2017-07-30,5,Gluten free PLEAASE!!,0,0,"Before my family went gluten free this was my favorite flavor but I can't have it anymore, if it was possible that you could find a way to make some of your flavors gluten free that would be AMAZING! Thank You!!";;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Kinley,2017-12-14,5,still amazing,0,2,"I don't know why people are complaining as this ice cream has been and forever will be amazing. This is by far my favorite flavor, I don't know what changed about the brownie but I like it either way.";;;

author: Wittyfamily
title: Not the same!

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,verystrange61,2019-12-27,5,Double Chocolate Heaven on Earth!,0,0,"If chocolate is what you're craving, then this is your ice cream! Absolutely delicious in it's simplicity. While this might be a little ""heavy"" for a daily treat, it's a perfect weekend splurge!";;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,maskee11,2017-05-28,2,Good but the brownies,0,1,"The chocolate ice cream and fudge was good but I went to the dentist and they said nothing chewy that could get stuck to your teeth, I was hoping for som good brownies but they were too chewy";;;

Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Robie32,2018-07-10,5,Love it!,0,0,"I can't recall the first time I tried this flavor, but I haven't been able put it down. Growing up I was never a fan of chocolate ice cream, but the Chocolate Fudge Brownie has won me over!!!";;;

author: katie2586
title: Love it
text;;;: the brownie was so fudgey and amazing. I love it! Couldnt be happier with it;;;

author: molly76

text;;;: I've had this a few times and absolutely love it. Would highly recommend.;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie

text;;;: I buy this for a treat and it satisfies every fudgy-needing itch I have!;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie

title: Love it
text;;;: It's my go to icecream cant find a better brand. I'm never disappointed.;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Cinndie
title: My favorite!!
text;;;: I've been this for years and nothing compares to my brownies! Yummmy!!;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: CFBlover
title: Great features
text;;;: I bought this and shared it with a friend and it’s our favorite flavor;;;

title: Fav
text;;;: My go to every time. This and chocolate fudge brownie pint slices.;;;

text;;;: i get this flavor every time. great flavor for chocolate lovers!!;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: chambo_mommy

text;;;: I've tried many other brands and this one by far is my favorite!!;;;

text;;;: Obsessed with this flavor. It's the best of any brand out there.;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,Jlgx2,2018-04-07,5,Favorite,0,0,"My all time favorite flavor, wish my local stores still sold it";;;

text;;;: This is one of the oldest and the best! I love ICE CREAM!!!!!!!;;;

text;;;: This is my favorite ben and Jerry's ice cream flavor by far!;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie,The Bad Keeper,2018-10-05,5,Nam,0,0,"I bought this for a week ago, its so good. I love it.";;;

text;;;: This has to be one of my top two flavors of all time.;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie

title: One of my favorites!
text;;;: Rich and chocolatey! Mmmmmm! Love the brownie chunks.;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie

text;;;: Fantastic flavor would highly recommend to everyone;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
title: Love Ben & Jerry's ice-cream
text;;;: I love this flavor!! Thank You So Much ❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤❤;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Jennnn
title: So good!!
text;;;: Delicious!! Can't wait until I get more !!!!!!!!!!;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Choclate Fudge Lover
title: This Flavor Is Great
text;;;: I buy this flavor almost every week. It is so good;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: OB04
title: GREAT!!!!:)
text;;;: GREAT ICE CREAM OVERALL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!;;;

name: Chocolate Fudge Brownie
author: Ptteckert
title: Toooo good!!
text;;;: The pint slices are amazing! Better than the pint!;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It,Scoopy sue,2019-07-02,5,Just perfect,1,0,"Delicious refreshing base, outstanding marshmallow swirl and yummy truffles - I love this flvaour!";;;

Chocolate Shake It,BabyDontGo,2018-07-02,5,Spot on...again!,4,0,"Love this! I am a lover of Ben & Jerry's, have been for as long as I can remember and while some flavors are not typically my thing, this one is awesome! With the ice cream you get a smooth, creamy and full bodied chocolate malt ice cream, combined with a beautifully whipped marshmallow fluff type swirl. The ice cream mixed with this smooth heavenly marshmallow swirl would be enough for me but the addition of the cookie crumbled covered fudge bits, its joygasmic! Everything about this is a win, I really hope that this flavor stays around for a long time. If you want a smooth, creamy, satisfying chocolate ice cream....well, this one is for you!";;;
Chocolate Shake It
author: eastwest
title: This is my dream flavor
text;;;: Where to begin. The explosive marshmallows? The creamy chocolate? The chewy truffles?;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It,Cree,2018-06-10,2,Disappointed,8,7,"Something has gone terribly wrong at Ben & Jerry's. After my 2nd disappointing pint from them I was really hoping for a win. This flavor was incredibly bland. You can't call something chocolate malt just because it is light brown. I could not detect any malt flavor whatsoever and could barely taste chocolate. Even then I think it may have just been the truffles. The truffles were ok and there were plenty, but even the marshmallow swirl was also bland. Sweet tasting and I liked the soft texture but none of the flavors that were supposed to be in this were! Unfortunately I forgot to use my coupon and paid for this junk.";;;
Chocolate Shake It
author: KirstenBuckeye
title: Hoped for more marshmallow and truffles!
text;;;: I am eating a pint of it right now and the ice cream is delicious. I wish the truffles weren’t as sparse though and wish there were more marshmallow swirl. I’m about halfway through the pint and can still hardly see any marshmallow.;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: NaeWavyGravy
title: Disappointed
text;;;: I bought this a couple of days ago and to be honest that's a long time to have Ben & Jerry's in the house. This one really isn't for me. I don't like it at all. It doesn't really taste like a chocolate milkshake to me more of a chocolate malted base with a lite marshmallow swirl. The truffle could be a little smaller which would make it have more also I'd they were a darker chocolate or a richer chocolate maybe it would be better I'm not sure but this one doesn't work for me.;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It,Kaya,2018-07-28,2,Bland and Odd Texture,9,8,"This one missed the mark for me. I understand the texture is meant to be more like a milkshake but I expected something different and it felt grainy. The flavor was bland for me, almost no milk chocolate flavor, closer to sweet cream. Even the marshmallow swirl was nothing like the S'mores swirl, it had a very artificial texture. The truffles were pretty good, but not as much cookie crunch as I expected and there weren't many of them. Overall, I'm disappointed. I love Ben and Jerry's but this one did not live up to the label.";;;

Chocolate Shake It,bgdl26,2018-03-26,5,Loved it but needs more truffles,3,0,"I've been obsessed with Tonight Dough for years and have yet to find a new flavor that I like as much until this one! I loved it! Tastes like a chocolate milk shake, love the marsh-mellow swirl and the cookie covered truffles were amazing, I just wish there were more in my pint. It seemed like I only had 4 or 5 but clearly there should be a lot more based on the photo. Anyway, it's still amazing.";;;

Chocolate Shake It,NotAChocoholic,2019-02-16,2,Average and Boring,0,0,"This may just be my anger speaking becuase I asked for one thing for Valentine's Day: Caramel Chocolate Cheesecake truffle. And what do I get? The most average chocolate icecream you can possibly from the Ben and Jerry's section of the freezer aisle. If you're gonna spend your money on something expensive, spend it on something good and flavorful.";;;

Chocolate Shake It,Chicksluvrock,2018-03-16,3,"Good, but not great",2,0,"I was very excited to try this flavor, and although it was good, it isn’t as good as I thought it would be. The texture of the ice cream is wonderfully creamy, but I would have liked a more intense malty-chocolatey flavor....it’s pretty mild. The marshmallow swirls and truffles are tasty though....except mine could of used more truffles! Overall good but I think I’ll stick with my favorite flavor - peanut butter world!";;;

Chocolate Shake It,Chocolover779,2018-03-23,2,Unimpressed,3,0,"Overall I wasn’t impressed with this flavor, while it is very sweet, there isn’t much chocolate flavor. I don’t care for the fudge morsels either, they’re quite dry. The marshmallow is the best part! I will go back to Chocolate Therapy for my next pint.";;;

Chocolate Shake It,Jasper02,2018-03-13,1,Will not purchase again,3,0,"Very bland ice cream and truffles. The only good thing was the marshmallow swirl, of which there was not enough. Only had about 1 tablespoon of marshmallow and 5 truffles in the whole pint.";;;
Chocolate Shake It
author: Ice cream man
title: Yummy
text;;;: Creamy smooth Malt ice cream! Need I say more? I think it’s a great idea no ice cream company ( at least in my area) sells malt ice cream so I’m happy Ben and Jerry’s came out with this!;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: Carrie999
title: My new favorite!
text;;;: I love everything about this new flavor! I ordered it online and it arrived today. I told myself that I would just try a bit and now I can’t stop eating it!;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It,samanthapaige,2018-06-08,1,Underwhelmed,3,0,"I was excited to try this but it fell short. Weird texture, off taste, the truffles were not good. Disappointed! Will stick with my Half Baked from now on.";;;

Chocolate Shake It,zoey,2018-08-21,1,not worth the calories,2,0,"the chocolate ice cream was okay.... nothing to rave about, but the marshmallow swirls didn’t taste like anything. the truffles were very sparse, there were only like 5 of them in the entire pint and i wasn’t a fan of the taste or texture. this flavor pint just didn’t work for me. i usually love ben & jerrys but kinda just wanted to throw this one out while eating it.";;;
Chocolate Shake It
author: Hayls
title: Kind of bland
text;;;: The truffles were extremely bland. The ice cream & marshmallow swirl were good but it was just lacking in overall flavor & chunks;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It,SarahSS,2018-02-18,5,Tastes like a milkshake!,2,0,"I had to try one of the new flavors, they looked so tempting! The ice cream flavor in this is so delicious and tastes like you're drinking a malt milkshake. There's a lot of marshmallow (my favorite part) and a good amount of truffles, not TOO many but certainly not sparse. I will definitely purchase again, but only after I try the other two new ones!!";;;
Chocolate Shake It
author: AllD
title: This is everything I've ever wanted in icecream
text;;;: I found this flavor yesterday after not buying ice-cream in a while. IT IS AMAZING. It tastes like you're eating a perfectly made milkshake. There's a little bit of some dryer flavor in the chocolate-cookie covered fudge but it levels out the entire flavor (one of the gripes I have with half baked is that it is too rich / gooey) and the marshmallow swirls tie it all together. Please never get rid of this and if you do let me know so I can stock up forever.;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It,Turtledark,2019-01-16,1,A whole lot of meh,1,0,"Bought this a few days ago after finally finding it again. Maybe I built the flavors up in my head but for a Ben and Jerry's flavor, this seriously lacked. I LOVE malt, marshmallow, and truffles but it was just so bland. I tasted no malt but the ice cream was really creamy. The light chocolate taste was nice. The marshmallow was pretty consistent with every other flavor that includes it. I'm a major fish food fan. The truffles were what I had been looking forward to the most. I really liked the ones in the chillin the roast flavor. The truffles in this though had NO flavor! The only chocolate hint I tasted was from the thin coating;" definitely not a """"cookie crunch"""". Needless to say
author: I was disappointed. It wasn't bad. I mean
date: I love ice cream! I just really wish there was a real taste. If I wanted to vanilla

name: Chocolate Shake It,Dumb,2020-05-26,2,They changed the fudge pieces,0,0,"This used to be my all time favorite ice cream. Bought tons every time it was on sale, gobbled it down and then bought more at full price. Love love loved it. Until they changed the cookie covered fudge pieces. Apparently the new fudge pieces are salted and it destroys what this ice cream used to be about. That cookie crust was so well done and the fudge melted in your mouth. For whatever reason Ben and Jerry’s has decided to stop making a superior product. Instead they cop out and use salt to pique people’s taste buds. We don’t need more salt in our lives or diets! Bring back the original fudge pieces and make this ice cream great again! I can barely eat it since I discovered the unnecessary and “wool over our eyes” awful salted fudge mix up.";;;

Chocolate Shake It,Tomas,2019-03-26,1,No No No!,1,0,"Picked up about 10 various flavors the other day and ""Chocolate Shake It"" was by far the worst. It was awful! Kept thinking it would get better as I ate, but gave up and tossed the last half away. I'll stick with my ""Tonight Dough"".";;;

Chocolate Shake It,Laurenisawesome,2018-07-10,2,Get the Phish Food instead,1,0,"The malt ice cream flavor is good, the cookie truffles are what brings the whole ice cream down. The truffles are bitter and too big. The size keeps it frozen and hard. The marshmallow swirl is amazing though. Then again why not just have the Phish Food which I think is similar but has the caramel to make it even better.";;;

Chocolate Shake It,Breezyj,2018-07-20,5,Excellence!,0,0,"I often feel a twinge of guilt purchasing Ben & Jerry’s over our many local brands, but yet again, the thoughtful, indulgent flavor combos are a league of their own.";;;

Chocolate Shake It,KaitlynC,2018-07-06,3,50/50,1,0,"I was extremely excited when I bought this icecream, and don’t regret it, the only thing I did not like about it was the chocolate truffles. They were extremely hard, and I felt like they were unnecessary in the icream. Other than that, the icecream was great, the taste was amazing, the marshmallow was great. 50/50";;;

Chocolate Shake It,,2019-05-02,5,Absolutely love it!,0,0,"I personally don’t like an overly strong chocolate flavor in my ice cream. I like black and white milkshakes, frozen custard, and chocolate malt because they all have a dialed down chocolate flavor. This ice cream is perfect for me, and the marshmallow is a perfect compliment. Sometimes it’s nice to have cleaner, more subtle flavors as opposed to overwhelming concoctions of bourbon pretzel cheesecake ice cream with peanut butter salted caramel brownie chunks or something equally extra. Really well done!";;;

Chocolate Shake It,FuzzyGut,2018-08-09,5,Yes please!,2,1,"What an awesome new flavor! First off, it really does taste like a chocolate milkshake. It’s light and creamy with the marshmallow swirl and the truffles are yummy too. Good job on this new flavor, B&J! Yum!";;;

Chocolate Shake It,Just Me,2018-06-25,1,Truffles were bitter,1,0,"My least favorite B&J flavor ever! The truffles were almost ""whiskey"" tasting, strong and bitter. I couldn't even force myself to try and eat it. First time I have ever thrown ice cream away.";;;

Chocolate Shake It,Andrew1989,2018-06-29,2,Bland,1,0,"This flavor is not very good, overall. Its just basic chocolate ice cream with a few dots of marshmellow fluff with these really mealy truffles that taste like nothing- very disappointing.";;;
Chocolate Shake It
author: brianaa
title: good but dont like the truffles
text;;;: i loved the chocolate and marshmallow. thought i found the perfect flavor but the truffles tasted off and were too heavy compared to the consistency of the rest of product.;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: Teecee
title: Malt Shake Dreams Come True
text;;;: I love malts so this is so delicious! The truffles are good too along w/ the marshallow bits. It's my favorite B&J's flavor & I hope it never stops getting made :D;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: Girly girl
title: Ice cream perfection
text;;;: I’m hoping this flavor doesn’t disappear because it’s the best I’ve ever tried. Love all the yummy marshmallow creme and decadent truffles!;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: Icecreamfan4life
title: Cool idea but wasn't quite a hit for me
text;;;: Bought this pint and the cheesecake flavor a few days ago(haven't tried the other just yet). Thinking this would be something fun and different to try(even though I'm not a big chocolate ice cream fan aside from Wendy's Frosties). And have to say as I sit here eating it now. The Malt base does remind me of a Wendy's Frosty(which I enjoyed). But I honestly don't think that it pairs all that well with the marshmallow swirl or the cookie truffles(which I've gotten plenty of those and not fully sure if I like them or not. Great texture and pretty soft to munch on. But taste wise may not be my thing).;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: lme2813
title: Used to be delicious
text;;;: We have loved this ice cream for a while and have bought many many pints. Ove the last couple of months I have bought it at different stores and we found some of these are horrible. The truffle pieces look nothing like the picture on this site or what they're supposed to look like. Unfortunately I threw them all away so I don't have one but they're little hard pieces of stale tasting chocolate bits. It ruins the ice cream and I was blaming the store thinking maybe they weren't kept frozen but I found the same thing when I purchased elsewhere. Not sure if it was a problem at the factory or if a change was made to the ice cream but wither way it ruins it and I can't keep wasting money on bad ice cream. I don't mind paying more for good quality but I'm not getting it anymore with this flavor and it's so disappointing.;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: Missa
title: Rich but subtle
text;;;: I have had this flavor twice now and it has hit the spot each time. It's subtle but it has deep flavor. It's very much like biting into a chocolate milkshake. I could do without the marshmallow fluff but it does have a nice texture and it breaks up the heaviness of the ice cream. A lot of people are reviewing that this flavor is bland but I like it. I hope it continues to be an option for years to come because I will be buying a shameful quantity of pints.;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It,violet616,2018-02-13,2,Great idea!,1,2,"I love a chocolate malt and loved the idea. While I found the ice cream itself to be delightfully creamy, the truffles certainly satisfying and marshmallow cream a pleasant addition I found the overall product to leave a strange aftertaste, so much so that I tossed out the pint after one paltry serving. Disappointing, but I intend to keep trying your new and novel flavors :)";;;

Chocolate Shake It,Isitdahfridge,2019-01-03,3,Is it the stores’ fault?,0,0,"I bought two pints of this flavor, each from a different store, and I was quite surprised. One was from a gas station, the other from a grocery store. The one from the gas station was grainy, but my guess it was just beginning to form ice crystals (maybe the door to their freezer room was slightly open). The one from the grocery store was perfectly smooth (other than the chunks).";;;

Chocolate Shake It,Jenniferu1,2020-06-23,4,Love this!,0,0,"I bought this today and couldnt wait to try it. I can definitely taste the malt in the ice cream. With the marshmallow it reminded me of a mallo cup candy, without the coconut, from years ago but way better as I'm not a fan of coconut. I just had a few bites tonight but plan on putting some hot fudge on it to make a sunday tomorrow and I'm sure it will taste like heaven! I eat in moderation!";;;

Chocolate Shake It,ChrisColby,2018-04-15,3,Good flavor but lacking.,0,1,"A strong malt chocolate base and the marshmallow swirl make for a good set up, but this flavor was really lacking in mix ins. The truffles in my pints were spaced too far apart and with too few in general. This flavor needed more of a bite or crunch (perhaps a second mix in, like cookie crumbs) to reach its full potential. A good flavor (thanks to the base and swirl) but certainly lacking";;;

Chocolate Shake It,duffy,2018-08-30,5,My new favorite,0,0,"In the past month I have bought a pint of this flavor every week. The texture is different to other flavors, more like a milkshake, which to me gives it some novelty and frankly I really like it. The chocolate cookie pieces alone are a little dry but pack great flavor and with the marshmallow swirls which are more liquid and the new texture it works together to make a truly great pint.";;;

Chocolate Shake It,SusanHop,2018-08-03,5,Fabulously delicious!,0,0,"I'm not a fan of marshmallow, but the chocolate malted milkshake ice cream, plus the truffle sold me on trying it. The awesomeness of the marshmallow was a wonderful surprise! The ice cream its self is perfect, though a bit more malt wouldn't go amiss in my opinion :-). The truffles are divine and blend the three ingredients into a satisfying and delicious ice cream experience.";;;

Chocolate Shake It,Joelle,2019-10-14,3,meh,0,0,"The ice cream itself is so good--malty chocolate, perfect. The marshmellow swirl is good and in good ratio but those fudge clusters! They're kind of bitter and just not what I was hoping for. The whole experience ends up being pretty one-note without a fun texture element. This one is so close to great, but unfortunately just not.";;;

Chocolate Shake It,Kaylazies,2018-07-12,5,Best flavor on EARTH,0,0,"Literally my new absolute FAVORITE icecream ever. It’s PERFECT. It’s all my favorite flavors together all in one and that chocolate cookie swirl is to die for and omg that graham cracker is just heaven, not too chocolately and that marshmallow icecream just ties it aallllll together. Amazing. Exquisite. Must have with every meal.";;;

Chocolate Shake It,Goldberry7,2018-10-07,2,"Palatable, but awfully bland",0,0,"I agree with other folks remarking on the blandness. There weren't many truffles, but that was actually a good thing since they were tasteless and ruined the bite on my spoon. Since my nightly bowl of B and J's is my only form of pleasure being 8 months pregnant, I felt the need to write a review. Going back to Chocolate Therapy.";;;

Chocolate Shake It,Brinkley28,2019-09-18,1,Save your money!,0,0,"I bought this ice cream from Safeway in Pasadena, MD. I was excited to try it since it was a chocolate ice cream base but man was I wrong. This ice ream had such an odd texture and tasted like ice milk. Like they just added chocolate syrup and like it get freezer brunt, I do not recommend this flavor to anyone!";;;

Chocolate Shake It,Sarahmuffin37,2019-08-22,5,So much marshmallow,0,0,"At first I wasn't excited to try this flavor but as I love anything marshmallow, I tried it. The marshmallow swirl is out of this world! Usually it says marshmallow but you can barely taste it, this product has a good amount of marshmallow that tastes like marshmallow! I would HIGHLY recommend this product!";;;

Chocolate Shake It,y2flu,2018-05-02,5,Surprisingly awesome,0,0,"I'm not a big fan of chocolate ice creams, but I was looking for a new flavor to try and this was the only one they had, so I bought a pint. Wow, is it good! I love the truffles and the marshmallow is awesome. I've bought 3 or 4 more pints since buying the first one, and I'm about to go buy another one.";;;
Chocolate Shake It
author: Mewples
title: My new favorite flavor!
text;;;: Whenever I'm craving ice cream this is the first thing I search for now. Others must have the same idea because half of the time its completely sold out at my grocery store! I love that the ice cream itself isnt too sweet which makes the marshmallow a perfect compliment. Please keep this flavor around ~;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: Beeb
title: New changes not welcome
text;;;: I have been eating this flavor and only this flavor since it's release. It was everything I ever wanted in ice cream. This ice cream really needed the crunch from the truffle. And the salt with marshmallow? Ew. It needs the dark chocolate to go with that sugary sweet. So disappointed in the changes.;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It,Azsedo,2018-04-22,2,Dirt,1,2,"I’m eating it right now and it tastes pretty much like a chocolate, dirt, and grass blend.";;;

Chocolate Shake It,molly_yum,2018-05-15,5,My New Favorite!!,0,0,"I bought this flavor on a whim, since my grocery store only had this flavor and another I don't like when I went. OMG, it is my new favorite. So unique and delicious. I just wish there were more yummy truffles!!! I will be buying this regularly now. YUM!!!!!";;;
Chocolate Shake It
author: sam347
title: great flavor
text;;;: im so confused i dont think i have a single truffle in mine? i came on here to see if that happened to anyone else and people are saying they are sparse. i've eaten about 1/4th and have not run into a single truffle. good ice cream but that is disappointing;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It,Etotheparpar,2019-06-24,5,BEST ICE CREAM I'VE EVER HAD,0,0,"I slightly consider myself to be an ice cream enthusiast, and Ben & Jerry's almost always puts out great products. BUT CHOCOLATE SHAKE IT IS ON ANOTHER LEVEL! It is so amazing, especially the truffles. Waiting for it to be restocked at my local Safeway!!!";;;
Chocolate Shake It
author: LaceLu88
title: Marshmallow Cream yes please!
text;;;: I was pleasantly surprised to find this flavor tonight in my grocery store and had to try. I was not disappointed! All flavors with your marshmallow cream are good but this one is AMAZING! And this is from an Phish Food addict! I will be back for more!;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: TaylorK
title: Very disappointing
text;;;: This was totally lacking in flavor. Was expecting more of a malt flavor and all i got was a watered down chocolate. It was just really disappointing for me and did not live up to what the package promised. I didn't even bother finishing the container.;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It,LARob,2019-04-07,5,Awesome!!!,0,0,"This ice cream is delicious! Tons of marshmellow fluff and chocolate fudge bits and creamy smooth chocolate malt ice cream, what is not to like, my god it is heaven! Anyone disappointed with this...all I can say is you must be a hard person to please!";;;
Chocolate Shake It
author: TxGalNFL
title: Malty goodness
text;;;: I love chocolate malts. Summers drinking a chocolate malt with my grandmother under the shade of the pecan tree come to mind. Add in a swirl of marshmallow and some chunks of truffles (not cookies therefore not crunchy) make this a top fav for me.;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: Willow
title: Best ice cream ever
text;;;: Bought it because I'm always looking for a chocolate ice cream with marshmallow and no nuts. This is what I have been searching years for! Went back and bought all they had and now I can't find it anymore so came to his site to try and find it.;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It,BSmith,2018-06-21,5,Amazing flavor,0,0,"Other than the all too limited edition Chocolate Cherry Garcia, (an even better version of my all time favorite B&J’s flavor), Chocolate Shake It is the best new flavor released in a very long time. Everything about it is absolutely delicious.";;;

Chocolate Shake It,Alex19,2019-02-22,3,"Great ice cream flavor, not so great truffles",0,0,"The malt chocolate shake ice cream flavor is amazing, especially with the marshmallow. However, the truffles taste like artificial and fake chocolate. I was really disappointed by the truffle flavor, but the overall ice cream was good.";;;
Chocolate Shake It
author: Lindsay222
title: What a great idea!!!
text;;;: This is my most favorite ice cream flavor ever. I would eat it almost every day if the Target stores in my area would stock more of it. It’s so delicious. The malty chocolate with the marshmallow and fudge pieces is the best creation;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: Lil__Eats
title: One of my favorites... ever.
text;;;: This is for the ones who love a mild chocolate flavor. It reminds me of drinking Chocolate Egg Cream. I absolutely love this flavor and could eat it without all the marshmallow and chunks (but they just make it all the more better).;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: misskitty
title: Love at first spoonful!
text;;;: This flavor was automatically bumped into my top three fave Ben & Jerry flavors. The ice cream really tastes like a chocolate malt milk shake! The marshmallow and truffles only amp up the experience. You must try this flavor!;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It,Shakes,2018-05-02,5,Very impressed,0,1,"My favorite is boom chocolata. Although it's tough to pick a favorite. ""Chocolate shake it"" is right up there. Amazing flavors, texture, and just the right amount of marshmallow and truffles. Very impressed with this one.";;;

Chocolate Shake It,madi,2018-11-18,5,RUINED ICE CREAM FOR ME,0,0,"The Walmarts in my area stopped carrying this flavor for some reason and now I have to find a replacement, since this one has become my go-to flavor. BUT I cannot eat any other ice cream anymore none live up to this stuff.";;;
Chocolate Shake It
author: jessicasayles
title: My all time favorite!
text;;;: For me this is just a perfectly balanced ice cream. It's not too sweet and a great mix of flavors. I love it so much I came to write this review. I'm pregnant with my second child now and I crave this flavor all the same!;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It,NurseDominique,2019-01-28,5,OMG Tastbud Heaven!!!,0,0,"This is ther best flavor & icecream I have EVER had! EVER! I loved everything about this mixture. I need this in a gallon. Marshmallows, chocolate truffles & more yummy stuff. It has a slight chocolate malt taste too.";;;

Chocolate Shake It,vonster,2018-07-28,5,New fav!,0,0,"Please make this more available! Found it once in our little corner store, but now that’s out and I haven’t seen it in Ralph’s nor Vons. Usually I don’t like chocolate ice cream, but this malt version is perfect!";;;
Chocolate Shake It
author: Turtle702
title: Very nice!!
text;;;: I am not even a huge chocolate fan but I saw the malted milkshake part and I wasn’t sold.. very nice flavor.. the truffles are soft and tasty and you can taste the milkshake! I would definitely purchase again!;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It,ahh72145,2019-12-12,2,Truffles need work,0,0,"I bought 2 since it sounds delicious, and it is...except the truffles which are unfortunately terrible. But the malt chocolate ice cream and marshmallow is awesome so you can just eat around the icky bits :)";;;
Chocolate Shake It
author: Sweets B
title: My Fav Ice Cream EVER BY FAR!!
text;;;: I would buy out the stock at any store I could find it in because I loved this flavor so much! It even replaced my Half Baked addiction. Now I can barely find it and I am so sad. Please bring it back!!;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It,MBrez,2020-09-10,4,"Good, but the Truffles version was GREAT",0,0,"This is good, especially the malt milk chocolate and marshmallow swirls. But it was soooo much better with the chocolate truffles instead of sea salt caramel. Please go back to the non-caramel version!";;;
Chocolate Shake It
author: Rachelcan719
title: Classic Malt Flavor
text;;;: This ice cream changed my life and I can NEVER find it anymore. It tastes just like a classic malt when Dairy Queen and Sonic just don’t get it right. The marshmallow swirl makes it phenomenal as well.;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It,Meeegsies,2020-06-29,5,Soooo delicious!,0,0,"Admittedly, I'm not usually a fan of chocolate ice cream, but this was milky enough, and I loved it. My kids loved it too, and ever since we had our first pint, we've been trying to get another one.";;;

Chocolate Shake It,Maddy V,2019-02-13,5,Amazing!,0,0,"Bought this on sale because it looked yummy, and it's absolutely amazing! I don't buy a lot of ice cream, but I would definitively get this in the future and keep an eye out if I go to a B&J store.";;;

Chocolate Shake It,Weeezoe2000,2019-03-11,1,"Bland, not good at all. Sadness.",0,0,"I decided to try something new. Bad idea. This is very bland and the truffles taste odd. I didn’t taste any malt flavor, and the chocolate was weak. Im glad it was on sale so I only wasted 3.50.";;;
Chocolate Shake It
author: MadMaxi
title: Best one since Cannoli
text;;;: Please keep this flavor. I was so upset when you guys only did a limited batch of Cannoli. Such a tease. While Chocotherapy was my favorite since Cannoli...now this one tops all of them by far;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: Kimber
title: SO GOOD
text;;;: I just bought this for the first time ever and it’s so good!!!!! It takes like a genuine chocolate milkshake. The marshmallow is amazing and the truffles are divine. My new go to.;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: Foxarazzi
title: Love it
text;;;: Ignore the haters. If you love malt chocolate you’ll love this. Mine was smooth and creamy with tons of chunks of truffles and loads of marshmallow. Malt chocolate magic!;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It,MontyC93,2020-02-16,3,Its Ok.,0,0,"3.1 balls. Its just ok. Lots of better flavors out there. Its somehting to try, and if its the only flavor id eat it happily. But nothing special.";;;
Chocolate Shake It
author: Brenda the Unicorn
title: Addicting!
text;;;: My dad bought me this and I loved it. It's my favorite ice cream in the whole entire world! Thank you for this AMAZING ice cream flavor!;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It,Tips,2020-02-21,2,Nice try but miss,0,0,"Love a great chocolate shake but this was too sweet, not sure what it was...not enough chocolate flavor. Might have tried adding malt.";;;
Chocolate Shake It
author: Smoran
title: New Favorite
text;;;: I looked for this flavor all over....finally found it. The marshmallow swirl is so creamy and satisfying. The truffles are amazing.;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: Aajj
title: One of the best!!
text;;;: This variety holds its own against some of my all-time favorites such as Phish Food & Americone Dream. I buy it anytime I see it!;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It,Ginah,2018-07-26,5,My Favorite,0,0,"This is the best ice cream! I love the truffles and marshmallow swirl, and how the ice cream tastes like a milkshake. Delicious!";;;
Chocolate Shake It
author: brandologist
title: Chocolate Shake it
text;;;: The most amazing flavor ever. I feel like I am eating a thick milk shake. I wish It was available more. I can never find it.;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: Coyoterose
title: So delicious!
text;;;: I tried this flavor and loved it! Just enough chocolatey goodness paired with creamy heaven! Definitely will try again.;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: ShySharon
title: I feel sorry for my waistline
text;;;: This is the best ice cream since Friendly’s Toasted Almond Fudge or Ben & Jerry’s White Russian or Pistachio Pistachio;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: birdie
title: Just found my favorite flavor
text;;;: This is the one pint I need to make sure I don't demolish in one sitting. All restraint melts away with my happiness.;;;
