name: Chocolate Shake It,Chris MThanks,2018-06-10,3,Good-ish,0,1,"Good concept, but skip the malt. Leave it chocolate ice cream like phish food and keep other ingredients. Yum overall";;;
Chocolate Shake It
author: Tosh
title: Finally malted ice cream
text;;;: I love everything malted.. I was hoping for more of a malted flavor but still love this ice cream and will buy again;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It,Guzziben,2019-08-01,5,Best flavor ever,0,0,"Can’t find this in the Minneapolis area anymore. Not sure if life is worth the trouble, please stock the shelves!";;;
Chocolate Shake It
author: Brina257
title: Delicious!
text;;;: If you like “phish food” this is so much like it just with a creamier texture. This is my new favorite!!;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: Rocko
title: GRRRREAT!
text;;;: I was at the plant last weekend and thought I would give this a try! Really hit the spot. LOVED IT!!!;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It,Deezee1979,2018-05-23,5,Holy chocolate !,0,0,"I tried this when it came out.. I am officially hooked! Its creamy, chocolatey, truffly goodness.";;;
Chocolate Shake It
author: Rgz124
title: So good!
text;;;: This is our new family favorite! It’s really hard to find so I hope it becomes more popular.;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: haliiii
title: SOOOO GOOD
text;;;: Very good! One of my favorites definitely recommends it for anyone who hasn't tried it.;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: csorensen81
title: Marshmallow goodness
text;;;: great chocolate malted ice cream with a sweet swirl of marshmallow!! Great new flavor.;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It,Kingfish,2018-06-26,5,My newest favorite!,0,0,"I was hooked from the first bite. I love chocolate malts, and this one blew me away.";;;
Chocolate Shake It
author: CDoo
title: Love the truffles
text;;;: Super smooth chocolate ice cream. All around amazing flavor. I love the truffles;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: Maryjane22
title: The best!
text;;;: Bought for my neice ...and it was delicious! Only problem ` cant buy it locally;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: MilkandCookies4thewin
title: TOO MUCH FUDGE 4 ME
text;;;: It was good besides all the fudge. Other than that the ice cream was very good;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: AnnieH
title: yummmmmy
text;;;: I bought this flavor today and it is so delicious! My new favorite flavor.;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: SCarlock
title: Loooooove
text;;;: This may be my favorite ice cream ever!!!! I love the subtle malt flavor.;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: Noah
title: bland
text;;;: they need to bring back a hazelnut ice cream because this is not good.;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It
author: Clsi
title: Great combo of texture and flavor!
text;;;: Tried this for the first time a couple of weeks ago. I’m hooked!;;;

name: Chocolate Shake It,LizzyJax,2020-06-17,3,Bring back the truffles!,0,0,"It’s good, but I liked the truffles better than the fudge pieces!";;;
Chocolate Shake It
author: Metalhead18
title: Wonderful.
text;;;: Best flavor I've ever tried. I think it is perfection!;;;

name: Chocolate Therapy
author: Siungit
title: Chocolate heaven!
text;;;: Got this as one of my cones for my halfy birthday! Great for chocolate lovers! Very rich. Cookies add a nice crunch.;;;

name: Chocolate Therapy,Marky Mark,2019-09-01,5,The best chocolate ice cream ever,8,0,"This is the flavor that won my heart by Ben and Jerry's. If you are some one who loves chocolate and/or chocolate ice cream then you need to try this because this one does not disappoint. You will want to be multiple pints because one pint just won't be enough. I could easily eat pints and pints of this deliciousness in a single day and I am not exaggerating. It really is the best chocolate ice cream I have ever had. They could have aptly named this one Brownie Batter because it really tastes like frozen a brownie. This is for all of us chocoholics out there. Thank you, Ben and Jerry's and please never discontinue this flavor! You have shown the rest that you are the best when you created this flavor.";;;

Chocolate Therapy,FuzzyGut,2018-08-12,5,So insanely good it’s stupid,18,0,"Oh my god! If you love chocolate this is your ice cream and if you need a chocolate fix, this is your ice cream and if you’re not sure if you love chocolate this will be the ice cream to ensure you do! Up there with Chocolate Fudge Brownie and phish food, this is a new favorite of mine. So silly good I could eat 2 or 3 pints in one sitting. Please do not retire this one anytime soon and if you do, please give us lovers of the flavor some time to stock up.";;;

Chocolate Therapy,Nicki237,2017-08-20,3,Decadent,2,26,"I just recently bought this at My local publix and wanted to try something new and picked this up. Very dense chocolatey icecream. Tastes like real chocolate compared to other ice creams but my problem with this is it should've had actual chocolate pudding swirls instead of pudding icecream and the cookies instead taste more like chocolate chips instead of cookies. The icecream also is more of a dark chocolate flavor, slightly bitter. Would've tasted much better if it was chocolate fudge icecream or Milk chocolate icecream but still a good icecream I just wouldn't buy it again";;;

Chocolate Therapy,SFMT,2017-06-15,5,My favorite chocolate ice cream by far!,13,0,"I tasted this ice cream for the first time last month. Since then, I've been hooked! It has all of my favorites into one. I love chocolate chocolate chip cookies, chocolate pudding and chocolate ice cream. Please, never change this recipe or discontinue it, because it's the only therapy I need! :)";;;

Chocolate Therapy,LainiPaige,2017-06-21,5,Aptly Named,14,0,"This ice cream is exactly what it's title implies - therapy through chocolate, only way cheaper than therapy. The chocolate pudding is amazing and it is so delish you really only need a few bites to hit to spot. My favorite chocolate ice cream of all time!";;;
Chocolate Therapy
author: Nessyrae23
title: I love Ben and jerrys chocolate
text;;;: I really love Ben and jerrys chocolate ice cream. It's the only chocolate ice cream that tastes like chocolate. I was excited when this came out so I could mix it up a bit and give my tastebuds a chance to miss chocolate fudge brownie. I really like this one but I think the cookies weren't the right choice. I like the pudding ice cream so I think what would've been better would be like a ganache swirl or chocolate frosting. Chocolate cookies aren't very popular to begin with so it wasn't the selling point for me. I wanted to try the chocolate pudding ice cream. Still though it's a rich chocolate ice cream that I enjoy a lot;;;

name: Chocolate Therapy
author: WMKonz924
title: Can't live without it!!
text;;;: I tried this for the first time a few months ago and it is perfect when you need a chocolate fix to make you happy:) It is so creamy then you get the chocolate cookie swirl. I shouldn't admit it but I have at least once a week.;;;

name: Chocolate Therapy
author: Greggo
title: Amazing
text;;;: Seriously the best chocolate ice cream I've ever had.;;;

name: Chocolate Therapy,Phish Food Fan,2018-08-12,5,Brilliant!,3,0,"Wow wow wow! I have found, along with a handful of others, another favorite! Amazing! This IS THE quintessential chocolate ice cream for chocolate lovers. The pudding and cookie swirls: totally out of this world chocolate flavor. My phish food and chocolate fudge brownie have competition! If you love chocolate, buy this pint. It won’t disappoint! Sorry for all the exclamation points but I’m serious, you need to be eating this.";;;

Chocolate Therapy,nomadicsoul,2018-05-07,5,Dark chocolate lover's dream,3,0,"Finally, a chocolate ice cream that is decadent, dark, and not too sweet. The pudding ice cream is an excellent touch and I love that the ice cream is not too milky. The chocolate cookies are a nice touch, although unnecessary to my enjoyment of the experience of eating this wonderful ice cream! Thank you for making a flavor for those of us who believe the only ""real"" and ""tasty"" kind of chocolate is dark chocolate!!";;;

Chocolate Therapy,Sweet tooth,2017-10-14,5,Angela,3,0,"My hubby brought this home for me from Albertson's. I probably wouldn't have picked this flavor myself. I usually go for chocolate with lots of stuff in it, nuts, caramel, whatever! It looks simple but the flavor is bold. It tastes like real chocolate, rich and flavorful. Better than any other chocolate ice cream I've had! My teenage daughter agreed, it is delicious!";;;

Chocolate Therapy,jul_910,2017-10-24,5,Better and cheaper than actual therapy!,3,0,"I eat this every night. I calculate calories throughout my day to allow for my Chocolate Therapy.... every. single. night. They laugh at me when I check out at the grocery store - I buy all they have in stock. The intensely dark chocolate, coupled with the cookies and pudding are the perfect way to end the day...every. single. day.";;;

Chocolate Therapy,ChocolateComa,2019-03-01,5,The Best Chocolate Ice Cream I've Had...So Far!,1,1,"When I saw the name I instantly grabbed it because I was in need of some chocolate therapy. I couldn't have been more satisfied and have purchased 3 pints of the stuff over the past few weeks. This will indulge all of your deepest chocolate cravings and leave you a bit depressed when you know there's none left in the freezer. it has all the right notes of milk chocolate and dark chocolate and then there's texture of smooth and creamy, pieces of chocolate cookie and/or brownie, and the silky texture of frozen pudding. This is a winner and I hope they never discontinue it.";;;
Chocolate Therapy
author: Lorilt37
title: God Bless You for this flavor
text;;;: This is THE flavor I never knew I was missing. My new favorite. PLEASE don’t ever retire this!;;;

name: Chocolate Therapy,Torri1345,2017-07-05,5,The best Therapy out there,3,0,"I don't usually like chocolate, but on the few emotional times when I crave it I want real chocolate which I've never seen in an ice cream before. This ice cream is heaven! Chocolate so rich you would think it was gourmet. The only thing that could make this better is to make it even darker.";;;

Chocolate Therapy,CaptRon96,2017-08-06,5,A darker chocolate satisfaction,3,0,"It's my dessert after every dinner. It's in my grocery shopping cart every week, usually 2 pints. The chocolate is amazing. Love it.";;;
Chocolate Therapy,NightElf321,2017-09-06,5,Easily my favorite Ben and Jerry,3,0,"The Pudding swirls really help with the flavor, This is my favorite Ben And Jerry flavor.";;;

Chocolate Therapy,NovaBelle,2017-07-06,5,AMAZING,2,0,"It's the best store bought chocolate ice cream. I only let myself have it once a month (wink) & it's become a tradition lol Most times I will get ruffle potato chips, let the ice cream melt & dip the chips in it. Freaking yum.";;;

Chocolate Therapy,Pachocolover,2017-07-25,5,Omg,2,0,"This is the ultimate adventure in chocolate, can not buy any other flavor since trying this. Ben and jerry should win the Nobel peace price for ice cream for this flavor. Guess there is a heaven, I visit it during every bite.";;;

Chocolate Therapy,Mary Lu,2017-07-08,5,True chocolate therapy,2,0,"Excellent flavor. The only chocolate ice cream's that I Eat are Ben & Jerry's. The ice cream itself is similar to phish food, but the other ingredients are very different. And delicious!. I love the cookies !";;;

Chocolate Therapy,Beca,2017-07-26,5,A-M-A-Z-I-N-G,2,0,"Are you a chocoholic? If the answer is yes then what are you wating for to try this ice cream? And if you're not then I swear you will become one after trying that, it's addicting. Soooo good";;;
Chocolate Therapy
author: Fiona
title: To die for chocolate lovers!
text;;;: A friend bought this flavor for me on my birthday two years ago. I haven't stopped eating it since. Please keep making this flavor or I may have to go to therapy for separation anxiety.;;;

name: Chocolate Therapy,,2017-06-15,5,Heavenly dark chocolate goey goodness,2,0,"I tried this as a whim in the grocery store and found my chocolate heaven. The name fits. I hope the keep this flavor. I loved candy pie, but this is WAY better!!";;;
Chocolate Therapy
author: Joanzie
title: Chocoate therapy favorite
text;;;: My fav flavor so far but I have loved Ben and Jerrys since I went to college at Purdue University in West Lafayette IN !!!!!;;;

name: Chocolate Therapy,Josh from VT,2017-07-26,5,Great stuff,2,0,"If you love chocolate, you'll love this flavor. Very one-dimensional, but that's a good thing when it comes to chocolate.";;;
Chocolate Therapy
author: Gamndalf the white
title: chocolate lovers dream
text;;;: perfect balance of rich chocolate and little cookie pieces. The texture is amazing!;;;

name: Chocolate Therapy
author: Tina
title: It is the ultimate therapy
text;;;: I'm a chocoholic and this is the perfect ice cream. Rich and smooth.;;;

name: Chocolate Therapy
author: Jbone
title: Just plain yummy
text;;;: Omg best chocolate chocolate ice cream ever ever ever;;;

name: Chocolate Therapy
author: Lanyard
title: When god makes a #2
text;;;: Best flavor to ever fall into earth and into my mouth;;;

name: Chocolate Therapy,Kollette,2020-05-08,5,OMG GREAT! Pure chocolate heaven.,1,0,"It's harder to find but when i do find Chocolate therapy I buy a couple. Not all stores sell this flavor. By far, my absolute favourite!";;;
Chocolate Therapy
author: Doon
title: YUM
text;;;: Bought on vacation. Love this flavor! Super smooth.;;;

name: Chocolate Therapy,Anonymous,2018-05-29,1,Only for dark chocolate lovers,3,16,"If you like dark chocolate, you'll like this flavor, but if you're like me and really taste the bitterness in dark chocolate, you won't be crazy for this one. Wish the website would indicate which chocolate flavor are dark chocolate and which are lighter/milk chocolate (if any are).";;;
Chocolate Therapy,Zab38,2017-07-16,5,OMG!,1,1,"Best chocolate ice cream I ever had! The taste, the texture, just perfect!";;;

Chocolate Therapy,Joycie,2019-07-02,3,"Rename it: Chocolate ice cream, nothing else.",0,1,"I was expecting chocolate paradise, big chewy chunks of chocolate cookie dough, obvious pudding swirls and thick creamy ice cream.";;;

Chocolate Therapy,WendyRuth,2018-05-04,5,THE BEST ICE CREAM!,0,0,"I am a chocoholic! I started my Ben & Jerry’s journey with Chocolate Fudge Brownie. It was okay but I didn’t like the chunks of brownie. The texture wasn’t right. Then, I found Chocolate Therapy and I fell in love! I relocated and now I can’t find it. My husband seems to think it may be discontinued. Please say it’s not so!";;;

Chocolate Therapy,gubbsies,2017-06-24,5,The most amazing ice cream ever,0,0,"I'm not even a huge chocolate fan but this ice cream flavor absolutely caters to my cravings when I am actually craving something with chocolate. It's the best chocolate ice cream, the pudding is amazing, and oh my goodness I love the chocolate cookies. Absolutely by far my favorite ice cream flavor to exist.";;;

Chocolate Therapy,Cara3177,2020-07-16,3,Cookies almost nonexistent,0,0,"The flavor is good, but the “chocolate cookies” is more like tiny bits of cookie pieces. I ate more than half the pint before I even found a tiny morsel of a cookie. If this flavor had actual chunks of cookies, or even better brownies, this would be my new fav. The pudding swirl is delicious.";;;

Chocolate Therapy,Eric17,2017-11-07,1,Chocolate Therapy,0,15,"I am a huge Ben and Jerry's fan, and I love all of their ice cream. I have not had Chocolate Therapy in a while, and I will tell you, it was a bad experiance. The ice cream did not taste the same and I was really upset. I have not tried Chocolate Therapy since.";;;
Chocolate Therapy
author: Cheyenne
title: Tasty!
text;;;: This is my all time favorite Ben & Jerry's ice cream!;;;

name: Chocolate Therapy,Kelly S,2020-08-12,5,The most ridiculous chocolate ice cream ever...,0,0,"...and by ridiculous, I don’t mean “deserving or inviting derision or mockery”. I mean the most ridiculously good ice cream deserved of world wide acclaim and the high honors for greatness... some sort of prize should be in order as well.";;;

Chocolate Therapy,JDog,2018-08-10,5,One chocolate to rule them all,0,0,"If I had to choose only one chocolate ice cream to get my chocolate ice cream fix, it is definitely going to be this! The chocolate variety tends toward a dark flavor, which I love. This is hard core chocolate therapy indulgence.";;;
Chocolate Therapy
author: Diane
title: My favorite of all of the Ben and Jerry's.
text;;;: This ice cream does not dissappoint. The texture and flavors are perfect in every way. I rarely get cravings for chocolate but when I do this is exactly what I go for. I just wish I could find it in stores more frequently.;;;

name: Chocolate Therapy
author: Truth2018
title: Chocolaty Goodness
text;;;: Today was the first day I tried chocolate therapy and it is delicious but i would've added brownie chunks instead of chocolate cookies that taste like chocolate chip pieces but other then that its yummy delicious!!!!;;;

name: Chocolate Therapy,Kelly1217,2020-08-03,5,Absolute favorite!,0,0,"I can eat the whole pint of this flavor in one sitting. Every time it’s in stock at the store, I make my mom buy it even if we already have some at home. You can never have too much chocolate therapy.";;;

Chocolate Therapy,ChocoQueen,2020-07-31,5,This has to be a woman's creation,0,0,"Chocolate Therapy has walked me back from the ledge on several occasions. Joking! It's SO good and so chocolaty (is that a word?), that I'm feel it's meant for women. :-)";;;

Chocolate Therapy,kimmykimmy,2020-06-12,5,Plz make a dairy free version!,0,0,"This was my all time favorite ice cream before I stopped consuming dairy and I would love to be able to eat it again! It’s exquisite. Ben and Jerry, make it happen!";;;

Chocolate Therapy,miacler,2018-04-25,5,Literally the best thing in the world...,0,0,"I went to my local scoop shop in 2013 and tried a scoop of the Chocolate Therapy. I've been hooked ever since. Seriously guys, I buy at least two pints a week.";;;
Chocolate Therapy
author: chocoholic
title: Rich decadent deliciousness
text;;;: This is seriously addictive stuff. It tastes like and has the texture of chilled rich brownie batter mixed with chocolate cream. Just heaven in the mouth.;;;

name: Chocolate Therapy,Monie,2018-02-18,5,Perfection!,0,0,"I’m not a chocolate ice cream girl at all, but this flavor is amazing! I love how rich and creamy it is;" I also love the chocolate cookie bits! So yummy!""";;
Chocolate Therapy
author: Jacksmom
title: Wonderful
text;;;: I don’t know why I tried this. I don’t typically like chocolate on chocolate but this was fantastic! I think the pudding was interesting and marvelous!;;;

name: Chocolate Therapy,Gmemery93,2018-05-20,5,100 stars!,0,0,"All other brands of chocolate ice cream fail in comparison! This is my go to and not substitutes, unless it is another Ben and Jerry’s flavor!";;;

Chocolate Therapy,mamahoohoo,2018-10-03,5,You had me at PUDDING,0,0,"Chocolate, chocolate and chocolate. I don't usually like bits interrupting my smooth ice cream texture, but the cookies are good.";;;
Chocolate Therapy,emmance,2018-03-09,5,Rich in the best way,0,0,"This is one of the best flavors, in my opinion. It has a rich flavor and great texture, just the right amount of components.";;;
Chocolate Therapy
author: Teerobs
title: Amazing
text;;;: I bought this because my pregnancy cravings were demanding chocolate and boy I was not disappointed! New favorite flavor!;;;

name: Chocolate Therapy
author: hbee4
title: My Favorite Ice Cream Ever
text;;;: This is the first Ben and Jerry's flavor I ever tried and has remained my favorite. I is perfect for chocolate lovers.;;;

name: Chocolate Therapy,Eights,2019-06-12,5,Dank,0,0,"This is THE best ben and jerrys flavor! So chocolatey, and so delicious. Perfect anytime, even my cat loves it!";;;
Chocolate Therapy
author: Big daddy
title: This so good
text;;;: So I saw this in the store and I decided to get it. My mouth was watering as the ice cream melted in my mouth;;;

name: Chocolate Therapy,TorySilver,2018-04-10,5,The best!,0,0,"Favorite ice cream of all time. hands down. Thanks for this Godsend, Ben and Jerry.";;;
Chocolate Therapy,Chlocd,2019-04-28,5,Addictive,0,0,"It’s so good that it should be a sin. Ugh, I can’t get enough of it!";;;
Chocolate Therapy
author: SnackyT
title: Amazing!
text;;;: I love dark chocolate and this combo is amazing! Quite tasty...;;;

name: Chocolate Therapy
author: blond1502
title: My favorite ice cream!!
text;;;: Just love the Chocolate Therapy! I like the texture and flavor;;;

name: Chocolate Therapy
author: KG0818
title: Delicious!
text;;;: Always satisfied when I pick up some Chocolate Therapy;;;

name: Chubby Hubby,BeardedFly,2018-12-17,5,Hello again old friend.,13,0,"It has literally been about a decade since I've had chubby hubby. I went to the scoop shops and they said it was discontinued, this was a few years ago. Well, I begrudgingly made peace with it a while ago. There was always that small voice in my head that said to check the freezer in my grocery store (this is over about 4 different states I've lived in), alas, no dice. Tonight, I have been reunited with my best ice cream best friend, I was at Walmart picking up a few things and that little voice said ""just look for it"". So I did, and there it was. I stood there in pure amazement for a good minute. Never give up hope.";;;
Chubby Hubby
author: ChubbyHubbysMainLady
title: best ice cream ever!!! No joke
text;;;: That if something happened to this flavor of ice cream I would die inside. This has easily become an addiction and I forewarn everyone who dares try it I've been on the hunt for it at every store near me trying to get the sellers nearest me to keep it in stock instead of only Cherry Garcia which I personally a peanut butter pretzel fudge loving person am not very fond of. If this ice cream Chubby Hubby was in fact a Chubby Hubby he would definitely be my hubby of choice. So a huge thank you to those coworkers the pranki. My only complaints are where and what is up with the Froyo version! Please attend issue as soon as possible;;;

name: Chubby Hubby,FuzzyGut,2018-05-31,4,Very good pint,5,0,"I just had my first pint of Chubby Hubby and I thought it was great! The ice cream flavor is delicious. Since my first experience with this flavor was after the change from peanut butter filled pretzels to regular pretzels, I can’t speak to that (though the filled ones do sound great) but the chocolate covered pretzels in the new pints are great! The reason I am giving my review 4 and not 5 stars is because I didn’t get any chocolate peanut butter swirl until the very bottom of the pint. I can imagine that if it had been dispersed throughout, it would have been AMAZING! Still, I will get another of these in the future.";;;

Chubby Hubby,KeithMoon78,2019-07-18,3,They ruined a classic! Not the same as before,4,1,"Why tinker with perfection? It appears that Ben & Jerry have changed their ""formula"" for their classic Chubby Hubby flavor, and in doing so have made it far worse. The ice cream used to be fuller and creamier, with peanut-butter filled chocolate covered pretzels and scrumptious robust chunks/gobs of peanut butter. Indeed, quite decadent! Now the ice cream is more ""watery"" (almost like skim milk), the pretzels are no longer filled with peanut butter, and the peanut butter is simply thinly swirled. The result: a pale comparison to its former self;" not as rich
author: not as tasty. Tastes very generic now. Skimping... a sign of the times... Will not be buying again.""";;

name: Chubby Hubby,eliz13413,2019-08-27,4,PLEASE bring back the good pretzels!,3,0,"I just bought this flavor for the first time in two or three years because I was so upset about the change in pretzels a few years back. While the current pretzels are better than the round ones you had for a while, they still don't compare to the yummy peanut-butter filled pretzels of yesteryear. There must be a way for you to source these?? Pretty please?";;;

Chubby Hubby,Sarah2019,2019-02-15,1,Like eating a salt lick!,5,4,"I just tried this for the first time and was so excited to find a new ice cream with peanut butter and chocolate! I've never before found an ice cream flavor I just didn't like (and my first job was selling ice cream, so I've tried a lot!). I wanted to love it, but after a few bites, I found one of the pretzels, and it was so salty! I thought it was a fluke, but I soon found another that was worse. It took a few minutes for the salt to dissolve in my mouth. Now I LOVE a sweet/salty combination, but I would have gotten less salt licking our Michigan winter roads. I hope this was a bad batch, but I won't be taking my chances.";;;

Chubby Hubby,Seekerofpeace,2017-07-24,3,Disappointing change,21,4,"This used to be my very favorite ice cream in the whole world! What's NOT to love? But not anymore. The chocolate-covered pretzel pieces are unsatisfactory. Although the pretzels do not taste stale, their consistency feels chewy and stale. They used to be peanut butter filled pretzel nuggets covered in chocolate - a crunchy triple delight! I no longer buy this ice cream. :-(";;;

Chubby Hubby,Julie,2018-02-19,5,-gurgling noise-,12,1,"I have a tough time finding this flavor, and thank goodness for that, because I find it impossible to put it down whenever I get it. This has been one of my favorite flavors for at least 17 years now. BTW, those gym bills keep getting sent back, marked ""return to sender"" - am I using the wrong address?";;;
Chubby Hubby
author: samw98
title: BEST FLAVOR
text;;;: I had this flavor for the first time a few months ago after finally tracking it down and it's AMAZING. Definitely in my top 3 right behind Cinnamon Buns and Peanut Butter World. My pint had over 15 pretzels in it and I was very happy. Only suggestion would be to make the pretzels into peanut butter filled pretzels!;;;

name: Chubby Hubby,Benihana,2018-09-26,1,Too much Salt,5,0,"I bought this last night, and was disappointed when I bit into a giant pretzel cluster that it was half salt. Needless to say I was forced to wash my mouth out a bunch, and lost my appetite very quickly.";;;

Chubby Hubby,chubbyhubbylover,2020-05-04,5,*the* BEST ice cream EVER!!!!,2,0,"I can't remember the first time I tried Chubby Hubby, but from the moment I did, it has been my hands-down favorite ice cream flavor of all time (and this is quite an honor of distinction, as I love many different brands of ice cream and their flavors!). There's just something MAGICAL about the formula of malt vanilla ice cream, with just the right amount of peanut butter and fudge swirling through, and the crunchy chocolate-covered pretzel nuggets embedded within---this combination is something close to ice cream heaven!!! Love digging into the pint, savoring the rich ice cream, and uncovering those awesome chocolate-covered pretzel nuggets---like mining for gold. Please, Ben & Jerry's, NEVER EVER discontinue this AMBROSIAL flavor!!!! And THANK YOU for providing me with such a great experience through your ice cream!!! :)))";;;

Chubby Hubby,Chubster,2020-04-22,5,Actually better than before.,1,0,"This is hands down my favorite ice cream on the planet. I guess I'm fortunate that I almost never find it in stores, because i can't see it without buying it. A lot of people have complained about the change from Chocolate covered peanutbutter FILLED pretzels to chocolate covered peanutbutter pretzels (it is my understanding that this was due to the original pretzels no longer being available to B&J's). While I do thing that the original was better in principal, I found that I frequently got pints where the pretzels were soggy and disappointing. I have never had that happen with the new recipe. The new pretzels are always crunch and a little bit saltier, which I actually prefer;" I need the salt to balance the fudge and vanilla malt. Still the best!""";;
Chubby Hubby,Erin,2017-04-11,5,Yum!,4,0,"This is my new favorite flavor, tried it for the first time about 2months ago.";;;
Chubby Hubby
author: Mia Oxford
title: Disappointing :(
text;;;: Wanted to try this since it seemed like a popular classic flavor. Sorry to say it was disappointing to me. The pint I got contained mostly chewy pretzels instead of crunchy ones. It also seemed that there were peanut pieces that were chewy. I liked the crunchy but the chewiness was an odd texture.;;;

name: Chubby Hubby,Artfreak06,2018-02-11,1,This was my husband's favorite,4,1,"We just recently it found chubby hubby at Meijer yesterday and my husband got excited because it's his favorite ice cream. We just ate it and it wasn't the same. The pretzels are supposed to be filled with peanut butter, not coated. I personally couldn't taste the peanut butter at all and the pretzels were too chewy. We will probably not be biting this flavor ever again.";;;
Chubby Hubby
author: uhhuhkayla
title: it was the best
text;;;: this was my favorite up until the pretzels were no longer filled. it gave the ice cream that soft texture nw it has too much crunch and will never be the same. still good but not great and can never find it anywhere lately;;;

name: Chubby Hubby
author: Mermaid023
title: Pretzels Suck
text;;;: Bring back the old pretzels or find a new peanut butter pretzel cause these chocolate covered ones aren’t the same. Changes the ice cream completely so people don’t buy this flavor anymore;;;

name: Chubby Hubby,Tombonannoo,2017-11-16,3,Nt as good as before,3,0,"I used to love this icecream with the nice crunchy pieces of pretzel, now the pretzels are really chewy and at times really un enjoyable, still a great ice cream though";;;
Chubby Hubby,Bennettelizabeth,2017-08-31,5,So many delicious textures!,3,0,"This has been my favorite since the beginning! Sweet and salty, smooth and crunchy! Never stop making it!";;;

Chubby Hubby,LarryPA,2018-02-17,3,Used to be my favorite,2,0,"The last time I had Chubby Hubby was when the pretzels were filled with peanut butter. I then tried it again and found no peanut butter in the pretzels. No doubt this was a change due to cost, but something was different with the overall flavor. Just not my favorite anymore. So unfortunate.";;;
Chubby Hubby
author: IceCreamCouple
title: Amazing but still disappointed
text;;;: My girlfriend and I thought this was our new favorite flavor (actually got on here to review how amazing it is) then we began reading other reviews only to realize the pretzels used to be filled with peanut butter. We now can’t stop thinking about how much better that would taste. It has ruined our night. We are the type to obsess over something like this. Will be awake for next 4 days thinking about that peanut filled pretzels. Smh. (But buy the flavor. It’s amazing);;;

name: Chubby Hubby,Chubbyhubbygrrl,2017-06-05,5,"The one and only, Chubby Hubby, is hands down...",2,0,"....the very best! Malt ice cream, peanut butter, fudge and pretzels...yowsa it's amazing! My only complaint is that it can be difficult to locate! I stock up whenever I find it though! Thanks Ben & Jerry for the most fabulous ice cream, ever!!!";;;

Chubby Hubby,bananni,2018-06-17,4,"Great, but used to be excellent!",2,0,"Chubby hubby is one of my favorite Ben & Jerry flavors, however the pretzels used to be stuffed with peanut butter a few years ago. It was WAY better then! I hope you consider going back the old way!";;;

Chubby Hubby,Jordan,2018-05-31,2,I miss my chubby hubby :-(,2,0,"This flavor used to be truly epic. Chocolate covered, peanut butter filled pretzels were the stuff of legends. Sadly, legends are now all they are. Bring back the real chubby hubby!! :-(";;;

Chubby Hubby,chubbyhubbyrules,2019-12-19,5,My All-Time Favorite Food,1,0,"I am truly dumbfounded as to how anyone could possibly rate this ice cream as anything less than five stars. This is the perfect food. I often go on extended diets, and they are almost bookended with a pint of Chubby Hubby. It's honestly one of the only things that keep me going in life. The crispiness and the saltiness of the pretzel, combined with the sweet and chewy peanut butter swirls. It's just incredible.";;;

Chubby Hubby,Kikimocha,2018-02-26,5,Only Ice Cream I Will Buy at the Grocery Store,1,0,"I LOVE this flavor! Only ice cream I will buy at the store for the past 6 years now I even got my family hooked on it as well. A lot of people are mentioning the pretzels, but I love the extra crunch. There is already a peanut butter swirl and a little peanut butter goes a long way since it is a strong flavor. Thank you for making this ice cream and please please please never get rid of it.";;;
Chubby Hubby
author: Chubby Hubby and wife
title: Couldn't ask for a better treat!
text;;;: My husband and I have been buying this ice cream flavor for about 6 months now. We are obsessed with this flavor. Chubby Hubby ice cream is addicting. We're just disappointed it doesn't come in a bigger size than pint and the pretzels are no longer filled with pb. I love the chewy pretzels. It adds character to the ice cream!!! Thank you for this yummy delightful flavor!;;;

name: Chubby Hubby,e4tami,2017-06-21,1,it's ALL hard dry pretzels,3,4,"Unbelievable that they changed the pretzels that used to be chocolate covered and chocolate filled and now they are plain, dry, with something they ""call"" chocolate covering them but it's just brown lard and there are SO many of them, hardly any ice cream, of course because they are cheap compared to cream, that one cannot even scoop the ice cream because the scooper keeps kitting pretzels, like big rocks when digging in dirt.";;;

Chubby Hubby,shanelee266,2018-08-08,3,Average Ben and Jerry's is still pretty great,1,0,"Ben and Jerry's is my splurging ice cream. Once a month I buy two pints. I always tell myself I'll make them last the entire month, and instead I'm ice cream-less for about 25 days until I buy more.";;;

Chubby Hubby,Sadsherri,2018-03-14,2,Disappointed,2,1,"My first taste of Ben&Jerry's was about twenty years ago. It was Chubby Hubby when the ice cream was peanut butter. Who had the lame brain idea to change it to vanilla malt? That ruined what was so special about it. Sadly, none of the current peanut butter offerings live up to the old Chubby Hubby.";;;

Chubby Hubby,Ob95,2017-09-25,1,Basically a pint of pretzels,3,3,"I was extremely disappointed with this flavor. It was almost impossible to eat because every bite was a chunk of pretzel. The little ""vanilla"" ice cream in the pint was almost sour and not the same as the regular vanilla flavor. Not to mention I didn't see a single bit of peanut butter.";;;

Chubby Hubby,WestTexSuz,2019-05-17,2,Just not the same...,0,0,"After not seeing this, my favorite flavor, for years, I was really excited when I saw it in the freezer section! Malted milk vanilla ice cream, peanut butter and fudge swirls and, the best part, chocolate covered, peanut butter filled, pretzels, Oh My. Unfortunately, the new rendition of this flavor is missing the peanut butter filled part of the pretzel which makes it just a dry chunk of pretzel covered in a thin layer of chocolate. It's OK but now where near as good as the original.";;;

Chubby Hubby,KimBeth,2020-02-23,3,Bring Back The Old,0,0,"This ice cream used to have more of an intense malt flavor--now the flavor of malt is lacking. The base of the ice cream used to be more like marbled fudge with thick swirls of peanut butter--now the base of the ice cream is vanilla with thin swirls of peanut butter and fudge. The pretzels used to be filled with peanut butter and covered with thick chocolate to keep the pretzels from losing texture--now the pretzels are not filled with peanut butter and the chocolate coating is not thick enough to prevent the pretzels from becoming soggy. I'm assuming the company did this to trim calories but if people want to be on a diet, we wouldn't be buying premium ice cream. Although this flavor is still good, it does not have the perfection it used to have years ago. Please go back to the original!!!";;;
Chubby Hubby
author: lovemyboys
title: I love this flavor!!!!
text;;;: I love this flavor so much and I am so mad because I CANT find it at any store. I have looked in 3 different states (I move a lot) and none of them sell it anymore!!!!!!!;;;

name: Chubby Hubby,Kamk,2019-01-24,2,Ruined an iconic flavor,0,0,"Bring the old pretzels back. Used to be my addiction and would woof down the whole thing in one setting. I know that the old pretzels sometimes got soggy but when they did not, the whole thing tated sublime. Now, the pretzels are huge lumps, crunchy but fairly tasteless and not stuffed with peanut butter. Plus, I almost always get one or two super super salty (as if I crunched a lump of salt) pretzels that ruin the whole experience. Do something to fix and save this amazing flavor!";;;

Chubby Hubby,Andy,2018-03-20,5,Our Family Favorite!,1,0,"We have a hard time finding grocery stores in our area that carry this flavor. Currently there is only one that we're aware of, so that's where we choose to shop!";;;
Chubby Hubby
author: Jenchapd
title: Sweet and Salty
text;;;: Perfect mix of sweet and salty this s a must. The chocolate covered peanut butter pretzels are just what makes this a perfect combo.You will not be disappointed.;;;

name: Chubby Hubby,Zarenna,2018-04-12,5,Addictive,1,0,"I love this. I got addicted to Chubby hubby when I was pregnant with my son. It is like moosetracks ice cream but better. Sweet and salty, a perfect choice.";;;

Chubby Hubby,Lizzo,2020-02-12,5,This Is NOT Up For Debate,1,0,"this is the best peanut butter and chocolate ice cream there is to date. PLUS, theres PRETZELS CHUNKS. What more could you ask for? more of it, perhaps..";;;
Chubby Hubby,Bigga,2017-06-12,5,My favorite!!,1,0,"A bit of sweet, a bit of salty, a bit of crunchy... ohh my. To bad I am having a hard time finding it in stores around me.";;;
Chubby Hubby
author: Beena
title: I fall in love with it.
text;;;: Just not sweet;;;

name: Chubby Hubby,FATher of the year,2019-09-14,5,Made me who I am Today...,1,0,"By far the best flavor in the World. Can’t beat sweet, salty, creamy and crunchy. Hard to find, an emerging top ten.";;;
Chubby Hubby
author: lithium1
title: Have the best memory
text;;;: When did you resurrect this flavor? More than 20 years ago i fell in love with Chubby Hubby. Extraordinaire taste!!;;;

name: Chubby Hubby
author: Padmanda
title: My favorite flavor
text;;;: It is my ultimate favorite flavor!!! Its the only grocery item I wont share with my household;;;

name: Chubby Hubby,tagirl,2018-03-23,5,Pretzels,1,0,"Agreed. It's not as good as it used to be, but. Peanut butter pretzels that is all.";;;
Chubby Hubby
author: wendlls
title: Please NEVER discontinue this flavor!
text;;;: I have loved this flavor for years. Please NEVER discontinue it!;;;

name: Chubby Hubby
author: Larry
title: It does make the Hubby Chubby!
text;;;: All time favorite B&J flavor!!! All time favorite B&J flavor!!!;;;

name: Chubby Hubby,Robin O,2019-04-11,5,Favorite Ice Cream Ever,0,0,"So, I spent a few months trying to explore as many Ben&Jerry's flavors as I could, but I've come to the conclusion that this is my favorite ice cream flavor EVER! I grew up drinking vanilla malt milkshakes with my dad and this ice cream base is perfectly that. I love the fudge swirls, they have a very classic chocolate syrup taste. They're not too overpowering! Always so many pretzels too! This ice cream is a no brainer for me. Team Chubby Hubby 5ever. <3";;;
Chubby Hubby
author: Uncle Gingy
title: Disappointing pretzel evolution
text;;;: Grew up loving this ice cream. Rarely would get anything else. Was disappointed in The change from chocolate cover peanut butter FILLED pretzels to simply chocolate covered but was able to look the other way as the peanut butter swirl still meet my needs. Once they changed those pretzels to way over loaded salty pretzels is been really disappointing. Thought maybe I was crazy but finally came to the website to see I am not the only one who feels this way.;;;

name: Chubby Hubby,Sarasota Florida Girl,2020-06-07,5,All time favorite!,0,0,"Chubby Hubby was the stuff of my childhood dreams and has been my favorite flavor ever since tasting my first scoop many years ago (more than I care to admit or try and number). I will not even be in the mood for ice cream, and yet I still check to see if it's in stock, any time I pass an ice cream selection in any store ever. Simply the best! If you haven't tried it yet, you are missing out. But that's fine, because it leaves me more pints.";;;

Chubby Hubby,ChilliedLaura,2018-01-17,5,Peanut butter and Pretzel Delight!,1,1,"I kept hearing about the hype around this one and had to try it for myself, I was not let down. The pretzels were by far the BIGGEST chunks in a Ben & Jerry's ice cream I have tried thus far, combine that with a little peanut butter and it is just pure heaven!";;;

Chubby Hubby,cylej,2018-02-28,5,name change?,0,0,"This is hands-down the greatest ice cream ever created! I have a deep love for this ice cream and last year during a PRIDE event, Ben & Jerry's had a stand where a worker informed me that they are going to change the name to ""Hubby Hubby"", having two cows with top hats on.";;;
Chubby Hubby
author: mary alice
title: My very favorite
text;;;: My blonde bomber of a cairn terrier -- Earth Dogge Mulligan -- and I used to eat CH after our pizza. It is the BEST. ICE CREAM. EVER!!! My boy is now enjoying pizza and CH on the Rainbow Bridge. And I get CH on my birthday. The smile on his furry little face as he plowed through his very own bowl always pops into my head on that day. Thanks for the memories.;;;

name: Chubby Hubby,Marks,2019-04-01,5,My absolute favorite ice cream flavor ever!,0,0,"I've been a Chubby Hubby fan for many years. I now live in Singapore though, where I've never seen it in shops. Last year I was in Hawaii and was delighted to find Chubby Hubby readily available there. I certainly took advantage of that availability while I was there, but I'm back in Singapore now, with no Chubby Hubby. Please make it available in Singapore!";;;

Chubby Hubby,kirsten28,2020-09-05,5,Always a favorite,0,0,"The ice cream is one of the few malt flavors and if that’s not enough to be incredible, the salty and sweet of the chocolate with the pretzels just make it amazing. The pretzels aren’t soggy since the chocolate makes a perfect shell, and there’s the perfect ratio of chunky to ice cream itself. I really hope this one sticks around forever because it ROCKS.";;;

Chubby Hubby,Phoenix87,2019-12-17,3,Missing the classic recipe!!!,0,0,"This used to be my absolute favorite flavor. How I miss the chocolate covered peanut butter filled pretzels of the original, classic, version of Chubby Hubby! Never mess with a great. Every time I think I will give it another try, I am dissapointed because I still remember how truly great flavor originally was and miss that this version falls short.";;;
Chubby Hubby
author: Bakerfam
title: Please make a non dairy version!
text;;;: This I've cream is by far my husbands very favorite ice cream. Our only problem is that we have had to go vegan for our health and can no longer consistently dairy or eggs. Would you please consider making a non dairy vegan version of this with the crunchy peanut butter pretzels please! We have had 2 of the vegan flavors and they were great!;;;

name: Chubby Hubby,Chubby hubby lover,2020-04-22,4,Bring the old pretzels back plz!!!,0,1,"This is the best icecream on the planet, even with the new chocolaty covered pretzels. But I still dont get why you dont want to bring the peanut butter covered pretzels back ?!! Most of chubby hubby fans are asking you and complaining but you just ignore. I dont understand what's so hard about getting the old recipe back.";;;
Chubby Hubby
author: Tubs123
title: Great! Would buy again!
text;;;: I just tried this flavor for the first time and I thought it was delicious! The chocolate covered pretzels were nice and crunchy! The saltiness of the pretzels was great with the sweet ice cream! The malt flavor of the ice cream was also great along side the huge swirls and fudge and peanut butter!;;;

name: Chubby Hubby,rsquare,2020-08-18,5,Absolutely delicious!,0,0,"This ice cream flavor is the best. The malted vanilla is already delicious on its own, and yet it melds so wonderfully with the peanut butter and fudge swirls. The stars of the show, though, are the pretzel pieces - crunchy, sweet, and salty perfection. Absolute joy in a pint!";;;
Chubby Hubby
author: Beepboop
title: My fave flavor for 15 years
text;;;: This is my favorite flavor but I’ve noticed over the last couple of years it’s tasted much sweeter. It’s missing the over the top peanut butter that I fell in love with. It used to have a better balance of sweet and salty. It’s still great but I wish it hadn’t changed. ❤️;;;

name: Chubby Hubby,Icecreamlovr,2020-09-17,2,Not the same as the original,0,0,"This was my favorite flavor of Ben & Jerry's ice cream. The ice cream doesn't even taste the same as the original. The chocolate covered pretzels are too big and aren't filled with peanut butter anymore. Why, oh why did you change a great flavor?";;;
Chubby Hubby
author: Rmeady
title: Bring it back to the UK
text;;;: Chubby Hubby is the best flavour ice cream I’ve ever tasted. All the elements blend so well together to create the ultimate taste sensation. It’s been a good few years since I’ve been able to taste it though as it sadly no longer is available in the UK!;;;

name: Chubby Hubby
author: SeanB
title: My go to since 1993
text;;;: I’ve been eating this flavor of Ben and Jerry’s for over 20 years. It’s been revamped with different pretzels but it still tasted exactly the same. They used to be peanut butter filled pretzels which was awesome. Chubby Hubby for the win!;;;

name: Chubby Hubby,supermas,2019-05-02,5,Greatest Ice Cream Flavor Combination,0,0,"Just the right amount of texture, sweet, salt, chocolate, and peanut butter! Gobs of those delightful pretzels. Can't go wrong with this pint! Sometimes a little tricky to find, but not impossible. The perfect ice cream.";;;
Chubby Hubby
author: ChandlerM
title: Excellent ice cream
text;;;: I went to a Ben and Jerry’s store out of state that had this and it was the best ice cream I’ve ever had! Unfortunately there isn’t any store that sales this flavor... :( I’d buy this every week if I could!;;;

name: Chubby Hubby
author: carla tortilla
title: The best of the best
text;;;: The best flavor there is! I've tasted a bunch of other flavors but I always keep going back to this one. The sweet and salty of the pretzel and the combination of chocolate and peanut butter are the best!;;;

name: Chubby Hubby,cdub,2018-09-03,5,"Delicious, I mix it with ""oat of this swirlled""",0,0,I love this icecream please do not ever stop making it. If there is a contest to enter to win a lifetime supply please let me know. PRO TIP: mix with oat of this swirrled flavor for a cinnamon explosion!;;;
Chubby Hubby
author: tmwsiy1976
title: The Best of the Best
text;;;: Words do Chubby Hubby no justice! My all time fave for sure and always on the look for it cuz its sometimes hard to find. Cheers to Ben & Jerrys for this timeless classic !!! Keep up the great work!;;;

name: Chubby Hubby,AshB88,2019-07-12,5,When salty and sweet collide!,0,0,"One of my favorite ice creams. It is a great blend of salty and sweet, with the sweet ice cream base and the crunchy salty pretzels. The only bummer is not many stores in my area or IL carry it.";;;

Chubby Hubby,locaknd,2018-02-05,5,SOOOO AMAZING OH MY LANTA,0,0,"This is by far the very best ice cream i have ever tasted. The combination alone is completely genius. Thank you for creating this peanut buttery, malt fudge filled masterpiece.";;;
Chubby Hubby
title: Best flavor of all time! GOAT!
text;;;: This is by far the best flavor of all time. So sad it isn’t sold any more. Every other flavor I get I want it to taste like this and they all fall short.;;;

name: Chubby Hubby
author: Lioness
title: The BEST ICE CREAM
text;;;: I have been trying to remember the name of my favorite ice cream in the entire world .. chubby hubby... .. absolutely amazing!!! Thanks Ben and Jerry;;;

name: Chubby Hubby
author: Yankee2565
title: Awesome
text;;;: This is the best ice cream ever. I've been eating it by the pint for what seems like forever. Don't change it and definitely don't stop making it.;;;

name: Chubby Hubby,Miki,2019-04-10,5,Best ice cream ever!,0,0,"Salty and sweet perfection! Who wouldn’t like peanut butter, chocolate and salted pretzels? I’m always sad when I can’t find it at the store.";;;
Chubby Hubby
author: lindzrose333
title: chubby hubbyyy <3
text;;;: this is by far my favorite ice cream from ben and jerry’s if not my favorite ice cream period! i hope they never discontinue this flavor!!!;;;

name: Chubby Hubby,Bttrfngrbbs,2020-07-04,3,The pretzel bits,0,0,"It would get 5 stars but i didnt like the huge pretzel bits. I expected broken up pieces of ""tiny twist"" pretzels. They were so salty too";;;
Chubby Hubby,,2019-02-02,5,Loveeeee it,0,0,"Chubby hubby was my first b&js ice cream, I’ve tried many other but it will ALWAYS be my go to and my favorite I’ve cream of all time";;;
Chubby Hubby
author: France
title: Would trade my first born for a life time supply
text;;;: This isn’t by far the BEST GD FLAVOR y’all have ever made it isn’t hands down my favorite and a bust have after a rough day lol.;;;

name: Chubby Hubby
author: SPack
title: The best
text;;;: This is my favorite flavor of Ben & Jerry's. The closest store to me that sells it is 22 miles away and it's worth the drive.;;;

name: Chubby Hubby
author: Tabi92
title: Best of All Time
text;;;: This is my Go To for ice cream. It has everything I need to satisfy cravings. Sweet creamy crunchy salty dream come true.;;;

name: Chubby Hubby,Barbara54,2020-03-15,3,EXTREMELY PEANUT BUTTERY,0,0,"The pretzels in this ice cream are good, but if you can’t handle that much peanut butter, than this might be intense.";;;
Chubby Hubby,Cheshire911,2019-07-20,5,Delicious,0,0,"I bought this a couple weeks ago, and I can’t stop thinking about it. Each time I get it, it gets better and better.";;;

title: Great flavor but disappointing pretzels
text;;;: This used to be my all time favorite but lately all the pretzel pieces are either too salty or soggy. Disappointed.;;;

name: Chubby Hubby,iscream4icecream,2018-11-28,5,turnin me into a chubby hubby,0,0,"Breakfast, lunch, dinner, snacks.... I just can't put it down.....This is gonna make me a real chubby hubby";;;

author: Bellaandjerrys

name: Chubby Hubby,DajonD,2020-03-17,5,Fat dad!!,0,0,"The best flavor, ever!! Everytime I see this flavor I can’t help but buy it. My wife gets mad at me. Lol";;;

name: Chubby Hubby,ACNKimmi,2019-03-25,5,Best Ice Cream Ever,0,0,"So hard to find, but still my favorite from day 1!";;;
Chubby Hubby,Grizbaer,2018-12-18,5,Love at 1st pint!,0,0,"My first bite of B&J YEARSSSS ago, have turn back!";;;
Chubby Hubby
author: devnall
title: One of the two best B&J flavors ever
text;;;: Chubby Hubby has been a favorite of mine for decades. It seemed to completely disappear from shelves for quite a few years but recently I've started running across it again in stores and am delighted.;;;

name: Chunky Monkey,jwhgg7,2018-08-17,3,Great flavor but hardly any chocolate chips,2,0,"I was sad to give a mediocre rating because I really loved the flavor of this ice cream. I have never had banana ice cream before and B&J does it perfectly. The addition of walnuts and chocolate pieces makes this flavor simple but delicious. Maybe it was an isolated incident, but my pint had very few chocolate pieces. I think I was averaging 1 chocolate piece for every 4 scoops of ice cream. That's not great, especially since the image on the label shows it being riddled with chocolate. I am hoping this was an isolated incident and the next chunky monkey pint will be better.";;;
Chunky Monkey
author: Wendy
title: Heaven!
text;;;: If I didn't know any better I would've thought this flavor was made with love and some type of witchcraft- it's that good! ❤️;;;

name: Chunky Monkey,Munica28,2019-09-15,1,"Hey, where are the chocolate chunks???",11,12,"I bought this at my local grocery store. I almost always buy Cherry Garcia but they were out. My next go to, plain ol' vanilla was not available either. I decided to try something new, normally I'm not adventurous with my food. I decided on trying Chunky Monkey because I love bananas. I opened my pint a few nights later, took my first spoon full and there were no chocolate chunks and very little walnuts. I kept digging and nada. The ice cream was very tasty and smooth. The walnuts had a nice nutty toasted flavor. Still, no chocolate chunks. It wasn't until I got to the bottom of the pint a few nights later did I find THREE chocolate chunks. Not cool, not cool at all.";;;

Chunky Monkey,Ancy,2017-09-27,5,The banana base is FLAWLESS!,13,1,"I tried this flavor for the first time a few months ago, and albeit I'm not much of an ice cream person as it is, I CANNOT stop buying myself a pint each week! It is SO SO good. The banana base is perfection! I honestly don't even need the walnuts and the chocolate, although the walnuts are absolutely amazing in it... They completely NAILED the banana ice cream. Just....wow. <3";;;
Chunky Monkey
author: Tallie
title: Was skeptical
text;;;: Tried this flavor today I was unsure about the bannna flavor but got it anyway it is so good. Bananas flavor was perfect wasn't overpowering the chocolate pieces were good tastes like good quality chocloate. I will get again;;;

name: Chunky Monkey,TheTyGuy,2020-04-03,1,"I’m sorry, but no.",1,7,"Being a lover of ice cream, bananas, chocolate, and all forms of nuts, I expected to like this ice cream much more than I did. After the first few bites into the pint, I realized how gross the banana flavor in it is. This might just be me, but I did not like the flavor. Eating into it some more, I noticed a stinging in the back of my throat, I think because of the fudge pieces. It was an acidic sting the more I ate, and the worse it got the more I ate, so I ended up throwing away the pint soon after I started.";;;
Chunky Monkey,Vanessa,2017-04-12,5,My All Time Fave since I was young....,7,0,"Delicious, creamy nana icecream with nice chunks of chocolate and walnuts.";;;
Chunky Monkey,Justyne,2017-09-28,5,So good!,4,0,"I've been eating this since I was a kid, its their best flavor!";;;
Chunky Monkey
author: Erin89
title: All monkey and no chunky :(
text;;;: This is the first I have tried chunky monkey. My go to is Americone Dream. I love chocolate covered bananas so I thought ... why not? I am so disappointed. Halfway through my pint and have only found 3 chocolate chunks. The ones I did find were delicious!;;;

name: Chunky Monkey,Rileyhd,2017-10-11,5,Nice flavor,0,0,"Got this instead of the mint to switch things up and let me tell you, I LOVE THIS. Great banana flavor. Everytime I take a bite with the fudge chunks it tastes like a chocolate covered banana";;;

Chunky Monkey,,2019-02-27,5,"AMAZING, but needs more chocolate.",0,0,"Okay I absolutely love this ice cream, it is my favorite Ben and Jerry's flavor in fact. It's hard to choose the best part, but it is the chocolate chunks. After an intense amount of research I was unable to find what kind of chocolate was used in the ice cream. I would pay a lot of money to eat a chocolate bar made out of the kind of chocolate used in chunky monkey. So, as far as I'm concerned if you would like to keep my business you have two choices: 1. Add much more chocolate to pint of ice cream like advertised or 2. make chocolate bars. Thanks and have a great day.";;;

Chunky Monkey,CHUNKY MONKEY CONNOISSEUR,2017-12-06,5,LOVE AT FIRST TASTE,1,0,"I've been a Chunky Monkey fan for over 15 years now. I moved from New Jersey to Alabama to find out the quality is not the same. I've notice less chocolate chunks and the ice cream has a gritty texture. Not sure why the disparities but I look forward to going home (Jersey) for Christmas. I have a suggestion, PLEASE consider selling in half gallon or gallon sizes. This would make my life complete. Thank You for a delicious product";;;
Chunky Monkey
author: lizzysun
title: Best banana ice cream
text;;;: My brother introduced me to this flavor years ago and it remains my favorite!;;;

name: Chunky Monkey,Jackie21,2018-03-26,5,Addicted,1,0,"I am addicted! this is the best product ever. The only one I purchase. I do not care about the calories because I run them but this icecream is so worth it. I used to make my banana shake with oats and milk...I gave that up to have this. My local grocery store was out so I decided to try the ""Almond Milk"" and I can tell you I was disappointed. The texture was not the same...it tasted like regular chunky monkey but expired.";;;

Chunky Monkey,JackieM,2019-05-10,5,Reminds me of my childhood favorite ice cream,1,0,"I absolutely love this Ice cream but I 100% could go without the walnuts, I don't really like those in there, I feel like the walnuts should be replaces with a lot more chocolate chunks. Breyers used to sell a banana ice cream with chocolate chips when I was younger but discontinued it and I was so unhappy! But this one is great, but again, a lot less walnuts or removing them completely would be great.";;;
Chunky Monkey
author: Luckii21
title: The best!!
text;;;: My absolute favorite. My favorite thing to do is share some with my little man who loves it as well!;;;

name: Chunky Monkey,chunkylover11,2018-02-16,5,Iconic,2,0,"This is the best thing you could ever purchase, a very good investment.";;;
Chunky Monkey
author: Ranger702
title: My last meal request will include Chunly Monkey
text;;;: I could gain 100lbs on this ice cream and be happy.;;;

name: Chunky Monkey
author: issa
title: Too chunky!!
text;;;: This is honestly my top favorite flavor ever but I wish the chocolate and nut chunks were smaller... when chocolate freezes it gets even harder to chew and it hurts my teeth so I usually eat around the bigger pieces and just eat the smaller ones!;;;

name: Chunky Monkey,Zucks29,2020-08-01,4,Very good!,1,0,"Love this flavor, rarely is banana done right. Only reason it’s not 5 stars is that I feel as though the walnut and chocolate pieces should be smaller so that the ice cream is more easily consumed when it is really cold.";;;

Chunky Monkey,Vero,2017-08-30,3,"Good, but little to no chocolate :/",1,0,The banana flavor is soooo good but I literally got 2 chocolate pieces which was kind of disappointing. Maybe I'll give it another chance.;;;
Chunky Monkey
author: HayyHayy
title: MY FAVORITE ICE CREAM EVER
text;;;: Every time I go grocery shopping I buy 5 pints (which I go every week because I’m a college student) I wish I could buy more but I’m a broke college student. I go thru a pint every night. One day I walked to family dollar up the street because I thought they had it but they didn’t. After leaving family dollar I walked to multiple corner stores and they didn’t have it and they weren’t close either I was so depressed and sad when I went back to my dorm room. But I eat this ice cream almost every week. I just wanna say if you guys ever have a contest for a giveaway for this specific ice cream for months or a year I am entering and ima do everything to win! Love this ice cream out of all the Ben & Jerry ones ive had. I’ve even made my family start eating this one and one of my family members don’t even like bananas. Lol;;;

name: Chunky Monkey,Marky Mark,2019-09-01,4,Surprisingly amazing flavor,1,0,"I am a chocoholic and will almost never buy any ice cream with any fruit associated with it but I decided to be open minded with this and give it a shot, so trust me when I say that this stuff is absolutely amazing. I was afraid that it was going to have a very strong banana flavor but it doesnt at all. It doesnt taste like a frozen banana or a banana smoothie or the artificial banana you see in popiscles and candy. Instead, the masterminds created a perfect harmony of sweet cream, vanilla, and banana that keeps it from being boring and the texture is out of this world, better than any soft serve i have ever had with it's creaminess and density. The only reason i am not giving this a 5 stars review is because i didnt care for the walnuts or the fudge chunks. They could have left them out completely and that would have been perfectly okay with me or have gone with milk chocolate chunks or peanut butter cups. Still, this ice cream is one of their best and one of the best i have ever had and i am shocked to say that about a fruit flavored ice cream. I was so impressed with the flavor that went out the next day to buy another pint. Now I know why it's a top seller year after year.";;;
Chunky Monkey
author: _neenaaa
title: Delicious
text;;;: The best combinations could only ask for smaller chocolate chunks;;;

name: Chunky Monkey
author: Happydude
title: Yummmmmm!
text;;;: Try this flavor! You'll return to the store for more!;;;

name: Chunky Monkey
author: Rich from Cecil
title: How about a Chunky Mint Monkey??
text;;;: Love Chunky Monkey but can we get a banana ice cream with York peppermint patties worked in?? Now that's a coooool monkey.;;;

name: Chunky Monkey,Gibby,2020-03-29,5,The Umami of Ice Creams. Change My Mind.,0,0,"Incredible real banana flavor, dark chocolate chunks at the size you DREAM all chunks should be at, and fatty walnuts to die for. So many other ice creams are sugar OVERLOADS. This flavor does not have to rely of excessive sugar to be great. Chunky Monkey is the umami of ice creams. Change my mind. Also, BRING IT BACK. My local stores are falling short. -Richmond, CA 94805.";;;

Chunky Monkey,Nicole81,2020-06-12,5,Absolutely LOVE everything about Chunky Monkey!,0,0,"This has been my favorite ice cream since I first tried it when I was a teenager. I keep saying I’m going to try another flavor, but it’s so hard. I love Ben & Jerry’s. There is no other ice cream that can compare to their ice cream. I mean every bite there is goodness! And anyone who knows me knows that I am not sharing my “Chunky Monkey”";;;

Chunky Monkey,Clark,2018-08-07,5,A masterpiece of a flavor,0,0,"I'd normally be skeptical of nuts in ice cream, but the walnuts and chocolate chunks in this flavor are just what the absolutely delicious banana ice cream calls for. I would like to shake the hand of whoever concocted this amazing recipe. The banana ice cream tastes delicious and unique, and the nuts and chocolate compliment it perfectly.";;;

Chunky Monkey,LexLuther,2018-01-16,5,Drool worthy,0,0,"The ice cream gods smile upon the flavor gurus that crafted this heavenly concoction. I always played it safe with cookie dough and half baked until I gave this flavor a try, and ever since, I'VE BEEN HOOKED! Forever my favorite, I urge EVERYONE who likes banana walnut to try this flavor, you won't be sorry!";;;

Chunky Monkey,Syd555,2018-06-04,5,Banana ice cream is perfect,0,0,"I loved the banana ice cream, it didn’t have that artificial banana flavor. Combined with the walnuts reminded me of banana bread. I didn’t care for the chocolate chunks, I wish there was a fudge swirl instead. I wish there was another banana flavor combined with peanut butter, caramel, or cheesecake.";;;
Chunky Monkey
author: Shake
title: Not a Fan
text;;;: The banana ice cream is overpowering and struggles to compliment the chocolate and nuts. I ate a quarter of it and threw the rest away.;;;

name: Chunky Monkey
author: Nik904
title: I Love It
text;;;: I purchased this ice cream because I'm lactose intolerant and was tired of only purchasing Breyers basic vanilla lactose free flavor. This ice cream is so good even my 2 yr old enjoys eating it. I just wish it was sold in a half gallon. The pint isn't enough.;;;

name: Chunky Monkey
author: Yummmmm
title: Delicious!!
text;;;: I just tried this flavor and it's delicious!! The ice cream tastes exactly like frozen bananas with no after taste. The nuts and chocolate pieces are definitely a plus. I always loved Ben & Jerry ice cream and this will be one of my new favorites!;;;

name: Chunky Monkey,Uzziah 1954,2020-07-02,1,Poor,0,0,"I bought two Ben and Jerry's Chunky Monkey one pint ice cream. When I got home, I found out they must have been refrozen many times. The taste was horrible...what a disappointment. I could not recommend this product the way it was to anyone.";;;

Chunky Monkey,Nikki72,2020-08-03,4,Needs improvement,0,0,"This is my favorite. Just needs to change one thing, and this applies to all their flavors with chocolate chunks. DON’T. Jus leave out the chocolate chunks. They get hard as bricks when frozen and have no flavor. Like eating bits of plastic.";;;
Chunky Monkey
title: BEST EVER - sometimes
text;;;: Chunky Monkey is by far my favorite ice cream and trust me I have eaten plenty of brands and flavors! BUT two of the last 3 pints I purchased were very disappointing. VERY VERY FEW fudge chunks - my favorite part of the pint!;;;

name: Chunky Monkey,Helen 1202,2020-07-04,5,Addictive!,0,0,"I am hocked, I was on dialysis, for about 5 years, I couldn’t eat ice cream, I just got a transplant in April, 2020, I have been eating this ice cream like crazy. But I was wondering if you could make it in your yogurt recipe.";;;
Chunky Monkey
author: SheriC
title: Chunky Monkey Is the Best!
text;;;: I love your pint size Chunky Monkey... it is my guilty pleasure. Can you make it in the 4 oz size? I have only seen Cherry Garcia and Cookie Dough ice cream in the 4oz. Thank you! Also I would appreciate any coupons!;;;

name: Chunky Monkey,Monkey Magic,2019-02-24,3,Recipe mods required,0,0,"I now do my own at home, leading to the realization that roasted macadamia nuts make a better-than-BJs Chunky Monkey. Drop the walnuts, sub in macadamias and I think you'll have the best banana ice cream on the planet";;;
Chunky Monkey
author: Gamndalf the white
title: Where's the walnuts??
text;;;: Great ice cream but I hardly got any walnuts in my pint. Lots of fudge chunks but little to no walnuts. This is already a simple ice cream and walnuts are one of only two mix ins. And there was hardly any in pint.;;;

name: Chunky Monkey,bridgenann,2020-07-05,4,Best Banana Ice Cream I didn’t know I needed...,0,0,"I’m on a mission to try all the Ben & Jerry’s flavors and have landed to Chunky Monkey. I can’t believe I held out so long! I thought banana ice cream would suck, but leave it to Ben and Jerry to prove me wrong!";;;
Chunky Monkey,Jon H,2018-08-22,5,So delicious,0,0,"I absolutely love Chunky Monkey. It’s always nutty, not too many chocolate chunks, but not to few. It’s always perfect!";;;
Chunky Monkey
author: Britms6133
title: Perfectly chunky
text;;;: Just finished my pint of Chunky Monkey and it was sooo good. There was a perfect ratio of chocolate pieces and walnut to the banana ice cream in my tub. By far my favorite flavor of Ben and Jerry’s ice cream.;;;

name: Chunky Monkey,Mamasuge,2018-04-15,5,Every bite is perfext,0,0,"I’m not sure how you do it but you get the perfect balance of chocolate, walnuts and banana flavor in each bite! No searching for chunks around the pint, they always there with each spoonful.";;;

Chunky Monkey,802GirlLivinInThe603,2020-02-08,5,"Banana Ice Cream, what?!",0,0,"Seriously, who thinks of banana ice cream with walnuts!? It's so good it should be illegal. But please don't make it illegal, I prefer not to have to go through the Black Market to get this.";;;
Chunky Monkey
author: Reenie Beenie
title: Oh YUM!
text;;;: I never get tired of this....it’s my all time favorite!! Bananas and walnuts are so perfect together...throw some chocolate in and I’m the happiest human on the planet!! Love it!❤️;;;

name: Chunky Monkey,,2017-08-22,3,Delish Banana Icecream But No Chocolate Chunks :(,0,0,"Brought this the other night, had it before and loved it! However, we dig around and only found a coulple of chocolate chunks, it was so good last time we were left disappointed:(";;;

Chunky Monkey,Macy,2018-07-22,5,Literally So Good,0,0,"Everything about this ice cream is perfect. The banana flavor is light, refreshing, and doesn't taste artificial. Perfect amount of chocolate and walnuts. Absolutely delicious,";;;
Chunky Monkey
author: TRVary77
title: Perfection
text;;;: I tried this at one of the Ben and Jerry's factories in Vermont and I loved it. I have bought it so many times since then and it is my all time favorite ice cream flavor ever!;;;

name: Chunky Monkey
author: LunaLoca
title: Not just banana flavoring
text;;;: Banana “flavor” is the worst. This reminds me of homemade banana ice cream. For me the nuts and chocolate are an added bonus but not the main event. It makes me happy.;;;

name: Chunky Monkey,Imai,2017-09-18,5,The Best Ice cream flavour in the World,0,0,"This is my favourite! An ultimate flavour combo that works every time. The fruitiness, the nuttiness & the chocolate rich taste comes together Harmoniously.";;;
Chunky Monkey
author: Becz
title: Perfect
text;;;: This flavor never fails to lift my spirits! The chocolate chunks are a perfect amount so that the banana flavor of the ice cream isn't overwhelmed. Love!;;;

name: Chunky Monkey,latavia81,2018-08-23,5,Favorite of My Son Honor and I,0,0,"We love the sweet simplicity of the trio of flavors! Sweet banana flavored ice cream, chunky dark chocolate pieces and rich walnuts .....it’s a hit!!!";;;
Chunky Monkey
author: Sartzer
title: One of the best ice creams made!!!
text;;;: Every time I’m at the store I have to pick a pint up. Can’t say enough about it. Smooth banana ice cream with decadent chunks of chocolate and nuts!;;;

name: Chunky Monkey,texx,2018-08-04,2,not as advertised,0,0,"I love banana ice cream, walnut, and fudge. But there is no fudge, it is dark chocolate which tastes like burnt chocolate to me. Will not buy again.";;;

Chunky Monkey,chunky,2019-02-14,2,No chocolate chunks?,0,0,"Flavor of the ice cream is nice and banana-y and there are some walnuts, but where are the chocolate chunks? Because of that, it is disappointing.";;;
Chunky Monkey
author: CassyDad
title: Flavor changed - now too sweet
text;;;: So sad they changed this magical flavor. It’s now sickly sweet and you can’t really appreciate the flavor combo because all you taste is sugar.;;;

name: Chunky Monkey,Chunky808,2018-10-11,5,Iconic B&J's,0,0,"By far, the one flavor everyone knows is Ben & Jerry's. Chunky Monkey makes life fun, no matter how old you are. Banana Ice Cream is the star.";;;
Chunky Monkey,Jaqs,2018-10-10,5,Best flavor ever,0,0,"Chunky monkey is so addicting. The banana, walnut, and chocolate flavors go together fabulously. No doubt my favorite ice cream flavor.";;;
Chunky Monkey
author: Tina325

name: Chunky Monkey
author: Debs
title: The best ice cream in the world

name: Chunky Monkey

name: Chunky Monkey,Seahawkstml,2018-05-04,5,Top 3,0,0,"In my top3 my favorites, taste so pure and fresh, which is weird cause who would of thought frozen would taste fresh.";;;
Chunky Monkey,Lkflore,2017-12-11,5,So good,0,0,"It’s been my favorite for years. Banana ice cream check , chocolate chunks check and walnut pieces check. Sooo good";;;
Chunky Monkey,Apl42,2020-09-17,5,Yum,0,0,"I've been purchasing Ben and Jerry's chunky monkey for over 20 years. Awesome flavor, texture,";;;
Chunky Monkey,Nina16,2020-02-05,5,Best ice cream ever,0,0,"Chunky Monkey is not only my favorite flavour of Ben&Jerry's, but it's also the best I've eaten in my life";;;

author: kolliaskat
