name: Cinnamon Buns,ahumanbeing,2019-02-13,5,Best flavor of all time,64,0,"30 years. 3 continents. 7 countries. Countless types and flavors of ice cream. This is it. This is literally the best ice cream flavor I have ever tasted in my whole life, period.";;;

Cinnamon Buns,erikarubes,2017-07-14,5,Cinnamon Lovers Unite,31,1,"I am in love with this flavor. It's a little hard to find but whenever i see it, i seriously by 3 pints at a time. (and its gone by the end of the week because my kids love it too)";;;

Cinnamon Buns,CorrieH,2019-03-05,5,My absolute favorite!,1,0,"This is my favorite Ben & Jerry’s flavor ever, I’ve been getting it for years and since I’m lactose intolerant I even tried the dairy free version and it was amazing too! My biggest complaint is it’s impossible to find in my area! So sad!!";;;
Cinnamon Buns
author: Dnice
title: Top 5 flavor hands down!!
text;;;: This is one of the best ice cream flavors I have ever had. It is probably more like top 3 flaovr for me and I have tried a lot of ice cream. It is bursting with cinnamon flavor and is unlike any flavor I have ever had. I got my Mom hooked on it now. If there is EVER even a thought of retiring this flavor I would have to make a trip to Vermont to talk to the CEO of Ben and Jerrys. It is that good.;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns
author: Adam
title: TASTES AMAZING
text;;;: This flavor is the best ice cream flavor I've ever had. It's my favorite. Please bring it back to my area.;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns,Mrstriadafillou,2017-04-27,5,To die for!,9,0,"I bought this the other day, skeptical it'd live up to all that cinnamon-y goodness. I know that the salt caramel core ice cream needs more caramel, so I was iffy about this.";;;

Cinnamon Buns,Trace22214,2017-08-21,5,The BEST most Amazing flavor of all time!,8,0,"My #1 favorite & I have access to ice cream, fresh frozen custard, frozen yogurt, etc. I can't even come up with words to describe the deliciousness of this caramel ice cream with cinnamon bun pieces & the cinnamon strudel swirls!!!!! This can NEVER end up in the graveyard! Thank you for this flavor.";;;
Cinnamon Buns,cigarman512,2017-05-02,5,WOW!!,9,0,"Eating it for the first time right now, you guys are gonna make me into an addict with this flavor!";;;
Cinnamon Buns
author: luisbet151
title: Heaven on a spoon
text;;;: This is the best ice cream I have ever tasted. I have never written a review but this merits one!;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns,manda55,2017-10-20,2,Dry dough :(,2,1,"I (embarrassingly) spent about half an hour reading Ben and Jerry flavor reviews before deciding that Cinnamon Buns was going to be my new favorite! Drove to the store and could hardly wait to taste it when i got home and....... I was disappointed :( Although the cinnamon flavor was delicious and definitely there, the cinnamon bun dough pieces that other reviewers were raving about just weren't there for me. The dough was VERY dry and crumbly, NOT at all soft and gooey like others have claimed. Not sure if mine was a bad batch but unfortunately I was very disappointed.";;;

Cinnamon Buns,Billybob6869,2018-06-08,5,Tastebud Delight,1,0,"Hello, my name is Ronny I just want to say how absolutely amazing Ben and Jerry’s did on this one of a kind flavor. When I taste this ice cream. I taste morning breakfast at grandmas with a cinnamon bun in my mouth melting my tastebuds. Ben and jerry all I can say is you succeeded everything and beyond. Thank you for being you and all you do to make these flavors. You always have my support. Never again will I have another brand of ice cream outside of Ben and Jerry’s. Thank you. I love you. Goodnight";;;

Cinnamon Buns,ag31026,2019-05-26,5,I Love It...and I Miss It!,1,0,"Cinnamon Buns was the best ice cream coping mechanism to help me with my dad passing away in August 2018. It's fulfilled my love for cinnamon and is my favorite flavor in the world! As of March 2019, however...I never see it in my area. My college town and my hometown don't seem to sell it ANYWHERE! I actually cried on my mom's birthday over it, how embarrassing. It truly is the best ice cream in the entire world. I miss it so much.";;;

Cinnamon Buns,Thom,2018-06-26,1,Strange texture,2,1,"I ran to the store to try a new flavor and just opened a pint of this today and was disappointed in the quality of the buns dough... the dough tasted old and was too hard. I tried leaving it to sit out for a while to see if it had just needed to thaw a bit, but that did not do the trick, also there were big almost sugar cubes between the ice cream. :(";;;

Cinnamon Buns,Scott_56,2019-09-03,5,Cinnamon Dreams are made of this,1,0,"Look no further, Cinnamon fanatics. This is the flavor you've been waiting for. The gooey swirl will keep you diving back in with your spoon, and if you're lucky you'll come up with some cinnamon bun dough too. I've considered buying an extra freezer dedicated to pints of this flavor. I can only hope it sticks around!";;;
Cinnamon Buns
author: Brie
title: Cinnamon Lovers Delight!
text;;;: Finally decided to try this flavor today and my goodness I was NOT disappointed. That streusel swirl is heaven! And the dough pieces remind me more like giant frozen pieces of crumb topping. Like the kind on top coffee cake with is HEAVEN. I definitely need some warm coffee cake to plop a scoop of this deliciousness on!;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns,lala4now,2019-04-18,5,Like a cinnamon bun in ice cream form,1,0,"I just tried this flavor for the first time and it's my new favorite flavor. It's everything I hoped it would be - from the ice cream itself to the cinnamon swirls, streusel pieces and cookie dough. Absolutely delicious. If you love the rich, indulgent gooeyness of a fresh cinnamon roll you'll love this flavor.";;;
Cinnamon Buns
author: Durban
title: Mostly good
text;;;: I was super excited to stumble upon this flavor. It was delicious other than the cinnamon bun dough bites. The dough had a weird taste and after a few pieces i could only describe it as a black licorice flavor. I mostly picked out the dough pieces and was able to enjoy the rest of the ice cream!;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns,Flip08,2017-08-26,5,Skeptical,1,0,"I have to admit that I was a little skeptical about this when I bought it, so I bought a backup pint of Americone Dream just in case. I have never eaten a pint of B&Js so fast in my life.....it was amazing !!!!! Keep it coming B&Js.....Cinnamon Buns has officially entered my top 5";;;

Cinnamon Buns,ToplessJeepChick,2018-08-06,5,Heaven in a Pint!,1,0,"Love, love, love this flavor!! It used to be harder to find, but lucky me it started showing up in more places. This is by far my most favorite ice cream flavor. I never get tired of it and when I do try other flavors although I enjoy them I always go back to my cinnamon buns!!";;;

Cinnamon Buns,SBayjj,2019-07-08,3,Sweet!,1,0,"There is nothing I love better than a cinnabon bun. However, for me, this did not translate well into ice cream. Maybe i'm getting older, but this flavor is over the top sweet for me. And that is saying a lot. Sorry, I won't be buying this one again.";;;

Cinnamon Buns,SuzeQ,2017-10-05,5,Omg I can't live without this!,1,0,"As a chocoholic, it's a pretty big deal when I will always choose this ice cream flavor over any chocolate flavor. Please don't ever retire this flavor! I could not live with out my cinnamon buns ice cream!!!";;;

Cinnamon Buns,LAURENC,2020-06-14,5,"So good, so hard to find!",1,0,I actually came here to figure out if Cinnamon Buns is just a seasonal flavor. Why is it so hard for all of us to find (I've now read everyone else's comments). Please deliver more everywhere!!!;;;
Cinnamon Buns
author: Cms2191
title: FAVORITE ice cream
text;;;: This is by far my favorite ice cream. I'm not always a big ice cream person but I always end up eating the whole pint of this stuff. Tastes just like a cinnamon roll!;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns
author: Lmcg91
title: Ultra Sweet Bun-mazing
text;;;: LOVE the cinnamon bun dough chunks and the delicious creamy cinnamon flavor. It’s really like a cinnamon bun in ice cream form!;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns
author: Kmiller2721
title: The best ever!
text;;;: If you love brown sugar pop tarts then you will love this! Its the exact flavor plus so much more!;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns,SugarPlumVixen,2020-01-29,5,Model Of What All Cinnamon Ice Creams Should Be,0,0,"I've never thought that an ice cream would make me feel all warm and gooey and content inside but Ben & Jerry's decided otherwise. I bought this on a whim when my cinnamon loving mother was supposed to visit me but I ended up having to buy a second pint before she even got there. This ice cream has such a pronounced buttery cinnamon flavour to its base, and the dough remains just soft enough so that it really feels like you're biting into a chunk of the thick cinnamon rolls you get at the mall. The cinnamon streusel swirl was probably my favourite part though. My mom and I fought over who got to scoop their spoon through the biggest swirls. Just to note it, my first pint had a lot of swirl while my second had more dough. Both were delightful but I wish it would have been more consistent with more of both aspects please!";;;
Cinnamon Buns
author: RMundo28
title: Amazing!!
text;;;: My favorite flavor ever!!! Is different from all the other companies;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns
author: abenny415
title: Bomb
text;;;: Broooooo. it SLAPS. It is for sure my new favorite.;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns,dre1018,2017-05-30,5,Amazing!!! Hard to stop eating it!,1,1,"This is my absolute favorite flavor of any ice cream! It might be the swirl. It might be the cinnamon bun chunks but from the moment I taste the first spoonful, it is bliss! It's been a while since I'd seen it but soooo happy I've found it again! Is is loaded with chunks of cinnamon bun like dough. I don't know what it truly is but it is amazing!";;;

Cinnamon Buns,Alex576,2019-10-05,1,Super disappointing,1,2,"Not what you'd expect from Ben and Jerry's. If I didn't know better if think it was some cheap store brand. The ""gobs"" of cinnamon roll dough are just those weird sugary chunks like in cheap cookie dough ice cream. Not like any of the other dough in Ben and Jerry's ice cream. I took a few bites and it sat in the freezer for months until we threw it out.";;;

Cinnamon Buns,DC24,2018-09-04,1,Not This One!,1,1,"Just not enough contrast in this flavor. It simply fails to capture the essence of a delicious cinnamon roll. It was a valiant effort, but it just wasn't enough for me to recommend the product to anyone. I love some of Ben & Jerry's flavors, just not this one!";;;

Cinnamon Buns,Jsteps,2017-05-22,5,Only cinnamon bon ice cream,0,0,"B&J Cinnamon bon ice cream is not just the best B&J flavor but also the most unique. I was hooked on this flavor, it was my go-to for a frozen treat. Then it disappeared. I was left feeling empty and unsatisfied. Did you know there's not even a competing cinnamon flavor ice cream made by any other companies? What's the deal with that? Why would cinnamon be so scarce from frozen tastey varieties?! ...heartbroken.";;;

Cinnamon Buns,atik,2017-11-16,5,Simple but different,0,0,"This isn't one of the Ben and Jerry's crazier flavors where they have unusual combinations of mix ins and flavors, like half baked or milk and cookies. Still, it's an amazing flavor. This flavor is one of my favorite Ben and Jerry's flavors. Everything from the steusel swirls to the dough to the caramel base in this pint is solid, and I can't name anything I would want to change about it.";;;

Cinnamon Buns,Blancos Girl,2017-09-20,5,AMAZING BUT HARD TO FIND,0,0,"Im telling you this is literally the best flavor!!!! But so hard to find not even the big name brand places like Walgreens and what not have it. Once you do find it it’s EVERYTHING, the chunks of cinnamon are to die for. Every bite is worth the find. Not to say I enjoy scavenging through stores to find it. But it is sooo enjoyable it’s crazy. MAKE IT MORE AVALIBLE PLEASE!";;;
Cinnamon Buns,Usefulcoin,2018-08-16,2,"Nice flavor, too sweet thoughm",2,3,I love cinnamon but the sugar in here is just too much;;;
Cinnamon Buns
author: booboo3677
title: FAVORITE ICE CREAM EVER
text;;;: I have had a multitude of ice creams all my life but none compare to this Cinnamon Buns one! This has been my go to ice cream for 6 years and will forever be my favorite. So hard to find but I hope this never becomes discontinued because I will probably never find anything as great as this one and will actually cry if it goes away!;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns,Mackenzie,2017-08-15,4,Cinnamon Buns,0,0,"I bought this because my store was out of Oat of this Swirled. If you like lots of chunks this is for you! Unfortunately I couldn't seem to shake the flavor of licorice from the dough chunks. But I was impressed by how much dough they fit in the pint. Not my favorite, but definitely worth the try!";;;

Cinnamon Buns,icelover,2019-03-12,5,So good I could cry,0,0,"Ice cream is my absolute favorite dessert. And anyone who knows me knows I always have a sweet tooth. In all my 18 years, I have never seen this flavor until yesterday. It is delicious, wonderful, and life-changing quite honestly. Because it was so hard to find but what a gem this ice cream is!!";;;

Cinnamon Buns,Purple77,2018-04-01,5,Simply Amazing,0,0,"My favorite flavor, hands down. I can't express enough how amazingly delicious this flavor is. I literally have to draw upon the deepest recesses of my will power to stop myself from eating the whole thing in one sitting. Please please please never discontinue this one. I would be so grateful.";;;
Cinnamon Buns
author: Sriddick
title: Cinnoman is a dream come true
text;;;: This cinnamon bun ice cream is a fight in my house this is the only kind i eat its the best my husband eats other ben and jerry so i be yelling at his cause he'll eat the cinnamon bun smh selfish i will fight for the cinnamon bun its is heaven in a container just the best;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns,Radzach,2018-07-10,3,Too rich,1,3,"This one is all right, its a little to sweet for me all though I love the flavor combinations. Its to rich for my tatse.";;;

Cinnamon Buns,Peter,2018-12-31,5,The best hands down!,0,0,"For those of us who don’t like chocolate, there is rarely an option outside of vanilla or a fruity variety. So I was so excited to find this. And I’ve introduced it to my chocolate loving friends and even they agree it is the best ice cream on the market!!!!";;;
Cinnamon Buns
author: Stephan
title: Best flavor so far
text;;;: I got it with a delivered pizza and instantly fell in love with the taste.;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns,Maryquality,2019-04-30,5,Best flavor ever!!,0,0,"This is my all time favorite ice cream in the entire universe!!! If you love cinnamon rolls, then this is the ice cream for you. The problem I have with this flavor is the availability in the grocery stores. It's hit or miss with it.";;;
Cinnamon Buns
author: Dannyboy
title: MOST AMAZING ICE CREAM FLAVOR EVER!!!
text;;;: This flavor tastes like eating a Cinnabon! I'm addicted to it! I tried it when it first came out and to date I have not found a flavor better-tasting than this one! Simply amazing! One spoonful and you'll be hooked! Guaranteed!;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns,Chad,2017-07-28,5,Absolutely delicious!!!,0,0,"This is not only my favorite B&J's flavor, but my favorite ice cream. Period. The ice cream, dough pieces, and cinnamon swirls are so fantastic that it's impossible to put a pint of Cinnamon Buns down until it's empty!!!";;;

Cinnamon Buns,Shelbynic18,2018-01-15,5,To die for,0,0,"This is my absolute favorite ice cream and I always eat the whole pint in one sitting. Nothing needs to be changed about this ice cream, please never discontinue. Is there anyway to get this in a quart?";;;

Cinnamon Buns,Bethany Grotto,2017-05-25,5,I love the dough balls!,0,0,"I had this at my local cinema and was instantly hooked. Move over Chunky Monkey... you have been usurped by this cinnamon dream. It's delicious, just the right level of cinnamon flavour. I love it!";;;
Cinnamon Buns
author: CW1984
title: Cinnamon Bun Heaven!!!!
text;;;: This is my absolute favorite flavor!! It’s not a sweet overload. All of the flavors marry together very well. I love the cinnamon bun dough pieces! Please NEVER EVER EVER EVER get rid of this!;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns
author: morgan123
title: Best Ice Cream Ever
text;;;: Every time I go to the store I search out this ice cream because it is easily the best thing I have ever had. The first time I tried it I accidentally ate the whole pint in under 30 minutes.;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns
author: hollyxo
title: Best flavor ever
text;;;: Im so happy I bought this flavor ice cream. It was so amazing! There were so many pieces of dough my mouth is watering just thinking about it! I have to get myself some more!;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns,johnc,2017-06-16,5,Fantastic flavors!,0,0,"I love cinnamon buns, so I was thrilled to find this flavor! There is cinnamon in every bite...just like a cinnamon bun. It's hard to control myself with this flavor.";;;
Cinnamon Buns
author: sydneyc
title: My favorite ice cream by far!!
text;;;: Always a classic. Was delighted to see my Walmart carried this flavor when I moved to a new town. I will always buy this flavor over any other flavor or brand any day;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns,isabella,2018-09-15,5,Best Flavor I Have Ever Had,0,0,"I have been buying this flavor since I came out the womb. I rarely buy anything else. For me, this is the best flavour of Ben and Jerry's Ice Cream out there.";;;

Cinnamon Buns,KellyR76,2018-04-07,5,Best ice cream EVER!,0,0,"I don’t like chocolate, so finding a good ice cream flavor other than vanilla is difficult. This is the BEST!!! And all my chocolate eating friends agree.";;;
Cinnamon Buns
author: LizzyC
title: The Most Delicious Ice Cream of ALL Time
text;;;: I am in love with this flavor. So many cinnamon roll chunks and the cinnamon swirl?!?! Forget it. The most delicious ice cream of ALL time.;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns
author: SirWased
title: The best of your Ice Creams sold in Denmark!
text;;;: I have had this ice cream quite a few times and I've had to limit myself to one quart every 3 months because I could live off of this one.;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns
author: Melv
title: OMG!!!! The Best Flavor Hands Down
text;;;: My hubby bought this flavor and let me tell you I couldn’t get enough my gosh B&J you have outdone yourselves with this one;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns
title: DELICIOUS
text;;;: I picked this out when i was 12 because I knew I loved cinnamon buns.. this was 10x better than any icecream I’ve ever had.;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns,Jebber007,2018-01-21,5,Amazing flavor,0,0,"This flavor is by far the most addictive flavor. It's virtually impossible to stop eating, so o typically finish a pint.";;;

title: NO NO NO!!!!!
text;;;: Why is this no longer at my Target and on clearance at Walmart???! Don’t you dare discontinue this glorious flavor.....;;;

title: Hands down the best
text;;;: We love cinnamon buns and when I saw this at the store I had to get some for the whole family and we all loved it.;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns,CHERI,2019-12-04,5,This is crack!!!,0,0,"OMG, this is the best in my opinion! SO SO SO good. Add more strussel and chunks, overload that sucker. SO GOOD!";;;

author: Cinnaloveruk
title: Bring to the uk
text;;;: So many times flavours don’t reach the UK. Is this because all of the additives that you Americans love so much?;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns,HannahYummy,2018-01-27,5,This is literally the most amazing ice cream,0,0,"This is by far my fav B&J’s ice cream, I wish it was easier to find! 10/10 would always eat again.";;;
Cinnamon Buns
author: cln1
title: To die for
text;;;: The best ice cream I have ever had! Every time we go to the store I can't resist getting it!;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns
author: Birdy
title: Rich flavor!
text;;;: In my top three. Rich flavor. They want eleven more letters but its all about the flavor;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns
author: Iloveicecream1234
title: Best Ice Cream Ever!
text;;;: I consistently buy this ice cream! It is my favorite because of its texture and taste!;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns,Maccy14,2019-11-19,5,Pure filth. In a good way.,0,0,"Ridiculously good, it's just not available in a lot of places like the others. Shame.";;;

Cinnamon Buns,Rebekah0509,2019-02-12,5,Careless Whisper,0,0,"I have been a dedicated Ben&Jerry's customer for a long time. First, I fell in love with Cherry Garcia. It was perfect. Finally ice cream had enough flavor with actual pieces of cherry! But then things changed...and I grew up. I grew up and I realized that my heart truly belonged to Half Baked. We were true soulmates. And I have eaten an average of a pint a week, ever since then, for years... I was certain nothing could ever superced perfection!!";;;
Cinnamon Buns
author: Nick
title: Cinnamony Goodness
text;;;: This flavor is a true cinnamon lover's delight! I eat it at least once a week.;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns
author: Icecream991
title: Delicious!!!
text;;;: This is my favorite Ben & Jerry's ice cream. I just cant seem to get enough!;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns
author: crazyk
title: Just like a baked Cinnamon Rol
text;;;: Great flavor! My favorite of Ben &Jerry's! Taste like a real cinnamon bun!;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns
author: RyanQ
title: BEST FLAVOR
text;;;: My absolute favorite flavor! If you like cinnamon rolls you'll love it.;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns
author: Dian
title: Amazing
text;;;: Tried first time at Ben and Jerry Vermont factory. Favorite flavor now.;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns

title: BEST EVER
text;;;: PLEASE always make this!!! LOVE LOVE LOVE!!!! Cinnamon Buns 4 ever!;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns
author: Carebear
title: Yummo
text;;;: Just tried this flavor and it's by far my favorite!!!;;;

name: Cinnamon Buns
author: Beachlover24
title: Best Ice Cream Ever!!
text;;;: Best ice cream and best flavor EVER! So delicious!;;;

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!,Bean,2018-07-08,5,All time favorite!!,3,0,"Discovered this flavor in a scoop store in Kingston, Ontario years ago. It became my go to flavor. I would hunt it down where ever we moved to. ;") No other coffee ice cream is strong enough and has just the right balance of chocolate and coffee like this one. Got my niece hooked on it too. Sadly she lives in Vienna
author: Austria and can't get it. Any way this great flavor can make it to the EU?? Please! Lots of Europeans like strong coffee. In the meantime my niece came to visit Boston
date: MA this summer and she was very excited to have it again. It was a good as she remembered.""";;

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!,ccbbb lover,2017-10-19,5,Thank goodness for CCBBB,4,1,"I was so disappointed when my favorite B&J flavor (Coffee Heath Bar Crunch) changed to Coffee Toffee Crunch and the flavor went way down hill. I decided to try CCBBB. It is on beyond delicious. It is how I reward myself after hard work in the garden, or walking with my Mastiff, or other causes for exhaustion or for celebration. When I finished my taxes the first thing I did was grab the CCBBB out of the freezer ..... my reward to myself. I have recommended CCBBB to others and their reactions have been positive. Thank you B&J! By the way --- the Mastiff has to stick to vanilla!";;;

Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!,I Love Ice Cream,2017-07-28,5,THE BEST!,7,0,"I am both a chocolate and coffee lover, and this is the single best coffee ice cream I've ever tried. The coffee flavor is so strong and there are many large chunks of rich espresso bean chocolate pieces. So much flavor...this ice cream really does pack a punch. Please NEVER discontinue this flavor, Ben and Jerry's! I stock up every month. :)";;;
Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!
title: The GOAT of coffee ice cream
text;;;: I’ve tried all of the coffee flavored ice cream I can find in local stores and this one is easily the best. My only issue is that’s it’s not carried at many stores and I’ve had trouble finding it in the last month. Thankfully the B&J team assured me it’s not discontinued but the production is behind because of the pandemic. When things are back to normal please get this in more stores so more people will discover this incredibly indulgent and amazing treat!;;;

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!
author: Katie W
title: Strong
text;;;: I bought this after a 3rd shift at work to get me through the rest of morning class at school. Its really quite strong and kept me quite awake!;;;

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!
author: luna09
title: Simply the best!
text;;;: I adore this flavor. I have become quite a fan of stronger coffee over the years so this one is a winner. The coffee ice cream is definitely strong and just sweet enough. The espresso fudge pieces give a nice texture contrast and are a lot like eating chocolate covered espresso beans. Fortunately there are at least a couple stores in my area that have this one and I hope they never stop carrying it. Please never discontinue this flavor.;;;

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!
author: wnabmedic
title: GET BUZZED
text;;;: I've been waiting for this flavor to come back to my area FOREVER! #InLove;;;

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!,Jmcorral504,2017-11-04,5,Great coffee flavor!,3,0,"I used to purchase a different brand of coffee ice cream and they no longer make it...BUT then I found you! Oh how I love you coffee coffee buzz buzz! I have tried almost every brand of so called ""coffee"" ice cream and nothing even comes close to the strong, creamy coffee flavor of this wonderful ice cream...can you tell how much I LOVE this ice cream?";;;

Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!,Dishon,2017-10-22,5,BEST (next to EVERYTHING BUT THE),2,0,"This is one of my FAVORITES. I first tried this in the B&J on my college campus and fell in love with it. Unfortunately, when I got home, I couldn't find the flavor anywhere I was bummed. That was about 5 years ago. I never wouldve thought to check the company website. I just thought it was a discontinued flavor but NOPE, I see that for my area they're selling it exclusively at Target. Now all I need are coupons.";;;
Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!
author: DR725
title: Absolute All Time FAVORITE FLAVOR!!
text;;;: I am literally addicted to this flavor!! I love it!! It’s the best coffee flavored ice cream ever. I know I sound like I’m exaggerating but I honestly mean every word. I buy at least 2 pints every weekend for my cheat meals. Eat like half a pint for the weekend nights. I’ve tried so many other coffee flavors because it’s one of my favorites but this one tops them all the strength of the coffee flavor is the best it doesn’t have that weird too creamy taste it’s just like adding some milk and sugar to a cup of espresso and a side of some dark chocolate which is honestly the best flavor combo ever just pairs so well. And I love the dark chocolate espresso pieces; I used to buy dark chocolate covered espresso beans and eat them and it reminds me of that with the light crunchy-ness of the beans in the chocolate. My literal worst fear is that I go to my grocery store one of these fridays and I find out that this flavor has been pulled or discontinued! If this flavor ever got taken away that would be the worst ever!! I mean I think I buy out this flavor at my store alone and waiting for it to get shipped sucks and is a pain. This is a lot just for a flavor of ice cream but as I said before I love it and I’m addicted to it. It’s the only coffee flavor ice cream I’ll buy. Thank for making it!!;;

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!,JMQCC,2018-07-16,5,OMG! Where have you been all of my life!!!,1,0,"This is, by far, one of the best flavors I have ever tasted! Tried it on a whim, not a coffee drinker or lover of coffee, but because the store did not have my normal go-to flavor (NY Fudge Chunk), I thought I would give it a try. Now, I am eagerly searching for grocers in my son's home state so that he can buy it and love it too!";;;

Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!,Mala,2017-09-28,5,One of my faves!,1,0,"I live in Taiwan, and we sadly get very limited flavors of B&J's here. However, this one is one I'm happy to have. Excellent coffee flavor with just the right amount of chocolate. I'm ashamed to say how many pints I ate this summer, when it was just too hot to even go outside (except to the Carrefour store for more ice cream!).";;;

Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!,livkerp,2017-11-16,5,The literal best,1,0,"This is my all time favorite ice cream flavor. The only downside is that I can eat it all in one sitting! It is so good, my family and I are obsessed. We even travel to get it because it is only available in certain stores around us. Wish it was available everywhere! Truly an underrated flavor!";;;

Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!,Bre86,2017-12-14,5,Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz,1,0,"Hello from HOUSTON, TEXAS!!! All do B&J ice cream is delicious, but CCBBB has my heart. Every bite has a scrumptious bit of espresso...its like you have to savor the entire pint in one sitting. I load up EVERYTIME I SEE MORE THAN ONE. PLEASE KEEP THIS FLAVOR GOING....ITS MY SPA DAY FAVORITE!!!";;;

Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!,jonpeg,2017-07-17,5,Love this flavor!,1,0,"We love this flavor, it has good, strong coffee flavor, and with the espresso fudge it's the best coffee ice cream out there! We haven't found it near us for a while and are glad to see it is still being made. Thanks Ben and Jerry!";;;
Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!
author: Bill13
title: Lost Product
text;;;: I absolutely love this flavor and so many stores near me stopped carrying it. I have actually abandoned a shopping cart and left the store when I found my favorite no longer on the shelf.;;;

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!
author: FuzzyGut
title: Simple awesomeness
text;;;: This was not a hard one to love. Delicious ice cream with delicious espresso chocolate chips! Simple? Yes. Boring? Heck no! It’s so good and kept me digging till the end of the pint!;;;

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!
author: Good stuff
title: I live for these
text;;;: Really great coffee flavor. These are totally worth trying if you dig coffee flavored ice cream. I would dive over others to get the last one in the case. These really are that good.;;;

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!
author: Amby
title: Delicious
text;;;: This flavor is by far my favorite. If you're a fan of coffee and ice cream I highly recommend trying it. The only disappointment is most stores in my area don't carry it.;;;

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!,Trishia,2019-05-06,5,"hands down, the BEST COFFEE ICE CREAM",1,0,"I have been buying this since it first came out, and EVERYTIME (and he eats ice cream nightly) he eats this, he says' GOD I LOVE THIS ICE CREAM!";;;
Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!
author: fansnotes
title: Coffee lovers' dream ice-cream!
text;;;: Rich coffee flavor (not like the milky latte flavor of most other brands) and the chips augment that taste with crunchy texture!;;;

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!,BuzzBuzz,2020-07-25,5,Best ice cream ever!,1,0,"If I were on death row, my last meal would be a gallon of Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz. Just joking -- it'd be two gallons.";;;
Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!
author: Cyndy
title: Love This Ice Cream Flavor
text;;;: Coffee and chocolate are my favorite things to drink and eat. I get both in this cream! This is best ice cream ever!;;;

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!
author: ALM77
title: EXCELLENT
text;;;: EXCELLENT coffee ice cream. I love the coffee and chunks of espresso chocolate.;;;

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!,Coffee dreams,2018-01-08,5,"Really, no words can describe the awesomeness",1,0,"Best coffee ice cream in the world, hands down!! Never tasted better.";;;
Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!
author: Lynda with a y
title: Disappointed
text;;;: I was so sad when my favorite coffee Heath bar crunch was replaced by toffee heath bar crunch. It is a total loss of flavor profiles - especially the change to the coffee base. Then the proportions changed in coffee coffee buzz buzz buzz so there is so little coffee ice cream in most of the pints I buy that I end up with at least 1/3 of the pint filled with the excess chocolate pieces after digging thru the pint searching for the tase of the worlds best coffee ice cream. I haven’t stopped buying pints because I love the coffee flavor and a portion of the buzz buzz is perfect.;;;

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!,Midnight Rider,2019-07-06,5,My favorite go-to flavor!,0,0,"I love my coffee, and I had high expectations for this when it got my attention. It instantly became my all-time favorite, kicking Americone Dream out of the ring for a while. It's not overly sweet in a toothaching way, and the espresso component isn't bitter either. It's a nice little pick-me up when you're wanting your caffeine fix and a nice way to cool down on a hot day.";;;

Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!,Tallkid86,2019-11-08,2,No your best work,0,1,"I just recently came across this in the store and thought I would try it because how bad could coffee ice cream be? Unfortunately, I quickly regretted buying this products. The ""coffee"" tasted awful and the chunks tasted weird. Idk if the pint its self was just being sold by the store old but it didn't even look appetizing either.";;;
Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!
author: Gail26
title: Love Love Love!!! Coffee Coffee Buzz Buzz!!!
text;;;: Started off with Coffee Coffee Buzz Buzz at my local Ben & Jerry's Shop in the '90's (it moved - & so did I.) It gave me a hit of that instant buzz buzz in the surreal shop setting reminiscent of the Grateful Dead & California vibes of the '80's. I could sit with my small son & continue my California Dreamin' of yesteryear.;;;

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!,MakeMore CCBBB,2020-09-19,5,Best Ice cream ever,0,0,"I consider this the single best commercial ice cream flavor I have ever had. Given that I can never find it, you must not be keeping up with the demand, that is if you made more you should be able to sell more and make more money. HELP! Please make it mare available!";;;

Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!,Jackytheripper,2020-06-07,5,"If you like coffee, this ice cream is for you",0,0,"This ice cream is so freaking yummy! I've never had anything like it. The fudge is so good and somehow you can chew it and it's crispy, then it melts. And the coffee is a true kick to the face coffee flavor. Perfection!";;;

Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!,HollyA,2020-07-19,5,Perfect balance,0,0,"Great balance of coffee ice cream and fudge chunks. The fudge chunks have some coffee on them and it is heavenly. One of my favorites! Sometimes it is hard to find in stores...when I see it, I buy 2!";;;
Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!
author: richy
title: coffee tastes mild but it is nice and creamy
text;;;: Loved the crunchy pieces contrasting with the smooth ice cream. Coffee could be stronger though;;;

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!
author: KitterKat
title: Best of the best!
text;;;: This is my all time favorite flavor. I’ve always loved coffee flavored ice cream but this takes it up several notches of awesome. Never get rid of this flavor!!!;;;

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!
author: Tx95
title: My 2nd Favorite Flavor.
text;;;: I grab this when I'm when I'm not in the mood for Chunky Monkey. It's like a mocha-chip with a bit of a kick. I like it. It's pretty good.;;;

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!
author: mray
title: Best flavor!
text;;;: I have been hooked on this flavor for quite a few years and am sad that it my grocery chain shows that it has been discontinued!;;;

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!
author: Porsha
title: Awesome flavor
text;;;: Got this flavor for free cone day and it was amazing. Loved the pieces of coffee grounds inside the chocolate chunks.;;;

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!,,2019-12-21,5,It’s AMAZING!,0,0,"It’s so addicting. It’s hard to control myself and try not to eat the whole pint, I buy this in like batches.";;;
Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!,coffeelover77,2019-07-13,5,"Love the coffee, love the chocolate",0,0,Wonderful taste -- my only regret is that my local shoprite frequently runs out.;;;
Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!
author: Maryann
title: Nothing Better
text;;;: The flavor of this can't be replicated. Any other coffee ice cream is awful.;;;

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!
author: Espressozombie
title: LOVE
text;;;: My all time favorite out of all ice creams and I can't ever find it anymore!;;;

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!
author: Steamer
title: Best flavor I've had
text;;;: Great mix of coffee ice cream and chocolate chink. Not the usual flavors.;;;

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!
author: J101019
title: My favorite icecream ever
text;;;: The espresso chocolate chucks with this icecream are amazing.;;;

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!
author: Buzz Buzz Buzz
title: The best
text;;;: Ben & Jerry have outdone themselves on this ice cream;;;

name: Coffee Coffee BuzzBuzzBuzz!
author: Jos726
title: My favorite!
text;;;: This is by far my favorite flavor! I love it!!! YUM!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,huntp,2018-04-22,1,What a shame they replaced the Heath Bar.,79,29,"I love coffee ice cream and heath bars, but try to eat them infrequently due to needing to watch my sugar and weight. On a nearly 90 degree day here in NH, I decided to indulge. What a horrible disappointment. The ice cream is ok, but after a few bites of toffee, I was done and tossed the pint. I found myself avoiding the crunch. So disappointing. I appreciate your dedication to non GMO, but I prefer strong labeling. I am a big girl, and can make my own choices. I just won't bother with B&J's if they sacrifice taste. This is not health food, there is no way this variant is any better for you than the Heath version, let's not kid ourselves.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Eliza
title: Why isn’t Ben & Jerry’s listening to its consumers
text;;;: After you changed the formula and removed heath bars from this ice cream it’s tasted awful. I ate this ice cream every day for years when it was Coffee Heath Bar Crunch. This new Coffee Toffee Crunch is dreadful. Consumers have been complaining since you made the change and you have not improved the ice cream. I know how Business works so I am sure part of the problem is that you are lock into a contract with the new Toffee company but you are losing sales therefore you should get a new supplier. I keep waiting and checking for you to fix this formula so it could taste like it used to. Very disappointed.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: ToffeeTastesLikePoo
title: Certifications over Taste
text;;;: Not sure why a Ben & Jerry's employee responded to another customer that Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch wasn't a replacement for Coffee Heath Bar Crunch. On this very page you have a video stating: Coffee Heath Bar Crunch has a new name!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,paige18,2018-08-14,1,Another sad customer longing for heath bar return,23,5,"Anyone who likes this flavor must never have tried Coffee Heath Bar Crunch because this is a sad replacement at best. And yes, I’ve read the multiple replies from B&J staff stating this flavor was not meant to replace it, but as others have pointed out, there is a video on the flavor’s page announcing its ‘new name’. I’ve bought this flavor more than once since its switch years ago, hoping for improvement over time, but still the toffee leaves a terrible aftertaste and the coffee ice cream lacks its once creamy, rich flavor. Ben & Jerry’s commitment to non-GMO products is admirable but please don’t this sacrifice the taste! Bring back the Heath Bar or give us a better replacement!";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Jeremy,2018-05-10,1,My favorite snack is no more.,38,6,"I eat a relatively healthy diet and the coffee/toffee Ben and Jerry's was always my one real guilty pleasure that I would indulge in whenever I wanted something sweet. I admire the company's dedication to non-GMO/fair-trade products as I often eat a diet as low in non-GMO products as I can, but this new product really is dreadful. There is little flavor in the ice cream, and the toffee tastes like what you would expect from a sugar-free candy bar. I have bought it twice now, the first time was a surprise, and the second time was me hoping it was just an isolated mistake. Both were bad enough that I threw them away within a few bites. Major disappointment and I hope they take these reviews to heart and reconsider the product change.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Holls,2019-08-06,1,"If I could give no stars, I would.",7,1,"Coffee Heath Bar crunch has been my favorite flavor of icecream since I can remember. I decided to try the new product because I figured it wouldn’t be too much different from the original. I can’t pretend to eat it. Knowing what the flavor was to this?! No comparison. I read all of the responses from Ben and Jerry’s on this site and they claim that the point was to not replace the product. If it wasn’t to replace why was Coffee Heath Bar crunch discontinued? Have the Non-GMO (I mean, we’re talking about a treat here) and the original one if it wasn’t meant to be a replacement. I haven’t bought a Ben and Jerry’s product since and I used to have my freezer full. Such a disappointment.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Disappointed Customer,2017-06-23,1,It seems no one is listening,32,5,"This ice cream is just disgusting. You say you weren't replacing Coffee Heath Bar Crunch but you were, I red it at the time. I get the GMO thing but as others have said ice cream isn't healthy and we can make our own choices. You keep telling people it is a manufacturing error IT'S NOT the ice cream is just BAD. Why are you treating your loyal customers like this. Fix it or agree that you can't reproduce one of the best flavored ice creams you had. It doesn't make the top 10 anymore but Coffee Heath Bar Crunch was always in the top 10.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Cnyc,2017-07-09,1,oh no no it has changed,36,5,"I noticed the name of my favorite ice cream changed in the grocery store today and tried it anyway - I figured swapping toffee bars wouldn't make that big of a difference but the coffee base changed too. It's no longer rich, the toffee no longer produces that sticky liquidy toffee pool. Instead, this toffee melts into a pretty gross dark brown grainy mess. The left over flavor is just yucky. Don't buy this. CHBC is gone and this is not a replacement.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Ommmmmm
title: A poor replacement
text;;;: Coffee Heath bar crunch was my favorite flavor.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,tcwoody99,2017-10-05,1,Disappointed,6,1,"I have recently decided to make my way through all of the B&J flavors (I have gone through an embarrassing number of pints embarrassinly fast..) and this was one that excited me at first sight. I love coffee ice cream and I love toffee, so I thought the two together would be a great mix. Sadly, the coffee flavor was very weak, and the toffee tasted almost metallicy. I thought maybe it was just a bad bite, but every piece of toffee had that same metallic taste, and all of the ice cream that touched the toffee was given that flavor as well. Overall, I was highly disappointed, and very saddened because this was the first flavor I have tried that I did not like. I will be throwing away my pint and not buying this flavor again.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,brianctoner,2017-04-30,1,Sad Face,21,2,"I love coffee, I love toffee, I don't care for this flavor. Strangely metallic flavored toffee. I bought this a few years ago and hoped that it had improved. Well, it did improve, but it still isn't great. It went from inedible to tolerable. This ice cream tasting bad just makes me sad. I don't want a refund, I don't want coupons, I just want this ice cream to taste good.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Madelyn,2018-10-09,1,Yuck!,5,0,"I wish I had read the reviews, this ice cream is disgusting! I love Ben and Jerry’s and like to try new flavors but this was a huge let down. The ice cream has little flavor and the toffee is indescribably bad. Like other reviewers said it tastes metallic and like a sugar free candy. The texture is grainy unlike other Ben and Jerry’s ice creams. I was wondering if I got a weird pint until I read the other reviews. I threw the pint away it, it was inedible. I expect more from Ben and Jerry’s.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: VellyBelly
title: Nothing good lasts
text;;;: I bought this the other day and was soooooo ready to dig in. Boy was I disappointed. Immediately there was a difference. The coffee has no flavor. It lost all the richness. Oh and the toffee bars. Ugh! Totally gross. This tastes like the diet version. I understand why you guys made the changes and I'm glad to support the cause. I guess I'll just have to find a new ice cream.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,KentM,2018-07-29,2,Not near good as previous Heath Bar Crunch,5,0,"Wife and I just bought a pint of the Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch because it has been a year at least since we had one. Today was a test to see if maybe had gone back to Heath Bar toffee. NOT. Whatever kind of toffee being used now is, apparently lots less money is the usual reason for change...big mistake. The Heath Bar version, I am betting, far outsold the present blend. The present toffee blend...we did not eat much of the pint, maybe total 3 spoonfulls. The rest...we tossed into trash.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
title: My guilty pleasure is gone
text;;;: I used to keep track of what stores had the Coffee Heath Bar Crunch for those times when you just need a good pint of ice cream and a movie. Knowing that it isn't out there anymore is sad in a way the surprises me. And it's not like an old Atari you can find on eBay. It's just... gone. I didn't hear about the change but noticed it was really hard to find the flavor when I was looking for it. Then I found the Coffee Toffee Crunch and thought they might have just changed the name. Then I tasted it and thought I must have gotten a bad pint. Then I read the label and realized my favorite flavor was gone. I can only hope someday they'll bring it back. Maybe Health Bar can meet the free trade non-GMO requirements? What's so wrong with GMO anyway? Isn't that just called science? Isn't that how we cure disease?;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
title: Love the coffee and the toffee!
text;;;: Maybe it's because I had never tried the original. But I love this flavor! It is one of my go tos! The coffee ice cream is delicious and the toffee is a tasty buttery crunch! Mmmm!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Zorg,2020-06-12,2,Bring Back the Original,2,1,"Let me be clear: I want to give this 1 star for how disappointed I am. I threw in the extra recognition because the idea is amazing. I was fortunate enough to try the original with Heath, but sometimes I wish I never knew how heavenly it was. It hurts so much to lose my favorite ice cream flavor strictly due to an ingredient change. The toffee is mediocre and reminds me of the cheap caramel from my childhood. It’s a critical difference from the original, more buttery and crunchy delight. Please, for my sanity, bring back the original flavor or just put this flavor to rest. I can’t take any more disappointment when I see it next to my second favorite flavor, skipping this one every time...";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Me2me,2018-01-11,1,Doesn't taste right,4,1,"I'm so upset at the taste of this ice cream that I made my way to you're website just to express my concerns. Okay so I love coffee, especially coffee ice cream. When I stumbled upon this ice (which was in sale) I thought I found a a yummy treat. Boy was u wrong and disappointed. The coffee flavor isn't bad. But the toffee. Yuck. It has like a sour milk metal taste to it. And no its not expired and in eating the ice cream with a plastic spoon. Something is just not right. And with the other reviews, I know it's not only me who feels this way.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,GiantBlue2,2018-01-10,1,Never again!,4,1,"I rarely buy B&J's but the CHBC was my fave, so when asked what kind of ice cream I wanted with Christmas dessert it was the first thing I thought of. I could hardly wait! Imagine the disappointment when met with this horrid excuse for coffee/toffee ice cream! I get the whole non-GMO thing, but is there no one making a decent non-GMO toffee bar that you could use? One bite and I knew it wasn't Heath - though I hadn't heard you were making a change. I complained pretty vocally so my sister actually showed me the container to prove it wasn't a generic brand. It was then that I noticed the change in the name. I wish I had known. What a waste! If Karamel Sutra wasn't so good, I wouldn't even look at the Ben & Jerry's section of my store's freezer.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Sijnaanik,2018-05-03,1,WHY????,6,1,"Coffee Heath Bar Crunch was one of my favorite ice creams of all time, but I can't even eat this. I get that some people have an irrational fear of GMOs, but that is no reason to manufacture a bad-tasting product. If you really can't use Heath then find some other toffee that tastes good;" I imagine it can't be that hard to do. Until then I'm not buying this (and since you discontinued most of my other favorites
author: my overall Ben and Jerry's purchases have been and will be infrequent).""";;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,lily14,2017-08-31,1,Gross,4,0,"Awful, metallic, bland taste. CHBC was infinitely better. Although B&J claims it was not a replacement, despite being dished out directly after CHBC was discontinued, it is clear that this was meant to appease CHBC lovers. B&J could not have been farther off in this assumption. This ice cream went straight into the trash after five people took a bite and determined something was ""off"" years ago. It was purchased again recently with the same conclusion. Awful.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,nyc ice cream,2017-04-25,1,Awful since they dropped the heath bars,13,2,"Coffee Heath Bar Crunch was my favorite B&J flavor. Bought this when they first made the change and thought I'd gotten a spoiled batch. As others have noted, terrible metallic taste, and the ""toffee"" tasted bad and had the wrong consistency--like a crunchy sponge instead of dense. Have never bought this flavor again.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Jtc3
title: I miss the old recipe
text;;;: Today I was daydreaming about the original toffee heath bat crunch. It's been over 2 yrs since I've had been and jerrys. This flavor was the last one that I ate. It was horrible. Of course I was comparing it to coffee Heath bar crunch which was magical tasting.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,kkudlich,2018-11-02,1,Let’s not fool ourselves.,7,1,"As much as you insist that this isn’t a replacement for Coffee Heath Bar Crunch, it absolutely is, and it’s a failure. How did you manage to find the grossest toffee bars on the planet to put in this abomination? And the coffee ice cream— icy and terrible. Awful, and substitution for the old delight that was Coffee Heath Bar Crunch— a flavor to which I would credit my bachelor degree, as it did its part in getting me through college.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Liz88
title: If you can't do it with the heath bar....
text;;;: So coffee Heath bar crunch was my jam. I agree with many of the other reviewers that the toffee used now for this ice cream is really bad and leaves a bitter taste.... so disappointing because the old version was amazingly delicious. I know your comitting to non-gmo products so perhaps partner with a different toffee maker? or make a plain coffee ice cream. B&J's coffee ice cream base is great so I I would just buy that and buy my own Heath bars!!!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,DisappointedPortland,2018-09-03,1,Unfortunate ... not at all the taste I remember.,6,0,"I love the coffee flavors from Ben and Jerry’s and “Coffee Heath Bar Crunch” was my all time favorite so I figured this might come close... and no, sadly it doesn’t. The toffee is grainy and sweet, tastes very little of anything. The coffee ice cream is much less richly flavored, sigh. I had a few bites and tossed the pint.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Whale,2018-03-10,1,Worst Marketing Choice Ever,6,2,"I understand what Ben&Jerry's is trying to do, but I no longer have a Ben&Jerry's flavor that I like enough to buy. Coffee Heath Bar Crunch was my favorite flavor and I bought it every single week. I tried this new one, thinking it must be the same thing with a new name;" However
author: this toffee is horrible and almost tastes metallic. The taste of the ice cream is completely different. You're better off just buying a different brand of plain coffee ice cream and adding Heath Bars

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,William Q,2018-02-01,5,BEST FLAVOR EVER!!!,5,4,"I can't believe I am seeing these negative review's. I am a fan of ice cream in general. I live in Schenectady NY and if anyone doesn't know this where some of the best ice cream in the country comes from. That said... This is my absolute FAVORITE flavor of all time. Awesome flavors. Together! But it is hard to find now and there's similar flavors out there but none with big chunks of toffee in it! Plus the coffee flavor compliments the toffee so well. I usually stick to my local brands, but this is by far one of the best out there!!! Why can't I find it anywhere guys!?";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Michael,2017-10-10,1,Go To The Graveyard Already!,6,1,"After being a huge fan of the CHBC, I was quite upset when the new flavor came out and still am. The coffee ice cream and toffee bar is absolutely disgusting. The toffee doesn't have the flavor that Heath Bar or Skor does, and the coffee ice cream is also horrible. I asked somebody else to try this flavor after it changed and they also thought it was disgusting.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Pamela56
title: It says what it is. Great title
text;;;: This is my favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor. I have had trouble finding it in my location 65109 and 65101. I love the coffee flavor with the flavor of the heath bar and the crunch of this ice cream. I am gluten free and so may flavors have cookie dough which automatically eliminates those options. Love this ice cream. Please start delivering this back to the zip code locations of 65101 and 65109. I have not been able to find this flavor in Jefferson City. Miss this ice cream which is what prompted me to make this review. Love the ice cream flavor of Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Juliennes,2018-02-27,1,What a disappointment....,4,2,"I don't eat a lot of ice cream in order to try and avoid too much sugar. But I wanted a treat and Coffee Heath Bar has always been my favorite ice cream. I picked up a pint and was so looking forward to the indulgence. What an absolute disappointment it was. I originally thought it was me...maybe I had dreamed it up in my head that it had tasted better than it did in reality. I had some more the next day and it still was not good. I had my son try some and he agreed. I was not going crazy. The toffee pieces are just awful. I am all for the non-GMO movement but honest to God, I would gladly take the Heath Bars back regardless. It was a delicious treat that is now a huge let down. I truly hope that I can find some replacement :(";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Dave P WA,2018-08-20,1,non-GMO isn't really science,10,1,"Wow, eliminating my favorite ice cream for this dreadful concoction for completely non-scientific pseudo-science mumbo jumbo fakery reasons is just stupid.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: RichardA
title: Bring back the Heath Bar!
text;;;: This is very disappointing stuff. I'm sure that the company that makes this tasteless toffee is very happy to have actually found someone to buy it. What's next...Phish Food with actual fish?;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: RaeU7916
title: Oh me goodness!!
text;;;: Saw this little guy in the freezer section and thought to my self my two favorite things so why now try it?! Got home and had a bit and it rocked my world. This flavor is amazing!! Delicious notes of coffee and massive chunks of toffee!! Pure delicious bliss for me. I went back and bought two more!!!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Madelyn,2018-10-09,1,Yuck!,2,0,"I wish I had read the reviews, this ice cream is digusting! I love Ben and Jerry’s and like to try new flavors but this was a huge let down. The ice cream has little flavor and the toffee is indescribably bad. Like other reviewers said it tastes metallic and like a sugar free candy. The texture is grainy unlike other Ben and Jerry’s ice creams. I was wondering if I got a weird pint until I read the other reviews. I threw the pint away it, it was inedible. I expect more from Ben and Jerry’s especially at $5/pint.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Andrew P,2019-01-04,1,Metallic taste still there,2,0,"It’s really not hard to make great-tasting buttery toffee candy. I used to do it all the time in my own kitchen, and I liked mine just as much as I like Heath bars. Please find a supplier of non-GMO toffee that doesn’t taste like a nickel-cadmium battery. Geez, maybe I’ll start up my own toffee company and underbid whomever you’ve contracted with just to save my formerly favorite ice cream flavor. (Well, second favorite of all time after Dastardly Mash — yeah, I go back that far.)";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Susan,2019-06-04,5,Delicious,13,5,"This is my favourite flavour of Ben and Jerry's. The contrast between the rich coffee ice cream and the sweet crunchy toffee is lovely. My two main grocery stores appear to have stopped carrying it, and that makes me very sad. (I found this site because I was searching to see if Ben and Jerry's had discontinued it.)";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,SarahBucky,2018-05-20,1,Terrible!,3,0,"Would have given it zero stars, if possible! This flavor is awful! The toffee is terrible! I could and do make better toffee in my kitchen. This was a bottomline decision. GMO, Fair Trade blah...blah, blah...blah, blah. Ruining one of the best BnJ's flavors was a bottomline decision by the parent company, Unilever. If BnJ's was purchased by Hershey, Heath bars would still be in use.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Theresa
title: Sucks
text;;;: I used to love your coffee heath bar ice cream. But then you took away the heath and put in cheap toffee. Yuck!!! You totally ruined my once favorite ice cream by getting rid of heath for cheap toffee. Now I will NEVER by any Ben & Jerry's ice cream.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Jfer,2017-06-04,1,Do not like new toffee bar,4,0,"I have tried the new blend of coffee toffee twice and the toffee is disgusting. Coffee heath bar crunch use to be my favorite flavor, but I cannot even chew the new toffee without gagging.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Kathy1950
title: Horrible replacement!
text;;;: Miss the full flavor heath bar and the big pieces. This is way off the mark leaving a nasty bitter taste from both the coffee ice cream and the toffee pieces. Will never buy this again.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Mik123,2020-02-27,1,Lost a long-time customer,1,1,"Coffee Heath Bar Crunch was one of my favorite indulgences ever since I started eating ice cream as a kid. Upon trying this changed version, I was so repulsed by the new toffee that I feel like I can no buy B&J's in the hopes that hear us on this particular flavor. I can at some level understand switching away from Heath Bars but there's plenty of ways to get a decent tasting non-Heath substitute (I've had a lot of good toffee in my time). But with this version it's like they're trying to make the worst toffee possible. B&J's product people please please please hear us!!! :(";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Pearson88,2018-09-09,1,Used to be my favorite,3,0,"Coffee Health Bar Crunch was my all time favorite ice cream. When I went. To get a pint and saw the name change I was confused, but figured maybe it was rebranding of some sort, but when I took it home and tried it I realized I was wrong. Honestly, the new toffee is gross and I couldn't even bring myself to eat t.f he pint. So disappointing!";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: MarkChana
title: Bring back Heath
text;;;: The new chocolate covered toffee pieces are terrible. They taste like ash. This was among my favorite flavors back when Heath bars were being used. Shame it fell so far.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: ConorC12
title: Flavor
text;;;: The ice cream wasn't even coffee flavored and the toffee pieces left a bad taste in my mouth;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Jo28,2018-08-30,5,Lip smacking,3,4,"My mum got this ice cream last week and we finished the whole thing in two days. The crunchy, crispy toffee pieces laced in fudge was heavenly. I just have to close my eyes and enjoy everytime a piece of toffee gets in my mouth. How this flavour got such low stars is something I would never understand in this lifetime. Mum’s a huge fan of coffee icecream and she just can’t stop raving about it. For sure this flavour is something we’ll keep coming back to. It’s like the gold standard of all coffee icecreams that exist in this world. Thanks a ton B&J.❤️";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,RF144,2020-01-26,5,I really like it!,1,2,"I just discovered Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch recently. I usually stick to Cherry Garcia, New York Super Fudge Chunk, and Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough. But when I realized how much I love toffee, and saw this in the store, I thought I'd give it a try. I'm not a coffee drinker, but what the hey? Boy, I really like this ice cream! The toffee pieces are much bigger than I expected, and that's a plus! I read some reviews from people who enjoyed the Heath bar version, but not this one. I'm sorry they don't like it, but I think it tastes great. Thanks, Ben and Jerry and the ice cream team!";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,CClW,2017-08-13,1,"Blood ice cream, anyone?",7,2,One time my neighbor talked me into licking her metal swingset. It was winter and I was a gullible kid.;;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: jkmm
title: Used to be my second favorite
text;;;: Decided to try again since I heard changes had been made but the toffee is still not good. Please keep trying!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Kimbe51
title: Gross
text;;;: Not the same since you are not using Heath Bar....I will no longer buy...It was gross...waste of money.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Katluv
title: Love it!
text;;;: Lover it so much!! Would buy again and again!! Miss the old version but still great!!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Wayne,2019-01-28,1,Changed formula??,5,1,"I was highly disappointed with the flavor, much different than the Heath Bar crunch my wife and I loved! We ate a few bites out of this pint and looked at each other the same way, like, what the heck did they do to our ice cream!!! Ugh!! By the way, what the heck DID you do to our ice cream!?!";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,efw63,2018-01-01,5,Love it!,5,1,"I hear that you may go back to the old recipe. If you do, I hope that you keep this one too! I love it! Some complain about the coffee being bitter, but it offsets the toffee perfectly. Love that toffee too! I have to make a special trip out of town to find it, but it's worth going after.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: ChelleS
title: Love Love Love
text;;;: This Ben & Jerry's flavor is dangerously delicious!!!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,CoffeeIceCreamLover,2018-02-23,5,YUM!,5,1,"I love coffee ice cream and this one did not disappoint! I found it creamy and delicious. There are other brands whose coffee leaves me with kind of a thick disgusting taste in my mouth, but not this one! It was absolutely yummy! As far as the crunch, that part was a nice treat.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,shannonCA,2018-06-19,5,Only one problem...,1,1,"Coffee Heath Bar Crunch was a magical concoction! Then it changed, and yes, it was gross and metallic for a while. But I have to say, it seems to have improved. It's not exactly the same as it used to be, but its much much better than the metallic one. I am 7 months pregnant now and it is 100% my biggest craving. Only one problem: I can never find it near me!!! The stores that are listed to carry this flavor never have it in stock, and now my poor husband is enslaved to finding it at all costs hahah! Please tell me how I can get my hands on a consistent supply!";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Grandma Leslie,2018-03-08,5,Absolutely Delicious,3,0,"This is by far my favorite Ice Cream. I have a very poor appetite and even my doctors tell me I can eat as much ice cream as I want, I usually finish this in 2 sittings. The only problem is that my Giant Eagle runs out of it very quickly.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Kjd313,2018-04-22,5,Definitely a favorite,5,4,"I love coffee ice cream, and toffee is my favorite type of candy, so this is obviously a winner for me. I've seen a lot of criticism about the toffee in this but I LOVE it. It's better than heath or skor in my opinion. It's much crunchier and it has more of a buttery taste. Every time I eat this ice cream I wish that I could buy the toffee itself to snack on, Maybe Ben & jerry's could start making candy too?!";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,COMtnMama,2018-04-10,5,Coffee & Toffee deliciousness,5,2,"This flavor is just so delightful. Robust coffee flavor tempered with the creaminess of ice cream, and crunchy toffee pieces, with bits of gooey goodness as you eat. It's really hard to get the right balance for a coffee ice cream, and somehow you found it! Such a great pairing with toffee! This Ben & Jerry's flavor I'll be returning to again and again!";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Ezcarter04
title: The single best ice cream in history
text;;;: I try to be objective but it’s hard because this is the best freaking ice cream ever. Coffee toffee is amazing (and I’m a Mormon) and I will die if it gets discontinued.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,meme,2017-08-10,5,Best Flavor Ever,4,1,"sorry to say i never tried your ""original"" but recently discovered this version: Coffee Toffee & must say: THANK YOU B & J - i am in love! cannot get enough of THIS flavor. gave up on anything else as a ""sweet treat"" won't be missing any of whatever it used to be. this is my Go-To, Gotta-Have-it ice cream, now & forever";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,,2017-05-14,5,Amazing combination of flavors,4,1,"I bought this after coming back from a vacation where they had toffee ice cream and was looking for something to fill the void it left, and I'm so glad I did! This coffee is not over powering in its flavor, but is enough to make you taste it. The toffee is super crunchy and in big prices scattered throughout!";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Former fan,2020-09-09,1,Still so disappointing,1,0,"Coffee Heath Bar used to be my absolute favorite ice cream and for years I bought it to the exclusion of everything else. Since the formula changed I've tried the ""new flavor"" (I get it, ""not a replacement"", sure) a few times and am always SO DISAPPOINTED. The toffee has a weird plastic-y texture and metallic aftertaste. This all natural non-GMO toffee tastes more fake than the good old Heath Bars ever did. And still missing is the absolute best part of the old flavor - the way the Heath Bars would melt a little into the ice cream leaving delicious gooey envelopes around the crunchy candy pieces. How long is B&J's Quality Assurance Team going to ""review"" all this negative feedback before they make a change? At least admit you aren't going to do anything, then I can just give up on it altogether.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Bells,2020-03-12,5,My all time favorite,1,0,"Honestly, I was shocked when I saw how poorly this rates on the website compared to most of Ben and Jerry's other flavors! I too loved Coffee Heath Bar Crunch, but this is a totally different product and I love it just as much. If you love toffee and coffee flavors, I think you'll enjoy this pint as much as I do. Just don't go in expecting Heath! This toffee reminds me more of a rich, handcrafted chocolate-covered toffee bar you'd find at a local chocolatiers shop. And it is so dang good.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,poTATEogeek,2020-02-24,5,Underrated gem,2,0,"Yalls trippin if you think this ain’t the bomb. It’s got toffee, it’s got coffee, it’s smooth, creamy, has a great amount of toffee bits you can nibble on in between scoop sessions or you could save it for last. It doesn’t matter how you eat it it’s still one of the greatest ice cream creations ever to come out of a pint container and into your mouth.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Meme1028
title: My favorite!
text;;;: The perfect blend of sweet coffee flavor & toffee crunch! I just wish my local store would carry it more.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Emma,2017-06-25,5,Haters gonna hate,4,1,"Saw all the negative reviews and was honestly baffled (admittedly, I never had the Heath bar version). I love this ice cream! Toffee is perfectly crisp and didn't get stuck in my teeth (I was a little worried about that going in). And I love the rich coffee flavor of the ice cream.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Tammy75
title: Awful!
text;;;: Nothing like the previous flavor. Won't be buying this one anymore;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,JacquiD,2017-07-17,5,Better than the old HeathBar one!,3,3,"The Heath bar crunch was my favorite flavor. After reading all the negative reviews, I was quite nervous about trying the toffee bar crunch. However, the new version is amazing! The coffee flavor of the ice cream is rich and deep, the toffee pieces are huge, and although they are not Heath bars, the Toffee is incredible. It does have a slight molasses taste to it, which is why I think people are saying that it tastes burnt. It doesn't! I am so glad they made my favorite flavor even better!";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,FuzzyGut,2018-10-02,2,Tough call,2,1,"I hate posting anything other than a glowing review of Ben and Jerry’s ice cream, but this... yeah. The coffee ice cream base is excellent, like all their coffee bases, but the toffee, while plentiful, is dreadful! I never had it with the Heath Bars so I can’t compare them;" I can only go on this new pint I bought but the toffee is really terrible! I couldn’t eat it
author: not worth the calories. I bet it was glorious with the other toffee because the coffee ice cream is delicious.""";;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Kellbell,2020-06-27,5,My favorite!,1,0,"I tried this flavor my last month living in California and fell in love! It is the perfect amount of toffee and the coffee flavor is delicious. I never had the heath bar flavor that everyone seemed to love, but it makes me sad that everyone writes such poor reviews for this flavor. The poor reviews might make this flavor go away all together so please stop with the one stars! Since moving to Texas, I am completely unable to find this in any store in my area and am very sad.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: FormerBandJfan
title: A terrible substitute for Coffee Heath Bar Crunch
text;;;: Please bring back Coffee Heath Bar Crunch. This flavor is a dreadful substitute and has made me lose my love of Ben & Jerry’s. Coffee Heath Bar was my favorite. I can hardly believe that switching out to this other toffee candy could downgrade this ice cream so dramatically. Please bring back Coffee Heath Bar Crunch!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Jeff
title: What happened to Heath bar crunch
text;;;: Just bought toffee bar crunch since I didn't see Heath bar crunch. Such a shame the new flavor was horrible compared to the original recipe. The vanilla ice cream was no longer thick and creamy and the toffee bar was terrible. No longer a Premium ice cream. Sorry B&J but I will not be buying anymore from you guys.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Coffee Ice cream Fan,2020-06-29,4,I thought this was pretty good!,0,0,"Now, CCBBB is my favorite ice cream flavor of all time. Can this replace CCBBB? Not in a million years. However, the local stores in my area do not carry pints of it, and the nearest Ben and Jerry's scoop shop is an hour away. I was craving coffee-flavored ice cream one day and saw Ben and Jerry's was really one of the only brands that DO sell coffee ice cream. So I tried this. I think it was pretty dang good I just wish there was more crunch in it. If you have a coffee ice cream kick and can't get your hands on CCBBB, this is a solid alternative to crush your craving.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,IceCreamTruths,2018-05-10,5,I Could live off this deliciousness!,2,5,"I tasted this by accident. The store was out of the one I had been eating. It took a bite or two before it actually got me and “Oh Wow!” I was hooked. This is the most amazing ice cream I have ever had, hands DOWN! I could eat it every day in place of my meals. It’s that good!";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Rafi,2018-08-31,1,Ruined With The new Toffee,3,1,"When this was Coffee Heath bar Crunch it was my absolute favorite flavor ever. I ate almost a pint a week. Since switching away from actual Heath Bar, the flavor is incredibly disappointing. The off brand toffee supplier is pretty bad. There's so much good toffee in the world... I don't understand how B&J managed to find a bad one. The flavor is ruined.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,kiwisoup,2017-04-15,2,Not just the toffee bars have been changed.,3,1,"Used to eat this flavor all the time when it was Coffee Heath Bar Crunch. The coffee flavor ice cream barely tastes like coffee anymore. What did you do? Blech... tastes like watered-down stale coffee that was left on the burner too long. Usually I devour a pint, but this one has been sitting in the freezer for a week ahead I've tried eating it 3 times now.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: LizzyD
title: Being back the Heath bars!
text;;;: I was so excited to remember how much i used to love this ice cream (formally of the Heath Bar variety). Then I dug into this new version. SO disappointed. It really is gross. Totally different texture and flavor. Overly sweet but bitter at the same time. Ya’ll need to reassess;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Babar,2017-08-02,1,Disappointing,2,0,"I guess they've changed the recipe since I last had it, because I was just disappointed with what I got this time. It used to be my favorite flavor, but it was just bad, with a metallic tasting toffee . Hopefully they haven't changed the recipes for all their flavors.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: schottski
title: Why does it taste metallicy??
text;;;: We tried this flavor for the first time yesterday (both my husband and I are big coffee ice cream fans) and we both took one bite and spit it out because it tastes SO metallicy! Super weird. We made a friend try it too and she also agreed it tasted like metal. Not sure if an ingredient went bad or if it the recipe needs reworking but probably the grossest ice cream I have ever had. Stilll a huge Ben and Jerry's Fan but won't be buying this flavor again.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,DonnaPc,2018-02-18,5,Great taste!,4,1,"At first I didn’t like it. But then the flavors took hold of me and I absolutely loved it! It’s my favorite flavor. Unfortunately, it’s harder to find but it’s the best!";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Nike
title: Why mess up a good thing?
text;;;: I kept thinking my taste buds had changed cause I haven’t had this ice cream in years but no the toffee and coffee are just bland and not at all worth the calories. Certainly a disappointment after having enjoyed the original perfection of coffee and Heath bars.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Momtothree,2017-12-26,1,Wish you brought back the original!,4,2,"The old coffee heath bar was my go to ice cream! NOTHING compared. Went to buy it one day and I hoped it was just the name they changed but boy was I so disappointed that the flavor changed, unfortunately in the worse way! Never bought it again and keep hoping some day it will be back! Glad to see I am not the only one who feels this way!";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Chant,2017-08-18,1,Horrible replacement,4,1,"I saw you changed out Heath bars for a non gmo version of toffee, unfortunately I absolutely hate this new flavor. Not sure it just tastes bland and off";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Kristian,2018-10-12,1,"Do not buy, do not eat",2,1,I echo the comments of everyone else who is disappointed and frustrated by the change to the recipe. The new toffee bars are not crunchy and I don't like the taste. The ice cream has also lost its coffee flavor. This used to be my favorite flavor but no more. Why hasn't anything changef if you have passing along negative customer feedback for over a year? I'd rather you discontinue this flavor altogether than keep making it in its current formula.;;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: sdecker27
title: This is my fav!
text;;;: I love this one. It combines my favorite flavors of coffee and toffee.... enough said. Now PLEASE bring it back to my area!!! Thanks!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Darren,2018-08-17,1,Toffee is Horrible,2,0,"Tried this flavor yet again after Heath Bar was replaced. Unfortunately the toffee replacement is not good. Surprised this is still is a flavor, would prefer you to put it in the graveyard and bring back Chocolate chip Oatmeal cookie.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Mommy
title: WOW!
text;;;: My favorite ice cream flavor of all time. It only took trying it once and I was hooked. Marrying the coffee taste with the toffee crunch is heaven in my mouth.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: suet
title: Nooooo!
text;;;: Please bring back your original Coffee HEATH BAR Crunch!! Very poor substitute. So disappointed.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Erins,2019-12-18,5,My fave flavor,4,1,"Delicious. I like it better before they switched from heath bars, but it is still my favorite";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,CaliDreaming,2017-12-04,5,My Fave,2,1,"Sad to see so many foodies complaining about this flavor in comparison to a previous similar flavor. I do love that the chocolate and toffee texture is not frozen rock hard so I am able to enjoy flavor as it melts in mouth. I’ve been looking for a similar quality in a regular candy bars, no longer enjoying some toffee bars I’ve eaten before. Makes me wonder how delicious this heath bar flavor was to cause such an uproar from others.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Farrinna64,2019-10-08,1,I haven't had Ben & Jerry's since...,1,0,"The last time I had B&Js, I thought I was buying my favorite flavor ""Coffee Heath Bar Crunch"". I wasnt paying attention to the change on the label. Starting to eat it and it didn't seem the same. I thought, maybe my taste buds had changed, or something. But, then I read the label and realized why. I haven't had B&J since. Now I'm reading these reviews, and it's not just me. Boy, do I miss my favorite ice cream, well ice cream flavor";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Ciara
title: My go to
text;;;: My favorite flavor. Nothing can compare. I probably eat one a week. I was concerned with some of the lower ratings last year before I left for basic training that I would get out and it would be in the flavor graveyard. Lo and behold it’s still here. Can’t get enough of the toffee!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Alw13
title: Best best best ice cream ever!!
text;;;: My MOST FAVORITE ice cream!! Did liked the 'heath bar crunch better but now that I'm used to this...I love it as We'll! The only problem is slowly but surely all my stores are dropping it..:-( There is only ONE Target that I know of that still carries it and it's 25 min away.;;;
