name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Josh VT,2018-04-02,1,Skim Milk and Coconut Oil,2,1,"I do not recommend this product. Should not even be considered ice cream. The minute you added coconut oil it tastes chalky, metalic and poor texture. Also skim milk;" why? This new product has more calories than the original version. Personally
author: when I choose this brand I expect true ice cream and ingredients. I do not care about how many calories or healther dietary ingredients. Make it the way it should be...""";;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: LibbyM
title: Please bring back HEATH!!!
text;;;: This is just not what it used to be. It has looonggg been my favorite flavor but the new toffee bar makes it a no-go for me. So freakin sad about it.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Amklush
title: Best coffee ice cream and toffee is amazing combo!
text;;;: This ice cream I was worried wasnt going to meet my expectations...but it did! And the size of the toffee pieces were great! This combo is amazing!!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: JamieB
title: Bring back Heath Bar
text;;;: This used to be our family favorite. We bought a pint almost weekly. But we haven't bought it in a few years. It's just not the same anymore. :(;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Jess
title: Blissful
text;;;: I feel like this flavor was made for me! I was astonished when I found it. I didn't realize other people like coffee and toffee too! I adore the toffee bar. Better than any I've had before! I'm eating it as we speak. Thank you! I also LOOOVE the big chunks!!!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Anna,2018-01-19,2,Unreasonably large and mediocre toffee,2,2,"I miss the Heath bars for sure (I saw a response to one of the reviews saying that this wasn't meant to be a replacement, and people just aren't that dumb). But I could get over it, I still like the coffee flavor. But why are the toffee bar pieces so enormous? What am I supposed to do with an inch-long chunk of toffee in the middle of my ice cream? Chisel away at it with my spoon? Not a good experience, and it's happened in all of the last few pints I've bought.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,BabyDaddy,2020-08-11,1,Pregnant wife is upset,1,0,"My wife loved the original flavor. She always said, whens she's pregnant she is going to eat this all the time. Well she got pregnant and there was no more coffee heath bar crunch. It crushed her spirits. Thankfully our local ice cream shop supported us through the pregnancy but the business would have been given to Ben and Jerry. Please bring back the CHBC flavor before we go through another pregnancy.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,rockinbaker,2020-06-22,5,Favorite Flavor,1,0,"This is my absolute favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor! I used to get it all the time, but the stores I went to frequently all stopped carrying it around the same time. I assumed it was discontinued. Imagine my surprise when I moved to NC, and there are actual Ben & Jerry's shops, and this flavor still exists! So excited to get Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch again after years of flavors that just weren't the same.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Brenda,2017-11-01,1,Not good,1,0,"I was very disappointed after eating the new version of the toffey coffee heath ice cream. It was by far the worst I've ever eaten. The ice cream with the heath bar in it is my favorite. I will no longer buy it due to the drastic flavor of the new toffee. Most people aren't buying ice cream at Ben and Jerry prices for their health, it's usually to indulge a little bit. So sad to see the change.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,The flying sergeant,2017-05-24,1,My life's blood ruined,4,2,"Ben & Jerry's Coffee Heathbar crunch has been my favorite food of all for about 26 years. I no kidding had days where it was all i ate. When i was a paramedic in Williamsburg, VA there was a B&J's store where you made the best even better by being in sundae form, heaven it was! In the military, anywhere in the world I was if I could find some of this ice cream I felt at home. Now however, it's not the same. The removal of actual heath bars completely changed the taste. Gone are the treasure which was the little gooey pockets found next to a piece of Heath. I hate to say it, but it actually tastes bad. Didn't know it was possible for a B&J ice cream to taste bad but it does. The chocolate tastes cheap like cheap generic store brand and the toffee tastes & feels stale.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Cricket68
title: July 4th bummer
text;;;: I always buy coffee ice cream. I usually buy a pint of coffee/toffee at the nearby coop. The price is 9.99. My husband treated me to your Coffee a Toffee Crunch. The ice cream tasted like molasses. The toffee bits had no crunch and tasted stale. I tried it twice thinking I ate something earlier that would alter the taste. Second spoonful hours later still tasted like molasses.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: jesslu
title: Favorite Ice Cream...and I eat a lot of ice cream.
text;;;: I'm shocked by the reviews of this ice cream. It's not the strongest coffee flavored I've ever had but when paired with the delicious and generously sized pieces of toffee it is fabulous.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Patti
title: Dad's favorite
text;;;: This was my dad's favorite and I like it a lot too. He walked me down the aisle for my wedding in 1996 and his reward was a pint. I can't believe people aren't reviewing it higher.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Bonne
title: Awesome!
text;;;: I love this ice-cream!! I'm from Canada and it also appears that my fav grocery stores have stopped stocking this one. I hope it hasn't been discontinued in the Great White North.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Rufus,2018-11-15,1,Toffee pieces too large,1,0,"I like coffee ice cream. I like toffee. What could go wrong?? Ahh! That's right. The toffee pieces are too large, so large it's difficult to get a little toffee and a little coffee ice cream in the same bite. Too bad because toffee & and coffee go together like two peas in a pod.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: CTisthebest
title: My favorite!
text;;;: All the negative reviews are crazy. This is my favorite flavor by far! I love the giant chunks or crunchy toffee. No other ice cream maker has anything even remotely close. You're lucky if you get tiny slivers in other brands. My only regret is that it seems to be caffeinated so I can't eat it too late or it keeps me awake.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Allieb
title: BEST FLAVOR
text;;;: Hands down the absolute best flavor made! No other coffee flavor even comes close! The toffee chunks are HUGE and the coffee flavor itself can’t be beat!!!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,maerceci,2018-04-15,5,Surprisingly Awesome!,2,1,"I wasn't too sure on this flavor, but my local store at them BOGO half off, so since they were sold out on Strawberry Cheesecake, I though I would try something new. And I found it to be one of my new favorite flavors. I love that the toffee doesn't get stuck in your teeth like a regular toffee candy bar, and the coffee ice cream compliments it perfectly.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Jaze,2020-02-11,5,Best Ice Cream I EVER Had!,1,0,"This is the only ice cream im willing to eat. For everyone that doesnt like this ice cream your negative reviews has made it difficult for people like me who would like to find it at the grocery store. im on a ben and jerrys coffee heath bar crunch ice cream hunt and i cant find it. The gas station nearby was the only place i could find it for 6.99 and now they have discontinued it After reading these negative reviews now i see why its slowly disappearing from stores. it is absolutely the best ice cream on the market. my 2 favorite things combined coffee and heath make it easily my favorite ice cream. I would pay $100 to have a bucket in front of me right now, but it is like a mission to find it. i live by smiths in las vegas they dont have it, walmart doesnt have it, some albertsons may have it i think if im lucky but i havent seen it on this side of town since i moved. no ice cream compares to this one. i hope to find a store soon with it. <3";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Julie11,2017-05-09,1,Not the best,3,2,"I thought I'd really enjoy this flavor, like I do with all other flavors or b&j, but this one just doesn't taste good. It leaves a bad taste in my mouth. I was excited to try it, but was very disappointed once I got home only to have it sitting in my freezer ever since.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Kelly
title: Just alright
text;;;: I have always had a thing for this flavor and finding it around my area is hard. I recently stumbled upon it and was so excited to get home and take a bite. Not realizing they changed the heath bar to a toffy bar I knew something was different : (... I want the heath bar back!!! It's just not the same without it.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Bright08,2017-08-02,1,Yuck!,1,0,"This used to be my favorite flavor. I hadn't bought this product in a while and didn't realize till I bit into one of the toffee pieces that it was no longer made with Heath bars. I understand their reasoning behind changing the toffee pieces, but this toffee is horrible. Tasted old and very oily. So sad!";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,BJRCallahan,2019-10-10,1,"Once my wife’s favorite, now unpalatable.",1,0,My wife loved this back when it used Heath bars but now she cannot stand it. The toffee no longer compliments the whole. Thankfully Americone Dream is unchanged so she still has an option she enjoys. I understand this B&J goal but flavor is still the most important consideration when it comes to ice cream.;;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Lilasiris,2020-05-21,5,Tastes great!,1,0,"This has always been my favorite flavor from Ben & Jerry’s, but it’s hard to find. I enjoyed it with Heath, but this new toffee is much better! It’s more buttery and easier to eat frozen. It tastes like the more expensive English toffee they sell in tins during Christmas.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Erica
title: Dislike the new recipie ...
text;;;: This used to be one of my favorite flavors. Bought it today and didn't notice the name change. The bars have a gritty texture to them and is nothing like the Heath bars that were used. Disappointed. Really wish I didn't choose this flavor. Won't purchase again.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Pepper
title: Everything is a disappointment!
text;;;: Are used to love CHBC far that I’ve changed wouldn’t be that different. Boy was I wrong! The coffee flavour is so disappointing and the bar is granny with no nice coffee flavour I am so sad as this used to be a big treat for me and now I’ve had to waste a pint.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Rgdedge,2018-07-08,1,Ruined,0,0,"I’m so disappointed. I loved Coffee Heath Bar Crunch. I picked this up, assuming it was a slight retool with a new, generic, toffee bar. It’s just not good. The texture of the ice cream is icy, not creamy, and the toffee bars are crumbly and one-note: sickly sweet. They remind me a bit of Scottish tablet. 3/4 of a pint still in the freezer and I don’t think I’ll be finishing it. I should’ve known...same disappointment when Mint Oreo changed to Mint “Cookie”. The essence gets lost in the translation.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Mom of four
title: Terrible substitute
text;;;: This is the worst thing you could have done to my most favorite flavor of ice cream ever!! This version doesn’t even come close in comparison to Coffee Heath Bar Crunch!!! Please bring back the original...this Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch stuff is awful!!!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Pixie
title: CoffeeToffeeBestComboEver! - SorryPB&chocolate!
text;;;: I found this flavor many years ago when it had Health Bar and I was sad at first when the toffee changed but I have learned to love the responsibly sourced toffee too. I like to try other B&J flavors but Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch is my true love!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Shay04
title: Used to be good
text;;;: This used to be my favorite ice cream. I keep buying more to see if it will taste the way it used to but ever time I'm left feeling disappointed and sorry I wasted my money. It's weird how something that used to be so yummy is now weird tasting?;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,A1149TKR,2018-06-26,1,Heath Bar crunch,1,0,"I have been on a diet for a while, used my cheat day to share some ice cream with my partner. The “candy” you used to replace the Heath toffee is NASTY, what good is fair trade non gmo terd nuggets, absolutely the last time I buy Ben and Jerry’s";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: hmtj
title: Toffe is horrible
text;;;: Just tried this in desperation looking for my Coffee Heath Bar Crunch fix. What a mistake. The toffee is chalky. Horrible flavor. Can't compare to the Heath Bars they used before. Don't waste your money. Grab another flavor.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Lori,2017-05-28,2,Different Toffee Bars,1,1,"My favorite Ben & Jerry's Ice Cream Flavor has always been Coffee Toffee Crunch, but the Toffee bars have changed. I think you used to use Heath Bars which are buttery and delicious and what a great combination to the coffee ice cream, but now the Toffee bars taste blah and I don't care for them in the ice cream. It makes the ice cream taste watery instead of buttery. Wish you would go back to the original recipe.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: steph22002
title: Bad taste
text;;;: i bought this flavor ice cream today. Its my first buy from the brand. I was ready to dig in. I was disappointed at the flavor. The coffee taste watered down. Not a rich flavor. The toffee taste odd. I didn't enjoy it.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,BJLUVER,2017-06-14,4,Good ice cream with a bad wrap,1,3,"Now I wanna clear some things up here. This isn't a bad flavor but it seems as though it's getting a bad wrap. What a lot of people won't tell you about ice cream indulgence is that the mood/setting/amount you consume/way you consume all affect the experience. So let me start off by saying if you set out to finish the pint, you might not like this flavor, and that's fine, but just know you didn't enjoy this ice cream the way it was intended to be enjoyed. This is for the people who enjoy small servings of sweets. For those with more mature palettes. This ice cream deserves appreciation and admiration, and I believe the consumer but question where they're at mentally and spiritually before imbibing. Are there better flavors? Of course. But it's all about the time, place, feeling, and mode/way of consumption. This is enjoyable.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: SSue12
title: It used to be amazing
text;;;: I bought this about 1-2 years ago under the Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch name. It had pools of the tasty toffee throughout and the crunch bars also had lots of the gooey stuff. The coffee base was smooth and rich.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Toni94,2017-06-21,1,Used to be my favorite flavor. Now it's... ew,1,0,"When it was the coffeee Heath bar crunch it was absolutely stellar, but once they changed it, its really not good. It's the toffee. It's gritty, hard, and bitter which is a shame because the actual ice cream is good.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Bill
title: Threw it out
text;;;: I just purchased recently and first time ever trying Ben and Jerry because a co-worker highly recommended and i took about 3 bites and threw it out. It was bad. Doesn't taste anything like what I was expecting.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Fredwina D,2018-04-22,1,An abomination,2,1,"Coffee Heath Bar Crunch was my favorite ice cream of all time. You destroyed it. The ""toffee"" is disgusting and crumbly, and the ice cream is flavorless. I don't even buy Ben and Jerry's anymore. So sad.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: GramZilla12
title: Not even close to the original Heath Bar Toffee
text;;;: The newer version is a sad imitation of the original. New toffee is not even close to the flavor of the Heath toffee;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Chicky,2019-11-18,1,Not worth it!,1,0,"I tried this after they stopped using Heath. It's terrible! I was so unhappy, I've stopped buying all B&J products. I can appreciate they are trying to improve the products, taste can't be sacrificed.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Ice cream machine
title: Greatest Canadian Loss
text;;;: I'm not sure I have ever been so sad as when this flavour was removed from Canadian shelves. It is my favourite flavour but I can't travel to the US just for ice cream. A nation has been deprived.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,nope,2017-04-27,1,Not Good...,3,2,"I bought this on sale, and I see why. The bars are good, but the ice cream was the worst B&J's i've ever had.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,MarkC,2018-03-28,1,So Disappointed,2,1,"I just tried what I was hoping was still my favorite B&J flavor. What have you done? You are creating anti-non-GMO consumers. If avoiding GMO means substandard substitutes, No thank you.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Mom2017
title: Don't like the new toffee
text;;;: I loved coffee Heath bar crunch but this new flavor is nothing like it. Toffee tastes bad and barely a coffee flavor to the ice cream. I'll probably toss it out. Liked the old flavor better.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,AnonyfromWI,2018-03-22,4,I like it,1,0,"Not sure why so many blistering reviews, it's not even as horrible as it's being portrayed. I love the coffee and toffee taste. I enjoy ice cream every now and then and B&J's is a good brand.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: HANNAH
title: Massachusetts
text;;;: I feel so sick after eating this .. I have tree but allergies and I feel like my throat is closing after eating this.... i am freaking out . This was my fav flavor but what happened ?!?;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Hopup123
title: Agree w neg reviews...
text;;;: The toffee choc pieces are tasteless and the coffee ice cream which used to be rich and intensely coffee is more like tea and instead of creamy is frosty-iced pcrystalline. Very sad...;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Linz
title: The toffee is perfect!
text;;;: I don’t understand all these 1 star reviews! This is the absolute best ice cream and the actual toffee is far better in quality and taste then a Hershey's toffee bar. Perfection!!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Donna
title: Delicious Toffee!
text;;;: I love my coffee ice cream. And the LARGE chunks of toffee in this provide a perfect crunch without being too hard. I appreciate the size and quality of the toffee. Brilliant.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Ceci,2020-02-06,5,Favourite Flavour,1,0,"I love this flavour, it is my favourite! I think this is almost as good as it was with the original Heath Bar and appreciate Ben&Jerry's commitment and them being consequent.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Jen Berry
title: Coffee! Toffee!
text;;;: One of my favorites! The reason for replacing the Heath™ bar pieces was in honor of Heath Ledger's tragic passing #RIPHeath...The people rating it a 1 Star need Jesus!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Cathy84
title: Chunks of chocolate covered toffee!!!
text;;;: I purchased this along with my favorite core ice creams just to try it out. May want to have this as a shake in the morning instead of regular coffee.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
title: Love this!!!
text;;;: Tried this flavor on a whim and I loved it!! If you like Heath or Scor candy bars you’ll love this. There a huge chunks of toffee. Sooo good!!!!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Lanh
title: Love this flavor!!
text;;;: The coffee base is creamy and strong flavored and the toffee offers a delicious crunch. Also the perfect ratio of coffee ice cream to toffee!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,lovecoffeeheath,2018-11-19,4,Surprised at the number of complaints.,1,1,"This one is my favorite flavor from this brand. I used to love the coffee heath bar crunch as well, but to me, this one is so similar, I don't see why so many are disappointed? The toffee is probably a bit drier than the heath bar, but overall, I still love this flavor, in fact, I have not been seeing it as much as I used to at my local Target and I hope it hasn't been discontinued.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Gamndalf the white,2018-06-24,2,not sure,1,0,"Not sure if I got bad pint or what, but the ice cream was icy and not creamy at all. the toffee was great!! ice cream more ice than cream.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Mpitts
title: One of my favorites
text;;;: I never had it with the Heath bars so I don't feel like I'm missing out. I love coffee and toffee and this flavor is a hit with me!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Timothy,2018-11-17,1,Sad,1,0,"Coffee Heath Bar Crunch was my favorite treat. With the change, the ice cream isn't as rich, and the toffee is unappealing. :(";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Jackyg123,2019-06-05,1,Every batch tastes like a bad batch,1,0,"I had forgotten my rule of not buying this flavor, and now $5 is basically going in the trash because this stuff is inedible.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Heartofyoga
title: Forever Mine
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream of all time! The Heath bar bites are yummy chocolatey surprises. I'm hooked forever!!!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Londa007,2017-09-01,5,Delicious,2,1,"My all time favorite ice!!! If you are looking to try a new flavor, you have to taste this. I absolutely love it.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,stevie9923,2018-05-02,1,Don't buy if you liked Coffee Heath Bar Crunch,1,1,"Stop saying this wasn't meant to replace Coffee Heath Bar Crunch. For customers who like Coffee Heath Bar Crunch, this is obviously what they will go to since CHBC is no longer available & the name is almost identical & only the only ice cream you offer with coffee & toffee bits. Most are obviously going to compare the two & this flavor simply does not taste as good as CHBC.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Mikeybeee
title: Two of my favorite things together
text;;;: Never get rid of this flavor. Finally two of my favorite flavors and ingredients in one place!!!! Thank you;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
title: This is my favorite flavor!
text;;;: I loved Coffee Heath Bar Crunch and honestly I wasn't able to eat it for more than 2 years since I moved to another country. When I got back I saw the name change. I still love it and unfortunately can only buy the small pint size version. I would really enjoy a bigger size!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Sam467t,2017-08-08,1,"Changed the toffee, now it sucks",1,0,"This use to be my hands down favorite ice cream, now I won't even buy it. The new toffee taste awful";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Irasthe,2019-09-03,5,Love this with chunks of toffee!,1,0,"I tried this and went back and bought 4 more pints, my family and I are in love with this ice cream!";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Clay
title: The best!
text;;;: This is hands down the best ice-cream I've ever had. I have no idea why it's rated so low...;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: TS ice cream
title: My new favorite
text;;;: Love the huge pieces of Heath Bar. Yummy! Coffee taste like a creamy latte. Great combination;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Sprowt
title: Delicious!!!
text;;;: The pieces of toffee bar are just killer. So yum! Might be my favorite coffee ice cream.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Janebug
title: Not quite up to par
text;;;: The coffee flavor is washed out and the toffee is bland too. Sorry you diluted flavors!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Jamboy,2019-04-22,1,Absolutely Terrible,0,0,"You guys really need to bring back the old flavor. The new one taste like metal and is disgusting. You discontinued your most popular flavor, who cares about gmos, you guys should be more focused on customer satisfaction instead of this PC garbage. Look at Amazon for example, they sell adult novelty items and whatever else and look where it has taken the company. This ice cream is trash and I refuse to buy Ben and Jerry's until you bring back coffee HEATH bar cruch.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Tk224
title: Amazing
text;;;: Such a rich coffee flavor. So creamy and huge chunks of toffee;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Flub
title: Not delicious!
text;;;: No way is this as good as Heath bar crunch. Not even close.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Cmshanah
title: Soooooo yummy!
text;;;: By far the bets flavor! love the big Heath bar pieces!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Cath1234123
title: Terrible!
text;;;: I just spit this out of my mouth. The toffee is gross;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,lynnie,2017-06-05,1,Terrible,1,1,"Coffee Heath Bar Crunch was my favorite flavor. The Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch is the worst. It has a gritty texture, not sure what that could be. The toffee is horrible. I checked the expiration date even because I thought maybe it had gone bad. Coffee taste is OK, but leaves sour milk aftertaste. I can't believe ice cream can be this terrible.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Zach,2018-01-14,1,Unsatisifed,1,1,"I bought this ice cream flavor because I love toffee and coffee. I usually get americone dream but I thought it might be good to change it up a bit. Boy was I sadly disappointed. The ice cream almost had a smoky, burnt flavor to it and the toffee did not mix with the ice cream at all. I won’t be getting this one again.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Dave RN,2017-08-07,1,What a difference !!,1,1,"The heath bar cofffee had disappeared from my store. I then saw this new coffee toffee crunch. I was so excited, I bought three pints, in fear this may disappear also. My excitement was cut short when I tried the first pint. It was not heath bar coffee. It was a sad day as it was my favorite.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: ic critic
title: Poor substitute for old Coffee Heath Bar Crunch
text;;;: Shame they replaced the old Coffee Heath Bar(TM) Crunch for this one. The combo of this version of the ice cream and these 'toffee bars' have poor flavor and terrible texture. NOTHING like the old coffee and Heath Bars in the older version. Shouldn't have messed with a good thing!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Gina
title: Disappointed
text;;;: I buy Ben and Jerry's icecream all the time(usually chocolate fudge brownie). I was very disappointed with the flavor and texture of Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch. It wasn't worth eating and this is one of the first times I've ever been extremely dissatisfied with B&J's icecream. :-(;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,AmiG,2018-11-03,5,Still the best,1,2,"Saw the poor ratings and had to write a review to get it back up because if this gets discontinued I would be so sad! B&J marketing/distribution/whatever team, please do not get rid of this flavor! Make it extra delicious or whatever you need to do to get your fan base back but make sure it can live in our freezers for a long, long time.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,trai,2018-03-12,2,Toffee Bar NOT WOW!,0,1,"Always love me a Ben & Jerry's Ice Cream, but this coffee toffee bar a kinda a disappointment. The toffee is crumbly and not so great tasting and is off putting to the delicious coffee ice cream. I would suggest if this flavour was redone, is to use skor bar or even just the skor toffee bits without the chocolate coating. I think the skor toffee and nuttiness will pair well with the delicious coffee ice cream.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,MaggieSTL,2019-09-20,5,My favorite for years!,1,1,"I’ve been enjoying this flavor since I was in grade school! I used to buy it all the time at the local corner store on the way home from school. I’ve been having the hardest time finding it at the grocery store now-a-days, but it’s still my favorite!";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Chez36
title: So so tasty
text;;;: I love coffee and toffee ice cream and I love that Ben and Jerry’s have put them together. I am from uk and the toffee pieces taste like little Dime bars. By far my favourite ice cream flavour will be looking out for it all the time!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,jakeat1,2018-04-25,2,Ruined!,1,1,"I loved Coffee Heath Bar Crunch! The new toffee in this Ben & Jerry's ""Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch"" is so bad. Please just don't even try it. They gave up taste for a no GMO product. Why??? I am not eating ice cream for my health.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Ducky
title: Dry and chalky toffee bar
text;;;: Loved the toffee coffee heath bar crunch. The new version is really bad. The toffee bars are dry and chalky with no taste. I have tried it a couple times hoping it was a fluke. I would rather have a plain coffee ice cream.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,AndyC,2019-02-06,5,Additive Flavor - Grows on you!!,0,2,"I (like many others) was a fan of the Heath Bar Crunch. When B&J switched, I investigated as thorough as a consumer could. I discovered it had something to do with the Hershey's corp, and B&J had to come up with a toffee tasting replacement. So I gave it a try. It took a few pints, but I grew to love Coffee-Toffee as much as the Heath Bar Crunch. Its a little different, but it is good in its own way. This is the only food I've ever found that I can eat once a day and never get tired of it. I've probably eaten about 4,000 pints of the Coffee-Toffee (on top of probably 2,000 pints of the Heath). Sometimes, I get a pint that doesn't have quite as much of the toffee candy in it, so I buy a bag of the Heath ""Bit-o-Brickle"" Cookie bits, and sprinkle some on top, and it supplements the toffee nicely. Sometimes, I sprinkle in some Heath bits regardless of how much toffee is in the pint. I can't help it.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Tallie
title: Lacking
text;;;: Love Ben and jerry's ice cream but this particular flavor has an odd aftertaste the tofee bars in it were amazing and I seemed to dig for them since the ice cream wasn't that great.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Franwindle,2018-04-16,1,Disgusting!,1,1,"It was disgusting. Please ban all coffee ice cream. No amount of toffee can save this ice cream. Seriously disappointed. The vanilla toffee crunch, however, is delicious.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,LilMil,2018-03-21,1,absolutely horrible!!!!,1,1,"Please please bring back Coffee or Vanilla Heath Bar Crunch ice cream. The new kind, coffee toffee crunch or whatever it is called, is horrendous.....just awful!!!!";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Kenelli
title: Delicious
text;;;: My favorite ice cream by far! I never tried it with the heath bar so I can't compare it to that. I just hope this never goes anywhere..but my belly!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Joan
title: Use to love Coffee Heath Bar Crunch
text;;;: I was so addicted to this ice cream it's not the same but can't even find it any longer. Please return my favorite flavor.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
title: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch Rocks!
text;;;: This has been my absolute favorite by far for years! Although I must admit I like to add a bit of caramel swirl to it...;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,JDP1,2018-03-25,1,It’s like New Coke...,1,1,"I have a sweet tooth that demands satisfaction and my “go to” was Coffee HEATH BAR Crunch. Probably the best ice cream in the history of the world. Then for some unforeseen reason (ok, I know it’s to be a better Fair Trade Partner/non GMO...) they took perfection and threw it out the window.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Rachelly,2019-09-22,5,Ohhh Coffee and Toffee! Oh my!,0,1,"Used to buy this on a regular basis and now it's not here in the Pasadena, TX area. I wanted this so bad that I settled for terrible other ice cream coffee brand (didn't want to use the correct name because it really was kinda horrible) and bought some Heath miniature bars. Oh well. Still not satisfied because I really want your product.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Dakwar44
title: Great flavor
text;;;: My favorite of all Ben and Jerry's flavor. The heath chunks go well with the coffee.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Janice
title: Excellent!!!
text;;;: My favorite flavor!! My go to flavor at the Ben & Jerry's Store or grocery store!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: fumisme
title: How the mighty have fallen.
text;;;: This used to be one of my favorite flavours. It was best when it had the original Heath bars in it. It was still acceptable when it had the Ben & Jerry's toffee bars. Now it just seems to have flat pieces of chocolate in it without any toffee at all. I just finished my last serving of this flavour. It isn't worth the calories or the cost.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,uvarianna,2018-07-30,5,Good change!,1,3,"I'm happy they changed the type of candy bar. It now has natural flavors instead of artificial flavors. They should continue to make those kinds of decisions. Ben and Jerry's should be as natural as possible. It is originally from VT, after all.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Jazz mann
title: My favorite
text;;;: I was surprised by all the negative comments. I find this ice cream delicious;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,ella,2018-07-17,5,Tastes great to me...,1,1,"Gee, I love this flavor & haven't had any issues with it.... Totally yummy!";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: kat94
title: so delicious
text;;;: i love this ice cream and can never find it at my local walmart anymore! :(;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: colewis
title: My favorite Ben & Jerry's icecream
text;;;: I love the flavor and the chunks of heath bars. Please don't disconintue!!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Scruples
title: My New Ben and Gerrys
text;;;: Needed a treat that would be uplifting. Good to do something for me.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,cam0477,2017-09-22,1,Used to be my go to flavor,0,0,"The old coffe toffee heath bar crunch was my tried and true go to flavor!!! I loved it!!!! So I was bitterly disappointed when it changed to non heath bars- not even comparable- but being a fair person I tried it again recently to see if maybe it would wear on me. Nope, sometimes a girl just wants some gmo's if it means better taste.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Beckykp27,2017-07-26,5,Classic,1,1,"I can't believe people rate this so low, its one of my favorites!";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: MrRogers
title: Best ever!
text;;;: Toffee coffee and ice cream best things in the world combined!!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Azor Ahai
title: My favorite!
text;;;: Always my favorite! Should be higher rating! Love love lovve.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Messy Tessy,2017-06-28,5,I love it. But I never had the heath version,1,1,"I love coffee and toffee. On this heatwave, this is perfect.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Anilu
title: Love this flavor
text;;;: love the toffee bar and rlly lke the ice cream! great buy!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Lowe
title: Duuuude
text;;;: Stop what you're doing and eat this ice cream. Always.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Kimberlytheresa,2017-07-05,5,Delicious,1,1,"This flavor is delicious, I hope you keep this flavor";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Jessie39
title: Best ice cream ever
text;;;: Yummy an it is my favorite snack to eat at midnight;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Sparkles1970
title: Best Ice Cream Ever!
text;;;: I found this flavor twice where I live. It was the best ice cream I have ever had. I went to buy more and never found it. Still check the Walmart’s here every week. I would buy this ice cream on every shopping trip but have only gotten to eat it twice. I still want more 3 years later. I am actually sad that I can’t have any.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Darrahh
title: My New Favorite Ice Cream
text;;;: I discovered Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch about 2 weeks ago and I simply cannot get enough of it. I told my bestie about it and she has been searching high and low for it.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Emzy
title: All Time Favorite
text;;;: This ice cream brought me into the world of coffee flavored ice cream. I would be a worst person if I'd never discovered this truly fantastic flavor combo.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Luthersez,2017-09-10,5,Number 1 in my heart!,1,2,"This has always been and continues to be my go to Ben & Jerry's! My only complaint is that occasionally the toffee bar chunks are too big, no big whoop.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,naneres,2019-10-26,5,By far the best ice cream ever,0,0,"I've loved this ice cream my whole life (38 years). It's so creamy and has the best coffee flavor. I love that Ben & Jerry's took the initiative to change their ingredients to non-GMO, Fairtrade, etc. More companies need to follow suite. I just wish this flavor was easier to find- almost no one carries it!";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Cricket928
title: Terrible without Heath Bar
text;;;: I’ve tried really hard to like this new version but it just isn’t good. Please listen to your customers and bring back this ice cream with Heath bars. Your sales will make up for any licensing costs. And we don’t care about the sourcing mumbo jumbo. We want you to source your toffee bars from Hershey Co.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: kathyz
title: Love it!
text;;;: This is my favorite flavor! I love the mix of the coffee ice cream and the toffee pieces. And I love that the toffee bites are so big!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Kkely626,2019-01-26,5,DELIGHTFUL!,0,1,"I really hope Ben & Jerry's does not listen to all the whiners complaining that it isn't Heath Bar in the ice cream. Truly, this is my favorite flavor! The coffee ice cream is divine and the toffee pieces are delicious! There are usually some nice huge chunks of it in there as well. So so good!";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,sc123,2017-10-09,2,So sad!,0,0,"I love Ben & Gerry's....they have some really AWESOME flavors. But this is not one of them. So disappointing. I was totally expecting a delicious Heath Bar knock-off. But no such luck. The ice cream itself is the usual B&G's quality, but the toffee bar chunks are totally sub-par. wah. :(";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Angel,2020-07-01,1,Stop denying replacement,0,0,"Heath Bar obviously replaced by a salty concoction called toffee bar crunch. This used to be the only flavor I'd leave Haagen Dazs for. The coffee ice cream base still delicious, but I have to pick out all the big salty chunks of this horrible toffee. Perhaps add pecans or almonds instead.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Mattyicekilla
title: YOU EVER BEEN IN A STORM WALLY?
text;;;: A storm of flavors blasting you in the mouth? When was a kid always ate the toffee heath bar and now it's there toffee I love it the same maybe more 5 star ice cream.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Lolly,2017-09-20,1,Worst coffee ice cream,0,0,"I love coffee ice cream and I don't think I have ever hated it no matter which brand I bought, but this one was that bad. Major issue is the toffee bar pieces, they ruined the ice cream. Just get ride of this flavor for good. Brewed to Matter is really good though, that one I LOVE..";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Frankie2u,2019-07-24,1,Chalky/gritty,0,0,"I bought this flavor this past weekend and it was chalky and gritty. I checked the sell by date and it doesn't expire until next year. Couldn't taste the toffee well either. I love your other flavors but this one let me down, especially it being close to 7 dollars a pint at 7-11.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: TRenee
title: Disappointed
text;;;: I LOVED the Coffee Heath! This toffee is not good to me in taste AND texture. The coffee ice cream is delicious though. I ate just the ice cream and tossed the candy in the garbage which was disappointing. I'm afraid to try other flavors that I like in case you changed them too!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Jackpipe
title: Can’t stop eating this!
text;;;: Picked this up for the first time. It’s sooo good. I just kept eating and eating...;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,MikeH,2017-07-28,1,So disappointing,0,0,"Coffee Heath Bar Crunch was the absolute best B&J flavor. The coffee ice cream is still the best, but the toffee bars in this pint have a kind of taste I can barely describe - probably because it doesn't belong. This flavor is not a consideration for me anymore. It is a shame.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Raebirds,2019-01-19,5,Still the best!,0,1,"Yes, I know this isn’t the original Toffee heath crunch flavor that we all loved, this flavor has improved greatly since it’s release and is still my favorite BJ flavor by far. Thanks BJ for keeping this masterpiece around for all the coffee ice cream, buttery toffee lovers!";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Hippiekitchen
title: The Best!
text;;;: I so rarely get this wonderful Ben &Jerry’s Flavor! It is the perfect combination with a perfect crunch. A lot of perfect in one little pint!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: srjanes
title: Yummy
text;;;: My absolute favorite! The perfect taste of coffee and toffee.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Kit96,2019-04-24,1,Grainy ice cream and no crunchy toffee,0,0,"I bought a pint today because the flavor sounded interesting. I was sorely disappointed when I took a bite and got grainy ice cream. It was even worse when I found a piece of the promised toffee and it was mush, no crunch or nice toffee flavor just mush.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,RachelB85,2017-10-15,4,Needs more toffee!,0,1,"I grew up eating coffee heath bar crunch, and while I'm fine with this version, I wish there was more toffee. You get a few big squares in the middle, and then none for the rest of the container. Still delicious, just want more toffee. Nom nom nom.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Busybee
title: Always my favorite
text;;;: This has been my favorite Ben & Jerry’s ice cream for years. I could care less if it has name brand heath bar or a different toffee candy bar. I still think it tastes the same. It’s delicious! Thank you for continuing to make this ice cream.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Amby,2017-07-28,5,Sadly disappointed,0,2,"I expected the ice cream to taste like coffee coffee buzz buzz since they are both cofee ice cream. The ice cream tasted more like molasses than coffee. The toffee was disappointing also, it didn't taste like any toffee I've ever had before.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
title: No toffee in the ice cream?? 3 times...
text;;;: I used to really like this flavor. But the last 3 pints have had literally 1 piece of toffee in them. Super disappointing. Thought it was just a fluke but I probably will not buy this again. I should just stick with Cherry Garcia forever.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,some rapper guy who raps,2018-08-08,5,Perfect combination,1,3,"Luxury, decadance, uniqueness all in one pint sized tub.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Debg
title: Was my favorite until the change
text;;;: I LOVED the coffee heath bar flavor. Was my favorite. But with the name change and the formula change it tastes like a cheap knock off. The toffee has a burnt taste. Very unappealing. Please find a different toffee to use.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Booksnoop,2019-07-12,1,Repulsive Toffee,0,0,"This used to be my favorite ice cream flavor, but after trying the new version which does not use Health Bars, no more! The new toffee is disgusting. Why did they replace delicious Heath Bars? I won’t buy this again.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Scaro,2019-11-22,5,Hits the spot!,0,1,"This is my all time favorite flavor, the toffee is soft and buttery yet still holds the perfect crunch while simultaneously melting in your mouth. The coffee ice cream is on point, everything about this flavor is great!";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Carol Sue,2018-03-20,2,Disappointed,0,1,"Used to be my favorite. Don’t plan to purchase again. Toffee is poor and even the coffee ice cream seems different, and not good. I expect better from Ben and Jerry’s. On a positive note, I do like the Urban Bourbon.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,ajs626,2019-11-29,5,My favorite!,0,0,"I love the uniqueness of this flavor and it has become my favorite go-to for snack until the stores in my area stop caring it. I've been testing other flavours, but none have matched my love for the Coffee Toffee.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Emmee
title: Please tell me you sell the Toffee separate??!
text;;;: Listen I LOVE the ice cream but the TOFFEE! The toffee is so delicious I picked it out FIRST ate it and then ate the ice cream. I am just blown away....if you don't sell separately can I get a recipe!!? PLEASE?;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,CrissyD,2019-07-02,5,My Soulmate!,0,1,"I just discovered this ice cream recently and now my local grocery orders it special for me, and my friends, because we're all now addicted. I love it. It is the best flavor the is. Please always keep it!!!";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,taylortots,2018-01-30,1,Horrible Flavor,0,1,"When I took one bite out of this ice cream, I immediately regretted buying it in the first place. The toffee bar crunch part tasted really odd, like burnt toffee. It is a shame because it sounded so good!";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Bethany1500
title: My favorite!
text;;;: This is my all time favorite flavor of Ben and Jerry’s. I couldn’t find it anywhere for awhile and came on here to find it near me. I’m happy to say I bought all 6 they had at my local bi lo. Heaven!!!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Deborah,2020-06-08,4,"Delicious, but caffeinated",0,0,"I love the flavor of this coffee ice cream, but I'll have to eat this one for breakfast. It keeps me up if I eat it post dinner. I'd love to see a decaffeinated version! Love Ben & Jerry's BLM message!";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Lizzie from the Lou
title: Love it!
text;;;: I started buying pint sized ice cream instead of going out for ice cream. Gave this a try and wasn’t disappointed. I wish the store where I do curb side pick up offered more Ben and Jerry flavors;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Zokk5,2020-03-29,1,Terrible flavor,0,1,"I just bought this from a local Shoprite. Toffee pieces were too flat to be crunchy. And it did not taste like coffee ice cream. Severely disappointed, as I dont eat much ice cream.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Mona,2019-03-12,5,Delicious,0,1,"My husband surprised me with this and I love it, my only criticism is that I thought the toffee pieces should have been a little smaller, maybe half the size for ease of eating.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: CRSpooner
title: Why why why
text;;;: I grew up eating Ben & Jerry’s coffee heath bar crunch ice cream. It literally was the only ice cream I would buy in stores. Years ago it was replaced by this terrible copycat.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: AnnaGarv
title: Worst toffee ever
text;;;: Wow what a waste of $6. I spent more time scooping around the cheap yucky toffee than I did eating the ice cream. Heath bars would have been much better. Gosh that was sad.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: jccd23
title: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
text;;;: It Was Any First Time Trying This Flavor And Overall I Loved The Flavor But It Was A Bit Hard To Enjoy Because There Was This Grity Powdery Texture To The Icecream Itself.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: LaurieUpstate20
title: What Toffee?
text;;;: I bought this a few days ago. Only two pieces of toffee in the whole container. And a few tiny pieces. Very disappointing. Maybe it was the last container in the batch.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Aaron
title: Bring back the heath!
text;;;: The new toffee bars used taste waxy and are definitely not as good as the original Heath bars in the “Coffee Heath Toffee Crunch” I ate for years. Please change it back!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Lambski,2018-06-25,5,All-time Great,0,1,"I have bought this flavor loyally for over 10 years (since it had Heath bars), and enjoy it even more now. The flavors are perfectly balanced and it never disappoints.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,,2019-04-09,5,Try it if you love coffee ice cream!,0,0,"I've been eating coffee ice cream since I was a kid! This brand has some delicious coffee ice cream! I'm surprised by the bad reviews, but I love this flavor.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,krissi924,2020-08-16,5,The best!,0,0,"This is by far my favorite ice cream flavor! The large chunks of toffee beat any other ice cream with toffee in it, and the toffee melts in your mouth.";;;

Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Birdmann,2018-01-03,2,Hard on the teeth,0,0,"We loved Heath Bar, but this has very hard thick toffee that doesn't crunch. Tastes good, but wish we could have a softer crunchy toffee again";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Someinternetguy
title: Garbage
text;;;: Not a substitute for coffee Heath Bar Crunch. Did anybody taste this stuff before they put it on shelves? The brand has gone down hill.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Equinn17
title: This ice cream makes my boyfriend jealous.
text;;;: Literally the best thing I could put in my mouth. Not even my dreams could come up with something like this. Thank you Ben and Jerrys!!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Cavewmn
title: CCOOOFFFFEEEEEEEEE!!!!
text;;;: This is my new favorite ice cream. I love the coffee ice cream. Then it is amazing having these toffee chunks covered in fudge.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Missheath
title: Bring back the heath bar!
text;;;: I am so sad that you all changed the heath bar to toffee. The texture and flavor is not the same. Please bring back heath bar!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,melodie,2020-09-10,5,she is delicious,0,0,"you all are out of your minds, coffee toffee bar crunch is truly one of b&j’s best, second only to cherry garcia honestly";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Gummeh,2020-06-11,1,Ugh,0,1,"This used to be my FAVORITE! The toffee bars are disgusting now, they leave a weird aftertaste. Bring back the Heath bar!";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Bill vandrick
title: Ruined the best ice cream
text;;;: Humans are GMO - there is nothing wrong with GMO and you reunited this ice cream by getting rid Heath Bars. Stupid!!!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: bringbackheathbar
title: Tastes like blood
text;;;: Has a disgusting metallic taste. I recommend only for people who like their ice cream to taste like blood.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Alex576
title: All time favorite
text;;;: The ice cream is amazing and the toffee bars are sooo good. Not like cheap check out line candy bars.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: BringBackKeyLimePie
title: Worst Toffee I've Ever Tasted
text;;;: Just gave this a try tonight and I am very disappointed. Literally the worst toffee I have ever had.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Cambrieezie
title: My Favorite!!
text;;;: I have only been able to find this flavor one time and it is my FAVORITE!!! Ughhh... send me more!!!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: ABLE403
title: Incredible
text;;;: Dont be fooled by the low star rating this one is one of the best pints I ever had! EPIC FLAVOR;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Angelazhuinn
title: Toffee bar nasty
text;;;: Omg I love Ben & Jerry’s ice cream but this one was a flop. Ended up throwing away 2 pints :(;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: HazelBasil
title: Favourite Ice Cream!
text;;;: This is by far my favourite ice cream to buy. Great coffee taste with large pieces of toffee.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Illy,2019-02-09,5,My Favorite!,0,1,"It's my absolute favorite ice cream. Unfortunately, I can not find it anywhere. So sad.";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: LoveHeath
title: Toffee too thick
text;;;: I thought I was gonna break a tooth. The toffee pieces are much thicker than Heath.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Hawthornecl
title: Nasty metallic flavor
text;;;: Coffee heath bar crunch was the best. This coffee toffee is junk! So disappointing!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Jeepin Jesse
title: Bring Back Heath Bar!!
text;;;: They non GMO ruined this flavor. To the graveyard with this one.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Mariss
title: Best
text;;;: Best flavor they have. So delicious. Cant go wrong with coffee and heath bar;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Carrie
title: One of my favorites!
text;;;: Love Toffee and Coffee together! I am sad when I can't find it at the store!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: bgood 76
title: Awesome Awesome mix of all my favs
text;;;: bought it 7 years ago and have looked for it every since my for ever go to;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: QueenSky
title: My favorite
text;;;: This is the only flavor I like. But it is rarely stocked in stores :(;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Mandamae
title: Addicted
text;;;: Love this icecream. It's an awesome blend of coffee and toffee. ❤️❤️;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,Halle,2019-08-01,5,Coffee with toffee crunch!,0,0,"My fav flavour, you can't beat coffee ice cream with toffee crunch!";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: MsC757
title: I love it!!
text;;;: Very very GOOD ♥️..If I could I would eat this ice cream every day;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Stgrmom
title: Inedible
text;;;: So so so bad! Won’t waste anymore time on this disgusting product.;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,JenB,2019-05-29,5,Coffee toffee,0,1,"I am so happy I tried this flavor, it is now my new fav!!!!";;;
Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Sue2020
title: My favorite flavor!
text;;;: This is my favorite flavor. More stores need to carry this!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
title: FAVORITE
text;;;: Try it and you will always buy it!!! BEST combo everrr;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch
author: Galex66
title: My favorite
text;;;: The perfect blend of toffee and coffee and crunch!;;;

name: Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch,MalloryKnows,2018-05-10,5,For those who are brave or who have taste ONLY!,0,1,"I can’t even imagine comparing a nasty, trite, bland Heath bar to the fine, succulent toffee in this ice cream. A Heath bar belongs in a bland generic brownish ice cream made specifically for the commoners’ consumption, basically people who will never know any better;" it certainly doesn’t belong in this delicious
author: palatable gourmet ice cream made by Ben and Jerry’s.""";;

name: Cold Brew Caramel Latte,Mama Shannon,2019-08-06,5,The best caramel ice cream I've ever haf!,3,2,"I tried this ice cream for the very first time about a month ago, and now it is my once a month treat to myself. I didn't eat ice cream very often, but I'm a bit of a caramel nut. When i saw this flavor, I have in and broke my rule and got a pint, even though I was leery of spending so much on an unfamiliar product. I have a strict budget, and only allow myself to get a ""comfort food"" treat once a month, so that I'm not tempted to buy junk food when I'm really in need of that ""comfort"" factor. I'm SO glad I took the chance! This is the best caramel ice cream i have ever had! My only regret is that out only comes in pint containers.";;;
Cold Brew Caramel Latte
author: BrianNYC
title: Finally an ice(cream) caramel latte!
text;;;: I bought this flavor a couple of weeks ago and it has now become my all time favorite ice cream! If you love coffee ice creams and caramel this is the perfect ice cream for you! Mixing the cold brew ice cream with sweet cream allows for a much more subtle coffee flavor and really emphasizes the trio of flavors goes together exceptionally well.;;;

name: Cold Brew Caramel Latte,goziii,2020-05-27,5,Rare Find!,1,0,"This ice cream is so good that I’m eating it right now. I love Ben & Jerry’s and I love coffee ice cream. So when I went looking for ice cream I went to the 7-11 down the street. Had I known this was going to be so good, I would’ve bought the rest of whatever they had in stock!";;;

Cold Brew Caramel Latte,nikkibeethatsme,2020-07-29,5,"If you like coffee, this is for you!",1,0,"I absolutely love this flavor. We bought one pint and went back for two more, then we showed them to our friends and they went and bought some! The best flavor I’ve ever had.";;;

Cold Brew Caramel Latte,Dragonfire8910,2020-07-13,5,SO GOOD,1,0,"This is so good? I don’t usually like coffee icecream but this is amazing. Definitely has a lot of caffeine, but luckily I have adhd and am therefore immune.";;;
Cold Brew Caramel Latte
author: christianbean
title: Best Caramel Ice cream EVER
text;;;: Bought one last week at a 7/11 and saw that they’re exclusive so I had to go back yesterday stock up on a few!;;;

name: Cold Brew Caramel Latte,drewwwtimus,2020-09-22,5,Amazing & Satisfying!,0,0,"To say I love ice cream is an understatement. I eat a pint of Ben & Jerry's every night (that is not a typo). I usually do half baked and try other ""exclusive"" flavors when I need a change. I saw this flavor at 7-11 and decided to try it. Wow! This is my new favorite flavor! It tastes like genuine cold-brew coffee, not a cheap, overly sweet imitation. The sweet creme ice cream gives the perfect amount of sweetness without being too much. And the slightly salted caramel swirls are to die for. The combination of flavors is the perfect balance. It's not too sweet or heavy and is actually refreshing. There's no chunks, so if you love creamy ice cream like me give this flavor a try! Tastes just like that popular chain's caramel frappuccino. Only problem is that I bought every one at my 7-11 and can't find any more! I'm absolutely in love with and addicted to this flavor and hope it becomes a staple.";;;

Cold Brew Caramel Latte,Jmkbabe,2019-12-07,1,Disappointing,0,3,"I bought this tonight. I love Ben and Jerry’s, this flavor was the only one left at 7-11..... about four bites fixed my sweats craving, however- despite my love for coffee and my love for icecream - this just doesn’t taste quite right. Way too potent on the coffee side, and I like espresso straight. Not going to buy again :(";;;
Cold Brew Caramel Latte,JLNM,2019-06-18,5,Great Flavor,1,3,"so creamy and yummy, i love the chunks and swirls so much";;;

Everything But The...,Eileen,2018-01-22,1,Everything other than what it used to be!,26,3,"I have bought this flavor for years and it was my favorite ice cream EVER! However when you changed the recipe and took the HEATH out of it I noticed immediately! I thought I had bought a bad batch, and after a few bites threw it away. After 4 more batches with the same disgusting taste, I wondered why I was eating ice cream that tasted like rusty metal! And sure enough it was the NEW “Toffee Pieces”. They are so bad I can no longer eat this. What a tremendous disappointment. I could eat another brand of ice cream with a rusty spoon and it would taste less like metal than the New everything but the.....NEVER AGAIN!";;;

Everything But The...,DMAC,2019-06-01,4,"Love this flavor, but...",28,1,"This is my go-to choice every time I'm needing a fix. It's close to being perfection in a pint. However, I miss the Heath brand chocolate covered toffee pieces. It just hasn't been the same since the switch. Am I the only one that thinks the current toffee has almost a medicinal or metallic taste? Would love to see a better toffee choice in the future. That's not strong enough....PLEASE GIVE US BETTER TOFFEE PIECES!!!";;;

Everything But The...,Hrshanahan,2017-09-10,4,Where's the toffee?,4,0,"This flavor is one of my favorites! I fell in love with it the first time I had it, it was packed full of peanut butter cups and huge pieces of toffee. However the past couple time I've had it I only get shavings of toffee, and a couple peanut butter cups. was there a recipe change? Smaller toffee and more nuts? Fewer PB cups? I'll still purchase this flavor! Just disappointed to not find large toffee pieces and more delicious PB cups";;;

Everything But The...,Alanna P,2020-06-10,5,Delicious Flavors!,2,0,"I got this ice cream for the first time after finding out about Ben and Jerry's no nonsense stance agaisnt white supremacy and was not disappointed! Absolutely delicious, I ate every morsel I could get! The peanut butter cups were massive and delicious, the toffee pieces were really yummy for me, and the white chocolate was not overpowering, as white chocolate can sometimes be, but added a nice addition. I will certainly get this flavor again and am excited to try other flavors in the future!";;;

Everything But The...,Shan,2017-07-06,1,Where did Everything go?,6,3,"There is a complete lack of ""everything"" in this! I've had four in a row with no toffee, and very little of anything else. Seriously?? When you pay a premium for ice cream that is stingy, it is not premium, it is a waste of money! Very disappointed! Been a forever fan, but I'm done hoping it was a temporary issue, it has been consistently lacking. So sad, but time to say goodbye):";;;
Everything But The...
author: Elizabeth
title: Awesome Except the Toffee
text;;;: The toffee isn't nearly as good as when it used to have Heath bars in it - it tastes a little more sour to me. But everything else is fantastic. This is by far my favorite B&J flavor.;;;

name: Everything But The...,FuzzyGut,2018-06-08,3,"Almost great, but misses",4,1,"Ben and Jerry’s is hands down my favorite brand! As for this flavor, the ice cream is great, as are the peanut butter cups, but the toffee is not good at all. I never had this when Heath was used but I can imagine it was far better. The nuts were ok but I won’t be buying this flavor again. Others are far better. Sorry, folks.";;;

Everything But The...,may_g13,2018-09-18,1,Peanut butter cup overload,2,0,"This ice cream was practically taken over by pb cups. While I do love pb cups, I wanted more of a variety in this ice cream. I only got two pieces of the toffee and less than 5 almonds. The white chocolate was there which was delicious but my favorite is the toffee and unfortunately it was lacking. Overall, it’s good if you’re in the mood for peanut butter cups.";;;
Everything But The...
author: Kokoabuttah
title: Pregnant go to
text;;;: I bought this ice cream honestly because the supermarket was having a sale and they didn’t have the kind I originally wanted no brand shall be named being that I’m 38 weeks pregnant and can never make my mind up on what I want the list of ingredients sounded like a delicious combination of everything I wanted to try so I bought one. I thought it was vanilla ice cream with chocolate swirls but it’s not its Chocolate and vanilla ice cream togetherI honestly don’t even like chocolate ice cream but to my surprise it was delicious!!!!! . I would love to see more pnutbutter cups in there but beside that it was amazing.Now I find my self going straight to this brand and this flavor no matter if it’s on sale or not.;;;

name: Everything But The...,HorriblebooTM,2018-08-23,2,Um...,1,0,"So I just got this stuff from a local drug store because I’ve never had Ben and Jerry’s before. I was so excited to try it! Once I did, I had to spit it out in the sink. The chocolate, vanilla, and almonds are good, but the toffee covered fudge chunks tasted nothing like hoe they sound. They tasted like blood or rusty metal. Yuck! I thought I could just work my way around the blood tasting fudge pieces, but no, the metallic flavor was everywhere! Not getting this flavor again!";;;

Everything But The...,ColumbiaH,2018-11-11,1,Sounded good but tasted awful,4,1,"I have no idea what it was but randomly through eating it I’d get this terrible taste in my mouth. I came to read other reviews and someone else summed it up perfectly. The toffee tasted like rusty metal! great idea, but something in this is off.";;;

Everything But The...,Shannon,2017-07-01,3,Everything but the Peanut Butter Cups,4,2,"I debated between this and Coffee Toffee Bar Crunch for quite a while but ultimately decided on this because of the Peanut Butter Cups, but there wasn't a single peanut butter cup, if you can believe it!? There was a very generous amount of large Toffee bars, which was nice, but it certainly did fulfill my Peanut butter craving. No hard feelings, just saying!";;;

Everything But The...,kleemargaret,2018-09-02,3,Not the Same,1,1,"5 years ago, Everything But The was my favorite treat. I ate a pint a week and I was in love. Then, one day, I opened a new pint of the ice cream and found that the Heath Bar part tasted a little funky. I thought at the time that I got a bad batch of the ice cream and bought a new one. Sadly, I realized that there had been a switch of the Heath Bar permanently. For the past 5 years, I have eaten around the metallic tasting toffee. I still love the flavor, but I beg that we can switch back to the original taste.";;;

Everything But The...,prospermom,2019-04-05,3,Please use better TOFFEE!,1,0,"This was my favorite ice cream in the whole world (five stars!) UNTIL the ""new"" toffee. From the other reviews I read, I know your other fans agree with me. And of course this applies to all your other flavors that have Toffee as well, that I USED to enjoy, like Coffee Heath Bar. I appreciate the Non_GMO/Fairtrade efforts, but can you please source Toffee that meets your standards and actually tastes good? The toffee is missing the buttery taste. Or maybe gets Hershey's on board with making some special non GMO Toffee just for you guys? I used to love digging for ""treasure"": the gooey, slightly melted toffee pockets were my favorite part. Now, I don't buy this ice cream nearly as much as I used to, but when I do, I dig around the toffee and throw it away, which is wasteful. I cant just add Heath bars to this myself because they will not get those gooey carmelly toffee pockets.";;;

Everything But The...,Specie,2019-09-29,2,What Happened??,1,0,"This was always my favorite flavor. Lately, though, the Heath Bar pieces and Peanut Butter Cups are few and far between. Like almost non-existent. Just some tiny round balls of chocolate with almonds inside (I think), and flat pieces of chocolate. Are the new owners cheaping out? Please bring back the original - it was one of the best ice creams on the planet!";;;

Everything But The...,Rmg1188,2019-08-19,3,Inconsistent,0,0,"When I crave ice cream this is what I crave. It's literally all of my favorite candies in one ice cream. But it's really hit or miss with the amount of candy in it. Sometimes I'm completely missing toffee pieces, or white chocolate pieces it just depends. There never seems to be a shortage of the peanut butter cup though. I just wish the candy ratio was more balanced and consistent. I literally never know what I'm gonna get when I buy this, but i still buy it anyway because even on its worst day it's still pretty darn good.";;;

Everything But The...,karlena,2018-03-24,2,Everything But The Delicious,0,0,"I've never been disappointed with Ben and Jerry's in the few months I've been buying pints. I like to try a new flavor every time. The description of this flavor sounded to die for, so I snagged a pint. However, I'm very disappointed in the flavor of the candy chunks. The white ""fudge"" tastes like plastic or has some sort of chemical aftertaste and the toffee pieces taste metallic/rusty. The chocolate ice cream and the peanut butter cups are what enabled me to keep eating it and not throw it in the trash.";;;

Everything But The...,pointeful,2017-05-29,5,Absolute favorite,1,0,"My mom bought this flavor my entire childhood and got me hooked on it! Everything in it works seamlessly and provides a different, sweet, chocolaty taste with every bite! The inclusion of the two kinds of ice cream makes it even better!";;;
Everything But The...
author: Douglas
title: Used to be good
text;;;: This was really good back when this had Heath toffee bars in it. Sadly this is not the case anymore. The new toffee bars are metallic tasting. On top of that all stores within 25 miles of me stopped carrying it. Might be the taste???;;;

name: Everything But The...,Nikhug,2020-02-05,3,the loss of Heath,1,0,"Still a fan, but the loss of real Heath bar really downgraded the product. On my bookshelf I have an empty pint of the last container with real Heath bar in it, a happy reminder of a better time in a better product";;;
Everything But The...
author: James_ice_cream
title: PLEASE CHANGE BACK TO OLD RECIPE
text;;;: Why why why would you guys change my favorite ice cream?! Please go back to the old mix... Im sure people would pay a little more for it if that's the issue...;;;

name: Everything But The...,SadStoryGirl,2017-11-27,1,Disappointed.,1,0,"I decided to try a new flavor, and this sounded appealing. Ugh, I was wrong. Hate the combination. Toffee pieces too big. I'll stick to the ones I know work.";;;
Everything But The...
author: Mary
title: It truely does have Everything But the
text;;;: I but 7 pints of this a week and eat every one of them!!! I will drive to every store in my area if I cant find it!!! The best ice cream I've ever eaten!!!;;;

name: Everything But The...
author: Beemandyd
title: My Favorite Flavor!
text;;;: I've been coming back to this flavor for years. It hasn't disappointed me where I need to try a new flavor but I'm sure the others are just as good if not better! I always recommend this flavor and I am disappointed when sold out!;;;

name: Everything But The...,Dianne,2018-06-17,5,Best flavor!,0,0,"This has been my ""go to"" flavor for years! It combines the best of everything (which means no cloying caramel)! I can never choose between chocolate and vanilla, so I don't need to with this flavor. I love the big peanut butter cup chunks, toffee pieces, and fudge covered almonds. These three items are my favorite mix-ins at any ice cream parlor. Most Ben & Jerry flavors are good, but this one is exceptional and 100% perfect.";;;
Everything But The...,Andig,2017-07-28,1,"Only the kitchen sink, nothing else!",2,2,Not much going on here for me.. New York Supa Fudge Chunk kinda gal so maybe that's why!;;;

Everything But The...,BAR507,2017-09-24,5,What's not to love!,1,1,"With all the peanut butter cups, chocolate toffee chunks, chocolaty almonds and white chocolate deliciousness, the only thing that would make this flavor better is whipped cream! But, I guess that's the but!";;;
Everything But The...
author: Ckebb
title: ALL ICE CREAM
text;;;: Ok I saw this and saw the peanut butter cups and I was like yes I’m craving peanut butter lemme get this one. And then I bought it and there was 3 PIECES OF PEANUT BUTTER LIKE WHAT. It was LITERALLY all Ice cream I was not happy. And the other things like the almonds and whatever that other thing is was so so and there wasn’t much of that either. Yea like this is just all I’ve cream.;;;

name: Everything But The...
author: Big Boiiii
title: So good!
text;;;: I saw that this flavor had under 4 stars average and thought it was criminal. Here's my boost for an awesome flavor!;;;

name: Everything But The...,Ineedtoffee,2018-09-15,4,Everything but the Toffee,0,0,"This is my absolute favorite. I didn't really mind the switch from the heath toffee to the current. However, I recently brought a pint the other day and there was no toffee whatsoever in my pint. How are the batches being made now? It seems like for the price you would literally get some of everything. I would appreciate better service.";;;

Everything But The...,Ryan,2017-10-09,2,Did NOT Like the PB Cups,0,0,"Purchased a pint of this ice cream within the last couple of weeks at the local grocery store. The PB cups were not up to par with the quality of the other ingredients. Overall, just not a distinct taste to this pairing of ingredients. Disappointed, at best. Recommendations: Chunky Monkey (always);" Truffle Kerfuffle (!).""";;
Everything But The...
author: MKracken
title: Miss this Flavor!
text;;;: Everything But The has always been my favorite flavor even when they changed to different pieces. I love the blend of flavors and large chunks of stuff. However it’s not carried in stores around me anymore! I’m starting to worry it’s being discontinued.;;;

name: Everything But The...
author: Runningskunk53
title: I love everything but the
text;;;: I get everything but the every night and yet the past few nights it’s been like freakin peanut butter cup lovers cuz that’s all that’s in there is peanut butter cups I’m getting very disappointed with everything but the now;;;

name: Everything But The...,Ashlynn,2018-08-09,2,Why is it discontinued?,0,1,"This is my absolute favorite ice cream and I came home from deployment to find that all the stores near me stopped carrying it because it’s discontinued it’s all I’ve wanted for the past year l, this is truly upsetting";;;

Everything But The...,Mel19,2018-08-02,4,My favorite flavor,0,0,"This is honestly my favorite flavor ice cream. However, I don't like the metallic tasting toffee pieces, I usually give those bites to my son that doesn't mind the metallic taste. Please get better toffee pieces!!";;;

Everything But The...,Bowlgouge,2020-08-11,1,Everything but the goods,0,0,"If you like plain vanilla and chocolate ice cream with nothing else, then this is the flavor for you. If you purchase this flavor expecting PB cups, toffee bits, and white chocolately chunks look elsewhere.";;;
Everything But The...
author: Joycie
title: Horrible taste and odd gravel in pint?
text;;;: I bought this a week ago and took one bite and noticed an awful rusty iron taste as I bit into a very gritty something. I tried a few more bites and every single bite tasted like metal. Very dissapointed .;;;

name: Everything But The...,Sarasue92,2018-08-14,4,Love it!,0,0,"This is one of my favorite ice creams, I have to hide it in a frozen vegetable bag in the freezer so my daughter and boyfriend don't eat it. The only thing it needs is a little more vanilla ice cream.";;;
Everything But The...
author: Tallal
title: Lovely
text;;;: What can I say? What's not to love? Two of my favorite candy. Toffee and peanut butter cups. Lovely combination. Only thing Want more pieces in it. Fully loaded please. Thanks Ben and Jerry's.;;;

name: Everything But The...,Apethecake,2017-09-07,5,So good I gained weight from eating too much of it,0,0,"This ice cream is the best ice cream I've ever had in my 20 years of life. I would eat it everyday if i could! Ben and Jerry, you are a blessing for my heart but a cruse for my body!!!!";;;

Everything But The...,MsBluewings,2019-04-07,5,What else could you ask for?!!!,0,0,"Oh my, and I thought ""Phish Food"" was going to be my favorite for LIFE. Well, I found my new favorite for LIFE! Great combinations and well blended. Big chunks and whole pieces GALORE!!";;;

Everything But The...,tonezib,2017-06-23,5,Fantastic,0,0,"I love this flavor. It is Devine. In May, for the first time ever, two of the things were not in the pint. I've kind of noticed this lately, I hope it's not the new owners.";;;

Everything But The...,The Bombshell,2018-03-08,5,THE BEST ICE CREAM EVER MADE ON PLANET EARTH!!,0,0,"Let me tell you something people! If you have not tasted this ice cream, you have not lived. Every single bite is different and my god it's addictive! Very Therapuetic!";;;

Everything But The...,KingBob,2020-04-11,5,The best ever specially the salted almonds.,0,0,"I used to have one of this at least once a week and love the salted almonds, reeses ans heats chocolate pieces. Unfortunately it looks like only exists at US market now.";;;

Everything But The...,Maxdonaldo,2018-03-18,4,Interesting Flavor Combos,0,0,"Every bite is like a new flavor with all that’s in there! That said, I wish it were a little better. Maybe if the chocolate ice cream were richer. But still—its good!";;;

Everything But The...,Aanstead,2017-09-10,5,Everything I want!,0,0,"I love this ice cream! When I first tried it I was skeptical, but I love everything in this ice cream. I just wish it was consistently sold in my grocery store.";;;

Everything But The...,Meeshell,2018-01-30,5,My Go-To Pint!,0,0,"This is the perfect blend of everything, especially since you don't have to choose between chocolate and vanilla ice cream! My favorite is the toffee pieces.";;;

Everything But The...,Qjeenah,2018-11-29,5,My favourite flavour!,0,0,"This is the best flavour because it has a little bit of everything. Chocolate covered almonds, white fudge pieces, peanut butter cups... i want some NOW!";;;
Everything But The...
author: toffeelover
title: Everything but the Toffee!
text;;;: This used to be my favorite flavor until they removed the toffee. I could not find even a single piece of toffee in the entire pint. Very disappointing.;;;

name: Everything But The...
author: pepgirl78
title: Awesome flavor
text;;;: This is the best flavor... Can't get enough... It tastes like heaven.. Wish it came in a bigger size... Just finished a pint and want more...;;;

name: Everything But The...
author: Kammie69
title: Aww
text;;;: This is by far my favorite in the world i live 5 mins.away from borgata an they dont carry it...please please bring it to ben an jerry's their..;;;

name: Everything But The...,ToughSissy,2017-11-03,5,My Favorite,0,0,"The chocolate is rich, the vanilla is mellow and digging with the spoon is like treasure hunting. The peanut butter cups are like hitting gold!";;;
Everything But The...
author: Becky11117
title: AMAZING
text;;;: Every time I get ice cream cravings this is my go to! I’m not a big fan of dark chocolate but with the flavor combinations it works!;;;

name: Everything But The...,Cocosdad,2019-08-28,5,My Favorite,0,0,"This has always been my favorite, but can't find it in any stores in my location. I look for l look for it everywhere we go.";;;
Everything But The...
author: SUNFLOWER23
title: Absolutely love
text;;;: This flavor is amazing. I absolutely love it. The only downside is I can not find it in any store near me now. COME BACK!!!!;;;

name: Everything But The...,Blake6900,2020-06-08,5,Personal favorite,0,0,"I rarely see this flavor while shopping but anytime I do, I have to buy myself some. If you love chocolate, you'll love this";;;

Everything But The...,Icecreamaddict55,2018-05-21,5,Everything I Want,0,0,"It's everything I want but not too much. It checks all the boxes of what a good ice cream needs. Nuts, chips and chocolate.";;;
Everything But The...,Kim J,2020-03-22,5,Miss everything but the,0,0,"I love, love, love the Ben & Jerry’s everything but the. I have been looking for months and cannot find it. HELP!!!";;;
Everything But The...
author: jasminesb418
title: I love this flavor
text;;;: This flavor is so good I don’t get why it’s reviews are so low!! It has a lot of components but I think it’s bomb;;;

name: Everything But The...
author: Raye
title: Best Flavor!
text;;;: My mom introduced this flavor to me years ago. It’s my absolute favorite!❤️ I wish this came in a 48oz.;;;

name: Everything But The...
author: Nini1991
title: Nom Nom Nom
text;;;: Seriously one of my favorite flavors!!! It's always hard to choose between this one and half baked!;;;

name: Everything But The...
author: Brin
title: Favorite but
text;;;: I bought this because it’s my favorite but it had toffee and no Reese’s and no white chocolate;;;

name: Everything But The...
author: highup
title: hi
text;;;: is it called this bc there is a limited amount of ice cream and its a lot of toppings-lmk;;;

name: Everything But The...
author: Mike2312
title: Best Flavor
text;;;: This is by far my most favorite flavor and hope to see it stay around for a long time;;;

name: Everything But The...
author: Magicalmusing
