title: Best Flavor!!
text;;;: Anytime I want some Ben & Jerry's it's gotta be Everything But The... simply amazing;;;

name: Everything But The...
author: buner
title: AMAZING
text;;;: The toffee pieces are just heaven. Perfect blend of flavors and all things great.;;;

name: Everything But The...,Zac11,2019-07-14,5,Great texture,0,0,"Bought this too many times at this point, outrageously good ice cream";;;
Everything But The...
author: eliz13413
title: Delicious
text;;;: The title of my review sums it up: Delicious!! One of my favorites.;;;

name: Everything But The...
author: whatthemel
title: YUM
text;;;: One of my favorites! So much goodness packed into one flavor;;;

name: Everything But The...
author: Softycz
title: Everything is everything!
text;;;: My go to flavor fave! When I really want to treat myself.;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix
author: tortellini
title: Delicious Swirls
text;;;: The regular chocolate ice cream usually isn't the best but the salty pretzel swirly really elevates it to a new place. The combination creates a salted chocolate flavor that really keeps you coming back for more. Marshmallow swirls are always a good option over mini marshmallows and the almonds add a good crunch. I rounded this up to 5 stars but I would be interested in graham cracker or some type of pastry chunks along with or replacing the almonds. I just simply don't love almonds. Overall 4.5/5 Very good. Worth buying.;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix,Chip M,2019-05-16,5,"Love, love, LOVE Glampfire!!!",6,0,"I found this ice cream last year and bought way more than I should have over the summer and cleared out my local Target in the Fall. I mourned the loss of summer and this ice cream until I happened across five pints at that Target close to the holidays! It was a Christmas miracle that I savored well into the new year. Then it was gone...again. I thought that was it until I saw it today back on the shelves. THANK YOU, B&J for bringing this back. I hope this is a permanent summertime flavor!!! The salty/sweet combination is PERFECT!";;;
Glampfire Trail Mix
author: m4rski
title: Bring it back!!!!!
text;;;: Please bring it back B&J.;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix,tracymzuziak,2019-06-12,5,Best flavor EVER!,11,0,"I, myself, am not the biggest fan of ice cream, but I was stocking up for my husband, and I saw this exclusive flavor at Target. Got it home, tried it for myself, and went back the next day to get two more pints! I LOVE IT! The chocolate is so decadent. The marshmallow is scrumptious and the little bits of pretzel give it the perfect dash of crunch and salt. I cannot stop eating it. Dee-lish!";;;

Glampfire Trail Mix,FuzzyGut,2018-06-27,3,"Good, not great.",11,11,"I think Ben and Jerry’s does the best chocolate and fudgie flavors I’ve ever had, and this one is now exception. The pretzels were great tasting and nicely salty but was not so much a swirl and more chunks of pretzel here and there. The marshmallow was great and played well with the pretzel chunks against the chocolate background but honestly, the fudge covered almonds were kinda gross tasting and I had to eat around them. The real problem was that the pint wasn’t full! There was a big gap on the side of the container and that was rather frustrating. This came so close to being great but between the missing ice cream and the funky almonds, I think this one time will be my last for this flavor.";;;

Glampfire Trail Mix,chefamyj,2020-05-13,4,Good not great,0,1,"I'd give this an 8 out of 10. The chocolate I good, and marshmallow swirl is awesome(which I love) and the chocolate covered almond chunks are fantastic. And it would be 10 out of 10 except the pretzel part is waaay too salty. if it were actual pretzel pieces it would be ok too But in the container I got, the pretzel part was like the texture of wet sand and just too salty. Zero crunch at all and no defined pieces. just this salty paste. But the chocolate, marshmallows and almonds are so good. I'm wondering If I got a bad container because reading other people's reviews of this flavor, they had pretzel pieces in theirs. which would have been 10x better.";;;

Glampfire Trail Mix,Carolyn,2018-04-23,5,Obsessed!,7,0,"I tried this on a whim, and it is now my absolute favorite flavor ever! The combination of chocolate ice cream with slightly salty pretzel bits and globs of gooey marshmallow along with fudge covered almonds is just perfect. Please let this be a regular flavor and not just a limited edition. Pretty, pretty please!";;;

Glampfire Trail Mix,audrey1,2019-04-22,5,Please make this a permanent flavor!,5,0,"BEST FLAVOR EVER. The pretzel swirl is my favorite feature of any ice cream, and the fudge almonds are amazing with the salty pretzel. I was so disappointed when I stopped being able to find it in the store and really hope this flavor makes a comeback! I would make this a staple of my ice cream rotation :)";;;

Glampfire Trail Mix,Angie Mottk,2019-04-25,3,I loved the first pint of this but...,1,2,"I bought this last month and feel in love! The salty swirls are so delicious and the marshmallow took the show! I would have given this a 5 out of 5 based on that. But purchasing it again, it was basically chocolate ice cream with marshmallow. The pretzel swirls was NOT in my pint. Very disappointed in the hit or miss with the pints. I thought they was improving on this but that’s the second pint of this flavor with the skimpy mix ins. I get so disappointed when this happens being I only indulge once a week in ice cream so I want it to be good! Please work on this.";;;
Glampfire Trail Mix
author: Charm
title: Salty and sweet
text;;;: On behalf of all pre menopausal women... don’t let this one go. Crunchy and salty and marshmallowey chocolatey goodness. Best pint of ice cream I’ve ever eaten.;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix,capinmn,2019-01-08,5,PLEASE BRING IT BACK in 2019,2,0,"Love, Love, Love the Glampfire Trail Mix ice cream! This is the first ice cream that I haven't been able to put down and I must have ate it all, cause now I can't find it at any of the Targets. Please, Please, Please make it one of your staple ice creams. It is ridiculously good!! Nice job by the way!!";;;
Glampfire Trail Mix
author: CurlyGF18
title: BEST ICE CREAM EVER!!!
text;;;: I adore all kinds of chocolate ice cream and have a special place in my heart for Ben and Jerry’s (its always just perfectly rich) but this flavor is bar none my favorite ice cream of all time!! It was a seasonal Target only flavor so at the end of the season I bought 9 to last me until next summer!!;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix,ChrisColby,2020-03-05,3,Rocky Road-ish?,1,0,"Glampfire Trail Mix has chocolate ice cream with chocolate covered almonds, a marsmallow swirl, and a pretzel swirl. The base and almonds provide alot of chocolate flavor that dominates the taste buds when eaten in isolation. The salty pretzel swirl gives a nice crunch and heightens the chocolate, giving it a sort of dark chocolate taste. It's a little overbearing but luckily the sweet marshmallow swirl balances the other components out, providing a great flavor when eaten as a whole. Very close in fact to a rocky road but done better. The only problem is the amount of marshmallow isn't enough. Perhaps I just got a pint with less marshmallow but without more of it, the salty chocolate taste can be overpowering. A great flavor when all the components come together but a little too strong on the chocolate taste otherwise.";;;

Glampfire Trail Mix,NanasCone,2019-09-15,5,Might be my new favorite!,1,0,"Just picked up this pint today, and was blown away by how deliciously rich, textured, and addictive this flavor is. I loved the chocolate covered almonds, the rich chocolate icecream, against the gooey marshmallow, and the nicely salty graham cracker. I am no fan of those cloyingly sweet salted caramels flavors, so I wondered if the salted graham crackers would work. It was perfect! This would be my icecream s’more of choice. Please make this a regular flavor!";;;

Glampfire Trail Mix,IceCreamEnthusiast,2019-07-30,5,THE GREATEST ICE CREAM EVER,1,0,"As an avid ice cream enthusiast I’ve eaten my fair share of ice cream, but this flavor is hands down the greatest I’ve ever had. I stumbled upon it in summer 2018 and then spent an entire year searching for it at every store I went into for the last year. I just found it again and I bought the entire stock. PLEASE make this a permanent flavor! I never write reviews on anything.... but felt compelled to expressed my love for this amazing ice cream!";;;

Glampfire Trail Mix,Natf,2018-03-23,5,Awesome Mix!,2,0,"If you like heavenly hash icecream, this is just about the same thing. The marshmallows are very creamy, and the hint of salt from the pretzels accents the chocolate and almonds perfectly. This might be my new favorite flavor! Thanks Ben & Jerry.";;;
Glampfire Trail Mix
author: margie
title: cannot stop eating!
text;;;: Awesome ice cream! The add-ins to this ice cream are just terrific. The marshmallows and pretzels. I cannot stop eating this flavor. I hope you keep it in the rotation!!;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix,fastforwardgirl,2018-06-19,5,New FAVORITE Ben & Jerry's Flavor!,2,1,"Just bought this this past weekend for the kiddos! My favorite flavor before was Half Baked, but I took a bite of my son's pint of this Glampfire Trail Mix and honestly was MIND BLOWN! The saltiness of the pretzelness mixed with the sweetness of the marshmallow is PERFECT. The perfect texture and you won't be bored because there's always complex, changing flavors throughout! SO DELICIOUS! This is our new FAVORITE";;;

Glampfire Trail Mix,SamanthaPN,2019-01-08,5,MY NEW FAVORITE,2,1,"This is the most perfect ice cream I have ever eaten. I can’t smell, so I love strong flavors, and this ticks every box. Sweet, salty, creamy, good textures - it’s like ambrosia. When I suspected Target was going to stop carrying it over the winter, I bought 20 pints from my local stores and boy am I glad I did. I’ve had one a week since then, and recently ran out. I PRAY that this comes back next year!!!";;;
Glampfire Trail Mix
author: Bigbird
title: No pretzel!
text;;;: No pretzel swirl in some of them! So disappointing! I feel you owe me my money back for lying to me.;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix,kyla,2020-05-07,5,The best flavor,1,0,"I have a lot of favorite ice cream flavors but this is the best one, by far. I am OBSESSED with it, and they stopped stocking it at my local stores as well as the big box stores in my town about a year ago. I'm super sad about it, and still scour the shelf every single time, hoping it'll come back. The combination of flavors in this one is just perfect, hasn't been matched.";;;

Glampfire Trail Mix,RockMomma,2019-06-04,5,The best flavor there ever was!,0,0,"Glampfire Trail Mix is literally the best flavor of all time. I can’t think of anything better than rich chocolate ice cream with a pleasant sweetness and then BAM- salty pretzel, gooey marshmallow, and crunchy almonds. My local Target stopped carrying it during the winter months, and then there it was in the freezer section the other day....my heart almost stopped. They brought it back for the summer!! I jumped for joy like a little kid and bought a bunch of them. Never stop making this flavor. It’s life changing!";;;
Glampfire Trail Mix
author: RRatx
title: My absolute favorite
text;;;: I cannot believe this is not available everywhere!!!! I am a huge Ben and Jerry’s fan (like I get pints of B&Js instead of cake on my birthday).... this is my absolute favorite flavor! If I had a deep freezer I will just fill it with pints of Glampfire!;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix
author: Mdbenandjerry
title: The pretzel swirl rocks my world
text;;;: This flavor is so close to perfect. Only way it would be better is with more marshmallow and pretzel swirl. So GOOOOOD;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix
author: scoops
title: Love the Pretzel Swirl But Mix-ins Few & Burried
text;;;: This flavor has potential but needs better execution. The chocolate base is dark and goes well with the marshmallow swirl and pretzel swirl. There's some good texture with both swirls and a slight saltiness from the pretzel swirl.;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix,_jquig_,2019-07-02,5,Pretzel swirl is mind-blowing,0,0,"This flavor is now one of my top ice cream flavors of my life. The pretzel swirl is to die for, and the marshmallow swirl and almond chunks are a great addition. but really, that pretzel swirl is life. I hope it gets incorporated into more flavors! (In fact, a peanut butter world flavor with pretzel swirls might the best ice cream flavor I can imagine).";;;

Glampfire Trail Mix,Stormy9679,2019-07-28,5,Absolutely amazing!,0,0,"If you’re a chocolate lover and enjoy the regular s’mores flavor you love this one! I knew when I read the ingredients that I’d love it. From the very first bite to the last, it’s a flavor that I’ll never forget. It’s the perfect blend of chocolaty sweet and a hint of salty that will send your taste buds on a journey";;;

Glampfire Trail Mix,Carmella,2018-09-25,5,Best Flavor Ever,0,0,"I got this at Target and it was so amazing. I love ice cream and eat lots of it, and have tried many Ben and Jerry flavors. This was the best ice cream I ever had and my brother in-law agreed. Alas, I can't find it now and am heart broken. The lack of this flavor is driving me to try and make my own.";;;

Glampfire Trail Mix,Icecreamfan4life,2018-06-20,2,Not Glamping Girl,1,1,"I bought this flavor from my local Target last week along with a couple of other flavors. Figuring that, since I've come across a couple really good chocolate ice creams lately, I can't go wrong, right? Most especially with this being a B&J's flavor. But unfortunately, I have to say that this one missed the mark for me. :( I mean don't get me wrong, I had all the mix-in's, in the right amounts. But personally speaking, I felt like this was kind of another visit to salt lick city round two(first trip was via the Salted Caramel core flavor a while back), when I hit that pretzel swirl. I mean if I didn't eat straight from the middle where the marshmallow was and some of the not so salted part of the pretzels bits were or strictly the base that was on the outside of the swirl. I was just totally bombarded with a bunch of salt from the main part of the pretzel swirl. And it was soooo not good. Add to that, I am not quite sure what kind of fudge was made or bought to coat the almonds. But I beg of you B&J's, please find a way to tweak the recipe, some how. As I thought eating a couple of those would offset the salty flavor as well. But nope, the taste of that particular fudge just was not very appetizing to me. I'd recommend the fudge that is used to make the fish in Phish Food. But definitely not this new recipe. Sorry.";;;

Glampfire Trail Mix,Robyntheriveter,2019-10-29,5,Crying joyful tears,0,0,"Never have I ever left an Ice cream review and that stops here. Pretzels and ice cram go together like Freddie and Queen. I’ve been longing for a day where pretzels have made it into these precious pints and I will feel personally attacked if this flavor ever vanishes. Nice work B&J, prouda you.";;;
Glampfire Trail Mix
author: Chicksluvrock
title: Addicting
text;;;: This is definitely my new favorite Ben and Jerry’s flavor. The pretzel swirl has that perfect saltiness that is so addictive and pairs well with the chocolate ice cream. The fudge almonds add a nice crunch and the marshmallow brings it up a notch. Great job on this flavor! Love it very much!;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix
author: QueenofEverything
title: Wow.
text;;;: This is exactly what I was expecting! The chocolate isn't too overpowering or overly chocolatey and the pretzel swirl gives just the right amount of pretzel flavor with a hint of saltiness. The marshmallow swirl adds a nice touch. Definitely my new favorite. I hope this one never goes away!;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix,lionslover33,2018-04-29,2,Too Salty,0,2,"Tried this flavor last week, was very excited for the combination but found it to be WAY too salty. I threw the carton out after a few bites. Very disappointed, could have been a great flavor. Spend your money on their better flavors, Phish food, Cheesecake, Half Baked, etc.";;;

Glampfire Trail Mix,Nursikins,2019-10-08,5,Omg! Yes!!!,0,0,"This is my favorite flavor right now. The chocolate ice cream is reminiscent of what I remember having as a kid, the pretzel swirl is just the right amount of salty with the chocolate and the surprise swirl of marshmallow round toss pint out to make the perfect bite.";;;

Glampfire Trail Mix,nearlyvegan,2020-05-24,5,Target employee that set this up deserves a raise,0,0,"Favorite flavor ever. I make special trips past my grocery store to Target for this flavor, with a backpack full of frozen packs, then run home as fast as I can so it's still frozen... because it never even sees my freezer before the empty container finds the trash.";;;
Glampfire Trail Mix
author: heidi19
title: Move over Phish Food - this is my new flavor!
text;;;: I LOVE this flavor. I'm nervous about it being an only summer time flavor so whenever I see it at Target it have to stock up! I hope this flavor stays in their normal rotation! When you get the pretzel swirls it is a great surprise with the chocolate. Sooooo good!;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix,KW30,2020-09-14,5,AH-MAZING!!!!!,0,0,"I love, love, love this ice cream flavor and can't get enough of it!!!! Thank you, B&Js for coming up with this one!!! I now have my dad hooked on it, so I'm responsible for bringing it to him when I can find it. It truly makes my day eating this ice cream!";;;
Glampfire Trail Mix
author: Katie04
title: NEED IN EVERY STORE!!
text;;;: I wish this wasn’t only in target... I have to drive to two sometimes three different targets to find it in stock. Hands down best ever. I wish there was more salted pretzel swirl because that’s my favorite part. B&J’s please sell this at other stores too!!;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix,glampfirefan,2020-06-04,5,Like classic Rocky Road...only better!!,0,0,"This was the best impulse buy of my life. I’ve discovered my new favorite B&J’s flavor!! But I can only find it at Target, and the “exclusive” packaging makes me fearful that it’s gonna go away...say it isn’t so!";;;

Glampfire Trail Mix,Yomart,2019-06-09,5,The best flavor yet!!!!,0,0,"I know this is only at Target, and I’m reeeeeeeeally hoping it’s not just temporary flavor! I need this to be available everywhere, all the time!!! Seriously obsessed with this flavor. Please don’t let it go away! My favorite since “The Gob Father!”";;;
Glampfire Trail Mix
author: Janine T
title: My New Go-To
text;;;: I absolutely love this flavor! The only thing I don't like is that its an exclusive flavor. It's the perfect mix of salty and sweet while the marshmallow adds an extra creamy texture. Really hope I'm buying enough to turn this to a regular flavor...;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix,khcruise,2019-08-24,5,My favorite!,0,0,"Discovered this one a couple months ago. I absolutely love it. Right amount of ingredients. So many other flavors just have way to many things crammed in there and I can't stand the core options. Please make this one permanent, pretty please!";;;
Glampfire Trail Mix
author: CatB
title: SOOO DELICIOUS!!
text;;;: This ice cream would be in my top 5 favorite flavors. My number one is phish food and this tastes veryyy similar but in an original creative way! And it’s such a unique flavor. My only complaint is that it’s not available in all grocery chains!;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix
author: melanieMichele
title: Absolutely amazing
text;;;: I absolutely love the pretzel swirl and chocolate covered almonds in the rich chocolate ice cream with a marshmallow swirl. The only thing I would change is I wish the chocolate covered almonds were larger!;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix,mstearns13,2018-08-01,5,Favorite flavor of ice cream EVER,0,0,"I bought this because I love chocolate covered pretzels, but the mix of pretzels, almonds, and marshmallow is absolutely unreal. It was as if this flavor was custom tailored to my taste buds.";;;
Glampfire Trail Mix
author: Lara
title: Perfection
text;;;: I have bought a pint of this every time I’ve been to the store in the last couple of weeks. Last time I went they were sold out and I died a little inside. Please keep this amazing flavor.;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix
author: Bearsie
title: My New Fav!!
text;;;: I’m always trying to find the perfect balance between sweet and salty- and this is it!! The pretzel swirl is so delicious! I always buy multiple pints when I see this in the store.;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix
author: Stephaniern7
title: PLEASE MAKE THIS PERMANENT!
text;;;: This ice cream is amazing- from the salty crunchy pretzel swirls to the gooey marshmallow to the surprises of fudge almonds. Please look at the reviews and make this permanent!;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix,Mam766,2020-02-28,5,The best ice cream ever,0,0,"This is literally the perfect mixture of sweet and salty. I would do anything for this ice cream and i can only find it at target. My absolute all time favorite, i am in love.";;;
Glampfire Trail Mix
author: Kitkatlin
title: Like phish food but BETTER
text;;;: I LOVE this new ice cream. The almonds add crunch and the pretzels are surprisingly delicious and compliment the rest of this perfectly salty sweet treat.;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix
author: MaryElizabeth
title: Amazing - in top 3 of all time for your flavors!
text;;;: In love with this flavor. One of the best you've produced - please keep it around and offer more outlets for it in South Dartmouth MA!;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix,Maryisabelle_,2020-03-15,5,My FAVE B&J flavor!!,0,0,"Hands down best flavor out there, every bit of this complements each other, just fabulous!! It’s a must have, PLEASE keep it coming!!";;;
Glampfire Trail Mix
author: Krab06
title: New Obsession
text;;;: I absolutely LOVE this ice cream! It’s an obsession at this point. Would love to see more of it in the stores. Yummy deliciousness!!!;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix
author: BoydLake17
title: So Happy!
text;;;: ChubbyHubby is very rare up here in northern Maine. My go to is usually Phish food. I have FINALLY found the best of both worlds!;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix
author: mike66
title: Great Taste For to eat
text;;;: A perfect balance of both sweet and salty as well as a perfect concentration of almonds throughout to give it a nice crunch.;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix
author: FLIceCreamMan
title: Among my new favorites
text;;;: This is a great mix of savory and sweet and the ice cream is very smooth. It's quickly become one of my favorites.;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix
author: Caspian
title: One of my favorite flavors
text;;;: Nice mix of texture and flavors. All the ingredients stand out without overpowering each other.;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix,CTINA,2019-11-07,5,5 STARS!!,0,0,"By far my favorite ice cream!!!! Hate that it is an exclusive flavor, don't want to see it go!";;;
Glampfire Trail Mix
author: Mandyanne
title: Perhaps my favorite B&J flavor
text;;;: The salty sweet crunch to creamy ratios are so perfect here. I am sad this is limited edition.;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix
author: Stephl
title: Amazing!
text;;;: This flavor is my new favorite and I am super picky when it comes to ice cream!;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix
author: Su123
title: I LOVE IT!!
text;;;: I just tried it last night and I’m on my 3rd rub! Please keep in the market!;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix,Joelle,2019-10-14,5,New Fave?,0,0,"This unseated my long-mourned, lost favorite, Late Night Snack. Excellent.";;;
Glampfire Trail Mix
author: LindsKOP
title: Best I’ve ever had
text;;;: This is the best flavor of B&J that I have EVER had! I need more!!!;;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix
author: ericg87
title: Amazing!
text;;;: This is your best yet! The perfect mix of sweet and salty :);;;

name: Glampfire Trail Mix
author: sskk0825
title: Life Changer
text;;;: The. Best. Ever. Unreal tasty goodness in your mouth.;;;

name: Half Baked,blueman,2017-09-18,1,Quality has gone downhill -- cannot recommend,4,10,"I've been eating and basking in this flavor for as long as it's been around, but it's now awful. As pointed out by another, the cookie dough is like a stale malt ball now, and the brownie also sees degraded. But the cookie dough is horrible now. I thought this was a fluke, but I see it's happened to others and to me for the last month or so with multiple purchases.";;;

Half Baked,Moxie,2019-07-24,5,My Go-To Comfort Ice Cream,15,0,"This flavor is amazing. Its everything you didn't even know you wanted all in one. Vanilla AND chocolate ice cream, chocolate chip cookie dough AND brownies. I can't drop my craving. Plus you get A LOT of the cookie dough and brownie, and I mean A LOT.";;;
Half Baked
author: Derecia
title: No brownie in my half baked pint ☹️
text;;;: I bought me a pint of Ben and jerrys half baked last night at QT reading the description excited to try it mainly because of the brownie chunks but there wasn't any brownie it was mostly just chocolate and vanilla ice cream with hard balls of cookie dough. And I paid 6.99$ bummer;;;

name: Half Baked
author: Melody32
title: Sadly the reports are true
text;;;: I bought this ice cream because I was having a huge craving and I found that sadly the negative reports are all true. The brownie was a crusty and dried out consistency and the cookie dough was quite dry and chalky. I am still a fan of Ben and Jerry’s (I used to work there and I also appreciate their sincere care for humans and the environment) and I hope this flavor does get fixed because it’s a complete mess right now.;;;

name: Half Baked,fatisflavor,2017-07-20,5,OMG(oodness),4,1,"I wanted a treat this evening but I had no idea what I was getting into with Half Baked. So good it is dangerous. The remains of the pint are deep in my freezer now but I feel the urge to set it free. Great balance of vanilla and a superb chocolate ice cream and generous bites of brownie. The perfect way to eat brownie, too - saturated with creamy rich ice cream. And THEN there is cookie dough, too! It ALL tastes good, together and individually.";;;

Half Baked,Ashenfox,2019-08-14,1,"Chalk, not cookie dough.",2,2,"What happened to this flavor? During the last few months in Europe, there is no more cookie dough in this flavor. Replaced by some kind of white chalky substance that has an unpleasant texture. I threw away the first one like this, wasting 8e, when the second one was the same I ate it anyway thinking it must just be a recipe change and observed that the brownie is also compromised, like hard and stale. Now a third one is like this and I see similar comments. Something wrong here. Please fix it. How could this happen to such a flagship product without you noticing?";;;

Half Baked,alishamhorton,2019-08-14,5,,0,0,"Ben & Jerry's Half Baked Ice Cream is a treat sent from the heavens above. When I tell you I was eating this ice cream every single day....I am by no means exaggerating. You might be thinking, ""Oh she was just eating a scoop here and there."" NOPE. I would eat the entire pint and go to the store the next day to buy another one. This went on for MONTHS! Now, I definitely had to slow down because eating that much sugar on a regular basis was making my thighs a little thicker than I would've like but, hey, I still curl up on the couch every now and then, turn on a good movie or tv series on Netflix, and eat my go to comfort snack, Ben & Jerry's Half Baked Ice Cream. This ice cream honestly shouldn't be as good as it is. It's a sin! A yummy sin...haha!";;;

Half Baked,Hannahsmq,2017-06-18,1,Cookie dough is chalky and dry,11,10,"I used to love this flavor and have been enjoying it for years. Unfortunately I had to stop buying it because every pint I have purchased over the past year has contained dry, chalky cookie dough - not the buttery, creamy dough that I grew to love. This flavor used to be so decadent. I sent a letter last year to let them know, but nothing changed after their response. I am pretty bummed that this is still an issue.";;;

Half Baked,Jackie68,2017-05-04,5,HALF BAKED,2,0,"I mean look it's simple every one loves gooie cookies An gooie brownies even the batter , An yes I've tried your brownie batter core ice cream but I'll save that for another time, because half baked deserves nothing but 5 stars An an a min for some gloating of its own lol you guys are awesome keep doing what you do , p.s your impact is far beyond ice cream, it touches homes An hearts everywhere<3";;;

Half Baked,Emily D,2018-08-12,2,What happened to the brownie and cookie dough?!,0,0,"I always loved Half Baked, but the last three pints I have purchased over the past few years (from various locations) have been awful. This is the second pint in a row that I have thrown away almost full. I am writing this review because I think the company needs to look into this. The brownie and cookie dough chunks almost feel like some sort of low-cal, diet substitutes of their former selves. They are chalky, dry, and difficult to eat. The ice cream is still good, but overall the experience is pretty terrible. I have to give up on this flavor. It's not worth the calories anymore!";;;

Half Baked,happybarry,2019-06-30,5,"If you want happy, this is it",0,0,"The delicious, fat chunks of brownies with such rich (but not too heavy, as it should) chocolate ice cream pair oh so perfectly with the decadent vanilla and old school cookie dough! 10/10 everytime, my go to.";;;
Half Baked
author: amandag1
text;;;: Ben & Jerrys Half Baked has been my go- to B&J flavor for a decade now... its delicious! It has all my faves in one- chocolate & vanilla ice creams with chunks of cookie dough & gooey brownie bits. Heaven!;;;

name: Half Baked,Mmhale08,2017-09-24,3,Hopefully just a bad batch...,2,0,"Half baked has always been my favorite Ben & Jerrys. After not having it for a year, I saw it at my local store and bought 2 pints! Then to my disappointment, I found both the brownie and cookie dough to be dry. Usually the chewy fudge brownie is the best part! Not a crumbling dry mess. I hope this was just a bad batch...";;;
Half Baked,,2018-09-30,1,No cookie dough!,0,1,"I love half baked, like love love it. But I have a pint that is totally missing cookie dough!";;;

Half Baked,andybean,2017-09-18,1,No Cookie Dough?,3,1,"I bought a pint of half baked after years of it being absent in my life. I expected a cookie and brownie bonanza, but my ice cream had NO COOKIE DOUGH and only TWO BROWNIE CHUNKS. I am severely disappointed and don't think I'll ever get it again. Shame because this used to be my favorite flavor.";;;

Half Baked,DrumsMcaw,2017-09-16,2,Steady decline,2,0,"Like other have mentioned, the quality of this particular flavor definitely seems to have gone down hill. Use to be my go to flavor but now I find myself avoiding it more often than not.";;;
Half Baked
author: karissat1
text;;;: Most amazing flavor ever. It has the perfect blend of chocolate and vanilla ice cream with cookie dough and fudge brownie chunks. Highly recommend;;;

name: Half Baked,Gamndalf the white,2018-01-25,1,"hard, crusty cookie dough and brownies",4,2,"this is the third time I have gotten this flavor and the brownies and cookie dough were dry and really hard and crusty! inconsistent with this flavor becuase some pints its ok and really good, but its not consistant with quality";;;

Half Baked,annnaa,2020-07-27,5,,0,0,"This is hands down my favorite ice cream on the planet. I guess I'm fortunate that I almost never find it in stores, because i can't see it without buying it. A lot of people have complained about the change from Chocolate covered peanutbutter FILLED pretzels to chocolate covered peanutbutter pretzels (it is my understanding that this was due to the original pretzels no longer being available to B&J's). While I do thing that the original was better in principal, I found that I frequently got pints where the pretzels were soggy and disappointing. I have never had that happen with the new recipe. The new pretzels are always crunch and a little bit saltier, which I actually prefer;" I need the salt to balance the fudge and vanilla malt. Still the best!""";;

Half Baked,Half Baked Lover,2019-08-09,5,Best Ice Cream in the World but slight problem,1,0,"Been eating Half Baked for years!!!!! I absolutely love it. Buy a pint every week. Since moving to Texas from Pennsylvania in 2017, I noticed the cookie dough changed and became chalky. Not sure why in Texas it changed. It's become luck of the draw, sometimes it's good and sometimes I get a bad batch. Lately it's gotten better. Praying it stays that way.";;;

Half Baked,HalfBakedLover,2018-02-13,3,Quality isn't what it once was,0,0,"I would buy Half Baked at least once every two weeks and I generally stock up whenever it goes on sale since this is my favorite flavor. In the past year, I have noticed that the cookie dough has been very chalky and not at all chewy like it once was. Additionally, the brownie bites are no longer chewy and distinguishable, instead they just disappear with the chocolate ice cream. I attributed this to the fact that I stocked up on this particular ice cream however even with more recent purchases I have noticed that cookie dough and brownie bites are no longer the same texture and quantity as they used to be. This is my favorite ice cream so I hope they are able to pinpoint what exactly is going on with the recipe since they have said they have not changed it.";;;

Half Baked,,2017-07-25,1,Absolutely awful,1,1,"I bought a container of Ben and Jerry's expecting an awesome snack after a long day of work. I opened the plastic lid and scooped out maybe 1 cup. Not one fudge ""gob"" or chocolate cookie dough piece. So I came back the next day and had the rest. No fudge or cookie dough. It was just super disappointing and wrong that I spent $7.00 for a pint of ice cream that was mediocre chocolate and vanilla... Won't EVER be buying this again. Encourage everyone don't waste your money.";;;

Half Baked,TheStateOfWisconsin,2020-04-26,5,The #1.,0,0,"Ten thousand years ago, a zebra and a pig bred, and the result was a cow. Immediately, humans realized the majesty, the pure tears of God that streamed from the cow's udders. This ice cream is the product of those ten thousand years of experimentation. Benjamin and Jerry have perfected conquered the world of dairy by creating the perfect ice cream: Half Baked. Never again will humanity ever reach this level of perfection in the dairy industry, nay, in anything. All hail the ice cream gods;" and all hail their sublime creation.""";;

Half Baked,KatB,2017-07-14,5,One of the best!,1,0,"I hope this never gets cut, because this flavor is so yummy! It's definitely a basic flavor, but it's incredibly well-executed. The base ice creams are rich and delicious, and the mix-ins are HUGE! The brownies are rich with gooey, and the cookie dough pieces are spot on. Must buy!";;;

Half Baked,Grover15,2020-08-14,5,Never gets old!,1,0,"Half baked has always been my go to flavor. Although I have ventured out and found other flavors I love, Half Baked is always the one I eventually go back to. I can’t get enough of the wonderful chunks of brownies and cookie dough! Yum yum yum!!!";;;

Half Baked,romitta,2020-07-14,5,,0,0,"Ben & Jerrys is a brand that represents society. This brand takes societal problems and they are able to illuminate it through its products and advertisement. Honestly, because Ben & Jerrys is a proactive brand that cares about the worth of human beings ,especially those of color. So, I have invested into their ice cream. This is a flavorful non-dairy ice cream and I love the ingredients. Every bite you a taste a new flavor and sometimes you can get pieces of cookies and cakes in your ice cream.";;;

Half Baked,rachelw,2017-06-19,3,Dried Up but otherwise great taste!!!,1,0,"I love the taste of the ice creme mixed with brownie and cookie dough, and this is the perfect mix!! Unfortunately, the brownie and especially the cookie dough was extremely dry and crumbly.. hoping I just had a weird batch.";;;
Half Baked
author: Craftymomx5
title: Tastes like a freezer burnt mess
text;;;: I recently bought this for the first time. As I sat down in a quiet house with a spoon and high hopes of enjoying this (all to myself) treat. Unfortunately the pleasure lasted about as long as the quiet did. The brownies which I envisioned at delicious rich chewy chocolate were more like gritty freezer burnt chunks and the cookie dough was dry and crumbly. This one won't go back in its hiding place behind the frozen veggies but front and center so someone else can easily find and eat it.;;;

name: Half Baked,Markgopro,2017-06-05,3,Favorite flavor,1,0,"Huge fan. Only flavor ice cream I eat. Unfortunately, noticing ""the gobs"" aren't quite there like they used to be. I might switch to the chocolate fudge brownie quart";;;

Half Baked,scanangjelly,2018-02-18,5,I ATE 3 PINTS OF THIS IN 3 DAYS!!!,1,0,"I would give it 6 stars if I could, thank you, Ben and Jerry's, you are a blessing in my life. I don't know how I could survive school without half-baked.";;;
Half Baked,InezA7,2017-05-28,5,The Best Ice Cream!,1,0,"Big lover of ice cream, Half Baked definitely is the best! Amazing tatste, so obsessed!";;;
Half Baked
author: IrishRider70
title: LOVE Half Baked
text;;;: Love this ice cream! Seriously have 2-3 pints in my fridge at any given time! YUM!!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: Joey213
title: Amazing!
text;;;: One of the best flavors that exists!!! Totally recommended!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: bluesky089
title: Best flavor ever!!!
text;;;: This is my all time favorite flavor! I love it so much!!!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: Halfbakedluvr
title: Holy shoot
text;;;: So f*cking good plz bless yourself and buy it plzz;;;

name: Half Baked,halfbak3dlov3r,2019-05-26,1,Horribly disappointing,0,0,"I've been buying this flavor for years now but for the last year or so, every single pint I buy is filled with hard, chalky cookie dough, and dry, shapeless, flavorless brownies. I would really like to keep supporting ben & jerry's but when the quality has been this consistently awful, it's difficult to. What is the problem? I buy it in New York City, is there some nonsense going on in a distribution center that delivers to my area?? It's so frustrating!";;;

Half Baked,kayf27,2020-07-02,5,,0,0,"Its been a while since Ive had this but I know it tastes very good. Rich in flavor. One thing about this brand, if the product states that it has a certain thing in it (e.g., fudge, cheesecake, cookie dough), just know that you will get nice chunks of these ingredients in every bite. This is what sets Ben & Jerrys ice cream flavors apart from the other brands. They are very consistent with their products. Would definitely recommend any of their flavors.";;;

Half Baked,pillow4435,2017-10-24,1,No Chunks:(,1,1,"I adore Ben & Jerry's and Half Baked is one of my all time favorite flavors, and my go-to comfort ice-cream. After a bad week I went a grabbed one from my local store and was so disappointed when the cookie dough and brownie bits were only a few at the top! 3/4 of the pint was just ice-cream without the yummy chunks! I was so sad:(";;;
Half Baked
author: allyrbc82
text;;;: I am not one to gravitate towards ice cream but while on a recent vacation my sister had this so I decided to give it a try. Man I have been missing out for years now! I have bought one every week since returning from vacation. I make sure to fit some every couple of days in my macros for a treat. This will forever be my favorite flavor. It has tons of brownie bites and cookie dough bites and the perfect amount of chocolate and vanilla. LOVE!;;;

name: Half Baked,Cookie Dough Lover,2019-04-15,5,MY FAVOURITE ICE CREAM EVER!,0,0,"I don't usually write reviews, but I had to for this one! I'm so glad I heard about Ben and Jerrys ice cream because I've been obsessed ever since I first tried it!! Literally the only ice cream I buy now! Half Baked is my favourite flavour, because I love cookie dough, chocolate, vanilla, and brownies of course haha basically everything about it! I can finish the whole pint in one seating lol. Seriously, I absolutely love it! It's so good! I can taste the fresh ingredients in every bite! And I love how the mixture of textures complement each other so well. Though the mixture of flavours, it's still light and creamy. I can eat it as a snack while I'm watching my favourite show or even for breakfast, lunch, or dinner haha! I honestly lost count of how many pints I've bought since the first time I tried it. I would definitely recommend it to everyone!!";;;

Half Baked,cassandrajgollner,2020-06-09,5,,0,0,"I love the smooth and delicious taste of the Ben & Jerry's Half Baked Ice Cream . The fudge brownie chunks, are CHUNKS! The cookie dough are grape size balls! I do notice some inconsistencies from batch to batch on how much of the fudge brownie and cookie dough bits you get. Imy spouse and I can not share a tub, and always have at least one pint each in the fridge. I reccomend anyone to try this product. Always satisfied!!";;;

Half Baked,samsmakeupaddiction,2019-03-03,5,,0,0,"Can you believe that up until a few weeks ago I had NEVER tried Ben & Jerrys before?! Half baked was the first B&Js that tried, and I immediately fell in love. Its sooo creamy, so tasty, smooth and rich. The chunks of chocolate and cookie dough are in every bite, which is fantastic! I cant believe Ive been missing out so much.. I have since tried several other flavours and love them all;" but this is my # 1. Im hooked.""";;
Half Baked
author: Mlle2002
title: Freezer burnt! Unfortunate!
text;;;: I bought a pint of half baked and two pints of chunky money and they were all freezer burned when I opened them right after purchase. I was going to eat this with my family who is going to come over in a few days but now I can’t even eat it myself because of the awful freezer burn. There was also a severe lack of cookie dough and the brownie was stale. Very unfortunate and now I am scared to buy any more pints.;;;

name: Half Baked
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream brand. The chunks of all of the cookie dough are really big so you get the brownie or cookie dough in every bite. The ice cream itself is super creamy and delicious. I love the pint size because it can usually give you 3-4 servings depending on how much you eat at a time. I highly recommend everyone try and flavor of Ben and Jerry’s! The names of the ice cream are also very clever.;;;

name: Half Baked,jennyw50,2020-07-29,5,,0,0,"This has been my go-to ice cream for YEARS! In high school my best friend and I would always share a pint over our Friday night TV binging. Years later I continue to have it and each time remember whythe fudge brownies are so rich melt in your mouth, the chocolate and vanilla ice cream are a perfect blend of not being too rich or too sweet. No other B&J has topped this as my favorite ice cream yet! Keep trying!";;;

Half Baked,ladyslim37,2018-12-02,4,,0,0,"Oh yum this ice cream is so full of stuff ,and is so good .it's creamy ,and full of surprise's with every bite .It is a little pricey for ice -cream ,but come on it's Ben& Jerry's so you know it's worth it .Unless you never had it then you should try it your missing out PLUS you love the single container .I love to share ,but some things you want all to yourself .What are you waiting for Treat yourself today.";;;

Half Baked,kayh,2020-03-03,5,,0,0,"An instant classic for break ups, girls' nights, and sneaking bites out of the container in front of the fridge at midnight while your spouse is asleep. Perfect amount of chocolate and vanilla ice cream, just the right amount of cookie dough and brownie. Ben & Jerry's is definitely a tad over priced, but thank god for that otherwise I would eat this more often than any nutritionist would recommend.";;;
Half Baked
author: ilene
title: not so great
text;;;: I bought this today for the first time. I've sampled it several times today and am eating it now. I won't buy this again. It's heavy and has a grainy texture with cookie dough and the fudge pieces are toohard. It's too much gook. My favorite ice cream is Cherry Garcia. It's light and has chocolate flakes and cherries and is perfect in every way. Cherry Garcia should be the No. 1 ice cream.;;;

name: Half Baked,avashwal,2020-07-31,5,,0,0,"I love Ben & Jerrys!!! They are definitely my favorite ice cream brand. Half baked is my go to flavor because there is so much going on. The only dislike I have that it is a little pricey for only a 16oz jar, but trust me its worth it! I just wish they made bigger tubs of it. But it is absolutely amazing!!!! Definitely recommend either Half Baked, Phish Food, or the Brownie Batter Core! :)";;;
Half Baked
author: tinam3
text;;;: I love Ben and Jerrys ice cream! Its so rich and smooth a full cream ice cream that is indulgent and delightful. I love half baked! The chocolate is Devine the vanilla is perfect! Its sweet and not at all boring or bland. The good brownie pieces are perfect and can there be anything better than cookie dough ? The problem with this is you cant have it very often or your pants wont fit.;;;

name: Half Baked,gastropunk,2018-10-20,5,Layers & Textures.,0,0,"This is some of the best pints I've ever had from B&J. Incredibly, the textures of the vanilla and chocolate ice cream mixed with the brownie and the cookie dough are just amazing. Brownie is the mid-way between the softness of the ice cream and the crunchy sugar on the cookie dough and that makes basically everyone happy. From the rotating portfolio, this is by far my best flavour.";;;

Half Baked,Sunfireklf,2018-12-02,5,Dangerously Delicious,0,0,"I bought a pint of the Half Baked for the first time, about a month ago and I loved it! The texture of the icecream is smooth and the yummy brownie and cookie dough gobs give great substance to the mix. I haven't forgotten about Half Baked since that first round and just finished another this evening. I thought to myself, I could of eaten two of these pints! Dangerously Delicious :)";;;

Half Baked,Rosed,2018-01-24,1,Where's the dough?,0,1,"This has always been my favourite flavour, but the last few pints I've purchased had been found to be lacking. After the first spoonful the rest of the pint had very few chunks in it. I would say about 5 or 6 small chunks of dough. A flavour that has the word dough in its name should live up to that. The last few times it hasn't, looking forward to seeing this improve in the future.";;;

Half Baked,cristinab5,2020-07-24,5,,0,0,"This is my go to when I need a hug in the form of food. I can finish the whole pint in one sitting because I love the flavors and textures so much, so I have to check myself and put it away. Its definitely for chocolate lovers so if thats not your thing, youll probably think its too much chocolate. Its on the pricier side for ice cream, but its totally worth it. So rich and creamy!";;;

Half Baked,trailheaders,2020-07-27,5,,0,0,"Oh yeah, I remember where I was the first time I tried Half Baked Ice Cream by Ben & Jerry's. Chocolate chip cookie dough ice cream wasn't necessarily a ""new"" thing, although it was still fairly novel and B&J was doing it great. The only thing that could have made it better was mixing it with brownie chunks and more chocolate. There's no other company that beats this flavor combo.";;;

Half Baked,lilym96,2020-06-24,5,,0,0,"Half baked is one of my top 3 Ben and Jerrys flavors!! The toppings are so good and the flavors work so well together. Also, the founders of this company are so woke. They were recently arrested at protests for the black lives matter movement. They stick up for whats right and they share their beliefs. I love Ben and Jerrys and if you havent checked them out you totally should!";;;

Half Baked,jacquelinebca86,2020-07-24,5,,0,0,"This is my (and my fiances) go to ice cream pint! It has the perfect blend of chocolate brownie pieces and perfect size and amount of gobs of cookie dough. Kind of pricey since you can get a half gallon for about the same price (about $4 in my area, $3 on a sale) but I love ice cream and its better for me to eat a pint in a day versus a half gallon. Also, always a great flavor.";;;

Half Baked,liz112,2017-10-08,5,absolutely delicious !,0,0,"This was my first time buying a pint of Ben & Jerry's and I'm so glad I chose Half Baked! The cookie dough and brownie chunks were super good and the ice cream was nice and creamy. The only downside was that it was hard to scoop the ice cream because the brownie chunks were really hardened. Overall, it was amazing, but I'll have to stop myself from eating the whole pint!";;;

Half Baked,hillaryr2,2018-11-11,5,,0,0,"Half Baked by Ben & Jerry's is my ULTIMATE favourite! It's one of those flavours flavours that if you haven't tried it yet, you simply havent lived. Once you do try it, it will be your go-to choice of Ben & Jerry's too! A delicious blend of creamy vanilla ice cream, with fudge brownies (my favourite part) and gobs of chocolate chip cookie dough. Would highly recommend!";;;

Half Baked,KayforIceCream,2017-12-06,4,Half baked addict!,0,0,"This is one of my all-time favorite flavors. There's something about the combination of cookie dough and brownie bites that's just delish! My only worry? I have noticed that the ice cream to brownie/cookie dough has changed. I know find fewer dough/brownie bites in each pint. Hoping that they'll readjust that soon, or even better yet come out with a ""packed"" version.";;;

Half Baked,richardsara,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"This is my go to flavor whenever I have extra money to splurge on ice cream for myself. I love the bites of cookie dough and then you have the bites of fudge brownie. Oh my gosh, it is just so good!!!!! If you like cookie dough and brownies YOU HAVE TO TRY this out NOW!!!!! Mmmmmmm.....no review will be enough to make you understand how good this one is.";;;
Half Baked,Vicky1234,2017-10-06,1,No cookie dough!,1,1,"There was no cookie dough, the quality has really gone down hill. I used to love this flavor, now i am disappointed in the product.";;;

Half Baked,caitieh2,2020-07-29,4,,0,0,"whenever i get sad/or i work my butt off i treat myself to this. i could honestly eat the whole pint in one sitting. its technically b&js number one selling ice cream for the past few years!! the chocolate and vanilla ice cream/ cookie dough and brownie bits all have a perfect ratio. if you dont want all the calories, they offer it in a froyo version too :)";;;

Half Baked,,2020-07-30,5,,0,0,"Oh my my my!! I LOVEEEE Ben & Jerrys Half Baked ice cream. I have on occasion ate a whole pint of this by myself. When Im craving something more than a simple flavored ice cream this is my first choice hands down. After a long day at work, nothing is better than a pint of good old Ben and Jerrys Half Baked, eating it with a spoon out of the carton in bed.";;;
Half Baked
author: dhara9435
text;;;: This is definitely one of my ALL TIME fav ice creams. I literally always have atleast a pint of it in my freezer for bad days and my bf knows when it finishes to replace it because it's just what gets me through bad days. It's all things delicious in 1 ice icream. It's got fudge Brownie and it's got cookie dough... I mean really what more do you need?;;;

name: Half Baked,beautyinbeer,2018-10-23,5,,0,0,"I love this ice cream. I just wish I could eat more of it for less calories, but who doesn't wish that about ice cream? I've used it to make my own popsicles by slicing it horizontally with a good knife, popping off the carton, putting a popsicle stick in it then dipping it in melted chocolate and refreezing. Helps me control how much I eat.";;;
Half Baked
author: alsull1s
text;;;: My love for ice cream is deep and this flavor is seriously perfection. It has everything you want in an ice cream. I think I buy this every week its so good. It has the perfect amount of vanilla to chocolate ice cream with GOBS of cookie dough and brownie bites. The brownie is the most amazing part. I love you #ben&jerrys for making this!!!;;;

name: Half Baked,kendalina,2020-07-06,5,,0,0,"This is one of my all time favorite ice creams. It was a staple in my freezer in college. I love the creamy texture, delicious ingredients, and reasonable cost. I also LOVE that Ben and Jerrys pay all of their employees a liveable wage, are politically active, and donate to charities. It is definitely worth the slightly higher price point.";;;

Half Baked,zurrealcurls,2020-07-30,5,,0,0,"Munchies anyone? I mean, come on, its Ben & Jerrys! Some of the best ice cream combos ever. You really cant go wrong with any of their treats. I cant say I have ever had a pint of B & J that wasnt drool-worthy! Plus, they have a great mission. *Doing a snap and this review applies to any and all goodies related to this brand of delishhhh.";;;

Half Baked,jennifers402,2020-07-24,5,,0,0,"This flavor is AMAZING! It is my absolute favorite flavor of all! Ben and Jerrys brand. It is perfectly blended and absolutely delicious. I wish the brand wasnt so expensive because I would be able to eat it more often. If they ever came out with larger sizes at a similar price, that would be the best day of my life lol, its SO worth it.";;;

Half Baked,lexilovesmakeup,2020-06-03,5,,0,0,"This is my drunk ice cream. The brownie batter, the cookie dough, ugh. Such a perfect combination and I could kiss whoever invented this. I will share this one because its a great pick me up and it doesn't make me feel the need to hoard it to myself. I want others to experience the same euphoria I feel when I get a nice glob of dough.";;;
Half Baked
author: jovieb2006
text;;;: I absolutely love this ice cream!! My all time favorite Ben and Jerrys ice cream! One of my favorite parts about this ice cream is it has chocolate and vanilla combined in it! The fudge brownie bits are so amazing as well as the chocolate chip cookie dough. 10/10 recommend getting this! [product:ben-&-jerrys-ice-cream-half-baked-16oz];;;

name: Half Baked,lbs1217,2020-07-21,3,,0,0,"Reading the description of this describes my perfect ice cream flavor. But, for some reason, Ben and Jerrys doesnt do it for me. I am not the biggest fan of supermarket ice cream, I would much rather get it from a parlor. Something about it tastes artificial and I cant get past it. However, its the best flavor out of all of theirs.";;;
Half Baked
author: britta5
text;;;: This is hands down my favorite ice cream! A creamy ice cream base with delicious cookie dough and brownie bites mixed in. They are generous with the cookie dough and brownie bites too! My favorite way to eat this is to try to eat around all the added bits and save the bits (best part) for last and just eat spoonfuls of the bits.;;;

name: Half Baked,brandyh20,2020-07-27,4,,0,0,"This is my absolute favorite ice cream. I love Ben and Jerry's. I love everything about them. The company itself is awesome. It's so sweet and delicious, they are all good but this is by far my favorite. You can find it anywhere. It's got chunks of cookie and they have a half baked core that has more cookie dough in it's so good";;;

Half Baked,,2018-08-02,5,,0,0,"Half baked is so yummy because it has all of my favorite things in it. It has chocolate and vanilla ice cream with cookie dough and brownie. It’s so yummy especially when it is at the perfect temperature, to me that’s slightly melted to make it soft and smooth. This is definitely one of my favorite flavors from Ben and Jerry’s.";;;

Half Baked,Amelia2902,2020-09-03,5,Incredible!!!!,0,0,"When I buy ice cream with chunks, I'm always disappointed with how few and little the pieces are. However, this ice cream is by far the most satisfying chunk-containing ice cream I've had so far! The chunks of fudge brownie and cookie dough are the size of my spoon AND are evenly throughout the pint. So ADDICTING!!!!!";;;

Half Baked,elyseh2,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"I love this ice cream. A perfect blend of chocolate and vanilla, brownie and cookie dough. The brownie and cookie dough are large and delicious in the ice cream. A classic Ben and Jerrys flavor that will never disappoint. And they make it in a frozen yogurt option too which is equally as delicious but fewer calories.";;;
Half Baked
author: kirstenb
text;;;: One of my all time favorite ice creams. I especially love that I can pick up a pint of Ben and Jerrys and have my own little personal ice cream potion to attack through out the week when I want a taste. Hands down love Ben and Jerrys they have my business mostly when it comes to ice cream! Great company to support!;;;

name: Half Baked,autumnw40,2020-06-27,5,,0,0,"SPECTACULAR! Despite the calorie count being so high (but let's be real here, its ice cream, what do you expect?) I try to buy this ice cream every few weeks. Half baked Ben and Jerry's is a million times better than their basic ice creams, and the different chunks and flavors are an absolute delight. Give it a go!";;;
Half Baked
author: biancal05e3
text;;;: Ben and Jerrys is my all time favourite ice cream because first of all it has so many flavours and this one is my fave. This one mixes cookie dough with brownies and chocolate and vanilla and I think maybe a hint of peanut butter inside and it is just so delicious I can literally eat one pot just to myself hahah.;;;

name: Half Baked,jessica_ulrich,2019-01-03,5,,0,0,"This is my go to treat of choice. Is is SUPER expensive though. $5 for a pint. However, it does have brownie and cookie dough pieces in it, so I get it. When I do treat myself to it, I almost always eat the whole pint in one sitting. It’s delicious, chocolatey, and the brownie pieces are so so soft. I love this.";;;

Half Baked,Joe34,2017-07-22,4,Good but also disappointing,0,0,"I bought a pint of Half Baked (my favorite flavor) and even though it said it was Half Baked, it was actually just a chocolate and vanilla mix with no cookie or brownie pieces. This is the second time this has happened to me in the past few months. Hopefully its just a production issue and not a new standard.";;;

Half Baked,kylen19c7,2020-07-05,5,,0,0,"Ben and Jerrys ice cream is known everywhere for their amazing flavor and quality. The half baked is my favorite, Im a huge fan of cookie dough and when you combine that with brownies it just does something for me. The texture is great, the ice cream flavors are incredible, and a little bit goes a long way.";;;

Half Baked,earlsje,2020-07-24,4,,0,0,"Ben and Jerry's makes amazing ice cream as I'm sure no one would disagree with. The quality is definitely there with the Half Baked flavor, too. I really enjoyed it, but I wasn't blown away like I am with some of their other flavors. Don't get me wrong, I won't turn it down, but I have many other favorites.";;;
Half Baked
text;;;: I love Ben & Jerrys not just for the ice cream they have a really good quality ice cream but because the mission behind their brand did you know they hire recently released criminals and they pay the $16 an hour 75% of their income goes to paying back incarcerated youth I love them for that #PrisonReform;;;

name: Half Baked
author: jlcarson412
text;;;: This ice cream reminds me of getting my heartbroken by the douchebag I dated in high school. I didnt let my poor taste in guys ruin my amazing taste for ice cream. Half baked is so good and its my favorite kind of store bought ice cream to eat. I would definitely recommend it for the happy and sad times!;;;

name: Half Baked,,2020-07-02,5,,0,0,"LOOOOVE me some Ben&Jerry's ice cream!!! All flavors that I have tried so far are amasing! Very rich, full.of flavor delicious ice cream. I do wish the price was a little lower but then again you get what you pay for!!! So yesss, if you haven't tried it yet and you are an icecream lover, it is a MUST!!!";;;

Half Baked,amryl,2019-08-26,5,,0,0,"literally hands down the best tasting ice cream ever. a small one like this lasted me around 3 days, and i was so happy after coming home soaked in sweat from walking outside on hot summer day in texas, definitely would recommend this to anyone who loves brownie, and all the other ingredients listed.";;;

Half Baked,,2018-12-02,5,,0,0,"The best and most rich flavor in Ben & Jerry’s flavor arsenal, Half Baked provides consumers with a mash up of two extremely popular batter flavors Cookie Dough and Brownie Batter. Blending these two amazing flavors with vanilla and chocolate ice cream provides a snaking experience unlike any other.";;;

Half Baked,heat_duke,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"Honestly can you ever go wrong with Half Baked? It's my go-to Ben & Jerry's flavor because it never disappoints! The chocolate and vanilla mixture along with the cookie dough and brownie pieces are delicious. While this is more on the pricier side for a pint, it is always worth it when it's on sale!";;;
Half Baked
author: mollythegreat
text;;;: This is the best ice cream in the world; not only is this super tasty BUT they're literally the best company ever. These guys are the best and they're so kick butt and they stand up for all the right things and omg please buy their ice cream and support them because we need them to keep kicking butt;;

name: Half Baked,lindseym8fac,2020-07-23,5,,0,0,"My number one pick for ice cream always. I am a huge fan of Ben & Jerry's flavors! There really hasn't been one flavor I've tried that I didn't like, but this is by far the absolute best. You have cookie dough, brown dough and both chocolate and vanilla ice cream! Doesn't get better than that!!";;;
Half Baked
author: nickisfabfitandfun
text;;;: Ben & Jerry's Ice Cream Half Baked - 16oz never disappoints! I've loved this flavor since high school! I was able to visit the Ben & Jerry's Museum in VT a few years ago. I love the variety of flavors and the small sizes so you don't get frost bitten ice cream. #ben&jerrys #icecream #halfbaked;;;

name: Half Baked,caseyfbe0e,2020-05-05,5,,0,0,"This was the best ice cream and I ate so much of it during a period of time and I wore it out. But if you love chocolate and vanilla ice cream, brownies and cookie dough. Bomb combined it all together and it's heaven!! I would def recommend this. It def hit my spot when I was pregnant. LOL";;;

Half Baked,evztt,2018-02-07,2,Quality has gone downhill (number 2),0,0,"So we’ve been buying half baked for a while and in the last months, I feel like you guys should rename it to a quarter baked. There are literally two pieces of fudge brownie and a handful of cookies in a whole pint. I used to love it but I think I might need to go find me another favorite. :(";;;

Half Baked,,2020-01-02,5,,0,0,"The Half Baked ice cream is deluxe and what a treat it is when I do have it as it an expensive treat. Ben & Jerrys is expensive but the quality and taste is great. I buy it every now and then when I can find it on sale. I would give it five stars but because of the cost, Im giving it a four.";;;

Half Baked,gerib3,2020-07-29,5,,0,0,"What can I say...Ben & Jerrys is the best! And who wouldnt love courier dough and half baked brownies in ice cream?! If I could eat this everyday, you can bet I would! When I was growing up we used to go to the Ben & Jerrys store every Friday to kick off the weekend. I love their ice cream.";;;
Half Baked
author: zoey
title: the best freaking flavor on earth
text;;;: everything about it is perfect. chocolate and vanilla ice real together. there’s giant pieces of delicious cookie dough. and then there’s a HUGENESS fuge brownie at the bottom. this pint combines everything i love and i will fight for the deliciousness of this pint as if it’s my own child.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: sumatime
text;;;: This was a sensation with every bite! Smooth and silky flavor without an overwhelming amount of dough in it. I thought it was the perfect balance of ice cream and cookies! I always go back to this pint and will keep going back for more! I hide this from my kids to make it last longer lol!;;;

name: Half Baked,ktcan03,2019-09-27,5,,0,0,"There are just no words on how to describe this! It is absolutely fantasticly the best ice cream. Now, it is not my favorite flavor, but when you are in the need for some of that comfort, cry it out, girl I ain't getting out of the bed, ice cream...Half Baked is just that!! It has it all!";;;
Half Baked
author: amethystl4
text;;;: This is by far one of my favourite ice creams!Its almost impossible to find a bite without a big chunk of brownie or cookie dough. Its creamy with the perfect amount of sweetness and has ingredients you wont feel guilty about later! Dont even think twice about buying it. You will love it!;;;

name: Half Baked,tayjordan97,2020-06-30,5,,0,0,"My favourite ice cream by FAR! Im obsessed with this and there is always a tub to be found in my freezer. It is a little more expensive, but it is 100% warranted in my opinion, this stuff is incredible. Overall, I would recommend that you try this before thinking the price isnt worth it!";;;
Half Baked
author: mamalukic
text;;;: Ben & Jerry's half baked is probably my most favourite ice cream. I find the globs of chocolate and cookie dough are the perfect mix. I wish they would add more of them because some pints I find Lack I would still say that these are great value for your money they definitely hit the spot;;;

name: Half Baked,christinaxngyn,2020-07-30,5,,0,0,"This has been my favorite ice cream flavor for YEARS! I love how it has huge chunks of brownie and cookie dough, and its not too chocolatey for me. I cant find any other ice cream that has the same elements as this one, which makes it super unique and will always have me crawling back!";;;

Half Baked,lisafa5c9,2020-06-11,5,,0,0,"Ive been a fan of Ben &Jerrys ice cream, half baked is def on of my favs. It has all my Favorites. Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough and Chocolate Fudge Brownie. Vanilla ice cream and chocolate ice cream with chunks of cookie dough and fudge browniesit's hard to imagine a better combination.";;;

Half Baked,Hyt1804,2018-02-06,2,Where's the cookie dough?!?,0,0,"My favorite flavor of ice cream is cookie dough but when I was introduced to half baked my life was forever changed. Although lately, the last three pints I've had of Half Baked have only had 3-4 pieces of cookie dough. :( what's going on? Has there been a cookie dough sequestration?";;;

Half Baked,Claire,2017-04-26,5,Sooooooo excited,0,0,"I am so so so absolutely thrilled to see Ben and Jerrys in our shops now, so glad it's now available in Taiwan, especially this flavor!!! Truly love this tho I prefer mint chocolate cookie more(my childhood fave). I love you Ben and jerrys but please we need more flavors in Taiwan!!!!";;;
Half Baked
text;;;: This is the BEST ice cream I've ever had hands down. It is my go to... It is the perfect combination of cookie dough and don't even get me started on how Delicious the brownie chunks in this ice cream are.I was beyond satisfied in this ice cream and would 100% recommend it to anyone.;;;

name: Half Baked,tinydemon101,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"This is by far one of my guiltiest pleasures. This is my bad day ice cream and my cramped up grumpy go to for an attitude lift. Perfect and generous balance of brownies and cookie dough without the salmonella! Cant go wrong, I salute you Ben, I wiggle with approvals Jerry. NEVER STOP";;;
Half Baked
author: marcieo
text;;;: Half Baked is the best of both worlds. Not only do you get cookie dough but you get brownie pieces too. I love the size of these because you cant just keep eating them. I also love that you can find these almost in every store including grocery stores and even in convenience stores.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: miab326
text;;;: Seriously cookie dough and chocolate fudge brownie!? Do I need to say more?? First off I feel like cookie dough on its own is amazing enough but the combination of brownie mixed in makes this ice cream flavor hands down without a doubt one of the BEST out there!!! Absolutely-YUM!!;;;

name: Half Baked,,2020-07-09,5,,0,0,"Half baked is my go to ice cream! I love the way the flavors incorporate with each other. I love that its half chocolate and half vanilla ice cream, its the best of both worlds! Whenever Im grocery shopping and want ice cream this is what will end up in my cart. Its so delicious!";;;

Half Baked,memberfd4b4,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"probably my favorite ice cream flavor of all time. my absolute go-to every time I go into the store and I want to grab something sweet. I have to be careful though because I do like it so much, that sometimes I'll finish the whole thing in one sitting! it's seriously;"y that good!""";;

Half Baked,amyjo,2019-08-27,5,Love at first bite,0,0,"One of my favorite Ben & Jerry's flavors! How can one resist the mixture of cookie dough goodness and chewy brownie chunks in ONE pint?! There's always the perfect ratio of cookie dough and brownie bites. If you have the ultimate sweet tooth, this will not leave you disappointed.";;;

Half Baked,allisonw62954,2020-07-24,3,,0,0,"Ben & Jerrys ice cream is pretty good overall, but the price is outrageous! You have to treat yourself once in a while to such a small tub of icecream. But overall the taste of almost all of the icecream flavors tastes pretty good! Especially this one when its not frost bitten.";;;
Half Baked
author: shyanneg0d74
text;;;: I thought it was so funny when I found this ice cream. My fiancs two favorite ice creams are fudge and cookie dough. One day he could decide with he wanted and I found this! The name made me laugh and he loved it. I dont recommend eating the whole pint at once lol thats too rich;;;

name: Half Baked
author: katherinea
text;;;: Hello heaven in the form of ice cream! Im not a big ice cream fan and bought this by mistake. My kid tried it and loved it but hes a kid so I had no expectations tbh. Finally tried it and Ive since bought too many. The brownies and the cookie dough are my favorite indulgence.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: haleigho1
text;;;: I am a sucker for a good cookie dough ice cream and this kind did not disappoint. It is one of my favorite Ben and jerry flavors. It has the perfect amount of cookie dough in it. It is perfect when you need a little something sweet to just eat a little bit and feel satisfied!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: Bella
title: It is DELICIOUS
text;;;: It is the perfect mixture of vanilla and chocolate ice cream with cookie dough and brownie! It's so good it is tied with chocolate fudge brownie flavour. Anyways its very good and I recently discovered it and wish it sold as a more frequent flavour it grocery stores I go to.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: smileitschristie
text;;;: YASS! This is my all time favorite Ben & Jerry's ice cream! I love all the different flavors it has and the chocolatey goodness. When I'm having a crabby day or even some me-time I grab my spoon and chill with some Netflix and my night is set thanks to this buddy right here!;;;

name: Half Baked,kaylab162,2020-07-31,5,,0,0,"My favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor ever! I love cookie dough & combined with brownie makes it even better Chocolate is always my weakness when I'm having a sweet craving. This ice cream is perfect, I wouldn't change it one bit. I would reccomend this brand over other options!";;;
Half Baked
author: YouThought
title: Not quite what I was baked for
text;;;: I got this ice cream delivered to be from a market basket employee who I payed with my hard earned cash. Although the chocolate and vanilla tickled my fancy the cookie dough sadly fell short. I will not indulged in this until I get a written apology from both ben and jerry.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: Mimi232
title: Classic Favorite
text;;;: I have a few favorite ice cream and this one will definitely be a repeat along with American dream and gimme s’more’s. Those brownie chunks are ELITE. I love the swirls of vanilla and chocolate ice cream too. The cookie dough was good I really enjoyed the cookie pieces too.;;;

name: Half Baked,cassandraw21,2020-07-30,5,,0,0,"Mmmmmm!!! This ice cream is spectacular! It combines some of my favorite things, cookie dough, brownies, and ice cream!!! I would really love to taste the outcome if they did this flavor will all chocolate ice cream as the base. Maybe they do that? Ill have to look around!";;;
Half Baked
author: deziraealexandriamit
text;;;: This ice cream is mouth watering! It has the perfect combination of flavors. Im not a HUGE chocolate fan but I love cookie dough and mixed with chocolate and vanilla it goes well together. Its sweet but not rich. Its delicious and one of my favorite Ben and Jerrys flavors.;;;

name: Half Baked,mrsteotonio,2020-07-31,5,,0,0,"Ben and Jerry have always been there for me. They have never let me down. This is my favorite flavor and I can eat the entire pint in one sitting. I shouldnt, but I do. If I need some delicious ice cream in my life, I head to the store and find this container of happiness.";;;
Half Baked
author: samsch__
text;;;: this ice cream was immaculate it tasted so good I had all the flavor that I was looking for I would definitely definitely buy it again it was so tasty. This ice cream tasted like the cookie dough when youre making homemade cookies plus chocolate ice cream and brownie bits;;;

name: Half Baked,ayeeholla,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"Ben & Jerrys is the best ice cream on the market. Its very flavorful and has equal amounts of ice cream to chucks of cookie. Also this brand advocates for BLM, abolishing ICE and anti-racism so everyone should support them. Making a difference while eating bomb ice cream.";;;
Half Baked
author: MEOW123
title: THE MOST WONDERFUL EXPLOSION OF GOODNESS
text;;;: I HAVE BEEN FAITHFUL TO HALFBAKED SINCE THE LONGEST TIME. THIS HAS GOT TO BE THE BEST ICECREAM I HAVE EVER HAD IN MY WHOLE LIFE AND IM 22 WHICH MEANS IVE HAD MANY YEARS OF ICECREAM EXPERIENCES. PLS SPONSER ME AND SEND ME ICECREAMS EVERY MONTH AND ILL SUPPORT U <3 <3 <3 <3;;;

name: Half Baked,aikos2,2020-07-28,5,,0,0,"The perfect combo! Ben & Jerry's always comes in clutch with the flavoring, and also backs the best causes behind their products. I've been eating Ben & Jerry's for years and love their fun take on names with a side of humor. Would recommend for the perfect comfort pint.";;;

Half Baked,sambutneversammy,2020-06-10,5,,0,0,"I love brownies and I love cookie dough. so this was the perfect combination for me. I bought this way too often, but it is, and Ben and Jerry's ice cream is in general, my guilty pleasure. One of my all time favorite ice creams that can be bought in most grocery stores.";;;
Half Baked
author: dingbatty
text;;;: This is my go to when Im just feeling gross. It has the perfect vanilla to chocolate ratio and the same goes for the cookie dough pieces and brownie pieces. Other ice creams that combine both usually end up with either too much off the brownie or too little of the other.;;;

name: Half Baked
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream of all time! It has the perfect combination of ingredients! I wish it came in a huge gallon tub! Its so good every store around me is ALWAYS out. If youre looking for a new ice cream to wallow in or just a sweet treat you must try this one!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: coolbeansdani
text;;;: I LOVE Ben and Jerrys ice cream. Honestly every flavor is delicious but this half baked variety is everything. I love cookie dough and brownie bites in my iced cream. They are both soft and tasty. I once watched a Youtuber make cookies out of the dough and it worked !;;;

name: Half Baked
author: effiea3
text;;;: Yall. This is my go to ice cream. Not only do Ben and Jerry fight for freedom and basic human rights (YASSS) but they make the worlds best ice cream. I love the big chunky cookie dough and the rich brownie. The basic vanilla and chocolate ice creams cannot be matched!;;;

name: Half Baked,juliad87,2020-06-04,5,,0,0,"Between the cookie dough chunk and the brownie bites, this ice cream is super indulgent and extremely addictive. The ice cream is it's usual creamy and rich quality but adding in the extra flavours gives it more of a boost and more texture. This is my new favourite.";;;

Half Baked,valerieh23,2020-07-27,5,,0,0,"Cookie dough & ice cream together is a happy blend for me. This is a combination I haven't seen anywhere else. It's good as is, but adding a chocolate ribbon through it couldn't hurt. (Just sayin') If you like chocolate & are a cookie dough fan, this is worth trying.";;;
Half Baked
author: SAPHORA86
title: The best of 2 fav ice creams in one
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream in the world i buy one pint a month and its ingredients are high quality I love the plastic seal so I know it's not been pre licked lol. I always try new flavors but this one has been my fav since I first tried it years and years ago...;;;

name: Half Baked
author: gretchens
text;;;: Wasn't my favorite flavor of ben & jerry's not going to lie. I would like it better with more peanut butter flavor in the ice cream. I think if they added a little more flavor to it it would honestly be a favorite of mine. I'd give it a 3/5! Honestly could be better.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: katemariebeauty18
text;;;: Best flavor of ben and jerrys hands down. You get both their iconic cookie doimugh and fudge brownie bits in one pint. This ice cream is def nore expensive than others but worth every penny. Try and find on sale bogo. Ben and Jerry is also socially conscious company;;;

name: Half Baked,pdnimxcv,2019-02-02,5,,0,0,"Id rate this 10 stars if I could. If youre a chocolate lover like me, this is literally your next go-to pint.";;;
Half Baked
author: Kiki12345
title: Ice cream is good but missing something important
text;;;: I bought this ice cream for the first time when I couldn't decide on if I wanted chocolate ice cream or vanilla. Although the ice cream was delicious and satisfied my craving...I'm now stuck craving cookie dough AND brownies lol! I guess I'll have to make it myself.;;;

name: Half Baked,anamal_planet,2020-07-24,5,,0,0,"This is my all time favorite ice cream!! I love the mix of vanilla and raw cookie dough with chocolate and brownie pieces. This ice cream is for the hard times, fun times, and everything in between. But especially after those sucky dates or sad breakups. Love it !!!";;;
Half Baked
author: riabbby
text;;;: when it comes to ice cream.... i do not play any games! this is the best ice cream !!! EVER! I love the mix of everything! I wish i could get bigger containers of it! i definitely think what sets it aside from others is the name and the mix of everything! SO BOMB!!!;;;

name: Half Baked,kirsten,2017-05-21,4,Where are the gobs?,0,0,"I was so excited when I bought this, but when I opened it, I had to dig around to find the cookie and brownie gobs and was pretty disappointed with the amount :( I only got a couple pieces, but the few pieces I did get and the Icecream were as delicious as always!";;;

Half Baked,kyleennee,2019-02-02,5,,0,0,"Half baked is my fav! I love how much cookie dough and brownie hits there are, usually I eat the vanilla with cookie dough and my boyfriend eats the chocolate with brownie. Its a nice thing to sit there and share with someone. Love that it comes dairy free as well";;;
Half Baked
author: adap9
text;;;: This right here is the truth. Half baked gets 5 stars from me. This is mouthwatering and before you know it I eat the whole container. Theres nothing to compares to this. I stock up when theyre on sale at Walmart because its usually $6 so buying this is a luxury.;;;

name: Half Baked
