text;;;: My absolute weakness! I'm not a even a fan of chocolate or a lot of sweets but if a pint of Ben and Jerry's is around me I eat every single bite! So delicious and I love the chunks of yummy soft sweet bites inside. I'm always satisfied with any flavor I purchase.;;;

name: Half Baked,,2020-07-04,5,,0,0,"Half baked is one of my favorite flavors Ben & Jerrys has rolled out! It is the flavor I will pick up when Im in need of some sweet comfort food. Sometimes we need a reason to eat our feelings, right? It is delicious and sometimes I just need a reason to eat it!";;;

Half Baked,oilpaintednerd,2020-07-08,5,I've Been Missing Out!,0,0,"I tried this for the first time today, and it's amazing! I'm not sure what the other reviews are talking about- I don't think the cookie dough is chalky at all, plus you get so much of it! My favorite part, though, is that it's safe for people with nut allergies!";;;

Half Baked,,2020-06-11,5,,0,0,"Ben & Jerry's Half Baked Ice Cream is the best flavor! You get both chocolate and vanilla ice cream and both cookie dough and brownie chunks in one pint. If you haven't tried it, you should! The flavor is worth the price and I usually find it on sale quite often.";;;

Half Baked,instaglambrosia,2020-07-24,5,,0,0,"I have never met a Ben and Jerry's flavor I didn't like. But this one is my all time favorite. The brand is a bit more expensive, but the quality and flavor make it totally worth it. I also really like that the company gives back to the community in so many ways.";;;
Half Baked
author: dakotaw3
text;;;: One of my favorite ice creams! Its so delicious! Also Ben & Jerrys high key supports the #BLM movement. So we STAN Ben & Jerrys in this household. 10/10 recommend to anyone and everyone in literally the entire world. Go get you some Ben & Jerrys. Like. Right now.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: naturalbabyblues
text;;;: Wanting the best combo of many different ice cream flavor??! This is the one. It has Oreo and chocolate and cookie dough all in one its an all tile favorite for me since I saw it in stores and died to have some. Only ice cream I crave now! Best tasting as well!!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: alil02ec
text;;;: This is the perfect flavor when you cant decide what you want. You have chocolate and vanilla ice cream plus the added bonus of both brownie and cookie dough bites. Only thing missing is the spoon to eat it with!!!![product:ben-&-jerrys-ice-cream-half-baked-16oz];;;

name: Half Baked
author: jaywallk
text;;;: This is by far the best Ben and Jerrys ice cream Ive ever had. And I especially love the fact that the owners support the same causes that I do like BLM and the LGBTQ+ community. Thats hey Ill continue to buy their overpriced ice cream and live every bite of it.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: brendabccc1
text;;;: Best of both worlds! Ben & Jerry's combines chocolate chip cookie dough and brownies in a delicious ice cream. This is one of my favorites. Only thing I would add to this is chopped walnuts. A little pricier than other ice cream at this size but still worth it.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: rolyatniltiac
text;;;: This is my absolute favorite ice cream in the world. I always get this ice cream when I want to treat myself. The cookie and brownie pieces in this ice cream are always moist and not dried out like some other brands. Ben & Jerrys also supports important causes!;;;

name: Half Baked,oharmonybaby,2020-07-26,4,,0,0,"who doesnt like Ben & Jerrys? Can be a bit pricey but so worth it on occasion. They have amazing flavors and a dope presentation. This is quality ice cream. I wish they made larger sizes when cold stone or Maggie moos is closed, this is usually my next go to";;;

Half Baked,sjm1,2020-06-10,5,,0,0,"At the end of the day, there is nothing better than a cup of delicious ice cream from Ben & Jerry's. And, the flavours in the Half Baked version is a perfect end to the day. thanks Ben & Jerry's for always being so creative. Love the new Netflix & Chill.";;;

Half Baked,megdini2015,2020-07-04,5,,0,0,"Everyones favorite double date: Ben & Jerrys. I love the creamy texture of the ice cream dotted with chocolate, and then the cookie dough and brownie pieces bring in a whole new level of flavor and chewiness. This has got to be one of my go to comfort foods.";;;
Half Baked
author: elliec2
text;;;: this is my all time favourite ice cream!! It is the perfect mix of vanilla with chocolate. I usually buy it at the grocery store for around 7 dollars. It is way better than alternatives like hagen daaz. Cheaper and better tasting will definitely purchase again;;;

name: Half Baked,maggiemf0c8,2020-07-06,5,,0,0,"Ben and Jerrys is just so good! I love that its not just flavored ice cream it has bits and pieces of cookies,brownies,etc. they have the best flavor combos and totally different than other ice cream. I wish they came in a bigger container but still amazing";;;

Half Baked,kristinspassionforfa,2020-06-15,5,,0,0,"This is my number 1 choice when it comes to ice cream and well Im an almost everyday ice cream connoisseur.... I wish Ben and jerry would have bigger options. Can I have an entire gallon of this please! Skip food, eat ice cream yum!! Grab me a spoon please";;;

Half Baked,mandib5c85,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"I love this classic flavor! Its extra packed with stuffing and is the perfect portion if you're trying to keep an eye out, diet-wise. Definitely makes me want some right now, especially the little sized ones! Would recommend for the classic ice cream lover!";;;

Half Baked,leilag11,2020-07-17,5,,0,0,"Ben & Jerrys is the best ice cream brand at the grocery store in my opinion. The ice cream itself is so smooth and creamy, and the flavors are so creative! This flavor specifically satisfies both my craving for cookie dough and chocolate at the same time.";;;

Half Baked,jazzymoggy,2020-07-31,5,Hands down my favorite flavor,0,0,"Whenever someone asks me what flavor I want, this is my go-to and it never fails to disappoint. If you are a lover of cookie dough or brownie batter ice creams, this is a real ride or die. Yes, I am writing this review because I am craving some right now.";;;
Half Baked
author: christopherh11
text;;;: Are you ready to get high off this ice cream? Well embrace yourself because this will take your taste buds to a new dimension this ice cream is out of this world and affordable won't break the bank but will send your taste buds to overdrive of this flavor;;;

name: Half Baked,carlyk19,2020-07-24,5,,0,0,"This is hands-down my all-time favorite Ben & Jerrys flavor. Everyone has their go-to, and this is mine. The decadent combination of chocolate chip cookie dough and brownie batter mixed in together with a vanilla ice cream base is a treat fit for royalty.";;;
Half Baked
author: juliad2
text;;;: My favorite comfort food. Not a big ice cream person so if I eat it Im going all out. Also I love the company. The company supports causes I support so I find spending more for their ice cream is worth it because of the ethical stand point by the company.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: kellihd6df
text;;;: I love me some Ben & Jerrys! Especially the Half Baked ice cream! You get the best of both worlds with chocolate AND vanilla with helpings of scrumptious cookie dough and brownie chunks. Can you say YUM?! Grab a spoon and itll be gone before you know it.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: jessicam808
text;;;: My new favorite ice cream and I'm not even an ice cream fan! Love the chocolate and vanilla ice cream swirled together and the chunks of cookie dough and brownie pieces are huge. They definitely don't skimp on mix ins or flavor. Grab a spoon and dig in!;;;

name: Half Baked,katpereira21,2020-06-24,4,,0,0,"Back when I was in high school choir, my friends and I would each by one of these after a show to celebrate. The doughy goodness mixed with the cool creamy ice cream was amazing. What I love most about it is that the ice cream is never shy on the dough.";;;
Half Baked
author: dominiquen4
text;;;: My favorite ice cream. Its expensive almost five bucks for a pint. Since its a special treat its worth the price. It is the perfect combination of chocolate and vanilla ice cream. Theres big chunks of brownie and plenty of cookie dough. It is delicious!;;;

name: Half Baked,eastcoastelaine,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"This ice cream is absolutely amazing, I love how delicious it is and theres the perfect mix of chocolate chunks and cookie dough in this mix. Im a huge fan of Ben and Jerrys and I would definitely recommend this to anyone whos looking for a nice treat.";;;

Half Baked,courtneyfaith___,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"My favorite Ben and Jerrys flavor! So many dough chunks in the perfect ratio balance with the ice cream. Not too stingy, not too excessive, just right. Not only that, but Ben and Jerrys takes a steadfast stance on social issues, which I can get behind.";;;

Half Baked,cassieann53,2020-07-15,5,,0,0,"My favorite ice cream splurge. This flavor has brownie and chocolate chip cookie dough and It really doesnt get any better than that. Although It is more expensive, the company is very vocal on social injustice and for that reason I buy this ice cream!";;;
Half Baked
author: macinnadeettemoon
text;;;: This is one of my favorite flavors of ben and jerrys. It is super yummy with the chocolate ice cream and chunks of cookie dough and brownies too. Who doesnt love that? It is for sure worth the price that you end up paying for a half pint of ice cream.;;;

name: Half Baked,idks,2020-06-12,5,,0,0,"OMG! I LOVE this ice cream. There is so much in this ice cream, its a great combination of flavors. Everything works in this ice cream. It tastes so good, I would definitely recommend it. I would say it is expensive for a pint, but it's on sale often.";;;
Half Baked
author: jackiek28
text;;;: This is my all time favorite ice cream and go to when Im at the store. I love the mix of ice cream with the cookie dough and brownie bits and its such the perfect balance where you dont get sick or overwhelmed by any one thing. Definitely recommend.;;;

name: Half Baked,awerman526,2020-07-29,5,,0,0,"This is hands down the best flavor ice cream of Ben and Jerrys. Hands down. Even though they have many great floaties this half baked is SO GOOD. its creamy and has all the goodness inside. I dont eat ice cream often but when I do, this is my go to!";;;
Half Baked
author: carolyns24
text;;;: Everyone has their favorite Ben & Jerrys Ive cream. I love the size. I love the variety of flavors. I love that you can eat as much as you want and put the rest back in the freezer. No one takes your ice cream because everyone has their own flavor!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: sbethala
text;;;: Ben and Jerrys half baked is the best flavor in the Collection if you hate nuts. It has brownie chunks and cookie dough chunks which are mixed into chocolate and vanilla icecream. They complement each other nicely and make this flavor irresistible!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: konkon963
title: YUM!!
text;;;: This has to be my favorite flavor. Recently I've been getting pretty good pints with a good amount of cookie dough and brownie. Sometimes ill have some pints that will have less cookie dough or brownie but for the most part I've been happy with it!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: taylorha8ad
text;;;: One of my favorite Ben and Jerrys flavors. I love the brownie and cookie dough pieces. The perfect amount of vanilla and chocolate. Definitely one of my go tos for at home ice cream enjoyment. Top it off with whipped cream and you are good to go!;;;

name: Half Baked,natchivers,2018-11-06,5,,0,0,"This flavor of ice cream is super tasty! The brownie and cookie dough are a delicious and perfect combo! It is more pricey and tasty than other brands, but worth it! I would buy this ice cream again and recommend it to anyone that loves ice cream!";;;
Half Baked
author: jazmines16
text;;;: This flavor is my absolute favorite. If you are a cookie dough lover and love brownies this is definitely the ice cream for you! The ice cream has both cookie dough and brownies in vanilla and chocolate ice cream which just has an amazing flavor.;;;

name: Half Baked,yumicecream7654,2017-12-09,5,This is my favorite flavor ever,0,0,"I remember my grandfather would always get me this flavor when was younger and now every time I eat some I just can't help but to think back to then. This is my personal favorite ice cream flavor ever, Thanks Ben and Jerry for the great memories.";;;
Half Baked
author: queenabigail30
text;;;: This is probably the best ice cream I habe EVER had ita absolutely fantastic amazing really it leaves my taste buds feeling so happy and free so much comfort as well I think this is a great treat I will be eating it always the taste is phenomenal;;;

name: Half Baked
author: octaviamom2020
text;;;: The flavor is great I love how theres a mixture of like cookie dough and Oreo in it. I love the size the only problem is is its so good where a lot of the times Ill eat the whole container in one sitting thats OK I wish they had bigger containers;;;

name: Half Baked,haleybd791,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"This is the best flavor of ice cream, hands down. It has the right balance of chocolate and vanilla ice cream and the brownie dough to cookie dough ratio is always perfect. I wish the pints were a little cheaper but love what the brand stands for";;;
Half Baked
author: saryym
text;;;: Loooooved these when I was pregnant with my daughter !! Omg !! So good ! My sister would always buy it for me ! Love how crunchy the chocolate chips are when you bite into those cookie dough chunks ! Very delicious! I will be buying some today !;;;

name: Half Baked
author: mooshoobunny
text;;;: My friend recommended this to me as its a classic fav but it was okay for me. I didnt like the too sugary pieces of the cookie dough. Im not a big fan of the cookie dough so wasnt a fan. These are pricey so I most likely wont buy this one again.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: Emoney88
title: 1st time trying
text;;;: Awesome! Never tried this classic until this week and it had the perfect amount of gobs and everything. Even if this ice cream melts and is refrozen - it still holds up much better than Phish food or other flavors that have lots of ingredients.;;;

name: Half Baked,samp926d,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"My super sweet tooth cravings dream come true! Woo thats a mouthful! Half baked wont disappoint if you are looking for that super sweat treat to get you through your bad day, breakup, period, celebration! You name it this treats got you covered!";;;

Half Baked,kristinh358,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"This is one of my absolute favorite Ben & Jerry's flavors. Delicious creamy ice cream with precisely the right amount of mix-ins. Like with most B&J ice cream, I have to convince myself to not consume the entire pint. Strongly recommend to all!";;;

Half Baked,nycerke,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"One of my fav flavors ever created. I can eat this anytime, winter/summer, afternoon/evening. It has big chunks of cookie dough and brownies in it. And Ben and Jerrys always has plenty of chunks. I will@most definitely be buying this one again.";;;

Half Baked,cathidelia292,2019-07-10,5,,0,0,"This is my favorite Ben and Jerry's. It is mixed with vanilla and chocolate ice cream, with chocolate chip cookie dough, and brownie batter. It is rich, but it is fantastic. It is also expensive considering that a pint is $5, but it is worth it";;;

Half Baked,blogqatart,2019-10-20,5,,0,0,"The delicious, fat chunks of brownies with such rich (but not too heavy, as it should) chocolate ice cream pair oh so perfectly with the decadent vanilla and old school cookie dough! 10/10 everytime, my go to. If you want happy then this is it.";;;
Half Baked
author: beckyyyyp
text;;;: This is the best ice cream! It is literally the best of every world. The vanilla ice cream with cookie dough is so good and the chocolate ice cream with brownie is delicious! It is a good price and I would definitely buy it again and recommend!;;;

name: Half Baked,angeliaa2,2020-07-24,5,,0,0,"This ice cream was my favorite when I was a teenage, its so good!!! I guess I kinda got tired of it though because I havent had it in so long lol! But now I kinda want some, so maybe Ill pick some up soon, and take a dive down memory lane lol!!";;;
Half Baked
author: carolyn_porreca
text;;;: I am obsessed with this ice cream. It has all of my favorite things inside so it's perfect. It's like going to Coldstone but without all the hasel and a better price! The only thing I dont like is I wish it had cake batter ice cream in it too!;;;

name: Half Baked,llusk,2020-06-22,5,,0,0,"Ben & Jerrys Half Baked ice cream is seriously the best. This flavor combines two of my absolute favorite things brownie and cookie dough. It honestly doesnt get much better than that. This ice cream brand is a bit pricey, but its so worth it.";;;
Half Baked
author: helloemmamarie
text;;;: Ben & Jerrys has been one of my favorite ice cream bands for years. I used to get it with my grandma walking along the beach. This half baked flavor is by far one of my favorites. I love the cookie dough and the brownie pieces that are inside.;;;

name: Half Baked,justicem8,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"No matter what flavor I choose Ive never gone wrong with Ben and Jerrys. One of the best ice cream brands, Ill admit its a bit pricy for its small container but its overall worth it. You wouldnt be disappointed with any flavor from this brand.";;;
Half Baked
author: carrieh17
text;;;: The best ice cream and flavour ever. If you're undecided between chocolate chip cookie dough and chocolate brownie this one is for you! I find other ice creams just don't compare to Ben and Jerry's. It is worth the extra price for the quality.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: lovelylanzz
text;;;: This is one of the best ice cream that Ben and Jerrys makes. I would rate this 9 out of 10. This ice cream is delectable and creamy. Theres also pieces of brownie and cookie dough inside. It tastes so amazing. I recommend getting this product!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: leae1
text;;;: This is by far my favorite ice cream! Its smooth and delicious and filled with cookie fought bites and my favorite part the half baked brownie bites all swirled together in creamy vanilla and chocolate ice cream. I recommend this to everyone.;;;

name: Half Baked,Jlcchavez,2019-06-11,1,Recent bad batch,0,2,"I love this flavor but recently purchased a pint and it was terrible, can't be sure if it was my local grocery stores fault or the batch was bad. Had a very odd texture it was similar to those dehydrated ice cream squares you get for camping.";;;

Half Baked,knkobelak,2018-06-03,5,,0,0,"My weakness! I love this ice cream so much! There are so many different flavors and textures, making it a terrific, indulging dessert. Yes the perfect ice cream to eat when you’re bored and just want to sit in front of the tv and do nothing!";;;

Half Baked,meganh4256,2020-07-27,5,,0,0,"If you havent had thisyou need it. This ice cream is packed with pieces of brownie and cookies. Unlike most ice cream, there arent many bites that dont have a huge amount of brownie/cookie dough. Well worth the few additional bucks you spend";;;

Half Baked,laurens283,2020-07-29,5,,0,0,"Best ice cream ever. Gives the best of both worlds- chocolate and brownies and vanilla and cookie dough. This is my favorite ice cream, plus I love the company so much. They are so socially responsible and help with so many important issues";;;
Half Baked
author: knoue
text;;;: This is my sisters favorite ice cream! I think the flavor is very delicious and since Ben & Jerrys are known for their textures I wouldnt recommend if you dont really like textures in ice cream. Other than that this is an amazing ice cream!;;;

name: Half Baked,sabrinasmash,2020-07-30,5,,0,0,"One of my absolute favorite ice cream flavors! Quality ice cream with flavorful, quality add-ins. The ice cream is packed full of the cookie dough & brownie. Ben & Jerrys may be more costly than other brands, but its definitely worth it";;;

Half Baked,linneai,2020-06-24,5,,0,0,"I was chocked trying this ice cream. I had been sticking to the cookie dough flavor for years, which I still dearly enjoy, but when trying this one the cookie-dough got competition! I will definitely buy this one next time Im getting B&Js.";;;

Half Baked,chifoodiebecs,2020-07-22,5,,0,0,"This ice cream is seriously so flavorful and delicious, Im a true believer that no other ice cream brands compare to that of Ben and Jerrys because it is seriously THE BEST and the cookie dough chunks in here are HUGE and outta this world!";;;
Half Baked
author: maybeamakeupaddict
text;;;: Half baked is one of my favorite Ben and Jerrys ice cream flavors. It is a great go to for any audience or if you are in a hurry and you just want to grab one fast. I especially recommend purchasing it if you like cookie dough ice cream.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: jackieq123
text;;;: Sooooooo good!! Loaded with chunks of brownies and cookie dough. Great consistency and phenomenal flavor. Not to mention Ben and Jerrys is a company with great values which makes me feel good about spending my money. You wont regret it!;;;

name: Half Baked,,2020-07-28,4,,0,0,"This is my second favorite Ben and Jerrys Ive cream. It has just the right amount of sweetness and is not over the top. I have easily eaten a whole pint in a single day. Overall, love this ice cream and the dairy they use is very creamy";;;
Half Baked
author: joscelync44c6
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream. The size is perfect for one person. The mix of toppings in this ice cream is perfect. The taste is absolutely delicious and its amazing quality. I would recommend this to anybody who likes sweet ice cream.;;;

name: Half Baked,aclifford88,2020-06-20,5,,0,0,"Ben & Jerrys Half Baked is my biggest weakness when it comes to ice cream. I wish I could say I had self control, but this pint...I can eat it all in one sitting. Everything inside it is so dang good and the ice cream is just so creamy.";;;
Half Baked
author: sarab15
text;;;: This ice cream is great there is so many flavor to choose from. The kids like to try the different mixes. Is a good quality ice cream for a decent price they even have froyo versions of some of their ice creams. Definitely worth a try.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: kierstab
text;;;: This ice cream is guaranteed to make your day better. The cookie dough chunks are amazing in this brand and really the reason I continue to buy the flavor. I love chocolate of course and I love the ice cream bar version on this flavor.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: melanieb112
text;;;: Ugh where do i even begin?! This is one of my favorite ice cream flavors of all time. Each bite is packed with a different flavor that satisfies my palette. I will never grow tired of the taste of half baked ice cream from@ben & jerrys;;;

name: Half Baked
author: hannahmz66
text;;;: This is my go-to pint! Its got a little bit of everything! It is worth every penny to get a more expensive brand when the quality of the ice cream is so good! I would definitely recommend this brand to brownie and cookie dough lovers!;;;

name: Half Baked,cornelius,2020-07-01,4,,0,0,"If Im craving a little bit of everything, this is my go to choice. Delicious chocolate ice cream with bits of decadent brownies and cookie dough. I only eat a quarter of the paint because its too much sometimes, but overall delicious";;;
Half Baked
author: taytay10
text;;;: The best ice cream ever! Yes it is more expensive per pint than most ice creams are per quart but it is soooo good. I continue to buy this because I love the rich flavor and you cant beat a cookie dough and brownie combination to me!;;;

name: Half Baked,jodim1,2020-07-30,5,,0,0,"One of my favorite Ben and Jerrys flavors. It has the perfect mixture of all the flavors. If youre unsure which ice cream flavor you are craving, this is the one for you! You are delighted with all of the flavors that are well loved.";;;

Half Baked,kelliese367,2020-06-16,5,,0,0,"I love this ice cream. Havent had any in a couple of months. This is one of my favorite splurge ice cream choices. I like to get the small sized ones when I need an ice cream fix. Highly recommend to anyone, you should give it a try";;;
Half Baked
author: jadziarosec
text;;;: This is amazing. Perfect cravings ice cream. I love the size of the container and the ice cream is very creamy. Price is a little high but for the quality its worth it! Definitely will have these stocked in my freezer ! A must have.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: waleskisss
text;;;: Its a perfect mix of vanilla and chocolate! Perfect when youre craving cookie dough & brownies!! Ben & Jerrys tend to be a little more on the expensive side but SO worth it! Especially since they pay their employees a livable wage!!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: Marie
title: Cravings? Satisfied!
text;;;: I buy this all the time and it’s my favorite. Both brownies and chocolate chip cookies are my favorite sweets to eat. The fact that it’s in ice cream is even better because I get to enjoy the best of both worlds on hot summer days!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: brieoc
text;;;: Tried this ice cream because of all the great reviews but it was just too sweet for me. If you have a high tolerance for sugar like my boyfriend (who likes this brand) then you may enjoy this but to me it just tasted overly sugary.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: cellissalovesyou
text;;;: The best mixture of cookie dough and brownie. Its not the most expensive but it also isnt the cheapest but for the quality I would say its worth it! This is my go to ice cream I have it atleast once a week as a little weekend treat;;;

name: Half Baked
author: debbied1
text;;;: This is a true decadent flavor blast. Easily one of the best pints in the line. Fudge brownie and cookie dough greatness that I would love to buy again and again. I love how they combine the top tier flavors together into one pint.;;;

name: Half Baked
text;;;: MY ABSOLUTE FAVORITE BEN AND JERRYS ICE CREAM FLAVOR. its definitely on the pricey side of ice cream but its so delicious. Its like a roller coaster of flavor! It really just doesnt compare to others. Seriously a satisfied consumer;;;

name: Half Baked,dianak1,2019-08-07,5,,0,0,"Craving this all day, every day. So so good! A little pricey but I think its worth it. Ice cream is great already but this just adds so much more. Id say its better than most other flavors and brands and Id definitely recommend it!";;;

Half Baked,Bridgespo99997,2017-11-05,3,"Really good, really rich tho",0,0,"This ice cream is a bit too rich for me. I love the vanilla ice cream with the brownies and the cookie dough, that's the really good portion. The chocolate ice cream is very strong, and too overwhelming to combine nicely with this.";;;
Half Baked
author: tiffanyscents17
text;;;: Can you say delicious??? Growing up in Maine I was able to enjoy fresh Ben & Jerry's ice cream at out local beaches. The way they make their pints is so amazing and just like the fresh ice cream you get. This flavor is so so yummy.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: kamrya
text;;;: Probably the best ice cream that exists. Its a great price for a pint and is packed full of flavor. Its better than others that are similar because you get a chunk of dough in just about every single bite. Overall its a top choice.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: bumble_beauty
text;;;: This is my favorite!! One of my pregnancy cravings so Ive been going through a lot of it lately. Its so delicious. I dont care if its pricey because Its worth it to me! [product:ben-&-jerrys-ice-cream-half-baked-16oz] #goodbyejuly;;;

name: Half Baked
author: jessicabbdd3
text;;;: This is my all time favorite Ben and jerrys flavor ice cream. I usually am not an ice cream person but this product is to die for!!! It is super delicious and you will want to keep eating it untill you finish the entire container!;;;

name: Half Baked,Review101,2017-04-11,5,"""A life without Ben, is a dull Jerry.""",0,0,"So good. So good- - - So good! My mouth is watering thinking of the mind numbing flavor contrast evident in this flavor! Half baked is absolutely phenomenal for any gooey, chocolatey, fudge brownie ice cream loving lad or lassie!";;;
Half Baked
author: amyccbd8
text;;;: I absolutely love Ben and Jerrys ice cream its super delicious and really creamy. I also like that you get a ton of toppings they dont skimp! Its one of my favorite ice creams and I think its a pretty good price for what you get.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: kileyg4
text;;;: This is my second favorite flavor behind chocolate fudge brownie. There are a ton of cookie dough and brownie chunks and then blend of chocolate and vanilla ice cream is perfect! Great way to cure your sweet tooth all year round!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: stella_1268
text;;;: This tastes very good but is a little but to chocolatey for my taste. I love how they are in small containers so I dont even have to grab a bowl! I wish there was more cookie dough in it though! I recommend if you love chocolate;;;

name: Half Baked
author: supacourt
text;;;: I love the combination of The vanilla and chelate with the brownie and cookie dough bits...that are perfectly soft! I will forever love this slightly over price ice cream brand! And I love what the company stands for in general!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: coraleel
text;;;: Best Ben and Jerry’s flavour ever! So amazing and full of flavour! Definitely affordable for the quality! Eat this like once a week! Absolutely amazing and anyone who hasn’t tried it it’s so good! Cookie dough and brownie dough!;;;

name: Half Baked,jess_doesyourhair,2020-07-27,5,,0,0,"Amazing ice cream. I love Ben and Jerrys, Ive tried several flavors and definitely this and chunky monkey are my favorite. Some people say its overpriced but I think its a great price for the quality of ice cream youre getting.";;;
Half Baked
author: staciem2cb5
text;;;: I think this brand is slightly overpriced but I wont deny the incredible flavor. Their ability to market similar flavors yet they taste so much better amazes me! Its a real treat if you havent had Ben & Jerrys yet. Go get some!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: rileyashs
text;;;: Ben & Jerry’s Half Baked Ice Cream has been my favorite For at least 10 years. First time I tasted it I realized why people were so crazy about this brand. DELICIOUS honestly. They have a very good selection of flavors as well!;;;

name: Half Baked,alicias37,2020-07-24,5,,0,0,"Ben & Jerrys half-baked ice cream has to be one of my all-time favorites. Its so creamy and rich, making it very satisfying. I love the chunks of brownie and cookie pieces in it, and each pint is generous with the pieces in it.";;;

Half Baked,oneandonllyy,2020-07-27,5,,0,0,"Ben & Jerrys is one of my favorite ice cream brands! The brand never disappoints in the quality and quantity you receive, I buy them all the time binge watching or just for fun. It is however a little pricey but its worth it!!";;;

Half Baked,saralynnb,2020-06-29,4,,0,0,"This ice cream is so good, and I didnt think I would like it. I dont love chocolate ice cream, but with the mix of chocolate and vanilla with cookie dough and brownie bites it is delicious. We keep buying it again and again!!!";;;

Half Baked,sabrinasb0f8,2020-07-13,5,,0,0,"Its really hard for me to pick a favorite Ben & Jerrys, but this is absolutely a top contender. How can you improve upon brownies AND ice cream in one pint? I love how both are perfectly chewy and balance the creamy ice cream.";;;

Half Baked,nicolettepf049,2020-06-19,5,,0,0,"The amount of times Ive purchased this ice cream flavor is insane. Ive never had a more delicious flavor of ice cream! The mixture of chocolate, brownie, and cookie dough is amazing, and I would 100% recommend this to others!!";;;
Half Baked
author: francist3
text;;;: This was soooo good I finished it within like 20 minutes. It is kinda pricey but for good reasons. Honestly this ice cream will not disappoint you. Every time I go grocery shopping the first thing I look for is this ice cream.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: jasmines126
text;;;: Half baked is one of my all time favorite Ben & Jerrys flavor and I hope they never retire it! I grew up on this ice cream and its never let me down. Its affordable and delicious and I will always love Ben and Jerrys ice cream;;;

name: Half Baked
author: faeriebarista
text;;;: My absolute favorite flavor of ice cream! I love it. Its got the perfect blend of flavors and it is just perfect. I definitely recommend it to anyone that loves chocolate. Or just hates choosing between cookies and brownies!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: jenniferl359
text;;;: So yummy! Between the cookie dough and the brownie batter you cant go wrong plenty of chunks throughout the ice cream. We will definitely buy again but the price is high for the small amount you get. Overall it was delicious;;;

name: Half Baked
author: jennifergz
text;;;: I LOVE this ice cream. I always go back to this one. I have tried other Ben & Jerrys ice cream but this by far is the best one. Although the Cherry Garcia is pretty amazing as well! But you can never go wrong with Half Baked;;;

name: Half Baked
author: ashleymc4f0
text;;;: This is the single most delicious ice cream on the planet. I actually names my two cats Ben and jerry because it's so good. I think one spoonful has more calories than I should eat in a week though but it's sooooo worth it.;;;

name: Half Baked,catmeowur,2020-07-29,4,,0,0,"I absolutely love the flavor of this ice cream! You get the perfect mix of cookie dough, brownies and vanilla and chocolate ice cream! It is perfect for that time of month, girls night in, or just because ice cream is life.";;;
Half Baked
author: emilyj142
text;;;: My favourite flavour of Ben and Jerrys. Its always very consistent and has a good amount of brownie and cookie dough. I always have to hold myself back from eating the entire pint. I can usually make it last two days though;;;

name: Half Baked
author: stephcb184
text;;;: Delicious. This is the best tasting ice cream Ive ever Puchased from a grocery store. I loved the creamy consistency and the generous ingredients. Ben & JerrysNever disappoints. I would recommend this ice cream to everyone.;;;

name: Half Baked,jilliang35f2,2020-06-04,5,,0,0,"Ben and Jerrys has yet to put out a bad ice cream flavor. This has the perfect amount of cookie dough and brownie bits and theyre pretty big pieces too. Its so good, but its definitely pricier than other ice creams for sure";;;

Half Baked,,2018-11-11,5,,0,0,"Nothing touches the flavor of Ben and Jerry’s, love the new products they are always trying new things and it shows great innovation. Half baked is just a classic of theirs that will always be my go to for movie nights in.";;;

Half Baked,atik,2017-11-16,5,One of my favorite flavors,0,0,"If you like chocolate, but don't like your ice cream loaded with it, this is a good pick. The chocolate ice cream and brownies aren't super overpowering. They compliment the cookie dough and vanilla ice cream pretty well.";;;
Half Baked
author: valerieced7e
text;;;: I looooooooove. Whoever created this flavor has my heart. Just writing this makes me want to take a trip to the grocery store for it. The flavors compliment each other perfectly. The quality of the ice cream is top notch!;;;

name: Half Baked,mpalmesano,2020-07-07,5,,0,0,"This is THE BEST flavor of Ben and Jerrys ice cream that Ive ever had. Its vanilla ice cream with cookie dough, brownie, and chocolate chunks and its so good. Its not too pricey for how much you get and it tastes amazing.";;;
Half Baked
author: kaitlynt32
text;;;: Do I even need to say it? This ice cream is the best. If you love cookie dough and brownies you will love this ice cream. I dont love chocolate ice cream in general but I do love this one and pick it up every now and then;;;

name: Half Baked
author: britdric
text;;;: This is my favorite flavor from B&Js! Their chocolate chip cookie dough pieces are delightful and this mix is a fun twist. Only downfall is the overall pricing of their ice cream but you do pay for quality to some degree.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: katd1
text;;;: When I found this ice cream I could not put the spoon down! It tastes so very good and I always finish the container within two days. The cookie chunks that are in this are amazing and I always recommend it to my friends.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: shelbyg7957
text;;;: Half baked is the holy grail of ice cream. Chocolate ice cream with brownie chunks and vanilla ice cream with cookie dough pieces is the perfect combination. This is always my go to ice cream when I want a special treat.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: alexism123
text;;;: Ben and Jerrys is my favorite brand of ice cream. Their half baked is delicious. The cookie dough is really I like any other you can find in an ice cream. I like that this flavor has the mixture of the chocolate as well.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: corinner23
text;;;: Favorite ice cream flavor! The chunks of brownies and cookie dough are so good and the ice cream itself is amazing. Its so hard to not eat the whole pint in one sitting! Wish it was cheaper so I could get it more often!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: ssl101
text;;;: Half-Baked is the best ice cream out there for someone like me who is so indecisive. Its half cookie dough and have brownie! Cant get enough of this one. Idk how they keep it separate but they know what they were doing.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: miav43
text;;;: It was so good and it had so much flavor it was my first time trying it and I would get it again. There is nothing to improve. It was only 6 bucks and good so I would buy it again and I would honestly let others try it;;;

name: Half Baked
author: alexandram143
text;;;: Probably the best ice cream youll ever eat with the perfect combo of cookies and brownies. I even put it in the microwave for like 10 seconds to soften the ice cream and makes the cookies and brownies a little warm too;;;

name: Half Baked
author: laurah192e
text;;;: My favorite. A mix of both cookie dough and brownies! Plus the vanilla and chocolate. I like to get this when it is on sale but is a very good value i like how they bring new flavors out often. Will buy again and again;;;

name: Half Baked
author: calleyb
text;;;: This is the best ice cream its delicious and has the best combination of extras in it that it creates the perfect comfort pint of ice cream. Its B&Js so it is kind of over priced compared to generic ice creams though.;;;

name: Half Baked
text;;;: This is my second favorite Ben & Jerry’s flavor and def one of my go tos. It’s really good. Love chocolate so brownie plus cookie dough is a great combination. Honestly I don’t know anyone who doesn’t like half baked;;;

name: Half Baked
author: mccrae0330
text;;;: Love Ben and Jerrys Ive cream when I need my ice cream fix they are always my go to with all my favorite flavors. The perfect amount of sweetness. Definately my favorite brand of ice cream for those late night treats;;;

name: Half Baked,gabrielleang,2020-07-17,5,,0,0,"this is my favorite ice cream flavor ever, it has the perfect combo of traditional ingredients and both chocolate and vanilla. Ive never disappointed with Ben & Jerrys. Just watch your serving sizes, word to the wise";;;
Half Baked
author: savsides
text;;;: I could NOT put this down once I took a bite. I love how this brand has so many different flavors and they are very unique. Pretty affordable for a college student like me. Great night time snack! Totally recommend.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: kirstyse6e6
text;;;: One of my favorites. Found at most grocery stores. Also online too. I recommend them. So many flavors. And they dont disappoint. A must try for sure and you will be going back for more. I highly recommend it to you.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: taylorll
text;;;: Hands down one of my favorite ice-cream! I love the chunks of sweets you get to eat while still eating ice-cream. This product is so creamy and so full of flavor! I love it on a hot summer day or even in the winter!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: kaialacombe04
text;;;: This is my absolute favorite ice cream. I have repeatedly bought this item and it never disappoints. The cookie dough and brownie bites are perfect. I definitely recommend to others. This is a great flair over all.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: haleygf26a
text;;;: fave of all time. may be a little pricey but ben and jerrys is always worth it!! so tasty so simple and so well done. always a treat with every spoonful. definitely one if those flavor I go back to again and again;;;

name: Half Baked,laramaraldp,2019-06-04,5,,0,0,"The perfect combination of cookie dough and brownie, and I really like the chuck pieces in it too. Also the chocolate and vanilla ice cream makes it even better. Im always happy when I have some of this in my day.";;;

Half Baked,corinnek911,2018-11-14,5,,0,0,"I love the combination of Cookue dough and brownie bits in this ice cream! I do wish they would add more brownie bits to it, it seems like there is never enough. The brownies are nice and soft and super delicious.";;;
Half Baked
author: theresn
text;;;: All Ben & Jerrys flavors are good but Half Baked is the best. Its delicious and I buy it more times than I probably should. I recommend buying this. Its affordable and worth it. You wont regret it. 100% recommend.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: nikib6
text;;;: Who doesn't love Ben & Jerry's? Unproblematic with wholesome ingredients! This is my favorite ice cream ever. The brownie chunks get me every time. I highly reccomend Half Baked when you cannot decide on a flavor!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: bridgettesl
text;;;: This is one of my favorite Ice cream flavors. It has all my@favorites all wrapped up in one. My husband always tries to steal some when I buy this. I highly recommend this flavor for anyone who loves a sweet treat;;;

name: Half Baked
author: antoinetten2
text;;;: Half baked is the best of both worlds. You get a little bit of brownie and a little bit of cookie dough. If I ever crave ice cream this one is my go to! I definitely recommend this flavor to everyone its the best!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: hcreger_17
text;;;: This stuff has been my downfall. I’ve had to learn to eat it in moderation. It is my number one favorite Icecream ive ever had. My husband doesn’t even have to ask what kind I want anymore it’s always half baked!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: sophiec21
text;;;: Cookie dough and brownie batter. How could you not like it? Such good flavor combos when mixed and eaten altogether. One of my favorite guilty pleasure ice creamed. Very satisfied every time I make this purchase!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: kenziedave11
text;;;: This is a very tasty ice cream flavor!!! I have bought this flavor many times before. It is so delicious and is my go to ice cream. I bought it from my local grocery store. I was very satisfied with this product.;;;

name: Half Baked,caitlynkayeblog,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"One of my favorite ice cream flavors EVER. I am not the biggest fan of the brownie bits but I looove everything else in this ice cream!! Chocolate, vanilla, cookie dough, and brownie yummy goodness!!! A must try";;;
Half Baked
author: lorim63
text;;;: This one is a bit of a throw back for me. Upon first bite Im taken back to my childhood. Sitting in the back of my parents station wagon eating a soft serve vanilla and chocolate swirl ice cream cone. Delicious!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: barbarac11
text;;;: Ben & Jerrys has some of the best unique flavored ice cream pints this one is one of my favorites it includes chocolate & vanilla ice creams mixed with chocolate cookie dough and fudge brownies. What not to like;;;

name: Half Baked
author: antonellam14
text;;;: So. Good. DELICIOUS. The perfect mix of brownies and cookie dough with a little bit of coldness. This is my go to flavor and I will get it every time i go to the store!!! GET THIS FLAVOR!!!!! IT WONT DISAPPOINT.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: nicoleee_u
text;;;: This could be an UNPOPULAR OPINION but....... there is just way too much brownie and chocolate in this pint for me. I am a cookie dough lover and I feel it just overpowers the vanilla ice cream and cookie dough.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: nanaagotthejuice
text;;;: I just had this yesterday. Im on my period and this was amazing to have during this time. It taste so good. Might be one of my favorites and Im honestly not that big of a fan of ice cream. Only like $5 at wawa.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: kaylas230
text;;;: Im obsessed with this ice cream! I love cookies dough but we all know we cant have too much of it and this is the perfect ice cream for the cookie dough lovers. If you havent had this its definitely a must try!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: akatori
text;;;: Love all the flavors and is great on summer nights when just chilling outside with friends. Its always on sale even at 711 buy one get one free. Top 5 favorite ice cream brands 10/10 would recommend any flavor.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: saratd34a
text;;;: My chidlren love this ice cream. They love that its like eating twi ice creams in one. It taste way better than the alternative products and is about the same price. This flavor is definitely not disappointing.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: maggiejane
text;;;: This is one of my favorite flavors. I always end up eating more than I intend to because I keep digging for the next chunk of cookie or brownie dough. Plus you dont have to choose between chocolate and vanilla.;;;

name: Half Baked,,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"My absolute favorite flavor. I love the mix between the brownies and cookie dough. I cant think of anything that would improve this flavor. I buy this all the time, I would definitely recommend this to others!";;;
Half Baked
author: jennab52
text;;;: The brownie and chocolate chip cookie dough bites is the most amazing combination of flavors! It is a bit rich for me to eat the whole pint but I easily could. More expensive then most but so good nonetheless!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: keepcalm155_reviewer
text;;;: Ben and Jerry's icecream is expensive .. especially for a small pint of icecream but when you eat it it is worth the price it is so creamy and although i do wish they would make a bigger size I recommend;;;

name: Half Baked
author: sarampls
text;;;: Although the price is higher than a storebrand the half-baked is definitely my go to. I love the gooeyness and chewiness of the brownie and cookie dough mixed in. I am super satisfied and will continue to buy.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: dylanc16
text;;;: This is the perfect combination. Chewy brownie pieces and soft cookie dough pieces in a chocolate and vanilla ice cream. Its a fair price for the quality and I love that the owners are human rights activists.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: ashleys32
text;;;: It tastes good but it's definitely something you have to be in the mood for. There are a lot of chunky bits so if you don't like to chew your ice cream this one is not for you. The flavor is very nice though.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: jasleena8136
text;;;: Sitting on your couch craving all the sweets like cookies and brownies? Too lazy to get up and bake some fresh ones? Heres your solution! Its not warm and fresh out the oven but it is still just as delicious!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: samag
text;;;: This is my favorite Ben and Jerrys ice cream flavor! Has fudge in it along with balls of cookie dough and chocolate chips. Its a bit more than your regular ice cream but its definitely worth it in my opinion.;;;

name: Half Baked
text;;;: Half Baked is my favorite ice cream! We love to eat this at our house! The price is good. I usually buy it on sale. Not all stores have it. It is so delicious. I am a happy customer. I will be a repeat buyer.;;;

name: Half Baked,princesstaytay91,2018-08-02,4,,0,0,"This is my favourite ice cream of all time! My only complaint is the big price for the small container, but it’s also worth the money so it’s not a game changer for me. I will buy this ice cream until I die!";;;
Half Baked
author: stephaniep40
text;;;: This is one of my favorite flavors from ben and Jerry's! I love brownie and cookie dough and with this you dont have to choose between either! The bites are well distributed and the ice cream is high quality;;;

name: Half Baked
author: rs426
text;;;: This is the perfect mix of cookie dough and brownie for those of us that cant decide. The babies ice cream is a good vanilla flavor. This is one of my favorite go to ice cream flavors to keep in the fridge.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: carriel16
text;;;: Half baked is my favorite from Ben & Jerrys. It has the perfect amount of everything that I want. There is nothing I would change about it. Its definitely worth trying if you like cookie dough and brownies.;;;

name: Half Baked,nataliem164,2020-07-28,5,,0,0,"Ugh, the best flavor of Ben and Jerrys! Perfect for late night with a Hallmark movie and a glass of wine. Love the company and will keep buying from them! Delicious!!!!! I only wish it came in a bigger bin!";;;
Half Baked
author: beccabee14
text;;;: Im obsessed with this flavor. Its so sweet and I love the chunks of brownie and cookie dough inside. Each bite has a little bit of everything and is the best late night snack to quench those sweet cravings.;;;

name: Half Baked,danyaalise,2020-06-24,5,,0,0,"If you like eating batter and dough, this is the ice cream for you. So tasty, love that there are plenty of cookie dough and brownie chunks throughout. More pricey than a basic ice cream, but well worth it.";;;
Half Baked
author: chym2
text;;;: The ice cream is good. It has enough of each flavor but doesnt conflict too much. I would love it if the little globs of dough were a bit smaller but all in all Im happy with the amount of bang for my buck.;;;

name: Half Baked,sammyxo19,2020-07-03,5,,0,0,"The perfect combination of everything you want: chocolate, vanilla, cookie dough, and brownie. This is one of my go-tos at the Ben & Jerry's freezer. I love saving all the cookie dough until the last bite!";;;

Half Baked,,2020-07-30,5,,0,0,"Ben & Jerrys Half Baked ice cream is my fianc and my all time favorite ice cream flavor. The pieces are so large and so good. However, You cannot go wrong with any of Ben & Jerrys flavors. 10/10 recommend.";;;
Half Baked
author: arielhasasecret
text;;;: My favorite flavor from Ben and Jerrys. When I want a gourmet bowl of ice cream I go with Ben and Jerrys. The flavors are rich and the ice cream fills me up quickly so that I dont feel like Im over eating!;;;

name: Half Baked,ashleythedietitian,2020-07-30,5,,0,0,"THIS IS MY FAVORITE ICE CREAM OF ALL TIME. so smooth, so creamy and curbs my sweet tooth. The perfect balance of sweet and creamy. Its always my go to when Im at the store. Ill love you forever half baked.";;;

Half Baked,christineh1,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"Ben and Jerrys is my favorite ice cream brand! They are also a good company to support! Check those guys out! Half baked is so good, it is delicious chewy brownie pieces and super good cookie dough pieces!";;;
Half Baked
author: angelbaby232004
text;;;: So so so good! Love the half baked the best especially when Im half baked or having a really rough week. Ive been getting this flavor for 10+ years. The taste is phenomenal and the price point is on point.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: allisonmaf9b
text;;;: No other ice cream brand compares in my opinion. Although quite pricy its so worth it! Half baked is my favourite flavour and its always jammed packed with filling and flavours!! Will always recommend haha;;;

name: Half Baked,brookr4,2020-02-03,5,,0,0,"Mmmm half baked is amazing. All Ben &Jerry is sooo good. We just constantly try and love every one, every time we try a new one. Creamy and you can taste each additive in there ( cookie dough, brownie etc)";;;

Half Baked,maryanastasia6,2020-07-15,5,,0,0,"Excellent munchie flavor, they didnt name it half baked for nothing. The fudge bits are delicious and I love this flavor so much. The company supports good causes too so it makes the ice cream even better.";;;
Half Baked
author: member53e86
text;;;: One of my favorite icecreams! I like the cookie dough chunks inside and they give a nice texture to the icecream. It's definitely very sweet so I wouldn't recommend it if you don't like very sweet things.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: lizy6
text;;;: One of my go-to ice creams. Love that these are non gmo and packed with goodies. I personally wish it was straight down the middle chocolate ice cream on one side vanilla on the other but I still love it!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: shelbyn30
text;;;: This is by far my favorite flavor! I love the chunks of desserts hidden in each bite. Ive been eating this one for years. I only recently stopped because my gut decided it couldnt handle the dairy anymore;;;

name: Half Baked,,2018-11-11,5,,0,0,"My favorite Ben and Jerry’s flavor! Maybe even my fave ice cream in general flavor too. The chunks are big too which I like! I have had this several, several times and would recommend. Decent pricing too!";;;
Half Baked
author: gonzalezg002
text;;;: So good ! All Ben and Jerrys ice cream flavors are so so good. I will eat the whole tub.. good thing they dont sell huge tubs of them ! These are so good theyll please any picky ice cream eater ........;;;

name: Half Baked
author: laurens94cd
text;;;: The best ice cream ever. So yummy and easy to eat. Not cheap for ice cream but not expensive by any means. I would make the packaging different for each flavor to make it more appealing and likely to buy.;;;

name: Half Baked,dubraskac,2020-07-23,5,,0,0,"This is my favorite ice cream in the world. It pretty much has everything but in little portions. Dont get me wrong, I love it, but I would love it more if they add more cookies dough and everything else.";;;
Half Baked
author: meganm70
text;;;: This ice cream is defiently the best on the market! I am a repeating consumer and will be for the rest of my life. It can be a little pricey. VERY DELICIOUS!!!! I am satisfied with the product they make!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: cailag31c4
text;;;: The absolute best ice cream on the planet! I love this product! It has the perfect amount of brownie and chocolate chip cookie dough chucks throughout so you are sure to get at least one with every bite!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: rebekahwillow
text;;;: Seriously SO AMAZING!!! Cookie Dough & Brownie Batter! I'm in! The consistency is nice and creamy. The cookie dough chunks are good size and you don't feel like your searching for them in this ice cream.;;;

name: Half Baked,uhohloreo,2020-08-01,5,,0,0,"First, Ben & Jerrys is an ice cream brand for the people. Ben & Jerry were quite literally protesting with people. So, this brand is the supreme ice cream brand. And its delicious and sooo rich & creamy!";;;

Half Baked,emilyh108,2019-07-06,5,,0,0,"This combines my two favourite flavors together, there are plenty of brownies and cookie dough chunks in there and a nice mix of chocolate and vanilla ice cream. It's so tasty and I will continue buying.";;;
Half Baked
author: caitlinm2cbb
text;;;: Hands down the best Ben & jerrys flavor ever!!! If you havent tried this you need to. Its one if those flavors that I crave after having a really bad day. Always makes me feel better to indulge. Buy it!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: poojap7228
text;;;: This is just what you need to come home to at the end of a long day. So creamy and rich in flavor. Definitely one of my go to flavors. Can be pricey but they definitely go on sale every once in a while!;;;

name: Half Baked,andreacambo,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"Super unique flavor! The cookie dough and brownie bits are delicious and are extremely chunky. Honestly, this needs no improvement. I am a repeat customer and will always come back for the yummy flavor.";;;
Half Baked
author: raqueln1
text;;;: This ice cream is delicious! Its also the perfect size and so easy to find at any grocery store or convenience store. Theres a ton different flavors that are good but this is one of my favorite flavors.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: _aditij_
text;;;: my absolute favorite flavor of Ben and Jerrys ice cream. i love the brownie chunks that i get in every spoonful and the vanilla and chocolate flavors. great ice cream and i can literally eat tubs of it!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: jenniferm875c
text;;;: Omg. Half baked is my FAVORITE. This is my go to ice cream for any occasion. The brownie and cookie dough pieces in this ice cream makes it what it is. I cant recommend this enough. You need to try it!;;;

name: Half Baked,kevins1015,2020-06-29,5,,0,0,"Half Baked is a staple item in my freezer. We always have a few tubs. The mix of chocolate, vanilla, brownie bites, and cookie dough makes for an amazing flavor profile. Absolutely love this ice cream.";;;
Half Baked
author: sarahh420
text;;;: Ben & Jerrys is always a favorite for ice cream. Unique flavors with LOTS of delicious chunks and swirls of yummy toppers. Only gave this one 5 stars because I prefer other flavors with less chocolate.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: iconicdria
text;;;: This is the perfect blend of brownie vanilla and chocolate mixed in one. Its not to pricey to me and I dont think I would change anything about this flavor. This is always my go when buying this brand!;;;

name: Half Baked,ilanah2,2020-03-01,5,,0,0,"Definitely my favorite ice cream of all time! I try not to have it all the time because its not super healthy, but its difficult to resist. I mean read whats in it, it cant get better than Half Baked!";;;
Half Baked
author: Andrea
title: No cookie dough!
text;;;: This is usually my all time favorite ice cream . There was tons of brownie but absolutely no cookie dough in my tub . I searched and searched as I was eating and no cookie dough at all. Disappointed.;;;

name: Half Baked,ciarap4,2020-07-16,5,,0,0,"Half brownie and half cookie dough you cant go wrong whenever you eat this I only purchase this flavor this is a must buy if you love ice cream, bit on the pricey side but definitely worth the money!";;;
Half Baked
text;;;: This is my favorite Ben and Jerrys product. It is a little pricey but worth the splurge. I would put more cookie dough then brownie. I am a repeat customer and will continue to be. I would recommend.;;;

name: Half Baked,nicolep1122,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"We rarely get ice cream to keep at home, but half baked is definitely our special treat. It tastes great and even the hubs and kiddos love it. Its a nice change from traditional vanilla or chocolate.";;;
Half Baked
author: tessac7
text;;;: Having an ice cream that is vanilla and has all the yummy goods that everyone craves I had to try it! It is so good and you can almost always find coupons on Ben and Jerrys ice creams in many stores!;;;

name: Half Baked,axhl3yy,2019-08-15,5,,0,0,"This product is really good I love eating this, its affordable the price isnt that bad and this product doesnt need improvement, Im a repeat consumer Im in love, yes I would recommend this to others.";;;

Half Baked,amys289,2020-07-28,5,,0,0,"Best. Ice Cream EVER! Cookies dough, brownies, vanilla, and chocolate ice cream! all blended together for comfort in a cup! It's a very rich ice cream, so the little container can last you a while!";;;
Half Baked
author: victorial0ve
text;;;: I love the Ben & Jerrys has a lot of different flavors - this by far is my favorite! Anytime that I eat ice cream I usually crave something with chocolate and Ive gone through 10000 tubs in college;;;

name: Half Baked
author: mekaylac3
text;;;: This is definitely one of my favorite Ben and Jerrys flavors. Its very creamy and rich. The pint is always very generous with the amount of cookie and brownie pieces. Definitely my go-to ice cream.;;;

name: Half Baked,sydneyc2,2020-07-30,5,,0,0,"This is absolutely my most favorite Ice cream flavor from them. Its just out right delish and if you have yet to try it, Id suggest doing so! No regrets if you love chocolate and cookie dough bites";;;
Half Baked
author: ess_102
text;;;: Favorite of all time. I love cookie dough and I love Brownie bites. I'm not a fan of just vanilla so the mix of chocolate helps balance everything out and I get my two favorite sweet treats in one!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: sierraskye13
text;;;: Always a good go to flavor! I mean who doesnt like cookie dough am I right?! Can never go wrong with this one! First flavor I ever tried of Ben and Jerrys and I always find myself going back to it;;;

name: Half Baked
author: rebeccagb80e
text;;;: If you like Ice cream this is definitely a flavor to try. Ben and Jerrys combinations cant be compared. Better than expected and I love that I can eat it out of the pint and claim it as only mine!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: meganr189
text;;;: AMAZING. Satisfied!!! When Im craving ice cream I go for this one as well. Its so delicious I can eat the whole container in one sitting Definitely recommend this ice cream and will repurchase it;;;

name: Half Baked
author: desiraek4
text;;;: This is the best ice cream it is my all time favorite! Chocolate and vanilla with fudge brownies and chocolate chip cookie dough! Delicious. I especially like that it has a mix of flavors. Amazing;;;

name: Half Baked,tejay,2020-02-02,5,,0,0,"Half baked is one of those Ben & Jerry signature flavors that is perfect yet simple. Vanilla and chocolate ice cream with chunks of cookie dough and my personal favorite, brownies. Its addicting.";;;
Half Baked
author: CroatianTaster
title: No brownies or chunks...
text;;;: I was so happy 2 hours ago when i purchased this...it looks so promising and i love all your other flavours...but when i opened it and started digging i was so disappoimted..no brownies or chunks;;;

name: Half Baked,sanzeria,2020-07-19,5,,0,0,"One of my favorite ice cream flavors. I haven't had it in a while but each time I do, it doesn't disappoint. This ice cream tastes good, is affordable & they sell it almost everywhere. Its great!";;;
Half Baked
author: theebombm
text;;;: The best ice cream. Hands down. Always has been a favorite of mine i just wish they offered larger sized containers. Even the price doesnt bother me because they are usually on salr where I shop.;;;

name: Half Baked,icecreamery,2018-05-14,5,SO YUMMY,0,0,"I ate a pint of this in one go. No regrets. I think this flavor is much better than Phish Food, which is another flavor of Ben and Jerry's. With both cookie dough and brownie, you can't go wrong.";;;
Half Baked
author: Nini1991
title: My best friend
text;;;: My taste buds have loved me ever since I've discovered this flavor! I can no longer eat the plain chocolate chip cookie dough ice creams thanks to this amazing flavor! Truly a girls best friend!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: amethystfay
text;;;: If I could give this 10 stars I would. This is my favorite Ben and Jerrys flavor. Honestly it does not compare to others. I am willing to try the fro-yo version of this and see how it compares.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: lechatn
text;;;: Two hippies from Vermont with a dream and a spoon create rich creamy loaded ice cream that helps save the world one pint at a time. What is not to love?;;;

name: Half Baked
author: avva
text;;;: I really like this! It's expensive but not as expensive as some others. I will say that I'm not as much of a fan of the brownie part of the ice cream. The cookie dough is the best part by far.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: TheWolfQueen
title: EVERY WEEK
text;;;: I love love loooove this flavor i wish this was lactose free! I cant have lactose but you can see me getting 2 of these a week! I was horrified to find my gas station stopped carring this! ;-;;

name: Half Baked,kathryns18,2020-07-28,5,,0,0,"I love the flavor and texture of Ben & Jerrys. Half Baked is my favorite, but I dont buy it often because it is very rich and a bit expensive. I would recommend if you want to treat yourself!";;;
Half Baked
author: noraflick
text;;;: One of the best flavors Ive tried from them. Creamy and delicious; highly recommend a try if youve never tried it before; unless youre not a fan of cookie dough then its probably not for you.;

name: Half Baked,meagand9d35,2020-07-15,5,,0,0,"I have this ice cream about once or twice a week because it is just that good. It has everything you could want or imagine in one run. Chocolate, fudge brownie, vanilla, cookie pieces. Yummm";;;
Half Baked
author: camillemalcom
title: I LOVE(D) THIS PINT
text;;;: I’ve been buying half baked for several years now and the past two days i had a pint with absolutely no chunks. just vanilla and chocolate ice cream )): what happened to the old half baked?;;;

name: Half Baked
author: Ange
title: Probably gained 15lbs
text;;;: This stuff is dangerous. Take one bite and you will end up eating the whole pint! Jeez the cookie dough and brownies are perfection mixed in vanilla and chocolate ice cream... I’m drooling.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: kellyk64
text;;;: Cant go wrong with any b&J flavor! A true classic. very creative and unique flavors you wont see elsewhere. Typically end up eating the whole pint in one sitting. High in calories and sugar;;;

name: Half Baked
author: gabbys59
text;;;: Oh my godddddd this ice is soooooo good!! It is so delicious. There are so many cunks of chocolate and peanut butter. It is one of the best ice creams I have ever had. You need to buy this!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: amandas0df3
text;;;: Favorite ice cream! It is the perfect combination of chocolate and vanilla ice cream. Mixed with brownie and cookie dough pieces! Pricey but worth the purchase! Great for indecisive people;;;

name: Half Baked
author: averik2
text;;;: All Ben and Jerrys ice creams are absolutely delicious. I love the company I love what they stand for and their headquarters in Vermont is such an awesome place. 10/10 all around for them.;;;

name: Half Baked,reemam1,2020-07-27,4,,0,0,"I though this was an interesting combination of flavors. The texture was really nice. For me, it was a bit on the sweeter side. Wouldnt buy occasionally but definitely when Im in the mood.";;;
Half Baked
author: katelyn_maria
text;;;: One of the best Ben and jerry icecream flavors. Every pint always has a great mixture of brownie and cookie dough bites. I try not to get this often because the pint is gone in one sitting;;;

name: Half Baked,ashleyrose93,2018-10-01,5,,0,0,"These little things are not cheap but they are so dang good! I love the big chunks of cookie dough and brownie batter, so satisfying! I try not to eat the whole thing in one sitting hahah";;;

Half Baked,abscog,2020-07-29,5,,0,0,"This is a delicious ice cream! It is my go to dessert, it is the perfect mix of chocolate and vanilla, with the chunks of cookie dough, it is so good! It is very creamy and a great size.";;;
Half Baked
author: tou tou
title: best ice cream
text;;;: I had this when I was in Paris but when I got back to the states I forgot about it. Fast forward to today my mom found it and bought me some and it’s just sooo good! I highly recommend!;;;

name: Half Baked,Applenoose,2017-07-02,5,Astonishingly Awesome,0,0,"Half baked is a fantastic contribution to mankind, and the universe in general. Grab a pint and settle in. Let it sit for a minute or so and then attack. Warning - can be habit forming.";;;
Half Baked
author: crystale426c
text;;;: This is the absolute best ice cream anyone could eat! Of course Im from Vermont so Im a little partial but it still does not take away from this amazing product and array of selections!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: goddessglowmo
text;;;: Half baked is one of my fav flavors. It's like heaven in your mouth and the cookie dough pieces just top it off right! I only gave it four stars because it is a bit on the pricey side.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: hwolf2389
text;;;: A mix of creamy chocolate and peanut butter ice cream which is delicious. Add in the peanut butter cookie dough and fudge brownie it is delicious. has a good mix in to ice cream ratio;;;

name: Half Baked
author: alishai1
text;;;: WOW! What a flavor! A perfect balance of cookie dough and brownie. For all my chocolate and vanilla lovers this is a great ice cream flavor![product:ben-&-jerrys-half-baked-ice-cream];;;

name: Half Baked
author: hannahnd486
text;;;: Just try it couple days ago. Delicious ice cream with both vanilla and chocolate mix well together. Very rich texture and will buy it again. Little bit pricey ice cream but worth it.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: shaylacoffman44
text;;;: This is the only Ben and Jerrys ice cream I eat. Its amazing. Just dont look at the calories and save it for a crappy night when you eat your feelings. It never disappoints I promise;;;

name: Half Baked
author: Alli86
title: The absolute best
text;;;: This is the best ice cream ever. My pints always have heaps of brownie and cookie dough in them and this is perfect for people who can’t choose between chocolate or vanilla. Love it!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: amandasfb9f
text;;;: This is my hands down favourite ice cream. It’s more expensive but totally worth it. I don’t eat ice cream often but when I am craving it this is my go to! Would recommend every time;;;

name: Half Baked
author: ennngeee
text;;;: My favorite Ben and Jerry's ice cream! It has a little bit of everything in it. Quite on the sweet side but it is so yummy. My favorite is the cookie dough bits and the brownie bits;;;

name: Half Baked
author: anyal1
text;;;: I think the price is a bit high and it obviously needs to be eaten in moderation because we can let it overtake the desert because its quite rich but once every six months is doable;;;

name: Half Baked
author: Goldriley
title: My weakness!!
text;;;: This is ultimately my personal favorite...and my friends know it!!! I just can't resist the delicious ice cream with the gobs of chocolate chip cookie dough and brownies mixed in!!;;;

name: Half Baked,indiap6002,2020-05-04,5,,0,0,"I am such a freaking fan of Ben and berries ice cream they are just so yummy Aarhus texture full. The flavors are just amazing! My personal favorites are brownie batter, half baked";;;
Half Baked
author: heatherp8eee
text;;;: Half Baked can definitely satisfy that rich ice cream craving. The combo of brownie and cookie dough is a win! Id give it 5 stars but usually its more expensive than I want to pay.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: justkaylaaa
text;;;: I get this ice cream all the time . The cookie dough and brownie chunks are so delicious. Every time I get this my daughter and I finish it so quickly . I would highly recommend.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: vmarine
text;;;: A delicious classic!! It has a little of all my favorites. Its one of my go to ice creams because I know it always hits the spot [product:ben-&-jerrys-ice-cream-half-baked-16oz];;;

name: Half Baked
author: chucktown1894
title: unique & delicious experience
text;;;: Such a great flavor of ice cream for those who enjoy soft & moist guilty pleasures! The chocolate & vanilla ice creams fuse together creating a perfectly sweet mixture. Amazing!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: destreeb
text;;;: Favorite ice cream! It has the best mixture of brownies and cookie dough but isnt too much. I look forward to this treat! Its a purchase I will make over and over and over! Yum!;;;

name: Half Baked,patriciaf29,2020-07-26,2,,0,0,"This ice cream is delicious! I have tried a lot of Ben & Jerrys ice creams and this is one of my@favorites. Cookie dough (yum!), chocolate chips, chocolate ice cream. Delicious!";;;

Half Baked,,2018-11-12,5,,0,0,"A guilty pleasure to say the least. This ice cream has brownies, cookie dough, chocolate and vanilla ice cream. Such a good combination for when you’re feeling something sweet.";;;
Half Baked
author: raybanna_xo
text;;;: This is actually one of my favorite icecreams. I love cookies and cream and I love brownie fudge and this is the perfect combination of the two. I would recommend this product!;;;

name: Half Baked,marleer3,2020-07-01,5,,0,0,"Ok Im sorry but this is the best ice cream known to man! If you like brownies or under baked cookies or anything like that at all, this is the kind of ice cream you should get";;;

Half Baked,juliawaslike,2020-06-23,5,,0,0,"This is a classic flavor and MY ALL TIME FAVORITE!!!! You cannot go wrong with this one. There is so much flavor, texture, and yumminess in half baked! I could eat it all day.";;;
Half Baked
author: elizabethm6
text;;;: Ben and Jerrys is my favorite ice cream. They have to many flavors- you cant go wrong- but half baked is definitely one of the best in my opinion. I will definitely buy again.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: mckenzif
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream of all time. I love having this as my after dinner snack. The ice cream is really smooth and the flavor is amazing. I love all of the bits in it.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: lazyolturnip
text;;;: Was OK. Meh. Just as good as competitors at 1/3 of the price. Wouldn’t buy again. If I’m going to indulge financially and calorie wise- I expect something more.. wow factorish;;;

name: Half Baked,bric5,2020-07-28,5,,0,0,"One of my favorite Ice creams. It is full of cookie dough and brownie chunks and you can buy it almost anywhere. However, I will say its a bit pricey compared to other brands.";;;
Half Baked
author: livh21
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream of all time. I constantly have it in my freezer and it is my go to desert. I love all Ben and Jerrys flavors but this one has to be my favorite.;;;

name: Half Baked,smasha3,2020-06-15,5,,0,0,"We stan a brand that fights for human rights, employs ex-convicts and pays them a fair wage. I will always pay extra for this brand, and their product is more than worth it.";;;
Half Baked
author: lisas245
text;;;: Sooooo yummy. Its the right blend of everything I like in one! I love that its not overly rich in sweetness and each bite has a little something you get from the ingredients;;;

name: Half Baked
author: farahpinklady
text;;;: Its my favorite ben & jerrys ice cream. Taste so chocolatey and delicious. I could finished a pint of the ice cream by myself. Very recommended to all the chocolate lovers.;;;

name: Half Baked,sarahf169,2020-07-30,5,,0,0,"By far the best ice cream Ive EVER had! It combines all my favorite flavors with chocolate, cookie dough, vanilla and brownie. Would recommend to anyone with a sweet tooth!";;;
Half Baked
author: catee3d1c
text;;;: every single flavor of Ben & Jerry's I have had has been so good. I love ice cream and they just go above and beyond to taste amazing. You definitely get what you pay for.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: saskiah5
text;;;: Had this during a breakup and I 10/10 recommend. You find actual fudge and cookie bits and its honestly the best heart mender and binge worthy ice cream you will ever meet;;;

name: Half Baked
author: meghana4
text;;;: I love Ben and Jerrys! And their half baked is sooooo good! This flavor has so much cookie dough and brownie pieces its so yummy! Highly recommend it! Also comes in froyo!;;;

name: Half Baked,abbye20,2020-07-30,5,,0,0,"This is my boyfriend and Is go to for movie night. We can pick it up at our local grocery store, and it has become a staple for our date night ins. delicious and creamy!!";;;
Half Baked
author: breanak3
text;;;: My favorite flavor! Love the soft brownies in this mix and cookie dough is always a good add in! Sadly I can never find it in my area anymore. Would definitely recommend!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: shanny_pans
text;;;: Half Baked is the best ice cream when you want to really indulge! The chocolate cookie dough and fudge brownie bits are so delicious and they stay soft in the ice cream.;;;

name: Half Baked,emilyb99,2020-07-29,5,,0,0,"So delicious. It's a classic flavor that many like. I don't buy it often because it is so fattening, but it's a great treat. Super sweet and actually loaded with chunks!";;;
Half Baked
author: chickenmom2019
title: My Favorite Ice Cream

name: Half Baked
author: brittneys3a01
text;;;: My favorite treat to indulge with love the Ben and Jerrys flavors and its so hard to pick which one I want every time but then end up going with the good old half backed;;;

name: Half Baked
author: deena_saurus
text;;;: I absolutely love this flavor and ben & jerrys will always have my business because they are a very professional and proactive company that gives back to their community;;;

name: Half Baked
author: jhoug21
text;;;: Great tasting ice cream that comes in a nice size container to make sure you dont over indulge. My only con is it is a bit pricey compared to some competitors pricing.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: samantham91d7
text;;;: this flavor is really good and i really want some right now. its one of my favorite flavors from them. also THEY SUPPORT BLACK LIFES MATTER GO BEN & JERRYS WE LOVE YOU;;;

name: Half Baked
author: Anni
title: Half Baked!
text;;;: Half Baked - for me the most delicious ice cream! Actually i don‘t like vanilla ice cream but this does not taste boring and the doughy brownie pieces are just hmmm...;;;

name: Half Baked
author: ninab101
text;;;: Five star flavor for a five star ice cream brand. I havent been able to find any other brand that can even come close to their flavors. Im definitely a repeat buyer.;;;

name: Half Baked,cayleym44df,2019-11-01,5,,0,0,"If you like chocolate chip cookie dough and brownie batter, you HAVE to try this! It is amazing and has giant globs of both all throughout. Seriously worth the price";;;

Half Baked,ellementalart,2020-07-29,5,,0,0,"If you like cookie dough, like a lot, you will love this! This has way more cookie dough than the average ice cream and its high quality and overall tastes amazing!";;;
Half Baked
author: kaitlynl1
text;;;: If you can’t pick between cookie dough or brownie this is the one you should get!! It’s a mixture between the both and what’s better than that?? Nothing. Go get it!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: calistag2
text;;;: Im not usually a huge ice cream person but I do love this kind. I dont like paying $5 for it but its worth it. Its a good mix and it can usually last me a few days.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: jazmink4

name: Half Baked
author: auroraj6
