name: Half Baked
author: NoelleWillowGracie
title: Best ice cream ever!
text;;;: This is my longtime favorite Ben & Jerry's ice cream. I have tried other flavors but none come close. The huge chunks of cookie dough and brownies are to die for!!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: amandaf23
text;;;: This is a classic and a staple in my freezer for those comfort food nights...which have been a bit more plentiful as of late with the state of the world right now.;;;

name: Half Baked
author: ice cream is awesome
title: THIS IS THE BEST ICE CREAM EVER!
text;;;: This ice cream puts all of the best flavors together. The brownies and the cookie dough blend so well. And you can't go wrong with vanilla and chocolate ice cream.;;;

name: Half Baked,sarahsweats,2020-07-31,5,,0,0,"If you want a full fat full calorie ice cream, dont reach for anything other than Ben & Jerrys! Nothing else compares to the creaminess and the variety of flavors!";;;

Half Baked,saraha317,2020-07-31,5,,0,0,"Love this ice cream!! Great size, as its not too big so I can try new flavors often rather than being stuck with a single flavor. However it is a little pricey :/";;;
Half Baked
author: maryjow1
text;;;: I love Ben and Jerry's I've cream. Very rich and creamy. The ingredients are so amazing. Some of the best chocolate ice cream ever. I have repurchased many times.;;;

name: Half Baked
text;;;: Honey where do I start. I LOVE half baked brownies and cookies just something about them being in ice-cream makes them even better. I would eat this all the time.;;;

name: Half Baked,ashleyn0230,2020-06-18,5,,0,0,"Its the best flavor hands down. I love the little chunks of cookie dough, and the texture of the brownie bites inside it. Its affordable and lasts me a good week.";;;
Half Baked
author: member467da1
text;;;: Perfect combination of Choco chips and chocolate flavor. The crunchiness of chips added some little taste in it. Mouth melting Experience. I love this ice cream.;;;

name: Half Baked,emilyhed58,2019-11-03,5,,0,0,"It is one of my favorite ice cream flavors. I am a big cookie dough fan. I find this ice cream to feed my craving of chocolate, cookies, and brownies all in one";;;
Half Baked
author: shannong63
text;;;: I mean this is just such a classic with such a delicious twist ben and Jerry's is still out here making boyfriends look bad everyday with their amazing icecream;;;

name: Half Baked,Anonna,2017-10-16,5,Favorite B&J icecream!,0,0,"If you like fudgy brownies and chunks of cookie dough, you'll love this ice cream! Always my go to flavor....I could kill a pint in one sitting with no regrets.";;;
Half Baked
author: bibileigh88
text;;;: This ice cream is a total classic at this point. Its delicious and the company is ethical and absolutely worth giving your money to. We love you Ben and Jerrys!;;;

name: Half Baked,alexisf55,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"A classic. This had been my go to forever and Im sure for many others. When not wanting to try a new flavor but wanting Ben and Jerrys, this is what I will buy.";;;
Half Baked
author: Willp147
title: The best!
text;;;: This is hands down by far my favorite Ben and Jerrys flavor. My only problem is I can never find it at Ben and Jerry shops. I need to try it with a fresh cone!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: Willp147
title: The best!
text;;;: This is hands down by far my favorite Ben and Jerrys flavor. My only problem is I can never find it at Ben and Jerry shops. I need to try it with a fresh cone!;;;

name: Half Baked
author: realdealsrichlandv

name: Half Baked,sarabelle1698,2020-07-30,5,,0,0,"Absolutely loveeee this ice cream! My go to favorite flavor. Its so creamy and you can really taste every individual flavor, very affordable highly recommended";;;

Half Baked,katied167,2020-07-23,5,,0,0,"These ice creams are delicious. The flavors mesh well. They are made with all natural ingredients. However they are just a little bit pricey but, are so good!";;;

name: Half Baked,Orri,2018-10-25,4,My favourite flavour,0,0,"I buy this all the time, it is my favourite ice cream ever. I got some today and there were no cookie dough chunks and it made me so sad I ate the whole pint.";;;
Half Baked
author: shawnaeg

name: Half Baked,adamaryc1,2019-10-11,5,,0,0,"I love it, it is one of my favorite ice creams you can make several desserts with this ice cream, I love to share it with my family, it has a delicious flavor";;;

Half Baked,nataliam6ed6,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"Its one of my favorites, because its I like it so much, I dont even give a chance to other flavors. I just dont like it as much as tres leches of Haagen dazs.";;;

author: Ayoo
title: WOULD SELL MY SOUL FOR HALF BAKED
text;;;: Favorite for years only recently topped by The Tonight Dough because it's Half Baked on steroids. Ben and Jerry are the two most dependable men in my life :O;;;

name: Half Baked,Chunny,2019-02-05,5,The BEST,0,0,"I buy this flavor of Ben & Jerry's all the time. It's a hit with everyone in my family, as well as with my friends, and is probably their best flavor. Ever.";;;
Half Baked
author: meghanf1
text;;;: This is my favourite of all the flavors. Love the mix of chewy brownie and huge chunks of cookie dough. Nice mix of vanilla and chocolate ice cream as well.;;;

name: Half Baked

name: Half Baked

name: Half Baked
author: kaylar12

name: Half Baked,butterfly67,2019-08-19,5,Love the Chunks,0,0,"A friend recommended it and I’m obsessed with it. Just the right amount of chocolate and vanilla ice cream with the chunks of brownies, ughh to die for :).";;;

name: Half Baked
author: lexikate24

name: Half Baked
author: raeecrawwford

name: Half Baked

name: Half Baked

name: Half Baked
author: stepht18

name: Half Baked,abbydayss,2020-07-10,5,,0,0,"this is one of my favorite ice creams, all of the ben & jerrys flavors are so so well done! the cookie dough, brownie dough and ice cream tastes amazing!";;;

Half Baked,blissfulbrunette,2020-07-29,5,,0,0,"Literally my number one favorite ice cream! Super delicious, and unfortunately super addicting. I definitely recommend for anyone that has a sweet tooth!";;;
Half Baked,,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"THIS IS HANDS DOW MY FAVORITE ICE CREAM FLAVOR. It is soooo good, so creamy, so fresh. It want and need bigger sizes of it. Its the perfect sweet amount.";;;

Half Baked,Seb10,2020-03-28,5,Better than the sum of its parts,0,0,"Chocolate chip cookie dough. Chocolate fudge brownie. Individually, two very mediocre flavors. But together... they are so much more. 1+1 does equals 3!";;;
Half Baked,kschwindt,2020-06-29,5,,0,0,"Chocolate and brownie, vanilla and cookie dough. You get the best of both worlds in this ice cream treat. This classic flavor is always one of my go tos";;;
Half Baked
text;;;: This is one of the best flavors hands down and probably one of my only favorite flavor. All of the other flavors are decent but this one is DELICIOUS!!!;;;

name: Half Baked,lenaporterr,2020-07-29,5,,0,0,"This is my favorite Ben and Jerrys ice cream flavor. I love chocolate brownie ice cream and cookie dough ice cream, so the fact its combined is amazing!";;;

author: rnagatori

name: Half Baked
author: doveb2da3
text;;;: Ben and Jerrys is a great ice cream brand . I like how they have dairy and non dairy options so many tasty flavors to choose from would highly recommend;;;

name: Half Baked,cmellion,2018-10-02,5,,0,0,"Amazing! Not too glad to admit, but have had this many, many times and not planning on switching any time soon! Will forever be a staple in my freezer.";;;
Half Baked
author: saracf8cb
text;;;: This is the best Ben & Jerrys out there. This has the perfect balance of cookie dough chucks and chewy brownie bites. Never a dull bite in this pint.;;;

name: Half Baked,marcyw8164,2020-07-29,5,,0,0,"Who doesnt like Ben and Jerrys ice cream?! Its amazing, thick and creamy. All the flavors are to die for and hit the spot perfect for an evening treat.";;;

author: christinaeb882

name: Half Baked

name: Half Baked

name: Half Baked
author: kristinhf7b8

name: Half Baked
author: thayas69a8

name: Half Baked
author: deanna21

name: Half Baked

title: Best flavor ever!

name: Half Baked
author: _extraaf_

name: Half Baked,christyc50,2020-07-24,4,,0,0,"One of my favorites! Half baked includes some semi-cookie dough, incorporating the taste but allowing a softer consistency not found in other brands!";;;
Half Baked

name: Half Baked,Jmkbbae,2019-12-09,5,Nothing better !,0,0,"For a decade, half baked Ben and Jerry’s has been my pick. Perfect portions of vanilla, chocolate, brownie and cookie dough. An absolute dream cream";;;

name: Half Baked

name: Half Baked,alyssalovevaz,2020-07-13,5,,0,0,"Such an incredible combination!! Half cookie, half brownie and the rest ice cream? Omg delicious! Thats one of my top favorites!! Totally recommend!";;;

author: arpitaptl

name: Half Baked,deannaa15,2020-06-20,3,,0,0,"This is always a classic in our house, I love it but theres something about the peanut butter version that just tastes better and has more filling.";;;
Half Baked
text;;;: My absolute number one choice of icecream! My friend recommended me this and Im so glad I picked it up. Its so yummy. A must try if you havent yet!;;;

Half Baked,caseycyap,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"This is my favorite Ben & Jerrys flavor! Perfect for a movie night and so delicious. I dont usually buy Ben & Jerrys but when I do, its half baked!";;;

author: jtwb768

name: Half Baked,candicem2,2020-07-31,5,,0,0,"This is my all time favorite ice cream! Seriously the absolute best. Contains brownies, cookie dough, chocolate ice cream, and vanilla. Must try!";;;

name: Half Baked,,2020-07-26,3,,0,0,"Packed with great flavor, but I prefer more of a focus on the ice cream and less on the mix-ins. This is a little too heavy on the extras for me.";;;

name: Half Baked,Nickname,2017-05-01,5,The only icecream i eat,0,0,"I only eat half baked, this is the best icecream i have ever had. chocolate, vanilla, brownies and cookiedough - Could it get any better? No.";;;

name: Ice Cream Sammie,CameronT,2019-08-06,5,Cookies and Cream 2.0,20,0,"Ben & Jerry's has reinvented my favorite basic ice cream flavor, Cookies and Cream. This should just replace all Cookies and Cream flavors everywhere and be the new standard for what is Cookies and Cream. Finally, someone actually put enough cookies in the ice cream. Usually, Cookies and Cream tastes like vanilla ice cream with the ocasional taste of cookie. This seems to be the other way around and I love it. Big cookie pieces! I hope this flavor never goes away.";;;

Ice Cream Sammie,SnackinMom87,2019-07-06,5,Omgggg,11,2,"Attn:: So my 6 year old saw this flavor and asked me to buy it, i did. He eats the carton within 2 days saying it was the best he ever tasted, super rare for him to devour ice cream that fast.. Beggs for another carton, I carry on and I go buy another carton for him. Later on my hubby is making a cup for my son and he randomly tasted it. Came to me like babe thats the best cookie and cream ice cream i ever had, ranting and raving... So me going to being nosey in the middle of the night i secures a cup. WHOOOOAAAAA! Blown away with its deliciousness. Needless to say i have to go to the store tomorrow to replace my sons carton LOL. We are all addicted. BNJ PUHHHHLEEEEASEEEE DO NOT GET RID OF THIS FLAVOR! I see those limited edition wrappings! Please don't do it. LOL. Sincerely The Late Night Snackin Mom";;;

Ice Cream Sammie,Icecreamfan4life,2019-05-09,5,YAY for B&J making a cookies and cream flavor!!!,3,0,"I picked this up with the Red, White and blueberry shortbread and the The Sweet like sugar new flavor as well a few days ago. And have to say that I was not disappointed at all. I know this is more of a tamer flavor for the company. But I can't help but feel that is what makes this flavor the best. Because there are so many cookies and cream variations out there, that don't always taste the best. And this one definitely does not disappoint with this shopper. Keep it up.";;;

Ice Cream Sammie,Demi252,2019-07-05,5,OMG OMG OMG,3,0,"So another brand use to have Ice Cream Sandwich ice cream but they stopped selling it and all this year I have been searching. Alas, here comes B&J to save the day. I absolutely love and have bought like 3 -4 cartons of it since it's come out. Cookies and Cream but amplified!! If you guys bring out Superman ice cream I know that B&J pays attention to their customer base!!";;;

name: Ice Cream Sammie
author: Storm660
title: I’m in love
text;;;: I am a cookies and cream connoisseur when it comes to ice cream. This by far what is the best cookies and cream I’ve ever had. The right amount of cookies and vanilla and goodness wrapped into one beautiful pint! Please please please do not stop making this and please have it at more stores because I can only get it at one.;;;

name: Ice Cream Sammie,Candice,2019-06-06,5,My life is complete!,3,0,"I have been waiting for YEARS for Ben and Jerry's to come out with this flavor! It's so amazing! Just letting you know, if you get rid of this flavor after completing said life, I will never buy your ice cream again! Lol";;;

author: Drogers2698

name: Ice Cream Sammie
author: Chicksluvrock
title: Whooooa boy
text;;;: I can’t even begin to describe to you how good this is. Forget about all other cookies and cream ice creams. You don’t need other ones anymore. THIS is everything cookies and cream should be. It’s so riddled with cookie crumbs and big cookie chunks it’s a cookie dream come true. You won’t be disappointed with this one! Excellent job Ben & Jerry’s! Never stop making this!;;;

name: Ice Cream Sammie
author: Vivicart
title: Best cookies and cream icecream ever!
text;;;: I have been looking for this flavor ever since I heard of its release. I’m a lover of all things cookies and cream and this icecream didn’t disappoint. I hope that this becomes a permanent flavor because it is now my favorite flavor. The flavors are intense and the cookie flavor is so yummy. Please please don’t take this flavor away. The is only one store in my area that carries it so I buy it in threes with no shame. Sooooo freaking good!;;;

name: Ice Cream Sammie
author: Tb1214
title: Way better than expected!
text;;;: I picked this up last week at Walmart and I’m glad I did. The best cookies and cream ice cream I’ve ever had. For some reason I wasn’t expecting as good as it was and it blew me away. Hopefully this one never goes away! Definitely pick it up if you’re at a Wal-Mart;;;

name: Ice Cream Sammie
author: Bsaucier
title: Simply amazing!!
text;;;: My husband and I could eat this by the gallon if it were available. We can’t even share a pint and always have to buy one each. I can only hope that this flavor becomes widespread and never leaves the line up! We are addicted! :);;;

title: Amazing!!! Hope it stays forever!!!
text;;;: Saw a new product and it was somewhat similar to sweet cream and cookies which i needed to try. It was amazing!!!!!!;;;

name: Ice Cream Sammie
author: April173
title: Love it
text;;;: I can't get enough of this ice cream I buy one every time I got to the store and the name has a bit of meaning to me;;;

name: Ice Cream Sammie
author: Jen7
title: So good!!
text;;;: Way to go Ben & Jerry’s!! This is the best cookies & cream ice cream!!! Please make it a regular flavor!!;;;

name: Ice Cream Sammie
author: Anc323
title: Amazing!
text;;;: Best cookies and cream ice cream I’ve ever had. I hope they make a non-dairy version;;;

name: Ice Cream Sammie,CookieswirlFORLIFE,2019-11-11,5,OMG. YES.,0,0,"I loved the old Vermonty Python ice cream by Ben + Jerry because of the delicious cookie swirl but then they discontinued it. THEN, I liked milk and cookies only for the cookie swirl and would eat around the ice cream just looking for the swirls as the rest was too sweet. NOW this has CHANGED MY ICE CREAM LIFE! Cookie ice cream with cookie swirls, holy moly I am so excited about this. Best B+J ice cream YET. Please keep this one forever!";;;
Ice Cream Sammie,Mrbeast6000,2019-04-29,4,Pretty good,4,6,"This ice cream was pretty good, had a nice combo of flavor and a good balance of chocolate.";;;

Ice Cream Sammie,rwright6,2020-06-15,5,Best Flavor,0,0,"I’m in love with this ice cream. Ben & Jerry’s is the only ice cream brand that I eat, so I’ve been slowly trying my hand at different flavors. The Tonight Dough, Americone Dream, and Half Baked used to be in a tie for my favorite until I had this. It’s like your classic cookies and cream but BETTER. And I love ice cream sandwiches so that, to me, is the best part. It’s so delicious!";;;
Ice Cream Sammie
author: Savanna
title: Best cookies and cream!!!
text;;;: This is legit the best cookies and cream ice cream. Probably one of the best pints of ice cream out there.;;;

name: Ice Cream Sammie,SOT24,2019-10-02,5,Best ice cream I’ve ever had,0,0,"I’ve never written a review before, but I had to after eating this. It combines my two favorite things in the world (ice cream sandwiches and sandwich cookies) and jam packs them into a perfect pint. Every spoon has so much of both so you’re never left digging around to get more cookie. PLEASE never stop making this flavor!!";;;

Ice Cream Sammie,Raebirds,2020-07-06,5,New Fav...,0,0,"Ben & Jerry’s continues to be my emotional support during this crazy pandemic. This flavor is 1 of 7 pints purchased. I can’t wait to try the other 3 new flavors. Thanks B&J! Also, love this companies stance fondness for equality and justice for all.";;;
Ice Cream Sammie
author: JamesT
title: So many cookies
text;;;: Best cookies and cream ice cream I’ve had. Does it tastes like a classic ice cream sandwich? Maybe a little/not really? It really doesn’t matter to me. 5/5;;;

name: Ice Cream Sammie
author: Hopperstall
title: Best cookies and cream ever
text;;;: Eating this i never thought of an ice cream sandwich but i did feel i was eating the best cookies and cream ever!!!;;;

name: Ice Cream Sammie,bananni,2020-01-31,5,Best “cookies n cream” ever!,0,0,"If you’re a cookies n cream lover, this pint is for you! This is your “life” ice cream! Love this flavor!";;;
Ice Cream Sammie
author: Sweetheart 37
title: They did it right!
text;;;: I saw this at my local Walmart and had to try it. Very good Ben&Jerry!! This is my new fave!;;;

name: Ice Cream Sammie
author: StrawberryAudrey
title: My new favorite
text;;;: I love cookies and cream and this is even better! Yum!;;;

name: Ice Cream Sammie
author: Brusso989
title: Great tasting love everything about it
text;;;: I have bought it twice and I’m happy I’m buying it;;;

name: Milk & Cookies,clouds513,2019-07-31,5,"The best flavor, anyone can fight me on this.",105,0,"I've been buying Milk & Cookies for i don't even know how long. I have to drive 30 minutes total just to go get it because none of my local stores have it. It's officially ruined all other cookies & cream flavored ice creams for me, nothing can top it. I mean, it't got TWO kinds of cookies in it. What??? Man that's a lot of cookie. And you know, every time I buy a pint, I always think ""man, is this $4-something-or-other worth it for just one pint?"" and every time I get a different brand's cookies and cream flavor I always get my answer. It's absolutely worth it. This will be served at my wedding, and most certainly at my funeral. If anyone comes up to me and tries to convince me there's a better flavor out there, they can expect nothing less than a full on war.";;;

Milk & Cookies,Squilly,2020-01-23,5,The G.O.A.T,10,1,"I recently came across the Milk&Cookies flavor at my local convenient store and...WOW! If Oreo, Chips Ahoy, Tate's, Milano, and Nutella came together to make the best flavor of ice cream ever, it would not even come close to Milk&Cookies. The only problem is that I am becoming addicted and it is starting to affect my social life. Although my girlfriend dumped me and my friends no longer want to spend time with me, I will never stop eating Milk&Cookies Ice Cream. I am willing to take out a mortgage in order to purchase Milk&Cookie Ice Cream in larger quantities. Thank you Ben. Thank you Jerry.";;;

Milk & Cookies,Phish Food Fan,2019-02-26,5,One yummy flavor,6,0,"This is just what I was hoping for tonight. I love Ben and Jerry’s chocolatey, caramely, marshmallowy gooie flavors the most but tonight I wanted something different. I wanted exactly what Milk and Cookies delivered;" a delicious vanilla ice cream with cookie swirls. No fudge chunks or nuts or oozey mix ins this time (even though that’s my favorite). Just a perfect ‘dry’ blend of cookie swirls and excellent vanilla ice cream. I will get this one every time I need a break from the Phish Food
author: Karamel Sutra and peanut butter fudge cores of the world. Awesome flavor!""";;

name: Milk & Cookies,Rocko13,2017-05-08,4,THE BEST - Just needs to be in more stores,9,0,"I was going to give it 5-stars, because it's BY FAR the best ice cream flavor that I've ever tasted! However, Milk & Cookies isn't available in a lot of stores, so it's definitely a challenge to find sometimes. Our local Whole Foods is really the only place that carries it. But, if you can find it, TRY IT! You won't be disappointed!";;;

Milk & Cookies,layla,2017-06-19,5,LOVE!,12,1,"I've been buying Ben & Jerry's for ages now, but I've never really been consistent with a certain flavor. I've always kept buying new ones to try. I'm on vacation in Florida, and found the Milk & Cookies one in the local grocery store and HAD to try it. Needless to say, we went back and grabbed 3 more the next day!";;;
Milk & Cookies
author: Brighton
title: The best flavor!
text;;;: I tried this flavor once because they were out of my past fav- Cookie Dough. This one is a million times better! The cookies are amazing. The ice cream is amazing. Everything together is awesome. Thank you Ben and Jerry's for an awesome flavor. I could eat 20 pints of this.;;;

name: Milk & Cookies,Chelle8,2020-06-01,5,THE BEST. EVERRR.,2,1,"I am the lady who will buy up the whole store if I see cookies & milk B&J ice cream on the shelf. I ate 2 pints in one day once! It all started, they were out of cookie dough (my old favorite) so decided to try the next best cookie thing on the shelf. Boy was I GLAD I did. It became my new favorite INSTANTLY. It’s so good though I have to really warm folks that you may NEVER want another flavor again. That’s what’s happened to me going on 3 years now since discovering it. My only problem with it is I’m mad I didn’t find out about it sooner!! I LOVE EVERY BUT ABOUT! 100 thumbs up!!! MMMMMM";;;
Milk & Cookies
author: Sfnelly420
title: Great combination!
text;;;: LOVE THIS ICE CREAM! Its the perfect combination.!! Thank you Ben & Jerrys;;;

name: Milk & Cookies,liv1,2020-02-28,5,The absolute best Ben & Jerry's flavor,2,0,"Every time I get ice cream this is the flavor I reach for, some people think it's a boring flavor but that is in no way accurate. It combines my favorite flavors, cookie dough and cookie's & cream creating the ultimate ice cream. With no overpowering crazy flavors, it took classic flavors and made them better. Ice cream will truly never taste the same - big shoutout to both Ben and Jerry for this one. (also it's a great post-run dessert)";;;

Milk & Cookies,juliew99,2018-02-18,5,New Favorite,2,0,"I had always been strictly Half Baked or Americone Dream, until I tried Milk & Cookies when all others were sold out. Needless to say I found a new reigning favorite. Nothing can compare to the gooey-ness of the cookie swirls - NOTHING. I fell very strongly about this ice cream flavor and I will defend its title as the best Ben & Jerry’s flavor.";;;

Milk & Cookies,,2018-02-21,5,My favorite,2,0,"I’m not the type of person to sit and eat a bowl of ice cream but with this flavor I can eat a whole pint, it the best ice cream flavor I have ever had, my boyfriend and I have to drive 30 min away just to buy it because no local stores carry it.. My boyfriend is an ice cream lover and he even says this is the best ice cream ever.";;;
Milk & Cookies
author: klok
title: #1 best flavor
text;;;: I ordered an unspecified pint of Ben & Jerry's from the deli and my delivery guy gave me this gem. I fell in love. It was fate <3;;;

name: Milk & Cookies,FuzzyGut,2018-09-23,3,Pretty good pint,3,8,"I love Ben and Jerry’s and I have for a LONG time. Over the last several months, I’ve decided to spoon my way through every flavor I can get in my area or online and last night was Milk and Cookies. It was definitely yummy but not my favorite. The cookie swirls were GREAT! The vanilla ice cream was for some reason not my favorite. I think a chocolate milk and cookies would be better. And I love Ben and Jerry’s vanilla a lot. All in all, this was a good pint but I like a lot of other flavors more.";;;

Milk & Cookies,jasmineg853,2019-06-20,5,"If you love cookies, you'll LOVE THIS!",1,0,"My husband and I have a pint B&Js probably every 3 days. This one is such a hit! We love Half Baked but this one is like a soft cookie sundae. My favorite is getting those little chocolate chips in the mix, it just adds another layer of something already fantastic. It would be dope if there were full sized mini chocolate chips instead of the micro ones. Either way, great flippin' ice cream!";;;

Milk & Cookies,Haley g,2019-11-06,5,My one true love,1,0,"I have a deep and intense love for this ice cream. If I could marry it, I would. B&Js best ice cream flavor by a long shot, and they never skimp on the fix ins. All my friends write it off as just a regular cookies and cream ice cream but NO! This is so much more than that. I would like to be buried in a coffin shaped like a B&Js pint of Milk & Cookies ice cream. That is all.";;;

Milk & Cookies,Icrissyc,2018-04-27,5,Give it a try !,1,0,"I found myself wanting ice cream one day and I found this flavor in one of my local stores. I thought it would be strange with 2 different cookies , boy was I wrong ! Definetly one of my favorites of not my top favorite. Besides who's not in the mood for milk and cookies !?! You'd just be crazy if you said you weren't. HIGHLY suggest this flavor you will not regret it !";;;

Milk & Cookies,groovy,2018-09-29,5,CREAM de la creme!,1,0,"I have been getting milk & cookies for years now and when I run out, I HAVE to restock. I don’t normally even have a sweet tooth, but there’s just something about the texture and taste of the cookies mixed with this ice cream! Milk & Cookies is my all time favorite ice cream and I always make my friends try it. You should too!";;;

Milk & Cookies,Stephanie A,2017-05-14,5,Recipe Suggestion,2,1,"This is literally the best ice cream flavor I have ever had! I'm actually eating it as I write this review. I just have one suggestion for the recipe...ADD MORE CHOCOLATE CHIP COOKIES!!!! This is a 10/10 ice cream flavor, but it would be a 20/10 if there were more chocolate chip cookie chunks in it!";;;

Milk & Cookies,ChrisColby,2018-07-25,4,Cookies. Cookies everywhere.,2,2,"Quite possibly the most accurate name for an ice cream flavor. Tastes exactly like cookies dipped in milk. The vanilla base is appropriately subtle enough to let the cookies shine, while adding the creaminess when melting. If there is one flaw, it's in the chocolate chocolate chip cookies which strangely taste a bit fruity. But that might just be me. Great flavor regardless.";;;

Milk & Cookies,Tanabear,2019-03-24,5,Cookie chunks!,1,0,"This is my favorite flavor. I get it anytime I am able! I love the swirls of cookie and the huge chunks of cookie that you get mixed in. I don't like cookie dough in ice-cream, so this works superbly. I love that it includes both chocolate cookies and chocolate chip cookies.";;;
Milk & Cookies
author: shanelee266
title: This cookie swirl is a game changer
text;;;: My favorite flavor changes every year or so. Milk & Cookies is this years. What's the point of buying boring cookie dough flavor when this is available? The cookie swirl works so well and is such a great addition to the TWO kinds of cookie dough in this delicious blend.;;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: Andreadiana
title: A nod to your childhood
text;;;: I picked up my first pint of Milk & Cookies a few years ago during a particularly hard time in my life. It was like a soothing balm during my emotional crisis. Could it be because it brings back a sense memory of better childhood times? Possibly. Or could it be because it is so darn tasty. I'm going with the latter. I have to really search my local stores for it and in the rare moments when they do have this flavor I buy multiple pints at once and look like a crazy woman. Thanks B&J. Thank you.;;;

name: Milk & Cookies,PhoenixRises,2019-09-03,5,I just found this gem!,0,0,"Recently I went to a store that didn't have any of my usual favorites, so I grabbed this one just to see what it was like. I know I love cookies, and cookie sundaes so I would probably like it. I'm not a fan of cookie dough ice cream (I like it plain, but not in my ice cream), so I was glad it was regular cookie pieces. It was amazing! I love the chocolate cookie swirls and the chocolate chip cookie pieces. It's only sold at certain stores, so that's the only downside, but it's a new favorite.";;;

Milk & Cookies,Freethebrowniebits,2018-05-02,5,"Delicious, so good! Mmm!",2,1,"I bought this for the first time the other day and boy was I in for it. I used to get the fudge brownie but they were always skimpin on the brownie bits. And now here I am, writing a review about ice cream!!!!!";;;
Milk & Cookies
author: Draper
title: Five star flavor profile!
text;;;: Milk & Cookies is in my top five of favorites from Ben & Jerry’s. The marrying of high quality vanilla ice cream and three types of cookies is a delectable treat sure to satisfy anyone’s sweet tooth.;;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: Zach21
title: Best flavor ever
text;;;: Milk & Cookies is the best ice cream flavor you will ever buy. I could eat pints and pints of this. You HAVE to try it! HIGHLY recommend!!!;;;

name: Milk & Cookies,Alaecia12,2017-10-25,5,Life altering!,1,0,"The Tonight Dough was previously my favorite, but Milk and Cookies tops the charts! I could eat a scoop or two every day!";;;
Milk & Cookies
author: Bellaandjerrys
title: Classic and delicious
text;;;: This ice cream is one of my favorite bnj flavors. I would describe it as a mix of cookie dough and cookies and cream.;;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: Shannon H
title: How do I give this more than 5 stars?
text;;;: I once drove almost two hours for a pint of milk and cookies because the grocery store was out of it. Enough said.;;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: ChilliedLaura
title: The Wife's Favorite
text;;;: This is one my wife just cannot pass up! Thank you Ben & Jerry for this wonderful get out of jail free card.;;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: kayli
title: My addiction.
text;;;: BEST ice cream in the universe. Never buying anything else.;;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: Vsalas2
title: Cookies cookies cookies
text;;;: I’m a happy huge cookie fan so this ice cream is amazing!;;;

name: Milk & Cookies,Kuhree,2018-12-31,5,My absolute favorite !!!!,0,0,"I remember the first time I bought Milk and Cookies on a whim, and I consumed that first pint within minutes.";;;

Milk & Cookies,Kristy,2017-07-28,5,Milk & cookies yummmmmyyyy,0,0,"I buy this flavor every time I go to the store but it was sold out for almost a month I legit went everyday to see if they had gotten milk & cookies and I left with a sad face. I even went to another store, and guess what?? They didn't have it either I went to 3 other stores and nope nope and nope but finally the other day boom they had it ugh I'm enjoying some now as I write ugh I'm in love..... the best";;;
Milk & Cookies
author: bec99
title: best combo!!
text;;;: Ever since I found this flavor it is the only flavor I will buy. It is the perfect combination of different cookies and only has vanilla ice cream which is different from most flavors and that is a big pro in my eyes. Hands down the best Ben & Jerry’s flavor ever and even though it’s hard for me to find sometimes it is always worth it! Definitely worth straying from your go-to flavor to try this one out!;;;

name: Milk & Cookies,Mymy,2017-06-02,5,Favorite Flavor of all Time,0,0,"This is my absolute favorite flavor of ice cream. Taking the spot from the former champion, green mint chocolate chip, this is the best ice cream I have ever put in my mouth. When I ended a long term relationship and was feeling a bit down, my roommate and her boyfriend went to 6 stores to fine one of these to bring to me. It was the b st cure for a broken heart I ever had.";;;
Milk & Cookies
author: mpg1904
title: Lacking chocolate cookie swirl
text;;;: I’ve had this flavor before and it was delicious but recently I purchased it again and it wasn’t great. My favorite part of this ice cream is the chocolate cookie swirl and unfortunately there was barely any in this pint! The cookie swirl was only in about a quarter of the pint and the rest was the vanilla ice cream with barely any cookie pieces! Very disappointing;;;

name: Milk & Cookies,Lboogie,2019-07-15,2,Usually the best Ben & Jerry’s getting cheap!,1,3,"I have always loved milk and cookies and buy it ALL the time. Recently I have noticed a dramatic decrease in the amount of cookie in the container, it’s mostly just plain vanilla icecream. Very disappointed.. for the top of the line ice cream at almost $6 a pint this is unacceptable.";;;

Milk & Cookies,icecreamfan10,2020-09-05,5,Best Flavor!,0,0,"Eating a pint of this ice cream is more satisfying than having actual milk and cookies. This is the best flavor, and yes this is the hill I've chosen to die on. The ice cream is loaded with delicious cookies and chocolate swirls. The milky flavor penetrates the cookies themselves. I hope this flavor is never discontinued because I'd be beyond upset.";;;

Milk & Cookies,atik,2017-11-16,5,Cookies n Cream 2.0,0,0,"Cookies n cream is an old time favorite for a lot of people me included, and it's not easy to make a simple, old time favorite even better, but Ben and Jerry's managed to do just that. They don't skimp on the cookie mix ins, and I haven't seen any other cookies n cream ice cream like this one. This is one of my top three flavors.";;;

Milk & Cookies,DC24,2018-09-04,5,What Cookies and Cream Should Be.,0,0,"I love this flavor! It is what cookies and cream should taste like, but seldom does. It is grounded in Ben & Jerry's awesome vanilla with just the right amount of intense chocolate cookie flavor. Honestly, it is hard to describe why this ice cream is so delicious. It just Is! This flavor surpassed my expectations.";;;
Milk & Cookies
author: SamIAm
title: The best ice cream you will ever eat
text;;;: When I tried this ice cream fro the first time my life changed. No flavor can ever live up to it. I feel like a kid again when I eat this ice cream. It seems to not be stocked at most places which is so frustrating and the only downside to this flavor. Try this asap and you'llnever go back to any other flavor.;;;

name: Milk & Cookies,Neanea500,2017-12-19,5,New Favorite Ice Cream,0,0,"I used to eat Half Baked, but the grocery store I was at was out....So I picked this up. This is the best Ice Cream I have ever had!!!! I est cookies and ice cream often because it is my favorite dessert but this is just amazing!!! Now my dad loves it. Too bad they dont sell it at any of the walmarts near me.";;;

Milk & Cookies,,2017-12-02,5,Holy deliciousness!!,0,0,"The only reasoning I have to be disappointed is the fact that I didn't try this flavor sooner!! It is chocked full of cookie bits and has become my new favorite. I can only hope they make this vegan by the time I transition back or I'll be pining for it. For now, I'll be enjoying whenever possible.";;;

Milk & Cookies,Bridgespo99997,2017-11-05,4,Could be amazing!,1,3,"Tastes exactly like cookies and milk! Really good. I wish the cookies were a bit more like cookie dough, but overall it's a very good flavor.";;;
Milk & Cookies
author: jennyr
title: Disappointed
text;;;: I decided to pick this ice cream flavor for my first time trying Ben and Jerry's because of all the good reviews associated with it but I was extremely disappointed. The flavor was too bland for my taste. I don't think I will be buying this again in the near future.;;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: Mclopez
title: Never eating another flavor again!!
text;;;: I usually do half baked but decided to try Milk & Cookies a try. It is DEFINITELY a game changer - I'm never buying anything else. I've been talking about it nonstop at work and to my friends. I gave one of my friends some to try and they were obsessed too!;;;

name: Milk & Cookies,Josh from VT,2017-07-26,4,"Good ice cream, but big hole",0,1,"The ice cream and cookie chunks were fantastic, but there was a big air socket in the bottom of my pint which resulted in ~30% of the ice cream being left missing. Great ice cream otherwise, but will have to subtract a star for the missing ice cream :(";;;

Milk & Cookies,anjenkins,2020-04-29,5,Everything I Want in a Pint,0,0,"This is hands down my favorite flavor. It has the perfect balance of vanilla and chocolate, the perfect texture balance between soft cookie dough & crunchy chocolate chips. This is my go to after a long week and will forever be my first choice.";;;

Milk & Cookies,DaveO,2018-04-10,5,Hands Down the Best Flavor of Ben and Jerry's,0,0,"I cannot get enough of this ice cream flavor! Between the ""Oreo"" and chocolate chip cookie each bite is delicious. I go through at least one a week and am fortunate the corner store stocks this flavor. I hope they never get rid of this!";;;

Milk & Cookies,JoangleBook,2017-07-30,5,Never Stop Making This Flavor,0,0,"I've recommended this flavor to several of my friends now, and they've all become obsessed with it. You should make a dairy free version of this flavor, because everyone needs to be able to enjoy this Mona Lisa of the frozen dessert world.";;;
Milk & Cookies
author: Missy6
title: Perfection in a pint!
text;;;: Obsessed! This is the perfect blend of ingredients in 1 pint! Perfect chocolate cookie w vanilla ice cream and fudge swirls! Perfect balance! Always sells out at my grocery local grocery stores! Please never stop making this!!!;;;

name: Milk & Cookies,Leems123,2017-05-31,5,Amazing flavor!,0,0,"This is one of my favorite ben and jerry's flavor ever! The cookies just melt in my mouth and it takes me back to my childhood of when I dipped my cookies in milk. Hands down, one of the best flavors ever. I love it so much!!!";;;

Milk & Cookies,Kidaboo94,2019-07-10,5,The best thing I've ever tasted!,0,0,"Seriously, it's THAT good. Just a perfect swirl or crunchy chocolatey cookie ribbon, chocolate chip cookies, and vanilla ice cream. I eat pints several days in a row. I absolutely LOVE this ice cream. It is my #1 fave ever!";;;
Milk & Cookies
author: bean12345678910
title: I LOVE THIS WITH MY WHOLE HEART
text;;;: this is my favorite ice cream flavor. Me and my bff sam Stan mink and cookies. We highly recommend for anything from a brake ups to celebrating amazing achievements to just treating yourself. MILK AND COOKIES IS THE BOMB!!!;;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: bananni
title: Best Current Flavor!!
text;;;: Milk and Cookies is by far my favorite flavor B & J have out right now. (My all time faves are retired :(...) It brings the best of cookies&cream and choc chip cookie dough into one fabulous pint. Go find one now!!;;;

name: Milk & Cookies,Joey,2017-04-26,5,Best Ben & Jerry's flavor,0,0,"This flavor is so good, I have the worst guilt every time I eat it. If there's a way to get a lifetime supply of it, I am highly interested, so that if I ever become homeless, I'd have the ice cream to fall back on";;;

Milk & Cookies,Sweetlola,2018-08-03,5,"Great features, satisfying appearance",0,0,"I’ve been buying this nonstop ever since I tried it 3 months ago. I’m always upset when they’ve ran out at my local grocery store, however I’m in love with the crunchiness, the creaminess and how yummy it is.";;;

Milk & Cookies,J3NNA,2018-07-24,5,Best B&J flavor hands down!,0,0,"I LOVE LOVE LOVE this flavor. When ever I venture out and try a new flavor, I always also buy this as my backup plan. I just cant let it go! It's so good!!! Thank you Ben & Jerrys! Please never ever go!";;;
Milk & Cookies
author: Mia528
title: ABSOLUTE BEST FLAVOR OF ALL TIME
text;;;: During my pregnancy I craved ice cream almost every day. My husband knows how much I love cookies and so he brought this flavor home one evening. I have been absolutely OBSESSED ever since!!!;;;

name: Milk & Cookies,witchchrist,2018-06-08,5,Addicted to this,0,0,"As much as I looooooove this ice cream as a cookies and cream addict, could it be possible to turn this flavor into a nondairy pint? I would die of happiness and not lactose intolerance lol";;;
Milk & Cookies
author: spookym
title: Vanilla flavored milk?
text;;;: Almost got this one right. I never dunked my cookies in vanilla flavored milk when I was a kid. I think a simple sweet cream/no flavor ice cream would have been closer to the real thing.;;;

name: Milk & Cookies,Mlis27,2019-08-27,5,A favorite,0,0,"I think this is my favorite ben and jerrys at the moment. I love pretty much any with the chocolate cookie mixed in. I agree with some others, I wish it were carried in more stores.";;;
Milk & Cookies
author: IceCreamPrincess
title: Top 5!
text;;;: I don't like milk but I love this milk and cookies! It has real cookies infused with the ice cream giving you a taste of heaven. I love this flavor. Easily anyone's top 5 ice cream.;;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: TeamGill
title: So good except...
text;;;: I really love this flavor but I have to pick out the Chocolate Chocolate Chip cookie pieces. Tastes soooooo gross! Almost manly. Like an old mans cologne. Very strange.;;;

name: Milk & Cookies,Keda,2018-04-23,5,My all time favorite!!,0,0,"I absolutely love this ice cream. I always try new flavors, but I always grab this one as well. The easiest way to my heart, is with a pint of milk and cookies.";;;
Milk & Cookies
author: Hroehr1256
title: The Best Flavor
text;;;: Milk and Cookies is not just Ben & Jerry's best flavor it is the best ice cream EVER!!! It is my go to ice cream now. Never go without a pint in my freezer.;;;

name: Milk & Cookies,KatB,2017-07-15,5,One of my all-time favorite flavors!,0,0,"This ice cream has no mix-ins, only swirls, but it's so loaded with cookie swirls that it's delicious! This is easily one of Ben and jerry's best flavors!";;;
Milk & Cookies
author: nikithebaddest
title: JUST WOW
text;;;: i discovered this flavor at a gas station an hour away from me and i got hooked. 10/10 WOULD RECOMMEND. me and my sister finished 4 pints in a day.;;;

name: Milk & Cookies,dudagarcez,2019-02-11,5,Da best!,0,0,"Everytime I see a Ben and Herry’s this is my go to choice whenever I don’t feel like risk it! Love the cookies, love the flavour!!! ♥️ Super yummy!";;;
Milk & Cookies
author: beech
title: Uuuuuuuunnnnggghhh
text;;;: Honestly how can you go wrong? It’s like the perfect mushy milk-dunked homemade cookie BUT ICE CREAM?! Genius. Move over classic cookie dough.;;;

name: Milk & Cookies,moonyandthestar,2018-07-28,5,Cookies and Cream 2.0,0,0,"I love me some Ben and Jerry’s, but this flavor takes the cake (haha, dessert joke) because it is new and improved cookies and cream. So good.";;;
Milk & Cookies
author: Aleksandra
title: My Favorite!
text;;;: This flavor has been my favorite for the past couple of years! Sometimes I would switch to other B&J flavors but soon I would be back to it!;;;

name: Milk & Cookies,SamanthaN,2017-10-05,5,The best,0,0,"After not being able to find boom chocolata anymore, i tried this wonderful flavor since it seemed closest. So good. Never disappoints.";;;
Milk & Cookies,kris2,2017-10-14,5,Favorite Childhood Ice Cream,0,0,"Tastes just like milk and cookies, there are multiple types of cookies, and it brings me back to childhood memories, A+";;;
Milk & Cookies
author: tootie
title: The best ice cream I ever had
text;;;: This is the best ice cream I ever had in my whole life. It was so good I took time out of my day to write this review.;;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: Soph
title: Only flavor I’ll eat!!
text;;;: I always look for this flavor in target. I can finish the whole pint in one sitting and I only feel half guilty:)))));;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: turtle8
title: The most amazing flavor!!!
text;;;: I have been a fan ever since the flavor appeared. I share my love for milk and cookies with all whom I come across.;;;

name: Milk & Cookies,RC06,2019-12-11,5,Delicious,0,0,"Best ice cream flavor EVER, hands down. Flavor is spot on with its name. Tastes just like milk and fresh cookies.";;;
Milk & Cookies
author: Cookielover32
title: The best Ice cream in tha world!
text;;;: Has the perfect balance between chocolate cookies and vanilla ice cream... I can pay any price for this....;;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: Lucke310
title: Wow great flavors
text;;;: This is my go to when I get Ben & Jerry’s ice cream it’s now my new favorite or at least one of them;;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: jesseash
title: best ice cream ever
text;;;: The crunchy oreos are amazing! I just ate a whole pint myself sooo worth the calories. just wow;;;

name: Milk & Cookies,Memah,2017-04-07,5,My favorite!!,0,0,"This is my favorite ice cream ever. Although, the only place that sells it is 45 minutes away.";;;
Milk & Cookies,neverseenitbefore,2020-08-23,5,Best ice cream in the whole world,0,0,"There I said it. I am an ice cream connoisseur. There is none better (mass produced, that is).";;;
Milk & Cookies
author: Taeko
title: Best Flavor!
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream flavor of all time! Tastes like an ice cream cookie sandwich;;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: Janel
title: So delicious!
text;;;: What a great flavor! It has that great cookie crumble that I love + cookie dough...mmmm!;;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: miagua45
title: AMAZE BEANS
text;;;: This ice cream never lets me down. The flavor tastes just like my grandmothers cookies.;;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: Kensington
title: YUMMY!
text;;;: My favorite ice cream of all time! Honestly it's like cookie dough ice cream on crack.;;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: Nicole64
title: Yumm...
text;;;: One of my favorites so good! I love the chocolate chip cookie ingredient vs oreos!;;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: Melll
title: Please never retire!
text;;;: I have found ice cream peace. How is it im just trying now? This stuff is AMAZING.;;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: Candiemarie
title: My all time fave
text;;;: Obsessed! My absolute favorite flavor by Ben and jerry and I have tried a ton!;;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: Mathi
title: The best ice cream
text;;;: Definitely the best ben & jerry’s I’ve had. Really good taste and combination;;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: mb711
title: Not great
text;;;: I was very disappointed in this flavor. I couldn’t even finish the tub. :(;;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: Jaredh94
title: Absolutely amazing!!!!!!
text;;;: It’s been my favorite for a long time. It’s extremely mouth watering;;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: Neka
title: Delicious
text;;;: I'm hooked on this flavor.... just tried it a week ago!!!!;;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: True87
title: Fav
text;;;: Looooooove this flavor its one of the best I have ever had;;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: Bree
title: Love it!
text;;;: Always my go to! Can't find any ice cream that's better!;;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: lele2007
title: great taste
text;;;: I buy this ice cream every Thursday. It is the best.;;;

name: Milk & Cookies
author: KCantrell
title: The BEST!
text;;;: The best flavor hands down! This is my go to flavor.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: Vinosheknoe
title: Best in the world
text;;;: This is my favorite Icecream in the whole wide world. POINT BLANK PERIOD. I drive 5 miles to the closest store that carries it atleast 1 a week which is a good thing as if it were closer is probably eat it everyday. Amazing job on this one guys!;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie,Fortnighticecreamlover69,2018-07-24,5,YUMMY!,4,1,"It's been a while since I've bought this ice cream because I can't find it in my local grocery store but I love this flavor so much! I ate two pints in one sitting! My doctor says I need to stop buying Ben and Jerrys because of my diabetes but I can't stop! Aaahhh! I love this ice cream so much that I have to sneak it in the house because my family tries to hide it from me. I've stopped eating regular food and I basically just eat ice cream every meal. This has to be one of my favorite flavors after half baked! Thank you for your service, Ben and Jerry!";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,Mint4Lyfe,2017-05-06,5,My favorite!,9,0,"Literally my favorite ice cream out of all of the ice cream I've eaten in the world. Sometimes it's hard to find at certain stores, but I'll climb through a freezer door to search for it. #NoShame";;;
Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: mintchocolover
title: Childhood Favorite
text;;;: This is my go to flavor whenever I buy Ben & Jerrys! I love how big the chocolate cookie chunks are!;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: James256
title: Used to be my favorite
text;;;: This has always been my favorite but the last 3 pints I have bought have had almost no chocolate cookie chunks! This is very upsetting as this is my favorite ice cream and my favorite park is the cookie chunks. I instead have been left with mint ice cream with a few spattering of what looks like cookie crumbs. For the high price of B&Js I expected more.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie,jcvt,2017-06-14,5,my favorite flavor,5,0,"I really like this flavor, it is super awesome! For real, my favorite.";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,Fwiffo,2017-07-14,5,Yumo,6,1,"I like big chunks of cookie & I cannot lie. Unlike the cookie dust that's typical of most cookies & cream, my pint had about three quarter cookie sized pieces & many more respectable sized chunks besides. & of course chocolate & mint play nice together.";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,Mareday,2020-05-19,5,Love of my life,3,0,"Me and this flavor have been going strong for 10+ years in fact it’s been my “gateway” flavor which lured me into supporting this company and branching out to find new flavors I love (such as justice remix, oatmeal cookie etc..) it’s super refreshing with thick Oreo pieces and doesn’t have that weird green color other companies add";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,Chunk Lover,2017-05-02,1,Chocolate cookies where?,6,5,"As a chunk fan who loves half baked, I recently decided to stop loyally buying my pints of Half Baked and gave this flavor a try. I read it was supposed to have big, generous sized cookie pieces all throughout the pint. Well, my pint didn't have a single big cookie chunk! It was just very small crumbles and mainly mint ice cream. I'm so disappointed! I was expecting this to be the ultimate ice cream for chunk lovers based on what I heard. :(";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,BJfan4life,2020-07-30,3,Yummy but disappointing,0,1,"I was so excited to finally try the Mint Chocolate Cookie ice cream. I'm a huge mint chocolate chip fan, mint ice cream fan in general. But with the concoctions that B&J puts together to make some of the best ice cream flavors around, this flavor is disappointing. I would have expected chocolate chunks, swirls of chocolate, or even the Andes mint chocolates that are sold in stores. But this is basically cookies n cream ice cream with mint flavor. The ice cream isn't even green. Yes it's still yummy, but doesn't live up to what Ben & Jerry's is capable of throwing together.";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,Nicki237,2019-07-12,5,Amazing!!!,0,0,"I bought this flavor yesterday at Walgreens for $6.94 and I must say this flavor is ADDICTING! It’s so good. Ben & Jerry’s knows the perfect balance. The mint flavor is clean and authentic and not sickeningly sweet and artificial and it’s not green like most mint ice creams. Plus, the cookies in here are big pieces, the more I ate through the pint, the bigger the cookie pieces got. It’s as if Cookies & Cream Icecream, York Peppermint patty & Oreos had a baby. I just wish it wasn’t so expensive! I need coupons so I can stock up on this flavor! PLEASE Don’t ever get rid of it!";;;
Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: Mquinn
title: No cookies :(
text;;;: First time trying this flavor and it wasn’t good. There were no cookie pieces at all. I kept waiting to get to the bottom and still no cookies. The bottom was even hollow so 1/4 of the container just had nothing but air.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie,Maybeillhaveonemorebite,2017-08-05,5,So so so good,2,0,"I don't write reviews, or didn't prior to today...I love this ice cream so much, it encompasses everything about a mint and chocolate cookie combination that makes me dream about eating more and more and more. I would live inside my pint if I could, build a little mint ice cream igloo with a cookie door, eat my way out and rebuild";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,MintBinch,2019-02-05,5,Holy Grail of Pints,2,0,"I check for this flavor every single time I'm in an ice cream isle, even if I'm not buying ice cream that day. I *scout* for it, all over the US. And I almost NEVER find it. I found the first pint in the last five years and it's still the best ice cream pint there is. Fresh but decadent but light but chomky. The fricken best.";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,Smrtgrl1231,2018-04-11,1,Great Ice Cream.....but,1,7,"This was my favorite ice cream flavor of all time. Always bought this flavor whenever I could find it. But, unfortunately now, its made with coconut oil and I'm allergic to coconut. I wish I would've looked at the container before purchasing it. I did look at the website before going to the store, and didn't see coconut oil in the ingredients. Maybe the website needs to be updated?? Would be more vigilant next time at the store and read all products. Ben & Jerry's does make great ice cream, I just got to be more proactive and always double check.";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,Nate,2019-12-06,1,The mint flavor that is forever leading you on.,0,1,"At first bite I could taste a mellow mint flavor over what is otherwise Chocolate Cookie Vanilla Ice Cream; sadly I sat there eating the rest of the pint not out of enjoyment but out of a desperate attempt to acquire the elusive mint flavor that was lacking. Long story short
author: I ate the entire pint and was disappointed not only in this flavor but myself. Also the texture was missing that of a chewy/crunch found only in a chocolate chip;" if you are looking for that added chocolaty textured greatness the cookie alone will not bring you any solace.""";

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie,Evelyn,2019-03-19,5,Taste Bud Satisfactory!,1,0,"I like big chunks and I cannot lie! You other B&J fans can't deny! Well, most of you- my friend prefers sorbet. Anyway, ever since Mint Oreos have been put on the shelves, they've been my favorite flavor! So when I saw this at my grocery store, I did a happy dance in the frozen aisle. The peppermint is to die for, and the chocolate sandwich cookies are like oreos! You did it again, B&J.";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,FuzzyGut,2018-06-07,5,Best mint chocolate ice cream around!,1,0,"My wife and I are both mint chocolate ice cream fans so when we found this one at the store, we had to try it. First off, the mint ice cream: rich, creamy, minty and delicious. And the mint tastes natural. Sometimes other brand’s mint tastes so artificial. Next, not satisfied with chips, this ice cream gives you whole cream-filled cookies! Awesome awesome stuff.";;;
Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: mintlover12
title: a classic!!
text;;;: as a mint lover i can truthfully say that this is one of the best! my mom buys this one for me all the time though there are usually very little left in store. i highly recommend this one! much better than minter wonderland which is an abomination to this planet(see my review):) i would add an image of a happy gamer but the stock images are invalid lol;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: Foreversienna
title: Not enough chunks
text;;;: I read several review on the good size of chunks and Great flavors. So when I was at my local supermarket and I saw this flavor I decided to step away from my usual purchase of phish food and half baked. But unfortunately I was very disappointed. There were no large chunks like reviews said. I am hoping thsi was a manufacturing error of some sort but the small pieces I did taste were also odd tasting.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie,Spocksdottir,2018-11-09,5,Excellent,1,0,"I don't enjoy chocolate chunks/chips in cold foods, but I like mint ice cream so much that I have bought mint chocolate chip ice cream, grudgingly eating around cocoa clusters. Thanks to Ben & Jerry's, there are no longer any obstacles to my enjoymint! Cookies are texturally lovely in this minty pint.";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,TheTyGuy,2020-04-03,5,I can’t stop eating it!,1,0,"Look. Ben, Jerry, Ben & Jerry, whatever you two go by, this ice cream is too good. You’ve got me hooked like I’ve never been hooked on ice cream before, and I can’t see any end in sight. How did it happen? I don’t know, but what I do know is I can’t complain.";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,Bridgespo99997,2017-11-05,2,Decent,2,1,"It's good overall, I wish they had a plain cookies and creme or a Mint Chocolate Chip. Similar to a thin-mint from the Girl Scouts. Not a favorite with me.";;;
Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: SeeairuhBuzzbee
title: ICE CREAM!!
text;;;: This is the best ice cream don’t @ me. I’m allergic to milk but I am willing to risk it all for this ice cream anytime I can find it.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: Pints4Dayzzz
title: Mint Chocolate Ecstacy
text;;;: My first pint of MCC (“Mint Chocolate Cookie”) changed my outlook on life and I haven’t looked back since. Strongly recommend.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie,coclico,2020-09-02,5,Disgustingly good.,0,0,"The mint cookie is truly the most supreme ice cream flavor ever invented: not too minty, not too chocolatey... perfect distribution of ingredients, and don't get me started on the exquisite texture. It's unfortunate that I have to eat the whole pint in one sitting. I recently moved to a city with a store that has this magnificent flavor stocked almost every day. The previous place I lived... there was some sort of shortage. I could only find it in random stores once or twice a year. SO, you'd think this is a GOOD thing: that I now have access to my favorite flavor almost every day. Guys, this is a HORRIBLE thing. The store near me is also open 24 hours... you get the picture. So, I declare to anyone who reads these things: TODAY IS MY LAST DAY TO TASTE AND ENJOY THIS SUPERB AMBROSIA> I'm kicking it... tomorrow. ";;;
Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: Jpocket
title: The Best Pint there is..
text;;;: This was my go to Pint. It is disappearing from stores. please don't retire this flavor.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie,tillysandy73,2020-06-15,5,Best mint ice cream,1,0,"This ice cream flavor is one of my reasons to live, no joke";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,parliamentp,2019-01-05,4,,0,0,"Mint chocolate chip is my absolute favorite flavor of ice cream. I don’t eat ice cream very often, but this is definitely a go-to. This ice cream even takes it a step further by having a cookies and cream twist. i was surprised the first time I had opened it because I thought maybe the label was wrong, but when I dug in, I could not be happier. Definitely check this out if you want a twist on the your favorite mint chocolate or cookies and cream.";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,DaiJa36,2020-02-29,5,My Freakin Fav!,0,0,"Ben & Jerry's is my favorite Ice Cream Brand. I recommend this to all my friends because I firmly believe that this Ice Cream will rule the nation. Therefore, my friends eat with appreciate that Ben & Jerry will rule the world. I have created an cult for this amazing business and we pray everyday with this Ice Cream. Sometimes in this because we love the smell of this ice cream. So I thank you, Ben & Jerry. I Love you.";;;
Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: Maria32
title: Adult version of Mint Chip.
text;;;: I love it! Would love to see it swirled with natural peanut butter. This is my favorite flavor!;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie,Valod,2017-06-23,1,disappointed...,1,1,"Bought it yesterday, was rly excited to give it a try. however, had almost no cookies and was mostly stuffed with mint ice cream. The mint taste was vigorous to an extent of repulsion.... had to throw it away half way... very dissapointing!!";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,Anna,2018-01-19,3,Slight tweaks could really improve,0,2,"I love this flavor, I love chocolate cookies in everything. But recently I've noticed the cream filling of the cookies has a really weird, unpleasant texture...kind of hard and crumbly. No one is here for the filling anyway, get rid of that! Also a few pints I've gotten have had almost whole cookies in there. Not easy to eat, break them up more! If you did these two things, this flavor would be A+.";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,Rocko13,2017-05-07,1,No Good - Disappointed - Pass on this Flavor,1,5,"Was excited to try a new flavor of Ben & Jerry's, but I just ended up being super disappointed in Mint Chocolate Chip. It had a very, VERY strong mint flavor and almost no chocolate cookies, it was very strange. Maybe I just got a bad pint, which is very possible, because this was just no good. I wish I would have spent that money on a different flavor.";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,Hat City,2017-07-31,1,Gross!!,1,3,"Since Mint Chip isn't available by the pint, and no scoop shops exist where I live, I tried this flavor and was beyond disappointed. The cookies are disgusting, it tasted like soggy Oreos coated in toothpaste and glue. I will never buy another pint, unless Mint Chip miraculously becomes available.";;;
Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: Kiki123456
title: Really disappointed
text;;;: So I just bought this today and from the reviews I was expecting a lot of cookie chunks. I guess I was wrong because after eating half the pint I got ZERO cookie chunks just some very disappointing specks of cookie. The mint taste is also VERY strong to the point where you start feeling sick. I’m really disappointed with this ice cream and I REALLY don’t recommend it.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie,Iheartmint,2018-01-15,1,"No, thank you!",1,1,"I recently bought Ben & Jerry's - Mint Chocolate Cookie ice cream. Unfortunately, this ice cream did not taste like mint.";;;
Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: anju8776
text;;;: Ben & Jerry's really nailed it with this ice cream. It is so good! Ben & Jerry's is known for their quality and this is no exception.A excellent mint taste and ice cream treat. I just wish they would include more mint cookie pieces.This has become my new favorite ice cream. The mint and Oreo cookies are a perfect combination.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie,brooke,2019-01-29,1,why tf is it not green ??????,0,7,"Im sorry, maybe i dont know how to read, but im pretty sure this says MINT chocolate chip ice cream?? am i wrong? this simply looks like oreos in vanilla ice cream, which is obviously VERY BORING and no where near exciting as MINT chocolate chip. i dont even want to buy this after seeing these photos. #disappointed.";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,danibreann,2018-11-06,4,,0,0,"Big fan of Ben and Jerry's ice cream. Cookies and cream is one of my favorite ice cream flavors, and adding the mint cookies takes it to the next level. A delicious treat that is the perfect size for just a coulple of people. The only complain I have would be that it is a little bit pricy for not a lot of ice cream";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,Jack,2018-03-31,5,DREAM FLAVOR,0,0,"This is by far the best flavor in the world. It has all the right flavors, and textures. By only complaint is that it is not infinite. I have been looking for this flavor for a long time, and found it here. I love mint ice cream, and I love cookies and cream. It is something I could only dream about.";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,stephhannam,2018-06-02,4,,0,0,"Ben and Jerry's have to be my favourite ice cream brand, they have so many amazing flavours to choose from. My current favourite is the Mint Chocolate Chip Cookie, it just amazing. If you like mint chocolate chip then you will love this ice cream too. Makes for the perfect treat on a summers day x";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,vaeh2010,2018-11-05,5,,0,0,"When I go to get ice cream this is the brand I always reach for. Its affordable in my opinion, about 4 bucks. Its a rick creamy ice cream and the flavors are strong. I always buy this for the nights I want to relax and watch a movie. Its a perfect amount for you and your partner. Or just you.";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,samanthaem9,2018-06-06,5,,0,0,"I’m not a huge fan of mint chocolate chip ice cream, but I love chocolate and mint so I’m so happy I found this flavor! The Oreos are a great addition to mint flavored ice cream. There were huge chunks of Oreos. I also love that the ice cream is not dyed green like some other mint ice cream!";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,ellieh3,2019-03-03,5,,0,0,"Because Im in college and only live in a dorm, these little pints of ice cream are really convenient. Theyre small enough to fit in the small freezer space of a mini fridge. Mint chocolate chip is my favorite flavor, but every flavor of Ben & Jerrys that Ive purchased has been good.";;;
Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: WillLOVESMintChocCookie
title: My All-Time Favorite!
text;;;: The Mint Chocolate Cookie has become a fun search and devour game for my wife and I. No matter where we are traveling if we go into a store that sells ice cream we look for B&J's MCC. It's getting harder to find. I fear one day you may kill the cookie and send it to your graveyard.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie
title: The best mint ever
text;;;: I eated last year in my USA trip and loved it!The cookies go way better than just chocolate chips.Its even better because in Brazil they only have one kind of mint ice cream that is no available in the grocery stores any that have giant chunks of chocolate in a enormous quantity.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie,beansky,2018-05-08,5,Best flavor of all time,0,0,"This has been my favorite flavor for YEARS! I love it so much and have driven to the store at night just to buy it. The peppermint flavor is perfect and the whole size cookies you get sometimes are an added bonus. The best ice cream of all time. Go buy it, you won't regret it :)";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,Cleeese,2018-12-10,5,Mint cookies n cream,0,0,"I love this flavor so much, I have been eating a pint a day ( i know, im addicted ) . They really do need to up the sandwich cookie numbers in the batches, lately it seemingly had very little cookie chunks. But when there is a decent amount of cookie chunks ,’im in heaven!!!";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,Jazz42,2017-10-25,5,HEAVENLY,0,0,"I am a BIG fan of mint chocolate chip ice cream so when I found Ben & Jerry's version I was head over heels. I even got my father in law & son addicted to it! This is the most amazing mixture and i can't get enough of it. THANK YOU Ben & Jerry, absolutley LOVE this!!";;;
Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: synthia7_
text;;;: Im a big ice cream fan. It can be a little expensive but its completely worth it this ice cream is filled with delightful flavouring and will satisfy every tease with their humungous list of flavours. Great for a small snack or even a binge eat! Highly recommend;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie,CocoaPicasso,2018-07-24,5,ALL-TIME FAV,0,0,"I worry that this flavor may get taken off shelves one day as it gets more and more difficult to find. This has been my favorite flavor since child hood, because I love mint ice cream but was never a fan of chocolate chips in my teeth so cookies are perfect!";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,Ooma,2018-06-03,1,"Good flavor, but...",0,2,"I generally like mint chocolate cookie but the last pint I got was very disappointing- all the cookie chunks were gathered in the bottom, all the ice cream was on top and very icy. Maybe it melted at some point, which I assume was the grocery store's fault?";;;
Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: angelloveinc25
text;;;: I love this icecream it's the best. It's very delicious and you won't be disappointed at all with the flavor. This delicious icecream are the best compared to any others. I'm a repeat consumer. I love it. I would definitely recommend this to everybody.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: rileyh4
text;;;: I love this ice cream I've been having it since I was very little and I love this ice cream with all my heart Ben & Jerry's is a very good ice cream bread and I would definitely recommend this to another person because it's not too pricey and I love it;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: chelseac1
text;;;: Amazing product I’ve tecommended it to my mother my father my aunt my best friend my husband loves it I love it I can’t get enough of it I only wish I’d tried it sooner it smells amazing too ugh one of those holy grail products I’ll never live with out;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: amyr4668
text;;;: Oooof. I love this. I know I shouldn’t eat so much but I love the creaminess and that the mint is really flavorful but not overly strong. The cookies are yummy and I love that they include thick sandwich cookies instead of just a thin chocolate cookie.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie,kierstin,2018-11-10,4,,0,0,"I really like this ice cream because it is really good for the cost. The only thing that I wish is that they had a strictly mint chip ice cream instead of the one with cookies. Other than that, I buy it all the time and it is really good!";;;
Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: allywblog
text;;;: you can NEVER go wrong with Ben and Jerry’s!!!! I love mint anything so I was really excited to try this. I thought it would be a little more chocolate-ty but it was still declines. I’d recommend to anyone wanting a good mint ice cream.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: andreah9
text;;;: This ice cream is fantastic. Flavour is great and truly refreshing. It is probably my favourite brand of ice cream but I barely buy it because the price is ridiculous. The portions are tiny and expensive. Maybe change the packaging?;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie,jenaw5e9e,2019-02-05,5,,0,0,"Ben&Jerry ice cream never fails to be absolutely delicious. Its always creamy, theres so many flavors to choose from and they come in sizes that keep me from going overboard. When they go on sale Im always sure to buy some.";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,jdivaaaaa,2018-10-22,5,My Absolute Favorite,0,0,"As stated, this is my ABSOLUTE FAVORITE ICE CREAM!!!! My only critic is to get rid of the cookie filling. It’s the only thing that doesn’t translate well. If I could order it special without the filling, I DEFINITELY would!";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,Tomas,2019-03-26,2,Meh,0,0,"Was excited to try this as I'm a big fan of both C&C and mint ice cream. However, this missed the mark for me. I'd rather have plain ol' C&C or mint choc. chip ice cream instead. This one had an odd flavor and aftertaste.";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,ambermc14,2018-09-13,5,,0,0,"Can I just say OH MY GOODNESS!!! This is so incredibly delicious! I love so many different flavors of Ben and Jerrys! Who doesn't? I will say I do find it a bit pricey for a little container but, I will continue to buy!";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,volorian,2018-11-09,5,,0,0,"This is their best flavor. It's like the Girl Scout cookie, Thin Mint, in an ice cream. This is easily my favorite. The mint isn't overpowering and there's plenty of cookies too! I always buy it when B&J is on sale.";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,icecreamlover454,2018-02-09,5,AMAZING,0,0,"This is my favorite flavor ever. Whenever nobody's home, I take out my spoon and eat away. It's the absolute perfect balance between mint and cookie dough. I had at least 3+ huge cookie pieces. Very very satisfied!!!";;;
Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: BreeC
title: So many chunks!
text;;;: I bought this flavor today on a whim and was so happy I did! I couldn’t believe how many actual cookie pieces were in it. It took a lot of self control to not finish the entire pint. Will definitely be buying again;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie,Raebirds,2019-01-28,2,Bad after taste,0,0,"I love Haagen Das Mint Chip, so I thought I’d give this a try. The flavor of the ice cream had a strange metal like after taste. This sounds more delicious than it actually is. I wish I could have my money back.";;;
Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: shannnn21
text;;;: Meant chocolate chip cookie is one of my favorite flavors from Ben & Jerry’s. You really can’t go wrong with this flavor or any player from Ben & Jerry’s for that matter. I can go through a whole bin in one sitting;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie,ajoyster9,2017-06-28,5,One of the Best,0,0,"I visited relatives near Phoenix, & was naturally inclined to find something cold to eat. i went to Wal-mart, found this & fell in love with it! Haven't found it in WA yet though 9which is a real heart breaker).";;;
Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: mooshoobunny
text;;;: I love dessert!! I have a huge sweet tooth and these ice creams fulfill each and every bit of that craving for me! This is basically cookies in cream but mint style and I love it!! It’s refreshing and delicious!!;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: member352555014
text;;;: It’s not good these are so small. I know there are multiple servings in one but they make it so freaking easy to just zone out and eat the whole thing in one night. I’m not really complaining. It tastes amazing.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: sparklinghideaway
text;;;: Im a sucker for both cookies and cream and mint ice cream but to have both in one?!? Omfg deliciousness is blissfully amazing! I totally recommend if you love both flavors to have in one ice cream pint cup.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: sophiacardinale23
text;;;: Mint chocolate chip ice cream is my favourite ice cream. Grab a tub of this for a movie night... or any night and you’re good to go. Grocery store or gas station you can pick up a pint and enjoy the night.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: blendt
text;;;: Ben n Jerry’s is my favorite! When they came out with this flavor I was in love! Not many people are fond of mint flavors but this brand and flavor is my go to ice cream when I’m craving something sweet.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie,megabucks,2018-06-03,5,,0,0,"The best, hands down. Thick ice cream, big chunks of chocolate cookies, and the best flavor ever. Probably not the best if you have a dairy sensitivity, its a heavy ice cream. I would highly recommend!";;;
Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: laikynmckennagarcia
text;;;: Cookies and cream with a hint of mint. Omg this stuff is amazing. Once you have one bite you have to force yourself not to eat the whole thing. Always have this or any ben and Jerry’s in my freezer.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: alwest27
text;;;: Ben and Jerry’s are my main men. But seriously they make the best Ice cream and have so many flavors. Every time I’m in the grocery store it is so hard to choose just one flavor to take home with.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie,kennykinns,2017-06-25,5,fave,0,0,"The best one they make next to Boom!. I don't just want ice cream, I want STUFF IN MY ice cream! They give so may cookies in here. I pile them in the lid and eat them at the end. YOU ARE WELCOME";;;
Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: alexisc219
text;;;: Usually ice cream gives me a belly ake and leaves me feeling yucky but I can honestly say this one doesnt. I love this brand its full of flavor and makes me feel good at the end of eating it.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: blushingdarling
text;;;: This ice cream is so so so good! My husband and daughter both love it as well. I love how it doesnt become rock hard like most ice creams! Its really pricey for how big it is but it so good!!;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: Noodle
title: Delightful
text;;;: When I picked this up I thought I was getting mint chocolate chip but to my delight I got this wonderful ice cream. The flavors blend so well. One of the best ice creams I've ever eaten.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie,Thomas,2017-08-05,5,Simply the Best!,0,0,"This is, without any doubt (at least to the writer) the very best ice cream ever produced. The subtle mint flavour combined with the Oreo-like cookie chunks makes this simple the best!";;;
Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: ivreelayce
text;;;: I was actually nomming on this just last night. It is more of a cookies and cream with mint added than a regular mint chocolate chip but it is still amazing and I absolutely love it.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: dad4monkeys
title: Mint Chocolate Cookie and Phish Food best flavors
text;;;: I saw that somehow Mint Chocolate Cookie was close to 4 stars and had to jump in. Great flavor. One of their best. The haters out there can not possibly be ice cream aficionados.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: katherinegdedd
text;;;: This answer was really good this ice cream was really good I am really enjoyed eating it it has a sweetness and then it has like a meaty flavor and they all blend in together;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: bethanyw852d
text;;;: I love anything Ben & Jerry’s ice cream that doesn’t have fruit in it but this one was my favorite it taste good it doesn’t give. Me a stomachache and it’s reasonably priced;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie,jamiemillsn,2018-08-07,5,,0,0,"Mmm minty , creamy delicious , tasty amazing melt in your mouth Ben & Jerry ice cream, another amazing best buy for hot weather like this can sit and enjoy and cool down .";;;
Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: amyr923e
text;;;: Love love love! Can’t get over how good Ben and Jerry’s ice cream is. It’s a little more pricey comepared to other brands but totally worth it. I’ve never had a bad one.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: shannonm43d1
text;;;: Our family lovesicecreaman Ben and Jerry's. We like it so much that we have purchased Ben and Jerry's cookbook to make their ice creams at the house whenever we want to.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie,Rileyhd,2017-10-08,5,My favorite!!!,0,0,"full size cookies, the best mint ice cream out there!!!! Always my go to, I will go to multiple stores to find it...I can never get sick of this kind of ice cream.";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,taylors31,2018-10-11,5,,0,0,"this icecream is a classic. i love the taste, flavor, and texture. wish it came in a lower calorie and carb and sugar version but its bad because it is soo good.";;;

Mint Chocolate Cookie,blessedbby,2018-08-07,5,,0,0,"I deff love ice cream and can't ever go wrong with it either, break up and not hungry? Hey get some of these bad boys the cold numb the pain haha :)";;;
Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: smalltownbelle
text;;;: I love this flavor. The chocolate cookies pair beautifully with a classic mint ice cream. I also love that the ice cream isn’t artificially colored!;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie,briannae371a,2019-02-04,5,,0,0,"Lets talk about yum! This ice cream is so delicious, I get it every time I go to the store, no other mint chocolate cookie ice cream even compares";;;
Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: Natp
title: My favorite ice cream
text;;;: I LOVE this flavor and have never been disappointed. Wish it was in all stores where Ben and Jerry’s is sold though! Kind of hard to find it.;;;

name: Mint Chocolate Cookie
author: pirak
text;;;: By far one of my favorite mint icecream flavor! The minty coolness of the icecream with HUGE chunks of Oreo-like cookies makes it so good;;;
