The consistency of the marshmallow is to die for, gooey and perfectly swirled through creamy chocolate goodness dotted with rich fudge fish- I need a pint.";;;

Phish Food,ceeuhxo,2020-02-17,5,New Favorite,0,0,"I bought this last night and I’m going back for more ! It’s so chocolatey, love the marshmallow swirls and fudge fishes there are so many in just one pint ❤️❤️ Definitely recommend this flavor if you haven’t tried it !!";;;
Phish Food
author: Memer
title: Not as advertised
text;;;: I was disappointed when I opened the cup and it was nothing like the packaging! I only tried it because it was new to me! It was pretty bad! I will go back to Dairy Queen!;;;

name: Phish Food
author: uniqueunknown
title: Loved Going Phishing!
text;;;: I absolutely loved this flavor. I felt like a big kid eating it. I will be buying more of this kind. The phish food is my new favorite flavor!!!;;;

name: Phish Food
author: Koni
title: One of the BEST flavours ever!
text;;;: This was one of my first flavours ever ( along with Strawberry cheesecake and Cookie dough). When I ate it it was the best moment in my life.;;;

name: Phish Food
author: chloeg47
title: THE BEST ICE CREAM
text;;;: My grandpa always ate this ice cream which led to my obsession with this flavor. Have eaten too many pints in one sitting to count...;;;

name: Phish Food,Ang444,2019-08-12,5,Needs 5 stars,0,0,"This is my die-hard-go-to-save-the-Day flavor the only thing I craved when I was pregnant, and I needs a full 5 stars ⭐️";;;
Phish Food,carolll,2020-04-13,5,yessss,0,0,"i thought'd i hate this flavor bc I don't like carmel or marshmallow that much, but this was a greattttt combo ugh";;;
Phish Food
author: Nanabanana
title: Phish Food
text;;;: 9 months pregnant and I LOOOVE the phish food ice cream but the little chocolate fish give me such bad heartburn;;;

name: Phish Food,Pattimelt,2020-07-20,5,My favorite!,0,0,"Best.ice cream.ever. Phish Food is a family favorite, but we also want to try many others.";;;
Phish Food
author: Emmi
title: ITS MY FAVORITE ICECREAM
text;;;: Its so yum. The different textures make it fun to eat. Its srumdillilyumpshous;;;

name: Phish Food,Cappy22,2020-09-16,5,Perfect!,0,0,"Phish food is perfect. My favorite and the best ice cream,ever!";;;
Phish Food
author: bigdog
title: very good
text;;;: its good..... very very very very very very very very very good;;;

name: Phish Food
author: Cohleressesayelet
title: It’s my favorite ice cream!!
text;;;: I love this Ice cream so much! It’s so good! I love chocolate!;;;

name: Phish Food,jackieb,2018-05-29,5,Hands down my favorite ice cream out there,0,0,"This is my absolute favorite ice cream, no matter what!";;;
Phish Food
author: dani3
title: Best ever
text;;;: This is my absolute favorite ice cream of all time!!!;;;

name: Phish Food
author: Damian
title: The best in the world.
text;;;: Phish Food is the best ice-cream in the world. Ever.;;;

name: Phish Food
author: Benji
title: Best flavor you guys make!!!
text;;;: Been eating this flavor for over 18 years the best;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio,DianaCAFLQC,2018-09-23,5,Perfection for Pistachio Lovers!,5,0,"I have had great, mediocre, and yucky ice cream/gelato all around the states and several different countries, and this is by far my very, very all-time favourite as the quality creamy ice cream has a cool subtle pistachio flavour and it is loaded with tons of toasted perfect nuts! What could be better than that? Sadly, I now live in Montreal, and have checked every ice cream selling market/deppaneur/etc. and cannot find this flavour anywhere! I need my fix! This is torture! (....and I don’t understand how we have such a huge French and Italian population here, why this is not one of the few flavours sold here!). :(";;;

Pistachio Pistachio,DianaCAFLYUL,2017-05-30,5,Perfection!,9,1,"This is my all-time favorite store-bought ice cream/flavor! Having been to Italy several times, I've had my share of amazing pistachio gelato. B&J's does it even better as you have the smooth, creamy lightly pistachio-flavored ice cream and lots of toasted pistachios for that great crunch within the creamy......perfection! Sadly, I've never been to a B&J's that offers this flavor, and it is pretty difficult to find in grocery stores and drug stores. So....when you do.....nab them all! :D You're welcome! (.....everyone always thanks me for turning them onto this flavor!)";;;

Pistachio Pistachio,,2017-10-30,1,Vanilla ice cream with hard pistachio nuts,7,29,"I have high expectations for Ben and Jerry's as they make fantastically wild flavors so when I saw they had a pistachio available I picked it up immediately. Before I even got home from the store I felt assured that I had found my new favorite ice cream (love pistachios), something to rival the pistachio gelato I get from my local coffee shop. Unfortunately, once I broke that bad boy open I was dismayed that what should've been a culinary treat was in fact plain, non-flavorful ice cream with hunks of rather hard pistachios in it. I was very disappointed with the experience and hope to never run across a similarly disappointing flavor again.";;;

Pistachio Pistachio,Cranberryred2001,2017-07-27,1,Trying something new?,4,16,"I went to one of my local grocery stores and picked up a pint of Pistachio Pistachio. I was looking forward to it all day. But when I finally tried it, it was not the same ice cream I was used to. The pistachios were soft and chewy and the ice cream did not taste like pistachio ice cream. I went to the same store again to buy another pint 2 days later and I was rewarded with the same bland tasting ice cream with soft pistachios. Plus once the ice cream melted a little, it was a little too frothy like there was extra milk or something in this particular batch. So very disappointed with Ben & Jerry's. I love this flavor, but not sure I want to risk a 3rd time.";;;

Pistachio Pistachio,Stego,2017-04-18,5,Heaven,9,0,"OK guys, I put on 30 pounds because of this stuff. It was worth it on one hand, because it's so amazingly delicious, but now I'm huge. Oh well. I'll lose some weight as long as this is waiting for me as an occasional treat.";;;
Pistachio Pistachio
author: Arslan
title: Taste of Bitter almonds
text;;;: I bought My first Ben & Jerry ice cream thinking it would compete Haagen daz but i left with disapppintmemt. The ice cream had wierd taste of bitter almonds. Rest it is plain vanilla ice cream with some pistachio in it. Not upto the mark. The bitter taste was horrible;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio,raynedrop,2019-01-13,3,It's only as good as the nuts,3,0,"I've consumed about 10 pints of this over the past 5 years. When it's good, meaning all the nuts are healthy, it's very, very good. It's pretty good when one or two nuts are a bit 'off'. But tonight I chewed into the most rancid, putrid pistachio of my entire life. Nearly hurled. Will not purchase again.";;;
Pistachio Pistachio
author: Dawn0719
title: Always Top Notch!
text;;;: B&J's Pistachio Pistachio is my all-time favorite ice cream - ever!!! The creamy smooth flavored ice cream and the crunchy salty nuts always give me exactly what my taste buds are craving. I remember the first time I ever tried this - I thought I died and went to heaven! <3 True Perfection <3;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio
title: All time favorite ice cream!!
text;;;: This is the ONLY ice cream I buy and I have tried all the pastachio flavors of different brands. I will drive the extra couple miles just to get this stuff. I don't see how anyone could rate this one star.;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio,Naboo,2018-03-25,5,"This is my favorite, my GO-TO for ice cream.",2,0,I have been eating Pistachio-Pistachio for several years and never grow tired of it. My favorite and before that is was New York Super Chunk. It takes a great deal to pull me away from good chocolate;;;
Pistachio Pistachio
author: Kittykate88
title: Yeasss
text;;;: Anything less than 5 Stars don’t appreciate pistachios.. the guy who compliains that the nuts are too hard... Obviously is not a nut lover. This is a must if you enjoy crunch and nuts;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio,lbcgav,2017-06-17,1,Ok if you like almond extract,12,17,"Here's the irony: ""The name alone shows how much we love pistachios. But don't just take our word for it - let the flavor speak for itself!"" The most forward flavor is almond extract, not pistacchio. Too bad, because there's not much better than a good pistacchio gelato. This is nowhere near that.";;;
Pistachio Pistachio
author: herbgreen
title: A Private Joy
text;;;: This ice cream falls into the category of private joy for me. The superb flavor and variety of texture between the silky ice cream and chewy pistachios elevate me to another plane. My ultimate indulgence is to sip a glass of scotch along with a bowl (I try to keep it small!) of this wonderful confection. An adult treat!;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio
author: Never Again
title: Great if you like DISAPPOINTMENT
text;;;: Horrible! Judging by the taste they have never had a proper pistachio dessert . You're better off spending extra money on another brand of pistachio. Or just getting a different flavor. This is my first time trying ben and Jerry's and I apparently picked the worst flavor of theirs imaginable. If I were to name this flavor it would be Pathetic pistachio. I'd give a constructive review but clearly they have been okay with the atrocity for this long and I dont believe it would help. 1 star for the fact that its icecream;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio,augieke,2018-08-08,5,Had several pints and loved them all so far,1,0,"I guess everyone can make a lemon, but I haven't encountered one yet in the Pistachio Pistachio flavor. Especially like the salted pistachio mixed with the vanilla. The pistachios were good and fresh in all the pints I've had. Always look for it on the shelf now. Keep up the good work!";;;

Pistachio Pistachio,purdybirdy,2017-09-29,2,Has potential but not as good as I'd hoped,2,2,"I appreciate the use of real pistachios in the ice cream because you don't see that too often. But because the pistachios are whole aaand there's so many in there, it's just a little too much. Maybe if they were smaller pieces and a tad bit less frequent. The ice cream flavor is nice though. Not too strong and artificial tasting like some pistachio ice creams are.";;;

Pistachio Pistachio,Fish,2017-06-09,5,Something went wrong,1,0,"My favorite!! I would never give less than five stars for Ben and Jerry's, however I think the last batch of this amazing ice cream was light on the pistachio... Usually full of them this one only had maybe ten total!! Still the best around.";;;
Pistachio Pistachio
author: KJoPistachio
title: Pure happiness
text;;;: I didn’t have really high expectations when I bought this today but after tasting it just now I am headed back to the store to buy all of the containers. I’m pretty sure that if everyone ate some of this then there would be peace on earth!;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio,Kyle,2018-03-27,5,Frozen Gold!,1,1,"I’m a picky eater. Especially when it comes to nuts. Often you’ll buy a batch of pistachios, and a handful will be sour or off. When I buy Pistachio Pistachio, I never get a nut that is off. I’ve purchased this flavor COUNTLESS times. It is my favorite Ice Cream. I have never had a Pistachio that is less than amazing in these magical pints. I swear by this flavor. Do yourself a favor and enjoy this heavenly treat!";;;

Pistachio Pistachio,yfu002,2019-07-14,2,no pistachio taste,4,5,"The pistachio chunk is real, but the ice cream itself does not have any pistachio flavor. Put together it is a blank ice cream with pistachio chunks. I can buy a pint of regular vanilla flavored ice cream and eat with some pistachio on the side instead of this.";;;
Pistachio Pistachio
author: Mommyx2
title: Love
text;;;: Everyone in my house has their own ice cream and this is my all time fav. I love that i dont have to share lmao. Plus my 5 year old knows what to get me when she and daddy go to the store. # MyGuiltyPleasure;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio
author: Berkley
title: Addicting!
text;;;: I always stick to the same kind of ice cream but recently I decided to try something new and now I'm addicted. I buy a pint of Pistachio Pistachio at least twice a week if not more and I don't care :);;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio,winterdestiny,2017-06-17,5,Favorite Flavor,1,0,"This is my favorite flavor ever! Ever since I tried this flavor, I rarely pick another. It has a great sweet flavor to balace it out with the roasted pistachios. It's indulgent without being too rich.";;;
Pistachio Pistachio
title: Simply the Best Pistachio Ice cream!
text;;;: I usually buy pistachio gelato at the local ice cream store but I was in Publix at the time. This pistachio is by far the BEST I have ever had! You will not be disappointed!;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio
author: Peacelover9
title: This is one of my favorite flavors.
text;;;: I always use to buy Karmel Sutra. But I thought I try this one. Its great!!!;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio,Jules,2018-04-05,1,Bland flavor,2,3,"I was excited to try this flavor since it was gluten free (one of the few B&J options I can have) and Ben & Jerry's is my favorite ice cream-with quality ingredients and great flavors. But, was disappointed-felt like the pistachio flavor was weak and the base almost icy in texture.";;;

Pistachio Pistachio,Mamma Kate,2018-09-04,2,Not Pistachio Ice Cream,1,1,"This flavor should be named “Almond Extract Ice Cream with Pistachios”. I was disappointed by the flavor profile. There is a generous quantity of pistachio nuts throughout the pint, but their flavor is overwhelmed by the almond extract, which by the way, has a bitter and lingering finish. Good consistency and mouth feel.";;;

Pistachio Pistachio,Lars,2018-07-31,5,What Happened?,1,5,"Used to be heavenly. When I could find it, it was the best of the best. Six on a five star scale. It was pistachio through and through. Generous portion of pistachios nuts embedded in a delicious body of pistachio flavored ice cream. Then somebody in the last year went and spoiled the recipe with coconut oil. Now it's pistachios in coconut ice cream. Who messed with perfection?";;;

Pistachio Pistachio,Bloomable,2020-06-07,5,Best Pistachio Ice Cream,0,0,"This is my favorite pistachio ice cream. The ice cream tastes simply like real pistachio with the roasted pistachios being the perfect added texture. I have purchased many pistachio ice creams from other brands and when Ben and Jerry’s came out with this one I have never looked back. Other favorites for me are Netflixed and Chilled, Cherry Garcia, and the discontinued Creme Brûlée.";;;

Pistachio Pistachio,ccoco,2019-02-18,2,All I taste is almond extract,1,1,"I honestly dont know what I was expecting with this being my first taste of any pistachio ice cream, but all I could taste was almond extract. Even the smell of the icec ream smells like almonds?";;;

Pistachio Pistachio,Kim94,2019-04-14,1,Love pistachio but too much,0,2,"I love pistachios so I thought I would love this ice cream. Unfortunately the pistachios overwhelm the ice cream so it’s too savory for me. I thought way to many nuts, maybe if they were halved or crushed, the flavor would go into the cream. Very disappointed and won’t get again. The amount of nuts (I know, you’re supposed to get at least one nut per spoonful, but way to much.";;;

Pistachio Pistachio,Geouhread,2017-07-05,1,Overpowering Almond taste,2,5,"The icecream itself had a very strong bitter almond flavor taste, the texture of the cream also was very gritty. We expected the product was expired but it wasn't.";;;

Pistachio Pistachio,Kjlee85,2020-05-05,1,almond almond pistachio,0,0,"I'm ok with almond but it disappointed my wife who is a pistachio lover but an almond hater. This tasted more like almond ice cream with pistachio nuts. Compared to pistachio ice creams we have had, this falls far short for any nutty, strong pistachio lingering fragrance and taste we were expecting from a name like ""pistachio pistachio""";;;

Pistachio Pistachio,japanese girl,2018-04-13,1,Umm...,1,4,"I bought pistachio ice cream because I like pistachio flavor. But this vanilla's flavor is like Dr. Pepper. So, weird. I expected it taste really pistachio.";;;

Pistachio Pistachio,jeffery,2017-08-27,1,this is not pistachio ice cream,1,5,"All this is, i just vanilla ice cream with pistachio nuts just thrown into it. i paid for pistachio ice cream but all i got was a peace of garbage.";;;

Pistachio Pistachio,Scootl,2020-02-06,1,Vanilla ice cream with large chunks of pistachio,0,0,"Basically vanilla ice cream with large chunks of pistachios. The nuts are not broken up. I understand if you don't want to use artificial coloring, but the pistachios should be broken up into smaller pieces! That would make it tastier.";;;

Pistachio Pistachio,Dallas16,2020-05-21,5,Beyond Delicious,0,0,"This is my favorite. So glad that the ice cream is also pistachio flavor, not just vanilla ice cream with pistachio nuts added. The nuts are whole and big, not just pieces and slightly salty. Worth the price. Love it !";;;
Pistachio Pistachio
author: Pistacho
title: Almondy pistachio
text;;;: I like the flavors going on in here. The ice cream has a taste reminiscent of marzipan and pistachio mixed and there is a generous amount of crunchy pistachios. This was quite tasty and I'll buy it again.;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio,Meryl,2019-03-06,5,My go-to food!,0,0,"I love this ice cream. It's the fifth food group for me. It's my snack, my treat, my comfort food! Yes, the nuts are fresh and yummy. Actually, it is the only ice cream I eat. Need I say more?";;;

Pistachio Pistachio,jesujesu,2020-06-03,1,Tastes like weird powder,0,0,"I love the fact that they had actual pistachios in the ice cream, but the ""pistachio"" ice cream tastes like powder. It doesn't taste like an actual pistachio ice cream. Frankly, it was disgusting.";;;

Pistachio Pistachio,Soundchicmic,2019-09-01,5,Pistachio Pistachio Pistachio!,0,0,"Fan freakin tastic! So good. My favorite! I loved pistachio pudding as a kid, but this is just out of this world. Chock full of plump pistachios and held together by creamy goodness. Love it!";;;

Pistachio Pistachio,Leopold,2019-08-21,2,Good but not pistachio,0,0,"I have high expectations for B&J icecream. However, this flavor disappoints. The icecream tastes more like almond/marzipan and the pistachio flavor is lost among these overpowering flavors.";;;

Pistachio Pistachio,Miss Jess M,2019-08-20,5,They do not sell this flavor at enough places!,0,0,"I would like to think of myself as an ice cream enthusiast. I literally eat ice cream every day. Ben & Jerry's never let me down. This flavor, Pistachio Pistachio, is an easy 5-star rating.";;;

Pistachio Pistachio,Fish11,2020-04-21,5,Only flavor I buy at the store!,0,0,"This is an amazing Ice cream! I love the ratio of nuts to ice cream. However, a pint is usually a single serving for me. PP is my favorite B&J flavor! And I have tried many!";;;
Pistachio Pistachio
author: LauraBB
title: My favorite ice cream. Ever.
text;;;: I love the flavor of the ice cream and the fact that the pistachios are whole. This ice cream is so good I don’t want to settle for any of my old favorites now.;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio,kolliaskat,2020-04-14,3,interesting,0,0,"If you're looking for pistachio flavored ice cream, this isn't it... it's good don't get me wrong, but it just doesn't strike me as ""pistachio tasting"".";;;
Pistachio Pistachio
author: LilMizLatina
title: Absolute favorite!
text;;;: This has always been my all time favorite flavor. Its a shame I can only get it in the US and not anywhere else in the world. This is the best!;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio
author: Philip
title: Love Pistachio!
text;;;: Love this ice cream...light but really tasty and great pistachio flavor. Unfortunately my local grocery chain stopped carrying this flavor :(;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio
author: Sweet_love0803
title: Pistachio pistachio
text;;;: I absoulty love pistachios and when I seen this I knew I'd have to try it. OMG! I think I'm in love with an Ice Cream nothing but the truth!!;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio
author: sunshinee626
title: Love love love pistachio pistachio
text;;;: Delicious every time I’ve had it. I could go for some hard pistachios and more of them but I’m not picky its delicious how it is y’all;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio
author: PATRICIA
title: I LOVE IT
text;;;: I CAN FIND IT ANY WHERE I'M IN NEW ORLEANS AND ITS MY FAVORITE ICE CREAM THE ICE CREAM IS SO SMOOTH THE RIGHT COMBINATION OF FLAVORS.;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio
author: Artfuldodger702
title: Delicious Addiction
text;;;: Oh my goodness Pistachio Pistachio is so delicious! My favorite flavor with a nice supply of crunchy pistachios in every bite.;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio
author: Max3811
title: Best Flavor
text;;;: Since the first time I tried this flavor it was my favorite. Sometimes its hard to find because not all stores stock that kind.;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio,Sartzer,2018-06-02,5,Name says it all,0,0,"The ice cream and nuts complement each other perfectly. I thought Chunky Monkey was the best flavor, this ties with it.";;;
Pistachio Pistachio
author: CMiller
title: Favorite Flavor
text;;;: This is my favorite flavor of Ben & Jerry's! The ice cream tastes wonderful. Once you start eating it you can't stop.;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio,Mikar,2019-08-16,5,Favorite Flavor!,0,0,"This is my go to flavor. EVERYTIME. I'm obsessed. I moved to Brazil a couple months ago, and I definitely miss it.";;;
Pistachio Pistachio
author: Maze
title: My favorite
text;;;: I’m a huge pistachio lover....and I love this ice cream!! I even use it to make my pistachio pound cake;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio
author: cquirke
title: Love Love Love
text;;;: I absolutely love this ice cream. Simple but amazing. Perfect light flavor loaded with pistachio nuts.;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio
author: MARISELA
title: Love this ice cream
text;;;: Omg I love pistachios and this is one of my favorite ice creams lol I love it ! its delicious;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio
author: Robjay
title: Life changing good
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream hands down. I was they had it in the gallion;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio
author: CheeseMan
title: Worst Ice cream in my life
text;;;: Cant even take a spoonful of it. Tastes just like maraschino cherry. -5/10;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio
author: Dotty
title: Great flavor
text;;;: Pistachio Pistachio is wonderful..Don't buy any other flavor for myself.;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio
author: Chauncey
title: My favorite flavor
text;;;: Definitely worth the price but I wish I can buy this is a larger size.;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio
author: Breezy
title: My new favorite flavor
text;;;: Can’t get enough of this flavor! Sooo many pistachios packed inside!;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio
author: Patti
title: best ever pistachio
text;;;: yum- what else can I say- good flavor and pistachios are authentic;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio
author: djackson
title: My favorite indulgence
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream. bar none. All time favorite.;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio
author: Nikilower73
title: Perfect!
text;;;: If you love pistachio pudding you will love this even more!;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio
author: Leeyen
title: Misleading
text;;;: It's more like vanilla ice cream with pistachio nuts inside;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio
author: anyknd
title: The best
text;;;: In spite all the busy new flavors - this is still the best!;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio
author: CCpistachio
title: Love it!
text;;;: I love it but its hard to find. Please keep it coming.;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio
author: kassidy18
title: Favorite Flavor
text;;;: First flavor I look for when I get ben and jerrys.;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio
author: Jenny
title: My favorite!
text;;;: I love the toasted pistachio's in it! It is yummy!;;;

name: Pistachio Pistachio
author: Kjk0
title: Pistachio
text;;;: Best flavor out out there! FABULOUS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!;;;

name: Pumpkin Cheesecake,LBOCK,2017-09-03,5,Fall Party in my MOUTH!,11,0,"I absolutely love the blueberry cheesecake but can't find it anymore. I stumbled across Pumpkin Cheesecake at Albertsons in Wildomar, CA and this has to be the best Ben & Jerrys yet! My husband said he's ready to spend a ton of money to stock up. It's identical to actual pumpkin cheesecake! During the 110 degree temps it's sooooo good! I'll be raving about this! Thank you for bringing back another amazing cheesecake flavor!";;;

Pumpkin Cheesecake,Sandy,2017-09-10,5,In My Life!!!!!,4,0,"This has been my favorite ice cream since 2008 when I first tasted this flavor. Since then, finding it was the worst experience ever! It is made in limited batches, and was NEVER in the same store every year, so you became an explorer to find it each year! Was it in Walmart, Wegman's, Shop Rite, CVS, or where every September? I knew this was the time the first batch was delivered! FINALLY, this year they have a specific page on their website for Pumpkin Cheesecake. All you have to do is put in your zip code, and it will tell you where is the nearest establishment to purchase this in incredibly, tasty, scrumptiously delicious frozen treat!!! Good luck, and be careful of brain freeze! You're gonna love it!!!";;;
Pumpkin Cheesecake
author: Mama Fig
title: Heaven is here
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream flavor ever. I usually buy dozens of pints to stock up every fall!;;;

name: Pumpkin Cheesecake,bridgespo97,2019-10-31,1,COULD BE AMAZING IF....,5,4,"I bought this last weekend, I am not sure how but it was still available at a local Walmart. I have been wanting to try this flavor, and figured it was long gone, but to my surprise I was able to find it, so I figured it was a sign from above. Overall, the pumpkin flavor tastes familiar... But over seasoned... It is a bit boring, and honestly this ice cream could be amazing. The graham cracker swirl is more of a.... occasional chunk. Honestly, the graham cracker swirl was to die for!! It was the highlight of this ice cream... If they could just add more swirl, I would be much more impressed overall. The swirl definitely breaks up the boredum of the ice cream, it is a bit repetitive. I think a huge glob of swirl would be amazing.";;;
Pumpkin Cheesecake
author: Miercoles
title: BEST ICE CREAM EVER
text;;;: I just bought this flavor from target.. i went there to get chunky monkey but they were all out. Ive tried every other flavor and this was the LAST pint of this flavor. I like pumkin pie but its not my favorite... i love all of B&J’s cheesecake flavors so i thought i mayyyyy like this one.......;;;

name: Pumpkin Cheesecake
author: Sammie826
title: Amazing!!
text;;;: I Baught this in Brattleboro Vermont while looking at their delicious ice cream! & oh my gosh! It's a complete favorite! Can't get enough!!;;;

name: Pumpkin Cheesecake
author: Trippex123
title: Best ever!
text;;;: I couldn't believe it! Who would have thought something so simple in a pint would be heaven in your mouth? Omg amazing!!;;;

name: Pumpkin Cheesecake,VWilson,2017-10-03,5,ABSOLUTELY AMAZING!!!,0,0,"This is the BEST ICE CREAM EVER!!! Taste like real pumpkin pie! So amazing, I have never had anything this good before!";;;
Pumpkin Cheesecake
author: SweetsAndTreats25
title: I love pumpkin ice cream!
text;;;: This taste great. I wait every year for the pumpkin ice cream to come out. So glad it comes out a little bit early. Pumpkin ice creams are my favorite and this one is delicious.;;;

name: Pumpkin Cheesecake,ShelB,2019-01-21,5,Pumpkin Love!,0,0,"Hands down the best pumpkin ice cream I’ve ever tasted! My dad introduced me to pumpkin ice cream at Baskin Robins when I was a kid and although he passed away, every time I eat this B&J flavor, I think of him. Your pumpkin ice cream doesn’t have a weird after taste I’ve experienced in other pumpkin ice creams. (Which I only bought out of desperation when I couldn’t find B&J.) The graham cracker swirl is heavenly and like an extra blessing of happiness! I look forward to autumn every year so I can eat your Pumpkin ice cream and think of my dad.";;;
Pumpkin Cheesecake
author: Addicted101
title: Addictive
text;;;: So smooth and and delicious every chance I had I bought 4 of them!;;;

name: Pumpkin Cheesecake
author: MikeL
title: My Favorite!
text;;;: Simply the best! I wish this was available year round;;;

name: Pumpkin Cheesecake
author: Oscar
title: Great flavor
text;;;: Great flavor. Tastes like pumpkin cheesecake blended into ice cream. The swirl is gritty and has great texture.;;;

name: Pumpkin Cheesecake,sj100,2017-12-30,5,In love,0,0,"I had this icecream years ago, it was immediately my favorite, and was upset when they stopped carrying it in my local stores the next following years. I hadn’t seen this icecream in about 3 to 4 years in my local stores. I checked so hard for it every year when fall hit. I even checked stores when I was out of town, ect. I finally found it this year at the store it’s been missing from, and I’m so happy. It is just as amazing as I remember. Wish it wasn’t a limited batch! Hope to see it next year!";;;
Pumpkin Cheesecake
author: Rafa
title: Absolutely the best
text;;;: Last time I had it bought the last 2 pints @ Walmart in Puerto Rico a couple of years ago. It was the last time since never seen it again anywhere.;;;

name: Pumpkin Cheesecake
author: lmrobby24
title: Great for all seasons!
text;;;: Came across this gem in Walmart and fell in love. The one thing that would make it perfect is a little more of the graham cracker crust.;;;

name: Pumpkin Cheesecake
author: Chibes
title: BEst flavor!
text;;;: Makes Pumpkin spice season worth it! I always try to buy tons but it never lasts :/;;;

name: Pumpkin Cheesecake,Icecreamfan4life,2018-12-05,2,Unexpectedly Good,0,0,"Just picked this up a couple of days ago. Figured since it was my year to try out some of these much beloved pumpkin spice and pumpkin flavored items, that come out. I would give this ice cream a try. I'll be the first to admit pumpkin flavored anything is not a go to favorite flavor for me during the Fall or otherwise. So I had low expectations going in. But once I tried out a little bit that was inside the lid....have to say I fell in love with this super light pumpkin flavor. Even enjoyed the light graham cracker swirl. Just the further down I went into the pint, not sure if it was do to the larger the swirl became or the mix of the graham cracker with the spice in the pumpkin in the base. But the taste of the swirl just got real nasty throughout the middle section of the pint. But it got better again towards the end though.";;;

Pumpkin Cheesecake,Makinna,2019-10-29,5,Best ice cream I’ve ever had,0,0,"I thought I would never find an ice cream to replace One Love that they killed off a few years ago (I’ve seen it back randomly for short periods, but it never lasts), but finally I have. Naturally the one ice cream I love is limited batch. Anyway, it’s amazing. It tastes exactly like pumpkin cheesecake and the graham swirl is awesome. I could eat this all year. I would eat this all year if it was available.";;;

Pumpkin Cheesecake,Laine,2018-12-03,5,PLEASE Make This a Full-Time Flavor,0,0,"This is my all time favorite flavor and I am already having trouble finding it in stores! Like said in the description, it's not pumpkin spice flavored so I do not feel like it would go out of taste at other points in the year. I am in love with the graham cracker crunch in it, and the ice cream is so incredibly creamy (probably from the real pumpkin). Please please please make it a full time flavor!";;;

Pumpkin Cheesecake,Gerry,2019-09-15,5,Great if you can find it!,0,0,"This is truly a flavor everyone should try. Unfortunately this can only be found in a few big box stores or super marts. The B&J locator shows what stores have it in stock. But when i get there, i find a messy freezer with flavors all over the place. When i ask the staff for help , they are clueless and defiantly not on target. I hope to find this ice cream some day but for now i will keep looking";;;

Pumpkin Cheesecake,piercedxangel,2018-09-19,5,A Fall Favorite!,0,0,"I look forward to this amazing flavor every fall. It’s like spooning into a fresh, creamy pumpkin cheesecake, the graham cracker swirls make it absolutely perfect! My only issue is trying to get my hands on a few pints, they sell out super fast, so if you see them? Grab ‘em! If you’re like me & love pumpkin EVERYTHING, you’ll absolutely love this ice cream. It’s worth stocking up on :)";;;

Pumpkin Cheesecake,JennaDanika,2019-09-20,1,Got an old one,0,4,"This is my absolute favorite!! I hunt it every year. Well I bought my first one of the season today... it was gross and so sad. Have hunted the last couple years and couldn’t find it, so I was beyond excited when I found it today. But to open it and it have zero flavor because i think it was not stored properly..it was all mushy and had crystals and wouldn’t harden.. ughh";;;

Pumpkin Cheesecake,Britms6133,2020-01-26,5,Just like actually pumpkin pie,0,0,"Perfect for those that enjoy pumpkin flavors. Amazing for the fall, but I could enjoy this year round. The ice cream was creamy, good balance of sweetness, with a good ratio of ice cream to graham cracker swirl. I wish there was more of a cheesecake flavor, maybe add some cheesecake bites. I would buy again.";;;

Pumpkin Cheesecake,SarahSS,2017-10-09,5,This is a must-try for Fall!,0,0,"I'm usually not one for the trend of all pumpkin-flavored or pumpkin spice-flavored things, but I saw the Pumpkin Cheesecake B&J at the store and I had to try it. Oh my goodness, I'm so glad I did! The flavor is delicious and the graham really brings it to a 5/5. I've already purchased 3 pints!";;;
Pumpkin Cheesecake
author: Animal Whisperer
title: Pumpkin cheesecake ice cream
text;;;: I love this ice cream I give it 4 stars because it is expensive for that little container instead of 5 stars :-*;;;

name: Pumpkin Cheesecake,jodyh3,2020-09-13,5,Best flavor they make,0,0,"I'm SO sad this is only out during fall. This is so good, it should be out year round. It doesn't have much of a cheesecake flavor but it has the light and buttery accents. The graham cracker swirl makes this pint what it is, AMAZING! Make this a regular flavor!!!";;;

Pumpkin Cheesecake,KatB,2018-10-22,1,Not sure if I got a bad pint or not...,0,5,"I bought this a few months ago, and I think it might have been old, because the ice cream was incredibly frosted and I couldn't distinguish any sort of graham cracker swirl at all. Definitely disappointed.";;;

Pumpkin Cheesecake,Kelseylovesicecream,2020-02-23,5,Absolute Favorite,0,0,"I tried this for the first time in October.. haven’t stopped eating it since. I literally CRAVE this ice cream!! I really, really hope they make this a permanent flavor instead of just the limited batch";;;

Pumpkin Cheesecake,Drowsy,2017-09-21,4,Great but can't eat it lol,0,1,"I love pumpkin flavored things, and have trouble finding ones that I can eat because I am allergic to Ginger. I did get to try this ice cream before realizing it had ginger in it, and it is amazing.";;;
Pumpkin Cheesecake
author: La Salsera
title: Thes best ice cream I've ever had
text;;;: I've been buying this ice cream for a few years now. I check the supermarket freezers even in the off season. It's the best ice cream I've ever had. My props to Ben and Jerry for this creation!;;;

name: Pumpkin Cheesecake
author: The Metal Man
title: The Best!!!
text;;;: The Ben & Jerry’s Pumpkin Cheesecake is the absolute best Ice Cream from a store I have EVER had!!!! I wish this was made year round but I will be stocking up on it so I have it for months!!!!;;;

name: Pumpkin Cheesecake,Dustybucket,2017-11-17,5,"Pumpkin cheesecake ice cream, yummy",0,0,I tried this last night and it is delicious. It captures the flavors of autumn perfectly. I wish this would be a permanent flavor offering though. It is that good.;;;
Pumpkin Cheesecake
author: nicolet
title: OMG
text;;;: every time I find this ice Cream in the stores i end up buy atleast 10 pints of it bc it is soo hard to find. wish is would be avail. all year round;;;

name: Pumpkin Cheesecake
author: BCJPP
title: My favorite flavor
text;;;: This is my Thanksgiving dessert (and dinner) when I end up having to work the holiday. Has all the right flavors and a nice blend of pumpkin spice.;;;

name: Pumpkin Cheesecake
author: Lailaann
title: Amazing and perfect for fall
text;;;: I bought this 3 weeks ago and already had theee of them. It is the perfect amount of sweet with a bit of salty from the graham crackers. I LOVE IT;;;

name: Pumpkin Cheesecake,FuzzyGut,2018-08-12,4,Delivers on its name!,0,0,"Tastes exactly the way it should. Real, fresh pumpkin flavor and a very nice graham swirl. I have 6 more of these in my freezer and I’m glad I do.";;;
Pumpkin Cheesecake
author: Maddie
title: Incredible
text;;;: My favorite Ben and Jerry’s flavor EVER. Everyone I have told about it is hooked too. Please please please just make this a permanent flavor!;;;

name: Pumpkin Cheesecake,austintoller,2017-12-15,5,Yum! I LOVE this flavor! Please keep it!,0,0,"I am addicted to this, you beacons of yummy evil. Not too sweet, the graham cracker swirl is perfect. Please keep this one on permanently.";;;
Pumpkin Cheesecake,Vthillbilly,2019-01-28,5,Delicious!!,0,0,"I love it!!! I hope they make it a permanent addition to their lineup!!! Oh, and bring back Willie Nelson's peach cobbler!!!";;;
Pumpkin Cheesecake,Insurancealdo,2020-01-26,5,My favorite flavor!,0,0,"My favorite, the best!!! Every fall I look for this flavor, I wish they would make it all year long instead of seasonally.";;;

Pumpkin Cheesecake,Devotee,2018-10-15,4,"Flavor is incredible, lack of availability stinks",0,0,"Pls, pls produce more. I think I got ONE last year, can't find any yet this year - supply is always sold out. :(";;;
Pumpkin Cheesecake
author: IceCreamy
title: New favorite
text;;;: I usually don't like anything g cheesecake flavored but this was amazing! Should make it a permanent flavor.;;;

name: Pumpkin Cheesecake
author: IceCreamGoddess
title: Can't eat just a scoop!
text;;;: Super tasty! As a fan of 1. ice cream 2. pumpkin 3. Graham Cracker pie crusts this is heaven in a pint!;;;

name: Pumpkin Cheesecake
author: MarkChana
title: Excellent but hard to find
text;;;: I love this flavor. But it is really hard to find in my area. Wish it was stocked in more supermarkets.;;;

name: Pumpkin Cheesecake,TCM2022,2019-09-17,5,Delicious!,0,0,"The flavors are fantastic, so complementary! Wish this wasn’t a limited flavor it’s that good!";;;
Pumpkin Cheesecake
title: Amazing fall or winter choice
text;;;: If your looking for something amazing that makes you think of fall then this is the perfect.;;;

name: Pumpkin Cheesecake,Kristay,2019-01-01,5,It has little crust swirls !!,0,0,"The flavor is creamy and good and it has soft pie crust swirled into the recipe, love it !!";;;

title: Pumpkin Spice Everything
text;;;: #PumpkinSpiceEverything I love this!!! I wish they can have this flavor all year round!!!;;;

text;;;: Extremely good has a light pumpkin taste. It doesnt over power your taste buds;;;

title: Best ever keep flavor please
text;;;: This pumpkin cheesecake is so good I have to buy more the best ice cream;;;

title: Yummy
text;;;: Loved a homemade version but couldn’t get more saw this. Delicious;;;

text;;;: Wait for the fall to buy and stock up this at a local store.;;;
