title: The best!
text;;;: My favorite by far. Wish I could get it year round. Love it.;;;

name: Pumpkin Cheesecake
author: Jesserae88
title: The Best
text;;;: I love pumpkin. I love cheesecake. Fantastically addicting;;;

name: "Red, White & Blueberry",Nathalier12,2019-06-09,3,it has potential.,10,4,"i give this icecream a 3 star. because 5 js licking spoon to its core. 4 is not enough chunks but yummy creamy icecream flavor. 3 is.... well this. def not enough cookie or strawberry. and not enough blueberry icecream flavor. needs LOTS more. tasted like vanilla icream with very rare moments of tastebud excitement when the tiny chunks of shortbread were finally dug up. Did i eat it in 2 days? yes. Did i enjoy eating it? yes. Did i look forward to wating it in the future? no i forgot about it which means it wasnt great. Will i buy again? if they advertise it after this review "" with an overload of added chunks"".... ps.. looks nothing like the picture smh :(";;;

"Red, White & Blueberry",metalpasta,2019-06-21,3,Where's the raspberries?,4,1,"I read the description of this flavor and thought this might be an instant classic. Raspberry and blueberry ice cream? And strawberries too? Ooh! But I have to say this flavor was a disappointment. All I could taste was vanilla and the shortbread. Now blueberry isn't the strongest flavor in the world, but you would think it could be amped up at least a little. And maybe it's just me but I could not taste the raspberry at all. And the pint I purchased had only a few bites of strawberry. The flavor was not bad, but it was nothing like i was expecting. Instead of ""wow!"", all I experienced was ""meh"". I'll stick with my old favorites and keep hoping for a resurrection of ""That's My Jam"".";;;

"Red, White & Blueberry",Icecreamfan4life,2019-05-09,5,Totally unexpected willy wonka experience!,8,2,"Okay as I said in another review. I bought this with 2 other flavors(Sammie flavor and the sweet like sugar flavor), and I was the most leery of this flavor. As I tend to enjoy fresh blue and raspberries as opposed to having them in ice creams. As they just don't taste right or good to me. But in this flavor. I'm not sure if it was the fact that there was the vanilla swirl and short bread cookies, that balanced things out or what. But this turned out to be a lot better than I expected. Again, I know others may not like it, because it's not one of B&J's chunck induced, fudge freckled classics. But it's definitely a step in the right direction in balancing out more natural even flavors, with deep, rich, and sometimes too salty flavors as well. So definitely keep mixing it up for sure.";;;

"Red, White & Blueberry",Dandani8,2019-10-10,5,AhhhhhMazing,0,0,"I love this flavor !!! The bursting flavor blueberry and raspberry and little fireworks of strawberries and shortbread pieces is a delicious way to make any day better, but not only that but every bite is so satisfying and gets better bite after bite!!! Definitely my new favorite!";;;

"Red, White & Blueberry",mer13,2019-06-25,2,Lacking flavour,2,1,"The vanilla itself isn't even that great tasting and vanilla is all this ice cream flavour really is. The blueberry and raspberry portion of ice cream taste just like the vanilla, the strawberry pieces are few and far between, and the short bread chunks were about the same. The ice cream could be a great flavour if they reworked it and added some more flavour to the blue ice cream portion and adding a little more chunks of fruit and cookies.";;;

"Red, White & Blueberry",Mmemimsmom,2019-12-06,1,Major Disappointment,2,12,"I was so excited to find this flavor (raspberries, blueberries, strawberries, shortcake! ! ) and so disappointed when I tasted it. First off, grayish purple ice cream is just NOT RIGHT! Second, flavor. It doesn't taste like anything but overly sweet vanilla. I found 3 threads of red that, if you squinted, might have been strawberry. The globs of shortcake were a disgusting greenish color and again, too sweet. No fruit flavors. Would I buy this again?? No. Will I finish the pint? No. Will I buy B&J's again? Meh.";;;

"Red, White & Blueberry",RaeRaeMae,2019-07-17,2,Not enough shortbread!,1,0,"If you tripled the amount of shortbread, at least, I could give this a 3 star rating. But it also hardly had any strawberry;" maybe 5 tiny little pieces(but that's a stretch) Raspberry? Where? That was non existent. And the blueberry could also be kicked up a notch... Also
author: just take out the vanilla all together. Other than the name
date: there is no need for it.""";;

name: "Red, White & Blueberry",,2020-08-31,5,I Want a Painting of This on My Wall,0,0,"I bought this on vacation expecting nothing but then I ate it and the texture reminded me of Play-Doh in all its glory (without the smell, which is still awesome in its non-edible glory) and it was SO GOOD. This is the first time in over 10 years I sat down and almost ate the entire pint and it had nothing to do with any kind of appetite stimulating...um...recreational activities. YUM is the three letter word that a Jeopardy question would ask and this would be the answer. More of this all day, at all times.";;;

"Red, White & Blueberry",MirandaR,2019-06-26,5,My favorite,1,0,I have bought 3 of these! So delicious. Sometimes I find the flavors overwhelming so this is a great one for people like me who enjoy ice cream but not crazy amounts of different flavor.;;;

"Red, White & Blueberry",Sky77,2019-08-01,2,"Mild, vanilla flavor",1,0,"If you ate this with your eyes closed, you would swear it’s vanilla with an occasional chunk of something that you couldn’t really place. Good vanilla, but...vanilla.";;;

"Red, White & Blueberry",Shmeezy,2019-05-20,3,Just ok,1,0,Wasn’t gross because it’s ice cream. :-p. However I was very disappointed. Tasted very plain like vanilla. Not a lot of chunks either. Not fruity at all.;;;
"Red, White & Blueberry",Zeus1995,2019-05-26,4,Good but could be better,1,0,"I enjoyed it but could be better. more shortbread chunks, more strawberries, and stronger blueberrie taste";;;
"Red, White & Blueberry",ems247,2019-06-22,2,Underwhelming,1,0,Usually love Ben and Jerry’s so I Thought this would be great but ended up being kind of tasteless.;;;
"Red, White & Blueberry",marijajjj,2020-06-11,5,so yummy,1,0,the best ice cream ive ever had! i bought it once and couldn't find it again;;;

"Red, White & Blueberry",Vnessa,2019-05-21,5,LOVED IT!,0,0,"Almost like eating a berry pie! I love this. I have been waiting around for this type of flavor/texture since another company launched a similar flavor YEARS AGO but with graham cracker crust! They only had it through summer and i haven't seen it since! I really enjoyed this because it wasn't chocolate, caramel, candy, etc. This is my FAVORITE! Please do not discontinue this flavor!";;;

"Red, White & Blueberry",Goldie,2019-07-04,1,Disappointed!,1,1,I only had white and blue ice cream that lacked flavor. No strawberries or shortbread pieces. This definitely is not an ice cream I would purchase again.;;;
"Red, White & Blueberry",Briarhopper,2019-05-12,1,Just tastes like vanilla,1,1,Usually love Ben and Jerry’s but this was the most bland ice cream I’ve ever eaten from them;;;

"Red, White & Blueberry",Vivicart,2019-06-24,3,I wish it had more flavor,0,0,I picked this up with the new Ice cream Sammie flavor and I have to admit this flavor was underwhelming for me. I’d like to see more of the raspberry and cookies pieces inside. Unlike like the Ice cream Sammie flavor this one is flavorful enough for me. I wanted more but really loved the idea of the flavors all together.;;;

"Red, White & Blueberry",Emilysmimi,2019-06-11,2,Big Disappointment,0,0,"I bought this flavor because I loved the Maine Blueberry ice cream that Ban and Jerry’s used to make. All I tasted was vanilla with what seemed to be something like pound cake globs. I even tried tasting the flavors separately but no berry flavor to be found. Also, MIA were the strawberries. So sad";;;

"Red, White & Blueberry",pixellkitten,2020-02-10,2,Meh I wouldn't get it again,0,0,"Was super excited about this one, but all i taste is vanilla and even though my pint looks filled with blueberry, theres no flavor, no berries and no shortbread! I feel like this was a waste to buy I should have bought my go-to flavor of phish food instead.";;;

"Red, White & Blueberry",qazy,2019-06-11,1,"Lacking ingredients, maybe just a bad batch.",0,1,"The pint had around 6 strawberry pieces in the entire container. The shortbread was also lacking in quantity and in texture and flavor. The shortbread was soft nasty no flavor blobs, thank goodness only a few pieces made it into the pint.";;;

"Red, White & Blueberry",Bondservant888,2019-04-26,3,Tastes great but missing ingredients,0,1,"There were very few and very tiny bits of shortbread and raspberries. Doesn’t look like the picture on the container. Tastes good, but disappointing considering other bj ice creams have loads of stuff in them.";;;

"Red, White & Blueberry",Mimi116,2019-07-14,1,So sad...,0,1,"Sounds amazing, tastes bland. Not a single strawberry or ANYTHING red was found in my pint. Also missing from this pint was flavor! It had an odd overly sweet vanilla flavor and that was pretty much it!";;;

"Red, White & Blueberry",Sunnyinor,2019-09-03,2,Not what it claims,0,0,"Just bought the red white and blueberry and was very disappointed, no raspberry at all. Mostly vanilla and very little shortbread. Won't buy again. Usually Ben and jerrys is amazing. Not this one.";;;

"Red, White & Blueberry",Weebsamy,2019-07-22,5,My new fav don’t discontinue!!,0,0,I love this ice cream! Totally addicted to the little blueberry shortbread pieces- this is a berry lovers dream! An alternative for ya folks who aren’t chocolate and caramel people.;;;

"Red, White & Blueberry",Cavewmn,2020-06-05,5,Not to much and not to little,0,0,This is my favorite ever. Sadly it's an exclusive to one store. Now it's not even for delivery. This was getting me through Covid19 and now I have to find something new.;;;

"Red, White & Blueberry",Andyh,2019-05-29,5,Fantastic!,0,0,"I bought this today from a Walmart in Evansville IN! It was a fruity ice cream which I’m not always a fan of, but for some reason this did it for me! Highly recommend!";;;

"Red, White & Blueberry",Joyful1,2019-09-29,1,Not as good as it sounds,0,0,"Not very flavorful & the shortbread adds a gritty/mushy texture. I couldn’t taste raspberry, the blueberry was dull & the strawberry just didn’t work in the mix.";;;

"Red, White & Blueberry",Emmysue,2020-09-10,5,Delicious!,0,0,I love this flavor! It is subtley berry flavored and I really like it! Love the strawberries and the shortbread pieces. One of my favorites!;;;
"Red, White & Blueberry",Smileszim,2019-05-04,5,Loved It,0,0,Just tried new flavor and really enjoyed. It was not overly sweet and the shortbread gave it a nice texture.;;;
"Red, White & Blueberry",Lacee,2020-02-29,5,Absolutely delicious,0,0,"We love this one! Its not sweet but, yet has so much flavor. Try it out you won't be sorry!";;;
"Red, White & Blueberry",esofresh,2020-01-08,5,Delicious,0,0,Favorite ice cream ever. It’s delicious. Come out with a bigger size to enjoy for days;;;
"Red, White & Blueberry",Smacklet,2019-09-09,5,Best flavor ever!,0,0,Best flavor you have! Love it. Reminds me of Royal Britannia which I miss a lot.;;;
"Red, White & Blueberry",Cakes,2020-07-07,5,Best flavor evah,0,0,Delicious scrumptious tasty awesome lovely delightful love it❣️Thank you ❤️;;;
"Red, White & Blueberry",Trish,2020-06-15,5,My favorite!,0,0,This is my favorite flavor but it’s hard to find at the grocery stores!;;;
"Red, White & Blueberry",sarahnicole,2019-06-07,4,Yummy,0,0,Really yummy! But could have more strawberry pieces.;;;
"Red, White & Blueberry",Brandon5689,2020-01-19,5,New Favorite,0,0,"Awesome combination, the blueberry and shortbread.";;;

S'mores,jnewbio,2018-07-01,5,"Best flavor, but hard to find!",29,0,"This has long been my favorite Ben and Jerry's flavor - the chocolate ice cream in it is deep, dark and delicious, the graham crumb swirl adds just the right bit of texture, the ""toasted marshmallow"" is more complex than the straight-up marshmallow in Phish Food, and the chunks of chocolate are of the highest quality. Sadly it is hard to find in my area - I look for it in any store I go into and when I find it, buy as many cartons as can fit in my freezer! I tried the new Limited Edition ""Gimme S'More"" flavor and found it very disappointing. I certainly hope Ben and Jerry's isn't planning to replace the classic S'mores with this new flavor - I'd be heartbroken!";;;

S'mores,Elizcady,2018-06-10,5,All Time Favorite Flavor,16,0,"I could eat ice cream everyday and am a bit of a chocoholic, so naturally this is my go to flavor for Ben and Jerry's. Although there are several other chocolate based flavors, its hard to compare and I went through serious withdraw when I couldn't buy it when living in the U.K. While this used to be easy to find in my local grocery stores, I've recently seen it replaced with the new Gimme S'more flavor on the shelves. I am hoping that it isn't going to be discontinued, as the new flavor is completely different. Never one to write reviews, but I feel so passionately that I wanted it to be stated that some of us out there love this one, despite the lower rating.";;;

S'mores,Cait5,2018-12-11,5,"All-time favorite, but so hard to find!",13,0,"This is my all-time FAVORITE ice cream flavor--period. Ben & Jerry's is terrific, but they have far outdone themselves with S'mores. Nothing else compares. It's been my favorite ice cream since I was a kid, and nothing has ever come close to replacing it. Unfortunately, it also happens to be the MOST DIFFICULT flavor to find. There are no retailers near me that still carry it--it seems to have been phased out, and I hope not in favor of ""Gimme S'more,"" which can't hold a candle to the original S'mores. The rich chocolate flavor, punctuated by fudgy chocolate chunks;" paired with velvety toasted marshmallow and delightfully crunchy
author: textured graham cracker swirls--nothing compares!""";;

name: S'mores,Matthart82,2017-07-14,5,My favorite of all time,26,1,"This is by far my favorite ice cream ever. I don't know what it is, but I am totally addicted to it and will pretty much eat the entire pint in one sitting, even though I don't like eating ice cream that much. I've driven long distances to buy this and was on the website right now just to find out where I can buy this since I just moved to a new state. I was shocked to see that this has some negative reviews and I felt that I should pay the ice cream back by writing this review. But anyway, best ice cream ever.";;;

S'mores,SarahSS,2017-07-01,5,Favorite!,16,0,"S'mores is by far my favorite B&J's flavor. I was upset to see the other reviews saying they were so disappointed! Maybe it was something in a recent batch or whatever, but anytime I get it, it's always perfect! The graham cracker swirls are the best part. So delicious!";;;

S'mores,DeeDee_BakedZiti,2017-05-04,5,The best of the best,14,1,"I'm in love with S'mores. In fact, I fell in love with my husband over a pint of S'mores. As teenagers, we shared spoonfuls of the richest chocolate, creamiest marshmallows and bites of graham cracker perfection. 15 years later, we still go ""gaga"" when we spot it in a store. My only wish is that we could find it more often--it's certainly hard to come by in the tristate area.";;;
S'mores
author: l0lu47smores
title: My Very favorite and that's saying something
text;;;: Ever since I was a baby I have loved this flavor. When we did a vote in our family about who was the messiest ice cream eater I was voted number one but especially with this flavor. I find this flavor my very favorite and I think that no other flavor is even close in the good range. You're in heaven when you eat it. It has the perfect amount of every flavor. I love it! Definitely a must in your freezer!;;;

name: S'mores,SugaHG,2017-09-15,1,For Chocolate Lovers Only...Unfortunately,3,8,"This flavor was a disappointment. The chocolate ice cream with chocolate chunks over powers the marshmallow swirl and the graham cracker has yet to be tasted. This flavor needs a revision. In the summer when you bite into a s'more you are instantly hit with the graham cracker taste that is followed by the marshmallow and then warm chocolate. This ice cream should be the same. Graham cracker flavored ice cream with an ample amount of marshmallow swirl followed by chocolate chunks and graham cracker bits would do this flavor justice. As it is now, I will never buy again, I won't even finish this pint!";;;
S'mores
author: Michele
title: If anything happens to this flavor I will die...
text;;;: There aren’t enough stores that carry this flavor! There aren’t nearly enough chocolate based b&j flavors but this one is perfect! The roasted marshmallow is so good & the graham is delicious. The only thing I might recommend would be to add more graham ... and to get more stores to carry it!;;;

name: S'mores,mooksT,2020-06-08,5,Awesome flavor! Impossible to find.,0,0,"This is my wife's all time favorite flavor of B&J (going back to when it was called Marsha Marsha Marshmallow), but we cannot find it anywhere near us even though the Flavor Finder says 2 different chains in our area carry it. I've been to all of those stores in ~10 mile radius and they don't even have a slot for it on the shelf. B&J's online store doesn't even carry it. I would be willing to pay a hefty premium to have it delivered at this point. I did see it recently at a Safeway in California when I was there on business, but was not in a position to try and haul it home with me on a plane. WE WANT THE S'MORES!";;;
S'mores
author: JenR
title: FAVORITE
text;;;: My absolute favorite flavor of Ben & Jerry's! The chocolate ice cream as always is delicious. S'mores ice cream should always have a chocolate base. I love the texture of the chunks of chocolate and graham crackers. I'm glad they chose to go with a whipped marshmallow rather than fluffy marshmallow chunks. This flavor really can't be beat!;;;

name: S'mores,Smores4lyfe,2017-05-30,5,The literal best flavor,5,0,"It's not like I can find it anywhere anymore but, it's still my favorite. Hopefully B&J will get with the program and have it more widely available in NYC again!";;;
S'mores
author: Sarah4
title: Plain chocolate ice cream
text;;;: Cannot even taste the graham cracker or marshmallow. I taste more marshmallow in the Phish Food. Chocolate should not be the base of this ice cream it completely overpowers anything else that could be there. I'd recommend a graham cracker ice cream with ample swirls of marshmallow and fudge as a remake of this flavor;;;

name: S'mores,Zoid,2018-05-05,5,I officially have a new favorite flavor...,2,0,"Phish Food used to be my favorite, until I first had S'mores. Now I can't get enough of it. For some reason it only appears to be sold in Publix in my area, so I have to make the extra trek to Publix just to get me some S'mores. The problem is they sell out of it frequently so I have to check back often. Very well balanced and frankly addictive. Please expand the retail distribution so all the s'mores fans in my area don't have to fight for the limited inventory at Publix. THANKS!";;;
S'mores
author: Doug
title: Love it
text;;;: I look for the S'mores every time I hit the grocer. Now to find the ever elusive S'mores Ice Cream bar!;;;

name: S'mores,TheFoodie21,2017-08-10,5,Delicious flavor that keeps me coming back!,4,0,"This particular flavor has to be one of my favorites I absolutely love the marshmallow swirl and the graham cracker pieces.The chocolate chunks were good too though I wish the pieces were a little bit smaller, still, won't stop me from getting this ice cream.";;;
S'mores
author: Christy
title: Best flavor on earth!
text;;;: This is my addiction! I love it's more a semi sweet chocolate with the marshmallow and graham cracker... I have no idea what I will do if they ever stop making this ice cream. I call dibs on the recipe if you ever discontinue!;;;

name: S'mores,trashpanda1971,2019-01-26,5,Legit the BEST,3,0,"I die of sadness every time I’m in the mood for B&J, but the store doesn’t carry this flavor...it has ALL THE THINGS...delish chocolate ice cream, graham cracker crack bits, and sweet, sweet toasted marshmallow swirls. One of the few foods in life that is worth the calories...when I see people give this flavor a low score I literally want to fist fight them.";;;

S'mores,RS30,2018-05-20,5,Best ice cream ever!!!,2,0,"So this was my favorite ice cream ever!!! all the flavors match so well and the combination of the chocolate ice cream with the graham cracker is great. If I could ask for anything would be to have a little more graham cracker in it, but is still absolutely delicious. However I'm deeply sad to see that this flavor is no longer available... just so disappointing and now I'm struggling to find another ice cream to substitute my favorite ever S'mores! :(";;;
S'mores
author: kpwr
title: best ice cream in america
text;;;: head and shoulders the best of the bunch. why so hard to find?;;;

name: S'mores,Nowan,2020-02-04,1,Chocolate AGAIN?,0,1,"I tried this a week ago then just now put it up against Phish Food. Here's the deal, imagine your a the S'mores flavored ice cream for a moment...then you looks at yourself and essentially you realize you've been created as a competition to Rocky Road ice creams and your own sibling Phish Food. Someone else offered an amazing idea of making this a graham cracker ice cream GAME CHANGER!, lets take it onestep further,..Making it a CORE then my freinds you've done it, A S'mores in a pint, the outside consists of a Graham Cracker Ice Cream and a Marshmallow & Fudge core. idk food for thought.";;;

S'mores,allisonlovesicecream94,2020-04-05,5,My favorite flavor! But so hard to find :(,1,0,"When I was living in NYC, I found this flavor one time in my local bodega. Ever since then, it's been my favorite Ben & Jerry's flavor. I recently moved back to Michigan and cannot find it anywhere! The graham cracker swirls balance out the decadent chocolate flavors and the toasted marshmallow adds this gooey element that is perfectly complex and sweet. Luckily, when I visit my boyfriend who is stationed in North Dakota, his store carries it and I'm able to get my fix. I hope this flavor never gets discontinued!";;;

S'mores,FuzzyGut,2018-06-23,5,Really good stuff.,3,0,"I just melt when I dig into certain B&J flavors and this is one of them. Everything about S’mores is great, I just wish the marshmallow and graham swirls were thicker. This is a great pint and I will definitely be buying it again.";;;
S'mores
author: Stacey
title: Best Flavor Ever!!!!
text;;;: My husband and I drive all the way across town to buy this ice cream at least twice a week! It is the BEST! I love that is is very chocolatey with a hint of marshmallow and graham cracker. It's perfection!;;;

name: S'mores,bluethreads,2017-08-05,2,lacks s'mores flavor,1,4,"I was excited to see a few brands of ice cream offering s'mores flavor at my supermarket! S'mores is one of my favorites! I thought the flavor might be difficult to capture in an ice cream and decided my best bet was to go for Ben and Jerry's. It seems I made the wrong choice, as their ice cream tasted like chocolate chocolate chip. There were a few graham cracker swirls, but I couldn't detect any marshmallows. I don't know if the marshmallows were supposed to be flavored within the graham cracker swirl, but the taste never came together as anything but chocolate. The ice cream was a super delicious chocolate chocolate chip ice cream, but if you are expecting an ice cream resembling s'mores, I'd try another brand.";;;

S'mores,bmhansen513,2018-03-14,5,S'mores Lover's Dream,3,0,"If you are like me and enjoy S'mores, you will not be disappointed with this pint. I have read some of the bad reviews and I think people have come across some imbalanced pints, but that it no way should take away from what this flavor is at its best. I have had imbalanced pints in every flavor and chalk it up to nuances in the manufacturing process. This one may be slightly more prone to imbalances, but the flavor is so good that I am more than willing to put up with a few ""misses"" from time to time.";;;

S'mores,nickmemyself,2017-06-06,5,SAVE THIS FLAVOR,5,1,"PLEASE, this is my favorite flavor and if it went away I don't know what I would do, the graham cracker chunks are heaven and everything about this spells happiness.";;;
S'mores
author: Rhirhi
title: Best flavor!!
text;;;: I love this ice cream. I wish they sold it in a bigger size. I would literally buy gallons of this stuff. Best flavor ever!;;;

name: S'mores
author: Lolly
title: Best Chocolate Ice Cream
text;;;: I love chocolate ice creams and this is my favorite of them all..;;;

name: S'mores,Tracy1975,2019-01-07,5,Better flavor than the new S'mores,2,0,"I accidentally bought the ""new"" s'mores flavor thinking it was this one. This one has much better flavor. It tastes like Smores because it has marshmallow and Graham cracker and chocolate. The new one tastes like vanilla ice cream with Oreo cookie pieces. Nothing Smores about it.";;;
S'mores
author: BriBri
title: My Favorite!
text;;;: This is one of my favorite flavors. So chocolaty! I love the marshmallow and graham cracker flavor too!;;;

name: S'mores
author: BC1226
title: Camp In A Pint
text;;;: Love the toasted flavor in the marshmallow and overall is one of my favorite flavors!;;;

name: S'mores
author: jdodge23
title: Amazing
text;;;: First time trying s'mores ice cream and I love it!;;;

name: S'mores,maya3,2017-10-19,1,What s'mores?,6,8,"I was craving s'mores on a hot day, which naturally led me to the perfect idea: s'mores ice cream! I was so excited to try this flavor that I bought two tubs of it at the store, only to be sorely disappointed. This doesn't even taste like s'mores, it's basically just chocolate ice cream. The chocolate ice cream base overpowers all the other flavors... such a disappointment.";;;

S'mores,Sarah,2017-05-21,2,Disappointed,2,1,"I'm a long time Ben and jerries fan, and I've never been let down by any of the flavors, until this one. In the entire pint I only got one bite of marshmallow, which is not what I expected from and ice cream named smores. It would have been an excellent flavor if it had more marshmallow and graham crackers in it.";;;

S'mores,pollosmoky,2019-10-04,5,My Favorite,0,0,"My favorite, but suddenly I can't find it! I am overcome with grief at this development. Other chocolate/marshmallow-y ice creams suffice, but it's the slightly salty graham-y flavor that really makes S'mores fabulous. Phish Food is much too sweet, and all those dang fish are in the way. Please tell me you're not retiring this flavor. If you must retire it, I demand Glampfire Trail Mix be put in regular rotation, bc if I can't have a graham cracker swirl, then a pretzel swirl will have to do.";;;

S'mores,j12345,2019-06-04,5,Favorite flavor ever!!,0,0,"I don't understand all the bad reviews for this flavor. It is my all time favorite, and I think it's perfect. The marshmallow and graham swirls give it a nice soft texture, with the chocolate chips giving it just a bit of crunch. It is a little heavy on the chocolate flavor, but then again, so are real s'mores. Graham and marshmallow are subtle to begin with and come through great here. I haven't tried the newer flavor that has graham ice cream, but don't know how it could improve on this!";;;

S'mores,Debra,2018-09-15,5,LOVE the strong chocolate flavor and mix ins,1,0,"Oh my goodness this is my favorite ice cream ever. The chocolate ice cream base tastes dark, which is so rare and hard to find. I absolutely love it and can't get enough. Thank you! I hope you never change the recipe.";;;
S'mores
author: NSEGS
title: Best flavor ever!!
text;;;: This is the best combination of flavors! We love this ice cream so much and it is impossible to find. Really hoping it is not replaced with the new Gimme S’mores flavor which is not great.;;;

name: S'mores,Tyra,2017-08-28,5,One Word. Amazing!,1,0,"I took one spoonful of this and fell in love. I could not stop eating until I reached the bottom. Hope this never goes away. Did not have any marshmallows, but I was too in love to care.";;;
S'mores
author: Lexx
title: Very disappointing :(
text;;;: I LOVE Ben and Jerrys ice cream. I LOVE anything s'mores flavored so I thought this would be my new favorite B&J flavor but unfortunately I was disappointed. It really did not taste like s'mores at all and tasted pretty much like plain chocolate ice cream. I was really rooting for this one because I love s'mores but this did nothing for me :( it would be the perfect ice cream if it tasted like actual s'mores!;;;

name: S'mores,Mickfrogger,2017-09-11,1,Very disappointed,2,6,"What makes me sad is ben and jerrys has the ability to make this a great ice cream, but they didn't. It tastes like chocolate chocolate chip ice cream. I actually thought I got a dud pint because i couldnt taste any graham. If they did a separate thick graham cracker swirl a la their pumpkin cheesecake ice cream and a thicker toasted marshmallow swirl it could be what it claims to be. Won't buy this flavor again.";;;
S'mores
author: Eric15
title: Best Flavor!
text;;;: This is the best flavor in my opinion but it not stocked very well in the KY area. Makes it very hard to find!!! Please fix guy!;;;

name: S'mores,Smoresgirl31,2017-12-16,3,I love it but I’m so disappointed!!,0,0,"This is my FAVORITE flavor Ben & Jerry’s offers. It’s my go to ice cream in the supermarket. The only problem is that it’s so inconsistent! Lately I’ve only gotten mostly chocolate ice cream, barely any marshmallow inside the pints (which is my favorite part). Last batch I had didn’t have any graham cracker or marshmallow. I don’t want to give up on this product but I just wish they could get it right! Will not be buying for a while, maybe the wait will be worth it..";;;
S'mores
author: MusicPhan
title: Yummy! Yummy! Yummy!
text;;;: My favorite flavor! Lately I haven’t been able to find it anywhere. I want s’more!!!;;;

name: S'mores,janderson,2020-02-24,5,S’mores,1,0,"Amazing, miss this flavor so much. All things s’mores from B&J I miss desperately";;;

S'mores,zackbrown322,2018-04-29,1,Tastes Nothing Like S'mores,1,3,"I honestly don't know what Ben and Jerry's was thinking with this concoction. The balance between the traditional s'mores flavors (graham cracker, chocolate, and marshmallow) in this pint is completely off. It ends up tasting like plain chocolate ice cream. Now Ben & Jerry's has come out with an additional s'mores flavor. But why? Just revamp this one! Probably the most disappointing pint of ice cream I've ever bought.";;;
S'mores
author: Em77
title: Love it!
text;;;: I love this ice cream SO much! By far my favorite!;;;

name: S'mores,Tali,2017-06-27,2,Not their best...,0,0,"I'm a die-hard B&J's fan, but they really got it wrong with this one. When I got it I first thought something was wrong because it only tasted like chocolate ice cream with nothing else -- but then I saw the rest of the reviews here and I guess it's just the flavor! I was really excited for the graham crackers but I they're practically non existent. I'm pretty disappointed, hopefully the rest of the flavors don't lose their character like this o";;;

S'mores,goldcrab,2017-06-02,2,Something feels wrong,0,0,"Usually this is my favorite flavor, have been treating myself every few months to S'mores for years. The one I bought today though, I almost thought it was a different product. Could barely see any marshmallow, the chocolate was overpowering, and I got a feeling I was eating condensed milk or something at times instead of anything s'mores related. I hope this was just a bad batch and not a permanent change :\";;;

S'mores,ejav,2018-01-30,1,"Good chocolate ice cream, but not much else",0,4,"I was really excited to get this for my wife since she loves chocolate and marshmallow and I thought this would be a match made in heaven with B&J being her favorite ice cream brand, but lo and behold this was probably the most underwhelming flavor to date. Tasted like a decent chocolate ice cream but other than that it was generic and didn’t have much of a s’mores taste to it.";;;
S'mores
author: Amy77
title: Best Ice Cream Ever!!!!!!!
text;;;: Omg! This is the BEST ice cream you’ll ever have. It’s hard do find. They don’t even have it at their own ice cream shop. Gimme s’more is nothing like it - I wouldn’t even buy that. “S’mores” is the best! I hope they keep making it. It’s smooth and not too sweet. The chocolate flavor is awesome combined with graham crackers and marshmallows!! I LOVE this ice cream!!!;;;

name: S'mores
author: ColoradoKate
title: More S'mores I Implore
text;;;: Been buying this chocolaty delight since my daughter was a toddler.....and she's now a licensed driver. This decadent flavor is my before-bed ritual. Smooth rich deep chocolate flavor with delicious fudge chunks and swirls of lip-smacking goodness. None of your other flavors compare to this delight. S'mores will always have a place in my heart.....and freezer.;;;

name: S'mores,Shaina,2018-01-11,2,A bit sad,0,1,"I have been a Ben and Jerry’s lover since childhood. With that being said it is rare that I come across a flavor that I am not a fan of. Being that I love Ben and Jerry’s as well as s’mores, I was really excited to try this. The base flavor was fine but I was not reminded of s’mores while eating this. I actually didn’t even finish the pint, which never happens.";;;

S'mores,Voltages230,2019-12-03,1,Not the flavor you're expecting,0,1,"I would expect a S'mores flavored ice cream to taste like my favorite dessert ever, a S'more. What I ended up getting was an overpowered chocolate flavor with tiny hints of graham cracker and even more chocolate in the form of the fudge chunks. I'm pretty disappointed in this flavor as usually I love B&J ice cream. Definitely won't be purchasing this again.";;;

S'mores,jennk83,2018-08-27,5,Best flavor,0,0,"This is my all-time favorite Ben & Jerry’s flavor. They changed it up a bit sometime in the last couple of years, but it’s still very delicious. It has become increasingly difficult to find since the introduction of “Gimme S’more” (which I do not enjoy half as much), so when I do manage to find it, I stock up. Perfect flavor combination, not to be missed.";;;

S'mores,Vonnie,2017-05-30,1,Not What I Was Expecting,0,3,"I am a S'mores fanatic, so once I saw this in the grocery store, I went crazy! Lol I was expecting a marshmallow based ice cream with a fudge swirl and Graham cracker and fudge chunks. Unfortunately, I found myself eating chocolate flavored ice cream. The Smores flavor was overpowered by the chocolate smh I tried, but it was nothing that I was expecting.";;;

S'mores,vtmmm,2018-03-08,5,Taste of Summer with Lots of Chocolate,0,0,"My current favorite flavor! I love the creamy marshmallow swirls and the sandy texture of graham cracker crumbs, plus chocolate chunks. Some people feel it's not ""balanced"" enough, but as a chocolate person I'm perfectly happy to have my s'mores be more chocolate than anything! It's as if you took your s'more and crumbled it in chocolate ice cream!";;;

S'mores,sublimecls,2019-04-07,5,"Amazing flavor, my fav!!",0,0,"This flavor is just PERFECTION for me! The dark chocolatey ice cream base is stellar, the gritty swirls of almost wet sand textured graham cracker is SO GOOD and the touches of toasted marshmalllow swirled throughout just top it off perfectly. I will never survive if they get rid of this flavor. I hat when I can’t find it in stock!";;;
S'mores
author: JakeJr9
title: SPECTACULAR SMORES
text;;;: Hey stores in Delaware - if you want my grocery business you had better start stocking this flavor. My favorite used to be chocolate and peanut butter ice cream. But once I tried Smores I find myself driving around until I find a store that carries it. Do yourself a favor - if you have not tried this flavor - do so now.;;;

name: S'mores
author: Bryant
title: Best I have ever had!!!
text;;;: My wife and I treat ourselves to Ben and Jerry’s on Friday nights. We used to buy S’mores and share it every Friday for 8 years!!! We can’t find it anywhere in North Carolina anymore. None of the other flavors are even close to comparing. Very sad that we can’t get it. It’s not even available in the online store.;;;

name: S'mores
author: Gustine
title: Disappointed
text;;;: I was excited to see my store finally selling the s’mores flavor so I obviously bought it. I started eating it today and it’s just chocolate ice cream with a little bit of graham cracker and almost no marshmallow. I won’t be buying this again but I will recommend my favorites: Cherry Garcia and The Tonight Dough;;;

name: S'mores
author: Nicky91
title: Disappointing
text;;;: I feel like they really dropped the ball with this flavor. The marshmallow and Graham crackers are entirely overpowered by the chocolate ice cream and chunks of fudge. I had really high hopes for this one. I think it would be so much better with a Graham flavored ice cream or even a marshmallow one.;;;

name: S'mores,momo9324,2017-09-21,2,Poor S'more Flavor,0,0,"I had high expectations for this ice cream as I love anything s'more flavor, but this ice cream just didn't cut it. It literally just tasted like chocolate ice cream. No graham cracker or marshmallow flavor at all. Sorry Ben & Jerry's, love your ice cream, but this flavor could use some work";;;
S'mores
author: Lauren14
title: I LOVE S'MORES
text;;;: This flavor is my favorite because of the graham cracker swirls; they are to die for. This is always my ice cream go to and I am so sad that s'mores isn't sold at most ben&jerrys retailers. I have such a hard time finding it these days that I usually am forced to settle for other flavors.;;

name: S'mores
author: Vali
title: Too much chocolate
text;;;: Insanely chocolatey. Needs more marshmallow and graham crackers because all I could taste was chocolate.;;;

name: S'mores,Adrienne,2017-08-21,1,Lack of S'mores,0,2,"Not your typical summer treat flavor...the chocolate ice cream is overpowering and the taste of graham cracker and marshmallow bits is non-existent. Very disappointed by our choice of ice cream. Ben & Jerry's is known for exceptional and creative flavors, but this one misses the mark.";;;

S'mores,Mbrown80,2019-01-06,1,Yuck,0,1,"Tastes nothing like s'mores. Such dark chocolate ice cream...i don't understand why it has fudge, as s'mores do not...the marshmallow is not enough to help the overpowering darkness of the ice cream, and the graham doesn't taste at all, just contributes a sandy texture. Hard pass.";;;

S'mores,morganutley,2017-08-10,5,Favorite Flavor!,0,0,"The Dutch chocolate base is DELICIOUS, and the occasional bites of crumbled graham cracker, marshmallow, and chocolate just make it that much better. Purists may prefer more ""S'mores"" flavor, as the chocolate ice cream is really bold, but I think it's beyond excellent as is.";;;

S'mores,Stine70,2017-10-25,5,"Love, love, love this flavor",0,0,"I am always on the hunt for this flavor when we visit a grocery store. I can’t get enough of the rich chocolate, buttery graham cracker, marshmallow swirl and chocolate pieces. I try so hard to ration it out, but I’m usually done in 4-5 nights. Thx for the yummy creation!";;;
S'mores
author: Brandy35
title: Ehhh
text;;;: I was excited to try the smores....but the chocolate overpowered everything.;;;

name: S'mores
author: av3rros
title: Drowning in Chocolate
text;;;: This is one of Ben & Jerry's most disappointing flavors. It tastes like nothing but chocolate ice cream. I didn't taste a single fudge chunk or roasted marshmallow it it. and that graham cracker swirl was non-existent. I'm shocked this hasn't made it to the graveyard yet.;;;

name: S'mores,tiredfrom work,2017-07-04,2,Isn't all that much different from Phish Food,0,0,"As a chocolate ice cream, it's OK, but if you're going to call an ice cream smores, it should at least taste like smores. This is nothing but chocolate. I barely see any marshmallow,and I don't know where the graham crackers are supposed to be. Pretty disappointing.";;;
S'mores
author: SmoresLover
title: BEST FLAVOR EVER
text;;;: S'mores has been my favorite flavor for YEARS. I love the chocolate base and the surprise of the marshmallow and graham cracker swirls within. Lately I haven't been able to find it in stores very often. Please don't send to the flavor graveyard. I would seriously cry.;;;

name: S'mores,Krystle,2018-08-13,1,Only chocolate,0,1,"I just opened my pint, when I took off the lid, I saw marshmallow, I was excited. But after I got threw that small layer of marshmallow, I couldn't find anymore. I didn't see or taste any Graham cracker. And I only saw a few chocolate chips. I think I got a mistake!";;;
S'mores
author: TammyC
title: Not worth the cost
text;;;: I bought this yesterday and I went to 4 differrrnt stores until I found it! I was so happy then when I tasted it I didn't see any marshmallow until I reached the middle and it was too much chocolate I spent over 8 bucks because I got two and I was very disappointed.;;;

name: S'mores
author: johanna
title: favorite
text;;;: this is my fave b&j flavor!!! however i have been seeing less and less of this flavor in stores. i hope they are trying to replace it with that horrid “gimme s’more” flavor...that flavor could never compare to this classic. please keep this flavor ben and jerry’s!!;;;

name: S'mores,Nickolaix,2018-09-14,5,Favorite Flavor,0,0,"I read other reviews that claimed that the chocolate overpowers the other components, but I think that is what I like. Chocolate ice cream is my jam, and S'mores brings chocolate ice cream to a new level with the addition of some marshmallow and graham cracker.";;;

S'mores,JennP,2020-04-14,5,This is so chocolately...Best flavor,0,0,"This is my FAVORITE B&J ice cream. The chocolate ice cream is so rich. The crunchy graham cracker part is yummy too. This ice cream is so hard to find in the stores so if you do find it, stock up like I do. I'm so sad that I don't have any right now.";;;

S'mores,Catie,2018-10-10,1,Poor mixture,0,1,"I bought this flavor to try because of the amazing reviews. However, I was really disappointed. There was maybe one or two graham cracker chunks and that was it. The ratios were very off. However, if you like chocolate ice cream, this is the pint for you";;;

S'mores,,2017-09-29,5,"Favorite Flavor, ATM.",0,0,I agree with a lot of reviewers that this is mostly chocolate...and could use more marshmallow...but it's still awesome. I love the flavor and texture of the graham cracker swirl. I allways get excited when I see this at my store and never pass it up.;;;
S'mores
author: Mhoss
title: Best Flavor Ever!
text;;;: This is by far my favorite Ben & Jerry’s flavor! The chocolate ice cream with the graham cracker crumbs and toasted marshmallow is the perfect combination and taste just like biting into a s’more! If only it was available at more locations...;;;

name: S'mores
author: Epersha
title: Favorite ice cream ever!!!
text;;;: This is what happiness tastes like. I freakin LOVE B&J s’mores! I’m pregnant right now and am so sad that I can’t find it in my local grocery stores because I am seriously craving it!!! I am mystified why Regis isn’t a Moreno popular flavor!;;;

name: S'mores,invalid username,2020-01-19,5,"my favorite, perfectly balanced",0,0,"So delicious, but hard to find around these parts. It is perfectly balanced between the chocolatey icecream, the marshmallows and the best of all, the graham swirls which to me seem to have a bit of saltiness... altogether, it's just yum.";;;

S'mores,Angela94nj,2018-01-16,2,Just chocolate ice cream,0,1,"It just tasted like chocolate ice cream. I got a couple chocolate chunks but no marshmallows or graham crackers. I would never have called it was s’mores. For the price I pay, I’d like a decent amount of toppinggs mixed in. Disappointed.";;;

S'mores,AJ105,2018-05-20,5,By far the best!,0,0,"This is my favorite Ben and Jerry’s variety, no question. I don’t generally like chocolate base, but this is just perfection. Love the complements to the rich chocolate base. I could buy this every visit to the grocery store.";;;
S'mores
author: Purple Lb
title: One of my 2 favorite B & J flavors!
text;;;: Been buying this flavor for years. My favorite part is getting a big glob of marshmallow. Been having a hard time finding it in the usual stores recently but maybe they were just waiting for the weather to warm up here in PA.;;;

name: S'mores,Mace,2018-04-30,5,Delicious!!,0,0,"This is my favorite flavor of ice cream! It got me through many hard nights of studying in college, and now I’m a successful engineer. It was clearly the S’mores!!";;;

S'mores,moorejennie78,2018-05-03,5,So much better the new Gimme S'mores,0,1,"This is my all time FAVORITE flavor. I go to the shop in Glenview just to buy it. The new version does not remind me of S'mores at all. This one does! Don't stop making it, even if it's just in the shops!!! Please!";;;
S'mores
author: Rika
title: Almost perfect
text;;;: I love anything s’mores and this was so close to being perfect. I thought it just needed more marshmallow and graham cracker so it would taste more like s’mores and less like a straight up chocolate ice cream.;;;

name: S'mores,bslpeace,2020-08-19,5,I am literally obsessed with this flavor,0,0,"I love this flavor so so so much. I, however, can not find it ANYWHERE. This is really upsetting for me because it definitely deserves to be a more mainstream flavor, so it can be more accessible. Love it.";;;
S'mores
author: Frange
title: All time Favorite
text;;;: This is my #1 pick ! I have to have it every other night. The graham cracker crunch and the chocolate chunks with the marshmallow taste just like s’mores and gives you that PERFECT CRUNCH ! I LOVE IT;;;

name: S'mores,sweetmel,2018-06-06,5,S'More's Ice cream!,0,0,"I remember baskin robbins having a s'mores ice cream and me wishing it had more graham crackers in it. This is what is should have been! I love,love,love this flavor so much! One of the best.";;;

S'mores,jcates9,2020-03-21,5,My absolute favorite B&J!,0,0,"This is hands down my favorite of all the Ben and Jerry's, I just wish it wasn't so hard to find! Also, don't be fooled by the new s'mores flavor, ""gimme s'more"" it isn't the same at all!";;;

S'mores,Alyssa731,2019-04-20,5,BEST ICE CREAM,0,0,"This is my all-time FAVORITE ice cream of all time! I'm not usually a S'mores type of person but this ice cream is my favorite! It is so smooth, goo-ey and delicious, just like a S'more!";;;

S'mores,,2019-06-22,5,Amazing!!!!,0,0,"This ice cream is amazing!!!! I love s'mores and this ice cream hits the spot everytime I eat it. I wish this ice cream was near me. Whenever I find it, I buy it. It's hard to find it.";;;

S'mores,,2020-04-22,5,FAVORITE FLAVOR,0,0,"It's been my favorite flavor for years, and I used to be able to find it at my local Wawa or Quick Check. I haven't been able to find it in months and it makes me so sad.";;;
S'mores
author: Lewsfancy
title: So hard to find!
text;;;: I loooove this ice cream flavor! It’s just so hard to find. I literally drive 38 miles for it. Gimme s’mores is carried near me but it’s such a disappointment.;;;

name: S'mores
author: Char27
title: Graham crackers as you’ve never had them
text;;;: I’ve always liked Ben and Jerry’s but typically went for more traditional flavors but now this is the only one I ever want! It’s awesome 10/10 would recommend;;;

name: S'mores
author: gin_
title: Literally the best
text;;;: Not even kidding this is the best ice cream in the entire world but it is so hard to find :( I ate a half of a pint of this stuff a night for like 4-5 years.;;;

name: S'mores,tdoubled03,2017-08-02,5,My favorite!,0,0,"This is my favorite! I love the swirls of toasted marshmallow in it, it could use a tad bit more graham cracker, but overall it is extremely delicious!!!";;;

S'mores,Robin62,2017-11-22,1,just chocolate,0,1,"Bought this last Sunday. It tastes like Chocolate Ice Cream. If there was Marshmallow or Graham Cracker in it, must be tiny amount. I can't find it.";;;
S'mores
author: KDH92
title: S’mores minus everything
text;;;: I was excited to try this and highly disappointed that it was basically all fudge. I’ve always wanted to try B&J but I think I’ll stick to Blue Bell;;;

name: S'mores
author: senseievan
title: Unmatched.
text;;;: My absolute favorite flavor. I hunt for it. I’m addicted to the toasted marshmallow. I wish my grocery store would stock it but they don’t respond.;;;

name: S'mores
author: sammy5
title: Best flavor
text;;;: I just recently tried S’more for the first time. It is amazing! By far my favorite flavor. Doesn’t seem to be in many stores around me though:(;;;

name: S'mores
author: Asa17
title: Chocolate too much
text;;;: The chocolate ice cream over powers everything else. I was really hoping for gobs of marshmallow and chunks of Graham. Really disappointed:(;;;

name: S'mores
title: Perfect Name
text;;;: This is my Favorite Ben & Jerry’s flavor. It flows so perfect the melted marshmallows the graham crackers. I’ve been in love since 2011.;;;

name: S'mores,Kathy,2018-03-06,5,My favorite...,0,0,"S'mores is the best,and I can't find it anymore!! They use to have ""Marsha,Marsha Marshmellow"" and I loved that one but its discontinued.";;;
S'mores
author: smith_z0301
title: Delicious
text;;;: This has been my favorite ice cream for years! No other brand seems to make s’mores flavored ice cream as good as Ben and Jerry’s does.;;;

name: S'mores
author: Kayla1027
title: Perfect Convo
text;;;: My Favorite combo ice cream in the world. I use to get this when it was called Marsha Marsha Mashmello! So happy they brought it back.;;;

name: S'mores
author: Gimmiemore
title: Love this!!!
text;;;: Just bought this on a whim and fell in love with it only thing would be more gram cracker that crunchiness is amazing thank you;;;

name: S'mores
author: Jamie76
title: Best flavor ever
text;;;: This is the best ice cream flavor ever!!! I have zero interest in trying any other flavors. It’s smores or nothing for me!!;;;

name: S'mores
author: Nicole63
title: The best ice cream ever
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream ever! I am a chocolate lover and the mix of marshmallow cream and gram cracker is so yummy♥️;;;

name: S'mores
author: Stillannoyed
title: This should be a flagship flavor.
text;;;: This should be a flavor found in every store that sells B&J. It’s easily the best flavor. Nothing like it in the world.;;;

name: S'mores
author: jj212
title: No marsh or graham
text;;;: I bought this last night and was disappointed. Just tastes like chocolate ice cream- no marshmallows or graham taste.;;;

name: S'mores,KrissyP,2018-12-15,1,Doesn’t taste anything like s’mores,0,3,"More like cookies and cream than s’mores. Disappointing. No marshmallow chunks or graham cracker, no toasty flavor.";;;
S'mores,Gaby,2020-06-21,5,All-Time Favorite,0,0,"This is my absolute favorite flavor of ice cream, not just Ben & Jerry's! So hard to find, but absolutely amazing!";;;
S'mores
author: Florida
title: My favorite!
text;;;: This is my absolute favorite flavor! It has the best graham cracker (taste and texture) and great chocolate!;;;

name: S'mores
author: JennD
title: Best Ice Cream
text;;;: This is my absolute favorite flavor. I hate that it’s impossible to find in stores or online. Bring it back!!;;;

name: S'mores
author: Barry
title: I love it
text;;;: My favorite. I buy all I can find when I go to the grocery store. As a result I keep buying bigger shirts.;;;

name: S'mores,denverdelish,2020-03-21,5,Best flavor ever!!,0,0,"This is the most delicious ice cream flavor I’ve ever tasted, Ben and Jerry’s or otherwise! Must try!!!!!!";;;
S'mores
author: Angie Mottk
title: One of my top faves
text;;;: This is my go to ice cream when I can’t decide a flavor. I love the graham cracker and marshmallow swirl.;;;

name: S'mores,nugget,2018-05-31,1,Disappointment,0,1,"I love smores everything but this ice cream just tastes like chocolate. So disappointing, what a waste.";;;

author: kitkatsanz
title: My favorite flavor!
text;;;: This has to be one of my all time favorite flavors! But it's now totally impossible to find now :(;;;

name: S'mores
author: Augatino
title: Better than them all
text;;;: When this was in stores I bought it all summer long. I'm hoping this will come back on the market;;;

name: S'mores,Jenn1245,2019-04-05,5,My absolute favorite,0,0,"The perfect s'mores ice cream, it is a great late night snack and I never want to share my pint";;;
S'mores
author: Lexiiii
title: 10/10 would buy
text;;;: I loveeeee this ice creammmmm. Please gettt! I love the flavor and there ice is just the best!;;;

name: S'mores

text;;;: This is my absolute favorite Ben and Jerry’s flavor. This dethroned Chubby hubby as my fav.;;;

title: Best Flavor

text;;;: I wish they would bring this version back to the stores or sell it in gallon tubs!;;;

text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream of all time. I’ve been obsessed with it for years.;;;

text;;;: Love this flavor!! Love the marshmallow graham cracker combo.;;;

S'mores

title: The BEST. ****Not to be confused with Gimme S'more
text;;;: This is my favorite! Only thing is its soooo hard to find :(;;;

text;;;: So super love this! My favorite in the ENTIRE world!;;;
