title: wish was different
text;;;: It was way to much chocolate I hated it !!!!!!!!!!;;;

name: S'mores,PamPammiePamela,2020-08-26,5,Most Incredible Flavor Ever - nothing compares,0,0,"This is absolutely the best ice cream flavor ever - from B&J or any ice cream company, period. I believe it has been discontinued because I cannot find it at any of my area grocery stores.";;;
Salted Caramel Almond
author: Naomi
title: Please meet this flavor!!!!
text;;;: I bought this a couple days ago and am obsessed! However I'm scared because it says exclusive flavor and I've never loved one of your flavore this much (which is saying something!!!!) What can I do to make sure you keep it???;;;

name: Salted Caramel Almond
author: Libby
title: IN LOVE!!!!
text;;;: I just bought this today! The most perfect Ben and Jerry blend and I have been trying all of them! Im also sad/scared that its an exclusive flavor. Please don't take it away from me.;;;

name: Salted Caramel Almond,Kimmist13,2017-07-31,5,Yum-mazing!,3,0,"This was reccomended to me last night at a store in napa and I don't write reviews for much but I had to for this one. Hands down the best ice cream I've ever had. Sweet, salty, creamy and crunchy and the best flavor ever. I hope I can find it in stores! Love love love it!";;;
Salted Caramel Almond,gjrosinski,2017-06-05,5,Spectacularly Delicious!,3,0,"First Time Trying This Flavor and Must Again Say, ""Spectacularly Delicious!""";;;

Salted Caramel Almond,itsicecreamtimd,2019-01-05,5,Thank you for listening,1,0,"I sent a request in for an ice cream similar to this one (except I named it Rich n Thicc) and ending up stumbling into this flavor while on vacation in Colorado and it made my heart so happy but most of all it was absolutely DELICIOUS!!! thank you for this amazing flavor, please make it a permanent one!!!";;;

Salted Caramel Almond,Clairissr,2019-07-19,5,Absolute best flavour!,1,0,"I bought this flavour for a friend who loves salted caramel and fell in love! I feel like the name just doesn’t do justice to the deliciousness within. Crunchy almonds, crispy chocolate, and caramel swirls that aren’t overly sweet - just perfection!";;;

Salted Caramel Almond,Retrac,2017-09-20,5,Best flavor since Mudslide,1,0,"This is my first review and honestly I never thought that I'd ever write a review on a Ben and Jerrys flavor. However, this flavor is awesome. Great flavor of the salted caramel, texture from the almonds and all around awesome. Keep it.";;;

Salted Caramel Almond,evie1234,2018-02-18,5,BEST FLAVOR I'VE HAD!!!,1,0,"I bought this a few weeks ago, and I became obsessed! I went back to the store though, and it wasn't there (exclusive flavor?) Hope they bring it back... it's the only one I like!!!!";;;
Salted Caramel Almond
author: Charlie
title: Must Have
text;;;: Wanted to try something other than my favorite coffee flavor and I was shocked at how much I loved this ice cream. I honest would choose it over coffee flavor which has been my fav for 10+ yrs. I wish I could buy stock in this flavor just to make sure you never stop selling it. Please keep this flavor. I can't express enough how happy I am to have something I know will always please me. KEEP THIS FLAVOR AVAILABLE!;;;

name: Salted Caramel Almond,xxerii,2019-11-09,5,PERFECT!,0,0,"Found this Diamond in Safeway Kauai, Hawaii";;;

Salted Caramel Almond,CatNamedIceCream,2019-08-06,5,The Ultimate B&J Flavor,0,0,"I have always enjoyed Ben & Jerry’s ice cream, but most of the time, they are a bit too sweet for my taste. The Salted Caramel Almond is perfect. It is sweet, obviously, but not overwhelming. I almost couldn't stop myself from eating the whole pint in one sitting. This flavor needs to be added to the regular rotation!";;;
Salted Caramel Almond
author: One For the Road
title: Hmmmmm
text;;;: Not sure what to make out of this flavor. The ingredients say almond slivers. What I got was more like crushed almonds or small almond pieces. They gave the ice cream a 'gritty' texture which was not pleasing to my tongue nor teeth. Not sure if I got a 'crazy' batch but doubt if I will try again.;;;

name: Salted Caramel Almond,Lover of the SCA,2020-08-14,5,Where has this been all these years??,0,0,"I've been quite reluctant to try B&J ice cream, because it always appeared to have flavors that didn't quite appeal to me. Well...you got me, you finally got me! This Salted Caramel Almond...whew!! Awesomeness!!! Please don't take this away.";;;
Salted Caramel Almond
author: aldahl
title: Amazing!!
text;;;: This is my absolute favorite flavor! Great combination. I would even be happy without the chocolate bits in there because the ice cream with almonds paired with the caramel is amazing on its own. PLEASE never get rid of this flavor!!!;;;

name: Salted Caramel Almond
author: DES1980
title: Disappointing!
text;;;: I bought the salted caramel almond because I love salted caramel. The one I purchased really lacked caramel. It was more vanilla ice cream with slivered almonds and chocolate chunks. Did I just purchase a dud?;;;

name: Salted Caramel Almond,Dimarie16,2018-04-20,5,Love everything about this flavor!,0,0,"This is the ONLY flavor I ever buy, and over the past 2 weeks NOWHERE has it anymore and I am sooo upset! I’m assuming it was discontinued since its an exclusive flavor?? Please keep it forever!!!!";;;

Salted Caramel Almond,PaladinJasmine,2019-04-01,5,My favorite so far!,0,0,"Perfect amount of everything. Not too much caramel, not too much chocolate. But best of all are the almonds. Just slivers but they make a big impact.";;;
Salted Caramel Almond
author: Amic1250
title: Amazing!
text;;;: This might be my new favorite Ben and Jerry’s flavor. I love the big chocolate chunks and lots of almonds!;;;

name: Salted Caramel Almond,policyman,2018-08-31,5,KEEP THIS FLAVOR!,0,0,"This is a fabulous one! My absolute favorite flavor, hands down! Send it to more places in San Francisco!";;;
Salted Caramel Almond
author: Trav
title: Best ice cream I’ve ever had.
text;;;: Ben and Jerry’s really got this one right. By far my favorite that they’ve ever made. Keep it up guys!!;;;

name: Salted Caramel Almond,Fuchsia,2018-01-10,5,Simple But Delicious,0,0,"I love this one. The caramel and almonds are so yummy, and it’s not too chocolatey. So good.";;;
Salted Caramel Almond
author: yeeyee69
title: Terrific ice cream
text;;;: This tastes great. wonderful product. 10/10 i would definetly buy this product again;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: janetec
text;;;: I give it a 4 star only because I think they should put more strawberries . Flavor is very good but lacks the fact that is strawberry cheesecake and it is a bit pricey.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,brandymaria,2019-09-24,5,,0,0,"This ice cream is breath takingley good!! It taste just like a cheesecake with fresh strawberries in it. I'm so happy to have found this kind because I make a lot of homemade shakes for my family especially on the weekend and when I brought this home for the first time I fixed them some on a Friday night and I looked and it was gone on Saturday night. That's how much they liked it and still like it, I put it in the back part of the freezer and put something in front of it so it will last longer than a day. Lol! I would highly recommend this brand and flavor of icecream to everyone and I will definitely be buying more of it!";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake,Kuhree,2018-12-31,4,My Second Favorite B&J Flavor,14,1,"Strawberry Cheesecake flavor was one of the first I ever tried from Ben and Jerry's, and I loved it.";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
title: STRWBRY CHZCKE !!!!
text;;;: I’m convinced this flavor of ben and jerry’s will create world peace. I hope it comes in slices/bar form or any other kind! NEED TO STOCK MY FREZER FULL! i eat this while binging netflix!;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: tom_s
text;;;: Im a Huge Ben & Jerry's Ice Cream fan! Its been my favorite brand for as long as i can remember and Im lucky enough to be one of the few places with a B&J's ice cream shop. But this flavor in particular has been my go to for years. Very rarely do i switch it up( unless its a different cheesecake flavor) . they really hit the nail on the head with this one. I have yet to find another brand of cheesecake ice cream that even comes close to comparison with B&J's. Their ice creams are usually around 5-7 bucks for a pint depending on if you get it at a grocery store or a convenience store but its worth the money.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,Beth1981,2019-09-24,5,The Best Strawberry Cheesecake Ice cream!,7,0,"I have been absolutely in love with this stuff every since the first time I tried it about 7 years ago. I have tried other brands of strawberry cheesecake ice cream when the store was out of ben & jerry's brand, and Ben & Jerry's is far superior to those because most of them use a strawberry jelly-like swirl instead of actual chunks of strawberry like Ben & Jerry's.";;;

Strawberry Cheesecake,ChrisColby,2018-10-07,3,"Strawberry, not so cheesecake.",7,1,"I love the idea of a strawberry cheesecake ice cream, but only one of those components really shine here. The strawberry flavor greatly overpowers the cheesecake, resulting in what tastes like a sweeter strawberry ice cream than a true hybrid. The graham cracker crumbs are a stand out, but even then, there's not quite enough. A decent flavor.";;;

Strawberry Cheesecake,catjthis,2020-06-24,5,,0,0,"Oh my God this is a problem! This ice cream is sooo freaking good I wanna cry! I've walked past this flavor so many times thinking it would be blah. Well is not... it doesn't taste super intense like cheesecake, it a more creamy and sweet taste that's slightly different but way better. Almost like a strawberry milkshake. It has frozen dry strawberries in it and huge chunks of tasty Graham crackers. I literally can't get enough!";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: E172
title: What happened to the cheesecake pieces?!
text;;;: This used to be my favorite. I haven't had it in 5 years so when I saw that it had come back I didn't waste any time splurging on it. It tastes almost the same but feels really thick and weird. That's probably because the cheesecake pieces were replaced with cheesecake flavored ice cream. I'm so disappointed.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,Mmbates,2017-09-09,5,Absolutely LOVE it,3,0,"I'm a huge Ben & Jerrys fan, half baked was always my go to flavor since I'm a chocolate fan. However, my boyfriend started getting strawberry cheesecake and after one bite, I'll never get any other flavor again. It's delicious, the graham crackers complete it. Would definitely recommend trying it! So refreshing.";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake,Tim1,2019-01-09,4,Delicious flavor,4,0,"I agree, very yummy, but need to double the amount of Graham cracker in it! Would be 5 stars if that happened!";;;

Strawberry Cheesecake,Rachie,2018-06-15,5,Totally tastes like cheesecake! Love this flavor,2,0,"I am a huge cheesecake fan, so obviously had to try this flavor. And I gotta say, I was definitely not disappointed. The base tastes so much like cheesecake..there's the perfect amount of strawberries throughout..and the graham swirl is just enough to be like a crust. Everything about this flavor is perfect. I'm one who almost always adds some type of syrup for a topping, but this one doesn't need anything!";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: DeniseJack87
title: Yummy
text;;;: This is my favorite but I would love it even more if there was more crust in the ice cream. Sometimes I may get a pint and there is really no crust at all in it...;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,jmarsenault1982,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"I'm in love with the crust part like little crumbles with strawberries and a vanilla ish ice cream, so it's like heaven in your mouth. I wish there was a little more of the crumble part in the ice cream cause it's not proportioned right. Keep killin it. Hope this helps";;;

Strawberry Cheesecake,LBeez,2018-06-30,5,The best!,2,0,"I usually go for Chocolate Fudge Brownie or Half Baked because I'm a chocolate freak. My husband brought home Strawberry Cheesecake for me, because our store was out of the other two, and OMG, this stuff is amazing! Definitely my new favorite! I ALWAYS have a pint on hand because I can't live without it! This ice cream seriously makes me happy when I'm down!";;;

Strawberry Cheesecake,Jadicorn,2018-01-26,5,I LOVE this flavor,2,0,"I’ve been eating the same flavor of ben & jerry’s ice cream for the last five years, with the occasional pint of chunky monkey, and the strawberry cheesecake flavor is my absolute flavor. it’s never done me wrong i just love the little bits of graham cracker. keep doing what you’re doing ben & jerry’s";;;

Strawberry Cheesecake,Mandelay,2018-10-07,3,Could be better,4,1,"This is good, but the graham cracker isn't very thick and it no longer has the cheesecake pieces. When eating it, it feels like it's missing something.";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: Whyamihere
title: Use to be my favorite
text;;;: This use to be my favorite. Lately it seems like they have no graham cracker though. Disappointing....;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,okayevelyn,2017-12-04,5,Makes my mouth water just thinking about it,2,0,"This is the best Ben and Jerry’s flavor in my opinion. Oh my gosh, I have to buy it a lot because it’s heavenly! However, I wish there were more strawberry bits.";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: Soccerdad
title: So delicious!
text;;;: I love the flavors soaring through this wonderful ice cream! Fresh strawberry and graham crust swirls all in a tasty cheesecake ice cream. So delicious!;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
title: Favorite
text;;;: This is my absolute favorite ice cream. It's delicious. I especially love the graham cracker swirl. I don't know how they do it but I'm glad they do. :D;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: Darkphoenix18
title: My current favorite
text;;;: One day I had a craving a strawberry cheesecake and was gonna get a shake that would have sufficed but was meh. We went to the grocery store and I found this. Next thing I know I was stocking up on this flavor. It’s sooo goood! Omg!;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: abbym
title: NEEDS TO BE AVAILABLE IN PINTS IN CANADA
text;;;: THIS IS BY FAR THE BEST FLAVOUR I HAVE EVER TASTED. I NEED THIS TO BE AVAILABLE IN PINTS IN CANADA. I BELIEVE IT WOULD SELL WELL. BY SELL WELL I MEAN I WILL PROBABLY BUY EVERY SINGLE PINT AVAILABLE IF I COULD.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: Eyajc
title: Freaking delicious
text;;;: I bought this yesterday and managed to finish the wholle pint. This is by far one of my favorite Ben And Jerry's Ice cream flavors so far. If I could change anything I would add more strawberries.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,Danni M,2017-08-22,5,Strawberry and Graham cracker bliss!!!,1,0,"I've been eating this for years and each time I eat this ice cream I fall in love all over again. Strawberry Cheesecake Ice cream is the very best. My favorite, I love this Ice Cream!!!!!!!";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: Carla
title: Strawberry?
text;;;: I was really excited to try this flavor because I've never met a Ben and Jerry's product I haven't loved. Unfortunately there is a first time for everything. The graham cracker and cheesecake flavors are so over powering you get no strawberry flavor. The result is so sickly sweet. There is no balance. Really bummed out!;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: Boowhoo
title: My fav but
text;;;: I bought this at target and at first I was overjoyed with how tasty it was but then I realized that my ice cream was half empty literally the bottom half was air;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,buzz,2019-03-20,4,"Not Enough GRAHAM CRACKER SWIRL, Please ADD MORE!",2,1,The flavor and premium quality ingredients are definitely superb except for the strawberries. They suck! Horrible texture! They gotta go! I spit them out when I eat this flavor.;;;
Strawberry Cheesecake,Breezymiss,2017-10-03,5,My new fave,1,0,"I'm usually go with Half-baked or American Dream Cone, but this one wins. The graham cracker swirl is it brings it all together.";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: Nanalove
title: Sooo Good
text;;;: I love everthjng about this ice cream I actually wish it had more graham cracker swirl in it it’s so perfect highly addictive;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: Vsalas2
title: Delicious
text;;;: Cheesecake flavor isn’t very strong but the strawberry and crust crumble is delicious;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: CaptainKitten
title: My favorite!
text;;;: My #1 go too! I'd eat it all in one sitting but then I'd be sad when it's gone. ;);;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,FuzzyGut,2018-10-29,5,Great ice cream,0,0,"This is a great flavor! The ice cream base is rich and sweet without being over the top, and the flavor is natural, not cheap and artificial like some other brands going after the same cheesecake profile. The strawberry mix-Ins are very yummy. It really hits the spot when you’re looking for strawberry cheesecake without wanting to eat actual cheesecake, unless you have a few scoops next to a slice of cheesecake... that sounds good so I’ll be back a little later :)";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: Mack
title: Love It!
text;;;: Favorite Ice Cream of theirs. Tastes vary good. Try it.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
title: Amazing
text;;;: Its so delcious and super amazing and sooooo gooddd;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: Danyel
title: My FAVORITE
text;;;: By far my favorite Ben & Jerry’s. Truly delicious.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,Dapper Dan,2018-10-05,1,Where's the strawberry?,2,4,"Ate about a quarter of this. So far i got the cheesecake and grahams. Still no strawberry, kinda missing the main ingredient.";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: ashrod26
title: Disappointing
text;;;: I love love love cheesecake flavored ice cream but this strawberry cheesecake did not live up to my standards at all. I was disappointed in this flavor as I love Ben and Jerry’s ice cream!;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: DianaLeigh128
title: Where's the Cheesecake?
text;;;: This would be my favorite flavor if it actually had cheesecake bits or cheesecake flavor ice cream... all you get are strawberries and graham crackers. Not my idea of cheesecake at all.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,Rebel of Mars 81,2019-07-17,5,Great Cheesecake Flavor,1,1,"The very first flavor of Ben & Jerry's, will always be a favorite. I think a lightly sweeten strawberry puree swirled in would be great compared to the strawberry chunks.";;;

Strawberry Cheesecake,zoey,2018-08-21,5,life changing,0,0,"this is my new favorite ice cream. tbh it doesn’t have an extreme cheesecake flavor, but the strawberry and the graham cracker swirl is to die for. the graham cracker tasted like a real pie crust. the ice cream does taste a little bit like cheesecake but it’s not overpowering. everything about it is delicious.only suggestion would be to add more strawberries.";;;

Strawberry Cheesecake,PhoenixRises,2019-09-01,5,Another old favorite!,0,0,"This one is another old favorite from B&J. I just wrote about how I first fell in love with B&J because of chocolate fudge brownie, so this is probably the second flavor I fell in love with. I also forgot how good this was until I got it on a Royal Caribbean cruise a few years ago and I started getting it again. It's a flavor that I will always come back to.";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: tickldkfiifo
title: Delicious
text;;;: This is exactly how I remember it! Cheesecake and graham crackers bring this to life.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,strawberrycheesybabe97,2020-03-28,5,If this gets discontinued I'll probably die,0,0,"If grass is green and the earth is round, then this is Ben and Jerry's...nay...the world of dessert's best flavor of all time. OF. ALL. TIME. The truth is, no one else makes anything like this - the strawberry is juicy and the graham cracker bits are buttery. If heaven were a place on earth, it would be found at the bottom of this pint.";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: natassjag
text;;;: This is the best ice-cream ever!!! Strawberry Cheesecake is my favorite flavor and not too many brands make this flavor or does it taste this great. But Ben & Jerrys has the best tasting Strawberry Cheesecake flavor ice-cream ever with really cheesecake chunks in it. I highly recommend this flavor and brand because its the best!!!;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,taylormarriiee,2019-10-22,5,,0,0,"The only ice cream I really like is Ben & Jerrys, their ice cream is just the best to me. This flavor which I dont even know if they make anymore as its not sold by me anymore and the chocolate chip cookie dough are my favorite. This one definitely tastes like a strawberry cheesecake in ice cream its so so good and I miss it";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: indiac4f44
text;;;: This remains one of my all time favorites. The texture of this ice cream is amazing and Ben and Jerry's gets it right with the mixture of flavors. The sweet cream of the cheesecake ice cream. The cool strawberries combined with the saltiness of the graham cracker crust is an amazing flavor profile and the perfect spoonful.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,jaida_johns,2019-08-12,5,,0,0,"Probably my favorite ice cream flavor to date. It's hard to resist eating the entire tub when it's so delicious. I love the bits of strawberry and cheesecake in this;" in particular
author: the cheesecake is so freaking delicious. The ice cream itself is sweet and creamy and is really good overall. Would absolutely buy again.""";;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,whittybitty247,2020-05-28,4,,0,0,"I really like Strawberry Cheesecake in any ice cream but this was delicious if you enjoy real tasting strawberries. I get this product regularly because of it's simple small size, but I prefer others over this as I don't care for seeds so often. Sometimes I feel like there is no cheesecake which is also disappointing.";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: MandyLou
title: THE BEST OF THE BEST
text;;;: This is my all-time favorite flavor from B&J! It has the perfect taste and balance of flavors. The only thing that I could say would improve this flavor is more of the graham cracker swirl as that is the best part and I am a “tunnel-digger” when it comes to eating this ice cream! Following the graham cracker swirl!;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: Tricia
title: Very disappointing!!! No strawberries!!!
text;;;: What happened to the pieces of cheesecake? Will never purchase this again - big mistake. It appears we just overpaid for graham cracker crust cheesecake “flavored” ice cream. :( NOTHING like the pics on the container. Not something we EVER expected from Ben and Jerry‘s - shame in you - you can do SO MUCH better. :(;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,Hananhf,2020-07-21,5,Love it!,0,0,"Ben and Jerry’s is more on the expensive side. So I either wait till it goes on sale or unless I REALLY want it. When I buy this flavor, the pint is ONLY for me. I live that there’s real cheesecake in there. As I’m writing this review, I can taste the ice cream. One of my favorite Strawberry cheesecake ice creams,";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: Lexa
title: What happened to the Cheesecake Pieces!???
text;;;: Strawberry cheesecake used to be one of my favorites.... but what happened to those gooey yummy sweet chunky pieces of the cheesecake!? Digging the graham cracker swirl but really miss the cheesecake pieces. It complimented the ice cream so well. Still got love for you B&J. New favorite.... Netflix and Chilled.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,morganh7c3a,2020-02-04,5,,0,0,"O.M.G. I didn't think I would like this as much as I do, but it's so good!!! Has the right amount of strawberry pieces, cheesecake ice cream, and Graham cracker swirls, which are my favorite!!! Honestly, my favorite cheesecake ice cream. I would definitely recommend if looking for something different. So good!!";;;

Strawberry Cheesecake,jammin0127,2020-07-30,5,,0,0,"This is my all time FAVORITE ice cream. It's so rich and smooth. The graham cracker swirl add the right amount of texture to the ice cream and the strawberry chunks are a nice treat. When I was pregnant, I literally ate this ice cream for breakfast. It's just the right amount of sweetness to curb the craving.";;;

Strawberry Cheesecake,alexjftz,2019-12-25,5,,0,0,"This is one of my favorite ice cream flavors - great graham cracker swirl throughout plus strawberry and cheesecake pieces. It is sweet and creamy, but feels like such a treat. I have to pace myself and try to make a pint last a few times. I actually got to try this FRESH at the factory in Vermont";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: widowvenus
text;;;: Frozen heaven in a tiny little tub. Every one has their very own favorite Ben and Jerry's Ice cream flavor and this one happens to be mine. That being said. No I don't like sharing. It's a little bit pricey depending on where you buy it but when something taste's this good who cares what it cost.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,fashunscape,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"I have never been someone who could finish any ice cream serving in one sitting. But let me tell you, I can go through this within one Hour. It is truly my favorite ice cream, I am constantly repurchasing this flavor. Its not too sweet and the cheesecake bits are heavenly. Absolutely obsessed.";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: aleonard0228
text;;;: Ben & Jerry's Strawberry cheesecake is delicious. It's the right amount of sweet and the graham cracker crust mixed in is my favorite part of this ice cream. It is a bit high priced so I usually only buy it once in awhile but it is definitely worth the money if you like strawberry cheesecake.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: memberefe9a
text;;;: I was recommended this ice cream many times and I finally got the chance to try it. It is sooo good. It has a nice strawberry flavor and the crust that is in it is so delicious. The crust tastes like real crust that is on a strawberry cheesecake. This is now one of my favorite ice creams.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,aymar1,2020-05-12,4,,0,0,"This flavor was my go to flavor to treat myself after exams. I love how they have mini cups since some brands don't have single serve cups. These can be affordable, but look out for sales. Overall satisfied with the flavors they carry. If you haven't had Ben & Jerry's yet, go try some!";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: brymeshaf
text;;;: I literally went to the 711 store and bought this ice cream for 2 weeks straight while in college lol. It is so amazing!! I love the frozen strawberries and the cheesecake pieces. It literally taste just like your eating new your style cheesecake. So yummy and my all time favorite!;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: MMoyer
title: Delicious!
text;;;: So I hate strawberries but love strawberry flavored things and my gosh- this hits the spot. The real strawberries in it don’t even matter to me. The rest of it is so freaking good;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: katie_scoville
text;;;: Ben & Jerrys will forever be my favorite brand of ice cream and this flavor will ALWAYS be my go to when I dont care about the calories! Lol but everything in moderation! This flavor has the perfect amount of cheesecake chunks to go along its the strawberry swirls. So yummy.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,kelsr10,2020-05-05,5,,0,0,"This is by far my favorite Ben & Jerry's ice cream flavor. I'm a little sensitive to dairy, so I try to avoid it, but I would gladly endure a night of stomach pain for this ice cream. The day Ben & Jerry's makes a non-dairy version of this will be the best day of my life.";;;

Strawberry Cheesecake,garyc8,2020-07-24,5,,0,0,"This is the one icecream I can say Ive been purchasing for YEARS. Both in store and in the grocery store. Its perfect honestly. Its not too sweet, the strawberries taste fresh every time. No artificial flavor to it. Its just a great brand and this is my favorite flavor";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: brittanys214
text;;;: This is my favorite Ben & Jerry's Ice Cream! I love this ice cream soooo much! My favorite part is the real pieces of cheesecake throughout the tub! This is an ice cream where it is hard to not eat the whole pint in one sitting. Highly recommend trying this ice cream!;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: beautifulatanyage
text;;;: What can I say about this Ben & Jerry's Ice cream creamy delicious!! the (strawberry swirl and vanilla Ice cream) just melts into your taste buds. I'm a big fan of this Ice cream Ben & Jerry's is my all-time favorite Ice cream easy on the wallet heavenly on the tongue;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,,2020-05-08,5,,0,0,"usually get at the supermarket when they are 2x$5 and I try to make it last a week but with these flavors is so diffuclt to resist, just please know that the size of the container is not 1 portion, you have to split it or you will be eating a week worth of calories!";;;

Strawberry Cheesecake,,2020-06-13,5,,0,0,"This is by far my favorite icecream EVER. And I've eaten allot of icecream. I've tried other brands of ""strawberry cheesecake"" and none even came close. It is well worth the few dollars extra. Ben and Jerry's absolutely know how to please their customers taste buds.";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: gisellera9b7
text;;;: I really like strawberry flavored ice cream terralina sweet and hits the spot after dinner or when I'm having a sweet tooth I would improve this product but making a bigger container and it's my favorite ice cream brand as of forevers and it's going to stay that way;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: sarahg256
text;;;: How can you go wrong with Ben and Jerrys?! They never disappoint! If you are a cheesecake lover you have GOT to try this flavor! There are HUGE chunks of cheesecake and a perfect amount of strawberries! You wont regret cracking this open after a long day at work!;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: addinew1
text;;;: I LOVE ice cream and these are AMAZING. These are a current favorite. I wish i had them now. I love that B&J is coming out with new candies and flavors. They are definitly affordable. I have a huge sweet tooth so this is amazing for those late night cravings.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: jennys42
text;;;: It literally tastes like a chilly strawberry cheesecake! I love this flavor so much because its not too sweet like the other Ben and Jerrys where its a lot of chocolate and baked goods filled in. This flavor is complex and unique yet simple at the same time.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,lyoung0110,2020-03-06,4,,0,0,"Ben & Jerry's straw berry cheese cake ice cream is a strong, solid offering from them. Slight hint of cheesecake and a moderate amount of strawberry. The cheese cake bits in the ice cream make it great. Would be better with more graham crackers throughout.";;;

Strawberry Cheesecake,operadivainthemaking,2020-07-04,5,,0,0,"This is just ADDICTIVE! If you have an incredible sweet tooth like me, you'll love this. There are chunks of cake and smaller pieces of strawberry in between the vanilla ice cream that will just rock your world. Highly recommended to those who love sweet.";;;

Strawberry Cheesecake,marissap15,2020-02-02,5,,0,0,"I can definitely say Ben and Jerry's as a whole is an amazing brand of ice cream. My favorite flavor is without a doubt, Strawberry Cheesecake and the seasonal flavor, Pumpkin Cheesecake. I love the Strawberry Cheesecake flavor because I love cheesecake.";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: Drewski23
title: Best I've ever had!
text;;;: I used to get either Americone Dream or Half Baked but as soon as I tried Strawberry cheesecake I feel inlove and won't buy anything else... The graham cracker squirrel it's absolutely amazing I just wish they all had equal amounts. 10/10 my favorite!!!;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,yeseniav15,2020-04-19,5,,0,0,"So many great choices! This is my all time favorite! I actually having some as I write this review! I usually get mine from Stater Brothers, and I get the mini sizes as well. I can wat a whole pint no joke!!!! They make the best ice cream!!! A must try!";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: jeennnnv
text;;;: Satisfy cravings when on period. Truly in love with strawberries and cheesecake. My go to aside from the plain old vanilla. I highly recommend this flavor to the lovers of ice cream and strawberries... even though I am lactose intolerant but oh well...;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: KellieB74
title: Love it But now it's Ginger!!!
text;;;: If you could still buy it... It would get 10 stars. Only strawberry ice cream that doesn't make me sick. I can't believe there would discontinue a classic after 15 yrs. No more Ben and Jerry's from me until they bring it back!!! Not one penny for them;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: amgoddess_
text;;;: Our favorite brand of ice cream or frozen yogurt. It can be kind of pricy but you get what you pay for. Always a lot of options as far as flavor goes; which is always a plus. We buy this a few times a month and its what we want for birthdays as well;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: martinisweets
text;;;: The only kind of Ben & Jerrys I buy. I love the way the graham crackers mix with the strawberrys and the sweet ice cream. If youre into strawberry cheesecake it doesnt really taste like one but it has a really good flavor for an ice cream version;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,alwayslindseyxoxo,2019-12-09,5,,0,0,"Hands down my favorite flavor! It is sooooo good! Ive been buying this since I was in college and the flavor has stayed the same over the years. Super creamy, rich, real strawberries. It is amazing! A must try if youre a strawberry lover like me!";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: jasminea43e5
text;;;: I think that Ben & Jerrys is delicious ice cream specially the strawberry cheesecake when I need a late night fix for my sweet tooth I go for this ice cream strawberry cheesecake Ben & Jerrys I am over all satisfied with this delicious ice cream;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
text;;;: So rich creamy and decadent!!! I love it! Its so delicious with pieces of cream cheese& crust! Its absolutely perfect the way that it is!! I would always catch it on sale BOGO! I would definitely recommend buying it if you want a decadent treat!;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,cassandrai4,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"This is my absolute favorite B&Js ice cream flavor. My second favorite is Tonight Dough. Not too sweet, has the graham cracker swirl, and is so creamy and rich. This flavor reminds me of mid-west summer nights on the porch with a glass of ros.";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: theonly_ali
text;;;: I LOVE this ice cream! The graham cracker swirls mixed with an almost cake batter like base is divine. Soon as you add the frozen strawberries it really sets it off. I can eat the whole thing in one sitting and wont feel a lick of guilt lol;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,karissalauren,2020-05-20,5,,0,0,"I love this flavor of Ben and Jerrys. I do not like chocolate that much, so I try to go for vanilla based ice creams. But usually they have bananas in them and I hate bananas, so this was the perfect flavor for me and its not super sweet.";;;

Strawberry Cheesecake,mgdaviss,2020-06-26,5,,0,0,"Addicting!!!! I love me some strawberry cheesecake and this ice cream is about as good as actual cheesecake of you cant find any or dont want to make it! Amazing. Definitely a problem because I eat the whole thing, well half it. Try it!!";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: jenniemackie_
text;;;: One of my all time favorite ice cream flavored and Ben and Jerrys just does it so right. There is not too much strawberry nor too much cheesecake. It is a great combination and the ice cream makes it even better. I definitely recommend.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: Sugar rush
title: No cheesecake. No strawberries. What is this??
text;;;: No cheesecake pieces. No strawberries. I’m not sure what I just ate. Tasted like old yogurt. No thank you.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: bexissick
text;;;: Literary my favorite ice cream. They smell alone is amazing and the taste is perfection. They have real chunks of cheese cake and strawberry in it. It is expensive but for ice cream this good I'd say it's completely worth the money.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: nayelid11
text;;;: Ive tried several Ben & Jerrys flavors and this one is by far my favorite. The crunchiness of the cheesecake with the strawberry flavor is just perfect. This ice cream isnt as sweet as all the others which is probably the best part.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: nicolec7247
text;;;: I absolutely love Ben and Jerrys ice cream it is expensive for the amount you get but it is delicious and it has a huge variety of flavors to choose from. Compared to other brands this has more cheesecake bites then ice cream bites.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: katys0275
text;;;: This is the best ice cream Ive ever had. The cookie parts and the strawberry are all just so perfect. I cant even explain how amazing this stuff tastes. I have it stocked in my freezer at all times!! Highly recommend trying it out;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,jbxby,2020-01-08,3,,0,0,"Honestly it was amazing, went on great and gave an overall amazing effect! It is better than others Ive tried so I recommend! I am a first user so it took some getting used too but other than that I would be buying again soon!";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: sheilamf76a
text;;;: Omg this was soooo delicious. Bought it on a whim and glad I did. There are even bits of graham crackers swirled in it. Very smooth and light. Pricey but worth it once in a while. If you like strawberries then this is a must.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: maryama1a01
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream ever to exist. It has the most rich buttery cheesecake taste with the sweetness of strawberry complimenting it and the yummiest graham cracker ribbon completes it. It's hard to find this though;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,rayfidalgo,2019-10-23,5,,0,0,"I LOVE STRAWBERRIES! Thats my favorite fruit, ever! I tried this one and Im soooo in love, cant live without it! Ive got eat at least twice a month so I can be happy! I bought at Walmart and its really cheap, and yummy!!!";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: brionap
text;;;: Ben and Jerrys cheesecake ice cream is my all time favorite ice cream. It tastes just like strawberry cheesecake which is also my favorite I used to walk to the store and get this all the time and I still enjoy it today.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,ardenr1,2020-01-01,5,,0,0,"Never would I have ever believed that a strawberry ice cream would be one of my favorites, but this ice cream is great. Theres just swirls of this good graham-crackery goodness and its amazing. Would recommend for sure.";;;

Strawberry Cheesecake,nardiaa,2020-01-04,5,,0,0,"This is my favorite flavor of Ben and Jerrys. One of the reasons I took a trip to Vermont, was to visit the factory there, so yes Im a fan. Its great, just enough cheese cake and authentic strawberry taste. Id buy again";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: hawm
text;;;: Tastes just like a strawberry cheesecake but in a frozen form. This ice cream love is happy with cheesecake flavors in my mouth. Its sweeter than the typical ice-cream because of the cheesecake but an occasional treat!;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: clarar30
text;;;: I love the graham cracker crumble with strawberries in this delectable treat! I have yet to find a Ben and Jerrys I dont like although I tend to stick to what I know I like Im confident that Id like most all flavors.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: natalief57c3
text;;;: The strawberry cheesecake flavor of Ben & Jerry's is by far my favorite! It tastes exactly like strawberry cheesecake. It can be hard to find in some stores but the next time you see it you should definitely try it!;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,Koni,2019-12-11,4,One of the BEST flavours ever!,0,0,"One of the 1st Ben & Jerrys ice cream I ate, along with Phis food and Cookie dough (which are great to). It was the best feeling I ever had. Personaly, I think its even better then a normal strawberry cheescake.";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: merissak2
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream. It tastes just like strawberry cheesecake and I love that they sell it in small individual tubs. If I'm having a bad day i just swing by the store and get a whole one for myself.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,nanah6,2020-05-03,5,,0,0,"Probably the best ice cream brand out there, incredibly accurate and rich flavors. Nice blends of graham cracker mixed in, and a good amount too. As well as strawberry chunks that help tie the flavor together.";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: smcwriter
text;;;: This is one of my top favorite ice creams. When I want something besides chocolate this one is perfect. I love the quality strawberry ice cream and the swirls of graham cracker crust are unique and delicious.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,ianp,2020-04-19,5,,0,0,"This ice cream has the perfect combination of graham cracker swirl and cheesecake chunks throughout it. You definitely will not want to share this one, and if you do, im sure its your not taking it lightly.";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: alexias18
text;;;: I hate actual cheesecake but I live this strawberry cheesecake ice cream. It doesnt taste like actual cheesecake so if thats what you are looking for then Id skip on this one. Its creamy and full of flavor.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: mijalc
text;;;: I try to be careful with what I eat and not eat too much sugar but when Im craving something sweet Ice cream is my go to specially different flavors like this I enjoy the most! Totally recommended to try :);;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: sophiagrace05
text;;;: 100 percent my favorite ice cream by them. This tastes amazing and I could literally eat the whole thing in one setting. It is a good price too. I highly recommend trying this product if you havent before!;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: nataliemarie19
text;;;: Forever my favorite Ben & Jerrys flavor! The pints are usually on the pricey side but trust me its so worth it. The ice cream itself is always so creamy and the additional flavors just make it even better!;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: hitomijd
text;;;: This has been my fav Ben & Jerrys flavor since I was a kid!! The price retails at about $4-7 depending on where you live. I dont get it as much as I used to but when I want ice cream I usually get this one;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,andibrn7,2019-12-28,5,,0,0,"Amazing!!! I eat so much of this ice cream, I just can not stop once I start! It tastes just like cheesecake, and then the addition of strawberry mixes in with gram cracker crust is perfect! So so good!";;;

Strawberry Cheesecake,laurennreadyy,2019-04-05,5,,0,0,"This ice is perfect for a midnight snack! Not too sweet, just sweet enough! It is so yummy and my niece also loves it, when she gets to eat aunties ice its definitely a treat for her! We love it so much!";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: cassiebrahh
text;;;: This is my guilty pleasure when it comes to the ice cream aisle. I love going to froyo places but this is the next best thing and its sooo tasty. A bit healthier than normal ice cream and just as good!;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: Bearsie
title: Best Ben & Jerry’s Flavor!
text;;;: This is THE BEST B&J flavor ever. I only wish I had tried it sooner!! The ice cream has an extra creamy texture. The strawberry is natural tasting and refreshing. Perfect ratio of graham cracker swirl.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: meghannk0041
text;;;: My one and only best strawberry cheesecake ice cream out there. The cheesecake parts are perfect and the crumbliest graham cracker is throughout the whole tub. So delicious!!;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,nootimusprime,2019-12-05,5,,0,0,"The best ice cream ever! Jam packed with so many beautiful things, every bite is an adventure. The cheesecake,is,definitely one of my favorite flavors because of the small cheesecake chunks in it";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: heathersellershender
text;;;: This is one of my biggest guilty pleasure snacks. I can sit down and eat the whole thing. The graham cracker running through it is amazinggggg. Always a winner especially when I find it on sale.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,angel_mariieee,2019-05-02,5,,0,0,"First tried this flavor at the Ben & Jerrys store on Haight-Ashbury in San Francisco when I lived their, and was immediately hooked. My favorite flavor and continue to recommend it to others!!";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: zipsbitaheaven
text;;;: The globs of cheesecake pieces are to die for! Strawberry delightful pieces really add the taste of a true cheesecake to ice cream to make the ultimate dessert! It is a go to ice cream for me!;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,laceem2,2020-05-04,4,,0,0,"SO unhealthy but my favorite ice-cream ever. The reason I give 4 stars is because of the price, I choose to skip out sometimes because it is very pricey compared to other ice-cream products.";;;

Strawberry Cheesecake,shelbyh49,2020-02-05,5,,0,0,"ALL TIME! If you love cheesecake, and love ice cream - you have to try it! Ive had multiple cheesecake ice creams before and nothing compares! Hey-Vee grocery stores often have then in sale!";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: Beannie25
title: My favorite ice cream and brand
text;;;: I have tried other strawberry cheesecake ice cream but nothing beats Ben and Jerry’s. Even if I’m on a diet this has to be my go to for my cheat day. Only wish there came in bigger amounts.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,taylord71,2020-01-03,4,,0,0,"I do not eat dairy often but when I do want a little something I will 9/10 times get this, I love cheesecake too much so the only reason it got a 4 is because I wish it had more cheesecake";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: cassandrad3866
text;;;: Wow of my favorite flavors from Ben and Jerrys. It tastes delicious. Like a strawberry cheesecake in ice cream form. What more could you ask for. I would recommend to anyone its worth it.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: erikam76
text;;;: It has a great taste. I do enjoy when I buy but I dont buy often to due to the fact that it is pricey for a small container. The only improvement is the price cause it tastes great.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: izziwilko
text;;;: Another favorite ice cream. Very creamy and tastes exactly like cheesecake. I love how Ben & Jerrys incorporated pieces of actual cheesecake and pieces of graham crust! Delicious.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: chloec37
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream EVER. So good real chunks of strawberry. The pieces of cheesecake taste amazing and ofc the vanilla ice cream in it is to die for. I would recommend.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: mocah_pocahontas
text;;;: this flavor has been my go to for years now. It is a little pricey for the amount so I only buy it every now and then. they used to have the $1.00 snack cups I'd bring them back!;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: megand115
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream for sure. It is so thick and creamy and has the perfect mix of strawberry and cheesecake. It is probably really bad for my body but is so indulgent.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,Ann26,2020-04-19,3,Where's the strawberry?,0,0,"The small size has strawberries so I purchased the pint size. There is almost no strawberries. The graham cracker swirls are good, it just shouldn't have Strawberry in the name.";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: nishitaa
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream flavor. I usually either go with this brand or chocolate shoppe but chocolate shoppe isnt as well known as this. Love this amazing company as well!;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: ceethrufashion
text;;;: This is one of my favorite flavors next to the chocolate fudge brownie flavor! I wish they had a dairy free option for this one too but I make the sacrifice anyway lol! So good!;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,Tiff76,2019-10-30,5,2 die 4!,0,0,"I absolutely love this ice cream! I'm assuming it's a fav here in San Antonio, Texas bc everywhere I go, the supply is low! I usually buy as many as I can. Thanks Ben n Jerry!";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: xtalvcu
text;;;: Ben & Jerrys Strawberry Cheesecake Ice Cream is my absolute favorite. I even have my husband hooked on it. It is creamy and sweet with gentle surprises of cheesecake pieces;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: diamondh2535
text;;;: My favorite ice cream! No one in my house is allowed to eat this or wed have a problem. Lol I love the cheesecake/ crust swirls in it. The perfect portions in each spoonful;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,marrrre,2019-04-05,5,,0,0,"Omg yum! Ben and jerrys cheesecake is abaolutly amazing, its a lottle pricy but the favor makes up for it, i cant find another cheesacake icecream that is better than this!";;;

Strawberry Cheesecake,teresam25,2019-12-09,5,,0,0,"Ben and Jerry's icecream has always been my all time favorite. The flavors are amazing and loaded with goodies. The only downfall is, they contain a boat load of calories.";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: jamesw11
text;;;: A good treat to get when its hot outside or your just craving ice cream. Good chunks of cheesecake and that graham cracker ribbon is to die for. Always a recommended item!;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: jerryj0c51
text;;;: This ice cream worth every penny !! The cheesecake bites is amazing . I buy this ice cream often when it fits my budget. When I run out I immediately go buy more.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: mariahcer24
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream ever by Ben n jerry! I love the flavor and its alittle expeinve for someone on a budget but Im pregnant so it doesnt matter I love it.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: betsabelr
text;;;: Ben & Jerrys ice cream is so good. It comes in your own personal size cup of ice cream. If you love strawberry cheesecake youll love this ice cream. Its delicious;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,heidi_xo,2020-05-06,5,,0,0,"Great texture and lovely strawberry flavour, sometimes I find the cheesecake part can taste a bit artificial with some brands but that isnt the case with this one";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: angelae16
text;;;: This is another favorite of mine. I love the texture and creaminess of this brand and flavor. Its my second favorite type of ice cream. Ice cream is always good.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: spengza
title: Disappointing
text;;;: Was looking forward to trying this. The strawberries were the tiniest little specks and the graham swirl was overpowering. No balance at all. Very disappointing.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: colleenm17

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: ashleyxmaries

name: Strawberry Cheesecake
author: kryssm
text;;;: This is one of my favorite flavors they make my first was the@cotton candy! The taste of the strawberry is amazing and really does taste like cheese cake!;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,,2019-12-05,4,,0,0,"This is one of my favorite strawberry cheesecake ice creams! Always has a creamy texture, isn't overly sweet, and has a good amount of cheesecake bits!";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake,,2020-04-16,5,,0,0,"One of my favorites from Ben and Jerry's! I love the Graham crackers swirl, it's my favorite part, and how actually get bites of real strawberry in it!";;;
Strawberry Cheesecake
author: destinyg43
text;;;: This was the best thing ever created. Whoever came up with this idea is a genius. If youre a cheesecake and ice cream lover youll love this ice cream.;;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake

name: Strawberry Cheesecake

name: Strawberry Cheesecake

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,britanyp8e09,2020-02-29,5,,0,0,"I am quite an ice cream connoisseur. One of my all time faves is strawberry cheesecake Ben and Jerrys! Its a little pricey, but it is so good!";;;

name: Strawberry Cheesecake,heatherrae1988,2020-01-05,5,,0,0,"10/10 super delicious! I love any ice cream from Ben and Jerry's. I wish they weren't as pricey as they are but then again, it's worth it.";;;

author: China907

text;;;: I buy one every other day. Wish they made it in gallons;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Sarahmarie
title: In love
text;;;: I've been a huge fan of Phish food for 15 or more years. It's been my favorite. But this blew me away. I saw another reviewer state the cookie swirl was too coarse or possibly crystallized. I love the courseness of the cookie swirl it tastes amazing and adds a different texture to all the soft goeyness. I bought and finished this ice cream in the same day. THANK YOU! I always go back to Phish Food. But this I will definitely be going back to.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,,2017-12-12,5,Best icecream I've ever had,13,1,"Haven't been big on icecream in my life time. Only flavor I cared for was cookies and cream. Had no idea I'd LOVE Choc flavor, and mixed with the carmel, such a divine combination. The cookie swirl is mouth watering. The cookie dough is exquisite;" although țhe peanut butter dough is also scrumptious
author: I could live without much of it in the pint. I've gotten pints with very little of the PB dough
date: which is heavenly. I've also gotten pints with lots and lots of PB dough
stars: which I find to be a bit overwhelming. Still
title: it's the flavor I always reach for. Still consider my FAV of all time. Thank you Ben & Jerry's
helpful_yes: & Jimmy Fallon for perfecting a flavor so awesome.""";;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Brittany
title: Ohhh emmm geeeee
text;;;: Honestly all I have to say is this is the best icecream I've ever had. It had gobs of amazement in it. Like wow.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,MeInSBC,2018-03-01,5,My new go-to,4,0,"Look, I just bought this for the first time yesterday, and I have to say, I’m already addicted. This stuff is JUST. SO. GOOD. I love the cookie swirl and the peanut butter dough, I love the ice cream flavor, I love everything is what I’m saying - it’s perfect and B&J please don’t change a thing!! Everything But The... used to be my favorite flavor but they have definitely changed the formula there and I stopped buying it because all I could taste was my bitter memories of how it used to be. So glad I have a replacement flavor that I love even more!!";;;
The Tonight Dough,dough believer,2017-04-13,5,Sooo Good,15,0,"I cannot stop talking to myself with my mouth full of ice cream saying, ""O my gawd, sooo good!""";;;

The Tonight Dough,austin1chase,2018-05-23,2,Why did they change the flavor :( :( !!,5,4,"This ice cream is to be our favorite. We probably right once a week for a year. However the last five we have purchased have had a new taste to it of some sort of fruit, and it has ruined the flavor. We waited A few weeks to that that that sent out, and then we went and bought some more , But it was still the same weird through the aftertaste. For the aftertaste doesn't belong anywhere near brownies or cookies or chocolate ice cream or Oreos. It's gross. Please change the recipe back to the original !!!!!!! We have switched to a different brand of ice cream for now.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: LLHh
title: Excellent...except for weird PB cookie dough
text;;;: I purchased tonight dough a few months ago and everything about it was great. This time the PB cookie dough was horrible. It tastes almost like an artificial banana flavor or how I would image nail polish would taste. Here is a photo of the batch numbers.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Andarra
title: THE BEST ICE CREAM ON EARTH
text;;;: I love this ice cream more than any other ice cream on planet earth. There has never been an ice cream that compares to this... If I could keep a giant deep freezer full of The Tonight Dough I would be pretty happy. Eating it makes me feel like Unicorns Dolphins Glitter are flying around my tastebuds. This may be dramatic but it's my addiction.... I can eat it in one sitting.... Its even better as a milkshake using vanilla oat milk. I love it so much. I actually hate chocolate ice cream but this is my major exception...I used to buy this every other day.. so yeah its PERFECT. Also the money goes to a good cause when I buy.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: nyfluttergirl
title: I really want to love it :(
text;;;: The first time I bought this flavor it was amazing! But the last few times the peanut butter dough has ruined it. It tastes rancid. I keep giving it chances because I love everything else about it. But I had one last night that was rancid tasting PB again and my pile of PB chunks in the end was about 1/4 of the container worth. I don't believe I'll be giving it any more chances this time.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,Katrina,2017-06-21,5,Cold Heaven,2,1,"This ice cream is what I would heaven if it were a flavor. Send me truck loads, ASAP! Contact me for my info. :)";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: Kait11
title: What is Wrong with that “Peanut Butter” Dough?
text;;;: This ice cream is great except for the disgusting peanut butter dough chunks that taste like eating a ball of Splenda mixed with dish soap. Seems like maybe there is a bad batch going around? The rest of the pint is great... not sure what’s up.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,TonightDoughisthebest,2017-04-27,5,The greatest flavor ever!,2,1,"I purchased Tonight Dough in a Ben and Jerry's shop hefe in Hawaii a few months ago... OMG it is the greatest flavor I have ever tasted! I am not even an ice cream person, but when I found out that my local grocery store carried the Tonight Dough in pints- I was hooked! The base of this ice cream is mostly chocolate with some caramel ice cream. Then you have globs of chocolate chip cookie and peanut butter cookie dough. There is also swirls of thick chocolate fudge and tiny chuck of chocolate sandwich cookie pieces! The best way to eat this is to let it melt a bit and swirl it all around to mix up the choclate fudge and chocolate sandwich cookie peices. Great Job Ben and Jerry's - and Jimmy Falon! Honestly the only ice cream I will eat!";;;

The Tonight Dough,Arliffy,2018-01-02,3,"Awesome except for ""peanut butter"" dough",4,1,"This is a great ice cream in almost every way: the ice creams are delicious and the crunchy cookie swirls are awesome. The regular cookie dough with mini chocolate chips is also delicious. I was taken aback by the ""peanut butter dough"" though - it tasted really artificial, almost a bit rancid? I ate a few and had to pick the rest out. One of my friends was eating it too and felt the same. Please consider changing the PB dough or removing it altogether.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: Dizzy
title: Best Flavor Ever!
text;;;: It's like heaven in my mouth from the first spoonful to the last.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,TylerJNA,2017-12-21,1,Usually one of the best,2,4,"This is usually one of my favorite flavors. Bought some yesterday, and when I went to try it the texture was icey and rough, as though it had melted and been refrozen. Little bit disappointing.";;;

The Tonight Dough,beck33,2019-05-26,5,AMAZING,0,0,"okay so for a while now i’ve been buying this ice cream as my comfort food and it is WONDERFUL!!! sometimes i eat the entire pint in one sitting because it just tastes so good. the tonight dough is probably the best ice cream i’ve ever had and my dad says the same! both of us eat a lot of ice cream too hahaha so you know it’s a big thing when we both think it’s the best ice cream ever. my dad expected it to be overwhelming bc there’s a lot in it but we both agree everything works together harmoniously. my boyfriend loves it too!!! amazing ice cream, never gonna stop buying it :)";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: Grover15
title: WOW!!!
text;;;: Words cannot describe how delicious this flavor is. The cookie swirl along with the never ending chunks of cookie dough is absolutely amazing!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: ahhvenlee
text;;;: The Tonight Dough from Ben and Jerrys is super sweet and 100% for cookie dough lovers! It is a little bit too rich for my liking but its still freaking delicious! They price isnt terrible depending where you get it either.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,Littleredindy,2018-04-07,5,My New “All Time Favorite”!,0,0,"I used to be a Chubby Hubby or nothing kind of ice cream fan...this topped it. I’m so glad I gave it the opportunity. I chose to try it because of the ingredients and for Jimmy Fallon, he’s awesome! Great creation!";;;

The Tonight Dough,sonicfox,2018-02-08,3,Peanut butter? I think NOT!,4,1,"I'm so disappointed because I wanted to try this one for a long time. Well, I'm gonna have to agree with everyone who complained about the peanut butter cookie dough. I can't even describe the taste, but it's certainly not peanut butter. Yuck!";;;

The Tonight Dough,FuzzyGut,2018-05-31,4,Almost awesome,2,0,"I really liked most of this one. The ice creams taste great as do all the mix-ins, except the peanut butter cookie dough, which has an extremely strange flavor, and not peanut buttery. It’s kind of frustrating because the rest of it is SO good. I’ll probably stick with Half Baked instead of getting this one again.";;;

The Tonight Dough,AwesomeAvian675,2018-05-15,5,Yummy and Delicious! Especially the Cookie Dough!,0,1,"My mom bought this for me and I love the flavors, especially the cookie dough. It has a nice soft feel in your mouth and goes well with the chocolate and vanilla.";;;

The Tonight Dough,A_rose,2018-07-15,3,Meh,0,0,"This flavor didn't live up to my expectations. I did taste any caramel ice cream flavor, and the peanut butter cookie dough had a weird artificial flavor.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: Golfer Girl
title: This was more PB Dough Than Ice Cream
text;;;: I have been trying really hard to stay away from ice cream but saw this on the shelf and thought I have to try it. Boy was I disappointed. First I almost bent my spoon in half trying to break into the ice cream but that was because the cookie dough took over everything. There was hardly any ice cream in this. The dough pieces were very dry and not tasty at all. I really wish I could have liked this one. $5.00 in the garbage.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,emilyg,2017-10-11,5,Heaven in a pint,1,0,"I've been dying to try this flavor and after trying a couple not so great flavors i decided it was time. it was the best decision of my entire life. if you only eat one ice cream for the rest of your life, let it be ""the tonight dough"". the dough chunks are not ""chunks"", they're insanely huge, like nearing nestle Toulouse premade dough size. the ice creams are so good and it's just amazing. i wish they sold this one in a barrel because one pint is just not enough!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: Cldowns81u
title: Peanut butter ?
text;;;: I bought this with high hopes but the peanut butter cookie dough is disgusting. Everything else is fine with it except that. It tastes NOTHING like peanut butter cookie dough. Pretty unhappy considering how much this stuff costs....;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Renaat
title: Wow!!
text;;;: Tasted this flavor today @ the factory in Vermont. Hope they introduce it in Holland!!!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Mary Lu
title: Great flavor but inconsistent
text;;;: The first time I tried this ice cream it was amazing! I thought it was my new favorite. The second time I tried it it hardly had any cookie dough in it at all and was mostly ice cream. Then the third time I bought it it was loaded with cookie dough (yay) but was mostly all the peanut butter dough which made it too peanut buttery for me. I'm not sure why it would be inconsistent because I've never had that experience with other Ben and Jerry flavors.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,icecreamlover123,2018-09-06,5,AMAZING TASTE!,1,0,"I was never really a big fan of ice cream but that was long before I bought my first pint of 'The Tonight Dough'. Ever since I took a spoonful of this heavenly creation, I've been addicted to eating it. Being a girl is tough for about a full week, once a month. I can now happily spend that week eating this ice cream. It's my guilty pleasure. Thank you, Jimmy Fallon for helping to create the single best thing that makes life worth living.";;;

The Tonight Dough,Pugmom37,2017-04-26,5,Heaven in a pint of ice cream,1,0,"Had a craving for some ice cream and hadn't had some B&J's in a while...picked up 'The Tonight Dough' at my local Walmart...when I cracked it open and took my first bite, I fell in love!! I love Jimmy Fallon and I love ice cream...you took my 2 favorite things and put them together!! Quick question: Did he REALLY come up with this combo, cuz if he did, tell him he hit a home run with it!!....and please don't stop making/selling it!!!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: Cree28
title: Mostly Good
text;;;: It was mostly good except the peanut butter cookie dough had yucky aftertaste. My husband agreed. Unfortunately most of the chunks were peanut butter so we both had significant collections at the bottom of our pints. Normally I like anything sweet but they really were a bit nasty. The rest was delicious.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: jshellenberger
title: Deliciousness in a bowl
text;;;: Tried this one for the first time tonight after many glowing recommendations from my girlfriend. I can't believe I waited so long to try this batch of heaven! The cookie dough and peanut butter offer a delightful chewy texture and flavor alternate with the ice chocolate and caramel ice cream.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,Keewester,2018-08-08,5,Absolutely my favorite!,2,0,"I can’t find this in my stores for the last week! It’s constant,y sold out. I may have to put on a disguise and sneak into another county! I need more!";;;

The Tonight Dough,,2018-01-13,3,Yum except for the PB cookie dough,3,1,"This ice cream is soooo great! It would almost say it is my favorite however the PB cookie dough has an add taste to it that makes it undesirable. Almost a freezer burnt taste. I would recommend a new recipe for the dough. Otherwise, it is great!";;;

The Tonight Dough,leazf913,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"This was my first ever Ben & Jerrys ice cream and I am definitely a repeat customer of this ice cream! I dont think this ice cream could get better! Its is sooo delicious and I recommend it to everybody! I had first seen this Ice cream on the tonight show and I kinda thought it was a joke until I saw it at a gas station I quickly picked it up, purchased it, and on the way home with a plastic spoon I found (still in its plastic) I opened it up and enjoyed on the way home. It was sooo good! I have since bought 3 more containers.";;;

The Tonight Dough,LiloLink,2018-01-02,3,"Good, except for the peanut butter dough :(",2,1,"I was really enjoying this one up until I tasted a bit of the peanut butter dough. It tastes rancid. :( I thought perhaps it was that one piece, but sure enough it tasted the same when i found another piece! Bummer. It would've gotten 5 stars from me had it not been for those funky PB dough bits, yuck! Everything else in it was fabulous.";;;

The Tonight Dough,Erikaaaa,2018-02-01,5,Heaven?,1,0,"Is it? Heaven in a pint? Seriously... Best icecream I have ever had. I Really hope it never gets discontinued... I live in Kauai, Hawai'i only Walmart sells It. Its now the only icecream I'll eat!";;;

The Tonight Dough,wanderlust,2019-04-18,1,"Horrible, doesn't taste like peanut butter!",0,1,"I bought this to try as my store was out of my usual flavor and it was absolutely horrible. The chunks with peanut butter in it were gritty (like sand gritty) and tasted nothing like peanut butter, they made me gag and I had to spit it out. I spent the rest of my time eating this, picking out and trying to avoid the nasty peanut butter bits but eventually threw out about half of a container. I'm a peanut butter addict and this tasted nothing like any peanut butter I've ever had! Will not repurchase ever.";;;

The Tonight Dough,,2020-07-27,5,,0,0,"Favorite. Flavor. Ever. This pint is for those ultimate ice cream lovers. This isnt for a cheat meal...save this for a cheat DAY, because you will not want to stop eating it once you break the seal. It is gloriously excessive in all the right ways: every single bite has loads of cookie dough, peanut butter, brownie, or chocolate cookie chunks, and the ice cream itself is swirled with more chocolate indulgence. Me and my husband buy a pint apiece because we have failed many times to share nicely!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: sweetbluerose3
title: Bomb
text;;;: Absolutely my favorite Ben and Jerry's ice cream flavor so far. I have yet to find another mouth-watering ice cream flavor that will impress me. I will be trying your new non dairy products very soon. Thanks for the creativity.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
text;;;: O love this ice cream sooo much is sooo good the only thing I hate is the peanut butter in it but the rest is all good I love the chocolate flavor the cookie dough in it and vanilla ice cream is just delicious;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Noel
title: Not what I was expecting
text;;;: Pb cookie dough was terrible. Had to force it down;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,pintgobbler2000,2018-08-24,2,Muddled flavors.,0,0,"Really strange. I thought this sounded great, but the textures and flavors don't compliment each other at all. The major problem is how overpowering the chocolate is: too much raw cocoa flavor. It's way too rich for all those mix-ins. The peanut butter dough is floury and almost sickly sweet, very artificial. There's absolutely no flavor to the chocolate chip cookie dough after being doused in their chocolate base. The cookie core is oddly coarse and, in places, kind of icy.";;;

The Tonight Dough,victor,2020-02-07,5,Cookie Doughs Best Ever,0,0,"The cookie doughs in this pint are better than I've ever tasted in other flavors. I think in particular it's the peanut butter cookie dough that WOWed me to death. The sweet caramel ice cream and the less sweet chocolate ice cream balance quite nicely. Before I tried it, I wrote ""The Tonight Dough"" off as too busy and probably not good, but now it's def like my favorite Ben & Jerry's. I can't get enough of the two cookie doughs with the chocolate ice cream.";;;

The Tonight Dough,meetig94,2020-06-04,5,,0,0,"My all time favourite Ben & Jerrys ice cream is the [product:ben-&-jerrys-the-tonight-dough-ice-cream]! It is jam packed with goodness. How can someone go wrong with cookie dough, chocolate cookie swirls, and peanut butter cookie dough? I love cookie dough and this ice cream satisfying my random cookie dough cravings. I would love tubs of ice cream as a #voxbox. Definitely try it out! #sweet #sweettooth #icecream #cookie #cookiedough #peanutbutter";;;

The Tonight Dough,carlyk19,2020-07-24,4,,0,0,"Well I usually dont choose peanut butter in any of my desserts, I tried the Tonight Dough flavor because I loved Jimmy Fallon! With caramel & chocolate ice creams with chocolate cookie swirls & gobs of chocolate chip cookie dough & peanut butter cookie dough, the peanut butter flavor isnt overpowering, and the caramel ice cream is dreamy! When you feel like eating an entire carton of ice cream to make your chocolatey dreams come true, try this.";;;

The Tonight Dough,Thepopcornking,2020-09-21,5,The most amazing ice cream EVER!!!! ♡♡♡♡♡,0,0,"This flavour is hands down my most favourite ice cream! Any time I have enough money, I always try to grab a pint or two because its just so dang delicious. I can't remember what turned me onto Tonight Dough, but it's been my soulmate for nearly 2 years now. If I can't find my baby, I usually settle for Half Baked, but The Tonight Dough will always be at the top of the totem pole for me. ♡♡♡♡♡";;;

The Tonight Dough,Lanes7,2019-03-11,5,The Best Flavor of Ice Cream EVER!!!,0,0,"I’m kind of a middle of the road ice cream person, I like it but not something I crave regularly... until now! I had Tonight Dough for the first time at a work function where Ben and Jerry’s catered desert . I cannot stop thinking about this ice cream. I crave it and get myself 1 pint as a treat when I grocery shop, but I could eat it every day! It’s been almost a year now and my love has only grown for this treat!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: Maddiejunk
title: Not enough dough
text;;;: I always buy ben and Jerrys and I tried this new type of pint and I am very offended. There was not enough ice cream as I expected in my pint. It was around half full and I was very upsset. This pint was not worth as much as I spent on it. I am a very good customer and this is my favorite ice cream and I wish this was prevented.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,Tanguera,2018-09-04,2,Tastes a little weird,1,1,"I’m a big B&J fan, but The Tonight Dough doesn’t work for me. The peanut butter cookie dough tastes like it’s gone bad which is shocking because I love all things peanut butter. I also usually like having a blend of flavors, but the combo is just weird.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: narayaesub
text;;;: Okay so when I was young I thought Ben and Jerrys was just so expensive and a treat I could not indulge in. I love ice cream and this is hands down the best store bought for me. Ben and Jerrys has a great mission and they strive to bring awareness to various social justice causes and they back it up with donations etc. anyway back to the cream man the mix ins are great salty sweet just amazing all in all;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,Shorty31,2018-02-24,5,"Goodness Me, the Ice Cream is oh so Good!",0,0,"I have legit converted 4 of my friends into craving and loving The Tonight Dough. The mix of cookie, brownie, and ice cream hits every checkmark. I have conflicting emotions in wanting and also not wanting this to come in gallon size. Not wanting a gallon cause it wouldn't last three days and wanting because it wouldn't last three days...lol";;;

The Tonight Dough,Sunshine,2017-07-08,5,Dough Addiction,0,0,"OMG this is hands down the best flavor ever! I have bought out every pint in about a mile radius from my house. I know the shipment days. I started at 1 pint a day and now 2, I've had to compensate by adding more time at the gym but it's worth it. I love that there's no pieces of nuts they are too hard for me. I love to let it melt and sip it then eat all the dough that sunk to the bottom. Mmmmmm!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: saras0df0
text;;;: ALL TIME FAVORITE ICE CREAM HANDS DOWN!!! It says its a caramel w dutch chocolate ice cream but it tastes like vanilla and the most delicious chocolate nice cream I have ever eaten. It has chunks of peanut butter cookie dough and chocolate chip dough. It also has chocolate cookie ribbons throughout which is the best chocolate ive ever tried. Its so creamy and rich tasting. Im addicted!!!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,SadSkinnyB175h,2019-11-04,5,Many years later still the best ice cream,0,0,"The only ice cream I think surpasses rocky road in taste, texture and how well the flavors compliment each other. I recently had this because it was offered by a friend and it taste just like I remember. I haven’t bought in years because these days I only by low calorie ice cream made for dieters/slimmers. I had forgotten just how indulgent a classically US made ice cream could taste haha";;;

The Tonight Dough,kapleski,2020-06-25,5,,0,0,"I always told myself I would NEVER buy an ice cream that costed as much as this one especially for the amount of product you get... that was until I came across this product on sale at sobeys one day. And wow, am I ever grateful for that day, this is my favourite ice cream by far! Great quality and great taste! I definitely recommend this product! Also you can often catch it on sale!";;;

The Tonight Dough,BrendaNoraG,2017-12-14,5,Literally the best flavor of ice cream Ever,0,0,"Please don’t ever discontinue this flavor, it’s the absolute best. I tell all my friends and family to try Tonight Dough. If you love sweets and chocolate and peanut butter, this is for you. You have to try it and you will instantly be hooked. I can’t explain to you the happiness I get from opening the lid and getting the chocolate cookie crumble on the top layer. Heaven!!!!!";;;

The Tonight Dough,badesim,2019-09-14,5,THE LOVE OF MY LIFE,0,0,"After the first time I ever tried this ice cream, I was unable to crave any other ice cream. It honestly changed the whole game for me. I love the texture and the flavor combination. I always recommend it to all my friends and wish It was easier to find in grocery stores. Honestly, can you just sponsor me? I promise you won't find anyone more passionate about this than I am.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: TyTheIceCreamGuy
title: WOW HOLY COW
text;;;: Okay! Ben? Jerry? Whose wacky idea was THIS? I flippin LOVE IT. From the very first bite (wow! I shouldn’t bite ice cream it’s very COLD);;;

name: The Tonight Dough,abscog,2019-07-14,5,,0,0,"This ice cream combines all the best parts of Ben and Jerry's including chocolate, vanilla, cookie dough and brownies. I love everything about this ice cream and there is absolutely NOTHING that I feel needs to be changed about it. I only wish that it wasn't so popular because it is sold out every time I go to the store. (kidding) keep up the excellent work Ben and Jerry.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: katieg108
text;;;: Ben and Jerrys is known in my family as the best Ice cream around. When a carton of half baked is placed in my freezer I know it will not last more than a week! I absolutely love this flavor! It has a perfect hint of saltiness in the dough and creamy sweetness in the ice cream! This is far superior to half baked because the different doughs in this mixture are much better!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,ABigBnJFan26,2019-07-28,5,Fav Ice Cream,0,0,"This is by far my favorite ice cream. Super creamy, not too rich, loads of delicious big chunks of cookie. I was surprised by the swirls of chocolate cookie. It can be a bit sandy at times but I don't mind the texture so for those adverse to it maybe it's not for you. Thank you for the wonderful ice cream B&J, this is my special go-to treat every time I want a pick me up.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: BWash007
title: AAA- Ma-Zing
text;;;: How could you not love? perfect blend of all ingredients added! Not too much of anything. I seriously have left all my other favorites behind and purchase EVERYTIME I pass the ice cream aisle and see it in stock. This satisfies every craving. I also love how vanilla is the base and everything else complements. WHO GAVE THIS ICE CREAM 1 or 2 STARS?!?!?!?! HOW!?;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,jessica_n,2020-07-28,5,,0,0,"The tonight dough is the SUPERIOR flavor out of all of the Ben and Jerry's flavors. If my family is getting ice cream, the tonight dough is definitely our first option. It is disappointing though because this flavor is always sold out (because it is so good). There is so much going on in one container. You must try it. You (probably) won't regret it :)";;;

The Tonight Dough,sourninja,2020-07-07,5,,0,0,"This is my favorite ice cream of all time. Legit I get a little irrational when there isnt any left at my local store. I dont care what it costs, if I have a craving this will be put into my mouth as soon as I can possibly get it. The peanut butter chunks are enough to write your grandmother and tell her you found your soulmate. And its an ice cream.";;;

The Tonight Dough,ekenzzz,2017-06-16,5,the best!,0,0,"i usually stick with ""if i had 1,000,000 flavours"" because let's face it, it's a piece of art... however i went to my local store and tried this out for size.
