OMG i don't think i'll ever turn back. it makes me upset when i go to grab some and there's every other flavour other than this one! i'm addicted, please please please never get rid of this";;;

The Tonight Dough,Lucky,2019-07-14,2,No cookie dough :(,0,0,"I bought this yesterday and I was so excited to eat it because I bought it before and loved it, but this time around there was barely any cookie swirl and there was only PB dough chunks, no cookie dough chunks. Very disappointed, might have to start sticking to half baked instead. :( not only that but this time the pb dough had a weird flavour.";;;

The Tonight Dough,mdvnielle_,2018-10-09,4,,0,0,"i’m a cookie dough type of girl. cookie dough ice cream is definitely my guilty pleasure. i’ve tried every brand of cookie dough ice cream. this one was alright. although it isn’t labeled as cookie dough, it’s still dough in it. i though this this one was little too sweet for me and i would prefer the dough chunks to be a little bit smaller.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: rainbowbee3
text;;;: Cookie dough ice cream is one of my favorites. I love this variation of it. It has chocolate chip and peanut butter cookie dough. The chocolate mixed in with the caramel and chocolate ice cream just makes this wonderful. I usually eat this in one or 2 sittings. There is no sharing when it comes to Ben & Jerry's The Tonight Dough Ice Cream;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
text;;;: Its nice and creamy and the chunks give it an added boost of flavor. I usually try to control myself and tell myself that I will only get a scoop but next thing I know the pint is gone. Its reasonably priced so you can afford to stock up on a few of the favs for later. They keep really well unlike some that tend to get freezer burn easily.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: shelbyg2189
text;;;: Let me get this off my chest: Jimmy Fallon is my soulmate. He just gets me. So it's only fitting that his face would be plastered on my favourite ice cream as well. This is the best combination of wanting to add all the toppings at the dessert bar but not wanting to go too far and ruining the flavour. It's the perfect balance of flavours;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
title: One of my favorites
text;;;: This is one of my absolute favorite ice creams! Every time I see it in the store I have to buy it! My boyfriend will even surprise me with a pint of it sometimes because I love it so much. When I was really sick recently (with a sore throat) I pretty much lived off of this stuff because it was the only thing that didn't hurt to eat!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
text;;;: Oh my goodness! So delicious and the perfect treat any time of the day! Some days you just need to come home and binge watch your favorite Netflix rom-coms and eat ice cream! This ice cream will make your insides feel better than any man ever could it tastes like you landed on the moon filled with all kinds of cookie dough goodness;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,bgdl26,2017-09-07,5,MY favorite ice cream ever!,0,0,"I love this so much, however, the last few pints I have had the regular cookie dough has not been good. I've gotten pints at different stores just to see if it was that stores batch. Have you changed the consistency of it? It was always soft and melted in your mouth. It's now kind of hard and crumbles. (does that make sense haha)";;;

The Tonight Dough,drinkswithnadia,2020-07-29,5,,0,0,"Every once in awhile Ill treat myself to a Ben and Jerry's Ice Cream The Tonight Dough - 16oz ! Something about this particular flavor stands above the others in my opinion ! Theres so many textures and flavors coming from the two different cookie doughs! If you like chocolate, peanut butter and cookie dough... this is for you!";;;

The Tonight Dough,Ms Kentucky,2019-09-29,5,OMG... One Mouthwatering Good,0,0,"While on vacation in Atlantic Beach, We stopped at the Ben & Jerry's store. My eyes were speaking to me... what's this wonderful ice cream flavor. Fresh and in a waffle bowl, PURE delight. Since we have been home. I have been looking for a place where I can get more. Because this was an awesome flavor! Thank you Ben & Jerry's";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: jasonrob79
text;;;: This is a good flavor if you are a fan of cookie dough as it has two different kinds in it and its actually done correctly and taste great. Its not my first choice but I do enjoy it when I dont have my usual brand in stock at my local store. As Ive said if you are a fan of cookie dough this might be your next favorite flavor;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: leslies65a5
text;;;: This is the best combination of vanilla chocolate and cookie doughI love cookie dough. I can sit and eat an entire pint. Youre able to taste and savor each flavor. You can never go wrong with a little tiny pieces of chocolate bits so good. It is a little pricey about 4 to 5 dollars for a pint but definitely worth it.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,michelleb3082,2020-06-15,5,,0,0,"Ben & Jerry's tonight dough is basically one of the only ice creams I will eat, it is to die for. It combineschocolateandcaramelice creams withchocolate chip cookie dough,peanut butter cookie doughand a crunchychocolatecookie swirl. It is so good! if you haven't tried it you definitely need to get some immediately!!";;;

The Tonight Dough,yai_martinez17,2020-05-03,5,,0,0,"This would definitely be my favorite Ben and Jerry's ice cream. I got it once to try and see if I liked it, since I'm not really an ice cream person, and I fell in love. It's one of the best flavors Ben and Jerry's offers. The two ice cream flavors and the two types of cookie dough just really complement each other.";;;

The Tonight Dough,roshh1,2019-07-20,5,,0,0,"Let me start by saying WOW!! I had to force myself to stop eating this, or I would have consumed the whole pint. This flavor has now become my favorite! I had been looking for a tasty dairy free ice cream (Im lactose intolerant) but what the heck, Ill just take my pill before enjoying this deliciousness! Buy it!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: tarlanella
text;;;: This flavor is a party in your mouth. Whoever thought to blend a mixture of so many chocolate favorites is a genius and deserves an award. I am a repeat customer and have purchased this pint of cream 20+ times in my lifetime. I recommend to ALL my friends. I love this flavor so much. Its 100% a guilty pleasure.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,Mya788,2020-04-12,5,Absolutely to die for!!!,0,0,"I’ve been buying this same ice cream for years. It’s the perfect mixture of cookie dough and cookie pieces. It’s not too salty or too sweet. I can’t keep my hands from buying it off the shelves which is probably why my New Years resolution isn’t going to great lol. Nonetheless, I hope they never get rid of it.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: faspee
text;;;: This is the second time I've bought this brand and it was also well worth the money. I will buy this again for sure! It's very good for that girls night out and you need that comfort food. So many yummy chunks cookie dough and peanut butter cookie dough. Satisfaction was achieved after this was consumed.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,jennyw50,2020-07-30,4,,0,0,"I got to try this for my first time recently. I love the variety in there with chocolate, caramel, COOKIE DOUGH!! Anything with cookie dough has my vote. The peanut butter conflicted with the caramel just a bit too much for me, but overall super delicious. Im happy whenever I can find B&J on sale for $4!";;;

The Tonight Dough,stephaniem100,2020-07-28,4,,0,0,"The perfect alternative to regular cookie dough ice cream! This has your standard chocolate chip cookie dough and peanut butter cookie dough mixed with chocolate and carmel ice cream. I gotta say my favorite part is the cookie crunch swirled in, gives you a nice crunch of texture every once in a while.";;;

The Tonight Dough,Icecreamfan4life,2018-06-22,4,Interesting Mix,0,0,"Bought this a couple nights ago on a whim. Had seen it plenty of times when I was looking at other flavors to try out, as I'm not typically a real big chocolate ice cream fan do to the bitter taste it can have at times. But I've found that I really enjoy B&J's chocolate ice creams. Very smooth and light flavor. So I finally opted to break down and chose to buy this flavor. And have to say that I wasn't quite unsatisfied with it. I mean the chocolate and caramel ice creams came together beautifully with the chocolate chocolate chip cookie swirl. But I have to admit there was something off with the peanut butter cookie dough. I have no idea, if they taste off, do to possibly being made from a vegan recipe. But, I could very faintly taste the peanut butter as well as some kind of floral-esque note at the end. Was kind of strange tasting. I think maybe if the recipe was adjusted a bit or maybe just adding a peanut butter swirl or core to this pint, would really make everything come together.";;;

The Tonight Dough,AJ42,2020-03-03,5,BEST FLAVOR!!!! :),0,0,"I recently went to a Ben & Jerry's store and purchased The Tonight Dough but in a milkshake and although I am lactose intolerant, this was one of the best decisions I made. This ice cream is AMAZING, and I would defiantly be buying it. Hope they make this flavor dairy free one day to help me out.";;;

The Tonight Dough,girlwithnoclue,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"Ben & Jerry are my two favorite men because not only are they SMASHING the patriarchy, but theyve been killing the ice cream game for years. This flavor is the most packed with toppings so be aware if you like simple ice creams! A cookie dough lovers dream, the cookie swirl is my favorite!";;;

The Tonight Dough,sambutneversammy,2020-06-11,5,,0,0,"I never thought I would be a fan of peanut butter cookie dough in an ice cream as I am really picky about where I taste peanut butter. However, they balance the flavors so well that I really enjoyed it! The carmel ice cream soon made me realize my love for caramel ice cream in genereal!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: jasminemaewith
text;;;: I have had sooooooo many flavors of Ben & Jerry's throughout my life. It is an amazing brand. There's always so many goodies jam packed into one container! And there's an insane amount of choices available. This one is pretty memorable due to Jimmy Fallon's face being on the container.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,kimsparkle,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"Tonight Dough is my all time favorite Ben and Jerry's flavor. The mix of ingredients is the best. It has both chocolate and caramel ice cream along with chocolate chip cookie dough, peanut butter cookie dough, and a chocolate cookie swirl. It has a lot of texture and tastes great!";;;

The Tonight Dough,sallyw12,2020-07-02,5,,0,0,"This is by far my favorite flavor! I've tried so many different flavors and they're all good. But I like this one the best because it has some saltiness along with the sweet chocolate, cake and cookie dough flavor. I don't care about the cost, I'll pay anything for this yummy treat.";;;

The Tonight Dough,MattScoops,2017-09-09,5,Love from Canada,0,0,"Hello! Long time scooper, first time writer. The Tonight Dough is a revelation. Many flavours that blend so well together! I especially enjoy the peanut butter dough, it surprises me every time a gob finds its way into a spoonful. Next time I'll try a different flavour... maybe...";;;

The Tonight Dough,taylorb9,2020-07-24,5,,0,0,"My favorite Ben & Jerrys ice cream! I love a cookie dough period but this is a cut above just cookie dough. They give you caramel, chocolate chip cookie dough, peanut butter cookie dough and creamy well blended vanilla ice cream. This is crack in a cup and Im here to be drugged";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: awes0me14
title: Yes Sir Yes Sir Yes Siiiiiiiiir
text;;;: Oh my WOOOOOOOORD. BEST. ICECREAM. EVER. Sick? Buy this. Tired? Buy this. Happy? Buy this. Binge watching? Buy this. This Ice cream suits your every need!!! It is the best ice cream. All other companies should really learn from Ben & Jerry's. Would give it 100 stars if I could.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,Nephritis,2017-09-16,5,Pretty great flavor,0,0,"I bought this tonight after a long period of contemplation, and I love it! The only thing is, the chocolate cookie swirls that other reviews referenced is the single best ingredient in existence, and I personally thought it should have had more...like a separate pint of it!";;;

The Tonight Dough,alicer9,2019-06-23,5,,0,0,"Love the creaminess and all the toppings in the ice cream. This is my go-to pint to buy at grocery stores. It's loaded with the toppings, doesn't cheap out. The price for this product is decent but is amazing when it's on sale. Delicious and would recommend this to others.";;;

The Tonight Dough,leahro,2020-02-05,5,,0,0,"Im not supposed to eat dairy, but this is worth it. its delicious ice cream with doughs in it. cold, chewy, rich (but not too rich), creamy, and everything that makes it amazing. I tried this when it first came out years ago and its still my go to. Big fan, its a must try!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: Blondie95
title: Absolutely perfect!
text;;;: I have probably tried about every ice cream Ben and jerrys sells in stores and this is the best one. The chunks of cookie dough throughout the ice cream along with the cookie crumble swirl is the best combination. It's so good that it's now the only ice cream I buy ever!!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,tgunnlaw,2019-02-03,4,,0,0,"Always Crowd pleaser, what am I saying I never share this ice cream, go hey your own! Creamy, delicious and except ice cream to chocolate chip cookies ratio.";;;

The Tonight Dough,rossrikki,2020-02-04,5,,0,0,"I love ice cream with a lot of stuff in it. Ice cream might even be more about texture than flavor for me. If you feel the same way, it really doesnt get better than Ben & Jerrys. The Tonight Dough is my favorite but there are so many delicious Ben & Jerrys ice creams.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: haleymarie23
text;;;: I absolutely love this ice cream!! It has so many different flavors all in one. I like that it has cookie dough pieces in it. Its kind of on the expensive side but its well worth it. I definitely recommend trying it if you havent and you like all the flavors it has in it.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: erikal63
text;;;: This is my favorite flavor of all the Ben and Jerrys flavors! They put so much cookie dough in them which is the best part since most dont! You can buy it almost anywhere and its not expensive! You gota try it! [product:ben-&-jerrys-chocolate-chip-cookie-dough-ice-cream];;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: stephaniew80
text;;;: 5 stars all day long. I ate this Ben and Jerry's flavor every single day while I was pregnant and still continue to love! No other ice cream company fills their flavor with as much goodies like b&j does. Every bite you have cookie dough and brownie swirl. Omg. The best.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,brittanyv6f03,2020-07-25,4,,0,0,"I love Ben and Jerry and their ice cream. I gave this one a 4 because yes, it's delicious, but it's not my favorite. If I remember correctly, it has two types of cookie dough- chocolate chip and peanut butter. This one will fill my craving when I can't find phish food.";;;

The Tonight Dough,jamiesc69b,2020-06-20,5,,0,0,"Delicious! There is a great chocolate to vanilla ratio. I love the fudge mixed into the chocolate, but not too rich. There are lots of cookie dough bites so you can nearly get one in every other bite. No need to search. Perfectly mixed leaving very little to be desired.";;;

The Tonight Dough,Kirsten28,2020-09-05,5,Really Might Be The Best Ever,0,0,"This one really might be the best flavor ever. There are SO many chunk pieces and the cookie doughs are the best tasting cookie dough bits compared to any other brand. The caramel and chocolate ice cream is a good pair, and the texture of the cookie swirls are AMAZING.";;;

The Tonight Dough,kima62,2020-07-24,5,,0,0,"This caramel and chocolate ice cream is truly heavenly! It is not only filled with chocolate swirls, it also contains two different types of cookie dough, peanut butter and chocolate chip! Every bite contains each of these items making for a sweet and delicious treat!";;;

The Tonight Dough,kaitmeadows,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"The price of Ben and Jerrys has always scared me away, but this ice cream is 16 oz of everything good in the world. It is heaven in a pint. Ben and Jerrys is revolutionary both in social causes and in phenomenal ice cream flavors. Thanks for bringing heaven to Earth.";;;

The Tonight Dough,legitcolleen,2020-06-01,5,,0,0,"Its been too long since I had this or any Ben & Jerrys ice cream. Their ice cream is just that amazing. Except for cherry, because I do not like fruits in my ice cream, I would probably try all their flavors if I had the chance and money to. Highly highly recommend";;;

The Tonight Dough,kenzieebritt,2020-07-23,4,,0,0,"I'm a huge Ben and Jerry's fan. I really like this flavor, it's not my favorite but still delicious! I don't reach for it every time I'm in the mood for a sweet treat, but sometimes I am just really craving it! I really love the fun, creative collaboration flavors!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: mottagiu
text;;;: The dairy free Ben and Jerrys ice cream is the best in my opinion. The texture is and flavor is just like regular ice cream. I think Ben and Jerrys is a bit overpriced but its totally worth it considering that they support great causes and the flavor is immaculate;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,sjm1,2020-06-10,5,,0,0,"Another great flavour from Ben & Jerry's, the Tonight Dough has an amazing combination of cookie dough, chocolate, peanut butter cups and so much more. I feel guilty when I go into the tub for a 3rd and 4th scoop ... until I eat them and know that is is great.";;;

The Tonight Dough,kidjo22,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"If I want to indulge this is my go to! (Insert mouth water) its so good with the caramel ice cream and cookie dough bits and then you have chocolate Icecream with chunks of peanut butter cookie dough. AND the cookie swirl throughout it all, Seriously sooo good.";;;

The Tonight Dough,shangreen,2020-07-31,4,,0,0,"Love the flavor of this ice cream. It has a great mix of tastes and fix-ins that add a good texture to the ice cream. I always purchase this product when my local Giant Eagle runs a sale on Ben and Jerrys. Otherwise, price can be a little steep for this product.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: chrisg31
text;;;: This is one of my girlfriend and my favorite ice creams! We purchase it anytime there is a sale on Ben and Jerry's. Loaded with cookie dough and chocolate this ice cream satisfies any craving. Ben and Jerry's has always been one of my favorite ice cream brands!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"This is my favorite ice cream! Very chunky-which is a cookie dough lovers dream! The only thing to make it better would be to add more of a fudge component to the ice cream. I also wish that I could find this flavor in the mini-size, rather than just the pint";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: adriannae4
text;;;: My favorite Ben and Jerrys go to ice cream if Im watching a movie or just need to have a moment. The chunky chocolatey ice cream is what I seek in all of the ice creams I buy and this one is perfect. I like the pb cookies too its a different flavor in the mix.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,keriannhb95d,2019-11-01,5,,0,0,"My friends and I often like to take part in taste tests, and this one won out of the 6 brands we tried! Not only is the ice cream itself very creamy and delicious, they have a good amount of chunks and goodies in them. It is expensive but well worth the cost.";;;

The Tonight Dough,tessm17,2020-06-29,5,,0,0,"The tonight dough is my go to for Ben and Jerry. I mean who doesn't love brownie, cookie dough and Jimmy Fallon. Im always down to try a new flavour but usually find myself reaching for this or the half-baked flavour. Can't go wrong with what you know, right?";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: theresah29
text;;;: Ben and jerrys ice cream is so good! They have so many wonderful flavors its hard to choose just one. My absolute favorite is the tonight dough. This ice cream never disappoints my taste buds. The only thing is i always finish the whole tub! Its just so good.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,Nicg63,2018-10-29,3,Use to love it,0,0,"I’ve had this a few times and it was beyond heavenly but unfortunately the last few times the peanut butter cookie dough has tasted realllllyyy weird and not good. It makes me so sad cause this is the best flavor in the world, or use to be. Please fix it!!!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: Awhite
title: Eh
text;;;: Too much of a chocolate flavor and not enough cookie dough chunks. Not sure if it's freezer burned or an old batch but often the cookie dough chunks will break apart like powder with a terrible taste. Not a bad flavor if cookie dough is like it should be.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,millervolt,2019-09-29,5,,0,0,"This. Is. The best. Ice cream I've ever had. It has everything you could want in ice cream. It has vanilla, rich chocolate, caramel, peanut butter, cookie crumbles, and cookie dough. Just simply amazing. I will be buying more of this as soon as I get home.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: pineapplesp
text;;;: Love this flavor. Its filled with different types of cookie dough and its tastes heavenly. Each spoonful of ice cream will contain a type of cookie dough and ice cream. I would 100% recommend if cookie dough is your favorite part of cookie dough ice cream.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,my2babies11,2019-07-19,5,,0,0,"The flavor is delicious, the size perfect. Whether it's the ""I just broke up with my boyfriend"" ice cream, or the ""tonight's a special event, here's a treat"" or the ""just because"" ice cream, you cannot go wrong with the Tonight Dough from Ben and Jerry's.";;;

The Tonight Dough,iluvujennay,2020-06-20,5,,0,0,"When I am craving cookie dough ice cream, this is always the brand I go for. The chunks of Cookie dough are large and worth the money. Its like having an ice cream store in your freezer. I would highly suggest trying this brand if you have an already yet.";;;

The Tonight Dough,Eve_,2019-06-02,2,Weird PB dough,0,0,"I’ve had this flavor before and it was so good, I bought it again. This time, the PB dough chunks taste rotten. I’ve seen some similar reviews on this page. I don’t know what happened because I had it before with no issues. Seems like a bad batch??? Yuck.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: madiem7
text;;;: This is hands down my all time favorite ice cream flavor. The dough bites in the ice cream are larger than all other brands and have the perfect level of sweetness. If you are a cookie dough fanatic buy this it will satisfy all your cookie dough cravings;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Yaskween
title: The best
text;;;: They were having a sale at my neighborhood grocery store so I thought I would branch out and pick up a new flavor. After trying this I went back for more!My ultimate favorite ice cream now. You get a bunch of cookie dough it's addicting in a good way lol;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,sabrinasmash,2020-07-27,5,,0,0,"100000% my absolute favorite ice cream flavor. I absolutely love all of the different flavors in the ice cream and it is full of the different cookie doughs! The texture of the peanut butter dough isnt my favorite, but it doesnt deter from the product";;;

The Tonight Dough,aniburk,2020-07-31,4,,0,0,"i have had this product multiple times and it is always so tasty, however after eating it a lot it can get kind of sickening. also due to cookie dough in it, it can be hard to scoop. but the texture is amazing and i love the flavor of the cookie dough.";;;

The Tonight Dough,Trina,2018-11-18,5,For people who don't like chocolate ice cream,0,0,"I'm eating this ice cream as I write this review only because it's amazing and I wish I could share this pint with the world! I HATE chocolate ice cream but decided to give this a try, and let me tell you!! Best decision ever! I'm in ice cream heaven.";;;

The Tonight Dough,jennyi2,2020-01-04,5,,0,0,"This is my favorite flavor because it has everything- chocolate, peanut butter, cookies, etc. I love ice cream but its hard for me to choose a flavor so this one is perfect. The small pints are a good size and you can get multiple servings out of it.";;;

The Tonight Dough,msnyder2,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"One of my favorite B&J flavors. Not only do I love Jimmy Fallon, but this flavor has a great mix of caramel, chocolate ice cream and chocolate chip and peanut butter cookie doughs. DELICIOUS. Its like taking cookie dough ice cream to the next level.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: anne02
text;;;: The best ice cream ever! I remember craving some sweets one night during my pregnant days. I asked my husband to go pick up some ice cream. It was on sale so he picked one up to try. Omg! Love! We have this in our freezer at all times! So delicious!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
text;;;: THIS IS THE BEST!!!!! I love this ice cream with everything in me!! it combines all the best sweets into one and is so creamy but has a fun texture with the brownie and cookie dough. My whole family loves this flavor so it goes quickly in our house.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,,2020-07-27,5,,0,0,"Such a yummy flavor combination and who doesnt love the tonight show!? Ben and Jerrys is the fried and true girls night ice cream and this is my top flavor pick every time! Not to mention, Ben and Jerrys is a B-Corp and advocates for social justice!";;;

The Tonight Dough,edenmetz,2018-06-03,5,,0,0,"This is my favorite ice cream of all time! Ben & Jerry's is so creative and has so many great flavors throughout their entire line. Tonight Dough or not, you will not go wrong with choosing any single one of their flavors! I highly recommend this!";;;

The Tonight Dough,mikafalciola,2020-06-20,5,,0,0,"Their ice cream is good, but have you seen their stance to abolish white supremacy? That is what makes their flavors pop! I will now buy more Ben & Jerrys. This flavor is really good though, all of the sweets you like in one combined flavor! BLM!";;;

The Tonight Dough,emilyc403,2020-06-22,5,,0,0,"Immaculate flavor. This company has become well known for their political stance over the last few weeks which has sparked many to go and buy their product. It is delicious and serves its purpose very well!! A tasty, cold treat after a long day!!";;;

The Tonight Dough,hollandm,2019-10-22,5,,0,0,"Hands down the best ice cream. If you love sweets this has it all. A step up from your typical cookie dough ice cream, this one has peanut butter and chocolate chip cookie dough chunks along with even more. Every bite will be filled with cookie.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: denisec16
text;;;: I absolutely love Ben & Jerry's ice cream it is the smoothest creamiest ice cream I have ever tried it is pretty expensive so I wait for it to go on sale but I love love this ice cream and it is loaded with ingredients well worth the indulgence;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,lipkit99,2018-06-03,5,,0,0,"This ice cream is actually my favorite comfort food. Warning it is very sweet and heavy. So if you like plain flavors this is NOT the ice cream for you, but if you live to chocolate this is a must buy! Ben & Jerry's® The Tonight Dough Ice Cream";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: amazinggracematthew
text;;;: I am a huge ice cream fan I usually dont buy a pint or whatever I usually go out to ice cream shop a little mom and pop shop since thats an option during quarantine I love Ben and Jerrys the only one better than the tonight dough is half baked;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,justicem8,2020-07-27,5,,0,0,"No matter what flavor I choose Ive never gone wrong with Ben and Jerrys. One of the best ice cream brands, Ill admit its a bit pricy for its small container but its overall worth it. You wouldnt be disappointed with any flavor from this brand.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: mariaz15
text;;;: Okay I get it there's a famous person on the package yes of course I bought it. But I was very disappointed it's not as flavorful as it should be considering what favorite Parts he likes in the ice cream. Very disappointing will not buy again;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Emsicecream
title: Tasted stale
text;;;: I got a few of these at 7 11 thier was almost no cookie dough and the piece I did eat tasted very stale and gross. Not what I was expecting for the price didn't eat the other pint at all so gross and a waste of money also it wasn't expired.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,clairep2,2020-05-03,5,,0,0,"This is my absolute favorite Ben & Jerrys ice cream flavor. I love cookie dough and cookies in ice cream, and this has it all and more. So many of my favorite flavors packed into one pint. I never buy any other flavor anymore, only this one.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: katpereira21
text;;;: My best friend from high school and I would buy a whole pint of the tonight dough after every choir concert to celebrate one a trimester. We loved how similar it was to half baked but the added peanut butter cookie dough made it even better!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,sarahc354,2020-07-28,5,,0,0,"All time favorite ice cream!! Perfect cookie dough pieces, chocolate and caramel ice cream make for the richest and most delicious ice cream!! Ben and Jerrys always does the best when it comes to their ice cream and makes it worth the money";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: alyssam251
text;;;: This one is probably my absolute favorite ice cream all the different tastes and textures in it I love them it goes very well together I was very sad when one of my stores got rid of it because this is like I said my favorite ice cream ever;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
text;;;: Dangerously delicious. Its my familys favorite flavor by far. Its hard to put down once you pick it up. It has all my favorite flavors and would definitely be my first choice as a dessert. Im a sucker for the cookie dough and brownie in it!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,jackien33,2020-07-28,5,,0,0,"Ahhh its sooo good ! It has everything in it ! Chocolate chip cookie dough, peanut butter cookie dough, caramel, and a chocolate cookie swirl . Its cookie dough ice cream but richer in flavor . Its pricey for the size but worth the flavor .";;;

The Tonight Dough,jeffreyb66c1,2019-03-06,5,,0,0,"This is one of Ben and Jerrys best ice cream flavors, like all Ben and Jerrys ice creams this is loaded with cookie pieces. If you are lucky you can sometimes get these 3 for 6 but if you arent lucky youre stuck spending anywhere from $3-$5";;;

The Tonight Dough,hilaryb4,2018-10-03,5,,0,0,"This is my favorite flavor of Ben and Jerry's! It has chocolate, it has cookie dough and cookie pieces so what's not to love! I have recommended this ice cream to everyone I know and have even converted some of my friends from other brands.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: jasmineo25
text;;;: EVERY single Ben and Jerrys ice cream flavor is absolutely amazing Im in love! Its a little on the pricey side but theres always so many ingredients so its definitely a special treat Ben and Jerrys is definitely my favorite ice cream brand!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: kate5098
text;;;: Oh my gosh this is my favorite ice cream!! Its very affordable. It has multiple doughs in it that are delicious!! I love how its not too sweet and too doughy. Every time I go to the store this is the ice cream I grab when I want ice cream.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,angelasc911,2020-07-26,3,,0,0,"Not my favorite Ben and Jerrys, there is a lot going on with the crunchy cookies and peanut butter. Wouldnt ever be my first choice but hey its still good and I finished it. If I was offered it, I would say yes but I wouldnt buy it again.";;;

The Tonight Dough,saras79,2020-07-30,5,,0,0,"My fave by Ben and Jerry. Like the different cHunks of dough. I havent bought any in a while. Sometimes I notice my cups were loaded with goodies and other times not so much. Kinda inconsistent, but its been years. I should go buy a pint.";;;

The Tonight Dough,trelawneye,2019-11-03,3,,0,0,"I prefer some of their other flavours. Personally I feel like this one has a little too much going on. Also I love Ben and Jerrys but can get more ice cream from other brands for much less, so I can only afford this as a sometimes treat.";;;

The Tonight Dough,themayaabdulr,2020-07-29,4,,0,0,"Super yummy and love Jimmy Fallon, Im just not a huge peanut butter person so it definitely threw me off when trying this. Still super delicious and I would eat it if I was in the mood for it, love the cookie dough and brownies as well!";;;

The Tonight Dough,,2020-02-03,5,,0,0,"Best grocery store ice cream. The peanut butter cookie dough bites with the brownies makes the perfect combination of sweet and salty. Although the ice cream is very heavy, it is a delicious dessert to have a spoonful of every so often.";;;

The Tonight Dough,,2018-12-01,5,,0,0,"Ugh so good. The combo of caramel, brownie, and whatever else is in there (can’t remember at the moment) is so great. It’s a little high calorie but so good. I also only buy this on sale because it’s like $6 at rite aid which is insane.";;;

The Tonight Dough,callmeladymary,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"One of the few flavors at the 7/11 across the street from me, so Ive had this one a few times when Im craving ice cream late at night. All textures and flavors I enjoy in this one, so I dont mind that its one of the only options I have.";;;

The Tonight Dough,katld4a6,2020-07-18,5,,0,0,"This pint is one of my favorites! All the mix-ins I could want. I always find the ice cream base of Ben & Jerrys to be perfectly creamy too! It is a bit pricy so I try to find it on sale or 2-for-1! If youve not tried it, pick one up!";;;

The Tonight Dough,jasminer629e,2020-04-01,5,,0,0,"This is my favorite ice cream. Nothing else to say. It's hot perfect chunks of choclate and peanutbutter it is my guilty pleasure. Although ben and Jerry's can get super expensive, sometimes I treat myself to this wonderful creation.";;;

The Tonight Dough,katietabisz95,2020-03-07,5,,0,0,"This ice cream literally makes me weak because its so good haha! The tonight dough is the best flavor of ice cream ever created, and it is impossible to not eat the whole thing in one sitting! Absolutely delicious and would recommend";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: nicolen97
text;;;: This ice cream is HEAVEN. SOOO good with chocolate chip cookie dough and peanut butter cup together its a great mixture of both. Good balance. Im not one for an overly heavy kinda chocolate ice cream but this one is a good treat.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,JordanB23,2019-01-24,1,Changed the Recipe???,0,0,"I’ve had this flavor a few times and usually love it.. this last pint was alarmingly devoid of cookie dough. There were 3 huge chunks of cookie dough, the rest was just plain chocolate ice cream. I don’t know exactly what happened";;;

The Tonight Dough,melissaf3e07,2018-10-04,5,,0,0,"I love this ice cream. The cookie dough is so good and the ice cream has the perfect texture. Its nice that is has a combination of flavours of ice cream and cookie dough. It’s a little pricey, but it’s definitely worth the money.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: yoselinz
text;;;: Tried this ice cream for the first time a few days ago and it didnt disappoint. I loved the peanut butter and cookie dough mix. The caramel and chocolate ice cream didnt give it an overwhelming sweetness to it. Must try ice cream!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,billb,2020-07-30,4,,0,0,"This I've cream is perfect for people who like a lot of ""stuff"" in their ice cream. It honestly had a great Balance of stuff to ice cream. I love that it has everything in it... Great when you can't decide what you exactly want.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: emilys456
text;;;: This product is a chocolate cookie dough lover dream. The amount of cookie dough in this product is phenomenal. Its my main go to when I am craving raw cookie dough. Its definitely a product I would recommend and would buy again.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,suttono,2020-06-24,5,,0,0,"This is my favorite flavor from Ben & Jerrys. Everytime I get a different flavor, I realize it just doesnt add up to this flavor and I always go back and get this one. It has everything you want thats sweet in one pint! So good!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: aliciac25
text;;;: Ben and Jerrys is my absolute go to ice cream. In my opinion it is worth the price tag on it. I really really wish they made bigger sizes though. All flavors are amazing I would definitely recommend there ice cream to everyone.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: melanieh8801
text;;;: This flavor is sooo delicious! It has a little bit of all the doughs/cookies and brownies that everyone loves. The caramel and chocolate ice creams combine very well with all the flavors of doughs and make for one tasty treat.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Ansssss
title: Amazing
text;;;: Every single Friday me and my boyfriend each get a pint of this amazing ice cream. This is by far the only Ice cream I eat and I will drive to 4-5 different stores just to find this flavor. 10/10 would recommend it is amazing.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: hrburdo05
text;;;: This is my absolute favorite ice cream ever. I love love love Ben and Jerrys and this flavor is soooooo good!!! May be a little expensive for just a pint but still the flavor makes up for the price. 11/10 rating if possible :);;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: kaitlyng6
text;;;: My husband turned me onto this flavor and it is super good. Its very expensive for a small bit though so we definitely dont buy often. I found that HEB has a flavor very similar so we constantly buy that one instead for price;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,geniuswithADD,2017-08-31,5,Literally Heaven,0,0,"I'm not a huge ice cream person. I don't really buy it on my own - just eat it when offered from other folks. However, after my friend gave me a taste of this, I've been searching for it ever since!";;;

The Tonight Dough,Finfid,2018-10-14,1,Sympathy for my tummy,1,6,"Overall the flavor is good. You just have to avoid looking at the label when eating it, otherwise seeing that smug face might make you queasy.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: emilys25a0
text;;;: This was pretty good! It has all the flavors I love in ice cream. It was rich but also so satisfying. Anyone who is a fan of chocolate and baked goods in your ice cream are certainly going to love this just as much as I did!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,,2020-07-10,4,,0,0,"This is my favorite Ben & Jerrys. I only get it when Im splurging as the price is very high, and I can get a whole gallon from most other brands for this price. But the flavors of this one are good and they are very balanced";;;

The Tonight Dough,erin_holl,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"This is one of my favorite ice cream flavors! It is packed with chocolate chip and peanut butter cookie dough, chocolate cookie crumbles mixed into chocolate and caramel ice cream. Everything you could want in an ice cream!";;;
The Tonight Dough,emrenick33,2020-06-26,5,,0,0,"This is my favorite Ben & Jerrys ice cream EVER;" plus Jimmy Fallon makes me giggle. It has all my favorites
author: cookie dough
date: chocolate fudge chunks (similar to the Dairy Queen ice cream cake filling)

name: The Tonight Dough
author: caroandgmom
text;;;: My all time favorite flavor. Ben & Jerrys has been around a long time. I think the Price is similar to other pint sized ice cream packages. And this one is responsibly produced. Delicious and socially responsible. Win Win;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: dawng006c
text;;;: This is my favorite flavor of the Ben & Jerrys ice cream. I love cookie dough and the pieces are a pretty good size as well. It is rather pricey but in this case its absolutely worth it. Every chance I get I treat myself.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,member9e45e1,2019-05-01,5,,0,0,"Soooo good. Chocolate therapy is my go to when my therapist isn't available haha, but The Tonight Dough is a close second for favorite. I love all the different treats you find in this flavor! Especially the cookie dough.";;;

The Tonight Dough,skyeleer,2020-07-24,5,,0,0,"This is one of my favorite ice cream flavors because it has two delicious cookie dough flavors, peanut butter and chocolate chip! All the flavors mix so well together. The flavor is also fun because Jimmy Fallon is great!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: Ginny
title: AMAZING!
text;;;: I bought this for the first time a couple weeks ago and now i can't stop buying it!! I love the different textures. It's definitely my new favorite!! Is this flavor going to be around awhile or is it a limited time thing?;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,sarahatoms,2020-07-24,5,,0,0,"One of my favorite go to ice creams to eat! I love eating thing with some wine or on a date night as I dont eat ice cream too often but when I do, I get the tonight dough flavor! So good! I binge eat this once I open it!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: jamiesonwhisky
text;;;: My fav Ben and Jerrys flavor. Im not a huge ice cream fan but i do love this flavor. It is really sweet so Im only able to have like 4 bites at a time which is really random but hey i did say Im not a huge ice cream fan.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,Vivbelle,2017-11-27,5,Haa everything you need in an ice cream!,0,0,"This has everything you need in a great ice cream flavor. It's like i went to an ice cream shop and had them make something special for me. I've never had a better flavor! I would add a pic, but it's all gone. So yum!";;;

The Tonight Dough,mainstreamdiy,2020-07-31,5,,0,0,"By far my favorite flavor ice cream. However, I could do without the peanut butter flavor. Nonetheless this packaging and concept is literally everything and I tell everyone to get this anytime they have an opportunity.";;;

The Tonight Dough,___thelittle1,2018-11-07,5,,0,0,"By far the best ice cream I have ever tasted! The mix in this ice cream is perfection and you can’t get enough of it! It’s expensive, but when it’s on sale it worth every penny! You won’t want any other ice cream again.";;;

The Tonight Dough,meaghank27,2018-11-14,5,,0,0,"I would die for this ice cream! Although it is on the more expensive side, it is worth it. It is rich in flavor and creamy, added with amazing snacks such as cookie dough. I would buy this ice cream over and over again.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: Amber
title: Best ice cream ever.
text;;;: Honestly. I hope this never goes away. It's amazing! I love the many different flavors and gobs of cookie dough and the cookie swirl and everything else. It's like the ultimate ice cream flavor. Definitely my favorite.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: ah240
text;;;: Not bad. I dont see it too many places. But its something that I would get like once in a blue moon isnt something Im crazy about. And there are better ice creams out there and I would only buy it if I had nothing else;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,lorim63,2020-07-23,3,,0,0,"This one is ok. Nothing for me to write home about. But as an avid Ben and Jerrys lover, I felt this one to be a bit lacking. Still tasty which is why I gave it 3 stars instead of less. I still love you Ben and Jerry!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: aarond765d
text;;;: The tonight dough is to die for! If you love ice cream and chocolate this is your pint. I would post pictures if I would of resisted eating it in time. Alittle more pricier than others but worth the extra investment!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: sierrasaxhet
text;;;: This is my FAVORITE ice cream in the world. So many insane flavors and dough inside. I try not to buy to often but when Im feeling down or its that time of the month that whole thing is downed in 10 minutes . Love!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,katelynf5822,2018-11-13,5,,0,0,"This ice cream quite literally captures the essence of what I call desert! I love cookie dough in any desert, and this is quite perfect! I have tried many other flavors and I have decided that this is my favorite!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: as85
text;;;: I think these ice cream individually packaged are expensive. This flavor is not my favorite at all. I dont think it is worth the money spent. You can get a lot more ice cream with a lot better options for cheaper.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: muppethans
text;;;: One of my favorite ice cream flavors ever. Usually my go to Ben and Jerrys. I love anything with cookie dough and this one is delicious. So good I usually eat the whole thing in one sitting. Definitely recommend!!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,MBring04,2017-05-12,5,PB Heaven,0,0,"I am obsessed with this. The chunks of cookie dough and peanut butter make this so amazing. Just the perfect amount of everything swirled into one amazing pint. Plus it's Jimmy Fallon, so how can you not love it!";;;

The Tonight Dough,alissabe874,2020-06-29,5,,0,0,"this is the best flavor that Ben and Jerrys has to offer, its filled with all of these chucks, and perfect if your treating yourself, only thing is I wish they had healthier options since its so high in calories";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: britdric
text;;;: Another great flavor from Ben and Jerrys! The peanut butter cookie dough isnt my favorite so I dont get this one anymore. Only downfall to Ben and Jerrys is the price but youre paying for quality to some degree.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: laurent76
text;;;: You cannot go wrong with any of the Ben and Jerrys flavors. They are all delicious and extremely satisfying. Their flavor filled bites make a little go a long way. I am a huge fan of them and their social@stance;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: vanessagkelly
text;;;: My go to ice cream when I want to mix it up from vanilla. Its not too much chocolate. Just enough and has the crunchy chips and perfect bite sizes of cookie dough too. Pint size is perfect! Love this ice cream!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,mykaelasc3e5,2018-08-01,5,,0,0,"Wonderful, delicious ice cream for when your just binge watching Netflix and you just want to have a night to yourself! This ice cream has such great flavor combos that allows you to just fall in love with it!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: ridasaqib7
text;;;: I really like this brand. It tastes natural and creamy. Smooth and crunchy ice cream. Very delicious. The texture is thick and just perfect. The prices are reasonable and can buy it from any store. Recommended;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: dthulin_
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream in the world. It has such a good flavor and texture. It is a little pricey compared to other ice cream brands at the grocery store but is definitely worth the extra dollar or two.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: maybeamakeupaddict
text;;;: This is one of my favorite Ben and Jerrys ice creams. It is a wonderful option for cookie dough lovers who want something a little more interesting or different. I definitely recommend purchasing this flavor.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: legse
text;;;: Ur not gonna get anything but 5 stars for 99% of Ben and Jerrys flavors and this one really delivers. It has huge chunks of cookies and brownie ... what more could you ask for ?? I would highly recommend this;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,Ryguy,2017-11-05,5,Best ice cream I've ever had in my 33 years...,0,0,"Duuuuuuuude! It sounded a little over the top with all l the cookies, but this is by far the best. Jimmy Fallon must have sold his soul to the devil to have come up with this devilish concoction... well done!";;;

The Tonight Dough,,2020-07-23,5,,0,0,"My absolute favorite flavor. I love the mix between the different flavors in it. I cant think of anything that would improve this flavor. I buy this all the time, I would definitely recommend this to others!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: xzarial
text;;;: This ice cream is the perfect size for you and a friend to share its yummy and doesnt melt fast the flavors really come through with its creamy goodness it is an affordable price and overall I purchase again;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: jordanl84d3
text;;;: The Tonight Dough is my absolute favorite ever! I could eat this all day everyday. I have to limit myself though because there are a lot of calories in this ice cream. Its so hard not to eat the whole pint.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,baileyr8,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"If I could rate this 20 stars I would. THIS IS LIFE CHANGING FLAVOR! The cookie bits? Chewy, decadent, wow factor. The swirls? Rich, sugary goodness. The ice cream? Picturesque Jay Gatsby-esque luciousness.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: avad12
text;;;: I have purchased this a couple of times. It captures a mix of ingredients that just make the perfect combination which is really hard to describe. My only complaint is that the cookie dough is really big.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,kristens79,2020-03-01,5,,0,0,"Love this ice cream! I love the cookie dough chunks and cookie crumble. Yum! This is a little expensive for what you get, but I love getting it to not share with anyone. Its a fun personal size. Its yummy!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: skylakea01
text;;;: Literally addicted to this flavor. The cookie crumbles throughout are something great that I look forward to . Im not a big fan of peanut butter so I do wish the cookie was a diff flavour but still great.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,Jen Berry,2020-05-10,5,What up Dough!,0,0,"Despite Jimmy Fallon's betrayal of Jay Leno to get the Tonight Show gig, I gave this one a try. WOW!! One of my favorites! I'm praying for the day Conan O'Brien dethrones Jimmy & we get a #TeamCoco flavor";;;

The Tonight Dough,simrenb,2020-07-08,4,,0,0,"I love this ice cream flavor. It has every thing a chocolate lover dreams of: choc ice cream, choc cookie swirls, choc chip cookie dough, AND peanut butter cookie dough. Absolutely brilliant, *chefs kiss*";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: typical tor
title: The Perfect Cream
text;;;: This is the perfect cream of the ice variety. The only thing that could possibly make it better would be to add brownie bites and/or peanut butter cups but that might be overkill with the toppings. 10/10.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,LisaK,2017-10-01,5,Probably my favorite ice cream of all time.,0,0,"And I have tried a lot of ice cream flavors. This ice cream flavor is dang near perfect, please whatever you do, never get rid of this flavor. I was a fan of half baked for years, but this is EVEN BETTER.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: miriuhhh
text;;;: This is such a good flavour from the Ben and Jerrys ... line? Haha. Its so delicious and such a treat. The texture and craziness of the ice cream is unmatched to other brands. I could eat this every day!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: siennag0b68
text;;;: It has to be one for my favorite Ben and Jerry's flavors! The cookie dough with the crunchy cookie swirl. Chocolate and vanilla ice cream really top notch but you really can only except the best from B&J;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,MK2730,2017-08-16,5,Best flavor I've ever had,0,0,"This is just amazing! It incorporates all my favorite flavors without being overwhelming - vanilla, chocolate, peanut butter and cookie dough. Honestly probably the best ice cream flavor I have ever had!";;;

The Tonight Dough,ticketsforfive,2020-07-28,4,,0,0,"Yum! Im not a huge fan of chocolate ice cream but this is so good because of all the other goodies mixed in with it. Ben and Jerrys are some of my favs bc I love the size, I dont mind trying new flavors.";;;

The Tonight Dough,indiap6002,2020-05-04,5,,0,0,"I am such a freaking fan of Ben and berries ice cream they are just so yummy Aarhus texture full. The flavors are just amazing! My personal favorites are brownie batter, half baked and the tonight dough!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: isobeldm
text;;;: This ice cream is the best! I love cookie dough and Ben and Jerrys quality of ice cream no matter which flavor you pick up is gonna make you taste buds explode! But the cookie dough one is just heavenly;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Jess08
title: Just so good
text;;;: Honestly the best ice cream you can buy in the frozen food aisle. After this no other ice cream that claims to have chunks of cookie dough will do. Y'all set the bar super high with this one. Nice job!!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
text;;;: Best ice cream ever. I'm a sucker for cookie dough and this is filled with it. The ice cream has a smoothe texture and filled with mix ins. The only downside is that this ice cream and very expensive.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: idks
text;;;: This is such a good midnight snack! I always get it. Its one of my favorite Ben and Jerrys flavors. Its a bit pricey but its on sale a lot. Its also such a good splurge. The flavors combine very well.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,,2020-07-31,5,,0,0,"I love this product, it is one of my favorites. This product takes the best out of other products and combines them. I would not change anything about this product. I would recommend this to everyone.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: daablauren
text;;;: I am not a sweets personal but ice cream is my GUILTY pleasure. This is by far my favorite. It has chocolate and cookie dough and peanut butter and all the good things. I wish I didnt like it so much;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,77_cupcake_77,2019-11-01,5,,0,0,"So yummy!! When I have a sweets craving I have a few spoonfuls of this ice cream, ok ok I usually eat like half the jar haha i am a huge Ben and Jerrys fan and this is just one of my many favourites";;;

The Tonight Dough,abbys51,2020-07-30,5,,0,0,"This is hands down one of my favorite ice creams. It is so decadent and delicious. It is a bit pricey, but it's sooo good. I will buy this again and again. It will satisfy your sweet tooth for sure.";;;

The Tonight Dough,teddyandlaur,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"This ice cream falls in the treat your self category. If you like love chocolate chip cookie dough and are craving peanut butter too, this should be the flavor you reach for on the freezer section.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: staceyr6
text;;;: One of my most favorite ice creams! Has a little bit of everything and definitely satisfies all your sweet cravings. Perfect for that time of the month. A little pricey but definitely worth the buy;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: allysonp8
text;;;: This has quickly become a favorite in our household. The different flavors and textures work together nicely and we have to make ourselves put it away before we eat it all in one sitting! Must try!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,nicolel36,2020-07-23,5,,0,0,"I love Ben and Jerrys! Its a little pricey but its sooo good! This is my absolute favorite flavor. Its full of cookie dough and brownie bits, and the vanilla chocolate swirl is great for any mood!";;;

The Tonight Dough,Purple77,2018-04-01,5,My #2 favorite by a tiny margin!,0,0,"So delicious, I have a hard time stopping myself from eating the whole thing. The chocolatey crunchy swirl stuff is simply amazing, andas I eat I hope to get some in every bite. Sooooo yummmmy!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: kierraapratt
text;;;: This is the best flavor of Ben and Jerrys! Not only is their ice cream perfectly creamy and decadent but the brand is active in speaking up for injustices that are taking place in todays society!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: ashleyr55555
text;;;: I love this ice cream. I have not been able to find an ice cream that I like better. I personally would change the fact it has peanut butter. But other than that it's perfect. Overall I would re;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: livaukerman
text;;;: THE BEST ICE CREAM EVER!! It has both peanut butter cookie dough and chocolate chip cookie dough with delicious chocolate cookie swirls. Its hands down the absolute best Ben & Jerry flavor ever.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: lizzi05
title: Love this so much!
text;;;: I've been in love with Ben and Jerry's ever since I tasted my first bite. My first bite of Ben and Jerry's was The Tonight Dough. I fell in love with it ever since! In my opinion it is the best!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,pilargomesf,2019-04-05,5,,0,0,"My favorite ice cream of all times, I love the cookie dough pieces in it. Is very affordable compared to similar brands, and is just delicious. Ive been a consumer, and I will be buying it again";;;

The Tonight Dough,vv21,2018-04-08,5,This Ice Cream Flavor Is Life Changing,0,0,"Seriously, I had this ice cream flavor for the first time two weeks ago and I have bought it 10 times since. It is so good and I cannot stop eating it. I hope they never get rid of this flavor.";;;

The Tonight Dough,David 456789,2017-09-04,5,Amazing,0,0,"It looks and sounds like a kitchen sink type of flavor, but it works. It is so good. both times i went to the store i was lucky enough to grab the last tub left on the shelf. I cant get enough.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: haleigho1
text;;;: I love this ice cream! Cookie dough is my weakness and this cookie dough ice cream is no joke. Its so dang good. Whenever I get this ice cream I never want to share because it is just so good!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
text;;;: Another amazing Ben & Jerry's flavor! Recommend this flavor to everyone! It's got a little bit of everything that makes amazing ice cream. Plus it's inspired by Jimmy Fallon! We love that guy!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Lyssa136
title: BEST ICE CREAM EVER!
text;;;: This is one of the best ice cream flavors ever! I'm so in love with this flavor that I had to search every store until I found it again! I buy two every time I find it!! Please keep making it!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,morganh7289,2018-11-08,5,,0,0,"This is my all-time favorite ice cream. Creamy, chunky, sweet, savory. It is the best and I can eat a whole pint in a sitting. Love that every bite is a little different. Will always recommend";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: klhammell
text;;;: These are amazing. I love The Tonight Dough pints but always end up eating way too much. You look down and the pint is gone. These are great for portion control. Plus its covered in chocolate!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,samanthao56,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"You can never go wrong with Ben & Jerrys flavor, but this is my go to always it never fails to fulfill my sweet tooth! I would recommend this to anybody when trying a flavor of Ben & Jerrys!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: Alan
title: Hate Jimmy Fallon but love this ice cream!
text;;;: I'm a big chunky monkey guy but this is one of your best. And the fact the money goes to charity is even better. Why couldn't you name this after the Roots. You know Quest? loves this stuff!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: mindyybraga
text;;;: This is my ultimate favorite ice cream flavor! Heaven bless ben and jerry's for creating this flavor with jimmy fallon. All of the cookies are combined in this flavor and it's simply amazing;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,beck35,2018-08-29,5,SO AMAZING,0,0,"this is my favorite ice cream. whenever i’m down, i eat this and it makes me feel so much better. the flavors come together just perfectly, and i will never stop buying this ice cream. 15/10";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: lcook23
title: BEST ICE CREAM YOU WILL EVER EAT IN YOUR LIFE
text;;;: Just buy the ice cream. Honestly. It is so good. Everyone I’ve ever talked to about Ben and Jerry’s ice cream says this is their favorite and I’m sure it will be yours too after you try it.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: zoek8
text;;;: I love Ben and Jerrys Ive cream. My go to flavor is the chocolate chip cookie dough. There are so many amazing flavors to choose from. I definitely recommend trying this brand of ice cream.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,emilya352b,2019-03-05,5,,0,0,"Best ice cream, my personal favourite is the half baked but this is a second hands down. They dont rip you off of chocolate chunks peanut butter chunks but they do over do it. Its the best";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: hayleyf4
text;;;: Ben & Jerrys always keeps it interesting. You get a different bite every time. The tonight dough has been a recent flavor of mine. Although it is kind of pricey.... it doesnt keep me away!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: tanisha
title: best flavour yet!
text;;;: this is my favourite ice cream! i bought it 2 weeks ago for the first time and i always pick some up when I'm grocery shopping! never stop making this flavour ... its beyond delicious!!!!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,kroulina,2018-12-01,3,,0,0,"I bought that for me and my mom, we didn’t like much, I think we were expecting more of this as we love other brands (same flavor). I felt a little bit of coffe and not much of chocolate.";;;

The Tonight Dough,Amberlesque,2017-09-11,5,Thank Jimmy Fallon,0,0,"This by far the best I've had although many flavors are extremely good the tonight dough is the best, thus far I am hooked... thank You Jimmy Fallon for your late night contribution...";;;

The Tonight Dough,AnnaT,2020-08-01,5,The perfect cookie dough ice cream,0,0,"I love the flavors of the cookie dough and the combination of the ice cream are a perfect match. I used to like Half Baked, but I'm not a fan of chocolate chips. I love this ice cream.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: memberd23bb
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream. It is basically the only ice cream I will eat. If they ever discontinue this specific flavor or whatever you want to call it I do not know what I will do;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,,2020-06-29,5,,0,0,"Ben & Jerrys flavors are all fantastic and theres so much variety to choose from. Plus, theyre a great company that does a lot of impressive work on social issues. Worth all the money.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: stoneyr
text;;;: Love love love this ice cream! Loaded with stuff! Flavor is so good! Very affordable! No need to improve the ice cream :) very delicious! Not disappointing! I highly recommend this :);;;

name: The Tonight Dough
text;;;: Ben and Jerrys Ice cream is so good! Like its so delicious. Definitely my favorite brand of ice cream. They have so many delicious flavors and this one is one of my personal favorites;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: dkuhl
text;;;: Love the combo of this ice cream! So good and so flavorful! I have bought this on multiple occasions and enjoy it every time. Its affordable and worth every penny. I would recommend!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: sammy loves icecream
title: my favorite flavor ever!
text;;;: so i tried this for the first time over the summer and i literally have my mom buy it every time we go to the store. it’s had just the right amount of the cookie dough and ice cream;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,michfluenster,2020-07-27,5,,0,0,"Bought this when I was craving a new chocolatey ice cream & it did not disappoint, Ben & Jerrys is a bit expensive for my liking but when they go on sale, its definitely worth it!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: vibewbai
text;;;: This ice cream is really good. It has brownie chunks and peanut butter cookie chunks with vanilla and chocolate. I gave this 3 stars because it had a lil too much chocolate for me;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: marisar12
text;;;: You can't go wrong with Ben and Jerrys ice cream and this flavor is among the best flavors they have my only criticism is that I will they would make this one in their vegan line;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: kamilleleigh
text;;;: This is my favorite flavor of Ben and Jerry's! It is amazingly good. I highly recommend buying it if you haven't. It is kinda pricey but really worth it compared to other brands.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: lovelymeggs
text;;;: These things are amazing! I love everything about these. So much chocolate and the outer chocolate shell makes it perfect. Again these are kind of pricy so I dont get them often.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,Erik,2018-09-06,5,Please tell me this isn't for a limited time only!,0,0,"For the love of everything holy, please tell me this wasn't a limited run. I got hooked on this amazing flavor and now I can't find it anywhere! This ice cream is the bomb!!!!!";;;

The Tonight Dough,sarahm3,2019-12-05,5,,0,0,"Honestly, I really g day not think you can go wrong with any Ben and Jerrys ice cream. The ice cream is rich and creamy and the toppings are perfectly added in with every bite.";;;

The Tonight Dough,kellyc187,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"The Tonight Dough is so delicious. The peanut butter dough balls surprise you and are so awesome. It has chocolate chip and peanut butter dough pieces, and chocolate crunchies.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: Tierra
title: Favourite all time ice cream
text;;;: There will be days where I just need a good pint of Tonight Dough. It never fails and always does the trick!! <3 <3 it's my favourite ice cream and is the best of all worlds!!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,evaz5,2020-07-03,5,,0,0,"Wow this ice cream is amazing! There are so many amazing ingredients and they all go really well together. It is super creamy, affordable, and amazing! I would recommend this!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: laurens260
text;;;: This is my favorite Ben and Jerrys flavor. Its just so good. The cookie dough chunks are the best. The only issue with it is trying to not eat the entire pint in one sitting.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: ronnideann
text;;;: Ive tried multiple different flavors of Ben and Jerrys but I keep coming back to The Tonight Dough. It has the perfect amount of chocolate chip and peanut butter cookie dough.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,lindsayj3239,2020-07-25,4,,0,0,"THIS IS MY FAVORITE!! I love this as a treat, not keen on keep large amounts of ice cream in the house, so I love the little pints of Ben & Jerrys & this flavor is the BOMB!!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: tarynananthony
text;;;: So delicious it's so bad but yet too good to say no to. I love how many different kinds they have to try . These aren't go to ice cream. Love wit when they go on sale deals;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,Rosie,2019-04-20,5,Love it,0,0,"I love it. Bought it earlier today and it’s great! A bit too sweet for me but I would recommend someone to get this. Even though it’s a bit sweet for me, this is my favorite";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: meltargaryen
text;;;: This is one of my favorite flavors of ice cream - I once had my friend take out all the dough in this ice cream to attempt to bake it and it did in fact bake into a cookie.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: adrial8697
text;;;: Hands down the best ice cream flavor for lovers of chocolate and cookies! We go back and forth between this and Half Baked and decided this one is better by a small margin.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: beckier3
text;;;: You can never go wrong with Ben&Jerrys!!! Its pricey but worth every penny. Stores often have sales so it isnt too bad. Its delicious and very easy to eat the whole thing!!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,meganh151,2020-07-27,5,,0,0,"THE BEST ICE CREAM!! Big chunks of cookie dough, tasty ice cream and perfect flavors! I love the size because if you eat the whole container its not too much 10/10! Love!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: missvanidee
text;;;: Best Ben&Jerrys Ice Cream ever! Seriously you have to try this! The little cookie dough bits is a sweet surprise! They werent stingy too! I could eat a tub in one sitting!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Jamie18
title: One of my favorites!!
text;;;: This is one of my favorites! I love everything except the peanut butter cookie dough. The peanut butter cookie dough is ok but I wouldn’t miss it if it was not in there.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,shanpagnemarie,2020-07-29,5,,0,0,"The BEST, most indulgent ice cream of all time!! This is my go to b&j flavor, its so delicious. Peanut butter, cookie dough, fudge swirls... you cant go wrong with this.";;;

The Tonight Dough,laurettepp,2020-05-01,4,,0,0,"Really good ice cream, it is a nice desert, usually during summer time when it's really hot oustide. You have different flavour which is nice when you try something else";;;

The Tonight Dough,eme4usa,2020-07-26,5,,0,0,"If you are craving cookie dough ice cream this is it! It has the perfect cookie dough to ice cream ratio, you dont have to dig through the pint to get the perfect bite.";;;

The Tonight Dough,courtneyg100,2020-07-24,5,,0,0,"This is the best cookie dough ice cream you could get! As with most Ben & Jerrys ice cream, its a little pricey, so more of a treat! But its one of my favorite flavors!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: sarahm9987
text;;;: Every single flavour of Ben and Jerrys is to die for. Idk what secret ingredient is in these but if you havent had Ben and Jerrys before you should definitely try it!!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: jpaiva90
text;;;: If I could give this flavor 10 stars I would. This combination is so good. Sweet and chewy combined with the great texture of Ben and Jerry's ice cream. Cant go wrong.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Christina
title: Great!
text;;;: My favorite ice cream of all time! Everything about it is delicious and perfect! I’ve always loved chocolate chip cookie dough but this takes it to a whole new level!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: amanda_day
text;;;: I was underwhelmed with this flavor. I was expecting BIG cookiedough flavor but it was definitely lacking. Perhaps I'm a ice cream snob or maybe I just know my stuff.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: jessw65
text;;;: So yummy. I wish they had this flavor in the dairy-free version but its still an occasional treat. Love the messaging Ben & Jerrys has been putting out recently too!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: arielhasasecret
text;;;: What a great flavor. My local corner/convenience store has these in stock. I deducted a star because its a little messy since the shell cracks when you bite into it.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: nesmetb
text;;;: My favorite ice cream I literally love this ice cream so much its my go to ice cream when Im upset and when Im happy and when Im just normal just because its so good;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: brandyd23
text;;;: LOVED IT!! If you enjoy cookie dough and peanut butter and chocolate welcome to your new favorite ice cream treat!! I had make myself ration the tub its that good!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: melissarff26
text;;;: This is one of my favorite combos. I love anything with peanut butter and chocolate. Its very similar to like Oreo cookie and Reeces but masterfully mixed together.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,Ceonnie02,2019-10-21,5,Great features,0,0,"Omg when I say this is my favorite flavor ever it’s definitely not an understatement, I buy a pint practically everynight please don’t ever discontinue the flavor.";;;

The Tonight Dough,kaylab259,2020-07-27,3,,0,0,"Definitely enjoyed this ice cream, could have done without the peanut butter cookies pieces thats just me. Loved the ice cream base and regular cookie dough pieces";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: memberdf92d1bcd
text;;;: Best Ben & Jerrys flavor ice cream! I can eat the whole tub. It has the perfect amount of mix ins and the ice cream itself is so rich. The price is reasonable too.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: brenie
title: What happened???
text;;;: Tonight Dough was my favorite B & J flavor til this last one. Absolutely NO chocolate swirl in the whole carton. Very disappointing. Did you change the recipe?;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,IAteTheWholeThing,2018-09-13,5,Seriously good,0,0,"I’ve never written a review on ice cream, but this one deserves one! Perfectly balanced cookie dough to ice cream ratio, the cookie pieces were plenty. Delicious!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: erikav26
text;;;: I absolutely love this ice cream. I dont know about you guys but this is the best ice cream Ive ever had. A little of everything that I love in just one spoonful.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: emmalinemary
text;;;: The best flavor of Ben & Jerry's Ice Cream. The chocolate and caramel ice cream with the cookie dough bites just cant be beat. Hard not to eat the whole container;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Sophie
title: Best ice cream ever!!
text;;;: I buy this once a month as a cheat dessert!! It's so delicious and perfect we just share the pint but I could finish it myself. Wish I could buy it by the gallon;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,dawnnadeaulewis,2018-09-09,5,,0,0,"I love the creamieness of Ben & Jerry's and the flavors never disappoint, this has always been my favorite flavor and I splerg everytime I hit the grocery store.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: Jen25
title: Amazing New Flavor
text;;;: I absolutely LOVE This ice cream.... It has so much going on and so many things to taste you never wanna stop taking a spoonful. Just amazing. Its mouth watering;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: grscevirginia
title: Amazing!
text;;;: I buy this every once in a while to treat myself and they're so amazing. Perfect if you just want a little bit of ice cream or if you're craving something cool.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: sportslove
text;;;: I love this ice cream so much! I love the flavor and the texture. You dont have to get this flavor though because all of Ben and Jerrys ice cream is wonderful.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: belladoll94
text;;;: This is my favorite B&Js flavor because I love ice cream with a lot of stuff. The price point is a little high but its worth treating yourself every now & then.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: annwhitakermessman
text;;;: My son's favorite! Plenty of chunks of yummy goodness! The flavors blend together nicely. He can't get enough of it and will eat the entire pint in one sitting.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: sarabearycanny
text;;;: This is a pretty solid offering from Ben and Jerry's. They just have other flavors that I prefer. It is definitely tasty but it's not the flavor I reach for.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,beatrixrforkids,2020-07-29,5,,0,0,"Probably my favorite B&J flavor. It is such a good mix of textures and flavors. I dont know if Jimmy Fallon had anything to do with development, but its great.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: AliDoodle
title: i'm going to gain 100 lbs before my wedding.
text;;;: This ice cream is amazing. I wish I was never offered to taste it because I am most definitely addicted to The Tonight Dough. It is so chocolately wonderful.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,sarahp293,2020-07-31,5,,0,0,"When Im having a cheat day or half day, this is my goto. It is everything you could want in an ice cream and more! Salty, sweet, crunchy, soft. It has it all";;;

The Tonight Dough,tanyaa5d6a,2019-11-01,5,,0,0,"The Tonight Dough is one of the only flavors of Been & Jerry's that I can have, but that's ok because it's delicious. It has the perfect mix of ingredients.";;;

The Tonight Dough,Peg4sis,2018-06-13,5,"Awesome, I love all the ingredients!",0,0,"Sometimes I eat this every night! I just wish it came in larger quantities, i.e., bigger than pint-sized. Because I buy 3-4 pints at a time, just in case.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: Kgow
title: Best of the best
text;;;: A step up from phish food and half baked the peanut butter cookie dough is the perfect way to add a small taste of PB instead of globs of overpowering PB;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: susanl34
text;;;: This ice cream is everything!! Its the best I have ever had. I could eat it all the time. Its expensive but totally worth it. The best flavor hands down.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: nicolinah
text;;;: Sooooo good. My only complaint is that it has vanilla and chocolate ice cream and I wished they made something comparable with only chocolate ice cream.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,lisas245,2020-07-24,4,,0,0,"Love this ice cream and its one of my go-to flavors. Its delicious and I dont need to eat the whole thing, because it hits the sweet spot a few bites in";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: monicadnowf
text;;;: oh god! this ice cream is the devil because it is so good. i legit have to stop myself from eating this whole thing in like seconds. it tastes so good!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: _laurenester_
text;;;: This is good because I live for this flavor BUT it pails in comparison to a pint of the tonight dough. If your into sandwiches then you may enjoy this.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: robynw4
text;;;: 100% the best ice cream I have ever had. This has bits of chocolate crunch almost like an ice cream cake would have. Definitely expensive but WORTH IT.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,katelyneca49,2019-12-04,5,,0,0,"This is hands down my favorite flavor from Ben and Jerrys. I always struggle spending so much on a pint of ice cream, though. My go to flavor for sure!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: ogrose
text;;;: Tonight dough is the best Ben and Jerrys flavor. There I said it. Not the biggest fan of jimmy fallon but he did come up with a great ice cream flavor.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,Crw89,2019-07-24,1,Ew,0,0,"The ""chocolate cookie swirl"" has a terrible texture! Sort of like spent coffee grounds. The grittiness has cause us to stop eating it. What a waste :(";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: Sugarbliss
title: Delicious!!
text;;;: One of the best ice creams I’ve ever had! I love the big chances of cookie dough! Once in a while I will splurge and buy a pint for myself. Delicious!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,emmaro1397,2019-05-02,5,,0,0,"Perfect mix of cookie dough and brownie batter. I love raw cookie dough and batters, which i know is not recommended. This is a delicious alternative!";;;
The Tonight Dough,khummel,2020-07-08,5,,0,0,"This is my absolute favorite flavor and these bars sized treats are the best, they help with portion control and are packed with bits of cookie dough!";;;
The Tonight Dough,rhyanl2,2020-07-17,5,,0,0,"This is the best flavor Ben and Jerrys has hands down. Its affordable, good ice cream. You cant go wrong. A definite win in the ice cream department.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: kabeach87
text;;;: By far my favorite flavor. Im a huge Jimmy Fallon fan so I had to try it when it came out. Then all the cookie dough and chocolate its just perfect.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: christyc50
text;;;: My absolute FAVORITE B&J flavor! A perfect mix of fudge and cookie dough that leaves you wanting for more! There's nothing else out there like this!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,KatB,2017-07-15,5,Delicious!,0,0,"This is one of my favorite flavors! It has everything I'm looking for! Large mix-ins, a rich base, and lots of chocolate cookie swirls... so yummy!";;;
The Tonight Dough,,2020-04-02,5,,0,0,"Ben & Jerry's The Tonight Dough Ice Cream! Is AMAZING it has such a good flavour and you can really tell it's real ice cream and not ""iced dessert""";;;
The Tonight Dough,matts86bd,2020-07-09,5,,0,0,"Theres no greater ice cream or flavor than this guy! If youre counting calories keep walking. But if its deliciousness you seek, you better buy it!";;;
The Tonight Dough,chelbyc1,2018-07-01,5,,0,0,"Ben and Jerry’s ice cream is amazing. My other downfall with it, is that it is expensive so we can only get at specific times when it goes on sale.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: theblogista
text;;;: My favorite cheat on my diet ice cream. Love the cookie dough pieces throughout. Perfect mix of chocolate and vanilla. Its also pretty affordable.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Gasmanz
title: Almost Great
text;;;: I bought this a few days ago. Loved the flavors but the sugar in the cookie dough seemed very crystallized. A little bit too coarse for my liking.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: apinto
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream! The flavor is awesome and they do not skimp on the toppings inside. It is pretty expensive for a small tub though.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: sheeenanana
title: I dream about this ice cream
