text;;;: I am literally going to my 4th store looking for this flavor. I am addicted to it. It's the best ice cream I've ever had and that's saying a lot.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: allisond29
text;;;: Always my favorite Ben & Jerry ice cream! I typically cant choose between a cookie dough flavor or a brownie flavor so this is the perfect combo!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,ndrrslbnzslrz,2019-03-06,5,,0,0,"I mean this is delicious, especially considering that this is the dairy-free version, which makes you less guilty to eat that much of ice cream.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: tiffanycookhm
text;;;: This is my holy grail ice cream! I have been eating this for a year now ! I have to get it every time I go to Safeway! Very creamy and tasteful!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: hailyann
text;;;: I love Ben and Jerrys! I would die for Ben and Jerrys. What a gift to this world they are and their ice cream is delicious. Love them five stars;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,melissabc6a3,2020-07-27,4,,0,0,"Not my favorite flavor, Im not a huge fan of the PB dough pieces even though I love peanut butter. This is my husbands favorite flavor though!!!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: imairisiha
text;;;: this is by far my boyfriends favorite ice cream. ive tried it before and its great. theres a lot of different textures and theyre all very good.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: kaylynh1
text;;;: Love love love this flavor. Its so delicious and different than other flavors. I try to but it when its BOGO at Publix or other super markets;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: teresar
text;;;: So yummy! Ben and jerry is alway my go to@ice cream. Not your typical flavors but thats why I love about them. There is something for everyone;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: kkapper
text;;;: I hope this flavor never leaves!!!! It’s so hard to find but when i do find it i stock up! It’s has every one of my favorites! Best ice cream.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,oogillem,2020-01-05,5,,0,0,"SO good. I love this ice cream and all the chunks! One of my all time favorites, it has a little bit for everyone. Love the PB cookie dough";;;
The Tonight Dough,aleighaw,2020-07-30,5,,0,0,"This is the best store bought ice cream Ive ever had! It has so much deliciousness packed into this small pint. Seriously, try this stuff!!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: sarahl4c0a
text;;;: It’s delicious! The amount of cookie dough and brownie chunks is significant compared to the total amount of ice cream which is fantastic!!!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: angelapb797
text;;;: This flavor is amazing! Its the best little snack to have. My neighbor told me I had to try it so she got me some and I ate the whole thing;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: phoebec14
text;;;: You just have to try it- its the perfect dessert especially for those with a sweet tooth- all you need is a spoonful and it hits the spot!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: carmenn
text;;;: I love the flavor. This is a great brand i can remember since i was a kid. Their flavors are always yummy and the quality is always great.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
text;;;: Nice flavor from this brand and I of my favorite icecream. Will be buying it any time soon. Also I would recommend buying it to everyone.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: jairal2
text;;;: I love these bars. Theyre like what a Klondike used to be. Thick hard chocolate shell with ice cream and plenty of add ins on the inside.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: MissMarvel616
title: Best. Ice Cream. Ever.
text;;;: This ice cream blew me out of the water. I tried it and fell in love immediately. I can never go back to regular cookie dough after this.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: courtneyr33
text;;;: Best ice cream out there. Pretty expensive for the size. But my god is it ever good! Its nice for a special treat every now and again.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: nattalliee_xoxo
text;;;: This was totally my go to ice cream when I was pregnant! I craved it every night! So delicious! I would just make it in bigger containers;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,eliz13413,2020-07-16,5,My favorite!!,0,0,"Wouldn't change a thing!! I've tried MANY flavors and have a few that I enjoy regularly, but this one takes the prize for #1 in my book.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: kellys4605
text;;;: I love that jimmy Fallon collaborated with Ben and Jerry’s. An iconic duo. I also love how he added chocolate ice cream with the vanilla;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,morgancheyenne96,2020-07-30,5,,0,0,"This is one of my favorite ice creams! Its delicious!!! Its one the pricier side for an ice cream carton, but I think its worth it. Yum!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: baileyh6468
text;;;: This is a good Ben and Jerrys flavor. I am not the biggest fan of cookie dough personally but if you are this would be perfect for you!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: caileyw1
text;;;: This is my favorite Ben and Jerrys flavor. Ben and Jerrys is the best ice cream theyre always coming out with new flavors for everyone!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
text;;;: The tonights dough is where its at!! If youre a cookie dough lover like me this is for you. Also has bits of cookie that are a nice mix;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: laurenrosh
text;;;: 10/10 would recommend this to everyone! The amount of toppings mixed in with actual ice cream is great. This is the perfect ice cream.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: mollyp4
text;;;: so rich and packed with dough. got me through a lot of rough times in college. ben & jerrys is a little pricey but will always love it;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: CCwisco
title: Great overall but peanut butter dough disgusting
text;;;: Love the chocoloate vanilla swirl. But peanut butter dough is disgusting and gummy I picked them all out and ate all of the remaining.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,Kittywonderland,2017-07-19,5,I couldn't ask for more,0,0,"No ""blank bites"" perfect! I love all the swirls in here, it might seem like a lot of different flavors but they really DO go together!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: bellatroy
text;;;: Tasty what more can you say? I love when there is an abundance of toppings and that is always the case with Ben and Jerrys Ive cream!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: aubreyj4
text;;;: This is my favorite Ben and Jerrys icecream flavor that they have! It is full of many types of cookie dough and recommend to everyone.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: aly84
text;;;: Hands down this is the best Ben and Jerrys flavor! It has a good mix of cookie dough. I only buy this on sale since it is so pricey.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: AmyLiz
title: Soooo deliciois
text;;;: This flavor does not last a day in our house! It is so delicious and the gobs of peanut butter cookie dough make it that much better.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: feliciawed6c
text;;;: My absolute favorite flavor!!! Chocolate chip AND peanut butter cookie dough? Like are you for real? How can something be that good!?;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
text;;;: I love cookie dough. If you love chocolate and peanut butter together then I would recommend this. Its very delicious and satisfying.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: CourtDawg
title: Wow
text;;;: I'm eating this now...best ice cream I have ever had. First time ever eating Ben and Jerrys too! I know I have been under a rock lol.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: dezzyrose101
title: tastes great
text;;;: the first time i got this i thought it was gonna taste weird with all these different flavors ... but once i tasted it i fell in love;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: jorir2
text;;;: Amazing ice cream!!! I always finish the whole container with no ice cream left to spare. Any Ben and Jerrys is bound to be amazing!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: kristenh44
text;;;: My fave flavor! It is amazing with such variety. I love this stuff. I could eat a whole pint. All of their flavors are great though.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,danielleh7d56,2020-07-28,5,,0,0,"All Ben and Jerrys is good but this is one of my favorites. Theres a lot going on, and it always takes care of my ice cream craving.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: yasmeeni1
text;;;: I love Ben and Jerrys! All of their flavors are delicious and the price is worth the quality. This is my boyfriends favorite flavor!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,beccar1b4d,2019-01-03,5,,0,0,"Go big or go home right? This is so yummy and the best way to indulge when the time is right! Plus, who doesn't love Jimmy Fallon??";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: katelynw8
text;;;: This ice cream is so good!!! One of my favorite Ben and Jerrys. I always look when these are on sale and I can get a better price.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: shelbiem1
text;;;: HOLY GRAIL ice cream. There is none as good. I don't even buy any other kind of ice cream its so good. Its so creamy and delicious!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,nii_niixo,2020-07-25,5,,0,0,"BEST FLAVOR ICE CREAM HANDS DOWN! And who doesnt love The Tonight Show!! Absolutely the best, no one can compete with Ben & Jerry!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: bridgetb40
text;;;: The peanut butter cookie dough should be in smaller pieces because its not as big a favorite as the chocolate chip cookie dough is;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
text;;;: Love ice cream! And love cookie dough! It’s always my go to! Can’t help it! Even if I am lactose intolerant I still brave through!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: jlstuber
text;;;: Such a solid choice! Love the flavors and the extra additions to this one! I usually switch between this one and Cherry Garcia :);;;

name: The Tonight Dough,kiianab,2019-02-04,5,,0,0,"I tried this ice cream at an actual ice cream shop while on facation once and was pleased to know they sold tubs of it, very good";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: meglizram
text;;;: This is my all-time favorite ice cream ever! There are so many textures and tastes! Ugh I want some now just thinking about it!!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: msrissaaa123
text;;;: Ben and Jerry’s dough hits the spot and taste even better then when your eating cooking and slip in a few bites of cookie dough.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Agdr
title: Explosion of flavors
text;;;: I love this amazing combination of flavors. I like how it is not extremely sweet like other ice creams. The cookie is addictive.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
text;;;: You cant loose with this jam packed full of all the goodies that you can put in an ice cream. Its definitely a perfect overload.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: airiealese
text;;;: Best ice cream in the world. Want a snack eat this. Want a milkshake use this. 2 am! This is the ice cream o loce this ice cream;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: rachelm313
text;;;: Ben and Jerrys is too pricey for me to buy often - but this flavor is wonderful! It would be awesome if it came in bigger sizes.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: samanthab0237
text;;;: Great ice cream! Love the texture and flavors. Would definitely recommend as a movie snack or reward for accomplishing something;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,Munchielover,2017-09-03,5,Heavenly,0,0,"This icecream satisfies all my icecream dreams, it's chocolatey, but also has creamy caramel flavors and chunks of cookie dough";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: andresah
text;;;: Cookie dough chunk in it its so good. I loved this one and continue to buy it. The brand makes really good ice cream in general;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: liilsunshine
text;;;: Before I lost over 100lbs I could eat one of these in one sitting. Its so delish with tons of different flavors of cookie dough;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: saram3
text;;;: My favorite flavor! Thanks Jimmy Fallon for teaching us that all of these weird ingredients actually taste incredible together.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: smburrus
text;;;: I cant get enough of this flavor! I hadnt had it before until my boyfriend introduced me to it and now its one of my favorites.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: graverk
text;;;: Our fav go to dessert. So many good flavors in here! We always compare other ice creams to this one. Its our absolute favorite.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Nikkikenn
title: Yummmm
text;;;: My FAVORITE flavor. It is so wildly delicious. I love most of the other flavors too but nothing compares to The Tonight Dough!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,cindybolellastledger,2020-07-24,5,,0,0,"Choc full of goodies, this ice cream is exactly what you want when you think Ben and Jerrys. Always all natural and delicious.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: amstutzbabe
text;;;: My all time favorite ice cream! Love Ben & Jerry's and tonight dough is my favorite! It is the perfect combination of flavors.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: aziab1
text;;;: Delicious and great tasting ice cream. Wish this was cheaper to purchase but it is definitely a treat every once in a while :);;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: katiem44
text;;;: My favorite ice cream of all time! This has so many great textures and flavors it cant be beat! I would recommend it to anyone;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,deaifoshid,2020-09-04,5,DELICIOUS,0,0,"I have bought this twice, there's so, much cookie dough and the caramel and peanut butter is so good~!!!!!!!! would recommend";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: sarahashtonhawk
text;;;: This ice cream is SO good! My mom and I just tried it and will now probably be hooked. The fudge brownie is my favorite part.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: jessicaodda2
text;;;: Great ice cream all the flavor is there and with high quality taste. I purchase this often for home. Overall worth the price.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: niazp
text;;;: This tastes really good but can be extremely heavy. Theres a lot in there and its a good mix. Cant eat too much of it though.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: hanhearn
text;;;: The tonight dough is my favorite ice cream to pick up at the store because it is delicious and always fills my sweet craving;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: carols58
text;;;: You just grab and go . It is a nice surprise when you bite in to the buttercup. It is not expensive but stores run out fast.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Xsarah
title: Not my favorite
text;;;: I love the cookie dough and chocolate cookie. Put adding peanut butter dough throws the flavor off. Too much dough going on!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
text;;;: This is the best ice cream so good my husband loves us absolutely his favorite chunks of cookie dough swirls of fudge young;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: dreambig12
text;;;: I love some cookie dough and this blend is amazing. Ben & Jerrys may be my favorite brand I just wish they had bigger tubs.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: malorie_harrold
text;;;: This brand is amazing their ice cream is unreal recommend to everyone even tho it’s more expensive compared to other brands;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: shardic
text;;;: I am obsessed with this ice cream. Its everything you could want in your freezer. Jimmy Fallon has great taste in icecream.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough

name: The Tonight Dough

name: The Tonight Dough,Danaya,2018-04-28,5,Please dont every take it away!!!!,0,0,"I LOVE this ice cream!! It’s so good, and usually I don’t go for store bought ice cream but it’s the best I’ve ever had <3";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: karent0157

name: The Tonight Dough

text;;;: Amazing this is what I was born to be doing eating amazing Ben & Jerrys ice cream;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Avaleri
title: So tasty!
text;;;: One of the best flavors! Love love love it! Try it and you won't be disappointed.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: DustyKass
title: Our favorite!
text;;;: My boyfriend and I are obsessed with this flavor! We share a pint every other day;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Bchl0910
title: BEST FLAVOR EVER!
text;;;: This flavor is amazing! SO many good flavors and textures. Please always keep!!!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: KellyCrayon
title: Real Great
text;;;: A bit overwhelming if eaten too much at one time but great in small bowls;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,CWheeler13,2017-06-02,5,The Best,0,0,"Be warned, once you try this, you will never, ever want any other flavor.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: JimP
title: Wonderful blend of flavors
text;;;: If I could buy one pint of any ice cream in the world this would be it;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Writervengeance
title: My favorite
text;;;: I absolutely love the Tonight Dough. It is my favorite and I love it.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: mandy682
title: so freaking good
text;;;: I had this for the first time about a month ago... and im OBSESSED!!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,OverIt3,2020-01-10,5,Best ice cream EVER,0,0,"My husband hot me into this ice cream, it is the only flavor I eat.";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: SarawithnoH
title: Awesome ice cream
text;;;: Loved it !! It was so yummyyyyyy ! The flavor is just amazingggggg;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: hollygolightly555
title: So much dough!!
text;;;: This is my new favorite! Please don't discontinue this concoction.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Denise G
title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS FLAVOR!
text;;;: My favorite splurge! Please don't ever stop making this flavor!!!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,Lsp85,2018-09-13,5,AMAZING,0,0,"I can’t believe I’ve never tried this one before, I’m obsessed!";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: Edward woody
title: It's like crack do not try it
text;;;: I bought this and it's turned us into tonight dough into phens;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: dinorella
title: delish!
text;;;: Y. U. M. SO VERY good! Great combo of flavors and textures!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Navykid080
title: Best flavor!!!
text;;;: This is the only flavor I get. Sooooo good! Recommended 10/10;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Celeste19
title: Thee best!!!
text;;;: My new favorite flavor!! Its sooo good!! Everything about it!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: MichBin
title: Oohhh so delicious
text;;;: This is the best ice cream ever made and my favorite flavor;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: itsjustE
title: all time favorite
text;;;: its soooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo good. its amazing;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: dreyernoah69
title: the best ice cream i have ever had in my life
text;;;: try it and now love it it make's happy to live my life.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Riley
title: The best
text;;;: Literally the best flavor! My all time favorite! 10/10;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Csmith78
title: Best ice cream ever!
text;;;: Perfect blend of ingredients. This is my go to flavor!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Mello
title: WOW SO GOOD
text;;;: Finally tried this & it is now one of my VERY faves!;;;

name: The Tonight Dough
author: Lucas
title: Jimmy Fallon
text;;;: Yummy Ice Cream made specially by Jimmy Fallon. Yes.;;;

name: The Tonight Dough,Iraisp,2017-09-06,5,"Yup, delish!",0,0,It was heaven. Absolute heaven. Just get it. Do it.;;;
The Tonight Dough,brianna23x,2017-05-20,4,Hmmm,0,0,"Not enough cookie dough. Overall, it tastes okay..";;;
The Tonight Dough
author: mollyhobi
title: my favorite thing in the whole world
text;;;: Please keep this flavor forever i love it so much!;;;

name: Triple Caramel Chunk
author: Melisa
title: My all time favorite
text;;;: I love the surprise in every bite! Caramel and chocolate are a marriage made in heaven!! The caramel ribbons and the caramel covered chocolate bites are sinful! This is by far my all time favorite ice cream!! I drive past 5 grocery stores that carry other Ben & Jerry's Ice Cream just to go purchase this particular flavor!;;;

name: Triple Caramel Chunk,Brandonnnnnnnn,2018-03-06,5,Life Changing Experience,8,1,"I bought this the other night thinking there were no good flavors, and let me tell you. BEST decision of my life. I will NEVER go back. Thank you to the wonder minds who created this flavor and the hard working people who made and packaged my pint. Last but not least the kind soul who was generous enough to deliver my pint to the store I bought i from.";;;

Triple Caramel Chunk,Trace,2017-06-20,5,BEST caramel ice cream EVER-MAGNIFICENT!!!!!,6,0,"This hands down is the most delicious caramel ice cream. The caramel ice cream, caramel cups & the caramel swirl are perfection. Amazing";;;

Triple Caramel Chunk,emossmsw,2017-05-07,5,Caramel Crazy!!!,4,0,"If you love caramel, there will NEVER be another ice cream flavor for you!!! What can I say besides its amazing, I love it and can never get enough of it...";;;

Triple Caramel Chunk,Mpitts,2017-05-22,5,"Triple crown, triple play, 3 point shot",3,0,"Oh boy, this flavor is the trifecta. I love it so much it's going to be the end of a waistline. Thank you B&J's!!!";;;

Triple Caramel Chunk,FuzzyGut,2018-07-04,5,So good,2,0,"So I just polished off my first Triple Caramel Chunk and I’m very happily stuffed! The caramel ice cream, the swirl and the chocolate fudge chunks;" all awesome and perfectly balanced. There is just something so enticing about pulling off the lid of a B&J pint to reveal that glassy smooth ice cream underneath
author: just begging to be spooned.""";;

name: Triple Caramel Chunk,Phish Food Fan,2019-01-29,5,A lot of happy feelings,1,0,"This is just plain ol’ fashioned good! I love it! The caramel ice cream: great. The caramel swirl: delicious. The caramel-filled truffles: silly yummy! If you need lots of caramel flavor with several different textures (and some nice chocolate, too) as I often do, then this is the ice cream for you! It’ll put a nice big smile right on that mug of yours, and when was the last time you turned down a little extra happiness?";;;

Triple Caramel Chunk,RB2020,2020-09-12,2,"Ice cream is good, but where is the caramel?",0,0,"I would expect a flavor called ""Triple Caramel Chunk"" to have more of a pronounced caramel flavor. The chunks were few and far between and the caramel swirl was pretty much absent. I wanted something that looks like the picture used in your glamor shots, but got something a lot closer to plain light-brown ice cream with a vague caramel0sh taste. Nothing at all like it's advertised to be.";;;

Triple Caramel Chunk,Sara H,2020-09-06,1,Bland,2,8,"I purchased this ice cream thinking it might tast great , reading the title, but i was very dispappointed by it!! The ice cream did not taste like caramel , infact it was tasteless. I will never purchase from ben and jerry again,coz there description does not actually match with the flavor.";;;

Triple Caramel Chunk,barryf,2017-08-21,3,where are the chunks?,0,1,"First off, the ice cream tasted great. The problem is with the quantity of the chunks. In the pint I bought there were 4 chunks and i expected much more since many of the other great Ben and Jerry ice creams are loaded with treats. Plus I like the contrast between the ice cream and candy treats";;;

Triple Caramel Chunk,AK Catherine,2017-06-13,3,"Good flavor, gritty texture.",0,1,"I was very excited to try this flavor of ice cream, however I was saddened that the ice cream wasn't rich and creamy like Ben & Jerry's usually is. The flavor was there, but it had a gritty texture. I tried to power through but after 1/4 of the pint I gave up, I couldn't get past the texture. :(";;;
Triple Caramel Chunk
author: BellaBlue
title: I LOVE IT!
text;;;: This was actually my first ice cream I tasted by Ben & Jerry's years ago and I fell in love with it! It had gotten discontinues for a short while I think I wrote to bring it back a few times lol BUT I LOVE IT! I have about 3 pints sitting in my freezer! Great job with this one!;;;

name: Triple Caramel Chunk,EZ Doesit,2020-09-08,5,Savor Suggestion,0,0,"I read the review by Sara H. I recommend that she and others spoon a moderate amount of caramel from the center and with the balance of the spoon capacity, scoop a significant amount of vanilla, then allow those proportions to melt in your mouth and prepare for ecstasy.";;;
Triple Caramel Chunk,emilay,2020-02-07,5,Great features!,0,0,"My boyfriend loves this flavor so much, if he's ever grumpy, it just puts a huuuuuge smile on his face.";;;
Triple Caramel Chunk
author: Riles
title: My fave but hard to find!
text;;;: I wish I could find this one easier in Maryland now that I'm hooked on it.;;;

name: Triple Caramel Chunk
author: igloofn68
title: Never saw it at any of the stores I visit
text;;;: Never saw many of these at any of the stores I visit;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,Odie McGoo,2017-07-24,5,My New Favorite,17,0,"I recently found this at my local grocer and was a little skeptical since I like bourbon (I'm from KY so by law I have to) but I'm not a big fan of caramel. I decided to give it a try but still bought my go-to flavor, Chunky Monkey, just in case this bourbon and caramel infused ice cream wasn't my cup of tea. Despite my reservations I instantly fell in love with this ice cream and now keep a pint stocked in my freezer at all times. the caramel bourbon flavor is smooth, not to rich, and the almonds pieces pair well with the flavor and chunks of chocolate. Well done Ben & Jerry. I reall hope this flavor stays in the lineup for a long while.";;;

Urban Bourbon,GuiltyVargoIceCreamLover,2017-08-20,5,Wow...omg wow!,6,0,"It is SO good! I've been trying out new flavors instead of my stand by of chunky monkey or mint chocolate cookie. I have liked most and loved 3. But this one knocks my number one out! im not usually a Carmel fan especially the gooey kind (i usually go fudge) but wow! The only thing that I would have done differently is the nuts, i think pecans would have been in keeping with the southern theme ihis has going. But yes, I know, there is aways the pecan pie, which was just a like in my book.";;;

Urban Bourbon,ksgirl79,2017-09-19,5,Yum!,4,0,"On a particularly lonely Sunday while I was shopping I decided to grab my normal flavor ""Everything But The..."" to give myself a little treat. Then I saw this flavor staring at me. Carmel, Almonds, and Bourbon oh my! SOLD! I hurried thru dinner so I could rip open the container to get my first spoonful. Its creamy burnt carmel taste hit me first and I couldn't stop. The almonds and chocolate made for great trio of flavor but then it happened... I hit the bourbon carmel center. Oh my goodness my mouth waters just thinking of it. I promptly took a pic and sent it to several friends telling them to find some for themselves right away. Thank you B&J for yet another addiction.";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: Ja_Ja_jason
title: OMG!!
text;;;: Yet another amazing flavor to come out of the Ben & Jerry's flavor laboratory. I had to hide it from the wife so she wouldn't eat mine.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,Sweettooth,2017-07-08,1,Disappointed,4,18,"I normally love B&J, even if I don't love a flavor I try, I can still appreciate it. But not this time. First of all, the almonds are like flavorless splinters. The bourbon swirl tastes like bananas. And generally I like ice cream with chunks in it, but this was so overrun you can't even enjoy the ice cream. I'm whining about it because B&J might want to count the votes when deciding whether to keep making this flavor. I'm sure lots of people will try it, but I doubt you'll get a lot of repeat customers. But thanks for making such awesome ice cream (aside from this) and by the way my boyfriend LOVES your chocolate cherry Garcia. I do to. Hope you'll keep making it!";;;

Urban Bourbon,bikelvrgirl,2017-08-10,5,FABULOUS,3,0,"This flavor is simply not your ordinary ice cream. I enjoy a good helping of Boom Chocolatta Cookie Core now and then, but sometimes I just don't feel like something super sweet and chocolate-y. This flavor has a little bit of everything. Chunks: check. Sweetness: check. Saltiness: check. Rich, dark undertones of something mysterious: check. I love the balance of the darker, rich flavors with the salty, sweet flavors. This is the BEST! All I can say is, they better not ever get rid of it! It's addicting!";;;

Urban Bourbon,Curlysea87,2017-04-29,5,Yum yum yum!!,6,1,"I was a little worried about buying a new flavor because I have bought a few lately that I haven't liked and I didn't want to be let down again. But my favorite flavor is no longer available so I took a risk on this one and boy am I glad. I can't put my spoon down! The almonds, fudge flakes and caramel swirl dance in your mouth and while sometimes you get a bit of the bourbon taste it is not overpowering! Great work guys!!";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: Nance
title: Just what I needed!
text;;;: So happy my husband got this for me to try! He knows I love bourbon. I really love this flavor! I think u did it just right! Don't think I will share this pint. Maybe the next one. Which there will b plenty of because this is hands down my new favorite!!!! I am not a huge fan of caramel either so I was a little skeptical. But this is the perfect blend of the caramel and the almonds and the chocolate and the bourbon flavor all together. Yummmmmmmmm Nice job <3;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,Arianna,2017-08-07,1,Disappointed :(,2,2,"I was bugging my mom about how much I wanted Ben & Jerry's so when my mom took me to the store I was staring at the frozen doors drooling and I was looking at all the flavors and my usual ""half baked"" wasn't there so I grabbed Urban bourbon because it sounded delicious!! I went home and started eating it and it didn't have any flavor, all it tasted like was coldness overwhelmed by the tiny almond shreds. The only pleaseant part about this ice cream was the Carmel swirls. I wish I bought the bob Marley ice cream !! But I still love Ben & Jerry's no hate";;;

Urban Bourbon,Ashley547,2019-09-13,5,The best Ice cream I have ever had!,0,0,"My stepmom first introduced me to this flavor of Ice cream, and after my first taste I fell in love. I’ve been buying this flavor for about a year I think now and it never gets old! Recently I’ve heard some rumors saying that the Urban Bourbon flavor is going to be discontinued? Since I’ve heard that, I’ve been buying 3-4 tubs of it every time I go to the grocery store. I know there are thousands and maybe even millions of reviews out there, but if you happen to stumble across mine I would like to ask...could you could possibly keep Urban Bourbon as a permanent flavor? Thank you Ben and Jerry!";;;

Urban Bourbon,Sharon2802,2019-08-01,5,OMG -- my new favorite since Dublin Mudslide,1,0,"I instantly got addicted to this new flavor. I've been sad about Dublin Mudslide going to the graveyard for years, but I may have just found something at least equally good. Yes, it's sweet (caramel swirls), but not as sweet as any of the 'core' pints or Phish food that I do not like at all. Urban Bourbon is such a delicious combination of flavors! With the crunchy almonds, and chocolat bits it is really perfect to me. Chillin' the Roast and New York Super Fudge (one of my go-to's) seemed bland after Urban Bourbon.";;;

Urban Bourbon,bingobungo,2017-08-24,5,The Best Caramel Ice Cream Flavor,2,0,"The ice cream is what counts - all the extras thrown in aren't going to compensate for ice cream with no flavor. This ice cream has a complex, full bodied, intense caramel/bourbon taste and is loaded with flavor notes. The thick dark chocolate flakes and almond bits accent the flavor. This was excellent - so much better than the grainy flavorless taste of the coconuts for caramel flavor. I love it.";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: Traumatized by Bourbon
title: Had me gagging!
text;;;: The flavor sounds great in theory but it seems like it's a challenge to make consistent flavoring and distribution of ingredients. My point contained too much of a large center swirl of bourbon that was overly sweet and had me gagging. I couldn't even enjoy the perimeter and ended up tossing the entire pint before guzzling almost a liter of water! Definitely has kinks that need to be worked out.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: stupidhobbits1
title: Tasty but there's no alcohol
text;;;: I love the flavor and texture but was a littke annoyed when i did some research and found there wasn't any real alcohol in it even though it lists whisky as one of the ingridients. Was hoping to at least get a little buzz but was disapointed. Thought it was ice cream for grown ups but i guess not.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: jules23
title: FAVORITE FLAVOR EVER - But so hard to find :(
text;;;: I found this flavor a few years ago and have loved it ever since! Unfortunately it is EXTREMELY hard to find in stores.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,Mdmom,2017-05-30,4,Alcohol in it?,3,0,"So far so good, but I just wanted to know if it had alcohol in it? My son wants to try it lol";;;

Urban Bourbon,Red66climb,2019-01-29,5,"Extraordinary, delicious and worth dying for.",0,0,"The store was out of Chunky Monkey, but when I saw this I had to try it. I never expected it would be my new favorite. I have actually doubled my ice cream consumption because of it.";;;

Urban Bourbon,itisb4me,2017-05-03,5,Excellent move Ben&Jerry's,2,0,"Ever since Heathbar was removed from your ingredients, I have been searching for a new favorite icecream. The replacement toffee just wasn't the same. Well I can say that I am glad I remained loyal because this is my new favorite icecream. This could definitely be the difference for me :)";;;

Urban Bourbon,Paxeth,2017-04-10,4,nice combination of flavors,2,0,"despite the name there is no ""alcoholy"" flavors. the base ice cream is delicate, the fudge chunks are rich in flavor as always, I wish there was a bit more almonds in it though as you don't get nuts in every bite and I LOVE almonds but the creamy caramel swirl smoothed me over. delicious!";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: Casey k
title: Best Ever!!!
text;;;: I purchased this a few days ago and now I'm hooked! This is my FAVORITE ice cream! I used to go to Bruster's a lot to buy ice cream but this one puts everything they have to shame! Thanks so much for this wonderful new flavor and I hope you keep this one on the market!!! :);;;

name: Urban Bourbon,Suzanne,2017-09-30,2,I will never know,0,2,"Let me begin by saying that I am a serious B&J fan, lately consuming whole pints in a day. Unfortunately, as far as this flavor is concerned, epileptics like me don’t dare try it because of the whiskey (even in tiny amounts, alcohol is a very potent seizure trigger). A recovering alcoholic friend of mine said the same thing, that it could trigger a craving that could undo all his work. Delicious ice cream is not a good reason to spend a night in the hospital. Assurances from B&J isn’t enough, folks, how about an alcohol-free version? (I don’t even like bourbon very much, but a gin-flavor will probably do me in, LOL.)";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: Chenson
title: Awesome taste!!
text;;;: I am loving the new flavors. By far this ia my favorite. im not big on chocolate in my ice cream so i was skeptical on this flavor. To my surprise its perfect! Tiny little flakes and perfect amount of almonds. The bourbon taste is spot on not to overwhelming but noticable.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: handerson286
title: So yum!
text;;;: Just found this in the freezer at my in-laws' and I gave it a try. Usually caramel is so sweet in ice cream but this was unlike anything I've had before. The balance of flavor was perfect. The chocolate flakes and almonds were plentiful in every bite. Highly recommended!;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,Brodiecat,2017-04-23,5,Addiction in a pint,2,0,"This stuff is amazingly good. And addictive. I chose this new flavor on a whim, not to my boyfriends liking. He is now addicted. I agree, it's probably a new favorite. But he can't stop eating it... Great blend of flavors. Whoever came up with this needs an award.";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: Jodi143
title: Mmmm Sultry
text;;;: My absolute favorite. My local stores aren't selling this anymore! I'm so sad.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: Yvonne
title: Perfection!
text;;;: I tried this flavor when it arrived on the shelves at my grocery store. I am HOOKED!! The amount of almonds and chocolate chunks pairs exactly with the burnt caramel and bourbon. I can't imagine a more perfect icecream!!!!;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,Bostbosox,2017-08-13,5,Addicted!!,2,0,"Can't get enough! Love it. The burnt caramel base flavor is awesome, almonds and fudge the perfect mix ins, but the whiskey flavor is the straw that stirs the drink. Awesome";;;

Urban Bourbon,jessh,2018-04-10,5,Not your typical ice cream fix,0,0,"I bought this flavor on a whim one time when stocking up on my most recent favorite the Tonight Dough. I was shocked, the burnt caramel flavor mixed with chocolate and bourbon flavors was an instant hit the minute it hit my taste buds. I am normally a chocolate ice cream kind of gal through and through. But this was sooo good and different from anything I had ever had and it still cured that sweet tooth of mine. I've already bought this several more times and introduced it to so many friends who love it as well! In this case change is a good thing!!";;;

Urban Bourbon,Ima Scooper,2017-07-14,5,Soooo Happy!!!,2,0,"While I still mourn the passing of Tennessee Mud long ago my new boozy ice cream headache fix is Urban Bourbon. It's a fun mix of sweet, burnt and boozy!";;;
Urban Bourbon,Mary44429,2017-07-15,5,Yum,2,0,"I was so excited to try this and i love it. Probably because it Has all my favorite things in it- nuts, caramel, bourbon. Mmm :)";;;

Urban Bourbon,Phish Food Fan,2018-08-12,5,Different and really good,1,0,"I had this one once and didn’t like it, but I wanted to give it another chance and bought it again, and I’m glad I did. It’s really actually quite good when it gets a little melty. The ice cream flavor itself is somewhat subtle and the fudge chunks are really great. The bourbon caramel swirl is delicious! I will definitely buy this flavor again.";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: Icecream fan
title: Delicious
text;;;: Just ate this for breakfast. Great way to start the day. Not being sarcastic;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: KellyDEN
title: Love it!
text;;;: LOVE this flavor. Ben & Jerry's knocked it out of the ballpark. I picked this up at the grocery store because it's new and I like caramel. When I got home I attempted to take a taste of it and ended up eating half the pint! I love the unique bourbon and caramel flavors and the crunch of the chocolate and almonds.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,Dejota,2017-08-22,1,If I could give zero stars,3,2,"If I could give zero stars, I would. I love Bourbon but this ice cream was gross. I got barely a quarter of a pint done and had to throw it out. Luckily I went out the next night and found gen and jerry's One Love and that made up for it.";;;

Urban Bourbon,Puck,2018-10-18,1,Too much burnt flavor,0,0,"I wanted to love this flavor. EVERYTHING in the ingredients were things that I liked individually. Except... the 'burnt caramel ice cream'. All I can taste is that burnt flavor, sadly, and it overwhelms everything else. I understand wanting to try a combination that isn't so sweet in every aspect... but sadly, the burnt aspect of it drowns out the other elements to the point I can't taste anything else in much the same respect that several of their coffee flavored iced creams do for me. A shame.";;;

Urban Bourbon,Paul55,2017-05-26,1,No distinct flavor,2,1,"I bought this for my husband who loves anything bourbon flavored. He couldn't wait to try it and was very disappointed. He said it had no flavor at all that he could tell, it was just overly sweet. There was certainly no flavor of bourbon.";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: Nannerama
title: What I've been looking for!
text;;;: I just bought this tonight and am happily surprised. I have been going from flavor to flavor and brand to brand looking for just the right chunky and carmelly combo. And the bourbon is the cherry on top! Thank you for making the best out there.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,Kimberly,2017-05-20,3,It's OK,2,1,"It's fine, but it didn't wow me. The flavors are all just too muted, for some reason. But, it was 90 degrees in the city today, so I'm not too unhappy about it. I'm just glad I have ice cream to cool me down.";;;

Urban Bourbon,Pattynoone,2017-04-16,4,Very out of the ordinary!,1,0,"This has everything I look for in an ice cream, but more! I've never had this flavor of ice cream. My only complaint is, I actually think it has too many almonds! But that's better than having too few!";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: LadyD
title: A tweak could make it better
text;;;: This ice cream is ok. I think if it was made with salted caramel and a few less almonds it would be great. The bourbon swirls are tasty. I was a little disappointed in this flavor.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,Beekeeni,2017-07-22,1,Too sweet and too burnt,8,14,"At about the second bite, on top of the extreme sweetness, there's a strong overly ""toasty"" taste. I felt that they overplayed the burnt caramel. At least there's soft notes of nuttiness at the end.";;;

Urban Bourbon,Aj_mac,2017-06-26,5,Masterpiece of flavor,1,0,"This one is a keeper, so good. The bourbon and the caramel go together so well. Almonds come through too. Chocolate chunks should be smaller.";;;
Urban Bourbon,Radzach,2017-06-02,2,Nothing special,1,0,"I love ben and jerry's however i was not a fan on this. I didnt taste much bourbon and did not enjoy the ""burnt caramel""";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: Karinalyn
title: Meh
text;;;: I wanted to like this one but it is missing something.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,Cerie,2018-03-06,5,Please keep this one!,0,0,"This is my absolute favorite Ben and Jerry's flavor. I'm worried with some of the negative reviews that this flavor might get pulled, but please don't! I don't really understand some of the other reviews that are basically calling for this to be pulled from the shelves because some of the flavors are more unique. Everyone has different tastes, and I'm sure they would be perfectly satisfied with something like triple caramel chunk, why does that mean urban bourbon has to go? Part of the reason I love Ben and Jerry's is because they have more creative flavors than the typical chocolate, vanilla, caramel etc. you find with other brands. There's nothing wrong with liking basic caramel and cookie dough flavors, they're a classic for a reason, but I don't understand why everything on the market has to fit into that cookie cutter mold.";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: Dawnatella
title: Is 2.5 an option?
text;;;: Omit the almonds and this would be a 4.5! The almonds are tiny and get in the way. The hinder the flavor. I like when ice cream is smooth going down. Now it feels grainy. The flavor otherwise is good and the bourbon caramel is amazing. The chocolate is slightly too dry. I think they need to use the phish food fudge recipe instead.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,Reese,2017-07-06,4,"Great flavors, but...",1,1,"Bought a pint 3 days ago, love the flavors, but the almonds are too finely chopped for me, they get stuck in the corners of the mouth & in between teeth. I found myself focusing on trying to avoid the annoying almond pieces (impossible) instead of really enjoying the great taste of the ice cream, fudge, & bourbon Carmel swirl.";;;

Urban Bourbon,,2017-12-11,5,Sooooooo goood!,0,0,"My wife brought this home. She drinks bourbon, I do not. This is by FAR our favorite flavor ice cream! Even though I don't drink, you can really taste the bourbon in the caramel. But it's not a bitter alcohol taste. And the dark chocolate chips are the perfect sweet/bitter combination to compliment the burnt caramel and bourbon. Not too overly sweet like most ice cream. I really hope this flavor is around for a really long time!";;;

Urban Bourbon,Dana,2017-06-08,2,Disappointed,1,1,"I usually love Ben & Jerrys but I was disappointed with this one. Everything in the ice cream including the bourbon flavor had actually sank to the bottom of the container. So 95% of it was basically pretty blah tasting and the other 5% was overwhelming, which of course you couldn't eat.";;;

Urban Bourbon,Ice cream maven,2017-10-27,5,It's mine!,0,0,"I was standing in front of the refrigerator debating over what flavor ice cream to get when Urban Bourbon caught my eye. I love alcohol flavored sweets and warned the family that they might have to get their own pint. ""It has caramel"" they said ""You don't like caramel"" but it's Ben & Jerry's I replied. They didn't listen and now they wish they had because this perfectly blended flavor frenzy is only mine!";;;

Urban Bourbon,laurie,2018-04-10,5,My first taste of Ben & Jerry's,0,0,"So my first taste of Ben & Jerry's was Urban Bourbon ice cream. I ate the whole thing in one sitting! I have tried to say away from it because it is soooo good and I have no will power to put it down. Luckily for me the stores around me have stopped carrying this flavor but, I still look for it when I am out shopping. I know if I happen to come across it again it will be coming home with me.";;;

Urban Bourbon,Andres,2017-10-25,5,tastes so good!,0,0,"my coworker has been raving about this ice cream for a while now and she really described the flavor well enough to make me want to try it so i did...and it was awesome! loved how many and how big the chocolate chunks are and the flavor of that ice cream to match the caramel. and the nuts are a nice texture combined with it all. awesome new flavor, will definitely be buying more in the future";;;

Urban Bourbon,belhud,2017-04-30,2,Just okay...,1,1,"Just tried your new flavor, it's just okay, not my cup of tea. I didn't get any bourbon flavor at all, would have been better with roasted almonds, way too many fudge ""chunks"". Still a B&J fan though!";;;

Urban Bourbon,CrabbyTater85,2017-06-07,5,Such a surprise!,0,1,"My husband bought this flavor and made the mistake of leaving it unattended for a few days. I honestly didn't have high hopes based on the flavor description, but then I tried it and wow! Definitely my new favorite flavor! I thought all of the elements worked really well together and felt that the ""burnt "" caramel flavor wasn't overwhelming like I had initially feared. Great work!";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: Saucydragonfly
title: its My favourite flavour and I’m a connoisseur!
text;;;: This is absolutely my favourite Ben and Jerry’s flavour...I can’t tell you how mn\any pints of this I’ve packed away in the past two years! It’s not overly sweet but the flecks of almond and perfect crunch to the dark chocolate. I’m addicted to the caramel swirl... I’m telling you as a Ben and Jerry’s fan - YOU MUST TRY THIS FLAVOUR okay I’m off to buy some more okay thanks bye;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,forest sprite,2017-08-23,5,"""Urban Bourbon"" is delicious!",1,1,We absolutely love this new ice cream-and hope you guys will keep Urban Bourbon as a permanent flavor! Its the best caramel ice cream out there and we can't get enough of it!;;;

Urban Bourbon,jjcovarr,2017-10-05,2,Not the best flavor,0,0,"I was really when I saw this flavor. I was debating between Phish Food and this one. I have had Phish Food before, so I gave this one a try. There seemed to be a lack of flavor and it didn't really have an ice cream taste to it. It was not horrible, I was just nor impressed with it. I usually like the new flavors that Ben & Jerry's release, but this one just did not cut it.";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: Yackersmaren
title: HOLY YUM!!!! DID I SAY YUM??? YES YUM!!!
text;;;: Urban Bourbon is my new favorite. The flavors just melt together in a happy little dance in your mouth. It was all gone before I knew it!!YUM YUM YUM!!!!;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,Rwntree,2017-07-28,5,"Not perfect, but well worth a try",0,0,"Not a perfect replacement for my old favorite, Bonnaroo Buzz. But it's still great. In reality this is a 4.5 stars for me, but that's not an option. The reason: not enough Bourbon flavor. It's there, but you really have to try to find it. That really is the only downside for me. All things considered, this is a nice blend and I hope it stays around a while.";;;

Urban Bourbon,Two Spoons Johnny,2017-12-14,5,Best Caramel Ever,0,0,"I am not an avid caramel consumer, but this product has converted me, at least for ice cream. There is something magical about the combination of flavors here. I am a huge fan of New York Super Fudge Chunk flavor and can't find that any longer. This one is my new go-to flavor at any point. My second is tongue twister Truffle Kerfuffle.";;;
Urban Bourbon,Jacki921,2017-06-04,1,Boring,1,1,"Did not have the flavor intensity I expected. Quite frankly, it was boring.";;;

Urban Bourbon,Love BandJ,2018-02-14,5,Love This!!!,0,0,"I found this flavor several months ago and I absolutely love it!!! But, I just noticed that the grocery store in my area has it on closeout....:( I am so obsessed with it that I bought the last 5 cartons that they have so I could enjoy for a couple more weeks!! Hope you aren't stopping the production of this flavor!!!";;;

Urban Bourbon,FuzzyGut,2018-06-24,3,Not my thing but I can see it being for others,0,0,"I did not love this flavor but it’s not because of a defective pint. I just personally didn’t care for it but I can see why other people would love it. It sounded perfect to me but for some reason, it just did t do it for me. But hey, everyone has their tastes and I can understand why people love this one. Just not me.";;;

Urban Bourbon,musicalmystic,2017-10-06,2,Not what the title suggests,0,1,"I was really looking forward to this flavor. I am a huge fan of Ben and Jerry's and a huge fan of bourbon, so it seemed like a dream come true. Unfortunately it was not at all what I'd hoped. It was so different than I expected that I actually bought a second one just to make sure; alas
author: both were the same. First off the ice cream didn't have that caramel taste one associates with bourbon;" to me it tasted like coffee ice cream. It wasn't bad tasting
date: it just wasn't bourbon flavored. Also there were a LOT of chopped almonds in it
stars: so many that it completely dominates the taste and texture of the ice cream. It seemed as though half the volume of the carton consisted of almonds. Now if they had labeled this """"Almond Ice Cream with mild coffee flavor""""
title: at least I wouldn't have gotten my hopes up. Again
helpful_yes: it's not bad (if you like nuts in your ice cream
text;;;: but it's not bourbon either. There are lots of Ben and Jerry's flavors I crave";" this is not going to be one of them."""

name: Urban Bourbon,kabrion,2019-01-07,5,What a flavor.,0,0,"I bought this because it sounded weird enough to be good and it was way better than good. It is nutty, sweet, slightly burnt but not overwhelmingly so, the chunks and swirls were perfectly balanced with each other and the ice cream. 12/10. I will cry myself to sleep id it should ever be pulled from shelves.";;;

Urban Bourbon,SquamLoon,2017-09-03,5,My new favoriite flavor,0,0,"Not too sweet; not too burnt; not too bourbony—but enough of all of the above to taste decadent. Having happened upon it elsewhere and immediately fallen in love
author: I requested this in my local grocery store
date: and I'm happy to say that it;"'s been selling like hotcakes
stars: so I think they'll keep ordering it."""

name: Urban Bourbon
author: AmyM
title: Urban Bourbon Oh How I Love You!
text;;;: Just bought it today. Tried a spoonful and was skeptical it wasn't going to really taste like Bourbon. I was proved wrong. It's deliciously sinful. I do wish you could omit the almonds and add more bourbon. Well done!! Maybe B n J should try something with Bailey's or a Tequila Margarita ice :);;;

name: Urban Bourbon,Invain63,2018-05-12,5,More! More!,0,0,"I have been looking for a replacement for my dearly departed Oatmeal Cookie Chunk and then out of the blue came Urban Bourbon! It is a wonderfully complex and not too sweet pint of delight. On the down side, now I can't find it any more either. Is B&J trying to make me crazy?";;;

Urban Bourbon,petri33,2017-07-31,5,"Unique flavors, great combination",0,0,"This might be my new favorite Ben and Jerry's flavor! The burnt caramel ice cream is fantastic, and you can really taste the bourbon in the caramel swirls. The chocolate chunks are an excellent combo with the caramel, and the almond bits add a last bit of nice texture.";;;

Urban Bourbon,Connie1217,2018-01-25,5,Love Love Love It!!,0,0,"This may be my new favorite flavor. I usually go for the Chunky Monkey, but saw this at the grocery store the other day and decided to give it a try, since I have recently switched from vodkas to whiskey and bourbons. Absolutely love everything about this flavor.";;;

Urban Bourbon,Pris13ie,2019-11-27,5,Great Blend of Sweets,0,0,"This is my new favorite B&J!! The Bourdon swirl is perfect and I am quite surprised by how well the textured complimented one another. I do, however think the chocolate pieces could be smaller pieces and less portion of the pint. Otherwise, what an amazing mix.";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: Kate
title: Totally Unexpected
text;;;: Just tried this flavor and it is great! Unlike some caramel ice cream it's not overwhelmingly sweet... there were fudge chunks and almonds in every bite and the caramel swirl was so well flavored that it had me checking the carton for alcohol content! Loved it!;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,Princesca,2017-07-17,5,Angels showed up!!,0,0,"Okay, not really...but close. It was the best ice cream I've ever had!! And I'm a very good judge of ice cream. Not to sweet, well balanced. Great size of chocolate chunks & almond pieces. Smooth bourbon flavor. Delish!! Please don't EVER get rid of this!!";;;

Urban Bourbon,adelina,2017-10-19,1,"Sounded great, but dissapointed.",0,1,The ice cream & swirl were good. But the almond bits were like little annoying tasteless splinters. And what kind of chocolate flakes are these? The chocolate in chunky monkey is great. This chocolate barely has a chocolate taste and no chocolate feel at all.;;;
Urban Bourbon
author: Kmiller
title: I am in love!
text;;;: This might be my favorite ice cream ever! I am addicted! I have always liked Ben & Jerry's but I've never been a regular consumer until this one. The crunch of the almonds and the chocolate with the caramel ice cream is perfect. Please don't let this one go!;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,nyishaj123,2017-08-03,5,Caramel Love at 1st Taste,0,0,"I usually hate caramel flavor ice cream because it's extremely sweet. However, this made me a believer. It has the perfect balance of sweet and alcohol and nuttiness with pop of dark chocolate. I love love love this flavor. Please don't discontinue it.";;;

Urban Bourbon,sydney,2018-01-15,1,Awful,0,1,"I didnt like Urban Bourbon AT ALL. IMO there were way too many chocolate pieces. They were too big, they didn't melt and they had no flavor. And the texture of the almonds was terrible. They made the ice cream taste gritty. The carmel was cloying.";;;

Urban Bourbon,Elle,2017-08-30,5,Bestest EVER!,0,0,"Went out on a limb, usually I stick with my peanut butter ice creams. Holy cow!!! Seriously! THE MOST AMAZING ice cream EVER! The whole thing is the best concoction ever put together! Absolutely in LOVE! Please never stop making this flavor!";;;

Urban Bourbon,Makeupmom,2017-04-15,3,Really good,0,1,"It's good but I'm more a chocolate gal. Too much almonds. Which isn't a bad thing if it came with almond joys. ;") it IS good but not MY cup of tea. For the person who ventures outside the chocolate and coconut and creams
author: you'll love it.""";;

name: Urban Bourbon,Chelle,2018-07-07,1,Not satisfied.,0,1,"I just purchased this about 30 minutes ago to try. I do not like it. It tastes bitter and the after taste is worse. It’s too bad I can’t take it back to the store for a refund. Have to throw it away, like my money to purchase this.";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: Mrvampire
title: Will never cheat again!
text;;;: As a huge b&J fan I have gone through so many of flavours and continue to keep it mixed up and varied but since trying this one - I think I’m going to settle down! Absolutely gorgeous - I could spend the rest of my life with this one;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: Curly
title: Urban Bourbon...Best Flavor Ever!!!
text;;;: First bite and it was love!! Please... I beg you... never ever stop making Urban Bourbon!! Happiness is just a spoonful away in my freezer! Friends and family love it too. We all agree this is the best ice cream we ever tasted!!!!;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,Drsuzannec,2018-01-29,5,Love it!,0,0,"Urban Bourbon has the best texture! The nuts are chopped really small which enables you to get some in every bite. It took me a little while, but the bourbon caramel totally grew on me and now this flavor is one of my favorites.";;;

Urban Bourbon,SWLiver,2018-10-24,1,Top sweet and little flavor,0,0,"I have an enormous sweet tooth, and I rarely think anything is too sweet. I've also never been disappointed with any of the many B&J flavors I've eaten. That said, this was too sweet and had VERY little flavor. Cloyingly sweet.";;;

Urban Bourbon,,2018-04-27,2,Do not purchase if you like Almonds,0,0,"This has too many fudge flakes, which I thought is was dark chocolate. What Almonds? They just have chopped almonds that you will think are tiny pieces a fudge flakes/dark chocolate. The caramel ice cream and caramel were fine.";;;

Urban Bourbon,babybunnychrissy,2017-10-17,1,"Oh, NO!",0,3,We bought this with the new Truffle flavor. First bite it taste burnt as all get out. 2nd bite was a burnt alcohol taste. I couldn't stand it. And neither could my 3 year old who loves all flavors if ice cream- even coffee!;;;
Urban Bourbon
author: Gabby
title: Too many nuts
text;;;: I tried this since my fav flavor was out of stock. At first I liked it but as I took each bite I realized how I disliked all the nut slivers that were in each spoonful. There wasn’t enough bourbon caramel and too many nuts!;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: Jilly123
title: Amazing!
text;;;: I absolutely loved Urban Bourbon! I had every intention of eating just one serving but surprisingly when I looked down it was gone. Had to stop on the way home the next night to get more. Thanks for another great flavor!;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,Yumm,2017-05-17,4,"New fave, but...",0,1,"Got this when it was on BOGO because I love borboun and Ben and Jerrys. Oh man was it amazing! Only had a few bites with borboun flavor though... wish there was more. Otherwise, the combination of flavors was spot on!";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: Elise
title: Awesome!
text;;;: I took a chance on this flavor as I don't eat ice cream very often. IMHO I absolutely loved this flavor. The bourbon is very mild and the flavors came together very well. I had to stop my self from eating half a pint!;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,Emily56757,2018-02-06,5,Whoa. Second best flavor after Coffee Toffee,0,0,"All you need to say is “burnt caramel” and I’m sold. Though I don’t taste much bourbon the chocolate flakes, almonds and caramel pair wonderfully for a wonderfully interesting depth of flavors. Thank you Ben and Jerry";;;

Urban Bourbon,Josh from VT,2017-07-15,2,Dissapointed,0,1,"Great idea for a flavor, but unfortunately too many+too small almond pieces. The base and fudge flakes are nice, but it's still kind of plain. The swirl is very good, but there was almost none present in my pint.";;;

Urban Bourbon,Micaela,2017-12-09,5,Really tastes like bourbon,0,0,"When I usually try things labeled bourbon, I assume it will be kind of bourbony. The first bite I took of this I got the hints of ""burnt"" smoky flavor off the top and then the splash of bourbon and caramel. SO GOOD";;;

Urban Bourbon,Suri,2017-09-22,1,No bourbon taste,0,0,"I don't taste any bourbon at all. It was just an overly sweet unpleasant caramel flavor. My family did not enjoy this. The fudge flakes are a distraction and too large and hard. Good idea, but not a unique taste.";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: K2rite
title: Love at first site
text;;;: I was excited to try this flavor because I never buy Ben&Jerry but this is my new favorite. Every bite I took was exciting. All of the ingredients were equally amounted. I hope this flavor sticks around!;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: Kati
title: Oh My!!
text;;;: Just now tried the Urban Bourbon flavor that I bought 2 weeks ago. It is BEYOND amazing. I may just have to find something to binge watch so I can eat the whole pint! I will be going back for more.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: AJWoS
title: Best ice cream I've ever had. Period.
text;;;: This needs to stick around as a regular flavor! Everyone I've had try this thinks it's incredible. The slight taste of burbon in the swirls is out of this world!! Hands down my favorite of all time.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,Tonks,2018-02-09,1,Bourbon?,0,1,"When I opened the pint there was a huge blob of caramel at the top and then....nothing. A few chocolate chunks, but no more caramel, a few chocolate chunks and no ""bourbon"". It was disappointing.";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: Neeecola
title: AMAZING This ice cream saved my life
text;;;: Literally one of the best things to ever go into my mouth. Honestly everything you do in your ice cream ventures is inspiring. You paint masterpieces for the taste pallet and for that i thank you;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: Unsatisfied
title: Not that great
text;;;: The burnt caramel ice cream was soo overwhelming at first and not very pleasant at all. It left a horrible aftertaste. I won't be buying this flavor again but I'm excited to try other flavors.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: Fleurfairy
title: Just no
text;;;: The ice cream itself is very grainy. Almost a sherbert texture. Not creamy at all. Way too much bittersweet chocolate chips and not enough caramel. I didn’t taste any bourbon either. Big fail.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,ZionzMom,2017-05-19,5,This hits ALL sides of the sweet tooth!,0,0,"I literally eat this just about EVERY night. It's delicious & had the perfect blend of smooth/crunchy. I don't even typically like chocolate ice cream, but Urban Bourbon is put of this world.";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: Dee dee
title: Hooked
text;;;: My favorite flavor used to be in New York New York now it's urban bourbon I love the caramel center the fudge this is the best ice cream I have ever eaten I eat it at least once a week;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,Meemee,2019-03-20,5,Delicious!,0,0,"This is my new favorite flavor, since I can't peach cobbler anywhere anymore. I'm a sucker for ice cream with nuts and appreciate the meld of caramel, chocolate, and walnut flavors.";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: Kaylan
title: The best Ben and Jerry's flavor!
text;;;: All the flavors go so well together. The chocolate and especially the almonds both have different hardness which means the crunch is so satisfying. Easily my favorite flavor so far.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,Cammie,2017-09-06,2,Somewhat disappointed,0,0,"My first taste was great, but the ice cream had too much almond meal in it, and not enough burnt taste or bourbon taste. I loved the chocolate flakes, but I wouldn't buy it again";;;

Urban Bourbon,Redhead7000,2017-06-04,5,Great texture,0,0,"So, I'm not a big fan of ice cream but when my husband brought this home I decided to give it a try. I finally found an ice cream that I LOVE! It has great texture and flavor.";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: Chippie
title: Most yummy!
text;;;: For me replaces the previous bourbon flavor that i feel that was just to hard fpr people to pronounce! Seems that they got a good one w/this one! I hope its a keeper for awhile!;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,CMclaughlin83,2017-06-08,4,Urban yum,0,0,"I'm really enjoying this ice cream but I'm wondering if I should worry about the whiskey, I am pregnant. I'm sure its not a big deal but curious couldn't find any warnings.";;;

Urban Bourbon,Cmmcleod,2018-05-26,5,New favorite,0,0,"I eat A LOT of B&J...this is hands down my new favorite. Texturally, I’m not sure it needs the almonds AND fudge chips, but the flavor more than makes up for it. Cheers!";;;

Urban Bourbon,bonfirebo,2017-12-21,5,Flavor perfection!,0,0,"I love that the almonds pieces are small and fully incorporated! The ""burnt"" caramel is absolute perfection and the bourbon swirl....well, it doesn't get any better!";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: Twinkle toes
title: Disappointing texture
text;;;: Delicious new flavor but the almonds are pulverized and in every bite. It pretty much ruins the creaminess I want from ice cream. It's a bummer. I won't buy again.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: AngieP
title: Fell in love at the first bite.
text;;;: Bought this tonight at Walmart. The ice cream actually tastes like hazelnut to me. It had luscious chunks of chocolate in every bite. Will definitely buy again.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: Abigail224
title: All time favorite
text;;;: The Tonight Dough was a long running favorite until I sank my spoon into a pint of urban bourbon. Hands down the best ice cream I’ve had from Ben & Jerry’s.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: Island Girl
title: Why Barley ?!
text;;;: So sad this contains Barley so it's a no go for a celiac. So many of your flavors have Barley now. Guess I'm just out of luck with my old favorite brand.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,ihlini,2018-11-20,3,Pleasant..not exciting,0,0,"Bought mostly for a different taste;" not exciting
author: lotsa almond slices. These
date: made me happy though. Good caramel and not overly chocolate (big bonus) :)""";;

name: Urban Bourbon,danashopgirl,2018-03-21,5,"By Far, the best!",0,0,I decided to give this a try and fell in love! This has the right mix of caramel and Chocolate pieces and the flavor is JUST right. Highly recommend!;;;

Urban Bourbon,Harbingerdc,2018-04-18,5,Happy Accident,0,0,"My husband picked this up by accident and I'm so glad he did. This is my new favorite flavor. It sweet, toasted, and a little boozy - just perfect!";;;
Urban Bourbon,Juju,2017-05-02,5,Sweet Lord!,0,0,"Crunchy almonds and perfectly sized chocolate chunks...bourbon swirl...heavenly flavored ice cream. Sweet Lord, pleeease never retire this flavor!";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: Pirate_Princess
title: OMG!
text;;;: I just bought this tonight and it has to be my new favorite! Its not super sweet and has plenty of crunch. I had such a hard time putting it down.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: starkrawzen
title: Love Toasty flavor
text;;;: Love this so much. The toasty burnt flavor of the ice cream is awesome and nice balance with the gooey swirl. I hope this never goes away;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: Redshoes56
title: Delicious!
text;;;: Very decadent and a perfect treat. The bourbon flavor is not too strong (fine by me). Love the deep caramel and the crunch from the nuts!;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,sarahann,2017-04-26,5,Omg,0,0,"So good! Please don't discontinue! Wasn't sure about it on the shelf but gave it a try and so happy I did! Perfect ""grown up"" ice cream!";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: CJMTESV
title: What happened?
text;;;: I had this flavor a few months ago and loved it. Call me crazy...but I swear it didn't have almonds before. I hate almonds in ice cream.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: rebakay
title: My absolute favorite
text;;;: I was a little skeptical on seeing a bourbon flavored ice cream... but wow! This is amazing! They can't keep it in the stores here!;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: Debb
title: Don't think I'll get this again
text;;;: The Almonds are very small and soft. Not very enjoyable. I had bought it for my Husband but he doesn't like nut so he took mine.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: Nick3199
title: Absolute best
text;;;: Highly upset that I cannot find this anymore. One of the absolute best flavours to come out of B&J in a long time.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: Svetlana_Han
title: AMAZING.
text;;;: Honestly the best ice cream ever. I️ love the carmel with the bourbon and the almonds and it’s just so delicious.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,MikaMamas,2019-04-22,5,I love this ice cream - PLEASE don’t ever stop,0,0,"We started buying this about two months ago, and absolutely love it! PLEASE make it for every!! You’re the best";;;
Urban Bourbon,Fuchsia,2018-01-10,4,Really Good,0,0,"I like this one a lot. The burnt caramel ice cream is super tasty, and I always love the addition of liquor.";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: Dave27
title: Simply amazing
text;;;: I ama new York chocolate chunk guy but I tried this one and I truly believe I have found a new favorite.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,Jeepchick,2017-11-16,5,Yummmm!,0,0,"New & already one of our favorites! If you like a sweet bourbon flavor, definitely give it a try!";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: Pinkie
title: Best EVER
text;;;: Wow best ice cream ever. Please never stop making it. Please please please don't change a thing!;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: Lunar
title: Delicious
text;;;: Nice bourbon flavor going on with the caramel. You also can't go wrong with chocolate chunks.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: Lynz
title: Yummy!
text;;;: Really love this flavor! The ratio of everything is perfect! Please continue making this one!;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: Ash20
title: The nuts
text;;;: The ice cream is so good. All the flavors come together and the nuts make it tast the best.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,Chuchica,2017-10-04,5,I can't stop eating it!,0,0,"My favorite. I eat it in like a minute, especially when it is a little bit melted!!!!";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: nikpcjlicb2012
title: love it!
text;;;: Usually my husband likes one flavor and I like another but we both love urban bourbon;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: hotpinkpanda15506
title: Urban Bourbon
text;;;: I saw that there was a new flavor and I decided to try it so glad that I did amazing;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: Belle
title: Delicious!
text;;;: My new favorite flavor-yum! I kinda wonder what it would taste like with pecans....;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: bourbon babe
title: Sooooooooooooo Delicious
text;;;: I've only found this flavor once and I'm obsessed now! I can't find it again :(((;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,MJGsuperinc,2017-09-04,5,Really Truly Delicious,0,0,"After I was done with my pint that hour, I went to the store and bought another";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: AdrienneK
title: Delicious!
text;;;: We keep buying it over and over! The flavor and textures inside are perfect.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,CARMEN A,2017-11-29,5,"OMG, MY NEW FAVORITE!!!",0,0,"So good that I wrote a review, I never do this!! It's is my new favorite!!!";;;
Urban Bourbon
author: Page
title: Just enough!
text;;;: I really recommend this one. It tastes like bourbon but sweeter! So good!;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: IceCreamaholic
title: Absolutely the best
text;;;: I eat the entire tub in one sitting because it’s that good and addicting.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: TheDoctor
title: Great flavor
text;;;: The ice cream has great flavor great taste live the burbon swirls in it;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: Mhall
title: Love love love
text;;;: It’s so amazing. I sent my husband out for another for dessert tonight!;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: spanda
title: delicious!
text;;;: This might be my favorite flavor of all. It's a caramel bourbon dream;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: dogman1
title: urban burbon
text;;;: everthing i like in my ice cream just didn't know until yall made it;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: Windy
title: OMG
text;;;: Bought this and was amazed. Had all the flavors I was looking for.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: Giglet
title: This flavor rocks
text;;;: I totally consumed the whole pint! Better than a raspberry cosmo.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: Sjsj
title: Loveeeee
text;;;: It's soooo good. The chocolate chips are my favorite part. Buy it!;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: Julie569
title: Super Delicious!
text;;;: One of my favs. Everything about this ice cream is perfection.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: Orangutan man
title: New Favorite

text;;;: Just bought this today at Kroger and it is amazing Good!;;;

name: Urban Bourbon

title: Soooo good!
text;;;: One of my new favorites! So good! Go ahead and try it.;;;

name: Urban Bourbon,Jim S,2017-06-04,5,Great new flavor!,0,0,"I love the balance of Bourbon, caramel and chocolate.";;;

author: Jmoody
title: My new favorite
text;;;: I love this ice cream flavor! Don’t ever discontinue;;;

name: Urban Bourbon
author: Vegas diva
title: Delicioso!
text;;;: I spotted this the other day...now my new favorite!;;;

name: Vanilla
author: Kitty
title: Amazing!
text;;;: Best Vanilla Ice cream ever! And I have tried quite a number of them;;;

name: Vanilla,FuzzyGut,2018-11-17,5,The best Vanilla you’ll ever eat!,4,1,"I mean it, folks! This is by far the best Vanilla ice cream available. It doesn’t get better. It’s creamy, dense, sweet, rich and very natural tasting. It’s the essence of Vanilla;" very intense. It also has a great mouth feel. Yes
author: it isn’t full of chunks
date: swirls and mix-ins but that doesn’t mean it’s boring. On the contrary
stars: each bite is an exploration of what it means to taste true Vanilla. Honestly it’s the best.""";;

name: Vanilla,joank,2018-04-17,5,Best vanilla ice cream out there,5,1,"My favorite ice cream flavor is vanilla. Simple, sweet, savory, creamy, delicious vanilla. I've tried dozens of fancy/gourmet brands of vanilla and always come back to Ben & Jerry's. It's got great vanilla flavor and just the right amount of salt to the cream to make this savory and not bland at all.";;;
Vanilla,KimPete,2017-05-28,5,The BEST,10,3,"The best vanilla ice cream ever! It doesn't need anything added, it's great all by itself.";;;
Vanilla
title: True Vanilla
text;;;: Great Flavor! Vanilla Beans! Nothing else added. Its a great flavor when you want something simple.;;;

name: Vanilla,mai432,2018-05-13,5,"Excellent taste, texture, and appearance!",1,1,"My favorite flavor is vanilla that has vanilla bean. Almost every evening after dinner, I have one-third pint of Ben & Jerry's vanilla ice cream. In my mouth, it feels creamy and melts at a medium pace allowing me to savor the full vanilla flavor. This vanilla ice cream is perfect in every way. Thank you.";;;

Vanilla,Dee Me,2019-06-09,5,Please leave out the Guar Gum. Locust and Caragean,1,1,"I am thrilled that you have Non GMO choices. Thank you. But guar gum, locust beans and caragean are still off limits to most of us allergic people. Can you please make one choice just milk, sugar and vanilla?";;;
Vanilla
author: Ambee10
title: So great!!
text;;;: The best vanilla ice cream I’ve ever had! Super soft and creamy!;;;

name: Vanilla
author: Roger Kincaid
title: Example: Great features!
text;;;: Taste it once in Singapore. I'll never forget that taste.;;;

name: Vanilla
author: Yelper2034
title: Rather rich for my taste.
text;;;: Well it's too thick because it's packed with sugar and cream.;;;

name: Vanilla Caramel Fudge,GiGiT,2019-11-03,1,Mine wasn't swirled,1,4,"I must have gotten a bad batch. Mine looks nothing like the photo. I got vanilla ice cream with a glob caramel core. It was awful. I ate a little to see if the swirls would show up, but no. It was just vanilla ice cream. I threw the rest away. Complete waste of money. Very disappointed.";;;

Vanilla Caramel Fudge,FlavorFinder,2018-01-28,5,Stay Away...... It’s all Mine!,6,0,"I’m 62 and have loved B&J ice creams since first invented. I’ve probably cut a year or two off my life and don’t mind abit. Why? Because of this particular flavor combination. It’s the bees knees & the cats meow all rolled up into one sweet swirl. Once you try this, your flavor dreams will be fulfilled forever. This is the only B&J flavor combination I’d every want to be stranded on a desert island with, just me and my Vanilla-Caramel-Fudge Swirl! This is the creamiest, fudgiest, carameliest, tastiest, smoothest ice evermade. Dont wait, just go get some and enjoy every last lick!";;;
Vanilla Caramel Fudge
author: FuzzyGut
title: Simply perfect!
text;;;: I LOVE this flavor. It is flawless with just the right amount of caramel and fudge against the vanilla ice cream. Please never alter or retire this flavor!;;;

name: Vanilla Caramel Fudge,,2017-04-10,5,Simple and delicious!,6,0,"Nothing fancy, but definitely one of my favorites! If you are thinking of trying it you'll be glad you did!";;;
Vanilla Caramel Fudge
author: Ice cream lover
title: Best Flavor Ever!!
text;;;: This was my favorite years ago and was discontinued. I found it in my local grocery store and have been happy ever since. No chucks! I just don't like chewing my ice cream. The fudge and carmel is loaded in the ice cream. Pure awesomeness!!;;;

name: Vanilla Caramel Fudge
author: dejie
title: dont ever discontinue!
text;;;: dont ever ever ever! you knocked it out of the park and if you ever get rid of this flavor i will cry endlessly and be depressed until the end of my days. its amazing. so SO amazing.;;;

name: Vanilla Caramel Fudge,geefran,2017-05-13,5,Yesss!!,3,0,"Whenever I look for Ben and Jerry's, this is what I seek.";;;
Vanilla Caramel Fudge
author: Prdavid21
title: Love this flavor but is
text;;;: Love this flavor but it is not available in my area. According to the web site it should be at. A certain store but the store does not have it;;;

name: Vanilla Caramel Fudge,Carabeaner526,2019-09-08,5,No match for perfection!,0,0,"I have loved this flavor for as long as I can remember, although now it is very hard to find in stores now, only a Wawa I work close to carries it and maybe shop rite...now that there is a perfect ice cream, when can I get some coupons so I can actually afford it and eat it more often....I tried many other flavors and nothing compares to vanilla caramel fudge....NOTHING!!!!";;;
Vanilla Caramel Fudge
author: Icecream10
title: Most Perfect Flavor
text;;;: I found this flavor in my local market about a month ago and it instantly became my all time favorite!! Creamy vanilla ice cream and caramel and fudge rippled all through it smooth creamy perfection straight out of the container!! Ice cream dream come true thank you Ben & Jerry’s;;;

name: Vanilla Caramel Fudge,Terri,2018-04-02,5,#1,0,0,"The greatest flavor, so creamy with lovely fudge and caramel generously infused. Only problem can never find it at the local grocery store which I don’t understand because they NEVER have it. Did B&G quit making this flavor? The only flavor I like and it’s never available :(:(";;;

Vanilla Caramel Fudge,Gotta Have It,2018-01-25,5,Nothing but the Best,0,0,"This is my all time favorite B & J ice cream. I was very disappointed when it ended up in the Flavor Graveyard, but was then resurrected. I like to think it was because of me and my diligent feedback to B & J to resurrect it. Probably not, but one can think.";;;

Vanilla Caramel Fudge,nd0067,2017-12-11,5,My favorite!,0,0,"Not a fan of chocolate chunks in my ice cream, which takes a lot of B&J's flavors out of the running, but this is my all time favorite! Real FUDGE and caramel with the creamiest vanilla. I can't find it everywhere, so when I do, I stock up.";;;

Vanilla Caramel Fudge,myvice70,2018-10-12,5,Best Combination and Mindful of the Ying and Yang,0,1,"I love many Ben & Jerry's flavors but this is by far my favorite. Vanilla base of goodness with it's simple yumminess complimented by generous amounts of two of the greatest flavors ever combined, caramel and fudge!";;;
Vanilla Caramel Fudge
author: florida20
title: Amazing Flavor
text;;;: I found this 2 months ago and can't get enough. Has nice amounts of both fudge and caramel. Reminds me of the old vanilla fudge swirl ice creams that you can't find anymore. But this one gives you caramel too!;;;
