text;;;: Fantastic game good graphics good music own good way to its addictive gameplay and;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core,jhirst,2020-07-27,5,YUM!!,0,0,"I love the chocolate chunk and vanilla ice cream.  Unfortunately I cannot find vanilla chocolate chunk anymore, I also like chunky monkey, but the the big chunks of dark chocolate in vanilla were the best!! This is the next best thing!!!";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core,Amarie,2019-04-24,1,Nope!,0,0,"I was so excited for this to come out! Ben & Jerry's cookie dough is my favorite. However, the cookie dough core was just a gritty disappointment. The cookie dough core is so grainy and sand-like. I hope they reformulate and try again!";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core
author: midnitestich
title: Save your money
text;;;: I hope this isn't going to replace the regular chocolate chip cookie dough. It's more like a container of chocolate chip with hardly any cookie dough. The cookie dough doesn't even taste the same. I won't be buying this again;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core
author: Disappointed1
title: Recipe changed
text;;;: I bought this 4 days ago because I couldn’t find my regular chocolate chip cookie dough. Not only does the cookie dough recipe taste different but so does the ice cream I’m so disappointed. I will be going back to Hagen Diaz.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core,Goatgirl01,2019-03-31,1,Least favorite flavor,0,0,"This is my new least fave, even worse than Schweitzer’s Balls. The ice cream doesn’t have much flavor, just sweet. The core is puny: maybe 2-3 bites. The flavor of the core is ok (the only redeeming feature) but grainy";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core
author: 37oz
title: Weird cookie dough
text;;;: A big letdown. The cookie dough was completely different than you would find in the non-core offering - to the point that I almost wondered if something was wrong with it. The ice cream portion was very tasty.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core,Fadedtimekeeper,2019-05-16,3,It works,0,0,"The cookie dough itself is sandy ans grainy, it has an odd taste I can't really lay my finger on. But if you eat enough of the ice cream with the core it balances out a lot better and isn't as noticeable.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core
author: martya25
title: Disappointed with the core
text;;;: I bought this flavor on 10/15/19. I love cookies and ice cream so I was excited to try this cookie dough center. I was expecting an actual cookie dough texture but really it’s just grainy and sugar like.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core
author: Beth828
title: Ewww
text;;;: Should have read the reviews first. I don’t even mind the grainy texture of the cookie dough. But it tastes horrible! Not like cookie dough at all. This could have been amazing. Super disappointed.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core,Albie,2020-08-19,1,Just gross.,0,0,"This ice cream tastes cheap and gross. I usually love all their stuff but this one was just nasty. The ""icecream"" tasted like they just froze a cup of milk and the cookie dough was grainy and crumbly.";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core,Ar124,2019-08-16,1,pretty disgusting,0,0,"the cookie milk ice cream is okay, chocolate chips are chocolate chips...but wow that cookie dough core is gross. so horribly grainy and not a good flavor. they should really offer people a refund";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core
author: Bossmoose96
title: The ice cream flavor it’s self was good chips not
text;;;: The ice cream flavor itself was delicious but the chocolate chips were gross they need to be milk chocolate the core was tasty but the texture was very grainy needs to be cooked a little bit more;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core
author: Niece
title: The worst one i ever had!!
text;;;: I bought one because i love cookie dough. Ben and Jerry's is my favorite icecream after one bite I was so disappointed! The texture of it was the worst I couldn't eat I throw it in the trash.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core
author: Jody 33
title: Sorry I bought it
text;;;: The cookie dough core tasted more like a scoop of brown sugar with some chip chunks in it. I’m sorry but there was nothing cookie dough about it. Totally disappointed and a waste of money.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core
author: Lacey
title: Ice cream good cookie dough not so
text;;;: The ice cream favor was good but the cookie dough itself didn't taste like cookie dough had grainy like texture due to too much sugar. Not what I expected out of Ben and Jerry's;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core,Megan411,2019-06-13,2,Great Idea with a Terrible Execution,0,1,"This is the ice cream everyone dreams, but alas, a dream it will remain. The “cookie dough” is basically just brown sugar, about the size of dime throughout. Pass this one up!";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core
author: Radzach
title: Amazing idea mediocre execution
text;;;: The cookie dough was grainy and there was less than any other flavor containing cookie dough. The ice cream was great but I was expecting an amazing cookie dough core.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core
author: Nonnahs402
title: Where is the cookie dough!?
text;;;: I was excited to try this ice cream. I was very disappointed. The cookie dough “core” was tiny. I think I get more cookie dough in regular chocolate chip cookie dough.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core
author: Djal
title: Barely any cookie dough
text;;;: This pint tastes great but feels like it has way less cookie dough than the regular one. I waited months for this and was really disappointment.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core
title: nasty
text;;;: ice cream is good but the cookie dough taste like brown sugar and butter . nothing like cookie dough it’s like sand dissolving on your tongue;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core,Sky2222222,2020-06-10,4,Pretty good,0,0,"Tastes like cookie dough, especially good if you get a mix of the dough and the icecream compared to just eating straight at the dough. 8/10";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core,MsBluewings,2019-04-05,4,Great Combination!,0,0,"My daughter tried this one and says the only thing this: More Cookie Dough"". Keep it up with the flavors. They are simply delicious!!!";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core,Ravenkitty27,2019-03-17,2,I kinda liked the grainyness,0,1,"There was not nearly enough cookie dough in the core, I was disapointed it did not even reach the bottom of the pint.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core,JamieB,2020-01-25,1,Cookie core grainy,0,0,"The core is grainy, cumbly, and nothing like the dough balls in regular cookie dough. :( Please rework the core!";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core,Pandi,2020-07-09,2,Meh!,0,0,"The ice cream itself tastes bland and watered down, the cookie core is like sand it's a major disappointment....";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core,Janae126,2020-07-20,1,Disappointing,0,0,"The core was a terrible texture, and barely had any flavor. Super grainy. Back to the regular cookie dough....";;;

Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core,aspenleaf,2019-07-04,1,Hope this isn't replacing the regular cookie dough,0,0,"After being spoiled by chocolate chip cookie dough, my expectations were too high. Disappointed.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core,Mike K,2020-05-30,1,Nope not close,0,0,"Ben and Jerrys fan since they started. This one falls way short. Minimal core, nothing special.";;;
Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core
author: Bew4
title: My favorite flavor
text;;;: This is awesome! Its not grainy like the others with the cookie dough;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core
author: Tammy82
title: Not Good
text;;;: This was just a core of grainy sugar. Yuck never buying this again;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core
author: Beeeee
title: Expected Better.
text;;;: How did you guys mess this up? It could have been so good.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core
author: Cookiedoughfanatic
title: Awful cookie dough
text;;;: The cookie dough sucked.i repeat The cookie dough sucked.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core
author: NLFR
title: Not Epic
text;;;: There was nothing epic about be the cookie dough core.;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core
author: Jabhy
title: Whatever
text;;;: Was no cookie dough at all. Ripoff. So enraged ...;;;

name: Chocolate Chip Cookie Dough Core,CaseyT22,2020-07-10,1,PLEASE IMPROVE IT.,0,0,"I am a loyal Ben and Jerry's customer and most of their flavors are amazing and when I saw this in the store I was so excited to try it. But I am beyond disappointed in this. First I will say that the cookie milk ice cream part is DELICIOUS. I wouldn't change anything about the cookie milk ice cream. However, I was looking forward to a big center of that same delicious cookie dough that's in the other pints of ice cream (like the half baked). But instead, after digging through all the cookie milk ice cream I found a tiny little section of cookie dough, not even a core. Just a chunk on the side of cookie dough that isn't even actual cookie dough. It LITERALLY tastes like sugary sand and has a grainy texture. Nothing like the cookie dough I always enjoy in the other flavors.";;;

Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,sariashi,2019-05-08,5,Ate The Entire Pint and It Made Me Less Sad,27,2,"Ummm this is the best thing I've ever eaten (probably). I've been silently waiting for cookie dough core Ben & Jerry's and this one outdid any expectations I had. All of the flavors (almond, cherry, sugar cookie, shortbread) taste like happiness on a pink cloud of soft fatty calorie heaven. Would definitely eat an entire pint in one sitting to cope with my depressed emotions again. Hoping to also eat part of a pint in one sitting while I'm happy to experience the flavors in a different mood so I will update when that happens. (Spoiler alert: still going to be 5 star rating.)";;;
Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Reviewname
title: Best Ice Cream
text;;;: I have purchased almost 10 pints of this since discovering it. Literally the best ice cream I have ever had! Never stop making it!;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Rayofsunshines
title: Becoming a Favorite!
text;;;: I was intitially hesistant about this because I’m not a huge cherry fan. I do however love sugar cookies (and especially the dough). When I finally found it in a store I wasn’t sure what to expect but it was seriously amazing! I love the almond-y flavor it has to it and it actually works quite well with the cherry. Will definitely be repurchasing once this pint is gone!;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,Faux500,2019-02-23,5,Best ice cream I’ve ever had,11,0,"This ice cream tastes like Tortoni, one of my favorite desserts, only it’s amped up to 11. I hope they never stop making this.";;;
Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: abclementine
title: Love at first bite
text;;;: Always hesitant about branching out and trying a new flavor but I think I just found my new favorite...absolutely amazing;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,SLCJAMES,2019-07-08,5,The new all time favorite!!!,8,2,"Bought it on a whim, and now I find myself craving this new amazing flavor!! The almond, and cherry goes so perfect together.. and the sugar cookie actually tastes like the real thing! You won’t be disappointed. I hope they keep this one around for a while.";;;

Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,Kitty B,2019-07-28,5,Best ice cream flavor ever!,2,0,"I’ve eaten a lot of ice cream over my nearly six decades of life, and have been a Cherry Garcia fanatic for years. I never dreamed that Ben and Jerry’s would create a better flavor. I am happy to say I was wrong. Sweet Like Sugar beats out Cherry Garcia by a nose.";;;

Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,TATER,2019-07-21,5,A top three ALL-TIME BEST B&J flavor!,3,0,"Please don't EVER stop making this! The combo of flavors and textures is perfect: the touch of almond in the sweet cream on the one side and the nostalgic Cherry Garcia on the other, all tied together by the most decadent sugar cookie dough core... seriously. It can't be beat. It tastes like a bunch of classic holiday flavors combined!";;;
Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Ash9
title: Love <3
text;;;: Wow. I bought this as I quickly saw something new on my way out the store and I’m glad I did. I’m not a huge chocolate fan so it’s so nice to get a non chocolate flavor!! Both “sides” are great. The cherry side is similar to a non chocolate cherry Garcia and the sweet cream side is a delightful lightly almond flavor. Love this flavor.;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Tay13
title: All around perfection
text;;;: This is the kind of ice cream they eat in heaven. Jumping to the top of my favorite flavor list.;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,CakeNCookieLover99,2020-08-05,5,AMAZING DECADENT FLAVORS,1,0,"I bought this about a year ago, leading up to that I had been looking for it tirelessly. Once I finally got my hands on it.... it did not disappoint! This is the most delicious ice cream ever, the almond flavor is spot on and the cherry side is loaded with luscious, large cherries. The sugar cookie dough core is wow, just wow. I love the texture of grainy sugar in a sugar cookie and this hit it right on the nail. I will definitely be repurchasing this item till the end of time!";;;

Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,ADawgMoney,2020-07-26,5,"Fantastic, well-balanced, unique",1,0,"I’m usually not motivated to leave feedback, but after tasting this ice cream, I just had to post. It is amazing! Very seldom do you taste an ice cream that is so subtly crafted, so much thought went into this one. Each of the defining characteristics plays well with each other (the cherries, the shortbread, the almond flavor, the sugar cookie), though none is overpowering. You keep going back from one flavor to another, then appreciating each even more upon return. A sense of deep creaminess and vanilla tie everything together. Great texture. If there were a comparison to be made to a layered and multi-dimensional chocolatey dessert, this would be the decadent vanilla counterpart. So satisfying, you’ll be scooping up any available pints at your local grocer before someone else finds it... I know I have. Bravo.";;;

Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,April01,2020-03-30,5,Subtle and delicious!!!,1,0,"Please please please keep this flavor! I tried it as a shake at my local Ben and Jerry's shop and it has to be the best shake I have ever had. The flavors are subtle and delicious and make you want more! I would buy this flavor everytime, all the parts work so well together and are so balanced! My new favorite flavor for sure!!! I love the almond and cookie flavors and the cherry is just a sweet hint and not too overpowering. Seriously, please keep this flavor around!";;;
Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Mandy738
title: Perfection in a pint!!
text;;;: I had this at the scoop shop Friday then went on a mission to find the pints! Please don’t ever stop making this one! It is so good with the cookie dough and cherries. Perfectly balanced and just the right amount of sweetness!!;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,Tabris,2019-06-23,5,No chocolate!,0,0,"I love chocolate, but my girlfriend haaaates it, she's always so bummed out that almost every B&J flavor has chocolate something in it, whether its chips or swirls or chunks, so she was so delighted to see this! I've never seen her finish a pint by herself before. I tried it myself and its super good, I normally don't like cherry flavored stuff but the cherry is mild and not artificial tasting at all. The almond is really good, but the sugar cookie core is the real star of the show. I say this icecream suits someone with a more sophisticated palate.";;;

Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,,2019-04-27,4,"Fruity, creamy, nutty and sugary. Yum.",0,0,"Out of the 3 new cores flavors from B&J's, this one is the best. The cherry ice cream with cherries is just as tasty as in Cherry Garcia. The new sweet cream with a hint of almond flavor is extremely accurate. The almond flavor is there, adding a nuttiness to the taste while not being overpowering. And the core, while just as grainy as the the chocolate chip cookie dough pint, is at least more fitting of a sugar cookie and tastes accurate to the real deal. It's not a set of components that you'd ever imagine together, but it works. Delicious.";;;
Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: BenJerYum
title: The. Best. Ever
text;;;: This is the best ice cream. Ever. Please don't ever kill this off and put in the graveyard!;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: 1freerangechick39
title: I love this! It’s my new favorite!
text;;;: I am a huge cherry ice cream lover but hate the chocolate chips that are normally put in it so when this ice cream creation came out I was in LOVE!!! The sugar cookie core is amazing. I usually will buy 4-6 pints when I go to store just to make sure I never run out. Thanks Ben and Jerry for a great new ice cream for us non-chocolate lovers!;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Toby the Cat
title: Shortbread chunks... mmmmmmmmm
text;;;: My brother loves shortbread cookies and cherry ice cream so I thought I’d get him this as a going away present before he left for summer camp. Me and my mom ended up eating almost all of it... oops sorry bro :/ but honestly it was THAT good! This is definitely one of my new favorite flavors!;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,Z1603,2019-02-07,5,Delicious,5,4,"I loved it, I just didn’t eat the cherry ice cream because I’m not a big fan of it due to my allergy";;;

Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,j12345,2019-06-04,5,New favorite!,0,0,"If you like sugar cookies with that lovely hint of almond and vanilla flavor, they pair perfectly with the cherry ice cream in this pint! The cookie bits are a little dry, but otherwise this is my new favorite B&J flavor. The almond and cherry ice creams are subtle but perfect, and the sugar cookie dough core is delicious and just the right flavor. I don't know how they could make this one so delicious and fail so badly with the chocolate chip cookie dough core, but I'm not going to argue about it!";;;

Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,,2019-03-20,5,Best Flavor I have ever had,1,0,"Please, please don’t ever send this flavor to the graveyard. It is hands down the best flavor I have ever had. There is half a pint sitting in my freezer right now and I will divorce my husband if he thinks he can finish that off... that’s how good it is.";;;

Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,Stringer Dushane,2020-08-16,5,Peerless,1,0,"I am not one to write reviews and I am typically not one to like elaborate mash-ups but they outdid themselves with this flavor. If I could drop one ingredient, I'd cut out the cherry chunks but this is so well done we are just nit picking. A must try.";;;
Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Teaniebeanie
title: Holy god is this good!
text;;;: This is the BEST B&J ice cream I have ever tasted. Almond sweet cream ice cream tastes so much like the Italian 7 layer bar cookies. That hint of Almond is to die for. And the cookie dough core...don't get me started. Drooling....!!;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,NormalILGirl,2019-03-27,5,Delicious--even for non cherry fans!,1,0,"I am not a fan of cherry ice cream, however I love almond flavored desserts and cookie dough. The cherry was not fake tasting or overpowering and the almond ice cream and cookie core was amazing. Definitely a good choice!";;;
Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: BHami
title: Amazing new flavor!!!
text;;;: So delicious!! My new go to flavor!! Please keep this one around!! It is a keeper lol so good mmm mmm mmm;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Angelo
title: Flabbergasted
text;;;: A sugar cookie dough core?! Almond and cherry?! One of the best flavors ever. Don't ever get rid of it.;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,WickedAnnabella,2020-08-16,5,Outstanding!,1,0,"This is a sweet, super-delicious almond-y sugar cookie flavor. One of my favorites of recent years.";;;
Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: AshleyT
title: So Delicious!!!!!
text;;;: My favorite flavor ever! I do wish the almond flavor was a little more prominent though.;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Sugar Tooth
title: PHENOMENAL
text;;;: Catch me at the grocery store buying out the whole stock this flavor is SO good!;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,RKH123,2020-06-14,5,Such a great blend of flavors and textures!,0,0,"This might be my favorite Ben and Jerry's flavor. The sweet cream base with that subtle hint of almond really blends well with everything else. The smooth creamy texture mixes really well with the sugar cookie dough core and the slightly grainy texture. The cherries add yet another texture and a bit of tartness as well. If you like the pistachio flavor with the sweet cream and want more flavor and texture variety, I'd try this.";;;

Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,Mross,2019-04-14,5,Amazing flavor!!,0,0,"After being taunted by online ads for nearly two months, I finally found this flavor in a grocery store near me. It did not disappoint! All of the flavors are balanced, the shortbread pieces are delicious, the cherries are sweet and juicy... My only complaint is that I wish the cookie dough core was more ""doughy"", as it has a sugary paste consistency instead. Every time I see this flavor, I make sure to grab two pints. Amazing!";;;

Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,LotusB,2020-02-18,5,Best Cookie Dough Core yet!!!,0,0,"One of the only flavors that I can honestly say I can eat every day. I've probably bought more than ten so far. Cherry and almond flavors are well-balanced and lovingly tied together with shortbread cookie. This ice cream showcases the beauty in simplicity, and really takes your appreciation of sweet cream to a whole new level. It is by no means as intense (or obnoxious) as other flavors, but this is what makes it shine.";;;

Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,iloveicecreamss,2019-03-17,5,Best flavor ever!,0,0,"This ice cream is delicious. The almond flavor is subtle but still there, and the shortbread pieces are AMAZING. The sugar cookie dough has a great texture and flavor as well. If you love almond and/or cherry, I would definitely buy this flavor. Only downfall is that it is extremely hard to find this flavor, as I had to drive nearly 3 hours to locate a pint of the Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core Ice Cream.";;;

Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,PAttyD,2020-03-30,5,Best Ice Cream Ever!,0,0,"I bought this 3 weeks ago on a whim. Sometimes chocolate just isn’t what your in the mood for! It was amazing ice cream! Every bite was deeeee licious! Then the virus hit the nation and it can’t be found ! I’m so sad ! Please keep this flavor going.... I will be buying TONS more! Love this! If you haven’t tried it, give it a whirl! You will be pleasantly surprised!";;;
Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Sad Boy
title: Not Good.
text;;;: Not very good. Usually with the core ice creams they have a lot more flavor. I found that this ice cream lacked so much flavor it could barely tell the difference between to the 2 sides. Easily the worst out of the core ice creams... I was let down. Please bring back the cheesecake core!;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,Marv,2019-09-24,5,Ice cream will never be the same after this flavor,0,0,"For the love of all that is good in this world, don't ever stop selling this flavor! I usually go for the chocolatey flavors, but I went out on a limb to try this recently and I might not ever go back. Buttery shortbread dough, chewy cherry chunks like in Cherry Garcia, and a tinge of amaretto, make for a chunky, chewy, creamy--oops. I ate the whole pint!";;;

Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,Lorn,2020-03-16,5,Absolutely exquisite!!!,0,0,"This is maybe the most unique option in the ice cream market today. I’ve never had anything like it. The delicate flavors of the sweet cream and almond and cherry go so nicely together, none overpowers any of the others, they just peacefully coexist. And that core. My god. I cannot quit thinking about it. It’s a sandy, almost gritty (not in a bad way—in an I cannot quit thinking about that mouthfeel way!) sugar cookie dough texture and the contrast of that against the soft smooth flavors of the ice cream..I literally cannot quit thinking about it. I just discovered this a few weeks ago and have been through three pints. I have never had any ice cream like it. I am not seeing it restocked so I’m afraid it’s discontinued and I’m going to be devastated. I’d been buying ALDI’s generic Cherry Garcia because, it’s just BETTER, sorry for the blasphemy but it’s the truth. And this brought me back to the brand. I hope it’s restocked soon.";;;

Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,Lexy85,2019-04-28,5,Happy Tastebuds,0,0,"I purchased this flavor after waiting over a month for it to appear in stores! It is delightful, the flavors meld together beautifully, and are not overpowering. The cookie core is tasty, and the cherry chunks are juicy, flavorful, and plenty! The hint of almond pulls it all together for a perfect finish. I do believe I've found my new favorite!";;;
Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: chris77
title: Best Ice Cream Ever!
text;;;: I've been eating B&J since I was 13. This is by far my favorite Ice Cream of all time! the almond flavored base ice cream is unique and subtle but flavorful. I love how the sugar cookie dough and shortbread bits are countered by the acidity of the cherries and how that flavor profile is made more delicious combined with the almond. Well Done B&J!;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Abbygirl44
title: Pleasantly surprised!
text;;;: I contemplated buying this on multiple occasions but was afraid it would be too sweet. I finally gave in and was truly surprised. The cookie core was sweet but had enough buttery saltiness to make it addictive. The ice cream was subtle and perfectly balanced by the cookie core. I easily could have eaten the whole pint in one sitting;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,YoAdrienne,2020-02-14,5,My new favorite flavor!,0,0,"As much as I love chocolate, it's great to have more flavor options that don't have chocolate in them. I really like the combination of almond and cherry. With the sugar cookie core, it reminds me a little bit of marzipan. (It would be great to have a flavor with actual marzipan in it. Hint. Hint.)";;;

Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,dasikins,2019-07-06,5,My all time favorite,0,0,"Cherries and surgar cookies can make the perfect concoction. For me, this ice cream tastes like sugar cookie batter (which is my peronsal all time favorite treat.) It's filled with chunks of soft cherries and cookie dough which somehow compliments each other.";;;
Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Charlie Angel
title: Crazy Delicious!!!!
text;;;: My new fave! This is the Bomb Cyclone of deliciousness!!! Love Sugar Cookie Dough? Sweet Cream Ice Cream? Almond Essence? Shortbread Cookies? Cherries? BAM!! Mix all of that up and it's Ice Cream Heaven! Ben and Jerry...y'all knocked this one out of the park. Keep this on ON DECK!!!;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,anniecherrykaboom,2019-09-30,5,Needs to be renamed to CHERRY COOKIE KABOOM,0,0,"Literally the best ice cream I have ever had hands-down! I am a huge fan of cherry Garcia, and PhiSh food, but this ice cream really takes the cake. The name seems misleading though because it doesn’t talk anything about the delicious scrumptious cherry which is my favorite part";;;

Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,Nickle56,2019-09-11,5,Awesome flavors come together,0,0,"I was amazed how these different flavors come together to make an absolutely delicious ice cream core flavor! I love the sweet gritty sugar of the sugar cookie dough, the taste and almond aroma, vanilla and the right amount of cherry to make this my new favorite flavor!!!";;;

Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,Shananegins85,2019-07-06,5,Warning,0,0,"If you try this ice cream, you will never stop craving it. Flavor combo is intoxicating. If you’re eating straight out of the carton there’s no way to not finish it. I had to start working out for the first time in 5+ years thanks to this deliciously infuriating ice cream.";;;
Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Dls20
title: New favorite!
text;;;: I was really hesitant to try this flavor for many reasons but it is AMAZING. The cherry is perfect and not overpowering and the almond flavor perfectly compliments it. The sugar cookie dough core is so much better than the chocolate chip cookie dough core.;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: megan88
title: MY FAVORITE ICE CREAM EVER
text;;;: I purchased this Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough ice cream once and fell in love. I have purchased many more pints since then! This is the best ice cream I have ever had. It is sweet and has the cherry flavor that mixes perfectly with the cookie dough.;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,MegA,2020-09-21,5,AMAZING when I can find it!,0,0,"I dream about this ice cream, it's SO GOOD! The only bummer is that it's always sold out so I've only gotten to enjoy it a couple times.";;;

Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,Embe,2020-09-09,5,Loveeee this flavor,0,1,"The two flavors are more subtle which is why I love it! I’m not a fan of super over done and sugary flavors, which this is not. The almond cookie side is my fav, I wish they just made that in a pint size. Best flavor :)";;;
Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: belleyboooo
title: Great Flavor!
text;;;: I bought this a month ago and I just bought another pint last week! This pint core flavor is one that is sweet but not overly sweet with this flavor combination. Hopefully won’t have to see this flavor go!;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,Keoflex,2019-07-20,2,"Not outstanding, limited cherries",0,0,I decided to switch from Cherry Garcia and try this. I was super disappointed! There were only about three cherries in the entire pint and the core was way too sweet. Definitely will not buy this again.;;;
Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Jimbophill
title: Not cookie dough
text;;;: I accidentally bought this instead of cookie dough. I feel fooled;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,Cara3177,2019-05-31,5,My new favorite!,0,0,"This is by far the best ice cream Ben & Jerry’s has ever made, and that’s saying a lot because most of their ice creams are amazing. I hope they never stop making this. It’s absolutely delicious!";;;

Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,jacqueline78,2019-06-14,5,hit all my favorite flavors and textures YUMMY,0,0,"This was one of the most surprisingly yummy ice cream flavors, textures I have ever had. I say mmmmmm with every single bite. Please keep on making this SWeet as sugar ice cream. just heavely.";;;

Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,Kindaoffkilter,2019-11-16,5,So good,0,0,"Got it last week and was surprised how well almond, cherry, and shortbread went together in this pint! Tried to buy it again today at different store but outta luck. Will be getting it again!";;;
Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Gal Friday
title: Absolutely delicious
text;;;: This might be one of my top B&J flavors of all time. The only way it could be better would be more cherries and cookie dough in each pint. Please consider making a vegan version of this!;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Katana311
title: Yummmm!!
text;;;: This flavor is soooo good!! The cherry and almond flavors together are perfect and the cookie dough core has that great gritty cookie dough texture! This is one of my new faves!;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Megan1321
title: The best ice cream ever!
text;;;: The core was so sweet and just the right flavor. The smooth almond ice cream goes so well with the cherries and the sugar cookie! This ice cream flavor will not disappoint!;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Jay2312
title: Delicious
text;;;: Omg I brought this ice cream yesterday and was thinking about it at work lol couldn't wait to get home. This ice cream is amazing!!!!! Definitely my favorite!!!!!!;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Teddy
title: Unbelievable Flavor
text;;;: I discovered this flavor because it was on closeout at a store i shop. It is incredible. The flavors go together so well and that sugar cookie core is heaven.;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Abc123
title: Good but not a favorite
text;;;: I'm eating it right now. It's okay but not one of my favorites. Kind of plain.;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,Baggy08,2019-08-18,3,Ice Cream is great...,0,0,"I bought this yesterday, and I love the ice cream. My only complaint is, there was no cherry ice cream in it. Mine was all vanilla. Still loved it!!!";;;

Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,DanaStat,2020-01-22,5,Yummy,0,0,"I just got this flavor, it's now my favorite. I'm not a chocolate fan so this was my first choice to try. Now I love it. Thank you for making this.";;;

Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,mandalynn12,2019-04-30,5,Definitely has become a favorite,0,0,"Don't let the name fool you, it is not as sweet as i thought it was going to be. The almond flavor is amazing, and its definitely become a favorite.";;;
Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: ChantellB
title: Best ice cream EVER!
text;;;: I am not an ice cream person but I saw this and bought it on a whim because I love almond flavor and cherries. It is SO good! Glad I found it.;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,Heidinmc,2019-11-27,5,The BEST ice cream ever,0,0,"This is literally the best ice cream I have ever had. The almond flavor, sugar cookie core, cherries... everything about it is amazing!!!!!";;;
Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: SVAUGHAN
title: Too Little Core
text;;;: The ice cream was delicious! I was sad that the core wasn’t centered in the middle & was shallow compared to other core ice creams.;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: aelaws
title: Favorite flavor of all time
text;;;: I tried this for the first time today and it’s hands-down the best ice cream I’ve ever had. Please don’t stop making this flavor!;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Meghanb
title: My absolute favorite!!!
text;;;: I first found this flavor about two months ago and i can not get enough! This is my favorite flavor and i highly recommend it!!!;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,Jlugo,2019-09-28,5,Best ice cream,0,0,"I usually always get one pint of ice cream during a trip to walmart, this is the best ice cream l’ve ever had!! Super delicious";;;
Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Jm82
title: Mmmm!!
text;;;: Best. Flavor. Ever. I love the cherry without all the chocolate pieces. More cherries!! The sweet cream/almond is delicious.;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: berry
title: It's good what more can I say
text;;;: This and Chip Happens are the best new flavors in a looooong time; the flavor combo and the sugar cookie core are delicious.;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,Ashley0612,2019-11-04,5,G.O.A.T,0,0,"Don’t ever take this flavor away. Or I’ll find you. But for real, I don’t know if life is worth living without this flavor.";;;

Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,Lukaskatz,2020-06-20,5,Best flavor hands down,0,0,"Didn’t know I’d like almond flavor... now I love it. I used to be a half baked guy, but I’ve converted to sweet like sugar.";;;
Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,Jjamie,2019-08-13,5,So delicious,0,0,"Unique flavors, when together it’s perfection:) was looking for something without the chocolate flavor this hit the spot!";;;
Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Chachki
title: Very accurate!!
text;;;: The only core ice cream that I like! Almost ate the entire pint. The best ice cream since Jimmy Fallon's late night snack!;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,Peaches3,2019-05-04,4,Great flavors,0,0,"The flavor combo is amazing but the sugar cookie core doesn’t taste like as sweet as sugar cookie, kinda made me sad";;;
Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,KaylaStr,2020-01-07,5,Yum,0,0,"I love this. The flavors go so well together. Would love a version without the core, although it’s amazing with!";;;
Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,Karen613,2020-03-03,5,My absolute favorite!,0,0,"So so good! Does everyone feel how I do about this flavor? My local stores are sold out, I’m so sad. Lol.";;;
Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: lv2018
title: Too sweet
text;;;: This flavor is way too sweet and I wouldn’t recommend it to someone unless they want to eat pure sugar;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Netta1078
title: Best Ice cream ever
text;;;: I am so in love with this ice cream!!! Finally a cookie dough ice cream WITHOUT chocolate chips!!!!!;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Jenslucky1
title: My new favorite
text;;;: This is my absolute favorite! The most delicious flavor combination! Seriously the best ever!!;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Kris10
title: Perfect mix of flavors
text;;;: Hope they add this to their permanent lineup of flavors! There’s no combo like this out there;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,Jinxy,2019-11-01,4,Love this one,0,0,"I bought this ice cream cause it was a new flavor. It's a good thing cause its tasty, yummy!";;;
Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
title: The best I have found!!
text;;;: This is so good.... I am actually sad that I found it because now I eat it... almost daily.;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core,willmw121,2020-04-01,3,"Ok, but could be better",0,2,"The ice cream sounds pretty good, but I'd prefer it if it didn't have the cherry stuff.";;;
Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Sally
title: Addictive!
text;;;: Probably my new favorite. All the components are good on their own and together.;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: DaniH
title: The best
text;;;: If you like sweet this is the best Ben and Jerry’s flavor hands down!;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Kayer925
title: SO GOOD!
text;;;: This ice cream is the best. It’s my favourite out of all the cores.;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Delicious44
title: Best ice cream flavor yet
text;;;: Best ice cream flavor yet. Only flavor I will currently buy.;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: tayelle12
title: Best Ben and Jerry's Core Ice Cream
text;;;: This is the best ice cream ever!! Love the sugar cookie core;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: JennnnnT
title: Great Combo!!
text;;;: Super Yummy! Would definitely buy anytime I see it offered.;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Molly88
title: UHMAZING
text;;;: Could you like never stop selling this please? I will die.;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Ice cream lover forever
title: The most amazing ice cream ever!!!!
text;;;: So happy I tried this. My favorite ice cream of all time!;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Vermont tourist
title: Better than cherry garcia
text;;;: My new favorite ice cream. Could use more cherry chunks;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Pamp93
title: This is my favorite
text;;;: This flavor is so hard to find but this is my favorite!;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Shari
title: Best flavor yet!
text;;;: I can’t get enough of this flavor! Delicious flavors.;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: opirnia
title: best ever!
text;;;: even better than chubby hubby and urban bourban. yum!;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Christina3
title: The best!
text;;;: I love love love these flavors! One of my new favs!;;;

name: Sweet Like Sugar Cookie Dough Core
author: Peachs
title: Delicious
text;;;: Best flavor ever. Please don’t ever get rid of it.;;;

name: "Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",,2019-08-29,5,The One Core to Rule Them All,24,1,"Open your freezer. Do you see ice cream that isn't Wake & No Bake Cookie Dough Core? That's your first mistake. Get in your car, on your bike, or in your hovercar and go to the closest store for this. Don't believe it's THAT good? That's your second mistake.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Mariah95,2019-05-08,5,Favorite cookie as an ice cream,4,0,"When I saw this I was so excited because I’ve been making no bake cookies with my grandma years! ( hers are the best I’ve ever had ;") ) aside from that I personally like to add a little more peanut butter to the cookie mixture which would’ve been nice in this cookie core. The peanut butter cookies didn’t taste like peanut butter to me. The vanilla ice cream was fine
author: just subtle enough to let everything else shine. The best way to eat no bakes is while they’re still warm and not set up with a big glass of milk. I thought no bakes were an Oklahoma thing so I’m happy to see them represented in a product that’s sold worldwide.""";;

name: "Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",,2019-04-05,5,Best Core Ice Cream Yet!!,6,2,"I bought this thinking the name was just kinda funny(love you guys for it!) But I was sceptical due to not being a big fan of your core series of ice creams. I had always found the core to be over powering, not allowing the rest of the ice cream to really shine, but this was totally different! This one some how is lighter, not to over bearing, and yet still brings the spoonful of chocolate to the table. Maybe its the oats, maybe its the amount of cocoa in the mix, who knows. But yall nailed it on the head this time! Really hope this stays, happy to have found something else chocolaty from you guys other then my usual Tonight Dough.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",MJamz,2019-03-21,5,Better than expected,8,1,"I went from psyched when I first saw these were out, to wary when I'd heard several pans of this flavor, to delighted when I decided to try it anyway (and wondering why I ever doubted myself)! I thought the base flavors were a little muted, yes, but the core and mix-ins were great--not too gargantuan fudge chips, soft and chewy cookies (not dry like some have experienced), and a really unique and fun core. Plus, my particular pint was quality-control goals--solid core all the way through the container, not a single air pocket, and plenty of mix-ins distributed from top to bottom too!";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",BrendaNoraG,2019-03-16,3,Kinda boring,13,4,Finallly found this flavor. Vanilla ice cream is good but plain. Peanut butter cookie dough pieces are smaller than I expected and have a bland/dry taste. Chocolate cookie core is mediocre at best. Not as full of topping as expected. I’m disappointed.;;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Ks1986,2019-05-04,4,Do people not know what no bake cookies are?,18,3,"A lot of reviews you can tell these people have no idea what the core is supposed to be. It's not supposed to be like traditional cookie dough. It perfectly emulates the flavor and texture of classic no-bake cookies. A mixture primarily of chocolate, peanut butter, and oats dropped onto wax paper and cooled to form ""cookies"" that you don't need to bake.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",ILikeIceCream,2019-07-29,5,No Bake Cookie Core rocks!!,9,1,"My favorite cookie in the form of a Ben and Jerry's ice cream? YES PLEASE! It is delicious. Go get some now, yes now!";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",AshnPhilly,2019-04-25,2,Disappointed,1,1,"Just got a pint of this tonight, it looked so good in the store! But not so good at home. Mostly tastes like vanilla, very little peanut butter. Core part was good, but misaligned and had an air pocket so didn’t get as much as usual. Will be passing on this flavor in the future.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Amanda8,2019-06-05,1,The core doesn’t taste at all like cookie dough,25,24,This flavor sounded so good but it was a let down for me. The vanilla ice cream was pretty bland and the chunks weren’t so good. Very small chocolate pieces and the peanut butter cookies tasted dry and also not very flavorful. Then the core just tasted like gritty sugar. It was really strange actually because normally I love all Ben & Jerry’s flavors. I don’t get why it was called cookie dough core because it was like a gritty paste with hard chunks (maybe oats?). I was expecting it to actually be the cookie dough that’s in their other ice creams. It almost seemed like all the sugar in the container went to the core because it was so sweet (yet still not good tasting) and the rest was so bland. This was a big miss. Maybe something went wrong with this batch because I can’t imagine they would want to produce this variety if they tasted it first. I’d recommend passing on this! one.;;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Mdbenandjerry,2019-05-02,5,Shocked that anyone rates this less than 5 stars!,4,1,"Listen, the flavor combo = amazing. The peanut butter ice cream is rich and delicious and the vanilla balances it out. But the cookie core. The freaking. Cookie. Core. It is SO DELICIOUS. It’s chocolatey and a little peanut buttery and with little oatmeal (?) texture bits. It’s truly such an incredible flavor, I could barely stop eating the pint. Please don’t get rid of this!!!";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",MadLib,2019-04-16,5,Best Core Ice Cream,3,0,"This is delicious. As I sit here eating this, I'm thinking this is definitely one of my favorites from Ben and Jerry's. The core really complements the peanut butter cookie dough, and the texture feels so good in my mouth. This is a winner for sure.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",KellyKellz,2019-05-03,5,Pure Nostalgia!,3,0,"The core tastes just like my mom’s no bake cookie recipe I loved growing up! I’m not the biggest fan of vanilla ice cream, but it’s used perfectly here to balance the richness. So hard not to eat the whole pint!";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",KCJane,2019-05-25,5,DELICIOUS!!!!!,3,1,"Where has this been all my life? No-bake cookies are possibly my favorite kind of cookie, so this core is TO DIE FOR. I saw another reviewer here didn't like it because they were expecting regular cookie dough -- I am concerned that they have never eaten a no-bake cookie before, which would be terribly sad if true. In any case, they're right: this cookie dough core is quite different from regular cookie dough. It's BETTER.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",StacyT,2019-05-05,5,Awesome!!!,3,0,"I loke trying all the B&J ice creams and this one was AWESOME! I loved the peanut butter ice cream , cookie, and the chocolate core...just delicious!!";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Marsh,2019-08-19,1,"Grainy, Weird Taste, Difficult to even eat",1,1,"The core is grainy, dry, hard, and tastes nothing like cookie dough. Honestly I thought it was stale at first glance--does this kind of cookie dough get stale? Did I get a bad batch?";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",CDubs,2019-04-01,5,Yum!,3,0,No Bake Cookies are my favorite! This ice cream has the taste down. So good! Need to buy more and keep it in case if emergencies.;;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",lashawn96,2019-09-15,3,Bad Core,0,0,"I just tried this flavor on gopuff and my thoughts are the core has a weird taste and doesn’t taste like “cookie dough” like your other cookie dough core does, but Ice cream is tasty and accurately described.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",ChrisColby,2020-02-23,3,Amazing Core,0,0,"The second best of the cookie dough core lineup, ""Wake and No Bake"" is tasty. The theme here is peanut butter and chocolate and the flavor delivers for the most part. The peanut butter ice cream goes perfectly with the fudge chips, so that works, but could've used more fudge chips. The vanilla ice cream tastes weak and only takes away from the peanut butter, while the peanut butter cookies taste a bit dry. What saves this flavor though is the ""No Bake"" core. It's absolutely delicious. The core tastes like a well balanced combination of chocolate and peanut butter while having a unique gritty/chunk texture. Some changes could've definitely improved this flavor but it's still a good chocolate/peanut butter mix overall.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Madjars,2019-04-26,2,Ehh,0,0,The core is so small. But not as small as the supposedly pb cookie chunks. It tastes amazing otherwise !! More pb cookies & bigger core;;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Kris10,2019-05-17,4,"5-star core, 4-star ice cream",2,0,"Core was great but a little disappointed in the actual ice cream flavors. The PB ice cream was underwhelming and hard to differentiate from the vanilla. Loved the peanut butter cookie chunks but could definitely use more fudge flakes, especially since the PB was so hard to taste.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",veganime,2019-06-13,3,Meh,1,0,"Eh, not my favorite. The core was very, very hard, and I had a difficult time breaking it up with my spoon. The peanut butter cookie dough wasn’t much better. It was dry and kind of flavorless - if you had me try one blindfolded, I wouldn’t be able to tell you what it was. I found myself picking out the core and peanut butter cookie dough pieces so that I could enjoy the vanilla and peanut butter ice creams, which were good. Not terrible, but won’t buy again.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Freedom1330,2019-09-06,3,"I like it, but I don't.",0,0,"This is one of those ice creams where if you don't get a good pint of it, it's not very good. I agree with a lot of others on their reviews when they say the peanut butter side is bland, the vanilla side really comes through, the peanut butter cookie pieces are definitely dry and crumbly and not like a dough at all. And finally we get to the ever famous core. The core was a pretty big let down in multiple ways. First off, its always a different size in each pint. I also think it goes bad or gets almost freezer burnt tasting pretty quick even though the ice cream is not freezer burnt. It has a gritty, chocolatey and oat center. I definitely feel like more effort could be made to make this a better ice cream because the idea is amazing!!";;;
"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Bgh123,2019-04-16,5,Best icecream ever,2,0,Seriously get this stuff!!!! My boyfriend and I ate the whole pint in one sitting;;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",LovePeanutButter,2019-07-20,3,Wake and No Bake - tasty but not what I expected.,0,0,"I bought some Wake and No Bake ice cream the other day at my local Walmart here in Texas. I ate half of it before I realized it was only Vanilla ice cream, peanut butter cookie dough pieces, and the chocolate cookie dough center. I think there was only a few Fudge chips and NO Peanut Butter ice cream. While it was delicious, as most Ben&Jerry's ice creams are, I was disappointed because I was in the mood for Peanut Butter Ice Cream with the fudge chips. Maybe a little quality control is needed for this product. Thanks.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",,2019-03-29,1,Seriously?!,2,2,"My husband and I are Ben & Jerry's HOUNDS. Anytime it's on sale or a new one comes out, we have to try it. So naturally, we were psyched to see that there were new flavors, and we bought all three. The Wake and ""No Bake"" had to be one if the grittiest and tasteless concoctions that has ever come from this brand. Honestly, it was terrible. The only ""flavor"" present was a weird burnt sugar after taste. Yikes.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Votapkate,2019-03-17,1,Worst flavor,2,1,"I usually can’t put the spoon down when eating this ice cream, but it wasn’t hard to do with this flavor. The cookie dough bites seemed like they were flavorless, non-sugar pieces and the peanut butter cookie pieces were also pretty bland. The ice cream itself tasted okay, but I will definitely not eat this flavor again.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",ChrissyRo17,2019-06-05,1,Taste is very bland,1,0,"I purchased this today (6/3/19) at my local Kroger store. Usually, Ben and Jerry's can't be beat. However, this flavor is terrible. Very bland and the No-Bake cookie dough core is very gritty and stale tasting. I was very disappointed with this flavor pairing and would not recommend.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Bumbed,2019-04-07,2,Hand packed-no thanks.,0,3,"I am psyched to live close to a B&J shop, especially when they have a limited pint, and a great selection of fresh hand packed. Wake and No Bake has to be good in a store pint, right? I hope, because I went with Wake and No Bake from hand packed, just seemed unusual. Super excited to finish dinner and pop the top. Well, it was just a blend of vanilla-ish and peanut-ish with some dry crumbs. Oh, what core? No idea, didn’t see or taste it. Hope stores bought is better. I’ll try it.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Nats93,2019-09-22,1,Huge letdown,1,2,"Like others said, the description of the ice cream leads to a huge let down. As a fan of the peanut butter cup ice cream, I was excited to try this as it features peanut butter cookies and peanut butter ice cream. The peanut butter ice cream is undifferentiable from the vanilla ice cream, the cookie pieces are dry and tasteless, and the no bake cookie dough core is equally tastelss. I shan't stray from peanut butter cup again!";;;
"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Rashelle,2019-04-14,5,Awesome core!,1,0,I've had this a few times now and my only complaint is that I wish there was more core!! It's so delicious!;;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Ice Cream Monster,2019-05-31,5,Absolutely delicious - No bake cookie core,0,1,"I loved this ice cream. I've always been a fan of no bake cookies (for those not familiar with them, they're peanut butter, chocolate, oatmeal chunks that you eat. They're chewy and aren't like regular cookies or cookie dough), and the core was the best part! It was a little grittier than normal because of the temperature, but not enough to be off-putting. The peanut butter flavor in the ice cream was great also, and I'll be getting this again for sure!";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",juliaaaaaaa,2019-04-05,1,Ick,1,3,"This flavor is terrible. The peanut butter ice cream seemed essentially flavorless, there are very few fudge chips, the peanut butter cookie dough bites were hard and dry, and the core was borderline inedible. As another review said, the texture was like gritty sugar. I'm so confused about what this core is supposed to be. This is the very first Ben & Jerry's flavor I've ever less-than-loved.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Weez,2019-03-22,2,Ehhhhh,1,1,Couldn’t wait for the new core flavors and so far all three are a disappointment! This flavor core is tasty but very grainy. The peanut butter icecream is pretty good. The vanilla is blah and the peanut butter cookie pieces have a faint taste. So far no core ice cream is better than the Peanut Buttah Cookie Core!!!;;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Mike392,2019-10-06,5,A little core but still a lot of delight!!!!!!!!!!,0,1,Even though there was only a little core to the pint that I bought it was still very good! No regrets at all in fact I would eat two or three pints of wake and no bake cookie dough core ice cream. It was still extremely delicious and I’m still glad I bought it and I plan to buy it again as soon as I’m out and about at the grocery store. As a matter of fact I would recommend this to every one and this would have to be my absolute favorite.;;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Hanita,2020-02-24,3,"Great Core, The Rest is Meh",0,1,"No-bake cookies are my absolute favorite cookies. They are like blobs of chocolate peanut butter oatmeal fudge. So for me, the core is basically crack. The ice cream is kinda boring, maybe a chocolate malt or banana would be better? The peanut butter cookies are DRY and totally ruined the whole thing. Why cookies in a 'no-bake' themed ice cream, obviously should be cookie dough. Just sayin'.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",jsven,2019-10-24,1,Core only went halfway down,0,3,"Bought it for 6 bucks and change at cub because everyone said it was good, it was way overpriced and the cookie dough core only went down half way. I could have gotten a cookies dough kemps gallon for cheaper and there would have been far more cookie dough. I had the love banana chocolate and grahm cracker one awhile back, that one was good, this one was huge disappointment.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",kika07,2019-04-05,1,DO NOT BUY!!!!,1,3,Me and my boyfriend love LOVE LOVE ben and jerry's. We usually have a pint every week. Our favorites are milk and cookies or boom chocolota core. BUT THIS ONE HERE.... not worth it. It was very very bland and we didn't understand the core? Worst then great value walmart ice cream.;;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",JRobertson,2019-04-08,2,Mehhh Disappointing,0,1,"This is the second of the three new 2019 core dough flavors that I’ve tried. Is it better than the chocolate chip cookie dough core one? Yes. But not by much. The peanut butter ice cream is good, the vanilla ice cream with the chips is boring. The pieces of peanut butter cookie are little and bland. Way too much ice cream to dough ratio. The core is...ok.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Court25,2019-05-24,1,Not so great...,1,2,I was super excited when I saw this flavor and decided to give it a shot but I was not so impressed. The peanut butter cookie dough was very Minimal. After reading the reviews it seems like this ice cream is very inconsistent the peanut butter flavor in mine was incredibly delicious and you could taste it as soon as it hit your tongue. The vanilla was definitely a little bland but most vanilla is unless you purchase a French vanilla type ice cream. The core has a very off putting aftertaste I did see a review that this is what the core is supposed to look like taste like because that's what no bake cookies are and though I've never really had no bake cookie is I'm wondering if my pint taste different then that other persons pint because some of the reviews said they couldn't taste the peanut butter but I can taste the peanut butter spot on and some more saying that the core is delicious and for me it's not the texture of the core it's thing really badd aftertaste at leaves in your mouth that put me off I really hope this flavor goes through a remake because I think it could be really good.;;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",FuzzyGut,2019-03-21,3,50/50,0,1,"What a mixed bag these new pints are. This Wake and No Bake is not an exception. The core, like the other is rock hard but at least it tastes good. The ice cream, both side of it, is not bad, not good, just kind of mediocre. The mix ins were few in my pint. Kind of let down. I won’t be buying this one again.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Zenka16,2019-04-23,1,Core Was Unusual,0,2,"I love Ben and Jerry’s ice cream, but this core flavor was disappointing. The ice cream and cookie bits were fine, but I don’t know what was going on with the core! It was grainy and hard to chew and tasted nothing like cookie dough. I would get any other flavor before picking this one up. Super disappointed.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",LaurenLauren,2019-03-30,2,Very bland,0,1,"The no-bake cookie dough core was alright, the ice cream itself was really, really bland and boring. The dough pieces throughout had almost no flavor and I could hardly tell the difference between the two different sides. Unfortunately wouldn’t ever buy again, even if it was on clearance for $1";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Not a Fan,2019-08-16,1,Dissappointing,0,0,"I love trying new flavors and the Wake and No Bake sounded like an exciting new flavor to try. It was a total let down. The ""core"" was gritty and I wouldn't consider it a core since it was only at the top of the pint. I also didn't taste peanut butter ice cream and didn't see any fudge chips.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Larss,2019-05-04,1,Gross core,0,2,"I enjoyed the ice cream part of this but the core was disgusting. It says it's a cookie dough core and I figured ""wow that sounds good"" but then when I tried it the core is this awful dry nougaty chocolate and was not at all like how it is labeled. I will never again buy this flavor.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Mikel116,2019-05-30,1,Cookie Dough Bore,1,4,"I lost a lot of weight after having my daughter and gained it back by eating a pint of B&J everyday for a YEAR. I may not be a food scientists or sensory analysts but I do consider myself a bit of an expert when it comes to B&J. I know what no-bake cookies are so I didn't expect this to remind me of regular cookie dough. That being said, this was the most disappointing pint I've had and I am pretty sure I have tried every flavor available within 15 miles. Even the plain vanilla seems to have more flavor than the vanilla half of this pint. B&J is known for their generosity when it comes chunks, but there were 6-8 PB cookie dough balls in the entire pint. The peanut butter half was supposed to have chocolate chunks but there was literally not a single chocolate chunk in the entire pint. And the cookie core didn't really have flavor. It was hard and gritty with just a hint of chocolate flavor- not at all what I would expect from the geniuses who brought us miracles like Phish Food and Cinnabuns and Seven Layer Bar. I would highly recommend that you skip this pint and try another flavor... ANY OTHER FLAVOR.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",big swag papi,2020-06-14,5,"Bro, this is fricken awesome",0,0,"I thought I had reached my peak, my zenith if you will. But I was wrong. I took one bite of this creamy, chocolately no bakey concoction and a euphoria shot through my veins quicker than a prairie dog through a dirt tube. You did it again Ben and J-dog, you sly scoundrels <3";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",valian7,2020-07-06,5,No Bake Cookie Core is Heavenly,0,0,"i sent my husband to multiple stores to find this, it is one of my favorite flavors ever of any brand of ice cream...the texture of the cookie core is AMAZING and so tasty!! Love the texture of the peanut butter cookies in the ice cream too!";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Rach99,2019-10-17,5,So good!!,0,0,"So happy I bought a pint of the new Wake & No Bake Cookie Dough Core flavor! I loved the taste/texture of the cookie dough core the most, and combined with the yummy gobs of peanut butter cookies--I was in heaven! Will definitely buy again.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Solancer,2019-07-28,5,The one I can’t put down,0,0,I prefer my ice cream mostly plain but I tried this one and I cannot stop buying it every time I go to the store as well as finishing it every time I open it probably my favorite ice cream ever thank you for my new addiction!;;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Johnny S,2019-06-17,5,Love this one!,0,1,"This a great flavor and the cookie core is so good! I cannot believe it is getting so many bad reviews, whats wrong with these people? Its ice cream, for cryin out loud! Try this one for yourself before judging!";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Ice_creamer,2019-11-14,5,Fantastic taste,0,0,"A friend first bought this for me as a joke, but when I tasted it I was instantly in heaven. I have bought this ice cream every week since first eating it, and I have to say it's easily my favorite ice cream.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Sourismom,2019-09-10,5,My fave flavor in years!,0,0,"This is just about the perfect flavor for me. I love the combination of chocolate and peanut butter, and the no-bake chocolate oatmeal cookie center is such a fond reminder of my childhood. LOVE IT!!";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Kristen,2019-08-22,1,Worst flavor yet,0,1,"I got this today and was excited because it sounded so good. It definitely was not! There was hardly any chocolate chunks, the core was awful, tasted nothing like a no bake cookie. So disappointing.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",FlavorKid2,2019-11-13,5,Flavor Combo for the Ages!,0,0,Best ice cream to get if you love peanut butter and cookie dough. Perfect balance of flavors and this combo fits a whole in the B&J lineup as well as the overall ice cream market.;;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Bender,2019-03-24,1,Cookie Dough?,0,2,"The core does not taste like or resemble cookie dough, and besides the core, its pretty much all vanilla icecream with a hint of peanutbutter flavor.";;;

"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Sriccio1015,2020-02-13,5,Simply amazing,0,0,Newly made its way into my Top 5. I had this flavor at a scoop shop and then was ecstatic to find it in Pint size!;;;
"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",MikeK AZ,2020-03-14,2,Nope§!!,0,0,"I love no bakes, seems like it was skimped when you made it. Still love B&J, just not this flavor.";;;
"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",,2020-03-19,5,Love love love,0,0,I love the chocolate crunchies in this! It reminds me of the perfect ice cream cake in a pint!;;;
"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",,2020-01-29,2,This Aint It,0,0,"love the concept, poor execution. One of the few times Bernard and Gerald let me down";;;
"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Bayann11,2020-01-25,5,Peanut butter lovers dreams,0,0,"By far my favorite flavor, wish I had discover it sooner. I love no bake cookies!!";;;
"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Tytyrose,2019-04-19,1,Yuck,0,2,Doesn’t taste like cookies at all and the core is a really weird texture.;;;
"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",hotpinkpanda15506,2020-01-16,5,Wake and no bake,0,0,I love no bake cookies and this is an amazing way to get them;;;
"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Camtheman,2019-08-04,5,Wow,0,0,Best I've cream I've ever had. Everything I love all in one;;;
"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",Mama G,2019-08-05,5,Loving,0,0,Just bought it and loving it can't wait to try them all;;;
"Wake & "" No Bake "" Cookie Dough Core",sarah1234567,2020-04-18,1,is there even peanut butter in here?,0,2,total let down. especially with the ridiculous price.;;;

Brownie Batter Core,Alyssa26,2019-03-23,2,Frustrated,3,1,"I love this flavor and buy it frequently. However, in the last six months a few of my pints have been “dried out”. The brownie pieces completely crumble and the batter center is as hard as a rock. I know this isn’t how it’s suppsed to be because when it’s right its amazing and my favorite flavor. I’m attaching pictures of the dried out pieces.";;;

Brownie Batter Core,Rubberduckie,2019-07-29,2,"Brownie flavor on point, just missed it",10,1,"Brownie batter is like a chocolate lovers dream. Unfortunately with the core series it's a hit or miss, even if you find a suitable flavor you still play chance with even having one. This was essentially just chocolate and vanilla ice cream. I found the core after a couple spoon fulls and it was heaven. I had a feeling it'd be short lived and I was right the core disappeared before I made it to the bottom. Didn't even mind the missing brownie, just add more core !";;;

Brownie Batter Core,AtomicHoney,2017-08-13,2,Just doesn't do it for me,5,1,"I got this flavor instead of my usual core flavor and was disappointed. Its not that its bad so to speak, it was just...not good. I had to force myself to eat this flavor just to not let the food go to waste. Usually Ben and Jerry use pretty good ingredients, but this time, something in the core just didn't settle taste wise with me. It tasted almost artificial. Not like brownie batter at all. I probably would have been happier with plain old chocolate or vanilla ice cream on their own. The core ruined it for me. Not to mention that there wasn't very much of it, which turned out in my favor because once the core was gone, the ice cream was slightly more enjoyable.";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: Maryi56
title: Where did the core go
text;;;: The first few spoon fulls were amazing.. but as soon as I hit the middle section the core disappeared. The core disappearing half way through was disappointing since I was expecting the core to be consistent all the way to the bottom. Such amazing tasting ice cream just wish the core continued throughout the whole pint.;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,KristaRN,2019-02-20,5,Brownie Points,1,0,"Let’s say you were baking brownies and decided to lick the bowl. However, now you add in chocolate and vanilla ice cream to the mix. Sounds amazing right? Well it doesn’t stop there, now you throw in pieces of brownie to top it all off. It was like perfection in ice cream form. I think this came straight from the kitchen of the big man himself. I just sent my husband back to the grocery store because he forgot to pick up my icecream or I threatened to unrelentlessly nag him for the next hour. That’s how good it is. My core went from top to bottom like icecream intestines so I’m not sure about previous faults, but the issue appears to be solved here in SC. Good work on this one!";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: Alynicole18
title: Not very much core
text;;;: I bought this item but less than halfway through the pint the core disappeared I'm disappointed because it was so good;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,FuzzyGut,2019-03-09,4,Almost 100% perfect,12,2,"Everything here worked for me, and I’ve never had a core pint that didn’t go all the way down to the bottom. The brownie and ice cream flavor and texture are perfect. My only issue is that the core itself tastes more like thick fudge than brownie. Delicious for sure but I was hoping for more a brownie batter than fudge flavor, as the pint labeling suggests.";;;

Brownie Batter Core,halcyon,2018-02-03,3,Okay,1,1,"My pint has about 3/4 chocolate and 1/4 vanilla. Which is just as well, as the vanilla has no flavor and seems more like ice milk. I tried a bite by itself because I've read that B&J makes one of the best vanilla ice creams. Now I'm wondering if this is the same as the vanilla pints, or perhaps a lesser quality is used here, since there's a lot of other stuff going on to mask it. My first thought upon trying the chocolate side was ""coconut oil."" That's always disappointing as it's a rather prominent flavor. The core is good and gooey with a taste more of syrup than batter. I tried this as the store was out of the one I wanted. In the future I'll stick to the really good ones.";;;

Brownie Batter Core,larsen2398,2019-04-19,1,This makes me sad.,1,0,"I just bought this flavor while at Walmart the other day as a treat for the stressful week before finals. I usually get the cheapest ice cream at Walmart but figured I could splurge. I love brownie batter but found that the ""brownie batter core"" tasted nothing like brownie batter. Instead, the core was just like a chocolate fudge syrup. The description also states there would be half vanilla and half chocolate ice cream with brownie chunks surrounding the core. More than 3/4 of the ice cream in my container was chocolate. Sorry Ben & Jerry's, definitely not as good as expected.";;;

Brownie Batter Core,Okerrah,2018-01-30,3,Not Enough Core !,2,2,"I was looking for something sweet to eat , and ran into it , the ice cream was great except for the fact that the core disappeared . The ice cream was enjoyable until it was about half way gone . My pint also had very few brownie bites . Don't get me wrong it was delicious, i just expect core to last longer & a little more brownie bites !";;;

Brownie Batter Core,Robyn92,2019-01-07,3,Mostly just chocolate and vanilla ice cream,0,0,"It had been awhile since I had given in to my B&J's craving. I saw this flavor and was curious about the core. The first 1/3 of the pint was good, but not even halfway through the core disappeared and I was left with basically vanilla and chocolate ice cream. It was also definitely lacking in brownie pieces. A little disappointed.";;;

Brownie Batter Core,cheyenne12_25,2017-07-04,2,SO good but short lived,3,1,"The first several bites were really good (despite there not being any brownie pieces in the first 1/4 of the pint). The brownie batter was really good and it was overflowing but then about half way thru the pint, the brownie batter stopped. And then nothing. From then on it was just chocolate and vanilla ice cream with an occasional brownie piece. This could be a really great flavor if it was made correctly.";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: DakoH
title: The first half was great!
text;;;: I loved this flavor!! I’ve never had a “core” flavor before and the core was my absolute favorite part until it was gone half way threw the pint leaving a hole on the side .. Not to sure if I’ll be buying a “core” flavor again..;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,Mariana101,2019-12-13,3,Great flavor but...,0,0,"This is my all time favorite flavor of ben and jerrys. Though everytime i get ot, the core stops about 1/3 of the way down. I didnt mind that too much but my most recent stopped about half way.";;;

Brownie Batter Core,Tameka,2019-10-28,2,Disappointed,0,0,"I’ve always loved this flavor, but this has become my least favorite. I just bought a pint of this today and it’s dried out. No brownie batter core. I’m highly disappointed.";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: Sama_renee
title: Disappointed for the price
text;;;: I was so excited to see this! But as suspected the core didn't reach the bottom and 1/3 of it was AMAZING. The rest just regular ice cream. A waste of 6 dollars.;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,rasputin,2019-07-20,5,perfect for existential crises!,0,0,"I don’t know who needs to hear this but you deserve ice cream (or your favorite non-dairy alternative) because it may help you temporarily forget about climate change, I recommend this one because it’s basically the most amazing thing I’ve ever put in my mouth (and best believe there are many, many close contenders there). This stuff is so perfectly decadent that I almost couldn’t finish a pint of it, which is definitely an accomplishment in my book and I’m the book of anyone who’s witnessed me inhale a whole pint of green tea ice cream on a regular day.";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: emely
title: Has good potential
text;;;: I was slightly disappointed but there are good flavors. I wish it had more whole brownies and the core should go down to the bottom of the pint. Has lots of potential if tweaked.;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core
author: NaughtyNikki
title: Yum
text;;;: Ok y’all 2 star ppl need to hush about the core! Its sooo good the chocolate and vanilla and brownies! The core is just an added bonus! Loves it;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,Matthew6767,2017-10-22,2,Disappointed Sadly,0,0,"I decided to get this core flavor (my publix was all out of my favorite flavors) and I had never had any of the core ice creams before. I was disappointed to say the least, the core was non existent and seemed to go missing towards the middle, and the brownie bits when I found them were absolutely dreadful. Overall I was very disappointed and had to throw it away after being grossed out by the core and brownie flavors. Please do something about these two, the ice cream itself was on point, but the brownie bits and batter need a flavor overhaul.";;;

Brownie Batter Core,Kadi,2017-09-21,5,I found the core!!,0,0,"The first time I bought this flavor I was so hopeful, because brownie batter is my favorite b&J's flavor of all time, but I got my pint home and there was hardly any core in it (as the other reviews have mentioned). For that reason I hadn't repurchased until last week when I was desperate bc nothing else at the store sounded good, and lo and behold there was core all the way through!!! So much core in fact, that I questioned if I'd run out of ice cream before core!! (It was close, but I worked diligently to conquer a perfectly balanced core to ice cream ratio from start to finish. Still doesn't compare to the original brownie batter, but I'm so glad you all resolved this coreless issue so many had encountered. Reviewers, your voice was heard!";;;

Brownie Batter Core,veeloveschocolate,2018-02-11,2,Great Favor Idea with Poor Execution,0,0,"I am an extreme chocolate lover. Usual Half-Baked is my go to, especially now with the Froyo option. The Brownie Batter Core has great potential, however the taste of the “brownie batter” is not great. I honestly don’t even know what to compare it to. The core was also gone mid-way through the ice cream as if they pour it all on top then forgot about the rest of the pint. There also were many brownie bits, it was essentially a pint of chocolate and vanilla ice cream swirled together and that was it. Quite disappointing.";;;

Brownie Batter Core,Ebb19,2017-07-24,4,One of the best ice cream flavors but..,1,0,"This is one of the best ice cream flavors I've ever had (I'm hard to impress). I was loving the brownie core it was delicious! Until... it was gone, I wasn't even half way through the pint. I wish it lasted to the end. Regardless I loved it & will be buying it again. Hopefully, the core will be all the way through next time.";;;

Brownie Batter Core,Shan83,2018-04-29,2,"The core is more like a choc fudge, not brownie",0,0,"I happen to love actual brownie batter and got so excited that I opened it up so fast as soon as I got home and was so disappointed with the brownie batter core, its not brownie batter, its just water down chocolate fudge flavor. The chocolate and vanilla combination was good with the brownie pieces, but I wouldn't call it brownie. I think the factory should work on this flavor more and make it brownie, not chocolate fudge flavor, or just rename it.";;;

Brownie Batter Core,Lei12,2017-07-16,3,Would be excellent... if only there was more core!,1,0,"Like some other reviewers, the core in this carton was sparse. What I did manage to get was soo delicious and chocolately, however halfway through the carton, the core was missing! Please think about adding more core to this ice cream, it is the best part";;;

Brownie Batter Core,Laur,2018-01-08,5,My Fave Ice Cream,0,0,"I found this by accident as one day I couldnt find my second fave ""Milk and Cookies"". I love that there's a great flavor that combines vanilla and chocolate ice cream without nuts, but with some brownie pieces. Legitimately, this is my favorite ice cream across all brands, and now I don't even buy other brands, since I've fallen for this flavor. They no longer carry this flavor at my neighborhood store, so I'm forced to buy it at Target...which is ok with me :-)";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: Zinxo
title: Best flavour I have ever tried.
text;;;: It's more of a dessert than an ice cream. Really full and rich.;;;
