name: Brownie Batter Core,kzawideh,2017-11-27,2,"Good idea, unfortunate execution",0,0,"I bought this ice cream expecting a mix of chocolate and vanilla ice cream with brownie bits and a brownie batter core, unfortunately upon opening the container the brownie batter core was right at the top and make a mess, also the texture of the brownie batter was more like runny chocolate sauce than brownie batter, which was the biggest disappointment for me, also there were not many brownie chunks throughtout the vanilla and chocolate ice cream.";;;

Brownie Batter Core,,2017-11-12,5,LOVE IT!,0,0,"I am a hardcore chocolate brownie (anything brownie) ice cream fan. This... this is my fave Ben & Jerry's so far. I haven't had any problems with the core not hitting the bottom. I think the vanilla ice cream adds a nice balance to the overall chocolatey-ness (is that a word?) Anywho, Ben & Jerry's, a sincere thank you from the bottom of this girl's brownie lovin' heart.";;;

Brownie Batter Core,mary27,2018-07-28,3,"Great ice cream, okay core",0,0,"This was my first time purchasing this flavor and although the ice cream itself was really good, the core flavor was a bit disappointing compared to the other core flavors I normally get. The brownie batter core didn't go all the way to the bottom, and it was very bitter and tasted like artificial fudge. The core itself was the only thing wrong with the ice cream, everything else tasted amazing. I love the brownie and vanilla ice cream.";;;

Brownie Batter Core,PrincessDemandyPants,2017-11-25,1,To the graveyard!,0,0,"Oh no! There can be too much of a good thing and this flavor proves it. Chocolate Therapy manages to be ooey-gooey and over the top chocolate mayhem without being intensely sweet. The same cannot be said for its chocolate cored partner-in-crime, brownie chunked friend. If you can figure out a way to temper the evil Dr. Sugar, you may have a winner. If not, consign it to the graveyard to spare humanity.";;;

Brownie Batter Core,Kcbella64,2020-07-02,4,Favorite Flavor,0,0,"Didn't realize that icecream this good existed, unfortunately there was an air bubble at the bottom that robbed me of a fair chance at happiness. I'd also like to add that this has one of the lowest ratings on here yet when I went back to the store to get more, it was all sold out. So if yall are giving low rating to keep ppl away I fear its too late.";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: Cassi7321
title: Cheat Day Favorite
text;;;: This is definitely among my go-to Ben&Jerry’s flavors. The gooey chocolately brownie batter is perfect to really treat yourself after a long week. And I love that the actual icecream isnt overly sweet so that once the batter gets to be too much I can give my taste buds a refreshing break. Seriously its so decadent and I always have a craving for this;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,Kenzie,2020-01-17,3,Great!.. Until you get to the bottom,0,0,"This one is by far my favorite, but it has a terrible draw back! The Core is supposed to be the best part, don't get me wrong it is, but it is a small part that should be alot more than just a bite. At the bottom its just chocolate and vanilla ice cream. I just wish the browies and core were all throughout the pint like it is advertised.";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: Faeli
title: Freezer burner beyond recognition!
text;;;: I am SO DISAPPOINTED. I'm sick and sent my bf to the store for ice cream and got the brownie core... it's so freezer burned I don't even want to bother with it! I've never had the brownie core so this is really disappointing. Not to mention it mentions fudge brownies in it and I have not found a single one. I'm giving up on it.;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,Jb1777,2018-09-01,3,"Very Tasty, core lets it down.",0,0,"I buy this regularly as it is my favourite flavour. However, on multiple occasions of me buying this the core has been pretty disappointing. I find that the never really seems to go down to the bottom or even halfway. It’s more like a fat blob at the top and nothing more. Overall, it tastes very nice but the core lets it down.";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: JJ419
title: Kind of Disappointing
text;;;: I kept hearing so much great things about Ben & Jerry's ice cream flavors. This is the first one I ever tried and it was disappointing. I was really looking forward to have brownie pieces but I think I found like 2. The rest were like crumbs. The core was barely there too. I'll try another one but this wasn't worth it to me.;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,Mirevas,2020-08-31,3,Love the flavors but they’re so inconsistent,0,0,"I’m new to Ben n Jerry’s and so far have gotten 2 brown batter cores and 1 chocolate fudge brownie. I absolutely love the flavors but the cores for both didn’t go all the way down and for the fudge brownie, there weren’t any fudge brownie pieces until I reached the halfway point so it was kind of disappointing";;;

Brownie Batter Core,Tbreanne,2017-08-11,4,MORE CORE!,0,0,"This is the best ice cream flavor, and the core is the best part. But halfway through the core just stopped, and it's very disappointing since getting the gooey core in every bite is what makes this ice cream the best ice cream there is! Seriously just needs the core all the way through!";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: Haileeey
title: 100% my favourite flavour
text;;;: This is hands down my favourite flavour. The only way it could be improved is by replacing the vanilla ice cream with more chocolate haha! BUT the Australian Ben and Jerry's has stopped selling it here so now it exists only in my dreams..... No other flavour matches up in my opinion;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,jakevett9,2018-05-12,5,AMAZINGGGGGGGGG,0,0,"I just had this flavor last night! The core was so thick and gooey just like brownie batter! My core ran all the way to the bottom. I had lots of brownie chunks in mine and they were delicious and chewy!!!! Best ice cream I have ever had. If you're a brownie lover, eat this.";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: JamieG2020
title: Where is the core?
text;;;: Fudge Brownie is my absolute favorite flavor as well as the boom chocalata cookie core one so I decided this flavor would be the holy grail!! But only 1/3 of the pint had the core part opposed to the other flavors that I’ve tried having core in the whole pint! Why is this?;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core
author: Stevi
title: Love the core till it was gone
text;;;: I love several flavors of Ben and jerrys ice cream I just recently tried this flavor and fell in love but all 3 pints I have eaten i too have missed the core not even half way through. It ls amazing but not near as amazing without the core!!! Definitely needs more!!!;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,PapaSmurf,2017-11-26,3,Good but not great,0,0,"It’s hard to ever give a bad review on Ben and Jerry’s ice cream, but I am going to try. As far as brownie goes, I only got little hints, but the core was great. The brownie flavor was good, just not enough of it. As always, the ice cream was still very enjoyable.";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: lilianna
title: Amazing!!
text;;;: I love this ice cream!! I have actually never had a problem with the core because whenever I buy these the core goes all the way to the bottom. Anyway if you like chocolate and vanilla and brownies separately you’re gonna LOVE them all together with this flavor!;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,c_pro,2019-12-03,2,Gimme more core (and brownies)!,0,0,"Man, I wanted to love this but I was completely disappointed by the core which did not go all the way to the bottom (not to mention the lack of brownie pieces). Ugh, Ben and Jerry’s, please fix ASAP as this pint has the potential to knock it out of the park!";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: tmarie14
title: NEW FAVORITE FLAVOR
text;;;: The first and only time i’ve had it i absolutely loved it. Im impatiently waiting for my local publix to restock it i might try my local walmart to see if they have it though. i ate it on it for 2 days and i couldnt get enough of it. it’s my new favorite!!!;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,maggiep,2017-09-06,4,"Great Flavor, not enough core!",0,0,"I love this flavor, but I've gotten it twice and both times the core has disappeared about halfway through the pint. I haven't had this issue with other core flavors, so it seems to be unique to this flavor. It would be perfect if it reached the bottom!";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: liyah21
title: Upset customer
text;;;: I buy brownie batter core about 3-4 times a week and for about the past month every batch has dried out brownies and it’s literally disgusting. Haven’t had a good batch in a month! And i hate chocolate and this actually made me like chocolate.;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core
author: Elaine B
title: I can't get rid of all these muffin stubs!
text;;;: This is a great ice cream. The only negative is the brownie batter core only goes 3/4s the way down. Leaving the 1/4 usually going the dog. Still well worth the purchase. Thank you guys for making the best ice cream in the world.;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,Karen,2017-11-18,5,Best Flavor Ever,0,0,"The year 2017 has been all about Brownie Batter when l find it on Sale l buy all the store has twice. Unfortunately, l have to have one every night and my weight shows it. So, l decided to give up food so l could have my ice cream.";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: Iceeeeeeekreamm
title: Bland
text;;;: Tried this out hoping for a little bit of a variety in the chocolate and vanilla taste. All I got was a bland chocolate with not much else. If the texture and chocolate flavor itself had even a slight variation it would be ok.;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,mpg1904,2018-08-01,3,Not enough core,0,0,"I decided to try a new flavor and while the flavor was delicious, the core did not go to the bottom of the container. It ended about 2/3 of the way down which was disappointing because that was the best part of the ice cream.";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: Sydsm
title: DISGUSTING
text;;;: Please tell me why the brownie core is probably the worst taking brownie batter possible? First of all the viscosity is wayyyy off! No brownie batter is that this/ taste like the fakest chocolate on earth. Never getting again;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,Jake3469,2019-10-18,5,So good,0,0,"I don’t know why this one is rated around only 3 1/2 - 4 stars, it is honestly so good! It’s basically a hot fudge sundae mixed with brownies. Honestly one of their best flavors, I absolutely love it, and recommend highly";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: PhoenixRises
title: Love the Brownies & the Brownie Batter Core!
text;;;: This is probably my second favorite out of the Cores. I love brownies and I love Brownie batter so this was a win for me! The vanilla balances it all out so it won't be too much chocolate. I hope they keep this flavor.;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,Eleah911,2020-03-14,5,❤❤,0,0,"This is my fave flavor. The core tastes more like fudge than brownie batter, but I love it! Sometimes the core doesn't always go all the way to the bottom though, wish it would! Aside from that, I could live off it.";;;

Brownie Batter Core,Mads,2018-07-22,2,Bring back the brownie batter swirl,0,0,"I bought this one after not seeing the brownie batter flavor out anymore, which was clearly made with real brownie batter. This tastes more like and has the texture of a brownie that went soggy then got froze :(";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: Dejota
title: pretty good
text;;;: Pretty good ice cream but overall could be better executed. I love most of the core ice cream lines even though each series seems to be a re-run of previous series. Still a good product and will buy in a pinch.;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,MegS,2018-08-28,2,Great potential!,0,0,"I loved loved the bites that had some of the core or brownie bits. Sadly, those bites were limited. The core was short lived and I maybe found 2 brownie bites. It was more just vanilla and chocolate ice cream.";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: Banana1128
title: No core
text;;;: This is the second pint that I’ve bought and both times there was no brownie batter core. Just small amounts here and there. The ice cream was still good but I was looking forward to the brownie batter core!;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core
author: dcol
title: Don't Ever Leave Me Again!
text;;;: I love this ice cream and am so thankful you brought it back from the B&J graveyard. I know it's a little different blend the original Brownie Batter but the flavor is just as good. Don't ever go away again!;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,Mikayla2242,2019-03-03,3,Good concept,0,0,"I agree with several of the other reviews. The flavor was great, but really disappointed in the lack of the core that was in my container!! It was very thin and ran out half way through the container.";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: IzzyBella
title: Sad
text;;;: I knew I was taking a chance on this bc of the mixed reviews. The core only went 1/3 of the way thru and the brownie chunks were too hard. I love Ben & Jerry's but I'm disappointed with this one.;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core
author: AshK
title: few brownies and no core!!!
text;;;: Was very excited to try this flavor since I love chewy bits in my ice cream but there were very few brownies bits and the core was barely in there. Disappointed because I wanted to love it:(;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,Valy,2019-04-16,5,Perfect!,0,0,"I have never found a combination as amazing as this one. It's got everything I want. Chocolate, vanilla, brownie chunks and a fantastic brownie batter to amplify its flavour. I love it!";;;

Brownie Batter Core,sydney13,2019-05-27,5,My favorite core flavor!,0,0,"I have tried several of the core flavors and this is my favorite by far! It is a chocolate lovers dream. The brownie batter core is so decadent, and I love the brownie chunks!";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: Tsd8
title: Still no core
text;;;: Great ice cream flavors but the core ratio is horrible its more Like a topping. The same for the karamel sutra core is gone before you even get to the middle of the pint;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,Jason04,2019-04-22,3,"Really good, but...",0,0,"Great ice cream, as usual from Ben & Jerry's, but the core was only in the top third of the pint. Too bad, it really made this flavor work. Just not enough of it.";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: Msavage
title: My Lord it's good
text;;;: So good I haven't been able to find it since! I have gone to multiple stores and still nothing... but i wil pmm remain diligent..ty for making my mouth happy!;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core
author: Jadaboo
title: Yummmmmm
text;;;: I bought 2 pints at once. First pint was perfect. The second had maybe 4 pieces of brownie in it. (Which is the best part for me) I was highly disappointed!;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core
author: Milo
title: Best flavor for a chocolate lover
text;;;: I love chocolate. Especially dark chocolate. If you love chocolate as well - get this ice cream. The vanilla mixed in is the perfect amount.;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,Rachlen34,2018-02-11,3,"Great flavor, but poor core!",0,0,"LOVE THIS FLAVOR!!! But the core doesn’t reach past the top third, you miss brownie batter towards the end of the pint. Bit of a bummer :(";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: Terri2
title: Core doesn't go to bottom
text;;;: Started wonderfully at the top--lots of core but 1/3 down the core was barely visible--DISAPPOINTED--started so good WHAT HAPPENED???;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,Devv,2018-05-13,5,The best,0,0,"I love this flavor, it’s my absolute favorite. It’s literally a mix of brownie batter and ice cream together. What could be better";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: Kaybaby
title: The core..
text;;;: I'm extremely disappointed as I love the flavor but I only got a few bites of the core and it was gone before I was even halfway!!;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,Teeny,2017-12-03,3,No core,0,0,"As a whole it was really good but the core disappeared after literally 3 bites, it didn't go even close to 1/4 of the way down.";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: TDOT
title: MY FAV FLAVOR... BUT I NEED MORE BATTER
text;;;: for the most part this does not disappoint unfortunately today i got 4 spoons in and the core was gone!!!!! I need more CORE!!!;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core
author: Vivi
title: Where’s the core
text;;;: I get this ice cream SEVERAL times a week it’s great but the last two times I got it the core ended after the first bite!;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,Bria9142,2017-08-23,4,Just needed a bit more...,0,0,"I loved this ice cream and I would have it again, but there wasn't really much core in it... was kinda disappointing";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: Humph
title: Meh
text;;;: The core was too much and the ice cream didn't have the chunky goodness I've come to expect from Ben and Jerry's;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core
author: Dvlbear
title: The core
text;;;: I got this 2 weeks ago and I loved the flavor. Love the core it's so tasty. I will buy it again repeatedly.;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core
author: tinaaa
title: Good but missing most of its core
text;;;: Probably one of my favorite flavors but not even halfway through the pint and the core was completely gone!;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core
author: erikav00
title: The brownie batter in the middle
text;;;: I BOUGHT THIS LAST WEEK AND IVE NEVER BEEN MORE IN LOVE W AN ICE CREAM. THAT BROWNIE BATTER IS BEAUTIFUL;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,brownieloverrrr,2019-03-03,5,WHAT A GENIUS MOVE,0,0,"Um... Ben, Jerry, MY DUDES. This is heaven in a pint. Never gonna give you up, never gonna let you go.";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: Megs77
title: Core
text;;;: The core didn't taste anything like brownie batter. It just tasted like fudge sauce. Disappointed!;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core
author: Rosey885
title: Best of both worlds.
text;;;: You get both vanilla and chocolate with brownie chuncks and a fudge batter in the middle. Love it!;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core
author: MsBluewings
title: Brownie GALORE!!
text;;;: I really like the combination and really wanted more brownie batter in the core. Keep it up. YUM!;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,ancilla89,2019-07-22,5,Delicious!,0,0,"I was just introduced to Cora ice cream, and as someone who loves brownie batter, I love this!!!";;;
Brownie Batter Core,BrownIEto89,2017-11-02,5,Hands down favorite flavor,0,0,"This is definitely my go to flavor, with the peanut butter core coming in very close second...";;;
Brownie Batter Core,kj027,2018-04-23,3,Core disappeared,0,0,"I love this flavor of ice cream but every time I’ve bought it, the core runs out halfway :(";;;
Brownie Batter Core,Shelekene,2019-02-05,5,Favorite Ice Cream,0,0,"This is my go to flavor. It is the perfect blend of vanilla, chocolate, and brownie bites.";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: ILoveBJs
title: Chemical Taste
text;;;: The brownie batter core had a chemical taste to it. It was VERY sweet and acrid.;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core
author: soccerdadcol
title: My favorite but needs more core
text;;;: Core should be filled all the way to the bottom but it's still amazing.;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,Nolan,2017-05-15,5,Review title,0,0,"This is my favorite flavor, it's a perfect mix of chocolate and vanilla";;;
Brownie Batter Core,Parkor123456789,2018-04-14,5,"Great taste,But nog enough core.",0,0,"There never enough,never goes to the bottom but Hase the best taste!";;;
Brownie Batter Core,uwu9,2018-04-22,5,Delicious,0,0,"I go through the pint so fast when I buy it, you should make quarts!";;;
Brownie Batter Core,beezerbunny,2017-07-23,5,One of my favorites!!!,0,0,"Love the fudge, nice and gooey. Perfect for a chocoholic like me.";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: LaRock0972
title: Best ever
text;;;: Always has been my favorite flavor to eat. Make sure you keep it.;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core
author: maggie
title: Really good!
text;;;: I love anything brownie and this is great. The core is delicious.;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core
author: Kit1487
title: Great
text;;;: I love that ice cream it was so good Loved it Will buy it again;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core
author: Ashley
title: Amazing
text;;;: This is by far the best ice cream I've ever had. So good.;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core,Juliette0127,2019-04-28,5,Amazing,0,0,"It tastes so good! I love it, it’s one of my favorites";;;
Brownie Batter Core
author: Ggc1234
title: My all time favorite flavor of ice cream
text;;;: The brownie batter core is the best. Unbeatable flavor;;;

name: Brownie Batter Core
author: No name
title: My favorite
text;;;: It's my favorite it's simple but very delicious!!!;;;

name: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core
author: FatCatLady13
title: So good even my 4 cats want it
text;;;: I'm 8 months pregnant and this was all I wanted so I walked all the way across town to buy it at the grocery store. It's super expensive there but I HAD to have it. I've never been so happy in my whole life. I want this ice cream everywhere in my life from now on.;;;

name: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core,,2018-02-17,5,"So good, I'm going to start going to church again.",23,1,"If Jesus made ice cream, and not, like, carpenter-y things, he would make this. If God made this ice cream, I promise he wouldn't have bothered with the rest of creation. He'd just sit on his God couch and get wicked fat eating this all the time, except there wouldn't be time, because you know... no creation needed after the crowning achievement of the cheesecake core. Yup.";;;

Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core,Icecreamluva83,2018-01-14,2,Misleading Description,6,2,"The description of the is ice cream says it includes chocolate cookies. Per the graphic on top of the pint lid, the cookies are supposed to be distributed throughout the whole pint. To my surprise, while I was eating this ice cream their were ZERO cookies on the cheesecake side and only a few on the chocolate side. As a seasoned Ben and Jerry’s eater, I was highly disappointed.";;;

Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core,FuzzyGut,2018-07-02,2,Sorry,5,3,"Like most other reviewers, I am a huge Ben and Jerry’s fan and will be through good and not so good pints. I really didn’t like this one. The ice cream was grainy on both sides and the cheesecake ice cream was not so tasty and I ate around it. The chocolate side was good, albeit not smooth. The cheesecake core tasted great but it was very hard and there was very little of it. I ended up throwing half the pint away. Oh well, onto another new Ben and Jerry’s flavor to try.";;;
Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core
author: bigsteveokay
title: This is the best flavor I've found so far
text;;;: This is the best flavor of B&Js I've found so far. I can't do nuts or bananas and this one is excellent and won't kill me!;;;

name: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core
author: Starr588
title: Favorite ice cream ever!!!!
text;;;: Can't stop eating it once I've started!!! It's the best. Only wish there was a little more cheesecake filling it's so tasty!!!;;;

name: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core
author: The Jellyman
title: Awesome core!
text;;;: I got this at Walmart and it was epic! The chocolate ice cream is sweet and the cheesecake ice cream tastes similar to vanilla. The chocolate cookies add a really good crunch and texture to the creamy ice cream. The core was the bomb though. It tastes exactly like actual cheesecake and is rich and dense. I 100% APPROVE THIS FLAVOR TO ANYONE AND EVERYONE.;;;

name: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core
author: Spayne201
title: I liked the chocolate and cookie part...
text;;;: I was so excited to find this flavor! I was then disappointed by a very artificially tasting attempt at cheesecake for the ice cream and the core tasted more like thick baking glaze with too much confectioners sugar. Very disappointing. The chocolate ice cream and the cookie pieces were yummy though.;;;

name: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core
author: Dejota
title: Good ice cream but not the flavor inside
text;;;: I was excited to buy this when I saw it. I love cheesecake! I love cookies and cream! Great combo especially in a core Ben and jerry's. I was sorely disappointed. Don't get me wrong. The ice cream was good but... it was literally cookies and cream ice cream with a vanilla core. Vanilla. Core. That was it. No cream cheese. No cream cheese core. Nothing. Just vanilla ice cream. Very very disappointing.;;;

name: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core,LeiraTheBestest,2017-10-12,4,BOMB DOT COM,2,0,"Aloha from Hawaii! Lol, I always get this flavor when I'm at the store and this would TOTALLY get 5 stars if there was just a liiiiittle bit more cheesecake in the middle! I love scooping some of the middle with some ice cream around it, just wish there was more core!";;;
Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core
author: mixxa
title: I like this!!!!
text;;;: I like this!!!! I like this!!!! I like this!!!!I like this!!!!;;;

name: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core,KatB,2017-07-15,2,Doesn't taste like cheesecake.,2,0,"I bought this flavor a couple months ago, and never again. Cheesecake is one of my favorite flavors, but this just doesn't taste like cheesecake. It doesn't taste bad, but definitely a weaker flavor in the core line up.";;;

Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core,Ale123,2017-08-11,4,More core please!,4,2,"I love this ice cream. However, it is sometimes a little disappointing to get close to the bottom and see there is no more core left. I buy it 2-3 time a week and sometimes the amount of cheesecake core is a little low. I love this flavor so much, please don't short the core!";;;
Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core
author: Cheesecakelover1
title: This is the best icecream I've ever had
text;;;: Do not ever discontinue this flavor. I plan on snacking on this when I'm pregnant in a few years. Good stuff.;;;

name: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core
author: Andria
title: The best!!!
text;;;: Love it; The best ice cream ever! Just delicious.;;

name: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core,OompaLoompa49,2018-08-12,5,This is the straight dope!,1,0,"I was at my local grocery store, wasn't really planning on buying ice cream and there was a special. I love cheesecake and in my old age I am loving chocolate ice cream and cookies more and more. Well you get all of this in one pint. Real cheesecake. I meant to take one bite to just taste it and oops, just like that it was gone. I had to go buy more.";;;

Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core,Angelfeather,2017-08-08,5,Best ice cream ever,1,0,"I'm not a fan of ice cream. This flavor is the best ice cream I've ever had. My favorite part is the cheesecake core. If anything, I wish it was distributed more evenly. Usually towards the bottom, there is little to no cheesecake left. You've converted me, this ice cream is great.";;;
Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core
author: Echat
title: Not enough core
text;;;: I got a pint of this tonight and was super disappointed with how little of the core was. It tasted amazing but it didn’t last throughout and was pretty disappointing.;;;

name: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core,Jackieflorez13,2019-10-15,5,This is my favorite,1,0,"But needs more core! Why does it end not even half way unlike the other cores, the cheese cake core is the best part and best core, pleeeaseeee more core!";;;
Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core
author: Brandy31
title: Greatness
text;;;: I buy one twice a month so delicious the cheesecake core is the best !;;;

name: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core
author: Jody
title: Soo good
text;;;: My new favorite flavor. The flavor was amazing. Absolutely love it;;;

name: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core
author: alfinger1234
title: SLAPS
text;;;: the cheesecake? the cookies? is the best it really slaps;;;

name: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core,Austin98,2017-11-11,1,Really?,2,9,"I'm the type of person to never write a review, especially when it's for some ice cream... As i put the first spoon in my mouth i waited for the great taste of Ben & Jerry's but instead got the weakest flavor i think i've ever tasted. If this was repackaged and sold as a single spoon of nesquik in a gallon of water flavour i might have actually thought twice about paying for this super overpriced rubbish. It's not like i went into it wanting it to be bad. I'm the least fussy eater i know, and i don't think i've ever disliked Ben & Jerry's, or ice cream in general. It's not that the flavour is bad it's just so weak. The bargain supermarket brand chocolate ice cream tasted more like chocolate than this. Also the core tastes about as much like cheese cake as Gatorade tastes like almond milk... Guess what it doesn't. This ice cream is great if you find mayonnaise spicy. 0/10.";;;

Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core,queen23,2018-07-15,1,disappointed,1,1,"I bought this and my core didn’t even start at the top. Then when it did appear it was only about 1 inch down and then dissapeared. It wasn’t even in the middle!! Do not buy this, I bought this for the core and it wasn’t even there. It was a decent flavor though.";;;

Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core,caylab,2018-02-18,5,New Favorite!!!,0,0,"Tried this a few days ago because the store I went to never had the flavors I would normally buy (Phish Food or Cherry Garcia). I was bummed until I tasted it!! Oooh my gosh, this is my new obsession!!! It’s so good. Like someone else said, I wish it had a little more filling in the center just because it’s so delicious!! This ice cream is so addictive!";;;
Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core
author: Chae96797
title: Yummy
text;;;: I don't really buy ice cream maybe a cake once s year for a friend or family but my aunt was food shopping there was a sale she grabbed me this flavor I love cheesecake OMG I tell myself little bit put it away for later lol before I knew it I was at the bottom I'm happy to report I buy ice cream now and have 3 of these in my freezer;;;

name: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core,Cathy84,2020-05-24,5,Cookie and Cheesecake Core,0,0,"My son and I love this! We purchased it because I accidentally grabbed it along with the brownie core by mistake. The best mistake I ever made. A friend bought me the Ben and Jerry’s Ice-cream Dessert book, can’t wait to try. Loved reading the story of how the two of you persevered and didn’t give up.";;;

Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core,Bridgespo99997,2017-11-05,4,Could be improved but overall amazing!!!!,0,0,"Really an amazing core! I love it! The mocha ice cream is delicious! I wish they had a tub of the mocha, the vanilla is just ok! The cookie chunks are a bit different then the usual chucks they've done in other batches, but overall. This flavor is amazing.";;;

Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core,PhoenixRises,2019-09-03,4,Good,0,0,"It was good, but it wasn't a favorite. It didn't wow me like the others. It's the only Ben & Jerry's flavor (out of all the flavors I tried) that I only had once. I didn't buy it again, only because the others were so good. I still liked it though.";;;

Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core,Iknowgoodicecream7,2017-05-06,5,Great combination of flavors,0,0,"I tried this one on a whim today. My all time favorite is the Salted Caramel Core. But I must say, this one is pretty great too. The chunks of cookie throughout and the cheesecake core from top to bottom makes this a delight through and through.";;;
Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core
author: Cmill
title: Amazing!
text;;;: So happy I picked out this flavor at the store! It is great. I love that it has half chocolate ice cream and half vanilla. The cheesecake core gives it even better flavor. I will definitely buy this flavor again.;;;

name: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core,Colorfulcammie,2018-07-09,5,Awesome ice cream,0,0,"I love every flavor I have ever had and I have had A LOT of flavors. My absolute favorite is the ""Cookies & Cream Cheesevake core"" now I can not find it anywhere!! But all Ben & Jerrys are awesime!!!";;;

Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core,JerryLL,2020-06-04,5,The BEST Ben and Jerry's Flavor.,0,1,"If you ever discontinue the Cookies and Cream Cheesecake Core, I will light myself on fire and throw myself off of the Golden Gate Bridge. Do you want to be responsible for that? No? Excellent.";;;
Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core
author: Bigaim75
title: My current fave
text;;;: Thr cheesecake core is heavenly. My only complaint is my local grocery store has stopped carrying it or sold out. It's been several weeks. Fingers crossed they will get it back in stock soon.;;;

name: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core,Ajsza95,2017-07-18,5,The best !,0,1,"This flavor is amazing! I love it, when I have started eat that ice cream i couldn't stop. I was eating eating and eating. This taste made me happy. You have to try it!";;;

Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core,Lua89,2018-06-08,5,Simply the best!,0,0,"I have tried a lot of flavors but this one beat them all, so delicious! The cheesecake core is out of this world. This is the only flavor I buy now. Perfection!";;;
Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core
author: mayo23
title: Great gift
text;;;: I bought this as a gift for my teacher as I had been trying to get him to eat some for four months. He took one bite and he was an instant Ben and Jerry's fan;;;

name: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core
author: marcel
title: used to be my favorite
text;;;: Usually my go-to ice cream but something about the last one i bought was too icy and lost major flavor. Very little cookie pieces and small amount of core.;;;

name: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core,Jhoop,2017-08-24,5,Best flavor ever!,0,0,"This is literally the best Ben and jerry's flavor ever. I don't know who came up with a cheesecake core, but they derserve a nobel peace prize.";;;
Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core
author: Jenga
title: Savory!!
text;;;: Super amazing flavor - one of my favorites! The ‘cookies’ are not too chunky or hard and the cheesecake creates a mouthwatering experience.;;;

name: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core
author: Nancy
title: Ice cream heaven
text;;;: Tried this ben and jerry's for the first time and have not touched any other ice cream flavor since. Hands down the best;;;

name: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core
author: Melyy28
title: Amazing !
text;;;: It’s the perfect combination. Wish they added a little more cheesecake core though. Always seems to end too soon! Haha;;;

name: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core,SLSC,2018-03-21,5,SO darn good,0,0,"My husband and I were fighting over this ice cream even though it was MINE! Very good, and a unquestionable favorite!";;;
Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core
author: JKemp
title: My favorite ice cream!
text;;;: I recently started to eat it for a while but haven't seen it in Walmart for a long time. I enjoy eating this flavor.;;;

name: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core
author: Devin
title: Best tasting!
text;;;: Vanilla always compliments chocolate and with the cookies and cheesecakes just makes it outta this world!;;;

name: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core,unclelynda,2018-11-18,5,Handsdown my favorite Ben & Jerry's Ice Cream,0,0,"I've tried almost all of them and this is the one I crave I crave the most. OMG, sooooo gooood!";;;
Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core
author: Lulu87
title: Best flavour ever
text;;;: Please bring this to England. I had it in Arkansas and I dream about it.;;;

name: Cookies & Cream Cheesecake Core
author: kyle00023
title: The best of all
text;;;: Best flavor yet..... for real each bite is a dream;;;

name: Karamel Sutra,EmmaWhoLostToday,2018-10-15,3,Favorite but missing the most important part..,8,1,"So, this is by far the best ice cream we've ever had. Like, literally the best one. I like the vanilla, husband likes the chocolate and we fight over the core. It gets intense.";;;
Karamel Sutra
author: Cookie123
title: Not a core just a small plug
text;;;: I've read all the reviews and they are correct the core does not go all the way through this product it is more like a caramel plug. Was disappointed;;;

name: Karamel Sutra
author: Cows
title: My Reason for Living
text;;;: I love this so much that I’ve honestly considered moving to VT to work in the factory so I can be so close to the creation of pure goodness. The only possible way to improve this would be to invent a time machine that comes with it so you can always go back and taste it for the first time and see the moment your life changes.;;;

name: Karamel Sutra,Brandi,2018-10-16,3,"So delicious, but...",12,0,"I bought this from Publix a few days ago and I loved it, until I noticed the core stopped half way through. It was very disappointing, the caramel core was my favorite part :(";;;

Karamel Sutra,Susan8081,2019-01-04,3,Love the taste,8,0,"I tried this and i love the combination, im just disappointed in the caramel "" core"" . I wish it went all the way to the bottom and not just half way through.";;;

Karamel Sutra,Cait5,2018-11-11,3,"Good flavor, but not enough caramel",1,0,"The caramel flavored ice cream is ok--it would be better as vanilla. But the combination of the chocolate flavor, the chocolate chunks, and the soft caramel core is delightful!! The only problem is that the caramel core *always* stops halfway through the pint, rendering the other half of the pint completely and totally worthless. The last pint I got, my boyfriend grabbed one small bowl of it, and there was no caramel left at all after that--there should be way more caramel since this flavor can really only be enjoyed by one person, one time before the rest of the pint is ready to be tossed. Again, good flavor, but poor execution. I would highly recommend it if there were more than a dollop of caramel.";;;
Karamel Sutra
author: lottybee91
title: Disappointing
text;;;: I used to love this but the last few times ive bought a tub the core stops halfway down! :-( so disappointing as the core is the best bit. The bottom half of the tub is boring! Wont be buying it anymore.;;;

name: Karamel Sutra
author: Kjeffersk
title: My favorite flavor but
text;;;: This is my favorite flavor. I love the Caramel ice cream with the caramel core and the chocolate ice cream with the chocolate chunks. But the last two times I have bought this the chocolate chunks have been in the caramel ice and not the chocolate ice cream. So you can’t the caramel ice cream flavor and I’ve have very disappointed. I hope this isn’t the new normal and it’s just a quality control issue.;;;

name: Karamel Sutra,Carolina,2017-12-14,2,Disappointed,1,0,"Bought this for the first time expecting the core to go all the way down. It didn’t, it stopped about 1/4 of the way in. So I did research and i found it was meant to go all the down so again I bought it along with a friend who also bought the same and to our disappointment the core AGAIN stopped 1/4 of the way in. I only purchased it for the caramel centre therefore will not be buying again as I do not want just chocololate ice cream. As the was 2/3 chocolate ice cream 1/3 caramel ice cream.";;;

Karamel Sutra,veggierap86,2017-05-18,5,"all time fave, however...",2,0,"PLEASE MAKE A DAIRY FREE VERSION! I've loved this since high school when it first came out however I am lactose intolerant and it has gotten worse with age lol I love all of Ben&Jerry's dairy free products though, keep it up! :)";;;

Karamel Sutra,Melask,2018-05-16,3,The core issue,1,0,"Obviosly when you read all reviews it becomes clear that it is not your intentions to have the core go all the way to the bottom. Considering how much they cost, that is really not okay. Other than that (which is quite major though), the icecream is good but the chocolate ice cream lacks a lot of taste and is quite hard and not at all as creamy as the caramel one. It could be amazing, but you have a lot to fix.";;;

Karamel Sutra,Jenna321,2020-07-03,5,"No caramel in ""karamel sutra""??",0,0,"I've frequently purchased the karamel sutra core iced cream from ben and jerry's, so when i bought one to find there was absolutely no caramel, as in not even a single drop of caramel in the pint, i was highly disappointed. I've seen alot of other comments from people having similar experiences with karamel sutra ranging from only 1/2 the amount of caramel the pint should have all the way to what i experienced which was absolutely no caramel. Ben and Jerry's definitely makes some good iced cream, but they need some serious quality control.";;;

Karamel Sutra,MandyHope,2018-04-16,2,"No caramel, great ice cream",1,0,"Yesterday we just bought a pint of this from an Earth Fare grocery. It is well within date, and the chocolate and vanilla ice creams inside were nice. BUT the supposed ""core"" of caramel was no more than a tablespoon-sized dollop at the top. No more caramel in the whole pint if ""karamel"" sutra ice cream.";;;

Karamel Sutra,itsaoliveira,2018-01-21,4,It would be the best if...,1,0,"... it was all caramel ice cream with the caramel core. The chocolate half is delicious but it overpowers the caramel ice cream. Also, I wish I knew what brand or how B&J makes their caramel. I could eat that alone! I always purchase this flavor. Wouldn’t trade it for anything.";;;

Karamel Sutra,EastCoastGen88,2018-09-15,5,My FAVORITE Core Flavor!!!,0,0,"I have been eating this since it came out and love it! Recently moved to NW Minnesota from the east coast and no one sells it here! I was literally crushed because I thought it was discontinued like my other old favorite That's My Jam, was. I finally found one random pint of it today and I am so excited to try it.";;;

Karamel Sutra,Denise21,2017-07-16,4,Great Flavor!,1,0,"This is absolutely my favorite flavor as of now. The only problem is the caramel core doesn't go all the way to the bottom. How disappointing! The one I just finished the caramel core barely went halfway down. Other than that, it is absolutely delicious.";;;
Karamel Sutra
author: Lf123456
title: Caramel Core In bits
text;;;: Just indulged a small tub of this but the caramel ran and bits and stopped im the middle. Wasn't all the way through in the centre. Really wish I had the perfect balance each time instead of only chocolate and caramel icecream and no centre;;;

name: Karamel Sutra
author: rose
title: disappointed about the core
text;;;: The core does not go all the way through and is truly disappointing because that's why I buy this! It stops about a third of the way through. Second time in a row recently this has happened.;;;

name: Karamel Sutra,ajoshua,2018-05-16,3,So yum but..,1,0,"First, I love Ben and Jerrys. And I love all these flavors, the core is great. But it ended like a quarter of the way into the pint, which was disappointing cause it was the best part.";;;

Karamel Sutra,Ruthgrace,2017-08-08,2,Disappointing,1,0,"Brought this last night, flavour is amazing, just a shame that the core only goes down half way. Considering they cost $13 each here in Australia, not happy.";;;
Karamel Sutra
author: LucyS
title: Love half of it
text;;;: The caramel ice cream half is amazing but the chocolate doesn't have enough flavour and the caramel core stops halfway. Salted caramel core is way better.;;;

name: Karamel Sutra
author: Rebecca
title: Get in my belly
text;;;: This flavor is absolutely amazing and they really load up on the caramel. It is a perfect treat. I would give it more stars if I could.;;;

name: Karamel Sutra,Anm8410,2018-05-03,3,Tasty for the first half,1,0,"This ice cream is great for the first half, but there’s no caramel core in the bottom half. Major disappointment.";;;
Karamel Sutra,rmulli502,2017-06-14,3,It's my favorite but...,1,0,"The last 3-4 times I've purchased, the core stops mid, or 2/3 of the way through.";;;
Karamel Sutra
author: fsumom
title: So delicious but
text;;;: the core does not go all the way to the bottom. It stops maybe half way through.;;;

name: Karamel Sutra,Jadees22,2020-03-16,5,Opened the door for me to try something new!!!,0,0,"I just bought this today, from Publix and felt compelled to leave a review. This ice cream is perfect for those that only stick to one kind of thing, but want to venture out and try something new. Karamel Sutra, is that new exciting flavor that has familiar vibes. Which is why I decided to try it. I haaaaaate trying new ice creams. But as good as this one is, I feel like I’m missing out of a world of flavors! I excited to buy again and then try some other flavors.";;;
Karamel Sutra,Schribt,2018-04-25,3,"Would be my favorite, but...",1,0,"Everytime I get this one, it doesn't have the carmel center :(";;;

Karamel Sutra,S McG,2018-06-15,5,An unforgettable experience!,0,0,"I have been faithfully addicted to Karamel Sutra since it was originally introduced. At times it is difficult to find. I have tried other flavors and brands and nothing comes close to this decadent delight. Karamel Sutra Core isn’t just an incredible taste;" you dream of it
author: and fantasize there is more as you reach the bottom. When I finish one
date: I can’t wait to go buy another. Karamel Sutra rocks you to the core as an unforgettable experience.""";;

name: Karamel Sutra,ellen,2018-04-13,1,my Karamel Sutra ice-cream came without caramel,2,2,"I bought two Ben & Jerrys Karamel Sutra and both were missing the Soft caramel core. Such a disappointment im so sad, I eat the Karamel sutra all the time and im very upset. =/";;;

Karamel Sutra,KS4Life,2017-09-10,4,Say It Ain't So,0,0,"I'm in Nashville, TN and I'm being told by the local stores that Karmal Sutra is no longer being produced. I am devastated by this news as Karmal Sutra is the most amazing ice cream that I have ever tasted and it is the only one that I eat. Say it ain't so! Please tell me there'd an error somewhere and let me know how I can still partake in the wonderful experience of your Karmal Sutra ice cream. Anxiously awaiting to hear from someone.";;;

Karamel Sutra,Milofield,2018-04-24,5,My favorite,0,0,"Frankly I don't care if the caramel doesn't go all the way to the bottom - it's very good & there's plenty. And the best part is the chocolate side anyway, love the chocolate bits in it too, but the vanilla is great as well.";;;

Karamel Sutra,Ben Cross,2018-06-16,5,Pint Sized Perfection!,0,0,"Karamel Sutra is an incredible blend of creamy, rich flavored ice cream with fudge chunks and mouth watering caramel core. It possesses the power to crush a person’s attempt to diet while making them perfectly happy to do so! While it is fair to say on occasion the caramel core does not reach the bottom of the pint, it won’t stop you from savoring every last bite! Go out and get this ice cream today before I eat it all.";;;

Karamel Sutra,Dakota,2018-11-30,5,The Only Ice Cream I'll Ever Eat Again,0,0,"Karamel Sutra is by far my most favorite ice cream I have ever had. I would be fine never having any other kind of ice cream. I have honestly had a disgusting amount of this flavor since my discovery. I know sometimes the core doesn't go all the way down, but I just eat a little off the top, then scoop out the rest in one giant scoop and flip it upside down. Then the core can be saved for last!!";;;
Karamel Sutra
author: Siren
title: Good idea...
text;;;: I love this flavor! Who doesn't want a thick gooey glob of caramel in the middle of their ice cream?! Only problem is about have way through the container the core is no longer there. The first time I thought maybe I just got a bad batch. It happens. Although I'm currently eating my third on (over a few months period of time I promise) and here I'am in the middle of the pint with no more core;;;

name: Karamel Sutra,FuzzyGut,2019-02-09,5,How I love thee,0,0,"This stuff... this stuff here. The caramel ice cream does taste like caramel. Rich and creamy like all Ben and Jerry’s. The chocolate side with fudge flakes is my favorite half. But the best part is that thick, sweet caramel core! It’s perfect caramel, flowing like honey through the ice cream, daring me to eat the core out of it and leave the ice cream for seconds. This is GREAT ice cream!!";;;

Karamel Sutra,Bream,2017-12-01,5,WHERE DID IT GO?,0,0,"This is the only flavor I've ever been able to find that's gluten free so it's been my go-to for several years... then out of nowhere it has disappeared from the 3 places I have been buying it from. A couple of months ago our Kroger stopped carrying it and then our small local grocery store ran out a few weeks later and last week I went to Whole Foods and thought I had found it but I got home, opened it up and took a bite without paying much attention and it had DISGUSTING Coconut in it. Trust me when I say that gluten free people have their absolute FILL of two flavors in every other thing they eat - almond and coconut - and I absolutely do NOT want it in my ice cream too.";;;

Karamel Sutra,Jennnnnn1112,2020-07-22,4,THE BEST!!,0,0,"This is the best ice cream I’ve ever had. Have to make sure I always have one(or more) in the freezer. The core definitely never reaches the bottom, but I just make sure to push the caramel sound so I can save some for the bottom. Also, sometimes the chips are in the caramel and sometimes they’re in the chocolate?? Confusion! But I will always buy this flavor.";;;

Karamel Sutra,Georgie,2018-09-23,2,Get rid of the s-xual innuendos,0,9,"The ice cream is pretty good, not very remarkable but not boring as far as caramel-chocolate ice cream flavors go. However, what I can't appreciate is the name and description of the flavor. I don't want to be reminded of s-xual activities whenever I see this product, and I don't want it to create awkward situations between curious children and their parents.";;;

Karamel Sutra,Jill,2020-07-16,3,Very tasty..but,0,0,"I recently purchased this product and it started off good;" expect for the fact that the caramel core disappears halfway through. Very disappointed and the caramel ice cream was lacking the caramel
author: it tasted more like a vanilla ice cream with a tang to it. Please improve your caramel ice cream and add more caramel core.""";;

name: Karamel Sutra
author: Esor
title: The Bomb!
text;;;: This IS ( period ) the best of the best. Been addicted from the first time I tried it over 10 years & counting. Never had a problem with the caramel core. I will literally go to different stores until I can find it. Crazy me went to 4 stores in a storm. LOL! Some days I have it for breakfast & dinner.;;;

name: Karamel Sutra,TD31,2017-10-15,5,This ice cream should be illegal...,0,0,"I told my husband he should have never brought this ice cream home, because now it is the only ice cream I want! It is absolutely amazing I can’t believe it’s real! It’s dangerous how good it is and it really tests my self control. One request... PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE MAKE A DAIRY FREE VERSION OF THIS!!!";;;

Karamel Sutra,Ginkgo,2020-05-12,5,The only reason I eat Ben and Jerry’s ice cream,0,0,"This flavor is the BEST. I didn’t even crave ice cream until my mother in law brought this to our table and now, HELP. It’s so good that I can eat a pint in a day. However, I can’t find it anymore! Since moving from Brooklyn, I have not been able to locate this flavor. Has it been discontinued?!?!";;;
Karamel Sutra
author: Enerlalem
title: Best ice cream ever
text;;;: The blending of flavour inside every pint of this one is so good. I refuses to eat ice cream is not the karamel sutra. Caramel is so soft not too sweet. The chocolate ice cream are so creamy as the caramel ice cream and chocolate tidbits are just bonus that makes this ice cream the best.;;;

name: Karamel Sutra,Sean84Irish,2019-09-23,4,Great tasting but faulty core,0,0,"This ice cream and mixture taste great. It's one of my favorite go tos. I would give it a 5 but the last couple times I've purchased this ice cream the core stops halfway through which is a little disappointing considering that the feature name of its series is ""core""";;;

Karamel Sutra,Mojitomami,2018-10-22,5,This flavor gives me life!!,0,0,"I was not impressed with Ben & Jerry's ice cream until I saw this flavor and its ingredients. From the first spoonful, I was in love!! The only drawback is that Karamel Sutra's hard to find in my city. So whenever I come across it, I usually buy at least four pints.";;;
Karamel Sutra
author: EmmaD23
title: Asking for a customer
text;;;: We have a customer in our store who loves this flavour but has been saying that it is very soft in our freezing. After getting checks on the freezers they are fine and so are other Ben and jerry flavours but we are cursious if this is due to the soft middle.;;;

name: Karamel Sutra,Dustybucket,2017-11-07,5,Karamel sutra.,0,0,"I love this flavor when I was able to find it I’m my local Walmart super Center but now I am not able to find it there. Your product locator just confirmed to me that it could not find it in my area . Please bring it back to Elkins,WV Walmart super Center.";;;
Karamel Sutra
author: Kenz
title: Was way better before changing
text;;;: Not a huge fan of the new fudge chips on the caramel side. It was my favorite flavor before this addition. I enjoyed having one side of the icecream that was perfectly creamy with the chunks remaining on the chocolate side. Not nearly as good now.;;;

name: Karamel Sutra
author: tshoreview
title: Name speaks for itself!
text;;;: Karamel Sutra is SO delish! The texture & flavor are unmatched and the smooth rich caramel core is such a WONDERFUL surprise to your taste buds. Superior quality and dedication to the best ice cream ever! My all-time favorite. Kudos Ben & Jerry!;;;

name: Karamel Sutra
author: Nat09
title: Good at anytime!
text;;;: I'm always looking for this flavor in store but when I find it...OH YES! This is my favorite flavor. From the caramel icecream to the core to the chocolate icecream and back....loveeeeeeee;;;

name: Karamel Sutra
author: Lordbuffington
title: My Favorite
text;;;: I cannot let this flavor have anything less than 5 stars. This is my all time favorite Ben & Jerry's! The center caramel is perfection. I like to save as much of it as I can till the end!;;;

name: Karamel Sutra,Ke no y,2017-09-28,5,Best by far,0,0,"I have been eating Karamel sutra ice cream when the grocery I shop at put it on the freezer shelf. If it was available by the gallon, I would buy at least 3 at a time.";;;
Karamel Sutra
author: Emily JT
title: PLEASE make it vegan!
text;;;: My nr 1 fave that is avaivable in Sweden! I have noticed that the core doesn't go all the way to the bottom :( And I WISH it was vegan </3 but overall SOSOSOSO GOOD!;;;

name: Karamel Sutra
author: Rhonda
title: All time Favorite
text;;;: I used to buy this regularly at the Giant Eagle stores in Ohio. I've not seen it in stock lately. I'm hoping the flavor doesn't drop into the graveyard.;;;

name: Karamel Sutra
author: Jenny55
title: Core or a Topping?
text;;;: Disappointed that the Karamel Core was only a third of the way down the center of the pint. I expected it to be all the way through to the bottom.;;;

name: Karamel Sutra,Layna,2017-05-07,4,Love it!!!!!,0,0,"Love it!!!!! One of my favorites. Awesome blend of ice cream, chocolate and caramel. Just wish the caramel core went all the way through.";;;
Karamel Sutra
author: Aski
title: OMG
text;;;: It's the best ice cream ever! Karamel Sutra has the best texture and flavor. The perfect amount of chocolate and I love the caramel core.;;;

name: Karamel Sutra
author: Aini
title: My Fav Ice cream
text;;;: Love it..... Personally I love the Caramel Core but it's very hard to find this flavor I don't know why rite aid don't have this flavor.;;;

name: Karamel Sutra,Cassidy526,2017-10-19,4,It’s great but...,0,0,"This ice cream is absolutely delicious, the best part is the caramel core. Unfortunately the core doesn’t go all the way to the bottom.";;;
Karamel Sutra
author: STK76
title: The Best
text;;;: A soft caramel core flowing between caramel ice cream and rich chocolate ice cream. The dark chocolate fudge chips are sublime.;;;

name: Karamel Sutra
author: Akiteonacloud
title: Team change!
text;;;: First I was in love with New York super fudge chunk but then I got a taste for this Karamel Jar of 7th heaven and I was sold!;;;

name: Karamel Sutra
author: igloofn68
title: Top Dog!
text;;;: This is my favorite. Many of these new ones are terrible! I can't stand the Jimmy Fallon pints at al to name a couple.;;;

name: Karamel Sutra
author: Glittery bohemian
title: Pretty delicious!!
text;;;: One of my favorite combos !!! Creamy and caramelly !!! Love!! S/o to BNJ for standing up for racial issues too !!;;;

name: Karamel Sutra
author: Leslie55
title: Simply Heavenly!
text;;;: I've been eating this ice cream for about a year now. It is simply wonderful. I really love the caramel core.;;;

name: Karamel Sutra,KellyCrayon,2017-05-13,3,Mixed Feelings,0,0,"It's a Ben and Jerry's creation, so it's automaticly tasty, but nothing about it made me want to try it again";;;
Karamel Sutra,Matt W,2019-03-10,5,By far the best of all worlds,0,0,"My go to, EVERYTIME. You can really tell the quality of ingredients in this pint by its superb taste. Bravo!";;;
Karamel Sutra,Shadow12,2017-08-07,5,So good!!,0,0,"Love caramel and this just brought it over the edge, absolutely in love with this!!! Simple but amazing :)";;;
Karamel Sutra,,2020-02-14,5,Absolutely My Favorite,0,0,"I may buy other flavors but not without including this one in the mix. Caramel and chocolate, enough said";;;
Karamel Sutra,Katmandu,2018-09-16,5,One of my absolute favorite ice cream flavors!,0,0,"One of the best ice cream flavors ever made! Once you start eating it, it's almost impossible to stop!";;;
Karamel Sutra,MsBluewings,2019-04-07,4,Caramel GALORE!!,0,0,"If you love caramel, you will love this combination. I would love more caramel in the core. YUM!";;;
Karamel Sutra
author: J4yb0n35
title: I would marry this ice cream
text;;;: This is the best ice cream ever. I love eating around the core until that's all that's left.;;;

name: Karamel Sutra

title: My favorite flavor!
text;;;: I can’t get enough of this flavor! My only issue is that it’s rarely available in my area.;;;

title: The Best
text;;;: This is by far the best Ice Cream I ever had! And the tast and consistency is outstanding;;;

title: Love it!!!
text;;;: By far my favorite one!!! Just have a hard time finding it in the stores around me!!!;;;

title: Omg amazing
text;;;: Amazing amazing. Only prob was core didn't go to the bottom. It's the best part. Sad.;;;

name: Karamel Sutra
author: natelise
title: My Favorite Ice Cream Ever
text;;;: This ice cream *literally* saves my life every time I eat it. The best. Period.;;;

text;;;: Just downright yummy & delicious. One can eat the whole pint in one setting;;;

text;;;: This is my favorite Ben & Jerry’s flavor!! Please never get rid of it;;;

name: Karamel Sutra

title: The only cure for that time of the month.
text;;;: I would truly die without it. it’s the only ice cream I care about.;;;

name: Karamel Sutra
author: Klaudert
title: Love it!
text;;;: This is hands down my favorite flavor! So delicious and decadent;;;

name: Karamel Sutra
author: Irene
title: Is it discontinued
text;;;: Have loved it for awhile now. But can’t seem to find it anymore.;;;

name: Karamel Sutra
author: abby
title: FAVORITE BEN & JERRYS!!!
text;;;: I always buy this ice cream whenever I go to the grocery store!;;;

name: Karamel Sutra
author: MorenitaSunshine
title: My Karamel Krack
text;;;: I love this one so much that I buy it when it’s not on sale.;;;

name: Karamel Sutra
author: Sportsnut1962
title: Best tasting caramel ever!
text;;;: This flavor has been one of my favorites for over 9 years!;;;

name: Karamel Sutra
author: Melba
title: AWESOME!!
text;;;: It’s good. That’s it. Just GOOOOOD!! Every single time!;;;

name: Karamel Sutra
author: Stef
title: Delicious
text;;;: It's great. Caramel core is the best part. I love it.;;;

name: Peanut Butter Fudge Core,Chocluvr,2018-02-04,5,Don't ever stop making this Ice Cream flavor!!!,22,0,"This is by far one of the best Ben & Jerry's flavor ever created. I found this flavor in my supermarket a few weeks ago & being a chocoholic peanut butter fanatic I had to try it. A delightful swirl of ice creams,a rich chocolately and creamy peanut butter core , and tons of chocolate peanut butter cups!!! Keep up the good work Ben & Jerry's!!!";;;

Peanut Butter Fudge Core,SusanR,2017-10-29,5,THE ABSOLUTE BEST,9,0,"It's hard to even find the words to describe how much I LOVE this ice cream. If ever it gets sent to the graveyard, I am not sure I would want to continue existing on such a cruel planet. Please, please, please never get rid of PEANUT BUTTER FUDGE CORE!";;;
Peanut Butter Fudge Core
author: LitaLo
title: Peanut Butter delight
text;;;: I have been buying this guy over and over. My freezer is always stocked with this flavor. The only bad thing Ihave to say is that not all contents of containers are created alike. Some have a lot of pb cups and some others lack those mini peanut butter cups that I love so much. I wish for more pb cups and less fudge core. Otherwise this is perfection;;;

name: Peanut Butter Fudge Core
author: chocho22
title: Chocolate and Peanut Heaven
text;;;: I bought the Peanut Butter Fudge Core yesterday and the moment the ice cream touched my tongue I was in heaven. This ice cream is now one of my favorite ice creams ever!! Thank you for creating this ice cream.;;;

name: Peanut Butter Fudge Core
author: Brittbrat
title: Lacking
text;;;: I eat ice cream for the yummy things that are in it (pieces of peanutbutter cups in this case) unfortunately I might have had in total 1 whole peanutbutter in the entire pint. Very disappointed as I love peanutbutter cups but with so very little in it I don't think I'll be getting this one again.;;;

name: Peanut Butter Fudge Core,slogirl,2018-11-15,3,Could be better,7,8,"I have bought this 3 times now, so you could say I'm a fan. I love the two different ice-cream flavors, but the core tastes fake and processed to me. I was hoping that maybe I just got a bad batch but now that my third one tastes the same I think this is the real flavor. Re-invent the core flavor and this would be a 5-star.";;;
Peanut Butter Fudge Core
author: Lyss24
title: New favorite flavor
text;;;: I bought this today after trying the cookie dough core pint which was highly disappointing. This one is 1000 times better and my new flavor. Two things I would change- more pb cups because when are there too many pb cups?? And the core didn't go all the way down;;;

name: Peanut Butter Fudge Core,TreeDancer,2018-01-28,5,"Holy cow, so good",1,0,"I wasn't expecting something this satisfying, it's perfectly balanced and no peanut butter cup will ever be worth it ever again, this ice cream has ruined me for any other brand.";;;

Peanut Butter Fudge Core,Jolty,2017-12-08,5,In love!!,1,0,"I love this ice cream!! Anytime I need something sweet I grab a pint of peanut butter fudge core, Plz dont ever stop making this flavor!!!";;;
Peanut Butter Fudge Core
author: Jdacld1224
title: The best flavor!!
text;;;: I could die for this flavor. The peanut butter fudge core is so amazing I could eat theee pints in a day.;;;

name: Peanut Butter Fudge Core,Sanford,2018-08-29,5,The Best Flavor,0,0,"This is my favorite ice cream flavor -- if this is in the store, I will never walk out with another flavor. If they don't have it, sometimes I'll walk another block to check another store or two. It's that good. Great balance, so it feels very rich instead and never too sweet. Both sides of the ice cream are equally compelling, so there are no disappointing bites. I hope this flavor sticks around for a long long time.";;;

Peanut Butter Fudge Core,Marley,2019-08-14,5,Awesome Flavor,0,0,"I can eat peanut butter, but I'm not a huge fan. In the store one day, they were out of my favorite (Half Baked). One of the few remaining flavors on the shelf, I bought the Peanut Butter Fudge Core. This stuff is so addictive, and I just can't get enough. I love the fudge core, and I love the tiny peanut butter cups. It's a perfect blend of flavors and textures. Beyond YUM!";;;
Peanut Butter Fudge Core
author: Shellyshellzs
title: Peanut butter fudge heaven
text;;;: Oh man I use to be a whatever was on sale girl but my now fiance brand me this ice cream when I wasn't feeling good and it quickly became my favorite. It's is the perfect combination. It hit the spot when you get the craving. I am always in the look out. I since tried other flavor. I'm found of fish food but this is delicious....please sell more shoprite in linden NJ lol;;;

name: Peanut Butter Fudge Core
author: Or1234
title: The best Chocolate Ice Cream Combo
text;;;: This is the first chocolate ice cream I’ve tried and actually liked. The peanut butter cups and the combination of all the flavors along with the smooth core texture makes for a dreamy ice cream!;;;

name: Peanut Butter Fudge Core
author: ava21
title: PERFECT!!
text;;;: This is the best pint of ice cream I've ever had!! If you like chocolate or peanut butter or ice cream or have any taste at all you'll love this flavor!!!!;;;

name: Peanut Butter Fudge Core
author: yeee
title: My favorite!
text;;;: This is my favorite ice cream ever! Can't get any better than that. Everyone who loves chocolate/peanut butter combination should try it.;;;

name: Peanut Butter Fudge Core
author: Ellehcar
title: The Best
text;;;: This is my favorite flavor...I can just buy one!! Highly recommend;;;
